<p>26a.5</p>NAM tsa pU dzAM tri da sha pU dzi taH/ /sa rat+na ba R+ShaiR+Yadz+nyA+en+to ka n+yA grA ma pU ra pra daH/ /sa hi taM tri da shA r+he na ha ri NA he ma mA li nA/ /da dau rA dza ga dzi brah+ma ra thA khyA ya pu ro d+ha se/ /yo dza nA nAM sha taM tU r+Na
<p>26a.6</p>po dang / /thub mchog rnams kyang mchod pa byas/ /mchod sbyin mjug tu mdzes ma dang / /grong dang grong khyer rin chen char/ /skabs gsum par 'os rta dag ni/ /gser gyi 'phreng ldan bcas des byin/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni mgyogs pa ru/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'gro ba gang / /rgyal po'i glang chen mdun na
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>me ke nA h+nA pra yA ti yaH/ /ta smai sa ma rbi ti dr-iSh+TA rAdz+nyA b+ha dra gi riM ga dzaM/ /a b+hUd duHpra sa ho rA dzA ta ta sbri hA kr-iSh+Ta mA na saH/ /pra yA te Sh+wa tha b+hU pe Shu pa smi te khu ma kha shrI yA/ /sa ma rbi ti ya dz+nya pha le
<p>26b.2</p>'don/ /tshangs pa'i shing rta zhes par byin/ /rgyal po'i glang chen bzang po'i ri/ /de la yang dag gtad mthong nas/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' der/ /chags pas drangs pa'i yid du gyur/ /de nas sa bdag mchod sbyin gyi/ /dpal gyis ya mtshan gshegs gyur cing / /sa yi spyod pas mchod sbyin 'bras/ /
<p>26b.3</p>b+hA rga bA ya ma hI b+hu dzA/ /ta mu bA tsa sa ma b+h+ye t+ya swa sti bA da pu raHpa raM/ /ma rI tsi shi Sh+yo bA hI kaHprA p+ta pU dzA sa no mu niH/ /rA dzan+na d+h+ya ya na s+yAn+te gu ru rme gu ru dak+Shi NAM/ /I ha te pa ritsaR+YAr+thI sA mA n+ya dza na durla b+hA/ /e ka stA
<p>26b.4</p>b+h+r-i gu'i bu la gtad pa'i tshe/ /ma rI tsi slob thub pa ni/ /mchod dang stan thob bA hI ka/ /yang dag 'ongs nas shes pa'i tshig /mngon du btang nas de la smras/ /rgyal po slob gnyer gang gi mthar/ /bdag gi bla ma bla ma'i yon/ /g.yog 'khor don du skye bo ni/ /thun mong ba las rnyed dka' bzhed/ /sgrub byed khyod
<p>26b.5</p>me ba bi d+hi nA ni rmi to durla b+ha pra daH/ /ba ha bo dzA tu dzA yan+te na lo ke kalpa pA da pA/ /de bi pad+mA ba ti pu tra sa hi ta gu ra be ma ma/ /ta paHkr-i sha ya br-id+ha ya dI ya tAM pa ri tsA ri kAM/ /i t+yu k+te mu ni nA rA dzA
<p>26b.6</p>nyid gcig pu yis/ /rnyed dka' rab tu sbyin pa sbrul/ /dpag bsam rkang 'thung 'jig rten na/ /nam yang mang po skye mi 'gyur/ /bdag gi bla ma dka' thub kyis/ /nyam chung rgas pa'i g.yog 'khor du/ /pad+ma ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /bu dang bcas pa gnang bar mdzod/ /thub pas de brjod rgyal po ni/ /
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>da yi tA bi pra yo ga dzAM/ /ru dzaM saM sta b+h+ya ma na sA ta mU tse b+hU d+ha raH/ /pra yats+tshA mi mu ne tu b+h+yaM mip+si tAM gu ru dak+Shi NAM/ /sa hi tAM yu ba rA dze na dzI bi tA b+h+ya d+hi kAM pri yAM/ /i t+yuk+t+wa sa su tAM tasmai da dau
<p>27a.2</p>brtan pa sa 'dzin btsun mo dang / /'bral las skyes pa'i mya ngan las/ /yid ni brtan pas de la smras/ /dga' ma srog las mngon par lhag /rgyal tshab dag dang bcas pa ni/ /mngon par 'dod pa bla ma'i yon/ /thub pa khyod la rab tu sbyin/ /de skad brjod nas mi bdag gis/ /pad ldan
<p>27a.3</p>pad+mA ba tIM nr-i paH/ /swa dzI bi te pi ni sne has+t+yA gaM sa twa ma yAt+ma nAM/ /A dA ya rA dza dA yi tAM bi ra ha kle sha kA ta rAM/ /sa pu trA mA shra mAM ga twA pra da dau gu ra we mu niH/ /a trAn+ta re duHpra sa haH
<p>27a.4</p>sras bcas de la byin/ /sems dpa' tshul ldan bdag nyid rnams/ /rang srog la yang chags med gtong / /bral ba'i nyon mongs kyis skrag pa'i/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo sras dang bcas/ /blangs te gnas su song nas ni/ /thub pas bla ma la rab phul/ /skabs der dregs bcas ku ru'i rgyal/ /
<p>27a.5</p>ku ru rA dzaHk+Shi tI shwa raM/ /dr-ip+to pa yA tse dU te na b+hU t+yai b+ha dra gi ri ga dzaM/ /pu ro hi tAr+b+yi taM rA dza na da dau dwi ra daM ya dA/ /ta dA bi pu la sai n+ye na swa yaM yod+d+hu sa mA ya yau/ /ba li nA ku ru rA dze na ru d+d+he pu ra Shu bar+t+ma su/ /
<p>27a.6</p>shin tu bzod dka' sa dbang la/ /glang chen bzang po'i ri bo ni/ /'byor phyir pho nyas nye bar blangs/ /mdun na 'don la byin zin pa'i/ /so gnyis rgyal pos ma byin gang / /de tshe rang nyid mang po'i sdes/ /g.yul ni rab tu 'gyed du 'ong / /ku ru'i rgyal po'i dpung rnams kyis/ /grong khyer lam rnams bkag pa la/ /
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>ba b+hU ba b+hU mi pa lA s+ya sai n+yA ra Na ra sod+b+ha TaM/ /sa bI ra kuny+dza ra ha riHshak+to s+ya ri bi dA ra Ne/ /dza na k+Sha ya b+ha yod+big+naHkA ru N+yAta sa ma tsin+ta yata/ /a ho\u0f85nu kU la mi traM me rA dzA duHpra sa haHpa raM/ /mA taM
<p>27b.2</p>sa gzhi skyong ba'i dmag gi tshogs/ /g.yul du 'jug pa rab spror gyur/ /dpa' bo glang chen seng ge de/ /dgra ni rnam 'joms nus gyur kyang / /skye bo 'dzad pas 'jigs shing 'khrugs/ /snying rje las ni yang dag bsams/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' ni/ /bdag gi rjes mthun grogs kyi mchog /glang po dag la
<p>27b.3</p>ga lo b+ha mo he na sa ha sA sha tru traM ga taH/ /sne hAn+tAHsu dza naiHsne hA ni sne hA n+tA+e sh+tsa ma d+h+ya maiH/ /du rdza nair+g+ho rA bai rA tAM b+ha ban+ti prA Na hA ri NaH/ /a ho bi b+ha ba lo b+he na k+Sha Na k+Sha yi ni dzI bi te/ /sa mud+Ya
<p>27b.4</p>chags rmongs pa/ /kye ma 'phral la dgra nyid gyur/ /dam pa'i mdza' ba mdza' ba'i mtha'/ /bar ma rnams kyis mdza' med mtha'/ /ngan pa rnams kyi srog 'phrog pas/ /shin tu 'jigs rung dgra mtha' yin/ /kye ma 'byor pa la chags pas/ /bdag gi yang dag sbyor ba 'di/ /srog ni skad cig
<p>27b.5</p>mo ya masmA kaM pa ra prA Na ni pA ta ne/ /hiM sa yA pa pra sAn+tA nAM shak+tA nAM ka li karma su/ /ra Na rak+tA b+hi Shik+tA naM b+hak+tar+tho yaM sa mu d+ya maH/ /se bA bi krI ta dzI bA nAM tsaN+Da pIN+DAr+thi na ma yaM/ /ka la ho daHsa
<p>27b.6</p>'jigs ldan zhing / /gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la'o/ /'tshe bas ngal la rab chags shing / /g.yul gyi khrag gis mngon bkrus pa'i/ /sems can yang dag sbyor ba 'di/ /zas don rtsod pa'i las la'o/ /g.yog 'khor gtum drag phra ma can/ /srog rnams 'tshong zhing kha zas dag /don gnyer rnams
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>haHbkrauR+Ya pi shu nA nAM shu na mi ba/ /a ho bi b+ha ba lu pa d+hI nAM pa ra san+tA pa shI ta lAH/ /swa su kha yai ba d+hA ban+ti nr-i shaM sa tsa ri to d+hi yaH/ /ye yud+d+hi sid+d+hi san+nad+d+hA rak+tAn+taM b+hUny+dza te shri yaM/ /ku taHkrU ra tA
<p>28a.2</p>kyi rtsod pa ni/ /khyi rnams kyi bzhin bzod par dka'/ /kye ma rdzas la chags pa'i blo/ /pha rol gdung bas bsil gyur pa/ /rang nyid bde ba kho na'i phyir/ /ma rungs spyod la rab tu rgyug /gang zhig g.yul grub go bgos shing / /khrag gis sbags pa'i dpal za ba/ /de snying rab tu drag
<p>28a.3</p>re te ShAM hr-i da ya kA ru Na ka NaH/ /e Sha duSh+p+ra sa ho rA dzA lub+d+ho bi b+ha ba mo hi taH/ /na ba d+h+yaHsA pa rA d+ho pi kA ru NA ya ta naM ma ma/ /i ti tsin+ta ya ta sta s+ya kA ru N+yA ta kA na nai Shi NaH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+hAsh+tsa twa raHswa yaM byom+nA sa
<p>28a.4</p>po la/ /snying rje'i cha ni ga la zhig /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' 'di/ /rnam par 'byor la chags shing rmongs/ /bdag gi snying rje'i yul gyur pas/ /gnod byed gyur kyang gsad mi 'os/ /de ltar bsams shing snying rje las/ /nags ni 'tshol byed de yi slad/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rang nyid mkha'
<p>28a.5</p>mA ya yuH/ /prAp+ta pU dzA s+sa nAHshru twA sarba dz+nyasta ta sA mI hi taM/ /rA dz+nyaHpra sha ma shI la s+ya pra san+nAsta twa mU ci re/ /saM mo ha pa Ta lAn+d+he Shu saM sA ri Shu da yA lu tA/ /sho b+ha te ta ba b+hU pI la sa twa lo ka bi be ki naH/ /
<p>28a.6</p>las yang dag 'ongs/ /kun mkhyen mchod dang stan thob cing / /dang bas rab zhi ngang tshul can/ /rgyal po yang dag bzhed pa de/ /thos nas de nyid rab tu gsungs/ /'khor ba kun rmongs rab rib kyi/ /long bar brtse ba dang ldan pas/ /sems pa snang ba'i rnam rig can/ /sa skyong khyod ni mdzes par gyur/ /
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>kri ya tA mI p+sI taM rA dza na bo d+hau bud+d+hirni d+hI ya hAM/ /saM pra ti pra ti ro d+hesmin ba na me ba bi gA h+ya tAM/ /smai ra nir+dz+ha ra dz+haM kA ra kIr+N+Na saM to Sha sI ka rAH/ /bi bik+ta kA na nod+d+he sha sha mi na me ba pal+la b+hAH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA
<p>28b.2</p>rgyal po dgyes par mdzod cig dang / /byang chub tu ni blo gros tshugs/ /da lta rab tu 'gog pa'i tshe/ /nags nyid du ni 'gro bar byas/ /chu rgyun rab gsal lhung lhung sgrog /yang dag sim byed thigs pa can/ /dben pa'i nags kyi sa phyogs de/ /zhi ba rnams kyi dga' bskyed nyid/ /rjes su bzung blos
<p>28b.3</p>nu gra ha d+hi yA bi d+ha yA s+ya bi yang+ga tiM/ /pra b+hA pra sA di ta di shaste te na sa hi tA ya yuH/ /yA te Shu swa pa daM te Shu hi ma bat+ta Ta kA na naM/ /saM prA pya pr-i thi bI pA laHpra yan+na pra sha mo b+ha bta/ /
<p>28b.4</p>'di gsungs nas/ /de la mkha' gshegs bsgrubs byas te/ /'od kyis phyogs rnams rab gsal zhing / /de dang lhan cig de rnams gshegs/ /de rnams rang rang gnas gshegs te/ /sa skyong gangs can ngos kyi nags/ /yang dag thob pas rab dang zhing / /rab tu zhi ba dag tu gyur/ /
<p>28b.5</p>bi be ka bi ma la sta s+ya d+hi yaHsa twa ba tA mi ba/ /ba b+hU pri ya ni puHpUr+N+Na nirbA N+yo ba na b+hU ma yaH/ /b+hU d+ha rAM ta ri te ta smin sa ha sA b+hU pa b+hA swa ti/ /shu shu burmo ha ti mi ra prAp+ta sho ka pra dzAHpra dzAH/ /ta tastata
<p>28b.6</p>snying stobs ldan rnams nang na ni/ /de blo dben zhing dri ma med/ /dga' ba'i char ni rdzogs pa'i sa/ /nags kyi sa gzhi bzhin du gyur/ /sa bdag 'od ldan 'phral la ni/ /sa 'dzin dag gis bsgribs pa der/ /gti mug rab rib thob pa yis/ /mya ngan 'gro tshogs skye rgu nyal/ /de nas thub pa
<p>28b.7</p>par 'dir dga' ba'i char gyi skad dod yig 'bru gsum chad pa ma dpe rnams las ma rnyed pa pri ya ni zhes pa 'di'ang ra los gsar du bcug pa rgya dpe rnyed na dpyad/
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>sa tsi bA ga ke ma rI tse mu ni mA shra me/ /shak+taM rAdz+ya s+ya rak+ShA yai rA dza pu traM ya yA ci reH/ /mu ni nA nirbi kA re Na dat+ta mA dA ya man+t+ri NaH/ /rA dza su nuM swa na ga re tsakruHsai n+ya sa mud+Ya maM/ /ta taHs+yai n+ya
<p>29a.2</p>ma rI tse'i/ /dbus su de yi blon po song / /rgyal srid bsrung bar nus gyur pa'i/ /rgyal po'i sras ni rab tu bslangs/ /thub bas rnam 'gyur med par byin/ /blon po yis ni blangs byas te/ /rgyal sras rang gi grong khyer du/ /dmag tshogs yang dag ldan par byas/ /de nas dmag sde'i
<p>29a.3</p>sa mamut+sA ha i ba rA dza ba rAt+ma dzaH/ /su b+ha TA gre sa raHprA puHku ru rA dzaM ra NA dzi re/ /sa te na ha ta bi d+h+wasta b+hag+na san+da na kuny+dza raH/ /pa lA ya na pa ri trA NaHpra ya yau ha sti na pu raM/ /ba li nA rA dza pu tre Na dzi
<p>29a.4</p>spro ba bzhin/ /shin tu dpa' ba sngon 'gro ba/ /rgyal po mchog gi sras po yis/ /'khrug sar ku ru'i rgyal po sleb/ /de yi shing rta glang po che/ /bcom zhing rnam bshig bcag pas de/ /'bros pas yongs su skyob byed cing / /ha sti na yi grong du song / /stobs ldan rgyal po'i sras po des/ /
<p>29a.5</p>te duSh+p+ra sa he yu d+hi/ /man+t+ri b+histad+b+hu dza n+ya stA b+hU min she Sha d+h+r-i tiM ya yo/ /rA dz+nye duSh+p+ra sa ha s+yA tha kA le na ka lu ShAt+ma naH/ /ba b+hU ba br-iSh+Ti dur+b+hik+Sha ma ra ko pa p+la baHpu re/ /sa bi tsin+t+ya nu tA pAr+t+ta stI praM dza na
<p>29a.6</p>shin tu bzod dka'i g.yul bcom la/ /blon pos de dpung sa bkod pas/ /lhag ma can bzhin dga' bar gyur/ /de nas dus kyis sdig bdag nyid/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka' yi/ /grong du char med mug dang / /yams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba byung / /mi bzad grong rdal rgud pa dag /bsams pas
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>pa dA pa daM/ /na bi be da pa ri trA NaM bi pha la swasti kaHkri yaH/ /pr-iSh+TA bi pata pra tI kA raM te nA mA t+yAsta mU tse re/ /duHsa ho yam+ma hA rA dza dza na bya sa nod+b+ha baH/ /ma Ni tsU Da s+ya b+hU di tsau Da ma Ni pra b+ho/ /
<p>29b.2</p>rjes su gdung bas gzir/ /dge ba'i bya ba 'bras med des/ /yongs su skyob pa rig ma gyur/ /rgud pa sel byed de yis dris/ /blon po rnams kyis de la smras/ /rgyal po chen po bzod dka' 'di/ /skye bo gdung ba yang dag bskyed/ /sa bdag gtsug na rin chen gyis/ /jo bo gal te gtsug gi nor/ /
<p>29b.3</p>la b+h+ya te sa su d+hA s+yan+dI te ne yaM tA+e R+Ya te bi pata/ /tsA re b+h+yaHshru tamasmA b+hiHsa rA dza hi ma bat+ta Te/ /s+thi taHsaM sA ra bai mu khyaHbi be ka bi ma lA sha yaH/ /ar+thi taHsa da dA t+ye ba bi shwa tsin+tA ma Nirma NiM/ /pu tra dA ra sha
<p>29b.4</p>bdud rtsi'i brlan ldan rnyed na ni/ /de yis rgud pa 'di las thar/ /gangs can ngos na rgyal po de/ /dben zhing dri bral bsam pa yis/ /'khor ba'i las ni phyir phyogs gnas/ /bdag gis bya ma rta las thos/ /kun gyi yid bzhin nor bu de/ /bslangs na nor bu ster ba nyid/ /bu dang chung ma lus la
<p>29b.5</p>rI rA di na de yaM ta s+ya kiM tsa na/ /i ti man+t+ri ba tsaHshrU twA ta the t+ya rad+hA R+Ya tse ta si/ /sa dwi dzAn+ma Ni yadz+nyA yai bi sa sardza ta dan+ti kaM/ /asmin+na ba sa re rA dzA ma Ni tsU Da sh+tsa ren pa ne/ /ma rI tse rA shra mo pAn+ta ma bA pa
<p>29b.6</p>sogs/ /de yi sbyin min ci yang med/ /de skad blon po'i tshig thos nas/ /sems la de bzhin brtan byas te/ /de yis slong phyir bram ze rnams/ /de yi drung du brdzangs par gyur/ /skabs 'dir rgyal po gtsug na ni/ /nor bu nags su rgyu ba yis/ /thub pa ma rI tse'i gnas kyi/ /nye 'khor
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>bi pu laM mu neH/ /de bI pad+mA ba tI ta tra pha la mU lA d+h+ri ti bra tA/ /pra dzan+tI bi dza ne b+hI tA bi pe ne mu ne shA sa nAta/ /sa ba rair+m+r-i ga yA yA tair+d+r-iSh+TA kaSh+Ta da shAM shr-i TA/ 8/dzi g+h+r-i
<p>30a.2</p>yangs par phyin par gyur/ /der ni lha mo pad+ma ldan/ /rtsa ba 'bras za'i brtul zhugs bzung / /mi med nags su thub pa yis/ /bstan pa las ni 'jigs shing song / /rngon la 'gro ba'i sha ba ris/ /sdug bsngal gnas skabs bsten pa mthong / /'dzin
<p>30a.3</p>k+Shu b+hiHkam+pa mA nA tsu kro sha ka ru Na swa raM/ /A kar+N+ya ka ru NA kran+daM ku ra lI kU dzi to pa maM/ /hA rA dzan+ma Ni tsU De ti tra ya swe ti ra duHsa haM/ /sa ha sA b+hi dru ta kAn+tAM da daR+sha nr-i pa tirni dzAM/ /rU hu saM trA
<p>30a.4</p>par 'dod pas 'dar gyur cing / /snying rje rje skad cho nges btab/ /kyi hud rgyal po gtsug na nor/ /zhes dang skyabs shes mi bzad pa/ /bya ni ku re re sgrogs bzhin/ /snying rjer cho nges grags pa thos/ /mi bdag rgyugs pa'i 'phral la ni/ /rang gi mdzes ma mthong gyur te/ /zla ba sgra gcan
<p>30a.5</p>si ta s+yen+nir+r+Yu tin+ni pa ti tA mi ba/ /bI ta rA gAM ga ba sa nAM ni rany+dza na pa ri gra haM/ /ba dan+tI mi baM saM b+ho ga saM yo gA nA ma nI t+ya tAM/ /tAM rA dza haM sa su ga tAM bi hA ra sta na mAN+Da lAM/ /
<p>30a.6</p>gyis skrag pa/ /'od ni rnam par nyams pa bzhin/ /chags bral lus kyi gos 'dzin cing / /mig sman yongs su 'dzin dang bral/ /rdzogs pa'i longs spyod kun sbyor rnams/ /mi rtag nyid du smra ba bzhin/ /rgyal po ngang pa bde bar gshags/ /nu ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas/ /
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>a shru kA ShA ya nA ya naM bi lo kya ka ru NA ba nIM/ /saM sA ra tsa ri tAsh+tsaR+ya bi tsa re Sh+wa pi karka shaM/ /kr-i pA kr-i pA NI ni rlU na mi ba b+hU pa terma naH/ /e kA ki naM ba ne de bI bi ga tats+tsha tra tsA ma raM/ /dr-iSh+T+wa
<p>30b.2</p>'dren byed mchi ma'i ngur smrig can/ /snying rje'i sa de rnam gzigs nas/ /'khor ba'i spyod pa ngo mtshar can/ /rnam par spyod la sra gyur kyang / /sa bdag yid ni brtse ba yi/ /chu gris nges par bcad pa bzhin/ /lha mo mgon med lta bu yis/ /nags su mgon po gcig pu nyid/ /'jig
<p>30b.3</p>nA tha ma nA th+yai ba lo ka nA thaM ta thA ga taM/ /tad+bi yo ga bi ShA krAn+tA tad+daR+sha na ra sA ku lA/ /sho ka taR+Sha sa mA kIr+NA ba b+hU ba b+h+r-i sha bi hwo lA/ /sAn+bi tAHsa ba rA rA dz+nya shA pa b+hI ta pra du dru shuH/ /
<p>30b.4</p>rten mgon po de ltar song / /gdugs dang rnga yab bral mthong nas/ /de bral dug gis non pa dang / /de mthong nyams dga' rgyas pa dag /mya ngan dga' ba yang dag rdzogs/ /myur du rnam par 'khrugs par gyur/ /rgyal po zhi bgyis sha ba ri/ /dmod pas 'jigs nas rab tu bros/ /
<p>30b.5</p>na nA ma b+h+yu da ye b+hA nor+d+r-iSh+TaM sa pra ti b+haM ta maH/ /a trAn+ta re sha ma dwe ShI sarba b+hU tA sha yA sha yaH/ /mA raHpu ru Sha rU pe Na sa me t+ya nr-i pa ma shra bIta/ /rA dzAn+dI dzI ba na ya nAM pri yAM pra Na yi nI mi
<p>30b.6</p>nyi ma mngon par 'char ba yis/ /mthu ldan mun pa dman gyur mthong / /bar 'dir zhi la sdang ba'i bdud/ /'byung po kun gyi bsam par gnas/ /skyes bu'i gzugs kyis yang dag 'ongs/ /mi bdag la ni smras par gyur/ /rgyal po chu skyes spyan ldan dag /mi med nags su
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>mAM/ /na t+yak+tu mar+ha s+ya dza ne ba ne ba na dza lo tsa na/ /i yaM hi te ma no pr-i ti ri ba niHsu kha tAM ga tA/ /brdzi tA rA dz+ya b+ho ge na rA dza rA dza na rA dza te/ /e ta dA kar+N+ya nr-i
<p>31a.2</p>dga' ma ni/ /phreng ldan mig can mnyes gshin ma/ /'di ni gtang bar mi 'os so/ /rgyal srid longs spyod kyis spangs nas/ /nges par bde med gyur ba 'di/ /khyod kyi yid kyi spyod tshul bzhin/ /rgyal po'i rgyal po mi mdzes so/ /de dag thos shing dben pa
<p>31a.3</p>pa tistaM bi dz+nyA ya ma no b+hU ba/ /an+ta rA yaM bi be ka s+ya prA t+ya b+hA Shi ta sa smi taH/ /dzA nA mi trA ma haM kA ma ma kA maM sha ma saM ya me/ /saM to Sha bA saM ko nA pa b+ha ba tA na bi mo hi taH/ /i ti bA di ni b+hU pA le
<p>31a.4</p>yi/ /bar du gcod byed yid byung du/ /rnam par shes te mi bdag gis/ /'dzum bcas de la lan smras pa/ /dul la zhi ba mi 'dod pa'i/ /'dod pa khyod ni bdag gis shes/ /rab tu sim par 'dod pa rnams/ /su zhig khyod kyis rnam mi rmongs/ /sa skyong de skad brjod pa yis/ /
<p>31a.5</p>sa ha sAn+ta ri tai sma re/ /ba b+hU ba bi kla bA de bI tap+tA bi ra ha ba h+ni n+na/ /duHkhi tAn+tA mar+ha duHkhA pa ti b+ho ga pi yo gi nIM/ /u bA tsA shwa sa ya nrA dzA dzA yAM dzi ta ma no b+ha ba/ /de ba d+har+m+ma kr-i
<p>31a.6</p>'phral la 'dod pa mi snang gyur/ /'bral ba'i me yis gdungs pa yis/ /lha mo shin tu rnam par 'khrugs/ /yid byung las rgyal rgyal po yi/ /btsun mo bdag po longs spyod pa la/ /sdug bsngal mi 'os sdug bsngal ldan/ /de la dbugs ni 'byin zhing smras/ /lha mo chos ni
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>ya yuk+tA na sho kaM kartu mar+ha si/ /duHkhA pa pa ni bi ra saHsarbaM yaM su kha bi b+h+ra maH/ /de hi nAM da yi tA saM gAsta raM ga ta ra lA yu ShAM/ /lo la pad+ma pa lA shA gra s+kha ladz+dza ma la bA ku lAH/ /i mA mU hUrta
<p>31b.2</p>bya bar rigs/ /mya ngan bya bar mi 'os so/ /bde bas rnam par 'khrul pa yis/ /ro bral mjug ni sdug bsngal yin/ /lus can tshe ni rgyug chu 'dra/ /g.yo ba rnams kyi snying sdug grogs/ /pad+ma g.yo ba'i 'dab rtse na/ /'bred pa'i chu thigs lta bu yin/ /dpal 'di yud tsam
<p>31b.3</p>nArta kyaHkAl me g+ha ta Dil+la tAH/ /saM sA ra sar+p+pa ra sa nA bi lA sa tsa pa lA shri yaH/ /b+ho ga k+Sha No nai ba bi yo ga ro gAHbi b+hU ta yaHswap+na bi bA ha tu l+yAH/ /bA tA ha tA dI pa shi khA su kha shrI tun+mat+ta nr-it+taM b+ha ba pr-it+ta
<p>31b.4</p>gar mkhan dang / /dus kyi sprin glog 'khyug pa dang / /'khor ba'i sprul gyi ro 'dzin ni/ /rnam par rtse bzhin rab tu g.yo/ /longs spyod skad cig kho nas 'bral ba'i nad/ /'byor ba rmi lam bag ma len dang mtshungs/ /bde ba'i dpal ni rlung bsnun mar me rtse/ /srid pa'i spyod tshul 'di dag
<p>31b.5</p>me tata/ /sarbo pa dzI b+h+ya ka ru Na na lak+Sh+mI sad+d+har+m+ma pra kA shaHsa tan na dI pAH/ /ya shAM si ra myA ni na yau ba nA ni s+thi rA Ni pu N+yA ni na dzI bi tA ni/ /sa t+ya pra tastA mi ti sA twa yi twA bi sr-i dz+ya dzA yaM ni la
<p>31b.6</p>smyon pa'i gar/ /snying rje kun gyis bsten bya dpal 'byor min/ /dam chos rtag tu gsal byed mar me min/ /grags snyan rnams kyis dga' ldan na chung min/ /bsod nams dag ni brtan ldan 'tsho ba min/ /bden pa'i brtul zhugs kyis ni de la de skad gdams/ /drang srong chen po'i
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>yam+ma haR+SheH/ /tsa tsA ra saM sA ra pa rAd+mu khA nAM saM to Sha pu N+ye Shu ta po ba ne Shu/ /ta thA ga tA ste twa ra yA bi mr-iSh+TAHpany+tsa dwi dzA duSh+p+ra sa he na rA dz+nyA/ /
<p>32a.2</p>'dul ba btsun mo rnams btang nas/ /'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs rnams kyi dka' thub nags/ /yang dag bsil byed bsod nams ldan par rgyu zhing song / /rgyal po shin tu bzod dkas myur bar gnyis skyes lnga/ /rnam par btang zhing de bzhin song bas des/ /
<p>32a.3</p>ta mar+thi nA me ka ma kA la ban+d+huM bi shud+d+ha sa twa da dr-i shurba nAn+ti/ /te swa sti bA daM sa na kairbi d+hA ya bi shasta i ba sa d+h+wa se na/ /ta mU ci re sU ci ta tI bra tA pA dIr+g+hoSh+Na ni shwA sa sa mI ra Nai na/ /rA
<p>32a.4</p>rnam dag snying stobs slong ba rnams kyi ni/ /dus med gnyan gcig po de nags mthar mthong / /'jigs nas brtan pa rnam par btang ba bzhin/ /de dag gis ni sgra bskyungs shis brjod bsgrubs/ /shugs ring ring zhing dro ba'i rlung dag gis/ /mi bzad gdung ba bsal byas de la smras/ /rgyal
<p>32a.5</p>dza na pu re duHpra sa ha s+ya rA dz+nyAHkrU ro pa sargar+haita shAn+ta b+r+gaH/ /dza naHkr-i taHkr-it+ta sa map+ta kA maHpra kA ma mAr+t+ta swa na mA tra sheShaH/ /a she Sha do Sha pra sha mai ka he tus+t+rai lo kya rak+Sha pra thi ta pra b+hA baH/ /tsU DA ma
<p>32a.6</p>po shin tu bzod dka'i grong khyer du/ /rgyal po drag po'i nyer 'tshes dge tshogs bcom/ /skye bo'i 'dod pa mtha' dag chad par byas/ /rab 'dod gzir ba'i sgra tsam lhag mar gyur/ /skyon rnams ma lus zhi ba'i rgyu gcig pu/ /'jig rten gsum bsrung grags pa'i mthu ldan pa/ /gtsug gi nor
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>Ni rdai ba b+ha ba dwi dI NAHka ro ti ta s+yo pa ni pA ta shAn+ti ma/ /da yA dzu Shash+tsan+da na pal+la bAr+d+raHswats+tshA sha yA sh+tsan+d+ra ma Ni pra kA shaH/ /saM tA pa kA le sha ra NaM dza nA nAM b+ha bad+bi d+hA e ba b+ha be b+ha ban+ti/ /i t+ya r+thi
<p>32b.2</p>bu lha khyod gnang ba na/ /de yis nye bar 'tshe rnams zhi bar bgyid/ /brtse bas bstan pa tsan+dan yal 'dab brlan pa dang / /dri med bsam pa zla pa'i nor bu rab gsal ba/ /khyod nyid lta bu yongs su gdung ba'i dus su ni/ /srid par skye bo rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ba yin/ /de dag gis
<p>32b.3</p>tastair bi lub+ta sa twAHsaM pUR+Ya mA NaHka ru NA ra se na/ /u bA tsa saM tsin+t+ya dza no pa tA paM saM krAn+ta man+taHshru ti bar+t+ma ne ba/ /a ho sa rA dza sa ha te ka than+na de bo ba g+hA te na ni pI
<p>32b.4</p>ni de skad bslangs la snying stobs rnams/ /rnam par ma bri snying rje'i ro yis yang dag khengs/ /thos pa'i lam nas skye bo'i nye bar gdung ba dag /khong du yang dag zhugs bzhin legs par bsams nas smras/ /kye ma ma la nye bar 'joms pa'i las kyis ni/ /nges par gzir ba'i skye rgu
<p>32b.5</p>Di tA nAM/ /nirda ri tAn+taH ka ra NaM pra dzA nAM bi yo ga duHkhod+b+ha ba mAr+t+ta nA daM/ /a yaM ma Nir+m+mA sta ka mU la dzan+mA naskr-i t+ya tUr+N+NaM pra ti gr-i h+ya tAM me/ /d+ha s+yAsmi ya d+yaM r+thi dza na s+ya duHkha k+Sha ye
<p>32b.6</p>bral ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /rab skyes cho nge'i sgra ni nang gi byed pa dag /nges par 'joms pa rgyal po des ni ji ltar bzod/ /bdag gi mgo yi rtsa ba las skyes nor bu 'di/ /myur du nges par chod la rab tu bzung bar gyis/ /gal te skye bo slong ba'i sdug bsngal 'dzad pa yi/ /
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>k+Sha NaM kA ra Na tAM bra dzA mi/ /i t+yuk+ta mA tre ba su d+hA d+hi pe na d+hA ra d+ha rAM bo d+hi ma hI d+ha ri trI/ /tsi raM tsa kam+pe tsa ki te ba ta s+ya shi rasta Tot+pA Ta na tI bra duHkhAta/ ta taHkr-i pA
<p>33a.2</p>rgyu nyid du ni skad cig bdag 'gro bdag legs so/ /nor 'dzin bdag pos de skad smras tsam la/ /sa 'dzin chu gte ra dang bcas 'dzin ma ni/ /de yi spyi bo 'gems pa'i sdug bsngal dag /drag pos 'jigs pa bzhin du ring zhig 'dar/ /de 'og mi bdag thugs
<p>33a.3</p>ko ma la tsit+ta br-it+taistIk+Sh+Na shas+t+rairba tsa sA nr-i pa s+ya/ /su tI k+Sh+Na sha tra da pi tIk+Sh+Na tsit+taHswa yaM shi raHpA Ta yi tuM pra br-it+tAH/ /ta duHka raM karma na ra shwa ra s+ya byom+na bi mA nairna li nA sa nA d+yaH/ /su rAHsa bi d+yAd+ha ra
<p>33a.4</p>spyod brtse ba yis/ /mnyen pa'i gsung gis rab rno mtshon pas kyang / /rno ba'i sems ldan de rnams mtshon rnon gyis/ /rang nyid spyi bo 'gems la rab tu zhugs/ /rig 'dzin grub pa sgrub bcas lha rnams ni/ /pad+ma'i stan sogs mkha' yi gzhal yas nas/ /mi dbang de yi dka' spyad mdzad pa
<p>33a.5</p>sid+d+ha sA d+h+yaHsa mA ya yur+d+r-iSh+Tu ma lup+ta sa twaM/ /bi pA T+ya mA ne shi ra si sra sa h+ya rat+na pra b+hA bi b+h+ra ma mA da d+hA naiH/ /sa rak+Sha pU rai ra b+hi Shik+ta kA yaHse he bya thA mar+thi su khe pra br-it+taH/ /pi lo kya taM sa twa ni pad+d+ha d+haiR+Ya tI
<p>33a.6</p>la/ /snying stobs ma zhum blta phyir yang dag 'ongs/ /'phral la spyi bo rnam par bkas pa yis/ /rin chen 'od du rnam par 'khrul 'dzin pa'i/ /khrag gi rgyun gyis mngon gtor lus can de/ /slong ba'i bde la rab zhugs gdung ba bzod/ /sdug bsngal drag po'i shugs kyis mig zum
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>bra bya tha be+e ga ni mI li tA k+ShaM/ /ya yurbi rA mAM na nr-i shaM pra br-it+terbi prAHk+Sha NaM rAk+Sha sa tA ma bAp+tAH/ /bi tsAR+ya rA dzA swa sha rI ra duHkhaM saM sA ri NAM kle sha mA yaM sha rI raM/ /e baM bi d+hai rduHkha sa ha sra
<p>33b.2</p>zhing / /brtan pa'i snying stobs kyis bcings de mthong ste/ /skad cig srin po nyid ni thob pa bzhin/ /gtum spyod bram ze dga' dang bral ma gyur/ /rgyal pos rang lus sdug bsngal rnam dpyad pas/ /'khor ba pa rnams nyon mongs rang bzhin lus/ /rnam pa 'di lta'i sdug bsngal stong 'bum
<p>33b.3</p>lak+Shai rA krAn+ta mi t+yAr+t+ta ta ro ba b+hU ba/ /so tsin+ta yad dai ha ni bad+d+ha rad+na dA ne yat+pu N+ya pha lam+ma yAp+taM/ /te no gra duHkhaM ka la yA mi mA b+hU pu N+ya pA ke na ra ke na rA NAM/ /sa mud+d+h+r-i te rak+ta bA sA
<p>33b.4</p>gyi/ /zil gyis mnan ces rab tu gdung bar gyur/ /des bsams lus bcings rin chen byin pa las/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bdag gis gang thob des/ /bsod nams min smin dmyal bar mi rnams kyi/ /drag po'i sdug bsngal cha yang med par gyur/ /khrag dang zhag gis nges bran
<p>33b.5</p>ba sik+te tasmin+ma Nau nish+tsa la tA lu mU lAta/ /mUr+ts+tshA ku lo pi tra ya yau sa haR+Sha saM pU ra Ne nAr+thi ma no ra the na/ /sa kam+pa mA nAM gu li pal+la be na da twA swa ha ste na ma NiM dwi dze b+h+yaH/ /ni mI la yan san+ta ma se
<p>33b.6</p>nor bu de/ /g.yo med mtshog ma'i rtsa ba las bton pa'i/ /brgyal bas 'khrugs kyang slong ba'i re ba dag /yongs su rdzogs pas de ni rab dgar gyur/ /gnyis skyes rnams la rang gi lag sor gyi/ /yal 'dab 'dar bzhin nor bu byin nas de/ /yang dag mun pas 'jig rten
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>na lo kaM pa ta tik+mAM shu ri bA ti rak+taH/ /a lup+ta sa twe pa ti te pr-i thi byAM tasmin su rA NAM sa ha puSh+pa baR+ShaiH/ /ma NiM sa mA dA ya yur+d+wi dzA ste rUr+NaM pu raM duSh+p+ra sa ha s+ya rAdz+nyaH/ /sa te na sad+ya sa mi to pa
<p>34a.2</p>'dzum byed cing / /tsha zer can bzhin shin tu dmar bar lhung / /lha rnams me tog char dang lhan cig tu/ /snying stobs bri ba med pa'i sa der lhung / /gnyis skyes de rnams nor bu yang dag blangs/ /rgyal po shin tu bzod dka'i grong khyer song / /de yi 'phral la nye bar 'tshe rnams zhi/ /
<p>34a.3</p>sargaHsargo tsi tA sA di ta b+ho ga rgaH/ /tad+bo d+hi satwa s+ya sa map+ta sa twa san+tA ra NAr+haM pra shaM sa twaM/ /a trAn+ta re kiM tsi da bAp+ta saM dz+nya na re shwa raM bishru ta rat+na dA naM/ /sa mA ya yur+b+hArga ba gau ta mA
<p>34a.4</p>mtho ris 'os pa'i longs spyod tshogs rnams thob/ /sems can mtha' dag yang dag sgrol 'os pa/ /byang chub sems de'i snying stobs de yis bsngags/ /skabs 'dir mi dbang 'du shes cung zad thob/ /b+h+ri gu'i bu dang go'u ta ma sogs/ /ma rI tse sogs thub pa nags tshal las/ /rin
<p>34a.5</p>d+yA ma rI tse mu khyA mu na yoHba ne b+h+yaH/ /ma rI tse me bA nu ga ta tsa de bI pad+mA ba tI bIk+Sh+ya pa ri kA tan+taM/ /sam+mo ha be gA b+hi ha tA pa pA ta k+Sha NaM k+Shi tau ba la la tai ba lU nA/ /di gan+ta saM tsA ri Ni tsA ra NA nAM na b+ha swa rA NAM
<p>34a.6</p>chen byin pa thos nas yang dag 'ongs/ /lha mo pad ldan ma rI tsi nyid kyis/ /rjes bzhin song bas yongs brlag de mthong nas/ /kun rmongs shugs kyis mngon bcom sa la ni/ /'khri shing gzhon nu bcad bzhin skad cig 'gyel/ /de nas mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams kyi/ /mi bdag legs
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>nr-i pa sA d+hu bA de/ /sa rA dza pu trAHsa ha man+t+ri mu khyaiHpra dzA na tha ma tho ba dzag+muH/ /bIk+Sh+ya k+Shi tI shaM k+Sha ta dzo k+Shi tAM ga ma k+Shi Na sa twaM pa ti taM pr-i thi byAM/ /pr-i thu bya thA kle sha dzu ShaM dza nA nA ma b+hU da b+hU tAr+tha pi kalpa dzalpaH/
<p>34b.2</p>brjod phyogs mthar rgyu ba'i tshe/ /rgyal po'i sras de blon dang lhan cig tu/ /skye rgu skye rgu'i mgon can nye bar song / /khrag gis lus bsgos snying stobs ma zad cing / /sa yi dbang po sa la 'gyel mthong nas/ /nyon mongs gdung ba che ldan skye bo rnams/ /yang dag min don rnam rtog brjod par gyur/ /
<p>34b.3</p>ku ThA ri kaiHkaish+tsi da ho da yAr+d+raHsarbAr+thi pe byaHsa ra laHsu br-i taH/ /du rAd+ma b+hiHswAr+tha la bA b+hi yuk+taish+ts+tshA yA ta ruHkaSh+Ta ma yaM ni kr-it+taH/ /a ho pa rA r+thodz+dz+yi ta dzI bi to yaM pa raM tsa mat+kA ra da shAM pra yAtaH/ /sa
<p>34b.4</p>rang don la chags mngon sbyor bdag nyid ngan/ /shing gcod 'ga' yis snying rjes brlan ldan zhing / /slong kun gyis bsten drang zhing legs spyod pa'i/ /kye ma nyam ngar grib bsil shing 'di bcad/ /kye ma pha rol don du srog gtong 'di/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gnas skabs dag tu song / /shin tu dri
<p>34b.5</p>sau ra b+ha ts+tshin+na ta nu rgi tAM taM b+ha ba t+yu dA ra sa hA kA ra e ba/ /lub+d+ha s+ya na swaHswa dza no pi dzan+torna kA ma kA ma s+ya d+ha ne nu ro d+haH/ /sarbAt+ma nA sa twa hi tod+Ya ta s+ya de ho pi na sne ha pa daM da yA loH/ /ye ShA kr-i ti n+ya ma yaM
<p>34b.6</p>bzang rang gi lus gcod pa/ /yid 'ong shing nis ha ka ra nyid/ /brkam chags srog chags rang gi yin yang rang / /ma yin 'dod pa'i 'dod pa nor ngor min/ /sems can kun la phan brtson bdag nyid can/ /brtse ldan de yi lus kyang chags gnas min/ /gang don slong skye 'di ni slong ba'i
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>@#/ pra yA ti sarbAr+tha nAsh+tsAr+thi dza nor+thi b+hA raM/ /ta e ba dI nod+d+ha ra Na pra tA nAM prA NAHpa ri trA NA pa Ne tr-i NA ni/ /i ti pra bA de bi bi d+hA nu b+hA be bi dzrim+b+ha mA ne mu ni maN+Da la s+ya/ /b+hU pA la ma b+h+ye t+ya sa bASh+pa cak+Shum+mu
<p>35a.2</p>dngos/ /kun don gnyer la zhum par rab 'gro ba/ /zhum pa 'don pa'i brtul zhugs can gyi srog /de nyid yongs su skyob zong rtswa lta yin/ /de skad rab brjod rnam mang mthu yis ni/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phel ba'i tshe/ /ma rI tse thub mchi mar bcas pa'i spyan/ /
<p>35a.3</p>nir+m+ma rI tseHpra Na yA du bA tsa/ /a ho nu niSh+kA ra Na ban+d+hu b+hA ba mA laM bya rA dzan da ya yA dza na s+ya/ /pra dzA pa ri trA Na ni d+hA na b+hU mi ta nus+t+wa ye yaM tr-i Na bad bi tIr+NA/ /k+Sha yaM pra br-it+tA ni ra pek+Sha br-it+tista bAr+thi ban+d+ho rni
<p>35a.4</p>chags pas sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras/ /kye ma ma la rgyal po'i skye rgu rnams/ /yongs skyob gter gyi sa gzhi 'gro ba yis/ /rgyu med gnyen gyi dngos por bsten byas nas/ /khyod kyi brtse bas lus 'di rtswa bzhin byin/ /slong ba'i gnyen khyed rang nyid srog la yang / /ltos pa'i spyod
<p>35a.5</p>dzA dzI bi te pi/ /ya de Sha kA ma ka ma lA ni kA yaHkA yas+t+wa yA pA ya pa de ni yuk+taH/ /a pyasti rA dzan su kri ta bra te smin pha la spr-i hA pA NA pa Ne pi kA tsita/ /a s+yar+thi he tosta ba tA lu b+he da khe
<p>35a.6</p>tshul zad par nges rab zhugs/ /gang zhig dpal 'byor gnas kyi lus 'di ni/ /khyod kyis gnod pa'i gnas su yang dag sbyar/ /rgyal po legs byas brtul zhugs bsod nams kyi/ /zong 'di las kyang 'bras 'ga' bzhed las drang / /slong ba'i rgyus kyang khyod kyi mtshog ma phye/ /skyo
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>dAta pi kA raM b+ha dza ta na tse taH/ /i t+yad+b+hu tA bi skr-i ta mA na se na mu nIn+d+ra mad+h+ye mu ni nA sa pr-iSh+TaH/ /u bA tsa saM s+t+r-i b+h+ya ru dzaM pra yat+nAd rak+tA b+hi Shik+taM ba da naM pra mr-i dz+ya/ /pha la spr-i ha nA sti mu ne ma mA n+ya kin+t+we ka e ba
<p>35b.2</p>las thugs kyi rnam 'gyur ma bsten nam/ /thub dbang dbus su thub pas de skad du/ /rmad byung mtshar ba'i yid kyis dris pa des/ /'bad pas ngal dub bzod byas khrag gis ni/ /mngon par spags pa'i bzhin ras phyis nas smras/ /thub pa bdag la 'bras 'dod gzhan ma mchis/ /'on kyang
<p>35b.3</p>pra tsu ro b+hi lA saH/ /yad g+ho ra saM sA ra ni mag+na dzan+tu saM ta ra NA yai ba b+ha be b+ha be yaM/ /ar+thi pri ye de ha bi dA ra Ne smi n+nai bAsti me ko pi bi kA ra le shaH/ /ya d+ye Sha sa t+ya sa ma yo ma yok+tAsta dastu swas+tha
<p>35b.4</p>mngon 'dod gcig nyid rab tu mang / /gang zhig srog chags 'jigs rung 'khor bar bying / /sgrol byed nyid du srid par bdag gyur cig /slong ba dga' bar lus ni rnam bcom 'dir/ /rnam 'gyur cha shas gang yang med pa nyid/ /gal te ngas brjod dam tshig 'di bden na/ /de yis lus 'di rnal
<p>35b.5</p>ma daM sha rI raM/ /i t+yuk+ta mA tre sa ha dzA nu b+ha be sa two tsi te sa t+ya d+ha ne na rA dz+nyA/ /a b+hUd+ba pu sa t+ya ba le na ta s+ya ru D+ha bra NaM tat+k+Sha Na dzA ta rat+naM/ /ta taHsu raiHsha kra bi riM tsi mu khyai dzA ta pra haR+Shairmu ni b+hish+tsa sar+b+baiH/ /
<p>35b.6</p>du gnas gyur cig /rgyal po bden nor ldan 'di brjod tsam la/ /snying stobs la 'os lhan skyes mthu ldan pa/ /bden pa'i stobs kyis de lus rma bsos shing / /de tshe skyes pa'i rin chen ldan par gyur/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha rnams dang / /rab dga' skyes pa'i thub pa thams cad kyis/ /
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>a b+h+yAr+thi to pi k+Shi ti pA la nA ya b+ho gA b+hi lA sI na ba b+hU ba b+hU baH/ /a pAp+ta saM dz+nyA mu ni nA pra muk+tA pad+mA ba tI rA dza su te na sAM kaM/ /pa ti ya yA tse bi ra ho pa shAn+t+yai siM hA sa na kAn+ti su khaM pra dzA
<p>36a.2</p>sa skyong slad du mngon bar gsol btab kyang / /sa bdag longs spyod mngon par bzhed ma gyur/ /dran rnyed pad+ma dang ldan thub pa yis/ /rab bskul rgyal po'i sras dang 'grogs nas ni/ /skye rgu'i seng ge'i khrir bzhugs bde ba la/ /'bral ba zhi slad bdag la gsol
<p>36a.3</p>naM/ /ta tasta ma b+h+ye t+ya kr-i pA ku lA ste pra t+ye ka bud+d+hA dza ga to hi tA ya/ /de ha pra b+hA pU ri ta dig+bi b+hA gA ba b+hA Shi te haR+Sha mi bod+gi raM taH/ /tsi rA da bAp+te bi ra hA ba sA ne pu naHpA ri t+yA ga da shA ma sa
<p>36a.4</p>ba btab/ /de nas rang rgyal de rnams mngon phyogs te/ /'gro la phan phyir brtse bas 'khrugs gyur te/ /lus kyi 'od kyis phyogs cha khengs pa ni/ /dgyes pa gsal bar mdzad bzhin de la smras/ /bral ba'i mjug ni ring zhig lon nas thob/ /yang ni yongs gtong gnas skabs bzod
<p>36a.5</p>dz+yAM/ /na rA dza pu traHsa ha te na de bI duHkhA nu ban+d+ho h+ya pa kr-in+ni pA taH/ /swa mar+thi ne yaHpra da dA ti de ha mA pan+na duHkha pra sha mai ka he tuH/ /ka thaM sa kuR+YA ta swa dza ne pyu pek+ShaM dar+m+mo pya yaM ya s+ya pa
<p>36a.6</p>dka' ba/ /gang phyir lan gcig min ltung sdug bsngal bcings/ /bzod pa rgyal bo'i bus min lha mos min/ /rgud ldan sdug bsngal rab zhi'i rgyu gcig pu/ /rang lus slod la gang gis rab sbyin zhing / /gang 'di chos 'di'ang gzhan don nyid na de/ /rang gi mi la'ang btang snyoms
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>rAr+tha e ba/ /i t+yuk+taM mA kar+N+ya na re shwa rastesta the ti nish+tsi t+ya d+hi yA ka thaM tsita/ /byom+nA bi mA naiHswa pu rI ma bA s+ya b+ho dza ni dzaM rA dz+ya pa daM sa pu trAH/ /i ti sa bi pu la sa twaHsat+ya ban bo d+hi satwaHsu tsi
<p>36b.2</p>ji ltar bya/ /de dag gis ni brjod thos mi yi dbang / /blo yis de bzhin zhes des ji ltar yang / /mkha' yi lam nas rang gi grong khyer phyin/ /saT+ras bcas rang gi rgyal srid gnas rnams bsten/ /de ltar de ni snying stobs yangs shing bde ldan byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /shin tu yun
<p>36b.3</p>ra pi hi ta rA dz+yaHsau ga tA n+wA ma b+ho dze/ /dzi na pu ra ma Ni co t+ya ts+tsha tra rat+na pra dI pa pra ka Ti ta bi bi d+ha shrIrla k+Sha NA b+h+yasta bo d+hiH/ /i t+yA ha b+ha ga bAn bud+d+haHswa br-it+tAn+ta ni
<p>36b.4</p>ring rgyal srid bzung zhing bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas bsten nas/ /rgyal ba'i grong khyer rin chen mchod rten gdugs dang rin chen sgron ma ni/ /rab tu gsal ba rnam mang dpal gyis mtshan pa'i byang chub goms par gyur/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dge slong rnams
<p>36b.5</p>daR+sha naiH/ /dA no pa de sha b+hik+ShU NAM sa myak+saM bo d+hi sid+d+ha ye/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ma Ni tsU DA ba dA naM nA ma tr-i tI ya
<p>36b.6</p>la sbyin pa'i gdams ngag tu/ /rang gi spyod tshul mtha' ni dper mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad gsungs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ gtsug na nor bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>pal+la baH// //sho b+han+te b+hU ba ne Shu b+ha bya ma na saM yan+nA ka kAn+tA ka ra pro D+ho dany+tsi ta tsA ru tsA ma ra si ta ts+tsha tra smi tAHsaM pa daH/ /yats+tshot+sar+pa ti tar+pi ta shru ti ya shaHkar+pU ra pU
<p>37a.2</p>ste gsum pa'o// //gang zhig mtho ris mdzes ma'i lag pas mchog tu rab bskyod mdzes pa'i rnga yab dag dang ni/ /gdugs dkar 'dzum pa'i phun tshogs dag gis 'jig rten na ni legs ldan thugs ni rnam mdzes dang / /gang yang grags snyan ga pur rgyun gyis dri med thos pa sim byed
<p>37a.3</p>rodz+dz+wa laM swalpa dA nA ka Na s+ya tat+pha la ma ho dA naM ni dA na shri yaH/ /a b+hU du po Sha d+ho nA ma b+hU b+h+r-it+Ya s+ya bi b+hA ba te/ /bi bu d+hA b+hi ma tA kIrtiHsu d+hA dug+d+ho da d+he ri ba/ /ba su d+hA ma ba to ya s+ya ba su d+hA
<p>37a.4</p>rab tu 'phro ba dag/ sbyin pa'i cha shas de 'bras shin tu chung ngu'o e ma sbyin pa dpal gyi dang po'i rgyu/ /'o ma'i mtsho las bdud rtsi bzhin/ /mkhas rnams mngon 'dod grags pa yis/ /gang zhig rnam gsal sa 'dzin ni/ /gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba byung / /nor 'dzin bsrung ba nor dang ni/ /gzi brjid ldan
<p>37a.5</p>ma ba taHpu raH/ /na nA ma pra Na to ka s+ya na nA ma nr-i pa teHshi raH/ /shud+d+hA d+hI ri ba d+harme Na dA ne ne ba da yA lu tA/ /bi b+hU terbi na yene ba b+hU Shi tA ye na b+hU ra b+hUta/ /gu Ni naHpri shu baM sha s+ya ba b+hU ben+du d+Yu teHs+thi taH/ /ya s+ya
<p>37a.6</p>pa gang mdun du/ /mi yi bdag po'i spyi bo dag /nges par phyag la sus ma btud/ /chos kyis dag pa'i blo gros bzhin/ /sbyin pas brtse ba ldan nyid bzhin/ /dul bas rnam par 'byor ba bzhin/ /gang gis sa ni brgyan par gyur/ /yon tan kun ldan rigs su mtho/ /kun gyi gdung skyob zla ba'i 'od/ /gang gi
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>sarbA ta pa tra s+ya mUr+d+h+ni sar+b+ba ma hI b+h+r-i taM/ /ya s+ye shwa ra she raHs+thA yi shu b+h+raM gaM gA dza lodz+dz+wa laM/ /b+h+ra me t+yad b+h+raM lo ke Shu b+hU ba nA b+ha ra NaM ya shaH/ /kartuHkra tu sa ha srA NAM sa ha srA NAM sa ha srAk+ShA d+hi ka shri yaH/ /ya s+ya ShaSh+Thi sa ha
<p>37b.2</p>gnas pa'i spyi bor gyur/ /sa yi bdag po kun gyi'o/ /gang gi grags pa 'jig rten rgyan/ /dkar zhing dbang phyug spyi bor gnas/ /dri med gang gA'i chu bo ni/ /rab mang 'jig rten rnams su rgyu/ /mchod sbyin stong gi byed pa po/ /mig stong pa las lhag pa'i dpal/ /gang gi btsun mo lha mdzes ni/ /
<p>37b.3</p>srA Ni ka la traM su dr-i shA ma b+hUta/ /ka dA tsi ta mu ni rak+Sha yai rak+Shi k+Sha ya kr-i ta k+Sha NaH/ /bi tsa tsA rA shwa mA ru h+ya sa ta po ba na b+hU mi Shu/ /ta tra rA dzAR+Shi b+hiH kai sh+tsita pu treSh+Ti ka la shaM d+h+r-i taM/ /dU rA d+h+wa shra ma san+ta p+taHpa pa yaHpUr+Na
<p>37b.4</p>stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur/ /nam zhig drang srong bsrung ba'i phyir/ /srin po gzhom par dam bcas nas/ /dka' thub nags kyi sa la de/ /rta la zhon nas rnam par rgyus/ /rgyal po drang srong 'ga' yis der/ /bu yi mchod sbyin bum pa bzhag /lam ring gis ngal dub pa des/ /chu yis gang ba
<p>37b.5</p>mA pa pau/ /bi dza na sA di taM pi twA sa man+t+ra ka la shAt+pa yaH/ /rA dza d+hA nIM sa mA sA d+ya gar+b+haM le b+he bi b+hUr+b+hu baH/ /swap+na mA yen+d+ra dzA lA di ya s+yaHkau tu ka bi pru ShaH/ /dza ya t+yad b+hu ta saM b+hA ra b+hU miHsA b+ha bi ta bya tA/ /
<p>37b.6</p>'thungs bar gyur/ /skye bo med par rnyed pa'i chu/ /sngags kyi bum pa las 'thungs nas/ /rgyal po'i pho brang 'ongs pa na/ /sa yi bdag pos mngal thob gyur/ /rmi lam sgyu ma mig 'phrul sogs/ /gang gi ltad mo'i zer ma ni/ /rmad byung yang dag tshogs pa'i sa/ /brnag par bya ste rgyal gyur cig /
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>bi d+herbi bi d+ha bai tsi t+ya tsi tra karma bi d+hA yi naH/ /a sh+tsaR+ya re khA bi n+yA saM kaHpa rits+tshet+tu mI shwa raH/ /kA le na ta s+ya mUr+d+hA naM b+hi twA bA lonya shU mA ni ba/ /rU D+ha bra Na s+ya sa ha sA di byaM ti ra dzA ya ta/ /taM rA dzA dzA
<p>38a.2</p>mtshar ba'i las kyis rnam bskrun pa/ /sgrub byed sna tshogs rnam par bkra/ /ngo mtshar ri mo bkod pa la/ /gcod par byed pa'i dbang phyug su/ /dus kyis de yi spyi bo ni/ /rdol nas byis pa nyi ma bzhin/ /mdzes sdug 'od ldan skyes gyur te/ /'phral la rma ni rab tu bsos/ /bsod nams
<p>38a.3</p>yA dza gr-i hurdza ga ta sa mrA dz+ya lak+Sha Ni/ /bAt+sa l+ya pra stu ta kra bAHpu N+yaM mUr+t+ta mi bA shri taM/ /mAM d+hA ra yi Sh+ya ti shi shuHsh+lA g+h+yo ya dza na nI pa de/ /i ti tA sAM mi tho bAkyair+m+mAn+dzA tA b+hU ta nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/ /ta s+ya pra
<p>38a.4</p>gzugs la brten pa bzhin/ /'gro ba'i yang dag rgyal po'i mtshan/ /ldan pa de ni mnyes gshin las/ /nu zags rgyal po'i btsun mos blangs/ /byis pa bsngags 'os 'di yi ni/ /ma yi gnas su bdag gyur ces/ /de rnams phan tshun tshig gis ni/ /rgyal sras nga las nu zhes gyur/ /dbang po drug ni rab
<p>38a.5</p>bar+d+ha mA Na s+ya bA la krI DA bi lA si naH/ /Sha Dan+d+riHpra ya yau kA la pu N+ya krI DA k+Sha yA yu ShaH/ /na ba yau ba na nA rU D+haHsar+b+ba bi d+yA su pA ra gaH/ /sa yA te pi ta ri swargaM b+he dze rA dz+ya kra mA ga taM/ /yak+Sho di bau ka so nA ma su
<p>38a.6</p>'das dus/ /bsod nams kyis rtsen mi zad tshe/ /de ni rab tu bskyed ldan zhing / /byis pa'i rtse dgas rnam par rol/ /lang tsho gsar par rab zhugs te/ /rig gnas kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /yab ni mtho ris gshegs la nges/ /rim pas 'ongs pa'i rgyal srid bzung / /legs byas kyis ni 'bangs gyur
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>kr-i te rdA sa tAM ga taH/ /a b+hi She ko pa ka ra NaM di byaM ta s+yo pa nI ta bAn/ /sa swar+Nair+b+bad+d+ha mu ku TaHkalpi toSh+NI Sha she Sha raH/ /sa ra da b+h+rA ba taM pa s+ya me roHsho b+hA ma bAp+ta bAn/ /sap+ta rat+na ni ta s+yA tha prA
<p>38b.2</p>pa'i/ /gnod sbyin mkha' yi khyim zhes pas/ /de yi dbang bskur yo byad rnams/ /mchog ni nye bar bsgrubs par gyur/ /gser gyis bcings pa'i cod pan dang / /gtsug tor zur phud byas pa des/ /ston ka'i sprin gyi rna cha can/ /lhun po'i mdzes pa thob dang ldan/ /de nas de yi rin chen bdun/ /de tshe byung
<p>38b.3</p>dur+b+hU tA ni tat+k+Sha Ne/ /tsakrA shwa ma Ni hasti s+t+rI gr-i ha se nA gra gA n+ya pi/ /ba b+hU ba tsA s+ya pu rbA NAM tu l+ya rU pa ba lau dza sAM/ /sa ha sraM bi dzi tA rA ter+b+hU dzA nA mi ba b+hU b+hu dzaH/ /ba sun+d+ha rA+e sa map+tAd+pi be lA kA li ta le kha
<p>38b.4</p>gyur 'khor lo rta/ /nor bu glang po bud med dang / /khyim bdag dmag dpon sngon 'gro ba'o/ /sa bdag 'di yi bu rnams ni/ /gzugs dang stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs/ /dpung pa bzhin du dgra 'joms pa/ /stong phrag dag ni byung bar gyur/ /lhag ma ngal bas bder gnas pa/ /mtha' dag chu gter rlabs kyi
<p>38b.5</p>lAM/ /ni khi lAM bi da d+he doSh+Ni she Sha bi shrAn+ti nir+b+r-i tAM/ /b+hu ba nA ta pa saM nad+d+haHpra t+ya gra ka ma lA shra yaH/ /tsakra brti sa su kr-i tairbiSh+No ka ra i bA ba b+hau/ /tri dza gadz+dza h+na bi kIrteHpra b+hA bA b+ha ra NA shri yaH/ /
<p>38b.6</p>ni/ /ske rags ldan pa'i nor 'dzin ma/ /ma lus dpung pas bzung bar gyur/ /sa ni bsrung bar chas gyur cing / /rab tu gsal ba'i dpal la gnas/ /'khor los sgyur de legs byas kyis/ /khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin du mdzes/ /grags pa 'gro gsum gang gA dang / /mthu yis rnam par brgyan pa'i dpal/ /
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>so yaM su kr-i ta bal+lI nAM pra tha maHku su mong+ga maH/ /sa ka dA tsid+ba nAn+te Shu bi kA si ku su ma shri yaH/ /ru tsi rAM sa tsi baiHsAr+d+ham+bi tsa tsA ra bi lo ka yan/ /da daR+sha ta tra niSh+pak+Shan bi ha gAn pA da tsA ri NaH/ /byo ma
<p>39a.2</p>'di de bsod nams 'khri shing gi/ /me tog rab 'thon dang po yin/ /de ni nam zhig nags kyi mthar/ /blon po dag dang lhan cig tu/ /me tog rnam par rgyas pa'i dpal/ /mdzes pa lta zhing rgyu bar gyur/ /der ni 'dab ma med pa'i bya/ /rkang pas 'gro rnams mthong gyur te/ /mkha' yi
<p>39a.3</p>mArga ga ti smr-i t+yA pra yA tAn kr-i sha tA mi ba/ /pak+Sha hI nA na ga ti kAn br-it+tiM k+Shi NAn+ni ram+pa rAn/ /da ri drA ni ba tAn bIk+Sh+ya pro ba tsa kr-i pa ya nr-i paH/ /a ho bA rA kai bi hA gaiHki mi taiHku kr-i taM kr-i taM/ /ya de te
<p>39a.4</p>lam bgrod dran pa yi/ /shin tu ring bar gyur pa bzhin/ /'dab mas dman zhing bgrod byed min/ /'tsho ba zad cing lus g.yogs med/ /de rnams dbul po bzhin mthong nas/ /mi bdag brtse bas rab smras pa/ /kye ma sdug pa'i bya 'di rnams/ /ngan pa'i bya ba ci zhig byas/ /gang las 'di dag sgro
<p>39a.5</p>pak+Sha bi ka lAHkr-its+tshats+tsa ra Na tsA ri NaH/ /i t+yuk+te b+hU mi pa ti nA ka ru NA ku li tAt+ma nA/ /phu ras+thi to ma hA mA t+yaHsa t+ya se nas+tha ma bra bIta/ /shru ta me tad ma yA da ba ka t+ya mA nAM ba ne tsA reH/ /kA ra NaM pak+Sha pa da ne ya da b+hUt+pak+Shi
<p>39a.6</p>dang bral/ /dka' las rkang pas rgyu bar gyur/ /snying rjes 'khrugs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sa bdag gis de brjod pa la/ /blon po chen po bden pa'i sde/ /mdun du 'dug ste de la smras/ /lha gcig 'dab chags rnams kyi 'dab/ /gang las byi bar gyur pa'i rgyu/ /nags na spyod rnams gleng gyur pa/ /de dag
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>NA mi ha/ /san+ti pany+tsa sha tA n+ya tra pu N+ya d+hAm+ni ta po ba rne/ /ta paHswA d+h+yA ya shak+tA nAM mu nI nAM dIp+ta te dza sAM/ /te ShA ma d+h+ya yan d+h+yA na dza pa bi g+h+na bi d+hA yi naH/ /e te ko lA ha laM tsa kru kha gasta ru ba ne sa
<p>39b.2</p>bdag gis rab tu thos/ /dka' thub kha ton nus ldan pa/ /thub pa gzi brjid 'bar ba ni/ /lnga brgya bsod nams gnas gyur pa'i/ /dka' thub nags tshal 'di na yod/ /de dag gi klog bsam gtan dang / /zlos pa'i bgegs ni sgrub byed pa/ /shing gi nags la bya 'di rnams/ /rtag tu ca co sgrogs par
<p>39b.3</p>dA/ /tasmai bi ha ga saM g+hA ya kar+NaM kA ya pa raM shru te/ /a b+hi saM bad+d+ha mA nA ya tsu ko pa mu ni maN+Da laH/ /ta dud+b+hU ta ma hA shA pa tA pa p+la Sha Na sar+b+ba taH/ /k+Sha Ne na pak+Shi NA pak+ShA bya sIR+Yan+ta kr-i tA sha sAM/ /ta e te bi ha
<p>39b.4</p>gyur/ /rna bar mchog tu gnod pa dag/ shin tu yang dag rgyas byed pa/ /bya yi 'dus pa de dag la/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khros par gyur/ /des bskrun chen po'i dmod pa ni/ /sreg byed gdung ba thams cad du/ /gnod pa byas pa'i bya rnams kyi/ /'dab gshog skad cig gis zags gyur/ /bya ni 'di rnams de dag
<p>39b.5</p>gAHpak+Sha ra hi tA kr-its+tsh+ra brti naH/ /swata bi bak+Sha i ba ba ne shrAn+ta sh+tsa ra Na tsA ri NaH/ /ma hA mA t+ye na ka thi taM ni sha mye tad ma hI ba tiH/ /u bA tsa ka ru NA krAn+tastap+ta shA pe na pak+Shi NAM/ /a ho te dzaHpa ri Na taM shAn+tA nA
<p>39b.6</p>ste/ /sdug bsngal gyis 'tsho 'dab gshog bral/ /khyod kyi mi mthun phyogs bzhin du/ /ngal zhing nags su rkang pas rgyu/ /blon po chen pos brjod de dag /thos nas sa yi bdag po ni/ /bya rnams dmod pas gdungs pa la/ /snying rjes rab tu non pas smras/ /kye ma thub pa sol ba rnams/ /zhi bar gyur kyang
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>ma pi kA na ne/ /aM gA rA NAM mu nI nAM tsa da ha t+ye bA ni bA ri taM/ /mi th+yA ta pa swi b+hiHkiM taiHswa su khA yan yaiHkr-itaH/ /ma na sa ko pa tap+ta s+ya pa ri She kaHk+Sha mAM b+hu b+hiH/ /pra san+nA b+hIr+m+ma no mai traM da yA dA naM da maHk+Sha
<p>40a.2</p>nags su ni/ /yongs su gyur pa'i me dag gis/ /mi zlog sreg par byed pa nyid/ /rang nyid bde phyir gang gi yid/ /khro bas gdung la bzod pa yi/ /chu yis yongs su bran ma byas/ /log pa'i dka' thub can des ci/ /rab dang blod dang byams pa'i yid/ /brtse ba'i sbyin pa dul zhing
<p>40a.3</p>mA/ /ye ShAM te ShAM ta pa sh+lA g+h+yaM she Sha NAM kA ya sho Sha NAM/ /kiM ta po b+hiHsa ko pA nAM bi p+lu tA nAM ba ne na kiM/ /bi b+ha baiHkiM sa lo b+hA nAM dur+b+r-it+tA nAM shru te na kiM/ /ye baM ka lu Sha tsit+taste tI bra ma n+YU pa rA ma
<p>40a.4</p>bzod/ /gang de dka' thub bsngags par 'os/ /lhag ma lus ni skems pa nyid/ /'jig tshogs 'dzin pa'i dka' thub ci/ /rnam par bslad la nags kyis ci/ /chags dang bcas la 'byor pas ci/ /spyod tshul ngan la thos pas ci/ /de ltar sdig pa'i sems ldan zhing / /khro ba drag pos bskyod
<p>40a.5</p>NAH/ /duHsa hA e ba mu na yaHpra yAn+tu bi Sha yAn+ma ma/ /i t+yuk+t+wA prA hi Not+te b+h+yaHsan+de shaM pu ru Shai r+n+r-i pa/ /yA ba tI mad+ba sA b+hU mistA ba tI t+ya dza tA mi ti/ /bi haM ga pak+Sha pA te na ku pi ta s+ya ma hI pa teH/ /saM de shaM mu na
<p>40a.6</p>pa yi/ /bzod dka' thub pa de dag nyid/ /bdag gi yul nas 'gro gyur cig /'di brjod de la mi bdag gis/ /ji srid bdag ni dbang ba'i sa/ /de srid gtang bar byos shig ces/ /skyes bus 'phrin ni bsrings par gyur/ /bya yi 'dab gshog byi ba yis/ /khros pas sa yi bdag po de'i/ /'phrin thos skyengs par
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>yaHshru twA bi lak+ShA sa ma tsin+ta yan/ /tsa tuHsa mu dra pa ri khA me kha lA yAHk+Shi teHpa tiH/ /na ren+d+ro yaM kwa gats+tshA maHko de she s+ye ba se na yaH/ /i ti saM tsiM t+ya mu na yaHpAr+sh+wa ka na ka b+hU b+h+r-i taH/ /su ra sid+d+hi sa mA kIr+NaM dzaM bU khaN+DAn+ti
<p>40b.2</p>gyur pa ye/ /thub pa rnams kyis yang dag bsams/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi 'obs kyi ni/ /ske rags ldan pa sa yi bdag /yul gang mi bdag mi dbang la/ /gang zhig bdag cag gang du 'gro/ /de ltar bsams nas thub pa rnams/ /gser gyi sa 'dzin dag gi ngos/ /lha dang grub pas yongs gang ba/ /dzam+bu'i phyogs
<p>40b.3</p>kaM ya yuH/ /a tha ta s+ya ma hI b+hartu pra b+hA be na ma hI ya sa/ /a b+hU da kr-iSh+Ta sa ts+ya b+hU ra d+Yaush+tsa rat+nAm+ba ra pra sUH/ /pA ka shA sa na bai lak+Sha ka ra Nasta s+ya shA sa nAta/ /sap+tA haM he ma ba br-i Shurme g+hAHsaM g+hA ta baR+Shi NaH/ /
<p>40b.4</p>dang nye bar song / /de nas sa yi bdag po de'i/ /mthu ni shin tu che ba yis/ /sa ni ma rmos smin byed cing / /mkha' yang rin chen gos skyed 'gyur/ /smin pa gsod byed skyengs par ni/ /bgyid par de yi bstan pa las/ /sprin tshogs 'bebs par bgyid rnams kyis/ /zhag bdun gser gyi char pa phab/ /
<p>40b.5</p>sa pra b+hA be na ma hA tA sa ha sai n+yairna b+ho ga tiH/ /tsakra pUrba bi de hA khyaM dwi paM di bya dza naM ba she/ /ba b+hU bu ra gre sai n+ya s+phI ta sauR+ya ba lo dza sAM/ /b+ha TA nAM byo ma ga ma ne ta s+yASh+TA da sha ko Ta yaH/ /go dA nI yaM ta to dwI
<p>40b.6</p>de yi mthu ni chen po yis/ /sde dang lhan cig mkha' la phyin/ /shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya'i gling / /mchog gi skye bo dbang du byas/ /de yi dmag dpon mchog dag ni/ /rtul phod stobs dang gzi rgyas pa/ /dpa' bo bye ba phrag bco brgyad/ /mkha' la sngon du 'gro bar gyur/ /de 'og ba glang spyod gling dang / /
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>pa ma thot+ta ra ku rU na pi/ /pAr+sh+wA ni sa su me rosh+tsa sa shA sA ha ta shA sa naH/ /su khaM bi ha rastasta s+ya me roHka na ka pA nu Shu/ /ba hu sha kro ya yau kA lash+tsa tur+d+wI pa ma hI pa teH/ /sa ka dA cita su rAn dr-iSh+TaM
<p>41a.2</p>de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po yi ni ngos rnams kyang / /nyams med bstan nas bsrungs bar gyur/ /brgya byin mang po 'das gyur dus/ /lhun po gser gyi lcog la ni/ /gling bzhi'i sa yi bdag po de/ /bde bas rnam par rab tu rtse/ /nam zhig lha rnams blta bzhed pas/ /
<p>41a.3</p>byom+nA gats+tshan su ro pa maH/ /tsa kA ra nI la dza la da byAp+ta i ba ga dzairdi shaH/ /a tha te ShAM ni ras+thA nAM me ru pAr+sh+wa ta pa s+ya tAM/ /mu nI nA ma pata ta mUr+d+h+ni tad ga dzA shwa pa kr-id+di baH/ /ta ta ste kro d+ha
<p>41a.4</p>lha bzhin mkha' la gshegs bzhin de'i/ /sprin sngon gyis bzhin glang po yis/ /phyogs rnams rab tu khyab par gyur/ /de nas thub pa bskrad de rnams/ /lhun po'i ngos la dka' thub kyis/ /gnas pa'i spyi bor mkha' las ni/ /de yi rta glang sbangs rnams lhung / /de las de rnams khro bas
<p>41a.5</p>san+tap+ta dr-i shA byo mA ba lo ki naH/ /tsakruHpiM ga pra b+hA pal+li ka lA pa ka pi lA di shaH/ /ki me tat+ko pa i t+yuk+taiHshA pAg+ni si sr-ik+Sha yA/ /a b+h+ye t+ya de ba dU tastAn pra haR+ShA ku li to ba data/ /e Sha niHshe Sha b+hU pAl mau li
<p>41a.6</p>gdungs/ /mig gis mkha' la lta byed cing / /ser skya'i 'od kyis 'khri shing gi/ /tshogs kyi phyogs rnams ser skyar byas/ /de rnams 'di ci zhes brjod khros/ /dmod pa'i me ni spro 'dod der/ /lha yi pho nya mngon phyogs te/ /rab dga' rnam par rgyas pas smras/ /'di ni sa skyong ma lus kyi/ /mgo la bka' ni
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>bi shrAn+ta shA sa naH/ /pA ka shA sa na tu l+ya shrIr+m+mA n+wAn+tA pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /na b+ha sA na ra de bo yaM sa ha sai n+yai pra sarba ti/ /ya s+yAM kIrta na d+ha n+ye yaM bA NI pu N+yA b+hi mA ni nI/ /na dr-iSh+To ya s+ya nir+d+r-iSh+Ta sar+b+ba lo ka su kha shri yaH/ /
<p>41b.2</p>ngal gso zhing / /brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa'i dpal/ /sa yi bdag po nga las nu/ /mi yi lha ni nam mkha' la/ /sde dang bcas pa rab tu gshegs/ /gang gi drag po'i tshig 'di sngags/ /bsod nams mngon pa'i nga rgyal ldan/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde ba'i dpal/ /sbyin byed gang la 'byor pa yis/ /
<p>41b.3</p>mo ha saM bin+ma ya s+ye ba bi b+ha bi ma daH/ /kau be raM d+ha na da byak+t+yA kau wA raM shak+ti mat+ta yA/ /ai shwa raM br-i Sha b+ha yo gAta baiSh+Na baM shrI sa mA ga mAta/ /pra tA pa pra sA rA ta sau ra main+da bi dza na nan+da nAta/ /ain+d+raM dr-iSh+Ta ba lats+tshe
<p>41b.4</p>rab bskyed rgyags pa ma mthong ste/ /yang dag rig la gti mug bzhin/ /nor 'dzin gsal bas ku be ra/ /stobs dang ldan pas gzhon nu ste/ /khyu mchog ldan pas dbang phyug dang / /dpal dang 'grogs pas khyab 'jug dang / /'od rab spro bas nyi ma dang / /skye bo dga' bas zla ba dang / /mthong bas stobs gcod
<p>41b.5</p>dAta di byaM rU paM bi b+har+t+ya yaM/ /ba liHpra yA tA pA tA laM da d+hI tso pyas+thi she Sha tAM/ /a s+ya t+yA ge na dza neb+d+hiHk+Sho b+ha ma d+yA bi nodz+dzu ti/ /shru twe ti de ba dU ta s+ya ba tsa naM mu ni ma d+h+ya gaH/ /sa sardza dur+m+mu kho nA ma mu
<p>41b.6</p>dbang po yi/ /gzugs mchog 'di yis rnam par 'dzin/ /stobs ldan sa 'og rab tu zhugs/ /da d+hI tsa yang rus lhag nyid/ /chu gter ding yang 'khrug mi 'dor/ /'di yi gtong bas yin nam snyam/ /de skad lha yi pho nya'i tshig/ /thos nas thub pa'i dbus son pa'i/ /bzhin ngan zhes bya thub pa yis/ /dmod
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>niHshA pa dza laM di ni/ /pra ha san+na tha taM pra ha se nA nI pa ri NA ya kaH/ /ma haR+She saM ha ra ru ShaM mA kr-i tha sta pa saHk+Sha yaM/ /bai pha l+ya\u0f85la dzI shA bo yaM yA s+ya t+ya gre ma hI pa teH/ /na te ba yaM kha ga ye ShAM yu yaM pak+Sha pak+Sha
<p>42a.2</p>pa'i chu ni mkha' la gtor/ /de nas sde dpon yongs 'dren gyis/ /rab tu bzhad cing de la smras/ /drang srong chen po khro ba thong / /dka' thub zad par yongs ma mdzad/ /sa bdag mdun du dmod pa 'di/ /'bras med ngo tshar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyis gang gis 'dab gshog zad/ /bzod
<p>42a.3</p>ya bya mAH/ /i t+yuk+te sai n+ya pa ti nA shA pa stab+d+hA ma nI ki nIM/ /dr-iSh+TA gre bin+ma mA dU tse ki mi ta di ti b+hU pa tiH/ /saM rab+D+ho tha sa ma b+h+ye t+ya se nA pa ti ru ba tsa taM/ /te ShAM de ba ma haR+ShI NAM shA pA sai
<p>42a.4</p>pa'i bya de bdag cag min/ /de skad sde dpon gyis smras tshe/ /dmod pas bzung ba'i dpung tshogs la/ /mdun du sa bdag gis bltas nas/ /ya mtshan pas 'di ci zhes gsungs/ /de nas sde dpon khro ldan pas/ /de la yang dag mngon phyogs smras/ /lha gcig drang srong de dag gis/ /dmod
<p>42a.5</p>n+yaM na sarba ti/ /i dany+tsa tsakra rat+naM te byom+ni shA pa bi g+hUr+N+Ni taM/ /d+het+ta dza la da saM rud+d+ha tig+ma dI d+hi ti tu l+ya tAM/ /e ta dA kar+N+ya nr-i pa tir+d+r-iSh+TA tsA gre ta thai ba tata/ /dr-i shai ba bi da d+he shA
<p>42a.6</p>pas dpung 'di mi bgrod do/ /khyod kyi 'khor lo rin chen 'di'ang / /mkha' la dmod pas rnam par 'khyam/ /sprin gyis yang dag bgags pa yi/ /tsha zer can dang mtshungs par bzung / /de dag thos shing mi bdag gis/ /mdun du de ltar mthong nas kyang / /mig nyid kyis bsgrubs dmod
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>paM pi pha lots+tshaN+Da bi p+la baM/ /de ha k+Sha yaM ma haR+ShI NAM pa ri rak+Shan kr-i pA ku lAH/ /dza TA n+ya pa ti yata b+hU mau sa li lA la sa shA naH/ /a dzi ta kro d+ha mo ha nAM b+hA ra b+hU tA bri thA ba yaM/ /i tI ba ladz+dza yA te ShAMH
<p>42b.2</p>pa dag /'bras med rab gtum bslad par ro/ /snying rje'i tshogs kyis lus 'jig pas/ /yongs bsrungs de yi kyal ka'i bkas/ /dman pa'i drang srong che rnams kyi/ /ral pa sa la lhung bar gyur/ /khro dang rmongs pa mi thul na/ /bdag cag don med khur gyur ces/ /de dag ral pa ngo tsha nas/ /sa gzhi
<p>42b.3</p>lI nA k+Shi ti ta le dza neH/ /a tha me ru shi raHprA bya n-i paHsu ra ni ke ta naM/ /pu raM su deR+Sha naM nA ma da daR+sha pri ya daR+sha naM/ /nA gAsta tra kr-i tA rak+ShAHpra khyA ta da ka ni shri tAH/ /ka ro Ta pA Na yo yak+ShAHsu ra mA lA d+ha rA b+hi
<p>42b.4</p>la ni 'byar ba bzhin/ /de nas mi bdag lhun po'i rtser/ /phyin nas lha rnams gnas pa ni/ /grong khyer lta na sdug ces pa/ /blta na mdzes pa mthong bar gyur/ /der ni rol mtsho las 'thon pa'i/ /klu rnams dag la rab brtsams nas/ /gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs dang / /'phreng 'dzin zhes pa'i
<p>42b.5</p>d+hAH/ /sa dA mat+tAsta thA de bAHkro d+hot+ta b+hi ta sai ni kAH/ /tsA turma hA rA dza kA yi kA khyA s+t+ri da shA ba la bat+ta rAH/ /ma hA rA dzA sh+tsa twA raHsan+nad+d+ha ka ba tsA yu d+hAH/ /dzi twA rA dzA pra b+hA be na ne dza se nA gra gAH
<p>42b.6</p>lha dang ni/ /de bzhin rtag myos zhes pa'i lha/ /khro bas sdom byed sde rnams dang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris zhes pa/ /shin tu stobs ldan skabs gsum pa/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams/ /go bgos mtshon thogs g.yul zhugs pa/ /rgyal po'i mthu yis pham gyur nas/ /rang sde rnams kyi sngon
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>kr-i tAH/ /ta taHkalpa dru mo dA ra ko bi dA ra ma no ha raM/ /da daR+Sha pA ri yA trA khya saM shra yaM tri do bo ka sAM/ /me rormUr+d+hI ta taHshu b+h+ra pra b+h+raM mA lA mi bA ma lAM/ /su d+har+m+mA khyA sa b+hA prA pa swa pra b+hA bod+d+hA Shi tAM ba
<p>43a.2</p>'gro byas/ /de nas rgya che dpag bsam shing / /yid 'phrog ko bi dA ra ni/ /yongs 'du zhes pa mthong bar gyur/ /lha rnams kyis ni yang dag bsten/ /de nas lhun po'i rtser 'od zer/ /'phreng ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /mkha' ni rang 'od kyis gsal ba/ /chos bzang zhes pa'i mdun sar
<p>43a.3</p>rAM/ /he ma bi dru ma bai DUR+ya stam+b+ha saM b+hA ra b+hA swa raH/ /prA sA do bai dza yan+tA khyaHpra khyA to ya tra rA dza te/ /ya trAb+dzairba da nai r+b+h+r-iM gai ra la kaistu l+ya tAM ga tAH/ /pad+mi n+yaHsu ra na rI NAM pad+mi nI nAM su raM ga nAM/ /bi m+bi
<p>43a.4</p>phyin/ /gser dang byu ru bai DUR+ya'i/ /ka ba'i tshogs ni gsal zhing mdzes/ /khang bzang rnam par rgyal zhes pa/ /grags pas gang las rnam par mdzes/ /gang du chu skyes bzhin ras dang / /bung ba lan bus mtshungs gyur pa/ /lha yi bu mo'i pad ljon dang / /pad+ma'i shing gi lha mo'o/ /nor bu'i
<p>43a.5</p>taus+t+ri da shaiR+Ya tra ma Ni b+hU stam+b+ha b+hit+ti Shu/ /su ra lo ko bi b+har+t+ye ko pya ne ka su ra lo ka tAM/ /rat+na to ra Na har+m+m+yaM shu ni ba haiR+Ya tra tsi tri tAH/ /byAp+tA bi b+hAn+ti ka ku b+haHb+haHsha krA yu d+ha sha tai ri ba/ /ya tra
<p>43a.6</p>zhal zhal ka ba sa/ /gang du lha yi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /lha yi 'jig rten gcig nyid kyang / /lha yi 'jig rten du ma 'dzin/ /rin chen rta babs ba gam gyi/ /'od kyi tshogs kyis rnam bkra gang / /phyogs rnams mdzes pas khyab gyur te/ /brgya phrag brgya byin tshon gyis bzhin/ /gang
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>bA lA ni lA lo la kalpa pa da pa pal+la baiH/ /nr-it+tad+d+han+tA i bA b+han+ti nan+di n+yo nan+da na shri yaH/ /ya tra tsai tra ra thaM nA ma de bod+YA na ma no ra maM/ /d+hat+te ni t+yot+sa ba pre mi kA ma kA ma baM sha
<p>43b.2</p>du rlung gzhon gyis bskyod pa'i/ /dpag bsam rkang 'thung 'khri shing gis/ /dga' ba bskyed de dga' ba'i dpal/ /'gyur zhing rab bsgyur bzhin du mdzes/ /gang na shing rta sna tshogs zhes/ /lha yi skyed tshal yid dga' ba/ /rtag tu spro bas dga' ma dag /'dod dang so ka'i bzhed
<p>43b.3</p>ta yoH/ /sarba kA maM sarba su khaM sar+b+bartu ku su modz+dz+wa laM/ /sarbA ti shA yi taM dr-iSh+T+wA de bA nAM sa da naM nr-i paH/ /mU hUr+t+ta bisma yA s+yan+da sA nan+da snig+d+ha lo tsa naH/ /a tsin+ta yata su kr-i ti nA mi mAstAH
<p>43b.4</p>pa bzhin/ /'dod pa kun dang bde ba kun/ /dus tshigs kun tu me tog 'bar/ /lha rnams gnas ni thams cad las/ /khyad 'phags rgyal pos mthong gyur nas/ /yud tsam ya mtshan g.yo med cing / /'dzum pa'i spyan dang kun dgar bcas/ /legs byas rnams kyi bsod nams kyi/ /'bras
<p>43b.5</p>pha la b+hU ma yaH/ /ai rA ba NaM su rA pa terlo lA li ba la yA ku laM/ /da daR+sha ta tra sA mo daM sA kA ra mi ba nan+da naM/ /pu ran+ta rasta to dz+nyA twA prAsta b+hU mi pu ran+da raM/ /pra t+yud+Ya yau pra mu di taHsa ha sar+b+bair+m+ma rung+ga
<p>43b.6</p>bu de ni 'di zhes bsams/ /lha yi bdag po'i sa srung ni/ /sred len bung ba'i tshogs rgyas pa/ /dga' tshal rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/ /der ni dri bzang ldan pa mthong / /de nas sa yi dbang po ni/ /'ongs par shes nas dbang po ni/ /lha yi tshogs dang bcas pa dag/ /rab dga' ldan pas bsu
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>NaiH/ /pU dzi taHsu ra rA dze na rat+na rA dza bi rA dzi tAM/ /rA dza rA dzaHsa b+hA b+hU mi b+he dze bi ra dza sAm+ba raH/ /tri da she Shu pa biSh+Te Shu rat+na paR+YaM ka paM k+ti Shu/ /u pA bi shran+n+r-i paHshrI mA nA sa
<p>44a.2</p>ba byas/ /rin chen 'phreng bas rnam mdzes pa'i/ /mdun sa'i sa gzhi rgyal po yi/ /rgyal po lha yi rgyal po yis/ /mchod pa rdul bral mchog gis bsten/ /rin chen stan gyi 'phreng ba la/ /skabs gsum pa rnams nyer bzhugs shing / mchod sbyin brgya pa'i stan phyed la/ /mi yi
<p>44a.3</p>nAr+d+he sha ta kra toH/ /e kA sa na dzu Shosta tra su ren+d+ra ma nu dzen+d+ra yoH/ /rU pa gu Na ga No dA raM nirbi she Sha ma dr-i sh+yata/ /ta taHsarba su rot+s+r-iSh+Ta spaSh+Ta lo tsa na ShaT+pa daiH/ /pI ya mA na mu khAm+b+ho dzaM b+ha dza hA ra ha ri
<p>44a.4</p>bdag po dpal ldan bzhugs/ /der ni stan gcig la 'dug ba'i/ /lha dbang mi yi bdag po dag /yon tan tshogs ni rgya che ba'i/ /gzugs ni khyad par med par mthong / /de nas lha kun gyis spros pa'i/ /rab gsal mig ni rkang drug pas/ /bzhin pad 'thung ldan mi bdag la/ /'phrog byed kyis
<p>44a.5</p>nr-i paM/ /a ho pa do yaHsh+lA g+h+yaste dza sA te dza sAM ni d+he/ /b+ha ba tA b+hU Shi tA b+hU mir+d+yaush+tsa de ba na b+hA swa tI/ /a b+h+yun+na ta pra b+hA bo yaM la sata si ta yA shAM shu kaM/ /b+h+rA dza te te tri b+hu ba ne sA mrA dz+ya bi dza ya
<p>44a.6</p>ni yang dag smras/ /kye ma gzi brjid gter gyi gzi/ /gang zhig bsngags 'os mngon par 'char/ /khyed kyis sa ni brgyan gyur cing / /'od ldan lha yi nam mkha' yang / /mthu yis rab mtho grags snyan dag /gsal ba'i gos can sa gsum du/ /yang dag rgyal po rnam rgyal ba/ /khyod kyi rgyal mtshan 'di
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>d+h+wa dzaH/ /twata ka thA mr-i ta pA na s+ya twata daR+sha na ra sa s+ya tsa/ /teR+Ya te shro tra ne tre Na su khA khyA ne sa ra swa tI/ /s+thi rI kr-i tas+t+wa yai bA yi su kr-i tAp+ta bi b+hU ti nA/ /karma NAM pha la bA da s+ya nish+tsa ya sh+ts+tshan+ni saM sha yaH/ /a ta e
<p>44b.2</p>mdzes so/ /khyod gtam bdud rtsi'i btung ba dang / /khyod ni blta ba'i ro la yang / /rna ba mig kyang rab bskul cing / /bde ba'i sgra la dbyangs can no/ /las rnams 'bras bu rtsod pa yi/ /the tshom chad cing nges pa 'di/ /'byor pa legs byas kyis thob pa/ /khyod nyid kho nas brten par byas/ /bsod nams 'os
<p>44b.3</p>ben+d+ri ya grA me tsak+Shu re ba spr-i haspa daM/ /pu N+yaiHpu N+yau tsi tA tsA ra dr-i sh+yan+te yad+b+ha bad+bi d+hA/ /i t+yuk+te tri da shen+d+re Na mA n+wA tA ya sha sAn+ni d+hiH/ /twat+p+ra sA da pra b+hA bo yaM bi t+yu bA tsa na tA na naH/ /i t+ye baM pU dz+ya mA na s+ya
<p>44b.4</p>pa'i kun spyod ldan/ /khyod lta bsod nams kyis mthong gang / /'di nyid phyir na dbang po yi/ /tshogs las mi nyid dga' ba'i gnas/ /lha yi dbang pos 'di brjod tshe/ /grags pa'i gter ni nga las nus/ /mthu 'di khyod kyi drin no zhes/ /smras nas gdong ni dud par gyur/ /de ltar de ni lha rnams kyis/ /rtag tu
<p>44b.5</p>ta s+ya ni t+yA da raiHsu raiH/ /Sha Din+d+ra pra ya yo kA laM tri di pe ba sa taHsa taH/ /ta ta pa rA kra ma bi shwasta sa map+tA su ra maN+Da laH/ /ba b+hU ba su ra rA dza s+ya ni ra pA yo da yo dza yaH/ /dIp+ta dA na ba saM grA me te s+ya sauR+ya ma hA ta
<p>44b.6</p>gus pas mchod ldan de'i/ /lha yul bzhugs shing gnas pa las/ /dbang po drug gi dus 'das gyur/ /lha min dkyil 'khor mtha' dag ni/ /de yi pha rol gnon pas nyams/ /lha yi rgyal po 'tshe med cing / /dar ba dang ni rgyal bar gyur/ /gzi ldan g.yul du gzhu 'dzin lha'i/ /dpung pa'i grib mas nyer
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>roH/ /bi shrAn+tIM b+hA dzi re de bA b+hu dzAts+tsha yo pa dzI bi bad/ /ta s+ya pu N+ya pa Na kr-i taM b+huny+dzA na s+yA k+Sha maM su khaM/ /kA la pra bA he ma ha ti pra ya yuHShaT+pu ran+da rAH/ /sat+karma pha la b+ho ga s+ya lAM ts+tsha naM bi ma lam+ma naH/ /
<p>45a.2</p>'tsho rnams/ /dpa' bo ljon pa chen po de'i/ /ngal gso dag ni bsten par byed/ /de yi bsod nams tshong zong gis/ /myos pa mi zad bde spyod pa'i/ /dus kyi rgyun ni che ba la/ /brgya byin drug ni 'das par gyur/ /dam pa'i las 'bras spyod pa yi/ /rtags ni dri ma med pa'i yid/ /
<p>45a.3</p>kA lu Sh+yAdz+dza ya te ta s+ya pra t+yA san+na pa ri k+Sha yaH/ /a tha kA le na kA lu Sh+ya ka li ta s+ya ma no ra thaH/ /a b+hUl+lo b+hA b+hi b+hU ta s+ya b+hU pa te ra b+hi mA ni naH/ /trid shA nA mi yaM la k+Sha mIr+m+mad+bA hU ba la pA li tA/ /
<p>45a.4</p>de ni rnyog par gyur pa las/ /rab tu nye bar yongs zad gyur/ /de nas dus kyis sa bdag ni/ /nyes pa'i rnyog pas rab bsgos shing / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal chags pa yis/ /zil mnan yid la 'dod par gyur/ /skabs gsum pa yi dpal 'byor ni/ /bdag gi dpung pa'i stobs kyis bskyangs/ /
<p>45a.5</p>ta de mAn+na sa he tA ba dar+d+hA sa na bi Dam+ba nAM/ /a ha me kaHsu ra pa tiHpra b+hA bA nu b+ha bA mi kaM/ /a yam+ma ma b+hu dzaHsar+b+ba dza gad+b+ha ra b+ha ra k+Sha maH/ /ts+yA ba yi twA su rA d+hI shaM swarga sA mrA dz+ya sam+ba daM/ /
<p>45a.6</p>de las re zhig stan phyad kyis/ /bag 'khums 'di ni yongs mi bzod/ /'gro ba kun gyi khur 'dzin pa/ /bdag gi dpung pa 'di yis bzod/ /bdag rang gcig pu lha dbang du/ /mthu yis 'gyur ba min pa ci/ /lha yi dbang po nyams byas nas/ tho ris rgyal srid phun sum tshogs/ /
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>e kA ta pa tra ti la kAM swa yaM grA ho tsi tAM b+ha dze/ /i ti tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya sha kra dro hA b+hi lA Shi NaH/ /shu b+h+ra pra b+hA pra b+hA ba shrIrmA le ba m+lA na tAM ya yau/ /g+ha no da ya sa mut+pat+pA sau dza n+ya ta Ta pA ti nI/ /
<p>45b.2</p>gdugs gcig nyid kyi thig le ni/ /rang nyid 'dzin par 'os pa bsten/ /de ltar bsams shing brgya byin la/ /'khu bar mngon par 'dod pa de'i/ /dkar ba'i 'do ldan mthu yi dpal/ /'phreng ba bzhin du nyams par gyur/ /stug pos rgyas par bsams pa yis/ /skye bo legs pa'i ngogs gcod pa'i/ /
<p>45b.3</p>lo laM ka lu Sha ya t+ye ba mA na saM shrI raM gi NI/ /pra ma dA bi pa dAM dU tI duHsa ha ma ha tA ma pi/ /ku sha lon+mU la nA yai tsa kilbi ShA ku li tA ma tiH/ /pA pa saM kalpa mA tre Na k+Shi tau k+Shi ti pa ti k+Sha NAta/ /pA pa
<p>45b.4</p>g.yo ldan dpal ni sred bcas kyis/ /yid kyi rdzing bu dri mar byed/ /bag med rgud pa'i pho nya ni/ /che rnams kyis kyang bzod par dka'/ /rigs ni nyams pa nyid kyi slad/ /sdig pas 'khrugs pa'i blo gros so/ /sdig pa rnam par brtags tsam gyis/ /sa bdag sa la skad cig gis/ /lhung ste
<p>45b.5</p>ta bi shrAM b+ha pha lash+ts+tshin+na mU la i ba dru maH/ /han+ti bi d+yA ma na b+h+yA saHshri yaM han+ti ma do da yaH/ /bi dwi ShaHsA d+hu tAM han+ti han+ti lo b+ha sa mun+ni tiM/ /a ho ba te ma hot+kaR+Sha shriM gA ro ho ma ho da yaH/ /bi b+ha
<p>45b.6</p>'bras bu rnam lhung zhing / /rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon pa bzhin/ /ma goms pa yis rig pa 'joms/ /rgyags pa rgyas pas dpal 'byor 'joms/ /rnam sdang gis ni legs nyid 'joms/ /chags pas yang dag mtho ba 'joms/ /kye ma kwa ye dar rgyas che/ /che zhing mtho ba'i rtser 'dzegs pa/ /'byor pas
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>bod+ha ba mat+tA nAM pa ha sai ba pa ta t+ya d+haH/ /te na sarbA bi b+hUrnA ma pU dzi taHpUr+b+ba dzan+ma ni/ /tat+pa la dAp+ta ba na rA dz+yaM spr-i ha NI ma rut+pa teH/ /su rA d+hi pA d+hi paHko pe pra b+hA bo bisma yA ba haH/ /a nalpasta s+yA b+hUta pA
<p>46a.2</p>rgyags pa skyes pa rnams/ /'phral nyid du ni 'og tu ltung / /de yi skye ba snga ma la/ /thams cad zil gnon zhes bya mchod/ /lha dbang rgyal srid bsten 'od ni/ /de yis 'bras bu thob gyur cing / /gang yang lha dbang las lhag pa/ /mthu ni ya mtshan ldan pa dag /de yi snod la sbyin pa'i chas/ /
<p>46a.3</p>tra dA nAM sha saM b+ha baH/ /ban+d+hu ma t+ya b+hi d+hA nA yAM na gaR+YA mu tsi taHshu tsiH/ /ba ni gut+ka ri ko nA ma so b+ha bat+pur+b+ba dzan+ma ni/ /bi pa sh+yI nA ma b+hik+Sha yai samyak+saM bud+d+ha tAM ga taH/ /bi be sha tad+g+r-i haM sar+b+ba satwa saM tA ra Nod+YA
<p>46a.4</p>bskyed pa mi nyung skal bar gyur/ /gnyen ldan zhes ni bya ba yi/ /grong khyer 'os shing gtsang ba ru/ /tshong dpon ud ka ri ka zhes/ /de yi sngon gyi skye bar gyur/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /nyid du gyur cing sems can kun/ /sgrol ba la brtson rnam gzigs mtshan/ /bsod snyoms
<p>46a.5</p>taH/ /pA tre ta s+ya sa ni k+She pa mung+ga muSh+Tim+p+ra san+na d+hIH/ /pha lA ni ta tra tsa twA ri pe tuHshe ShA Ne b+hU ta le/ /te na dA na pra b+hA be na man+d+hA tA pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /sarba dwI pa pa ti b+hU twA shakrAr+d+hA sa na mAp+ta bAn/ /
<p>46a.6</p>slad du de khyim zhugs/ /de yi snod du dang ba'i blos/ /sran ma chag gang de yis 'phangs/ /de las lhag ma bzhi dag ni/ /sa yi gzhi la lhung bar gyur/ /de yi sbyin pa'i mthu yis ni/ /sa yi bdag po nga las nu/ /gling rnams kun gyi bdag gyur nas/ /brgya byin stan phyed thob par gyur/ /
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>mung+ga she Sha ts+yu to yasmA ta b+hU mau ta s+yA n+ya tse ta saH/ /ta dA sau pha la paR+Yan+te pa tis+t+r-i da shA la yA ta/ /lu Tha ti bi ka la ka lpA ya tra saM kalpa mA lI s+phu ra ti na tsa ka dA tsi ta swap+na mA yAn+ta re yA/ /b+ha ba
<p>46b.2</p>de yi sems ni gzhan gang las/ /sran ma lhag ma sa la lhung / /de tshe 'di ni 'bras bu'i mthar/ /skabs gsum pa las lhung bar gyur/ /gang zhig rmi lam sgyu ma'i gnas skabs su yang nam yang mi 'phro ba'i/ /rnam rtog 'phreng ba cung zad 'khrugs pas gang la nye bar rab sbyar ba/ /'di ni
<p>46b.3</p>ti bi b+ha ba b+ho gA b+ho gi nI b+hA gya b+hA dzA ma tu la pha la ta tiHsA dA na kalpa dru maH/ /i t+yA ha b+ha ga bAn bud+d+ha prI t+ya dA na pha laM shri yaM/ /ni dza dzan+mAn+ta rA khyA nair+b+hik+ShU NA ma nu shA sa ne/ /
<p>46b.4</p>sbyin pa'i dpag bsam shing gi mtshungs med 'bras bu rab rgyas tshe/ /'byor pa'i longs spyod spyod pa nyid du skal ba bsten pa rnam dag gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dges pa yis/ /rang gi skye ba gzhan brjod cing / /dge slong rnams la rjes bstan du/ /sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal 'di gsungs/ /
<p>46b.5</p>i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsit+tA yaM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM mAn+d+ha tu ra ba dA naM tsa tur+thaHpal+la baH// //dup+d+hA b+d+hirbi bu d+hAr+tha nA ti bi d+hu rAHk+Shub+d+hash+tsa kAM pe tsi raM kam+pan te tsa ni sarga
<p>46b.6</p>zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ nga las nu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi pa'o// //lha rnams kyis bslangs ba srubs pas shin tu 'khrugs shing 'o ma'i chu gter ring zhig
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>taHki la ka lot+sa rgeShu kalpa dru mAH/ /e kaHko pi sa dzA ya te ta nu sha tai ra b+h+yasta dA na s+thi tirniSh+kam+bA pu la kot+ka raM ba ha ti yaHkA yaM pra dA ne Sh+wa bi/ /asti kai
<p>47a.2</p>@#// /'dar/ /rang bzhin nyid kyi 'bras bu rab tu gtong tshe dpag bsam shing yang 'dar ro lo/ /gang zhig lus ni rab tu gtong yang spu long tshogs 'dzin 'dar ba mi mnga' ba/ /su zhig gcig pu de ni lus brgyas sbyin pa'i lugs 'di goms par gyur pa yin/ /kai la shas
<p>47a.3</p>lA sha ha si n+yA mut+ta ra s+yA ma nut+ta rA/ /di shi b+ha dra shi lA nA ma b+hu ba nA b+ha ra NaM pu rI/ /ya s+yAM si ta ya shaHpuSh+paHsa pha lAHsar+b+ba saM pa daH/ /dA nod+YA na la tAHprI t+yai ba b+hU bu pu ra bA si nAM/ /ya tra tri pu ra dzin+ne
<p>47a.4</p>mtshon byang phyogs na/ /bla na med pa'i grong khyer ni/ /bzang po'i brag ces bya ba ste/ /sa yi rgyan du gyur pa yod/ /gang du grags snyan me tog dkar/ /phun tshogs kun gyi 'bras bu bzang / /sbyin pa'i skyed tshal 'khri shing ni/ /grong khyer pa rnams dga' slad gyur/ /grong khyer gsum rgyal mig
<p>47a.5</p>tra shi khi trasto ma no b+ha baH/ /a ba lA b+hi tsa la krI DA b+h+rU b+haM gai re ba rak+She ta/ /muk+ta dzA lodz+dz+wa lA ya tra b+hA ti he ma gr-i hi ba lI/ /me roHshi Sha ra mA le ba bi s+phu rata s+phi ta tA ra kAH/ /ta s+yAny+tsan+d+raHpra b+hA shrI
<p>47a.6</p>gi mes/ /gang du skrag pas yid 'byung ni/ /stobs med g.yo zhing rtse ba yi/ /smin ma 'khyog po nyid kyis bsrungs/ /gang du gser gyi khang pa'i 'phreng / /mu tig tshogs rab 'bar bas mdzes/ /lhun po rtse yi 'phreng ba ni/ /rgyas pa'i rgyu skar 'phro ba bzhin/ /der ni dpal ldan zla ba'i 'od/ /
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>mA na b+hUta b+hU mi b+h+r-i tAM ba raH/ /kai lA sa i pa yaHkAn+t+yA tsa kA ra di na tsan+d+ri kAM/ /ya s+ya de ha pra b+hA pU raiHpUr+Nen+du d+Yu ti hA ri b+hiH/ /niHshA su dI pa kA b+hA su nA b+hUta sne ha gu Na k+Sha yaH/ /sma ra dz+wa raM b+ha dzan+te s+ya daR+sha ne
<p>47b.2</p>sa 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ /nyin mo'i zla 'od mdzes pa yis/ /gang zhig kai la sha bzhin byas/ /gang gi lus 'od zla nya yi/ /'od ltar rdzogs pa'i 'phrog byed kyis/ /gsal byed can min snang ba'i mtshan/ /byams pa'i yon tan zad ma gyur/ /'di mthong nyid na rgyu skar rnams/ /'dod
<p>47b.3</p>nai ba tA ra kAH/ /i tits+tsha trats+tsha la da s+yats+tsha di taM kha mi ben+du nA/ /pra ti sha t+ye Sha sa ta taM shri yaM mat+ko sha saM yAM/ /i tI sha daR+sha ne s+ya saM ko tsa prA pa pad+mi nI/ /se nA haM kA ra mut+s+r-i dz+ya t+yA ga
<p>47b.4</p>pa'i rims ni bsten 'gyur zhes/ /mkha' la gdugs kyi zol dag gis/ /'di ni zla bas bsgribs pa bzhin/ /dam pa'i mdzod na gnas pa'i dpal/ /rtag tu 'di yis rab ster zhes/ /gang zhig mthong la pad+mo can/ /zum par rab tu thob pa bzhin/ /sde yi nga rgyal rab btang nas/ /gtong ba
<p>47b.5</p>shu b+h+ra shri yA shri yaH/ /nirdiSh+TAHts+tsha tra mu ku Ta pra ka TaHpu ra bA si nAM/ /shu shu b+he bi b+ha bsta s+ya pu N+yA laM kr-i ton+na teH/ /A ro ha ti pa rAM ko TAM na mra s+ya d+ha nu Sho gu NaH/ /tsa twA riM shata sa
<p>47b.6</p>dkar ba'i dpal gyis dpal/ /gdugs dang cod pan rab gsal rnams/ /grong khyer pa rnams dag la btang / /de yi 'byor pa dul ba yis/ /dpal gyis brgyan cing mtho ba mdzes/ /gzhu ltar gug pa'i yon tan rgyud/ /gzhan dag rtse ru 'dzegs pa nyid/ /stong phrag bzhi bcu dag
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>ha srA Ni bat+sa rA NAM sha tA ni tsa/ /ba b+hU ba de hi nA mA yusta s+ya kA le ka li dwi ShaH/ /ta s+ya ShaSh+Thi sa hA srA Ni pu rI NAM pUr+Na sam+pa dAM/ /ba b+hU burlo ka pA la s+ya lo ka pA lA d+hi ka shri yaH/ /ya dz+nya
<p>48a.2</p>dang ni/ /brgya phrag dag gi lo rnams kyang / /lus can rnams kyi cher gyur pa/ /de dus rtsod la sdang ba byung / /'jig rten skyong las lhag pa'i dpal/ /'jig rten skyong de'i grong khyer ni/ /phun sum tshogs pas gang ba dag /stong phrag drug cu byung bar gyur/ /mchod
<p>48a.3</p>naHkIrti ti la kasta s+ya pu N+ya bi b+hU Sha NAH/ /yadz+nya d+hU ma la tA b+haM gairba b+hUrlI lA la kAHshri yaH/ /ta s+yA sam+pata ku mu di nI bi kA sa na sa do di taH/ /a b+hUta ma hA tsan+d+rash+tsan+d+ra lo ka i bodz+dz+wa laH/ /
<p>48a.4</p>sbyin byed po de yi dpal/ /grags pa'i thig le bsod nams brgyan/ /mchod sbyin du ba'i 'khri shing dag /'khyog pas g.yo ba'i lan bu mdzes/ /de yi blon po zla chen po/ /rab 'bar zla ba'i snang ba bzhin/ /phun tshogs ku mud ldan pa ni/ /rtag tu rnam par rgyas bgyid gyur/ /
<p>48a.5</p>ye na nish+tsa la lak+She Na pra b+hoHpradz+nyA pa tA ka yA/ /rA dz+yAb+d+hi kar+Na d+hA re Na pA ra mut+tA ri taM ya shaH/ /ma hI d+ha rA b+hi d+hash+tsA s+ya ba b+hU bA mA t+ya kuny+dza raH/ /b+hU mi b+hA ra sa hasta s+ya did+nA ga i ba pany+tsa maH/ /man+t+re NA
<p>48a.6</p>g.yo med mtshan ma shes rab kyis/ /ba dan rgyal srid chu gter gyi/ /rna ba 'dzin pa gang gis ni/ /gtso bo'i grags pa pha rol bsgral/ /de yi blon po'i glang po ni/ /sa 'dzin zhes bya sa yi khur/ /bzod pa gzhan yang byung gyur te/ /phyogs kyi glang po lnga pa bzhin/ /gang zhig
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>b+hin+na man+t+ra s+ya ya s+ya nI ti br-i haspa teH/ /t+yA dzi tAHpra ti sA man+tAHsaud+YaM bi Sha mi bA hi yaH/ /te nA mA t+ya na sa nr-i paHsa tsa rAdz+nyA bi b+hU Shi taH/ /gu NaHsad+pu ru She Ne ba gu Ne nai ba tsa sadz+dza naH/ /kr-i
<p>48b.2</p>phur bu'i lugs kyis ni/ /ma phye gros kyi gsang sngags kyis/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi dpa' bo dag /sbrul gyi dug bzhin btang bar gyur/ /blon po de yi mi bdag dang / /rgyal po yis kyang di brgyan pa/ /skyes bu dam pas yon tan dang / /yon tan gyis kyang skyes bu bzhin/ /byas
<p>48b.3</p>ta dz+nyAHsa ra laHswA mI sata b+h+r-i t+yo b+hak+ti nir+b+ha raH/ /su kr-i ta pra b+ha be nai ba b+hA gya yo ge na la b+h+ya te/ /i ya me ba tsi ra b+h+rAn+ti bi shrAn+tiHsarba sam+pa dA/ /yad gu Na dz+nya ta yA bet+ti swA mi sat+pu ru ShAn+ta raM/ /tau ka dA tsid+da dr-i sha tuH
<p>48b.4</p>shes drang ba'i rje bo dang / /dam pa'i g.yog ni rab gus pa/ /legs byas las skyes kho na yi/ /skal ba ldan par rnyed par 'gyur/ /rje yi skyes bu dam pa'i nang / /gang gi yon tan shes pas rig /'di nyid kho na phun tshogs kun/ /ring du 'khyam pa'i ngal gso yin/ /sbyin la zhen pas sa bdag ni/ /'jig
<p>48b.5</p>swap+na ma n+yai tsa man+t+ri NaH/ /k+Sha yo ya s+ya pha laM dA nAM bya pa ne na ma hI pa teH/ /tau dr-iSh+T+wA durni mit+tA ni prA dur+b+hU tA ni shaM ki tau/ /bya grau ba b+hU ba turni t+yaM shAn+ti swasti ka karma su/ /ni mit+ta daR+sha nod+big+nAsta po ba
<p>48b.6</p>'gyur gang gi 'bras bu can/ /blon po gzhan dang de gnyis kyis/ /nam zhig rmi lam mthong bar gyur/ /mtshan ma ngan par rab byung ba/ /mthong bas dogs par gyur de dag /rtag tu zhi dang shis pa yis/ /las rnams dag la chags par gyur/ /sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa/ /
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>na ga tA a pi/ /bi shwA mi tra pra b+h+r-i ta yaHswA mI t+yU tsurma haR+Sha yaH/ /a trAn+ta re bra h+ma ban+d+huHprAg+dzan+ma brah+ma rAk+Sha saH/ /rau drA k+Sho nA ma mAt+sar+Ya krauR+Ya daurdza n+ya duHsa haH/ /shru twA dA not+ta pAM
<p>49a.2</p>dka' thub nags na drang srong che/ /'di rnams kyang ni mtshan ma dag /mthong bas yid dman de dag brjod/ /bar der skye ba snga ma ni/ /tshangs pa'i srin po tshangs pa'i gnyen/ /ma rungs bzod dka' skye bo ngan/ /phrag dog drag po'i mig ces pas/ /rgyal po'i yon tan kun/
<p>49a.3</p>kIr+t+tiM rAdz+nyaHsarba gu Nodz+dz+wa lAM/ /nirgu NaHsarba gu Na dwe ShI san+tap+taHsa ma tsin+ta yata/ /a ho ba tA s+ya nr-i pa tergA ya te ga ga ne ya shaH/ /a ni shaM sid+d+ha gan+d+harba gIrbA Na la lA na ga NaiH/ /sa dA bi san+ti ye
<p>49a.4</p>rab 'bar/ /sbyin pas rab bskyed grags snyan thos/ /yon tan med de yon tan la/ /sdang ba'i gdung bas yang dag bsams/ /kye ma kyi hud mi bdag 'di'i/ /grags pa mkha' la nyin mtshan du/ /grub pa dri za tshig mda' yi/ /bud med tshogs kyis sgrogs par gyur/ /de yi yon tan bstod
<p>49a.5</p>kar+Na tata gu Nastu ti sU tsa yaH/ /kiM ka ro mi pra kr-i t+yai ba sa he nA n+ya s+yagu Non+na tiM/ /tata ga twA dA na shI la s+ya ta s+ya dA nArdzi taM ya shaH/ /ka ro mye Sha shi ro yAdz+nyA pra ti She rde na khaN+Di taM/ /ya shas+t+yA dz+ya te dA not+thaM
<p>49a.6</p>pa'i khab/ /rtag tu bdag gi rna bar zhugs/ /ci bya yon tan gyis mtho gzhan/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs mi bzod/ /des na sbyin pa'i ngang can de'i/ /sbyin pas bsgrubs pa'i grags pa dag /phyin nas mgo slong dgag pa yis/ /nyams pa 'di ni bdag gis byas/ /gal te mgo bo mi ster na/ /
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>shi rash+tsan+ne pra dA s+ya ti/ /a tha dA s+ya ti bi dwe Sha pra shAn+terme b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /i ti saM tsi t+ya su tsi raM sa krauR+Ya ka thi naHsha ThaH/ /gan+d+ha mA da na pA dAn+ta bA sI b+ha dra shi lAM ya yau/ /in+d+ra dzA la pra yo ga dz+nyaHsa kr-i twA
<p>49b.2</p>sbyin pas bslang ba'i grags nyams 'gyur/ /ci ste ster na bdag gi ni/ /zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /de ltar yun ring bsams nas ni/ /dri ldang ri zhabs mthar gnas pa/ /g.yo ldan ma rungs drag po de/ /bzang po'i brag tu song bar gyur/ /mig 'phrul sbyor ba shes pa de/ /rab tu zhi zhing
<p>49b.3</p>pra sha mo tsi taM/ /be shaM ka lu Sha saM kalpa pu rIM prA pa ma hI pa teH/ /asmin b+ha ba ba ne ni t+yaM gu Na do Sha sa mA ku le/ /kalpa br-ik+ShAHpra dzA yan+te dzA yan+te tsa bi Sha dru maH/ /a she Sha nA sha pi shu nair+g+ho ra
<p>49b.4</p>rigs pa'i chas/ /byas shing sdig pa'i kun rtog ldan/ /sa bdag grong khyer sleb par gyur/ /srid pa'i nags 'dir rtag tu ni/ /yon tan skyon gyis yang dag gang / /dpag bsam shing rnams rab skyes te/ /dug gi shing rnams skyes par gyur/ /ma lus nyams pa mtshon byed cing / /
<p>49b.5</p>san+t+rA sa kA ri b+hiH/ /durni mi t+tai ri ba kha laiHShe daHka s+ya na dI ya te/ /gu Ni dwe ShaHpra kr-i t+ye ba pra kA sha pa ri pan+thi naH/ /do ShA shra ya s+ya ko b+he daHkha la s+ya ti mi ra s+ya tsa/ /swats+tshan+da g+hA tI sA d+hU nAM bi
<p>49b.6</p>'jigs rung skrag par byed pa dag /ltas ngan lta bu'i mi bsrun pas/ /su la nyon mongs skyed mi byed/ /yon tan ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dgrar gyur rab gsal mi mthun phyogs/ /skyon la brten par mi bsrun dang / /rab rib dag la dbye ba ci/ /legs pa rnams kyi yid gcugs
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>dwe Sha bi Sha duHsa haH/ /dIr+g+hA bak+Sha kha la byA la ka rA laHke na nirmi taH/ /tasmin pra biSh+Te na ga raM rU pi NI su ra de ba tA/ /ba tsA b+h+ya t+ya b+hU pA laM san+t+ra sa ra le k+Sha NA/ /shi ro yA
<p>50a.2</p>'joms/ /rnam par sdang ba'i dug bzod dka'/ /logs ring skye bo mi bsrun sprul/ /'jigs su rung ba su yis sprul/ /grong khyer der ni rab zhugs tshe/ /grong khyer lha ni gzugs can ma/ /skrag pa'i mig ni g.yo ba yis/ /sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras/ /tshangs pa'i
