<p>50a.3</p>tsa ka e Sha twAM bra h+ma ban+d+hu ru pA ga taH/ /ba d+h+yo sau dzI bi to ts+tsha dI dza ga to dzI bi ta s+ya te/ /ni rud+d+ho na ga ra dwA ri sa ma yA ma li nA sha yaH/ /ma ma ta da drak+She tas+t+raM d+h+r-i tiM na la b+ha te ma naH/ /i ti shru bA NAM b+hU pA la pro
<p>50a.4</p>gnyen ni mgo slong ba/ /'di ni khyod can nye bar 'ongs/ /'gro ba'i 'tsho ba khyed kyis ni/ /'tsho ba gcod byed 'di gzhom 'os/ /bdag gis bsam pa dri ma can/ /de ni grong khyer sgo ru bkag /de mthong ba na bdag gi yid/ /skrag cing dga' ba ma thob po/ /'di smra grong khyer lha mo la/ /slong ba
<p>50a.5</p>bA tsa su ra de ba tAM/ /ar+thi saM ro d+ha saM dzA ta ladz+dzA tsa na mi tA na naH/ /de bi yAts+tsha b+hi yA to sau pra bi sha twa ni bA ri taH/ /dIr+g+hot+s+wA saM sa he nA hA mA sA bai pha l+ya mar+thi naH/ /yAts+tshA pra Na yi nA mar+the pu N+ya
<p>50a.6</p>bkag pas ngo tsha dag /rab skyes bzhin ras dman gyur pa'i/ /sa skyong gis ni rab tu smras/ /lha mo slong ba mngon 'ongs pa/ /'di ni ma zlog nang du thong / /slong ba'i bsam pa 'bras med pa'i/ /shugs rings bdag gis yongs mi bzod/ /slong ba don gnyer rnams don du/ /lus
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>prAp+tasta nu bya yaH/ /yu ga saM khyA ma pi s+thi twA bi pa d+yan+te hi de hi naH/ /e ta de ba su dzA tA nAM pU dz+yaM dza ga ti dzI bi taM/ /ya de ShA ma gra to yA ti nAr+thI b+hag+na ma no ra thaH/ /kri ya tA mA nu kU l+yaM me
<p>50b.2</p>nyams bsod nams rab tu thob/ /gang phyir lus ni dus bzhi'i grangs/ /gnas kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /slong ba re ba nyams pa dag /'di rnams mdun du mi bgrod gang / /de nyid skye bo legs rnams kyis/ /'tsho ba 'gro bar mchod par 'os/ /bdag gi rjes su mthun pa ni/ /dge
<p>50b.3</p>b+ha ba t+yA ku sha lo tsi taM/ /A sA bi g+hA te saM tA pasta s+ya tUr+Na ni bAR+YatAM/ /i ti b+hU mi b+h+r-i taHshru twA ba tso nish+tsi la nish+tsa yaM/ /dza gA mA daR+sha naM de bi tsin+tA san+tA pa mA na sA/ /a thA ya yau pa ku Ti la kha la kra ka tsa tseSh+Ti
<p>50b.4</p>bar 'os pa khyod kyis mdzod/ /de yi bsam pa rnam bcom pa'i/ /gdung ba myur du zlog par mdzod/ /de skad sa bdag tshig thos nas/ /g.yo ba med par nges pa yis/ /bsam pas yid ni rab gdung ba/ /lha mo snang ba mun par gyur/ /de nas gya gyu can de 'ongs/ /mi bsrun sog le'u spyod tshul
<p>50b.5</p>taH/ /dA ru NaHsa ra la s+yai ba ts+tshe dA ya swa ya mud+Ya taH/ /tasmin+n+r-i pa gr-i haM prAp+te bi br-i ta dwA ra mar+thi nAM/ /b+hUr b+hU pa ti k+Sha ya b+ha yAts+tsa kam+pai sa d+ha rA d+ha ra/ /na ren+d+ra tsan+d+ra mA sA d+ya sA rA hu ri ba durmu khaH/ /sa ma b+h+ya
<p>50b.6</p>can/ /mi bzad drang po'i shing dag ni/ /spyod la rang nyid sbyor ba bzhin/ /slong la sgo ni rab phye ba/ /mi bdag khang pa der 'ongs la/ /sa bdag 'dzin pas 'jigs pa yis/ /sa 'dzin dang bcas 'dar bar gyur/ /sgra gcan bzhin du gdong ngan de/ /mi dbang zla ba'i drung du 'ongs/ /mi shis don
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>d+hAd+pi d+hA ya prA ga shi bAr+tha mi bA shi ShaM/ /swasti rA dzan dwi dzan+mA hi bi dza ne sid+d+hi sA d+ha kaH/ /prAp+tas+t+wA mIs+si ta prAp+t+yai sarbAr+thi su ra pA da paM/ /dr-iSh+Ta br-iSh+Ti ri bA mr-i ta s+ya ma ha tI sau dza n+ya mi tri ma na
<p>51a.2</p>bzhin shis pa ni/ /brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar bya/ /rgyal po dge gyur gnyis skyes bdag /dben par grub pa sgrub pa po/ /slong ba kun gyi lha yi shing / /khyod can 'dod pa thob phyir 'ongs/ /rtag tu gang gis gzigs pa bdud rtsi'i char chen yid ni skye bo dam pa'i
<p>51a.3</p>k+ShAn+ti kro d+ha ra dzaHpra mArdza na na dI duHkhAr+t+ta mA tA ma tiH/ /lak+Sh+mIrdA na dza lo b+hi She ka bi ma lA so t+yo pa yuk+taM ba tso ni t+yaM ya s+ya saM e ka e ba hi b+ha bAn dzA to dza gad+bAn+d+ha ba/ /sid+d+ha ye ka thi taM kaish+tsits+tsakra
<p>51a.4</p>grogs/ /bzod pa khong khro'i rdul rnams rab sel chu bo blo gros sdug bsngal gyis gzir ma/ /dpal 'byor dri med sbyin pa'i chu ni mngon 'thor tshig ni bden zhing rigs par ldan/ /'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen du skyes pa de ni khyod nyid gcig pu kho na yin/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i mgo yis ni/ /
<p>51a.5</p>brti shi ro ma ma/ /dI ya tAM tat+t+wa da n+yo bA dAt+tuM shak+no ti kaHsa raH/ /san+ti spaSh+TAr+tha dA tsin+tA ma Ni kalpa dru mA da yaH/ /durla b+hAr+tha pra dA ba ro bi ra lAstu b+ha bad+bi d+hAH/ /i t+yuk+te te na nr-i pa
<p>51a.6</p>bdag gis 'grub ces 'ga' yis smras/ /da ni byin mdzod khyod las gzhan/ /su yi mgo bo sbyin par nus/ /gsal ba'i don ster yid bzhin nor/ /dpag bsam ljon pa la sogs yod/ /rnyed dka'i don ni rab ster mchog /khyod lta bu ni shin tu nyung / /de yis de brjod mi bdag ni/ /
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>tirniSh+kam+pa bi pu lA sha yaH/ /ar+thi san+daR+sha nA nan+da nir+b+ha rasta ma b+hA Shi ta/ /d+ha n+yo haM ya s+ya me brah+man+nar+thi nA mar+tha sid+d+ha ye/ /nirbi kalpo pa ka ra NaM bya yaM yA ti su dzI bi taM/ /ka dA prA NAHpa rAr+the
<p>51b.2</p>mi g.yo yangs pa'i bsam pa can/ /slong ba gzigs pas kun dga' dag /rdzogs pa yis ni de la smras/ /gang zhig bdag gis legs 'tsho dag /slong ba rnams kyi don grub slad/ /rnam par mi rtog yo byad du/ /zad 'gyur bram ze bdag legs so/ /bdag srog pha rol don
<p>51b.3</p>me pra yAn+tI ma no ra thaH/ /ki me tA ni na pu N+yA ni prAr+th+yan+te te ya di twa yA/ /a ho pa ka ra Na sid+d+h+yai sh+lAg+h+yaM me gr-i h+ya tAM shi raH/ /tata ta de ba s+thi ra lo ke yad ya dar+thi pa marbi taM/ /i t+yuk+te haR+Sha yuk+te na b+hU
<p>51b.4</p>du ni/ /nam zhig 'gyur zhing re ba yod/ /gal te khyod kyis de bslangs pa/ /'di ni bsod nams cis ma yin/ /'jig rten 'dir ni slong rnams la/ /gang gang byin pa de de brtan/ /grub pa'i yo byad bdag gi mgo /bsngags par 'os pa gzung bar mdzod/ /sa spyod snying stobs legs ldan pa/ /
<p>51b.5</p>b+hu dzA sa twa shA li nA/ /ta mU tsa tam+ma hA mA t+yau ma hA tsan+d+ra ma hI d+ha rau/ /ni dza dzI bi ta rak+She ba d+har+m+maste pra tha maHpra b+ho/ /twa yi dzI ba ti dzI ban+ti sarbe dza ga te dzan+ta baH/ /nA dA tu mar+ha si shi raHsarbA d+hA ra hi te ba suH/ /dI
<p>51b.6</p>rab dga' ldan pas 'di brjod tshe/ /blon po chen po zla chen dang / /sa 'dzin dag gis de la smras/ /rje bo khyod kyi chos dang po/ /rang gi srog ni bsrung ba nyid/ /'gro bar khyod ni 'tsho ba na/ /srog chags thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir khyod lus kun gyi gzhi/ /mgo bo sbyin par mi 'os so/ /rin
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>ya taM brah+ma NA yAsmai he ma rat+na ma yaM shi raH/ /sarbAr+thai rar+thi sAr+tha nAM pUR+Yan+te yair+m+ma no ra thAH/ /te ShAM saM rak+Sha Ne nai ba sarbaM b+ha ba ti rak+Shi taM/ /saM kalpo yaM dwi dza s+yA s+ya krU raHka lu
<p>52a.2</p>chen gser gyi rang bzhin mgo / bram ze 'di la sbyin par mdzod/ /slong ba'i don mthun re ba dag /gang gi don kun gyis rdzogs pa/ /de dag yang dag bsrungs pa yis/ /thams cad bsrungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i sems ldan gnyis skyes 'di'i/ /rnam rtog
<p>52a.3</p>Sha tse ta saH/ /mU lots+tshe do pa dzI byo hi na kalpa ta ru rar+thi nAM/ /he ma rat+na shi raHprA s+ya yA twe Sha shi ra sA s+ya kiM/ /tsin+tA ma Nirbi niSh+pa Sh+ya b+hu dz+ya te na bu b+huk+Shi taiH/ /i t+yuk+te man+ti mu khyA b+h+yaM he ma
<p>52a.4</p>'di ni 'jigs su rung / /gang phyir slong ba'i dpag bsam shing / /rtsa bcad nye bar 'tsho bya min/ /rin chen gser gyi mgo thob nas/ /'di ni 'gro 'gyur mgo yis ci/ /bkres pa rnams kyi yid bzhin nor/ /rnam par brtags nas bgam bya min/ /blon po'i gtso bos 'di smras tshe/ /rin chen
<p>52a.5</p>rat+na la yaM shi raH/ /sid+d+hau ne bo pa yo gyaM tan+ma me ti brAh+ma No bra bIta/ /a thon+mu mo tsa nr-i pa tirmu ku TaM mauk+ti kAM shu b+hiH/ /shi ro bi ba ha duHkhe na sA shru d+hA ra mi bA ti taH/ /mu ku TA ni k+Sha Ne ta smin ni pe
<p>52a.6</p>gser gyi rang bzhin mgo /de ni bdag gis 'grub pa la/ /nyer mkho med ces bram zes smras/ /de nas cod pan mi bdag gis/ /rab bkrol mu tig 'od rnams ni/ /mgo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /kun nas mchi ma'i rgyun bcas bzhin/ /skad cig de la grong khyer ba'i/ /cod pan
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>tuHpu ra bA si nAM/ /dig+dA hol+mu ka tu l+yA b+hi rulkA b+hiHsa ha b+hU ta lo/ /rA dz+nyA pra dA ne shi ra saHsarba thA pa ri kalpi te/ /tau tsakra tasta nu t+yA gaM man+ti Nau daSh+Tu ma k+Sha mau/ /rat+na gar+b+ha mi thod+YA naM pra bi sh+ya
<p>52b.2</p>rnams ni sa gzhi la/ /phyogs ni bsreg mtshungs mgal me dang / /skar mda' dag dang lhan cig lhung / /rgyal pos mgo ni rab ster ba/ /rnam pa kun tu yongs brtags te/ /mthong bar mi bzod blon po ni/ /de dag lus ni btang ba byas/ /de nas skyed tshal rin chen nang / /zhugs te sa
<p>52b.3</p>pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /ut+phul+la tsam+pa ka s+yA d+haHshi rash+tshet+tuM sa mud+Ya yau/ /ud+YA na de ba tA dr-iSh+T+wA taM shi rash+tshet+tu mung+Ya traM/ /mA kr-i thA sA ha saM rA dzan+ni t+yu bA tsa shu tsa ku lA/ /kam+pa nAH pra mA pi n+yasta mat+tA li ku
<p>52b.4</p>yi bdag po yis/ /rab rgyas tsam pa ka 'og tu/ /mgo bo gcod du yang dag gshegs/ /skyed mos tshal gyi lhas mthong nas/ /mgo bo gcod par brtson de la/ /rgyal po thub chod ma mdzad ces/ /mya ngan dag gis 'khrugs par smras/ /'dar ldan 'khri shing rab smras pa/ /bung ba myos
<p>52b.5</p>la swa naiH/ /n+ya bA ra yin+na ba la tA lo la pal+la ba pA Ni b+hiH/ /so pi n+yish+tsa la saM kalpaHsra sA d+yod+YA na de ba tAM/ /bi ma lAM bo d+hi mA laM bya ba b+hU ba pra Ni d+hA na bA na/ /asmin rat+na ma yod+YA ne pu N+ya rA shi
<p>52b.6</p>tshogs sgra dang ni/ /yal 'dab rab tu g.yo ba yis/ /lag pa dag gis bzlog pa bzhin/ /rnam par brtags pa g.yo med des/ /skyed tshal lha yang dang byas nas/ /dri med byang chub la dmigs pa'i/ /smon lam dag dang ldan par gyur/ /grong dang rin chen rang bzhin tshal/ /'di ni bsod
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>sa mun+na taM/ /stU pa mastu pra NA mastu sa twa san+tA ra No tsi taM/ /yat+kiny+tsa dardzi taM pu N+yaM saM kalpe na ma yA mu nA/ /b+ha ban+tu te na saM sA re niHsaM sA rAHsha rI ri NaH/ /d+h+yA twe ti
<p>53a.2</p>nams phung pos mtho/ /sems can yang dag sgrol 'os pa/ /ston pa'i mchod rten 'byung gyur cig /bdag gis brtag pa 'di yis ni/ /bsod nams cung zad gang bsgrubs pa/ /de yis 'khor bar lus can rnams/ /'khor ba med par 'gyur bar shog /de ltar dmigs
<p>53a.3</p>tsam+pa ka ta roHshA khA yAM nr-i pa tiHshi raH/ /pa d+hA ka tsa ka lA se nats+tshi twA prA dAd+d+wi dzan+ma ne/ /a tha na ra pa teHsa twot+sA ha s+phu Ta pra Ni d+hA na tarki ma pi bi ma laiHpu N+yA lo kerdi gan+ta pi sA ri b+hiH/ /bi ga li ta
<p>53a.4</p>nas mi bdag gis/ /tsam pa ka shing lo ma la/ /sgra tshogs kyis btags bcad nas mgo /gnyis skyes la ni rab tu byin/ /de nas mi yi bdag po'i snying stobs spro zhing gsal ba'i smon lam dang / /gang yang dri med bsod nams snang ba phyogs mthar rnam par 'phro ba yis/ /rmongs pa'i mun
<p>53a.5</p>ma hA mo ha g+hAn+taHshri taHpa ri nrir+b+r-i tIM pra bi ra ta b+ha bA b+h+yA sA yA paHk+Sha NA da b+ha badz+dza naH/ /i ti prAg+dzan+ma br-it+t+yAn+ta ka tha yA b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /b+hik+Shu NAM bi da d+ha shud+d+ha dA na sad+d+harma de sha nAM/ /i
<p>53a.6</p>chen rnam par sel zhing yongs su myang 'das la brten dang / /srid par goms pa'i ngal ba rab sel 'gro la skad cig dag gis gyur/ /de ltar sngon skyes spyod pa'i mtha'/ /bshad nas bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /sbyin pa dag pa'i dam chos dag /dge slong rnams la bstan pa bsgrubs/ /zhes
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>hi k+She men+d+re na bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpA la tA yA tsan+d+ra pra b+hA ba dA naM pany+tsa maHpal+la paH// //dA nad+ya tA nA pr-i thu bIR+Ya b+hA dzAM shud+d+hAt+ma naM sa twa ma ho da d+hi nAM/ /a ho
<p>53b.2</p>pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las/ zla ba'i 'od kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste lnga pa'o// //sbyin pa la brtson brtson 'grus rgya che'i gnas/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid snying stobs rgya mtsho dang / /spro ba che
<p>53b.3</p>ma hots+tsha ha ba tAM pa rar+the b+ha baM t+ya tsin+t+yA ni sa mA hi tA ni/ /harmyA ro ha Na he la yA ya da ba lAHswa b+h+raiHsa hA b+h+raM li hA yad+bA goSh+pa da lI la yA dza la b+ha ra k+Sho b+hod+d+ha tAHsin+d+ha baH/ /la g+h+yan+te b+ha ba na s+tha lI ka la na yA
<p>53b.4</p>ldan rnams ni gzhan don la/ /kye ma bsam gyis mi khyab bzhed pa yin/ /gang zhig mkhar rnyog ri bo sul bcas dag la rtse dgas ba gam la 'dzegs dang / /gang dag chu tshogs 'khrug cing gyen 'thor rgya mtsho dag la rol pas ba lang rjes/ /gang yang nags tshal stug po'i khyon la dga'
<p>53b.5</p>ye tsA Da bI nAM ta Tastid+bAR+Ya s+ya ma hAd+ma nAM bi la sa taHsa twordzi taM s+phurdzi taM/ /pu rA hi b+ha ga bAn bud+d+haHshra bas+t+yAM pu ra bA si nAM/ /u pa de sha pra kA sha na dza hA rA dz+nyA na dzaM ta maH/ /b+hik+Shu
<p>53b.6</p>bder khang pa'i thang bzhin 'god byed pa/ /de ni bdag nyid che rnams snying stobs kyis bsgrubs rgyas pa'i brtson 'grus rnam rtsen yin/ /sngon ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /man ngag rab tu gsal ba yis/ /mnyan yod grong khyer ba rnams kyi/ /mi shes las skyes mun pa bsal/ /de ni nam
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>@#/ saM g+haiHpa ri br-i taHpa kA tsid+ba nig+dza naiH/ /kr-i tA nu yA tro ma ga d+hAta swa yaM tsa ri ka yA ya yau/ /ma hAr+thA nu ga taM pra dzaM taM ba na bar+t+ma nA/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wa taska ra ga NaHshA lA Da byA ma tsin+ta
<p>54a.2</p>zhig ma ga d+har/ /dge slong tshogs kyis yongs bskor cing / /tshong pa'i skye bo'i rjes 'brang bcas/ /rang nyid rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur/ /nor chen don mthun rjes 'brang zhing / /nags kyi lam nas gshegs pa de/ /chom rkun tshogs kyis mthong gyur nas/ /sA la'i nags su
<p>54a.3</p>yata/ /e Sha pra yA tu b+ha ga bA na su raHsa twa hi te ra taH/ /pash+tsAta sAr+thaM gra hI Sh+ya maHpUrbaM dra bi Na rA shi b+hiH/ /b+ha ga bA na tha sarba dz+nyaste ShAM dz+nyA twa sa mA hi taM/ /ki me tA di ti tA nu tse nirbi
<p>54a.4</p>rnam bsams pa/ /sems can phan dges bcom ldan 'das/ /'di ni sngon la gshegs su gzhug /nor gyi phung pos gang ba yi/ /don mthun phyi nas gzung bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis/ /de rnams 'dod pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /rnam 'gyur mi mnga' bzhin 'dzum pas/ /
<p>54a.5</p>kA ra smi tA na naH/ /te na mU tsuHpa ri t+ya dz+ya kaut+Ya ma d+hu ra yA gi rA/ /tat+p+ra sA da smi tA lo kairbi naSh+Da mi rA i ba/ /b+ha ga bAn dzI bi tasmA kaM niM d+ye yaM karma nirmi tA/ /nab+h+r-i tirna kr-i ShirnA n+ya
<p>54a.6</p>'di dag ci zhes de la gsungs/ /de yis rab dang 'dzum pa yis/ /snang bas rab rib bcom pa bzhin/ /de dag gdug pa yongs btang zhing / /snyan pa'i tshig gis de la smras/ /bcom ldan bdag cag 'tsho ba 'di/ /smad par 'os pa las kyis sprul/ /gla rngan ma yin zhing las min/ /
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>rak+Sha NaM na pra ti gra haH/ /sa hA dzaM krauR+Ya masmA kaM ni sarga ka lu ShAt+ma nAM/ /kri ya te keM swa b+hA ba s+ya de ba tIk+Sh+NA hi kar+Ni kAH/ /tasmAn+na br-i ti lo paM naHkartu mar+ha si ga mya tAM/ /yA te tu twa yi sAr+tha s+ya ba yaM
<p>54b.2</p>gzhan srung ma yin byin len min/ /bdag cag gdug pa lhan cig skyes/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sdig bdag nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyi las kyis ni/ /sbrul gyi mche rnon ji ltar sel/ /des na bdag cig 'tsho ba ni/ /nyams byar mi 'os gshegs par mdzod/ /khyod ni gshegs na don mthun gyi/ /nor
<p>54b.3</p>sarbAr+tha hA ri NaH/ /i ti te ShAM ba tsAHshru twA ka ru NA pUr+N+NA mA nA saH/ /do lA lo lA yi ta ma tiHba b+hU ba b+ha ga bAn k+Sha NAM/ /ta ta sAr+tha d+ha naM sarbaM pa ri saM khyA ya tata sa maM/ /sa da dau tsau ra tsakrA ya
<p>54b.4</p>rnams thams cad bdag cag 'phrog /de skad de dag tshig thos nas/ /snying rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i thugs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi blo gros ni/ /skad cig khyogs la 'phyang bar gyur/ /de nas don mthun nor rnams kun/ /yangs bgrangs de dang mnyam pa ni/ /de tshe thob pa'i gter dag las/ /
<p>54b.5</p>k+Sha NAp+ta ni d+hA na taH/ /tad+bi d+he na kra me Nai ba pu naHpa thi ga tA ga taiH/ /ShaT kr-i twa pra da dau te b+h+yaHsor+tha sAr+tha s+ya muk+ta ye/ /su nash+tso pa ga te tasmin bar+t+ma nA te na sA nu ge /ba b+hU ba bud+d+hish+tsau rA NAM tad b+ho dza na ni
<p>54b.6</p>chom rkun tshogs la de yis byin/ /yang gshegs byon pas lam du ni/ /rim pa de lta bu nyid kyis/ /don mthun sgrol phyir de yi nor/ /lan drug de rnams la rab byin/ /yang ni lam de nas 'ong ste/ /rjes su 'brang dang bcas de la/ /de yi zas ni mgron gnyer ba'i/ /blo gros chom rkun rnams
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>man+t+ra Ne/ /b+h+r-i shA di shAn+ti bai ma l+yaM shu b+haM saM b+hA Sha Ne na tsa/ /pra dzan+ti saM ga ma b+h+yA saiHsan+taHsan+mArga se tu tAM/ /ta tra tiR+Yag+d+r-i sha sarba sarba ku sha la saM k+Sha yA ta/ /te ShAM sa mA hi
<p>55a.2</p>la byung / /dam pa mthong bas dri bral te/ /yang dag bshad pas dge ba yang / /'grogs pa goms pas legs pa'i lam/ /zam stegs dag nas 'gro bar gyur/ /mi dge thams cad yongs zad las/ /de rnams 'dod pa dag pa kun/ /der ni bcom ldan
<p>55a.3</p>taM shud+d+haM bi da d+he b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /ye ShAM saM gra ha bstU ni tsa twA ri ni ya tAt+ma nAM/ /ar+tha tsaR+YA sa mA nAr+tha b+hA bas+t+yA gaHpri yaM ba tsaH/ /ye ShAM brah+ma bi hA rAsh+tsa tsa twA raHsa twa shA li nAM/ /ka ru NA mu di to
<p>55a.4</p>rgyal bdag /drang por gzigs pas mkhyen par gyur/ /don spyod pa dang don mthun dang / /bdog pa gtong dang snyan par smra/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po la/ /nges pa'i bdag nyid gang dag dang / /gang zhig snying stobs ldan rnams kyis/ /tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po/ /snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms
<p>55a.5</p>pek+Sha me trI tse ti pa ri gra haH/ /ye ShAM ku sha la mU lA ni shak+tA ni trI Ni tse ta si/ /a lo b+hash+tsA pa ri dwe Sho phya mo hash+tsa ma hAt+ma nAM/ /dA na shI la k+Sha ma bIR+Ya d+h+ya na pradz+nyA dzu ShaM sa dA/ /u pA ya pra Ni d+hi dz+nyA
<p>55a.6</p>dang / /byams pa zhes bya yongs 'dzin dang / /ma chags yongs su sdang ba med/ /ma rmongs pa de dge ba'i rtsa/ /gsum ni thugs la zhen pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen po gang dag dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab rtag bsten zhing / /thabs dang smon lam ye shes
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>na ba lai rA shri ta tse ta sAM/ /pa ra trA Nai ka bI rA nAM ya dai pA dwa ya ba di nI/ /bi d+yA tra ya pra dIp+tA nAM tsa tur+b+bai ma l+ya shA li nAM/ /pany+tsa skan+d+hA bi muk+tA nAM Sha DA ya ta na b+he di nAM/ /sap+ta bo d+h+yaM
<p>55b.2</p>dang / /stobs kyi rab tu bsten pa'i thugs/ /yongs skyobs dpa' bo gcig pu dang / /rtag tu gnyis med gsung nyid dang / /rig pa gsum gyi gsal ba dang / /dri med bzhi dang legs par ldan/ /phung po lnga las rnam grol zhing / /skye mched drug ni 'byed pa dang / /byang chub yan lag
<p>55b.3</p>ga yuk+tA nA mAR+YaSh+TAM go pa de shi nAM/ /na ba saM yo ga hI nA nAM te ShAM da sha ba lAt+ma nAM/ /kiM bAs+t+ya bi di taM lo ke dzi nA nAM dza ne tseSh+Ti taM/ /ta taste Sh+wa ti ka ru N+yAts+tsha ra NA lI na mUr+d+ha su/ /ta thet+Yu
<p>55b.4</p>bdun dang ldan/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad nyer ston/ /kun sbyor dgus dman rgyal ba ni/ /stobs bcu'i bdag nyid ldan dag gis/ /'jig rten skye bo'i spyod tshul la/ /mi mkhyen pa ni ci zhig yod/ /de nas shin tu snying rje yis/ /zhabs la mgos gtugs de dag la/ /de bzhin no zhes
<p>55b.5</p>bA tsa b+ha ga bAM stad+b+ho dz+Yopa ni man+t+ra Ne/ /taistat+saM daR+sha na k+ShI NA kilbi SheHsa ma marbi taM/ /b+hik+Shu saM g+hair+b+r-i tob+ho dz+yi bi d+hi bat+sarba mA da de/ /ta tastad pra Ni d+hA ne na dz+nyA na lo ka sha lA ka yA/ /te sa mun+mI li ta dr-i shaHpra kA
<p>55b.6</p>bcom ldan gyis/ /de yi zas la zhal gyis bzhes/ /de mthong sdig pa zad gyur pa/ /de dag gis ni mnyam du phul/ /dge slong tshogs kyis bskor ba yis/ /zas kun cho ga bzhin du blangs/ /de 'og de yi smon lam ni/ /ye shes snang ba'i thur ma yis/ /de dag mig ni yang dag phye/ /rab tu gsal
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>shaM da dr-i shuHpa daM/ /te pa d+yastI bra bai rA gya pa ri pa kwAHpra sA di naH/ /pra bra dz+yA yo ga mA sa dz+ya dzag+murdza ga ti pU dz+ya tA/ /tat+te ShAM ku sha laM dr-iSh+T+wa sa ha so sa na taM pu raH/ /ba b+hA She b+ha ga bAn sr-iSh+TaH
<p>56a.2</p>ba'i gnas mthong gyur/ /de dag 'phral la drag por ni/ /chags bral yongs smin rab tu dang / /rab tu byung dang ldan thob nas/ /'gro ba'i mchod 'os nyid du gyur/ /de dag 'phral la dge ba de/ /sngon du nye bar gnas mthong nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis 'di ci zhes/ /dris
<p>56a.3</p>ki me ta di ti b+hik+Shu b+hiH/ /e ter+m+ma mA yaM sam+ban+d+haHsar+tha rak+Sha Na niSh+k+ra yaiH/ /dwI pa yA trA nu ga ta s+ya sI da n+yasmin+na pi dzan+ma ni/ /a sti pistIr+Na mArga s+ya sorga brga ba d+hirbi d+heH/ /bu rI bA rA Na sI nA ma kau
<p>56a.4</p>shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /'di dag bdag dang 'brel pa 'di/ /don mthun bsrungs shing slu ba yis/ /gling du 'gro ba'i skye ba ni/ /gzhan dag la yang grub par gyur/ /rnam rgyas spro ba sgrub byed kyis/ /rab mchog mkhas pa dga' ba'i sa/ /bA rA Na sI zhes pa'i grong / /mtho
<p>56a.5</p>sha lot+kaR+Sha haR+Sha p+hU/ /ya s+yA ma ma la kal+lo la bA hi NI su ra bA hi nI/ /sa dA da ye ba hr-i da yaM pra sA da ya ti de hi nAM/ /a hiM se ba sa tAM se b+ha bi d+ye ba bi du ShAm+ma tAM/ /k+She me ba sarba b+hU tA nAM yA bi shraM b+ha su
<p>56a.6</p>ris sde yis 'tshams gyur yod/ /gang na dri med chu rlabs ni/ /'dzin pa lha yi rgyun 'dzin dag /rtag tu lus can rnams kyis snying / /brtse ba bzhin du dang bar bgyid/ /bzod pa bzhin du 'byung po kun/ /bag phab bde bar gnas pa gang / /'tshe ba med bzhin dam pas bsten/ /rig pa bzhin du
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>kha s+thi tiH/ /brah+ma kalpe n-i pe ta s+yA bi ka sa ta ka ma lA shra ye/ /brah+ma dat+tA b+he d+he lo ke trai lo kya mi ba rak+Sha ti/ /pri ya se nA b+hi d+ha no b+hUta ta tra bai shra ba No sa maH/ /sAr+tha bA hor+tha sAr+tha naM s+tha na mab+d+hi ri bAM b+ha
<p>56b.2</p>mkhas pas 'dod/ /de nas mi bdag tshangs par ni/ /brtag bya rnam rgyas pad+mar bsten/ /tshangs byin zhes byas 'jig rten ni/ /'jig rten gsum po bzhin du bsrungs/ /der ni ded dpon dga' ba'i sde/ /zhes pa rnam thos bu lta bu/ /chu rnams dag gi chu gter bzhin/ /nor gyi don mthun gnas su
<p>56b.3</p>saM/ /ta s+yA b+hUta su pri yo nA ma sau dzA n+ya ni la yaHsu taH/ /pra ya yau yaM sa mA shri t+ya sAr+tha kr-i tAr+tha tAM/ /dA naM shI la k+Sha mA bIR+Ya d+h+yA na pradz+nyA sa ma n+wi taH/ /d+hA trA bi lo b+hA nA yai ba ya kr-i taHsu kr-i taHshri
<p>56b.4</p>gyur/ /de sras shin tu dga' zhes pa/ /skye bo legs pa'i gnas su gyur/ /gang la brten pa'i yon tan tshogs/ /don byas nyid du rab tu gyur/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab ldan/ /byed po rnam par chags slad gang / /legs byas dpal du byas pa
<p>56b.5</p>yeH/ /taM sar+b+ba bi d+yA bi Sha dAHka lAsh+tsa bi pu lA sha yaM/ /bi bi shuHsa rA so dA rA ma ho da d+hi mi bA pa gAH/ /gu NA laM kr-i ta tsA ri traM lak+Sha NA laM kr-i tA kr-i tiM/ /pu ru Shot+ta ma lub+d+he ba yaM sh+lA g+h+ya shrI ra rdzi shri
<p>56b.6</p>bzhin/ /de ni dri med rig kun dang / /sgyu rtsal shin tu yangs par yang / /ro ldan yid 'ong chu gter cher/ /chu bo bzhin du zhugs par gyur/ /spyod pa yon tan gyis brgyan cing / /lus ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa gang / /skyes bu mchog la chags pa bzhin/ /bsngags par 'os pa'i dpal gyis
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>yata/ /kA le na su kr-i ta krI taM si ta ri tri di baM ga te/ /tsakre skan+d+ha ta Te ta s+ya bya ba hA ra b+hA ras+thi tiM/ /so tsin+ta ya di yaM lak+Sh+mIrbi pu lAt+ma kra mA ga tAH/ /ta thA pi ma n+ye baR+YAb+tA na sarbAr+thi
<p>57a.2</p>bsten/ /bsod nams kyis myos mtho ris su/ /yab ni dus kyi gshegs pa'i tshe/ /de yi tha snyad khur dag ni/ /phrag pa'i ngos la gnas par byas/ /de bsams bdag gi dpal 'byor 'di/ /rim pas 'ong zhing yangs pa ste/ /de lta na yang slong kun gyis/ /re ba yongs su
<p>57a.3</p>ma no ra the/ /kiM tA yA su ma hA t+yA pi shri ya sat+pu ru Sha s+tha yA/ /pUrbA ga tAr+thi b+huk+te ba yA she ShAr+thi Shu ni s+pha lA/ /rat+na ka ra s+ya bai pu l+yaM niSh+pha lAM be d+ha sA kr-i taM/ /a d+yA pi pU ri to ye na nai kau pyar+tha sa bA Da
<p>57a.4</p>ma rdzogs snyam/ /sngar 'ongs slong bas zos nyid tshe/ /gang zhig phyis slong 'bras bu med/ /skyes bu dam pa la gnas dpal/ /shin tu che ba des kyang ci/ /rta gdong slong ba gcig de yang / /gang gis da dung yongs ma rdzogs/ /rin chen 'byung gnas byed po yis/ /yangs par byas pa'ang 'bras bu
<p>57a.5</p>baH/ /a tha bA pr-i thu saM kalpaHke nAr+tha pa ri pUR+Ya te/ /dza gA man+d+hi ra gas+t+ya s+ya tsu lu kA ba ma nI ya taM/ /kiM ka ro mya ti tA po yaM shri re kA ba ha bor+thi nAM/ /na ta dA sA d+ya te bit+taM yat+sarbAr+thi b+ha ra Na k+Sha maM/ /pany+tsa ShA pU ri tA e ba nAM
<p>57a.6</p>med/ /yang na brnag pa rgya che ba'i/ /slong ba su yis yongs rdzogs te/ /a gas+t+ya yi khyor chu yis/ /hub tu rgya mtsho chen po song / /dpal ni gcig la slong ba mang / /slong ba kun khengs bzod pa gang / /nor de bdag gis yongs mi 'thob/ /ci bya 'di ni shin tu gdung / /dpal dang nor bu la sogs kyis/ /
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>n+ye shrI kaustu b+hA di b+hiH/ /i tI pA d+ya pi tap+ton+ta dz+wa lo daurbA Na lom+bu d+hiH/ /tasmAt+ka ro mi yat+ne na ni saM khya dra bi NArdza naM/ /na sa he duHkha niHshwA saM bi mu kha s+ya mu khe r+thi naH/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya sa tsi raM sAr+the na
<p>57b.2</p>lnga drug nyid khengs gzhan min zhes/ /chu gter da dung rta gdong me/ /gdung ba nang du 'bar ba bzhin/ /slong ba phyir phyogs kha yis ni/ /sdug bsngal shugs rings yongs mi bzod/ /de slad dag gis 'bad pa yis/ /grangs med nor ni bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar yun ring bsams nas de/ /don mthun
<p>57b.3</p>ma ha to pr-i taH/ /rat+na dwI pa pu raM ga twA bi da d+he rat+na saM gra haH/ /ta taHpra tI pa mA sAn+taM kr-i tAr+thaM ba ne tsa raH/ /sAr+thAr+tha ha ra Non muk+t+wa da dr-i shurda s+ya baHpa thi/ /sAr+thAr+tha ha ra Ne dr-iSh+T+wa sa te ShAM sA ha sod+Ya maM/ /ni dza sarba swa
<p>57b.4</p>chen pos bskor nas ni/ /rin chen gling gi grong khyer du/ /phyin nas rin chen bsdu ba byas/ /de 'og don byas slar log ste/ /'ong bde ni chom rkun pa/ /don mthun nor 'phrog sbyor ba la/ /nags na rgyu ba sa lam du mthong / /de dag don mthun nor bslang phyir/ /bab col du sbyor des mthong nas/ /rang gi nor kun byin
<p>57b.5</p>dA ne na swAM rak+ShA nu yA yi nAM/ /pu naHpra me Na te nai ba ran+ta dwI pa ga ta ga teH/ /sAr+thA trA NA ya tsau rA NAM ShaT+k+r-i twAHpra da dau d+ha naM/ /ta thai ba twAM pu N+yA pi pan+tha ni saM prA p+tasta thai ba/ /tan da daR+sha tsau rAn sAr+thar+tha ha ra Ne\u0f85d+hi
<p>57b.6</p>phyis kyang lam ni de nyid nas zhes pa'i tshig rkang gcig po 'di'i skad dod mi 'dug pa rkang pa gzhan rnams dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sde ba sbyor du 'dar los bsgrigs pa rgya dpe rnyed na dpyad/
<p>57b.7</p>nas ni/ /rjes su 'brang ba'i nor rnams bsrungs/ /phyi nas rim pa de bzhin nyid/ /rin chen gling gi 'gro 'ong gis/ /don mthun bskyab phyir chom rkun la/ /nor ni lan drug rab du byin/ /phyis kyang lam ni de nyid nas/ /'ongs pas de bzhin chom rkun pa/ /don mthun nor ni 'phrog pa la/ /lhag par brkam pa de
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>kA da ran/ /so tsin+ta ya da ho bit+tairma had+b+hiHpa ri pU ri tAH/ /ma yai te na bi partaM te naM pa rAr+tha ha ra Nod+Ya mA ta/ /dza gta saM pU ra yA myar+thai ri t+yuk+t+wA pi ma yA sa kr-ita/ /a ho nu da s+ya bo nai te ba rA
<p>58a.2</p>dag mthong / /des bsams kye ma bdag gi nor/ /chen po yis ni yongs su sim/ /'di dag pha rol nor 'phrog la/ /brtson pa las ni phyir ma log /nor gyis 'gro ba khengs byas shing / /bdag gis yang yang brjod gyur kyang / /kye ma ma la chom rkun ni/ /gdug pa
<p>58a.3</p>kAHpa ri pU ri tAH/ /u tsi tot+sA ha hI na s+ya bya ha tot+ta ra bA di naH/ /bi kat+thA na pra ti dz+nya s+ya d+hid+me dzan+ma ku dzan+ma naH/ /i ti tsin+ta ya tap+ta s+ya tap+ta s+yA nu sha yAg+ni nA/ /phi dza ne pra ya yau rA triHsam+bat+sa ra
<p>58a.4</p>'di dag yongs ma khengs/ /rigs pa'i spro ba zhan gyur cing / /lan smra kun tu bcom pa dang / /smad par 'os pa'i dam bca' bzhin/ /ngan pa skyes pa bdag skye smad/ /de ltar sems shing 'gyod pa yi/ /me yis rab tu gdungs pa de/ /skye bo med par mtshan mo ni/ /lo brgya lta bur
<p>58a.5</p>sha to pa maH/ /taM sho ka paM ka saM dud+d+haM ga dzen+d+ra mi ba ni sh+tsa laM/ /dir+g+hots+tsh+wa saM ma he shA khyA swa p+ne pro bA tsa de ba tA/ /su ma te ma kr-i thAHsho kaM sha rI rots+tsha Sha NaM br-i thA/ /sat+saM kalpA b+hi rU D+ha s+ya b+ha bi Sh+ya ti ta bep+si
<p>58a.6</p>rab tu gyur/ /mya ngan 'dam du bying ba yi/ /glang po'i dbang po bzhin mi g.yo/ /dbugs ring de la rmi lam du/ /lha ni mthu chen ldan pas smras/ /blo bzang mya ngan ma byed cig/ /don med lus ni rab skem yin/ /rnam brtags dam par mngon 'dzegs pa/ /khyed kyi 'dod pa 'byung bar
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>taM/ /na ta dasti dza ga t+yasmin swap+na saM kalpa durla b+haM/ /yan+na si d+h+ya t+ya yat+ne na d+hI rA NAM bya ba sA yi nAM/ /sA kA pya nu pa yA shak+ti re ka s+yA pi dwi dzan+ma naH/ /ya dA dz+nyA s+yan+di te nai ba bin+d+h+ya k+Sh+mA sa ma
<p>58b.2</p>'gyur/ /blo ldan brtson 'grus can rnams kyis/ /'bad pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ba/ /rmi lam rnam rtog rnyed dka' dang / /'jig rten 'di na de yod min/ /gang yang nus pa de dpe med/ /gang zhig gnyis skyes gcig gi yang / /gsung gi kyal ka kho na yis/ /'bigs byed sa dang
<p>58b.3</p>tA ya yau/ /bi Sha maM sa ma tAM yA ti dU ra mA yA ti tsAn+ti kaM /sa li laM s+tha la tA me ti kAR+Ya kA la ma hAt+ma naM/ /ba rAr+thi yaM ta bA raM b+haHpha la t+ye ba na shaM sa ya/ /na b+ha ban+ti bi sa bA daM saM dig+d+hAHsa twa br-it+ta yaH/ /rat+nA
<p>58b.4</p>mtshungs par gyur/ /bdag nyid chen po'i bya ba'i dus/ /mi mnyam pa yang mnyam par 'gyur/ /ring ba rnams kyang nye bar 'ong / /chu yang skam sa nyid du gyur/ /gzhan don khyod kyis brtson pa 'di/ /'bras bu nyid du the tshom med/ /snying stobs spyod pa slu ba yis/ /the tshom la yang mi 'byung ngo / /lha
<p>58b.5</p>ni ba da ra dwi pe paM ti dri da sha se bi te/ /ye ShA me ka pra b+hA bo pi tr-i dza gta pU ra Na k+ShA maH/ /mar+t+ya b+hU mi ma ti pra mya sA hi b+hU mi ma hI ya sI/ /A sA d+ya te pu N+ya ma yI nA sa twairnA kr-i tAt+ma b+hiH/ /bi ShA das+t+ya
<p>58b.6</p>rnams kyis bsten ba da ra'i/ /gling na rin po che dag yod/ /gang zhig gcig gi mthu yis kyang / /'jig rten gsum po khengs par mdzod/ /gang phyir mi yi sa 'das nas/ /de ni shin tu che ba'i sa/ /bsod nams rang bzhin gyis 'thob ste/ /snying stobs legs byas min pas min/ /bu dag yid ni
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>dz+ya tAM pu tra s+thi rA bud+d+hirbi d+hA ya tAM/ /ba da ra dwi pa yA trA yA mud+sA haHpa ri gr-i h+ya tAM/ /shru ya tA me ShA tata prA p+t+yai did+mA trA nu kra maHkra maH/ /s+phI taHsa twa pra b+hA bste saM sA rot+ta ra Na k+Sha ma/ /a sti pash+tsi ma
<p>59a.2</p>gdung ba thong / /brtan pa'i blo gros rnam par bsgrubs/ /ba da ra yi gling 'gro la/ /rab tu spro ba yongs su zungs/ /khyod ni snying stobs mthu rgyas shing / /'khor ba rab tu sgrol bar bzod/ /de thob bya phyir phyogs dang ni/ /lam gyi rim pa 'di dag nyon/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi cha na
<p>59a.3</p>dig+b+hA ge sa mul+laM g+h+ya ma hA ya sAM/ /sha tA ni sap+ta dwI pA nAM ta thA sap+ta ma hA tsa lAn/ /sap+tA sa gAsh+tsA nu lo ma pra ti lo ma b+hi d+hom+bu d+hiH/ /a nu kU lA ni laiR+Yasmin pA ra mAsno ti pu N+ya bAn/ /ta tastat+tu l+ya nA mA drirbA taisti
<p>59a.4</p>yod/ /shin tu che ba'i gling dag ni/ /bdun brgya rab tu 'das gyur cing / /de bzhin du ni ri chen bdun/ /chu klung bdun dang rjes 'gro dang / /bzlog 'gro zhes pa'i chu yi gter/ /rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis der/ /pha rol 'thob bo bsod nams can/ /de nas de mtshungs ming can ri/ /rlung
<p>59a.5</p>mi ra mo ha kr-i ta/ /ya tA k+Sh+Nordi sha ti swAs+th+ya ma mo g+hA khyA ma hau Sha d+hiH/ /a thA bar+t+ya b+hi d+hoM b+ho d+hi bai ram+b+heR+Ya tra ba yu b+hi/ /madz+dza non+ma dz+dza ne rdza n+tuHsap+ta brte Shu tAR+Ya te/ /a brtA khyasta taHshai
<p>59a.6</p>gis rab rib rmongs par byed/ /sman chen don yod ces pa yis/ /mig gnyis gang du rnal gnas ster/ /de nas kun 'khor zhes chu gter/ /gang du rlung ni be rA ma b+has/ /'bying zhing 'byung bas srog chags rnams/ /kun 'khor bdun las sgrol bar byed/ /de nas kun 'khor zhes pa'i ri/ /
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>laHshaM kha nA b+ho ni bA tsa raH/ /g+ho raHprA Na ha ro ya tra tri de sha trA sa kr-ita s+thi taH/ /kr-iSh+Na sar+p+yA br-i tA ta tra shaM kha nA b+hI ma ho Sha d+hiH/ /trA ya te pu N+ya sam+pan+naM ne tre shi ra si tsa rbi taM/ /a tha ni lo da nA mA drI rak+ta k+Sho
<p>59b.2</p>gang na mtshan rgyu dung gi lte/ /'jigs su rung zhing srog 'phrog pa/ /skabs gsum pa yang skrag byed gnas/ /da na sman chen dung gi lte/ /sbrul ni nag pos dkris gyur pa/ /mig dang mgo la bzhag pa na/ /bsod nams ldan pa yongs su skyob/ /de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i mtsho/ /gang na
<p>59b.3</p>ya tra rAk+Sha saH/ /ma kaR+YAd+hi b+hU tAM bud+d+ha bi d+yA bi dwAn ba she /a tha nI lo dA nA mA dri nI la grI baHk+Sha pA tsa raH/ /pra dIp+ta ne tro ya trAste rak+Sha sAM pany+tsa b+hiHsha taiH/ /ta trau Sha d+hi ma mo g+hA khyAM rak+Sha t+yA shi bi ShAHsa
<p>59b.4</p>srin po mig dmar yod/ /ma gir zhes bya'i sman 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas rig byed rig pa'i dbang / /de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i ri/ /gang na mgrin pa sngon po ni/ /mtshan rgyu mig ni rab 'bar ba/ /srin po lnga brgya dag dang gnas/ /de na don yod ces pa'i sman/ /mthong dang dbugs dang reg pa
<p>59b.5</p>dA/ /dr-iSh+Ti niHshwA sa saM spaR+sha daMSh+Tot+s+r-i pa bi ShA na laH/ /u pa Sha d+ha bra ta ba tA mai tre Na ka ru NAt+ma na/ /la b+h+yA te sA sa mut+sAR+ya kr-iSh+Na sar+p+pa ma hau Sha d+hiH/ /taM rak+ShaHsha ka TaM shi laM ni s+pha la sh+la k+Sh+Na kan+da raM/ /tA many+dza
<p>59b.6</p>dang / /mche ba rab spros dug gi me/ /rtag tu sbrul gyi dug rnams srung / /gso sbyong brtul zhugs ldan pa dang / /byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /sprul ni nag po rab bskrad nas/ /sman chen de ni thob par 'gyur/ /de yis mig sman zur phud ni/ /byas nas srin po'i shing rta ri/ /'bras med bug
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>ne shi khA yaM tsa kr-i twa ta ra ti pu N+ya bAn/ /a tha be ram+b+ha nA mA driHsa re yA s+yot+ta ra ta taH/ /g+ho rA tA mrA Ta bi nA ma ma hA shA la ba nAM ta rAH/ /ma hA na dza garasta tra tA mrAk+Sho nA ma duHsa haH/ /a ste
<p>60a.2</p>ba phra mo can/ /bsod nams ldan pas sgrol bar 'gyur/ /de nas be ram b+ha zhes ri/ /de rjes gang gis pha rol gzhan/ /'jigs rung zangs kyi nags zhes pa/ /sA la chen po'i nags kyi nang / /de na sprul ni sbram chen dag /zangs mig ces pa bzod dka' ba/ /drag po'i
<p>60a.3</p>ya s+yo gra gan+d+he na bA yu nai ba nA dzI bya te/ /ShaN+mA sAn swa pa to ya s+ya lA lA byAsno ti yo dza naM/ /k+Shuta saM tap+tas+ya Shan+mA sA nalpI b+ha pa ti dzA gra taH/ /be Nu gul+me shi lA bad+d+hA gu hA mut+pA T+ya mo de niM/ /prA pyo Sha d+hIn di bA rA
<p>60a.4</p>dri ldan gang gi rlung / /nyid kyis 'tshe bar mi byed gnas/ /zla ba drug tu nyal gyur pa'i/ /kha chu yis ni dpag tshad khyab/ /ltogs pas gdungs nas zla drug ni/ /gnyis dang bral bas chung bar gyur/ /'od ma'i rtsa ba rdos bsdams phug /rab tu phye bas dri dang ldan/ /nyin dang mtshan du rab 'bar ba/ /
<p>60a.5</p>traM dz+wa lan+tI maM dza no tsi tAM/ /tasmA da dza ga rA ta g+ho rA n+ya to bA ma ho dza saH/ /a bai rA khyAM bud+d+ha bi d+yaM dza pa to na b+ha ber+b+ha ya/ /ta taHsap+ta ma hA shai lA be Nu kaN+Da ka saM ka TaH/ /tA mra paT+TAM ka pA de na
<p>60a.6</p>mig sman du 'os sman thob 'gyur/ /sdang med ces pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /rig pa bzlas pas sbram chen ni/ /'jigs rung de dang gzi brjid che/ /gzhan gyis kyang ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /de nas ri ni che ba bdun/ /'od ma'i tsher mas gtams gyur pa/ /zangs glegs kyis mtshan rkang pa yis/ /
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>tI r+Ya n+he bI shAli nA/ /ta tash+tsa shal+ma li ba naM sap+ta k+ShA raM ta raM gi nIH/ /ut+tIR+YA sA d+yan+te prAM gu sti shaM kurnA ma sarba taH/ /ta tra tri shaM ka bo nA ma kaN+Da ka badzra b+he di naH/ /pA da yorna bi shaM t+ye ba tA mra
<p>60b.2</p>brtson 'grus ldan bas thar par 'gyur/ /de rjes shal ma li nags dang / /'gyur byed chu klung rnam bdun dag /brgal nas rtse gsum zhes pa'i ri/ /rab tu mtho ba dag tu slebs/ /de na rtse gsum zhes pa yi/ /tsher ma rdo rje 'bigs byed yod/ /zangs kyi glegs bu nges sbyar ba'i/ /
<p>60b.3</p>paT+TA banad+d+ha yoH/ /tri shaM kurnA ma ta Ti nI ta trA yAHshaM ku parba taH/ /na dI ta du pasbI lasta to dwi swA dri d+hA sa ri ta/ /a thASh+TA da sha ba krA khyaHpar+pa to ni ra ba gra haH/ /tat+tu l+ya saM dz+nyA than dA+e sh+lak+Sh+No nA ma gi rista taH/ /a
<p>60b.4</p>pa dag la mi 'dzug go/ /chu klung rtse gsum zhes pa dang / /de na lcags kyi rtse yi ri/ /chu klung ngos dang lcags phur gyis/ /ri bo de nas de lta'i klung / /de nas bco brgyad 'khyog ces pa'i/ /ri bo bgrod par dka' ba dang / /de nas de dang ming mtshungs klung / /de rjes phra mo zhes pa'i ri/ /de nas du
<p>60b.5</p>dr-ir+d+hU ma ne drA khyo d+hU ma ni rdag+d+ha dik+ta TaH/ /dr-iSh+Ti spaR+sha pi Shai r+b+yAp+taHkrU rA shi bi sha maN+Da leH/ /tad+mUr+d+h+ni pA lwa la s+yAn+taHshi lA bad+d+hA ma hA gu hA/ /dz+yo tI ra so ma s+yaM dzI ba nI tsa ma ho Sha d+hiH/ /b+hi twA gu hAM ta da
<p>60b.6</p>ba'i mig ces ri/ /phyogs ngos du bas tshig gyur pa/ /ma rung sbrul gdug dkyil 'khor gyi/ /mthong ba reg pa'i dug gis khyab/ /de yi rtse na rdzing bu'i mtha'/ /rdo bas bcings pa'i phug chen po/ /phug nang nor bu 'od khung dang / /sman chen 'tsho byed ces pa yod/ /de phye de yis mgo
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>b+h+yak+ta shi raHsA da ka ro da roH/ /bra dzan man+ta ba lo pe toHkrU raHsar+pe na bA d+h+ya te/ /a tho gra sa twa saM kAr+NIHsap+tA shI bi Sha sarba tAH/ /na d+yash+tsatad+bi d+hA yA sA ma pA rA bA ri sam+pa daH/ /
<p>61a.2</p>dang ni/ /rkang lag lto la mngon par byugs/ /gsang sngags stobs dang bcas bgrod na/ /ma rung sbrul gyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /de nas sbrul gdug ri bong bdun/ /sems can drag pos kun tu khengs/ /de lta'i chu klung dag kyang ste/ /chu yi phun tshogs pha mtha' med/ /
<p>61a.3</p>e ta dut+tIR+Ya ni khi laM pu N+yaiHpa ra hi tod+Ya taH/ /a ro ha ti su d+hA shai la shriM gai rA liM gi tAm+ba raM/ /ta tasta s+yA pa re par+sh+rekalpa brik+Sho pa sho b+hi taM/ /pu raM ro hi ta kaM nA ma dr-i sh+ya te swarga san+ni b+haM/ /astaM
<p>61a.4</p>de dag ma lus rab brgal te/ /gzhan phan brtson pa bsod nams kyis/ /rtse mo mkha' la reg gyur pa/ /dkar ba'i ri la 'jog par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi ngos gzhan la/ /ro hi ta ki zhes grong khyer/ /dpag bsam shing gis nye bar mdzes/ /mtho ris dang mtshungs mthong bar 'gyur/ /de na
<p>61a.5</p>ta tra ma g+ho nA ma ma g+ha pA ni ba bi shru taH/ /sar+tha bA ho ma hA sa twoHsarba sa twa hi ta re taH/ /ba da ra dwI pa yA trA yA mud+Ya ta s+ya nA ba d+ya d+hIH/ /mArgo pa de shaM de sha dz+nyaHsa te sarba ka ri sh+ya ti/ /it+Yu k+to t+sA
<p>61a.6</p>ded dpon snying stobs ni/ /chen po ma g+ha zhes pa yod/ /sems can kun la phan par dgyes/ /brgya byin bzhin du rnam par grags/ /shes bzang blo gros skyon med des/ /ba da ra yi gling dag tu/ /'gro bar brtson pa khyod kyis ni/ /lam gyi gdams ngag kun byed 'gyur/ /'di brjod bdud
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>h+ya ba hu shaHsu b+hA drai ri ba su pri yaM/ /ba tso ti tu tsi tai rde bI sa hA sAn+ta ra d+hI ya ta/ /pra bud+d+haHsu pri yAHsarbaM tat+tA the ti bi tsin+ta yan/ /pra tas+thi sa twa mA rU h+ya ni dzot+sA ha pu raHsa raH/ /sa bra dzan
<p>61b.2</p>rtsi'i rlan gyis bzhin/ /'os pa'i tshig gis shin tu dga'/ /mang du spro ba bskyed byas nas/ /lha mo 'phral la mi snang gyur/ /shin tu dga' ni rab sad nas/ /thams cad de de bzhin zhes bsams/ /rang gi spro ba sngon btang nas/ /snying stobs la ni zhon te chas/ /de yis bstan pa'i
<p>61b.3</p>bi dzi tA yA saste na nirdeSh+Ta bar+t+ma nA/ /pUr+Nair+d+wa da sha b+hirbaR+ShaiHprA sa ro hi ta kaM pu raM/ /a drAn+ta re karma yo gAt+ta tra sAr+tha pa tirma g+haH/ /byA d+hi nA dush+tsi kit+se na ba b+hU bA swas+tha bi gra haH/ /a lab+d+hAn+taHpra be shor+tha
<p>61b.4</p>lam las ni/ /ngal ba rnam bcom des bgrod pas/ /lo ni bcu gnyis rdzogs pa na/ /ro hi ta ka'i grong khyer sleb/ /skabs 'dir der ni don mthun bdag /ma g+ha las kyi sbyor ba las/ /gso ba dka' ba'i nad kyis ni/ /lus ni rnal du mi gnas gyur/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab lta'i
<p>61b.5</p>gr-i he rA dza gr-i ho pa me/ /ta s+ya bya lam+pa ta dwA ri su pri yaHkAR+Ya sid+d+ha ye/ /ta to bo d+yo pa de she na sa pra be sha ma bAp+ta bA na/ /u pa yog ka thA pra dz+nyA naka s+yA da ra b+hU ma yaH/ /A urbe da bi d+hA na dz+nyAHsa ta s+yA
<p>61b.6</p>khyem/ /nang du 'jug pa ma thob nas/ /de yi sgo na shin tu dga'/ /bya ba bsgrub slad 'dug par gyur/ /de nas sman pa'i zol gyis ni/ /de ni nang du 'jug pa thob/ /nye bar rigs pa'i gtam shes pa/ /su yi gus pa'i sa ma yin/ /tshe yi rig byed sgrub shes shing / /'chi ba'i
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>riSh+Da lak+Sha NaiH/ /ShaN+mA pa she Sha me bA yur+dz+nya twA tsin+tAn+ta ro b+ha bAta/ /ta s+ya pri ya hi ta prA po b+hai Sha dz+ya pa ri tsaR+YA ya/ /a t+yalpe nai ba kA le na su pri yaHpri ya tAM ya yau/ /b+hai Sha dz+ya yuk+tistad prI
<p>62a.2</p>mtshan nyid shes pa des/ /zla drug mjug nyid de yi tshor/ /shes nas bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /dga' zhing phan pa'i sman mang dang / /de yi rim gro legs byas pa/ /dus ni shin tu thung ba yis/ /shin tu dga' dang mdza' bor gyur/ /de la mdza' bas sman sbyar rnams/ /
<p>62a.3</p>t+yA ta s+ya bal+lab+ha tAM ya yau/ /pri yau pa nI taM yata kiny+tsita tat+sarbam+ma na saHpri yaM/ /pri yo pa tsA raista s+yAHbyA d+hirmAr+d+rA ba mA ya yau/ /A d+hIHshA l+ya ti sat+saM gAn+ta to byA d+hirbi shIR+Ya te/ /ta taHsaM dzA ta bi shraM b+haM su pri ya pra Na yAn+ma
<p>62a.4</p>de yis 'dod pa bya bar gyur/ /mdza' bos cung zad byin pa gang / /de dag kun la yid dga' 'o/ /de nas bde ba'i rim gros de'i/ /nad ni chung ba nyid du gyur/ /dam pa'i grogs las sdug bsngal zhi/ /de las nad dang bral bar gyur/ /de nas ma g+ha mdza' ba las/ /yid phebs skyes la shin tu
<p>62a.5</p>g+haM/ /tsakre bi di ta br-it+tAn+taM pash+tsan+ni dza ka thA k+Sha Ne/ /ba da ra dwI pa yA trA yAM ta s+yot+sA haM ma hAt+ma naH/ /pa rAr+the nish+tsa laM dz+nyA twA ta mU tse bisma yAn+ma g+haH/ /a ho ba tA smi na saM sA re niHsA re sA ra rU pi NaH/ /dzA yan+te
<p>62a.6</p>dga'/ /slad nas rang gi gtam gyi tshe/ /spyod tshul mtha' ni rig par byas/ /ba da ra yi gling bgrod la/ /bdag nyid che de'i spro ba dag /gzhan don g.yo med shes gyur nas/ /ma g+has ya mtshan de la smras/ /kye ma snying po med pa yi/ /'khor ba 'di na snying po'i gzugs/ /gzhan
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>ma Na yaHkash+tsita pa ra tsin+tA pa ra yA NaH/ /na ba ba yaHpi ya mUrtiHpa rAr+tha pra ba NaM ma na/ /pu N+yo tsi ta s+tha tse ba yaM s+thA ne gu Na sa mA ga maH/ /i ya tAM b+hU mi mul+la g+h+ya pa rAr+the
<p>62b.2</p>gyi bsam pa'i dpung gnyen ni/ /nor bu 'ga' zhig yod pa yin/ /na tshod gzhon zhing mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /gzhan gyi don la gcags pa'i yid/ /yon tan phun tshogs bsod nams ldan/ /gnas 'di khyod nyid kho na'i yin/ /'di snyed sa 'di rab 'das nas/ /khyod ni
<p>62b.3</p>twa mu pA ga taH/ /ka ro mi ta ba sA hA y+Ya kiM twa haM b+h+r-i sha mA tu raH/ /ni bad+d+hA ba d+ha yaHprA NAHprA yA l+ya ba sha rI ri NAM/ /te pra dzaM tu ma mAn+ti pi twat+sa mA hi ta he tu tAM/ /e pa me ba bya yo yastu bya yaHsa
<p>62b.4</p>gzhan gyi don du 'ongs/ /khyod kyi stong grogs bgyid pa la/ /'on kyang bdag ni mchog tu gzir/ /mtshams ni nges pa lus can gyi/ /srog ni nges par 'gro ba nyid/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa'i rgyu nyid du/ /bdag gi de mthar gyur kyang sla'i/ /da lta nyid du zad pa gang / /de ni zad par
<p>62b.5</p>pa ri ga Ne te/ /pa rAr+the dzI bi ta s+yA pi bya yo la b+ha sha teHsa maH/ /na ma yA ba da ra dwI paM r+d+r-iSh+T-i kiM tu shru tam+ma yA/ /mahA b+d+hau di ka sa mud+de shaM taisterdza nA mi lak+Sha NaiH/ /i t+yuk+t+rA b+hU pa tiM su hr-id+ban+tu bAkyo pya
<p>62b.6</p>yongs su bgrang / /gzhan gyi don du srog dag kyang / /zad pa rnyed pa brgya dang mnyam/ /bdag gi ba da ra yi gling / /ma mthong 'on kyang bdag gis thos/ /chu gter chen po phyogs lhung ston/ /de dang de yi mtshan ma shes/ /de skad brjod nas sa bdag gis/ /grogs bzang mnyen
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>nA da raH/ /sa maM ga la pra ba ha NaM su pri ye Na sa ha da de/ /ta taHprA ba ha nA rU D+ho tau yo dza na sha tA n+ya pi/ /pa ba na s+yA nu lo mye na dzak+ma turbi pu la sha yau/ /s+thA
<p>63a.2</p>pa'i tshig kyang dor/ /de yis bkra shis gru gzings ni/ /shin tu dga' dang lhan cig bzung / /de nas bsam pa yangs pa ni/ /de dag gzings la zhon gyur te/ /rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis/ /dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar byed/ /gnas dang
<p>63a.3</p>ne s+thA ne dza laM dr-iSh+T+wA nA nA bar+NaM ma ho da d+heH/ /ki me ta di ti pa prats+tsha su pri yaHkau tu kAn+ma g+haM/ /dza le lo hA tsa lA pany+tsa saM d+ya s+ya pa ya sAM ni d+heH/ /trA mra rU pa ma yAsh+tsA n+ye he ma rat+na ma yA pa re/ /te ShAM ts+tsha yA bi
<p>63a.4</p>gnas su chu gter che'i/ /chu ni kha dog sna tshogs mthong / /'di dag ci zhes ltad mo'i slad/ /shin tu dgas dris ma g+ha la'o/ /rgya mtsho 'di yi chu la ni/ /lcags kyi ri bo lnga dag yod/ /gzhan yang zangs dang dngul rang bzhin/ /gzhan ni rin chen gser rang bzhin/ /de rnams grib ma'i bye
<p>63a.5</p>she She Na nA nA bar+N+Na pa de pa de/ /dr-i sh+ya teb+d+hi raM yaM dIp+taHprAp+tAM tad+ga to Sha d+hiH/ /i t+yuk+t+wa byA d+hi nA krAn+taHprAp+ta kA lA ba d+hirma g+haH/ /prA NAM mu mo tsa sat+kIr+t+ti bi n+yasta s+thi ra dzI bi taH/ /
<p>63a.6</p>brag gis/ /kha dog sna tshogs gnas dang gnas/ /khongs gnas rab 'bar sman dag gis/ /chu gter 'di ni 'bar bar mthong / /'di brjod ma g+ha dus kyi mtshams/ /thob cing nad kyis thebs par gyur/ /srog btang dam pa'i grags pa dag /brtan pa'i 'tsho ba rnam par btsugs/ /
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>badzra le pA da pi dr-i D+haM ya thA sa twaM ma hAh+ma nAM/ /ta thA ya di ta bre drA yuHki ma sA d+h+yaM b+ha be b+ha beta/ /kU lA bAt+ta pra ba ha NaHsu bri yastad+bi yo ga dzaM/ /shu tsaM saM sta b+h+ya bi da d+he su hr-i dasta nu sat+k+ri yAM/ /
<p>63b.2</p>ji ltar bdag nyid che snying stobs/ /rdo rje byugs pa bas kyang brtan/ /de ltar gal te 'tshe gyur na/ /srid na bsgrub byar cis mi 'gyur/ /gzings ni ngogs phyin shin tu dgas/ /de dang bral ba las skyes pa'i/ /mya ngan bsal nas grogs po yis/ /lus ni legs par bya ba bsgrubs/ /
<p>63b.3</p>e ta be bon+na taM lak+Sh+ma sa twot+sA he ma hAt+ma nAM/ /bi ts+tshin+na tsa lam+ba na kA le yat+kar+t+ta bya dr-i D+haM ma naH/ /pu naHpra ba ha NA rU D+haHsa mut+tI R+YabA ri d+hiM/ /rat+na parba ta pAr+sh+we na bi be sha bi ka TA Ta pIM/ /na bi
<p>63b.4</p>rten ni rnam par chad pa'i tshe/ /gang zhig bya la brtan pa'i yid/ /'di nyid bdag nyid che rnams kyis/ /snying stobs spro bas mtho ba'i rtags/ /yang ni gzings la zhon byas te/ /chu bo'i gter ni yang dag bsgral/ /rin chen ri bo'i ngos nas ni/ /nags tshal stug po'i nang du zhugs/ /bdag
<p>63b.5</p>yo gairna tsod+bai gairnA b+hi yo gair+d+wi ShA ma pi/ /na ro geHkle sha b+hau gairbA hI ya te ma hA tAm+ma ti/ /sa ta trA kran+ta ga ga naM ni rud+d+hA she Sha dik+ta TaM/ /du rA ro haM da daR+shA gre mUr+t+ta m+big+h+na mi ba
<p>63b.6</p>nyid chen po'i blo gros ni/ /sman pa 'bral bas ma yin zhing / /gdung dang dgra rnams mngon sbyor dang / /nad dang nyon mongs spyod pas min/ /der ni nam mkhar son pa'i ri/ /phyogs ngos ma lus bkag gyur pas/ /mdun du bgegs ni gzugs can bzhin/ /bgrod par dka' ba de
<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>tsa liM/ /u pA ya hI naM taM dr-iSh+T+wA gi riM mUr+kha mi bod+d+ha taM/ /a d+haHpal+la ba sha y+YA yAM sup+ta so tsiM ta yat+k+Sha NaM/ /a ho ba ta ki yAn kA laHpra ya taHpras+thi ta s+ya me/ /ba da ra dwI pa nA
<p>64a.2</p>yis mthong / /rmongs pa bzhin du sbyor ba'i ri/ /de mthong thabs ni dman gyur cing / /zhabs su yal 'dab mal stan la/ /nyal nas de yi skad cig bsams/ /kye ma bdag ni zhugs gyur nas/ /ji snyed dus ni rab tu 'das/ /gang du'ang ba da ra yi
<p>64a.3</p>mA pi na nA ma shru ya te kwa tsita/ /bya ba sA ya sa hA yo me yo b+hUta pu N+ya pa N+yaiHpa raM/ /b+hag+naHsla ba i bA kA le so pi karmo rmi bi sla baiH/ /nauSh+Ta sa ye p+Yu sa yesmin bya ba sA yAn ma hi ya saH/ /na nA ma bi ni
<p>64a.4</p>gling / /ming yang nges par ma thos so/ /bsod nams zong gis bdag gi ni/ /brtson pa'i grogs mchog gyur pa gang / /de yang las kyi rba rlabs kyis/ /dus min gdos pa chag pa bzhin/ /thabs nyams thabs ni 'di la yang / /shin tu che ba'i 'bad rtsol gyis/ /bdag ni nges par rnam
<p>64a.5</p>bar+t+te haM sid+d+hirni d+hA na mastu bA/ /ta de kaM dzan+ma yA trA su sU dz+yaM dzan+ma dza gat+t+ra ye/ /yasmin pa ro pa kA rA ya dzA ya te dzI bi ta bya yaH/ /i ti tsin+tA ku laM ta tra taM dz+nyA twa sa twa sA ga raM/ /nI lo nA ma ga ma b+h+ye
<p>64a.6</p>mi ldog /grub pa'am yang na shi bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba gsum po 'dir skyes pa/ /gzhan la phan phyir srog dag ni/ /zad par gyur pa de gcig pu/ /skye 'gro rnams su mchod par 'os/ /der ni de ltar bsam 'khrugs te/ /snying stobs rgya mtshor shes gyur nas/ /ri la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin
<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>t+ya yak+Sha prA hA tsa lA shra yaH/ /pUrbe Na yo dza naM ga twA trI Ni shr-iM gA ni b+hU b+h+r-i taH/ /be tra so pA na ni shre N+yA shwa mA tu n+yA tha ga mya tAM/ /i ti ya k+Sho pa de she na sa bi laM g+h+ya ma hA tsa laM/ /da daR+sha gre sa yut+tuM ga shr-iM
<p>64b.2</p>ni/ /sngon po zhes pa 'ongs nas smras/ /shar du dpag tshad phyin gyur nas/ /sa 'dzin rtse mo gsum pa ni/ /sa las byas pa'i them skas la/ /'dzegs la de nas 'gro bar gyis/ /de skad gnod sbyin gdams ngag gis/ /ri chen de yi rnam brgal bas/ /rtse mo shin tu mtho ba yi/ /shel gyi
<p>64b.3</p>gaM s+pha Ti ka b+hU d+ha raM/ /tasmin+ne ka shi la sh+lak+Sh+Ne durga me pak+Shi NA ma pi/ /mU hUr+t+ta ma b+ha bat+ta s+ya nir+b+yA pa ro ma no ra thaH/ /a b+h+Yun+na taM shi rA yam+baM swa saM kalpa yi bA tsa laM/ /sa taM bi tsAR+ya su tsi raM tsi tra n+yasta i ba b+ha bta/ /a
<p>64b.4</p>sa 'dzin mdun du mthong / /bya rnams kyis kyang bgrod dka' ba/ /'jam pa'i brag ni gcig pu der/ /de yi yid la re ba ni/ /yud tsam bya ba med par gyur/ /shin tu mtho zhing rten dang bral/ /rang gi rtog bzhin g.yo med par/ /de la rnam dpyad yun ring de/ /ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur/ /de
<p>64b.5</p>tha tsan+d+ra pra b+ho nA ma yak+ShaHshai la gu hA shra yaH/ /a b+h+ye t+ya satwa sam+pan+naM ta ma b+hA Sha ta bi smi taH/ /kro sha mA tra mi twa ga twA pUrbe NA pUrba bi b+h+ra maM/ /dr-i sh+ya te tsan+dan ba naM bA lA ni la tsa la l+la
<p>64b.6</p>nas zla 'od ces pa yi/ /gnod sbyin brag gi phug gnas pa/ /snying stobs phun tshogs de la ni/ /mngon phyogs ya mtshan ldan pas smras/ /'di nas shar du rgyang grags tsam/ /song bas tsan+dan nags tshal ni/ /rlung bzhon gyis bskyod 'khri shing ldan/ /sngon med rnam 'phrul mthong bar
<p>65a</p>
<p>65a.1</p>taM/ /ta tra phra sa rA nA ma gu hA lI nA ma hau Sha d+hiH/ /la b+h+ya te de ha rak+ShA yai sa mut+to l+ya ma hA shi la/ /tata pra b+ha ba kr-i ta lo kaM so pA naiHs+pha Ti kA tsa laM/ /sa ha sai ba sa mA ru h+ya ga mya tA
<p>65a.2</p>'gyur/ /de ni rab gsal byed ces pa/ /phug na gtams pa'i sman chen po/ /lus can bsrung phyir ri chen la/ /rab tu btus pas thob par 'gyur/ /de yi 'od kyis snang byas pa'i/ /skas kyis shel gyi ri la ni/ /'phral nyid du ni yang dag 'dzegs/ /'dod pa thob
<p>65a.3</p>mIp+si tAp+ta ye/ /k+Sha NAta kr-ita kAR+Ye bA sA pra yA ti ma hau Sha d+hiH/ /na khe dastata kr-I te kAR+Yasta Dil+lo lAHpri yAp+ta yaH/ /i ti yak+Sho pa deSh+Te na bi d+hA ne na sa b+hU d+ha raM/ /sa muta kra mya da daR+shA gre na ga ra he ma man+di
<p>65a.4</p>phyir 'gro ba byos/ /sman chen de ni don byas bzhin/ /skad cig gis ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa thob pa glog ltar g.yo/ /de phyir mya ngan bya ba min/ /de ltar sgrub byed gnod sbyin gyis/ /bstan pas de yis sa 'dzin dag /yang dag 'dzegs pas mdun du ni/ /gser gyi khang ldan grong
<p>65a.5</p>raM/ /me rU kU Dai ri bA kIr+NaM pra ka shai ri ba nirmi ta/ /sarbA sh+tsat+Yai ri ba kr-i taM tad+b+r-iSh+T+wA bismi to b+ha bta/ /ma hA he ma ka pA TA b+h+yAM tud+d+ha dwA raM bi lo kya tata/ /nirdza naM bA ra saM dzA raM ba nAn+te ni
<p>65a.6</p>khyer mthong / /lhun po brtsegs pas rgyas pa bzhin/ /rab gsal rnams kyi sprul pa bzhin/ /ngo mtshar kun gyis byas pa bzhin/ /de mthong ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ /grong khyer lam gyi mi med cing / /gser gyi sgo glegs chen po yis/ /de yi sgo ni bcad mthong nas/ /de ni nags kyi
<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>Sha sA da saH/ /a trAn+ta re di na s+yAn+te byo mA nan+ta pa thA d+h+wa gaH/ /a bA pAs+thA tsa lo pAn+taM pa ri shrAn+ta i bAM shu mAn/ /astaM ga te sa ha srAM sho ra dza nI ra ma Ni sha naiH/ /tA rA pa ti mi bA nreSh+TuM pra sa sar+b+ya b+hi
<p>65b.2</p>mtha' na gnas/ /skabs 'dir nyin mo'i mthar gyur te/ /mtha' med mkha' yi lam bgrod pas/ /tsha zer can ni yongs dal bzhin/ /nub kyi ri dang nye bar sleb/ /'od stong nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ /mngon par 'gro ba mun can ma/ /rgyu skar bdag po 'dod gyur nas/ /dal bus rab tu 'gro
<p>65b.3</p>sA ri kA/ /a tha pra kA sha bi b+ha baiHsar+b+ba shA pU ra Non+mu khaH/ /bo d+hi satwa i ba swats+tshaHsu d+hA dI d+hi ti tud+Ya yau/ /s+phI tA ta maHsa mU ha s+ya niHshe Sha pra pa mo tsi ta/ /mA na sol+lA si nI dz+yot+s+nA sa twa br-it+ti
<p>65b.4</p>ba bzhin/ /de nas rab gsal 'byor pa yis/ /phyogs kun yongs rdzogs gyen du phyogs/ /dri med byang chub sems dpa' bzhin/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od de shar bar gyur/ /mun pa'i tshogs ni ma lus pa/ /rab tu zhi bar nus shing rgyas/ /yid ni dngas byed zla ba'i 'od/ /snying stobs spyod
<p>65b.5</p>ri bA ba b+hau/ /ta mo mo haM dza ha ren+durdi shAM di na bi yo ga dzaM/ /pa ro pa kA ro hi du rA ro ho ma hAt+ma nAM/ /su pri ya sh+tsan+d+ra ki ra NaiHdUR+Ya Na ta nuHk+Sha NaM/ /ni drAM kAR+ya sa mU
<p>65b.6</p>tshul bzhin du mdzes/ /nyin bral las skyes phyogs rnams kyis/ /mun pa'i rmongs pa zla bas phrogs/ /gang phyir ring na bzhugs pa yi/ /bdag nyid che rnams gzhan phan mchog /zla ba'i zer gyis shin tu dga'/ /skad cig lus ni khengs gyur nas/ /bya ba'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs dag /
<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>hormi k+Sho b+ha mu drA ma bAp+ta bAn/ /k+Sha mA yAM k+Shi ya mA Na yAM gu Na dIk+Sha N+ya sA dA rA/ /dza ga da de ba tA swa sne ma he shA khyA sa me t+ya taM/ /a ho ba ta ma hA satwa sat+ta twA b+hi ni be shi nA/ /pa rAr+the bi pu la
<p>66a.2</p>'khrug pa'i rgya ni gnyid thob gyur/ /mtshan mo zad par gyur pa'i tshe/ /yon tan yon gyis gus bcas pa/ /mthu chen lnga yi rmi lam du/ /de la mngon par phyogs nas smras/ /e ma kwa ye snying stobs can/ /de nyid dam pa'i mngon zhen pa/ /legs byas khyod kyi ngal
<p>66a.3</p>kle shaHkr-i taHsu kr-i ti nA twa yA/ /alba she She pra yA sesmin nod+be ga kartu mar+ha si/ /a baR+Yu Shi ta satwA nAM sa d+hI nAHsarba sid+d+ha yaH/ /hai maM ya de taM na ga raM trI Ni tsA n+ya taHpa raM/ /san+ti rat+na pu ra
<p>66a.4</p>dub ni/ /gzhan gyi don du rgya chen byas/ /nyon mongs lhag ma chung ngu 'dir/ /yid ni 'byung bar mi 'os so/ /snying stobs dman pa med rnams kyis/ /rang dbang nyid du thams cad grub/ /gser gyi grong khyer gang 'di dang / /gsum ni pha rol gzhan dang gzhan/ /gong nas gong du rnam par
<p>66a.5</p>N+ya tra bi tsi trA N+yut+ta rot+ta raM/ /te b+h+yo niR+YA ti kin+naR+Yash+tsa ta sroSh+Tau tsa Sho Da shaH/ /dwA trIMsh+tsa kra me Nai ba twa yA dwA ri bi g+haT+Ti te/ /dzi ten+d+ri ya s+ya b+ha ba ta stat+p+ra mA da na be di naH/ /ki ma n+ya da tsi re Nai ba bAM ts+tshi
<p>66a.6</p>bkra/ /'di na rin chen grong khyer yod/ /khyod kyis sgo ni brdungs pa na/ /de dag las ni mi 'am ci/ /bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu drug dang / /so gnyis rim pas phyir 'byung 'gyur/ /khyod kyi dbang po thul ba yis/ /de yi bag med rig par bya/ /ring po min par 'dod pa dag /mthong bar
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>tAp+tir+b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /i t+yuk+taHsA da raM de bya pra ti bud+d+ho tha su pri yaH/ /tri dza g+hA na na ga ra dwA ra ma b+h+ye t+ya pA Ni nA/ /ta tash+tsa ta sraHkin+niR+Yo niR+Ya yusta ra lak+She NAH/ /Ash+tsaR+yata ru maM dza d+ya i ba
<p>66b.2</p>gyur te gzhan pa ci/ /lha mos gus bcas 'di brjod la/ /de nas rab sad shin tu dges/ /grong khyer sgo la mngon phyogs te/ /lag pa yis ni lan gsum brdungs/ /de nas mi 'am ci mo bzhi/ /g.yo ba'i mig can 'thon gyur te/ /g.yo ba'i rlung gis bskyod pa yis/ /ngo
<p>66b.3</p>lI lA ni lA ku lAH/ /mA na sol+la sa kA ri N+yo na ya nA ya nA mr-i ta br-iSh+Ta yaH/ /ba da nen+du sa mud+Yo tairda bA pi kr-ita tsan+d+ri kA/ /tAHsaM pU dz+ya sma ro dA raM su pri yaM pri ya daR+sha nAH/ /ta s+yA b+hi la Sha pra Na
<p>66b.4</p>mtshar ljon pa'i snye ma bzhin/ /yid ni rengs par byed gyur cing / /'dren byed dag gi bdud rtsi'i char/ /bzhin ras zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /nyin mor zla 'od ldan par byas/ /dga' bas mthong des shin tu dga'/ /'dod pa rgya cher yang dag mchod/ /de ni mngon par 'dod pa yis/ /
<p>66b.5</p>yai rA ti th+ya mi ba tsakri re/ /tsan+d+ra kAn+tA sa mA sI naM kr-i tA sa na pa ri gra hAH/ /dzI ba no Sha d+ha yo dzA tAHsma ra s+yai ba sa bi gra hAH/ /tAsta mU tsuHsa mun+mI la dwi lA sa ha si ta twi ShaH/ /na d+yan+t+ya i ba kar+pU
<p>66b.6</p>mdza' bas mgron gces bzhin du byas/ /zla ba chu shel stan 'khod pa/ /de la dran pa 'tsho ba'i sman/ /lus dang bcas par skyes pa bzhin/ /stan ni bzung byas de dag gis/ /rtse dga' dgod pa'i 'od zer dag /yang dag rgyas par gyur pa ni/ /mdza' ba'i phrad skyes ga pur dag/ /
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>raM pre mo pA ya tAM pu raH/ /a ho d+hA n+yA ba yaM yA sAM sab+gu NA laM kr-i tA kr-i tiH/ /swa ya me bA b+hi ga myo pi b+ha pA na d+yA ga to gr-i haM/ /bi dwe Sha ka s+ya pI yU She tsan da ne ka s+ya tsA ru tsiH/ /in+do man+da
<p>67a.2</p>sngon du ster ba bzhin du smras/ /yon tan dam pas brgyan pa'i dbyibs/ /khyod can 'ong bar 'os pa yang / /gang gis khyim du rang nyid 'ongs/ /kyi ma bdag cag bsod nams can/ /bdud rtsi la ni su zhig sdang / /tsan+dan la ni su mi sred/ /zla ba la ni su gus
<p>67a.3</p>da raHko bA sA d+hu ka s+ya na sam+ma taH/ /s+t+rI NAM ya d+ya pi sau b+ha gya d+haM gA ya pra Na yaHswa yaM/ /kra mas+t+wad daR+sha re nai ba ta thA bi mu kha ri kr-i tAH/ /i dan+na ra pu raM ba yaM tsa pra Na yAr+pi tAH/ /rat+naM tsa sau b+hA Sha Ni ka
<p>67a.4</p>dman/ /dam pa rnams la su mi 'dod/ /gang yang bud med rang nyid ni/ /gleng ba skal bzang nyams pa'i rgyu/ /de lta na yang khyod mthong ba/ /nyid kyis mu cor byas phyir smra/ /mi 'am ci yi grong khyer 'di/ /bdag cag dang bcas mdza' bas ster/ /legs par brjod ldan rin chen
<p>67a.5</p>sA d+ho swA d+hI na me ba te/ /i ti tA sAM ba tsaHshru twA su pri yaHpra Na yo tsi taM/ /u bA tsa sa twa d+ha ba lAM di shan da sha na tsan+t+ri kAM/ /ba hu mA nAspa daM ka s+ya ne daM saM b+hA Sha NA mr-i taM/ /At+ma no byA da ra s+thA naM b+ha
<p>67a.6</p>yang / /dge ba khyod kyi rang dbang nyid/ /de skad de dag rnams kyi tshig /mdza' bar 'os thos shin tu dges/ /so yi zla 'od snying stobs ltar/ /rab tu dkar ba spro zhing smra/ /phebs par smra ba'i bdud rtsi 'di/ /su yi gus mang gnas ma yin/ /khyed rnams bdag gis gus byas pa/ /
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>ba tI b+hiHkr-i tA da rAH/ /sh+lA g+h+yaM daR+sha na me be daM ta trA bya ya ma nu gra haH/ /muk+tA la tAstA ba ha rA kiM pu nash+tsan+da no k+Shi taH/ /e baM bi d+hA nAM swats+tshA nA main+da bI nA mi bA d+hI ShAM/ /A kr-i tI naM sa mu tsi tA ru tsi
<p>67b.2</p>bdag gi yang ni gus pa'i gnas/ /'di mthong nyid ni bsngags par 'os/ /de yang rjes su 'dzin pa 'di/ /mu tig 'khri shing gdung sel la/ /tsan+dan gyis kyang byugs sam ci/ /rnam pa 'di lta'i dri med dag /zla ba'i 'od bzhin gyur pa dang / /rnam pa 'jig rten spyod tshul ni/ /yang dag
<p>67b.3</p>rA lo ka br-it+ta yaH/ /au tsi t+ya tsA ru tsa ri taM pra sA dA bi Sha daM ma naH/ /bAt+sa l+ya pe Sha lA bA NI na ka s+ya da ra b+hU ma yaH/ /gr-i hI tosmA b+hi rA tsA rAHpU dzA pa ri ka ro tsi taH/ /At+mAr+pa NaM ru lArdaM baH
<p>67b.4</p>rigs shing mdzes pa yin/ /rigs shing mdzes pa'i spyod pa dang / /rab tu dang zhing dri med yid/ /mnyes gshin pa dang 'jam pa'i tshig /su yi gus pa'i sa ma yin/ /mchod pa'i yo byad 'os gyur pa'i/ /kun spyod 'di ni bdag gis blangs/ /bud med gzhan dbang yin pa'i
<p>67b.5</p>pa rA yat+tA hi yo Shi taH/ /ka n+yA b+hA bA da sa krAn+ta yU yaM pa ra pa ri gra hAH/ /bi shra b+he Na b+ha gi no me dza na n+yaHsne ha gau ra bAta/ /pa ra bit+taM bi ShaM ye ShAM dza na n+yash+tsa n+ya yo Shi ta/ /pa ra hiM sA me
<p>67b.6</p>slad/ /khyed kyang bdag nyid sbyin mi 'os/ /gzhon nu ma dngos las 'das pas/ /khyod ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung / /byams shing gus pas ma dang ni/ /phebs pas bdag gi sring mo yin/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi 'byor ba dug /gzhan gyi bud med ma dang ni/ /gzhan 'tshe bdag
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>hiM sai ba pak+ShA ste ShAM ni ra t+ya yaH/ /sai shu n+yA sa t+ya pa ru Sh+ya b+hin+na bA dodz+dz+hi taM pa tsaH/ /sa dai ba ba da ne ye ShAM te ShAM sarbA shi ShA di shaH/ /a b+hi d+h+yA ra hi taM tse byA pA ra pa ri brdzi taM/ /
<p>68a.2</p>nyid 'tshe ba nyid/ /de dag phyogs ni gnod pa med/ /phra ma rdzun dang tshig rtsub dang / /kyal pa smra ba spangs pa'i tshig /gang gi kha na brtag ba nyid/ /de dag phyogs rnams kun tu shis/ /gang zhig brnab sems bral ba'i sems/ /gnod sems dag ni yongs su spangs/ /
<p>68a.3</p>mi th+yA dr-iSh+Ta bi hI naM tsa ye ShAM te sarba thaM shri tAH/ /da shA ku she la mArga b+h+yo nirga tA ni ni sarga taH/ /e te ku sha la brga s+ya mArgAHswarge ni rarga laH/ /d+hI re ba d+ha n+yaM d+ha na mud+na tA nAM bid+yai ba tsak+Shurbe
<p>68a.4</p>log par lta bas dman gyur pa/ /de dag legs pa'i lam la brten/ /mi dge bcu yi lam dag las/ /nges par log pa'i rang bzhin can/ /de dag dge ba'i sde rnams kyis/ /bkag pa med pa'i mtho ris lam/ /nor gyis mtho ba rnams kyi nor ni blo gros nyid/ /dbang po rnam
<p>68a.5</p>dzi ten+d+ri ya NAM/ /da yai ba pu ru Shot+ta mA pu N+yA na mAt+mai ba tIr+thaM su tsi mA na sA nAM/ /e baM bi d+ho yaM gu Na san+ni beshaHshI le na bai ma l+ya mu pai puM sAM/ /sad rat+na muk+tA ni
<p>68a.6</p>rgyal rnams kyi mig ni rig pa nyid/ /skyes bu mchog gyur rnams kyi bsod nams brtse ba nyid/ /yid ni gtsang ba rnams kyi 'jug ngogs bdag nyid do/ /skyes bu rnams kyi rnam pa de lta'i yon tan dag /legs gnas 'di ni khrims kyi dri ma med par gyur/ /rin chen mu tig dam pa'i tshogs
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>ka rA ti rik+taM shI laM sa tA mA b+ha ra NaM ba dan+ti/ /i t+yuk+ta mA kar+N+ya gu NA nu rU baM sa twAr+thi nA dzi ten+d+ri ye Na/ /tuSh+TAsta mU tsur+b+hu bi tsan+d+ra lo kaM tA kau tu kA yai ba mu kheHsr-i dzaM t+yaH/ /ma
<p>68b.2</p>las shin tu lhag /tshul khrims dag ni dam pa rnams kyi rgyan du brjod/ /sems can don gnyer dbang po thul ba de yis ni/ /yon tan rjes mthun de skad brjod pa thos gyur nas/ /tshim par gyur cing ltad mo'i don bzhin mkha' las ni/ /zla ba 'jig rten sa la spo zhing de yis smras/ /nor
<p>68b.3</p>Ni ri bA nar+g+ha gu Nodz+dz+wa la s+ya dr-iSh+Tai ba sA d+ho ru tsi tsA ru tsiste/ /ya yai ba mau lau hr-i da ye shru tau tsa sad+d+hi sa dai bAn+da ra NI kr-i to si/ /ma Nir+m+ma hAr+haHpra thi ta bra b+hA baHpra gr-i h+ya tA mAt+ma sa mas+t+wa
<p>68b.4</p>bu bzhin du yon tan rab 'bar rin thang med/ /dge ba khyod kyi mdzes pa'i 'od ni mthong gyur ba/ /gang zhig mgo dang rna ba snying ga nyid la yang / /rtag par dam pa rnams kyi rgyan du khyod nyid bgyid/ /bdag nyid dang mnyam grags pa'i mthu ldan rin thang che/ /nor bu 'di ni khyod kyis rab tu bzung
<p>68b.5</p>yA yaM/ /d+h+wa dzArbi to baR+Sha ti yo dza nA nAM sa ha sra me bar+thi sa ma hi taM yaH/ /uk+t+we ti rat+na pra ba raM ta ru N+yastasmai da durmUr+t+ta mi ba pra sA daM/ /A dA ya tats+tsha pra Na yo pa tsA ra so
<p>68b.6</p>bar mdzod/ /gang zhig rgyal mtshan la bzhag dpag tshad stong phrag tu/ /slong ba rnams kyi 'dod pa char du bab par 'gyur/ /de skad brjod pas rin chen rab mchog gzhon nu mas/ /rab tu dang ba gzugs can bzhin du de la byin/ /des kyang de ni mdza' ba'i nye bar spyod pas blangs/ /dngul
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>pi dwi tI yaM pu raM mA pa rau pyaM/ /ta tra da rAt+tad dwi gu No b+hi re ba sa pU dzi taHkin+na ra kA mi nI b+hiH/ /kra me Na te nai ba bi shud+d+he bud+d+hirle b+he ma NiM tad dwi gu Na pra b+hA baM/ /tri gA ma
<p>69a.2</p>las byas pa'i grong khyer dag ni gnyis par phyin/ /der ni gus pas de yi nyis 'gyur dag gis ni/ /mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis de la mchod pa byas/ /rim pa de dag nyid kyi rnam dag blo gros kyis/ /de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan nor bu thob par gyur/ /de nas gsum pa'i
<p>69a.3</p>bai DUr+p+ra kr-i taM ru tseHSho Da shek+Sha NI tat+t+wa tsa pA sh+ya tau ta ta/ /ta bat+ta dAn+mA Ni ka ta s+ya b+hU te b+ha yA nu b+hAbyap+ta sa da y+ya saM kr-itra/ /prap+tash+tsa rU rat+na ma yaM tsa tur+thaM pu raM ta taHsarba pu rA d+hi ka shri/ /sau
<p>69a.4</p>sha lo ka gcig gi skad dod sde ba sbyor nye dbang rdo rje yod pa 'di za hor ban des kha bskongs pa mkhas pa rnams kyis dpyad pa zhu/
<p>69a.5</p>grong khyer bai DUR+Ya rang bzhin/ /mdzes pa'i mig can bcu drug de dag de yis mthong / /de dag rnams la de bzhin nyid du nor bu ni/ /de yi nyis 'gyur mthu ldan rim gro dam pa thob/ /de nas mdun du rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer grong khyer kun las lhag pa'i dpal ldan pa/ /bzhi
<p>69a.6</p>b+h+yar+thi tastad dwi gu NA b+hi ra gre gu NA d+hi kaHkiM na Da sun+da rI b+hiH/ /ta thai ba sad+d+harma ka thA pra saM gestasto Shi tAste na su saM ya te na/ /ut+phul+la nI lot+pa la dA ma dIr+g+ha ka TAk+Sha bi k+Ship+ta
<p>69a.7</p>par phyin de mi 'am ci ni mdzes ma de'i/ /nyis 'gyur dag gi yon tan lhag pas de don gnyer/ /legs gdams de yi de bzhin nyid du dam chos kyi/ /gtam dag zhar la byung bas tshim gyur de dag ni/ /rab rgyas ut+pal sngon po'i phreng ba ltar ring ba'i/ /zur mig gis 'phangs
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>ka raste mU tsuH/ /b+h+rA tAsti naHkin+na ra rA ja baM sha rat+na ka ren+durba da rA b+hi d+hA naH/ /ta s+yAspa daM dwi ba mi dam+ma hAr+haM swa nA ma tsih+naM bar+d+hi ta r-id+d+hi/ /rat+naM tse daM ni ya ma bi d+hi nA so
<p>69b.2</p>'od dang ldan pas de la smras/ /rin chen 'byung gnas zla ba ba dar zhes pa/ /nged kyi ming po mi 'am ci yi rgyal rigs yod/ /rdzu 'phrul yongs kyis rang gi ming gi mtshan gyur pa/ /rin thang che ba'i gling 'di de yi bzhugs gnas yin/ /'od zer tshogs ni gsal ldan rin chen 'di yang
<p>69b.3</p>Sha d+ha khya pra te na n+yastaM b+ha swata ki ro Na ni ka raM pu N+ya b+hA dzA d+h+wa dzA gre/ /dzaM bU dwi pe sha ka la dza na d+ha b+hi p+sa tar+thAn baR+Sha t+ya bas+thi ra pa ra hi ta byAp+ta ye gr-i h+ya tAM tata/ /i t+yut+pA
<p>69b.4</p>bsod nams brten rnams kyis/ /gso sbyong zhes bya'i brtul zhugs nges pa'i cho gas rgyal mtshan la bkod na/ /dzam+bu'i gling du mtha' dag 'gro tshogs mngon 'dod don rnams char nyid 'bebs/ /gzhan don brtan par gyur pas khyab par bgyid slad de ni bzung bar mdzod/ /de ltar
<p>69b.5</p>h+ya ma ra ta tu pha laM sA da raM sun+da rI b+hiHpra mad+dA ma pra Na ya su b+ha gi dat+ta mA sA d+ya rat+naM/ /bA lA hA khyAM bi dzi ta pa ba nan+ta pra hr-iSh+TaM tu raM ga so pyA tu h+ya swa na ga ra ma ga mal+lab+d+ha
<p>69b.6</p>mdzes ma rnams kyis 'chi med shing 'bras legs btus gus bcas shing / /lhag par mdza' sdug ldan pas skal bzang nor bu byin pa blangs byas nas/ /mgyogs 'gro rab dga' sprin shugs zhes bya rlung las rgyal ba la zhon te/ /de yi lam gyi gdams ngag thob pas de
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>mArgo pa de shaH/ /tasmin kA le bi pu la ku sha laiHswarga mArgaM pra yAM te bA rA Na s+yAM bi Sha da ya sha si k+Sh+la pa tau brah+ma dat+ta/ /shrI mAn sarba pra Na yi pha la daHsu pri yaHpau ra mu khyer lo ka
<p>70a.2</p>yang rang gi grong khyer song / /dus tshod der ni dri med grags ldan sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin/ /yangs pa'i dge bas mtho ris lam du rab gshegs bA rA Na sI ru/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten bskyab blo rnam bskrun slong ba kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /shin tu dga' ni
<p>70a.3</p>trA NI ta bi hi ta ma tir+d+harma rA dz+yA b+hi Shik+taH/ /ta taHshi raHsnA na bi d+hi kra me Na tat+pany+tsa da sh+yAM d+h+wa dza mur+d+h+ni rat+naM/ /sa po Sha d+ho yo Shi ta e ba d+h+ri twA tsa k+Sha ra pi shwaM pa ri pUr+Na kA maM/ /kr-i twA yA trAM pa ra hi
<p>70a.4</p>grong khyer gtso bos chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur/ /de nas mgo bkru cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /gso sbyong dag la nyer gnas bco lnga la/ /rin po che de rgyal mtshan rtsar btags nas/ /sna tshogs 'dod pas yongs su gang bar byas/ /gzhan la phan pas 'bras bu ldan par
<p>70a.5</p>ta pha lAM pat+sa rA NAM sha te na s+thi twA rA dz+ye ma ha ti ni khi laM pU ra yi twA tsa lo kaM /pu traM d+h+ri twa na ra pa ti pa de prA pya sarbo pa shAn+ti ta twa dz+nyo sau ki ma bi pa ra maM brah+ma b+hA baM dza gA ma/ /du re te da s+ya
<p>70a.6</p>gshegs bgrod byas shing lo brgyar ni/ /rgyal srid chen po la gnas 'jig rten mtha' dag khengs byas mi bdag gi /gnas la sras bzhag nye bar zhi ba thams cad thob cing de nyid shes/ /gang yang 'di ni tshangs pa'i dngos po dam pa dag tu gshegs par gyur/ /rin chen gling
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>raHsarbe pUrba ye pU ri tA ma yA/ /rat+na dI pA b+hi ga ma ne tasmin su pri ya dzan+ma ni/ /i ti shAsta swa br-i tI ta ka tha yA bi da d+he ba b+huH/ /dAn bAR+Yo de she na b+hik+Shu NA ma nu shA sA naM/ /i ti k+She
<p>70b.2</p>du mngon bgrod pa/ /shin tu dga' yi skye ba der/ /gang sngon bdag gis khengs byas pa/ /chom rkun de kun 'di dag go /de skad ston pa gtso bo yis/ /rang gi spyod tshul mtha' yi gtam/ /sbyin dang brtson 'grus man ngag gis/ /dge slong rnams la rjes bstan bsgrubs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i
<p>70b.3</p>men+d+ra bi ra tsi ta yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalba la tA yAM ba da ra dwI pa yA trA ShaSh+Tha pal+la paH// //ku sha la pra Ni d+hA na shud+d+ha d+hAm+naM bi ma lA lo ka bi be ka bo d+ha kA nI/ /pa ri kIt+ta na mA tra me ba
<p>70b.4</p>dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ba da ra'i gling du 'gro ba'i yal 'dab ste drug pa'o// //dge ba'i smon lam dag pa'i gzi brjid dang / /dben pa dri med snang ba'i rtogs byed ldan/ /gang zhig yongs su bsgrags pa tsam
<p>70b.5</p>yo ShAM b+ha ba mo hA pa harta ran+t+ra e ba d+ha n+yAH/ /pu rA paR+Sha ta sa ha srA NI n+ya gro d+ho pa ba na s+thi tiH/ /ka pi lA khye pu re tsakre b+ha ga ban d+har+m+ma de sha nA/ /a man+da nan+da san+do ha s+yan+di tsan+da na shI ta laM/ /ta s+ya bA
<p>70b.6</p>nyid na/ /srid pa'i rmongs 'phrog de nyid bsngags par 'os/ /grong khyer ser skya zhes par ni/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi nags tshal gnas/ /sngon tshe 'khor ni stong phrag la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan mdzad/ /mi dman kun dga' tshogs kyi bcud/ /tsan+dan ltar bsel de yi ni/ /gsung gi
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>ga mri taM d+ha n+yAHshra tAny+dza li pu TaiHpa puH/ /rA+ai dzA sud+d+ho da nasta tra d+harma shra ba Na saM ga me/ /pu N+yo pa de sha sa li lairlo b+he bai ma khya nir+b+r-i tiM/ /a tha ta tra ma hA na ma shAkya rA dz+ya ku lod+b+ha
<p>71a.2</p>bdud rtsi gsan pa yi/ /snyim pas bsod nams ldan pas 'thungs/ /chos ni nyan pa'i tshogs pa der/ /rgyal po zas ni gtsang ma yis/ /bsod nams nye bar bstan pa'i chus/ /dri ma dang bral dga' ba thob/ /de nas rgyal rigs las skyes pa/ /shAkya ming chen dag gis
<p>71a.3</p>baH/ /d+har+m+mo pa de sha mA kar+N+ya prAp+taHswa gr-i ha ma bra bI ta/ /a ho nu b+ha ga bAn bud+d+ho d+har+m+maHsaM g+hash+tsa sid+d+ha yeH/ /bud+d+hot+pA do ya masmA kaM nirbA NA ya ma hA pha laH/ /u pa de sha bi she ShAp+ta nir+b+r-i testa s+ya tad+ba tsaH/ /shru
<p>71a.4</p>der/ /chos kyi gdams ngag thos gyur nas/ /rang gi khyim du phyin te smras/ /kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di/ /bdag cag gi ni don chen la/ /bcom ldan sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun grub dang myang 'da'i slad/ /de yi tshig de thos gyur nas/ /khyim thab zla 'od gdams ngag gi /khyad
<p>71a.5</p>twA sha shi pra b+hA yat+nI pra Na yAt+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /a nu gra h+yA b+ha ga ba taHpu ru ShAHpu N+ya b+hA gi naH/ /nin+d+yasta du pa de shA na ma nar+hA yo Sha to ba yaM/ /i ti dzA yA ba tsaHshru twA sa dza gA da dza gad
<p>71a.6</p>par thos pas dga' ba dang / /don du gnyer las de la smras/ /skyes bu bsod nams skal ldan rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzung 'os/ /bdag cag bud med smad 'os rnams/ /de yi man ngag 'os ma yin/ /de skad khyim thab tshig thos nas/ /des smras bzang mo bcom ldan
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>gu roH/ /b+ha dre b+ha ga ba to nAsti b+he dra kA ru N+ye daR+sha ne/ /sa mA sarba tra b+hA b+hA noHsa mA dr-iSh+TiHpa yo mU tsaH/ /sa mA b+ha ga ba to dr-iSh+TiHsarba satwA nu kam+pi naH/ /ma hA pra dzA pa tI bAkyA da ba rA h+na k+Sha
<p>71b.2</p>'das/ /'gro ba'i bla ma snying rje yis/ /gzigs pa dag la dbye ba med/ /kun la nyi ma'i 'od zer snyoms/ /chu 'dzin dag gis char pa snyoms/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs pa snyoms/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo yis/ /tshig gis phyi dro khyod
<p>71b.3</p>NaM ta baH/ /shud+d+ho da naHka ro t+ye ba rA dza b+ha ga ba ton+ti ke /i ti pa t+yuHpri ya gi rA br-i tA shAkyAM ga nA ga NaiH/ /yA tsa na tad b+ha ga ba taHsa puN+yo pa ba naM ya yau/ /sA satwa ku su maM ta tra ta da daR+sha
<p>71b.4</p>kyi skabs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni/ /rgyal po zas gtsang byed pa nyid/ /de skad bdag po'i tshig snyan gyis/ /shAkya'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams nags/ /gtsang ma der ni de song gyur/ /der ni snying rje'i dpag bsam shing / /snying stobs
<p>71b.5</p>ma hA pha laM/ /pra sha mA mr-i ta saM sik+taiHka ru NA kalpa pA da paM/ /la te ba pa ba nA na mrA taM dU rA gre na nA ma sA/ /lo he ne ba pa ri t+yak+tA ts+hu ta kar+Nat+pa lAts+tsha lAta/ /bi lo kya kAM tsa na ru tsiM rat+na b+hU Sha
<p>71b.6</p>me tog 'bras bu che/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bdud rtsi yis/ /yang dag bran pa de yis mthong / /rlung gis dud pa'i 'khri shing bzhin/ /de yis ring nas der phyag 'tshal/ /rna rgyan g.yo ba'i zol gyis ni/ /rmongs pa yongs su gtong ba bzhin/ /gser 'od rin chen rgyan rnams kyis/ /brgyan pa
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>Na b+hU Shi tAM/ /A nan+da nA mA b+hik+ShustA ma ba tsa pra hi tor+Ya taH/ /be+e shaHpra sha ma shU n+yo yaM ma tarmu ni ta pho ba ne/ /dar+pot+sak+to na yuk+taste bi rak+t+ra nA mi daM pa daM/ /gu Na
<p>72a.2</p>dag ni mthong gyur nas/ /dge slong kun dga' bo zhes pas/ /shin tu phan brtson de la smras/ /ma ma khyod kyi cha lugs 'di/ /dregs pas rgyags shing rab zhis stong / /thub pa'i dka' thub nags su ni/ /mi rigs 'di ni chags bral gnas/ /yon tan
<p>72a.3</p>saM ya ma sik+ta ni mu kha rA b+ha ra NA n+ya ho/ /he hAsma ta gra ha NaM yuk+ta mi tI bo pa di shan+ti te/ /i t+yuk+tA te na sA ta n+wI bai la dz+ya bi na tA na nA/ /un+muts+d+ya b+ha ra NaM sarbaM prA hi Non+ni dza man+di
<p>72a.4</p>gyis gdams chags pa yi/ /mu cor rgyan rnams kye ma 'dir/ /bdag cag bzung bar mi 'os zhes/ /khyod la nye bar 'dom pa bzhin/ /de yis 'di brjod gzugs bzang de'i/ /skyengs pa'i gdong ni dman pa yis/ /rgyan rnams thams cad bkrol nas ni/ /rang gi khyim du bskur
<p>72a.5</p>raM/ /u pa bi She Shu sarbe Shu ni rdiSh+Ta ku sha lasta taH/ /a ni t+ya te baM b+ha ga bAn u pa de shaM pra tsakra me/ /ma hA mo ha pra b+ha bo yaM ye na ni t+ya ma ni t+ya tAM/ /ni t+ya tA mi ba ma n+yan+te mU D+ha dza ga ti dzan+ta
<p>72a.6</p>bar gyur/ /de nas thams cad 'khod pa la/ /dge ba ston mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /dngos po mi rtag pa nyid du/ /nye bar ston pa'i rtsom pa mdzad/ /gang gi rtag tu mi rtag nyid/ /rtag pa nyid bzhin 'gro bar ni/ /srog chags rmongs pas 'dzin byed pa/ /'di ni rmongs pa'i mthu chen
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>baH/ a sa t+ye ra ma te lo kaHsa t+ya pra t+ya ya mo hi taH/ /ni berti sarba b+hA bA nAM ma b+ha bA nu b+ha bAM s+thi tiM/ /ke tsita bya ke ra NaiHpa re shru ti pa thaistarka pra bA deHpa re ke tsin+tan+t+ra pa regra hairba hu bi d+hai ra
<p>72b.2</p>no/ /bden par yid ches rmongs pa yis/ /'jig rten mi bden pa la dga'/ /dngos po kun gyi dngos med ni/ /nyams myong gnas pa rig pa med/ /skye ba thos pa'i lam du yang dag chags ldan kha cig sgra yi bstan bcos dag dang ni/ /gzhan ni rig byed lam dang rtog ge rtsed
<p>72b.3</p>n+ye ka lA kau sha laiH/ /saM sak+tAHsu Na ruk+ta dzan+ma sha ra Nau yA tAHsa hai bak+Sha yaM ta trA s+yak+Sha ya lI la yA k+Sha Na pa de mug+d+hairni bad+d+ha d+h+r-i tiH/ /bi Sha ya bi Sha mA pA yaHkA yaHpra sa
<p>72b.4</p>pas gzhan de kha cig rgyud ni yongs 'dzin dang / /gzhan dag rnam mang sgyu rtsal mkhas dang lhan cig nyid du 'jig par skad cig gnas/ /de la yang ni mi 'jigs pa bzhin rol rtsed dag gis rmongs rnams dga' ba rab tu 'dzin/ /mi bzad yul gyi gnod pa'i lus ni nyon mongs phung
<p>72b.5</p>tsa yA sha yA kha ra ta ra ma ru s+phA rA kA raHpra mo ha b+ha bo b+ha baH/ /hi ta b+hU bi ta thA kAR+YaM kAR+YaM bi be ki nI ni ra ba d+hi ra yaM dr-iSh+T+wa byA d+hiR+Ya thA ni ra brta te/ /i d+yA d+ya ni t+ya saM skA rA saM yuk+taM
<p>72b.6</p>po dag gi gnas/ /rab rmongs las byung srid pa rab rtsub mya ngam thang gi rnam par gsal/ /mtha' dang bral ba'i srid pa'i nad 'di ji ltar rnam par ldog 'gyur ba/ /de ltar bya dang bya min phan pa'i sa la rnam dpyod ldan pas dpyad/ /bcom ldan rang nyid 'di la sogs/ /'du byid mi
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>yuk+ta mu d+ya te/ /d+harmo pa de sha ku sha laM bak+tuM b+ha ga ba ti swa yaM/ /e ka shAkya ba d+husta tra rU pa sau b+hA gya garbi tA/ /s+thi tA shai sha ba tA ru N+ya ban+d+ho ba ya si duHsa he/ /muk+ta hA raM sta na ta
<p>73a.2</p>rtag yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi gdams ngag dge ba ni/ /rigs par gsung bar brtson pa'i tshe/ /der ni shAkya'i bu mo gcig /bu mo gzhon nu ma yi mtshams/ /bzod dka'i lang tsho la gnas pa/ /gzugs dang skal bzang nyid kyis dregs/ /nu ma'i ngos su mu tig gi
<p>73a.3</p>De lo la pAM gairmu hurmu huH/ /A lu lau ke ya sha s+phA ra sA raM ra ti pa ti ri ba/ /hA ra ba lo ki nIM dr-iSh+T+wa tA ma ne kA gra mA na sA/ /ya tsin+ta yad bi rak+te ba ma hata pat+nI sha shi pra b+ha/ /i yaM d+harmo pa de she
<p>73a.4</p>do shal dga' ma'i bdag po yi/ /grags pa'i snying po gsal 'dra la/ /zur mig g.yo bas yang yang bltas/ /ming chen chung ma zla 'od kyis/ /rtse gcig min pa'i sems ldan de/ /do shal rnam par blta ba dag /mthong nas chags bral ba bzhin du bsams/ /chos ni nye bar ston tshe yang / /
<p>73a.5</p>pi tsa pa lA hA ra mik+Sh+ya te/ /b+hA bA nAM na shri No t+ye ba mU D+ha k+Sha Ni ka nA mi mAM/ /swaM hA daR+sha yi twA s+ya hA rot+sA haM ha ra mya haM/ /a d+hi ka lo ka ne nai ba dar+p+yaHsha mya ti de hi nAM/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya dA siM rau hi tA khya ma b+ha
<p>73a.6</p>g.yo ba'i do shal 'di la lta/ /dngos po rnams kyi skad cig ma/ /'di dag rmongs pas mi nyan nyid/ /rang gi do shal bstan nas 'di/ /do shel spro ba bdag gis dbrog /lhag pa mthong ba kho na yis/ /lus can dregs pa zhi bar gyur/ /'di bsams de yis 'bangs mo ni/ /ro hi ta zhes bya
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>Shata/ /rau hi ke gats+tsha me hA raM gr-i hAta sa twa mA ha ra/ /i t+yuk+ta sA ta ya ta tra pra br-it+te d+harma saM shr-i ba/ /a kA la ga ma no bag+nA ni shwa tsiM taM yata k+Sha NaM/ /a ho ba tan+ta ro yo yaM saM dzA taHku sha
<p>73b.2</p>la smras/ /ro hi ta song bdag gi ni/ /do shal khyim nas mgyogs su longs/ /de yis de skad brjod pas de/ /der ni chos nyan la zhugs pa/ /dus min 'gro bas yid byung nas/ /shugs dang bcas pas skad cig bsams/ /kye ma bdag gi dge ba 'dir/ /bar chod 'di ni yang
<p>73b.3</p>le ma ma/ /nAsmin shrot+tuM la b+he d+harmaM yata pa rA yan+ta dzi bitA/ /pu N+ya sau ra b+ha saM b+hA rAta kIr+Na kA ru N+ya ke sa rA ta/ /mu kha pad+mAd+b+ha ga ba to d+ha n+yeHprAsno ti bAd+ma d+hu/ /a ho swAts+tsha n+d+ya bits+tsha dasta nu b+haM gaH
<p>73b.4</p>dag skyes/ /gang phyir gzhan dbang 'tsho gyur pa/ /bdag gis chos nyan mi 'thob bo/ /bsod nams dri bzang rgyas gyur cing / /snying rje'i ge sar 'khrigs gyur pa/ /bcom ldan zhal gyi pad+mo las/ /gsung gi sbrang rtsi mchog gis thob/ /kye ma rang dbang rnam par gcod/ /lus 'jig
<p>73b.5</p>su kha k+Sha yaH/ /se bA dza ga ti dzan+tu nAM duHkha duHkha pa raM pa rA/ /se ba pra yA sa saM prap+taM d+ha na mA na ka No da yaM/ /tap+ta ma t+yuSh+Na ni shwA sai ra ho kr-its+tsh+ra Na bI ya te/ /mA na glA nirgu Na
<p>73b.6</p>ba dang nyams byed pa/ /sdug bsngal 'gro bar srog chags rnams/ /g.yog ni sdug bsngal brgyud ma yin/ /g.yog gi ngal dub kyis 'thob pa/ /gla rngan bya dga'i chu yi thigs/ /shugs rings shin tu tsha bas bskol/ /kye ma dka' slad dag gis 'thungs/ /dpon po mthong na khengs
<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>glA ni ro dzaHpU dza sha maHshra maH/ /shra tha maM se ba ka s+yai tata ku la mI shwa ra daR+sha ne/ /lo hI ban+d+ha na shr-iM kha lA tsa ra Na yor+he n+yA ba mA nA ba nIHswa byA pA ra ni Sha d+ha ni t+ya ni ya tI ni
<p>74a.2</p>nyams shing / /yon tan nyams dang gzi brjid mchod/ /zhi zhing ngal ba 'di dag ni/ /g.yog byed dag gi dang po'i 'bras/ /g.yog ni rkang pa 'ching ba'i lcags kyi lcags sgrog zhum zhing nga rgyal chags pa'i sa/ /rtag tu nges par rang gi bya ba 'gog cing gnyid
<p>74a.3</p>dra su kha dro hi NI/ /A sha sA sa bi shA la dzA la sa ra NiHsat+saM ga b+ho ga sha niR+Yu nAM mr-i ga tr-iSh+Ni ka ma ru ma hrI se ba sha rI rak+Sha ya/ /i ti saM tsi t+ya su tsi raM swa dza ga ma ta rA dza yA/ /se bA bi krI
<p>74a.4</p>dang bde ba 'joms par byed/ /re ba'i chags zhen tshogs kyi lam dang legs 'grogs longs spyod kyi ni rdo rje dang / /rmongs pa rnams ni ri dwags skom bskyed mya ngan sa gzhi lus ni zad byed yin/ /de ltar yun ring bsams nas ni/ /de yi bka' yis de song ste/ /lus ni g.yog tu
<p>74a.5</p>ta kA yA nAM swets+tshA bi ha ra Ni ku taH/ /pra dzan+tI pa ra preSh+ya kr-i pa NAM ka ru NA ku laH/ /n-i r-Ik+Sh+ya b+ha ga bAn di byA tsak+Shu ShA tsin+ta ya ta k+Sha NaM/ /asmin dzan+ma ni she Sho s+yAHnaM pUr+No dzI bi tA ba d+hiH/
<p>74a.6</p>btsongs rnams la/ /rang dgar gnas pa ga la yod/ /gzhan gyis bskul bas dman gyur cing / /'gro ba de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /snying rje rgyas pa'i lha yis ni/ /spyan gyis gzigs nas skad cig bsams/ /skye ba 'di la 'di yis ni/ /'tsho ba'i mtshams lhag yongs su rdzogs/ /
<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>e yaM pa ra kI saM sA ra dud+d+har+t+tA byA swa yaM ma yA/ /a tha tAM karma yo ge na bra dzin+saM sa ha sA pa thi/ /bat+sa rAt+sa l+ya ba be shAHshr-iM ga b+h+yA mA dza g+hA na gauH/ /sA pra da d+h+yo b+ha ga ba taHpra sA dAt+tan+ma yasmr-i tiH/ /
