<p>74b.2</p>sdug ma 'di ni 'khor ba las/ /bdag rang nyid kyis gdon par bya/ /de nas las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lam du 'phral la bgrod de la/ /be'u la chags rmongs bcas pa'i/ /ba yi ru yis brdungs par gyur/ /skye ba gzhan gyi lhag gnas kyis/ /yid ni sangs rgyas la dmigs shing / /
<p>74b.3</p>dzan+mAn+ta rA d+hi bA se na bud+d+ha lam+ba na mA na sA/ /a ho karmoR+Yi naR+YI NaiHsaM sA ra ma ka ra ka re/ /dzan+mA brte Shu dzan+tU nAM madz+dza non+madz+dza na kra maH/ /puM sAM la lA Da bi pu lo pa la
<p>74b.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin las/ /de yi rang bzhin dran des bsams/ /'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas kyi/ /skye ba'i 'khor mor srog chags rnams/ /las kyi rba rlabs kyis dkrugs pas/ /kye ma 'bying zhing 'byung ba'i rim/ /skyes bu rnams kyi dpral ba yangs pa'i rdo
<p>74b.5</p>paT+Ti kA su niHsharma karma g+ha Di ta pra ka DAM ka TaM kaiH/ /n+yastA ni dzan+ma ma ra Na pra sa rAk+Sha rA Ni ne tA nI pA Ni sa ri mardza na yA tsa lan+ti/ /i yaM karmA yan+tA pra tsu ra ru tsi bai tsi t+r+ya ra tsa
<p>74b.6</p>yi glegs bu la/ /bde med las kyi sprul pa bsal ba'i rtags can gzod dag gis/ /skye dang 'chi bar rab spros yi ge dag tu bkod gyur pa/ /'di dag rnams ni lag pas yongs su phyis pas bskyod pa min/ /gang gis mngal nas brtsams te rim gyis lhung dang rga dang 'jig
<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>nA na rA NAM mA yu rats+tsha da pa Ta la tu l+ya pa ri Na ti/ /ya yA gar+b+hA raM b+he kra ma ni pa ta ne br-id+d+hi sa ma ye k+Sha ye bA nA n+ye tAM ba dza ti ta nu le khAts+tsha bi da si/ /saM tsin+t+ya te pu
<p>75a.2</p>pa'i dus rnams dag /gang du yang ni lus kyi rtsis ris gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin pa/ /las kyi dbang gis mi rnams dag gi rab mang sred pas rnam par bkra ba dag /bkod pa 'di ni rma bya'i sgro yi tshogs dang mtshungs par yongs su smin par 'gyur/ /de ltar bsams te sngon
<p>75a.3</p>raHpra br-it+ta su da shaHsan+na pra san+na s+thi tiHprAp+te nA sa ma dA sa b+hA ba ka la nA bai lak+Sh+ya ni san+da tAM/ /A d+hA ya pra Ni d+hA na d+hAm+ni d+ha ba le sad+d+harma shud+d+haM d+d+hi yaM saM sA re bi tsi kit+pa e ba ya
<p>75a.4</p>du nye bar gnas skabs bzang po dang po'i rnam gzhag rab gnas pa/ /mi bzad 'bangs mo'i dngos po brnag pas skyengs par gyur pa bzhin du g.yo ba med nyid gyur/ /smon lam khang pa dkar po dam pa'i chos kyis dag pa'i blo ni yongs su bzung byas nas/ /'khor ba dag tu rmongs par
<p>75a.5</p>li naM ta t+yA dza sA dzI bi taM/ /ta taHsA siM ha la dwI pe sa mI be swarga sam+pa dAM/ /tsan+d+ra le khe ba dub+d+hAb+d+hau di bya d+yu ti ra dzA ya ta/ /A d+hA na dzan+ma nasta s+ya muk+tA baR+Sha di bash+tsu te/ /sA b+hUta muk+tA la tA nA
<p>75a.6</p>byed pas dri ma can bzhin de yi srog ni btang bar gyur/ /de nas mtho ris phun tshogs nye/ /sing ga la yi gling du der/ /'o ma'i rgya mtshor zla ba yi/ /ri mo bzhin du rab gsal skyes/ /de ni mngal zhugs skyes pa'i dus/ /mkha' la mu tig char pa g.yos/ /sing ga la bdag bu mo de/ /mu tig
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>ma siM ha lA d+hi pa teHsu tA/ /sA pu N+ya yi ba la pa N+yaM pa han+t+ri br-id+d+hi mA ga tA/ /le b+he bi be ke nAM gA nAM saM to Sha mi ba yau ba naM/ /ta taHka dA tsid+baNi dzaHshrA bsti pu ra bA si nAH/ /ma ka rA ka ra mut+tI d+ya sa ha
<p>75b.2</p>'khri shing zhes par gyur/ /de ni che bar skyes pa yis/ /bsod nams bzhin du 'jo sgeg 'dzin/ /yan lag rnams kyi rnam 'byed kyis/ /chog shes bzhin du lang tsho thob/ /de nas nam zhig mnyan yod kyi/ /grong khyer pa yi tshong ba rnams/ /chu srin 'byung gnas rab bsgral nas/ /
<p>75b.3</p>la dwi pa mA ya yuH/ /te ta dra rA tri paR+Yan+ti bi shrAn+ti su khai rA dzA guH/ /d+harmAr+tha gA thA sa nad+d+ha pra bud+d+ha bud+d+ha b+hA Shi taM/ /ta dan+taHsu ra harmya s+thA shru twai ba shra ba NAM mr-i taM/ /ki me ta di ti pa prats+tsha
<p>75b.4</p>sing ga la yi gling du song / /de ni de dag mtshan mo'i mthar/ /rab sad ngal bsos dga' ba yis/ /chos don tshigs bcad kyis bcings pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs glu ru blangs/ /pho brang ba gam la gnas pa/ /mi bdag bu mo'i rna ba yis/ /bdud rtsi de thos de dag rnams/ /
<p>75b.5</p>tA nA y+Ya nr-i pAt+ma dzA/ /te tA mu tsuHpra mu di tA mi daM bud+d+ha s+ya b+hA Shi taM/ /swa b+ha bArta b+ha ga ba taHsarba sa twa nu kaM pi naH/ /bud+d+ha b+hi d+hA naM shru twai ba pu la kA laM kr-i tA kr-i tiH/ /sA ba b+hU ba sa
<p>75b.6</p>bkug ste 'di dag ci zhes dris/ /rab dga' ldan mas de la des/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /rang bzhin du 'os gsung zhes smras/ /sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid kyis/ /de ni spu long gis brgyan lus/ /yang dag rig pa legs
<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>mud+b+hu ta sam+bid b+ha byA nu b+ha ba b+hUH/ /un+mu khi sA la yU rI ba shab+de ne ba pa yo mu tsaH/ /ka e Sha b+ha ga bAn bud+d+ha i ti prats+tsha tAn pu naH/ /ha taste ni khi laM ta s+yaM shrad+d+hA saM bar+d+d+hI tA da rA/ /n+ya ba de yan pu N+ya ma
<p>76a.2</p>ldan mthu/ /rab tu bskyed pa'i sa gzhir gyur/ /sgra ni sprin gyi lta bu yis/ /rma bya bzhin du de rangs nas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan zhes pa 'di/ /su zhes yang ni de la smras/ /de nas de la dad pa dag /skyes par gus pa de dag gis/ /bsod nams rang bzhin bcom ldan
<p>76a.3</p>yIM b+ha ga bats+tsa ri ta s+thi taM/ /a tha sA tata ka tha bAp+ta prAg+dza n+ma ku sha lo da yA/ /bi dz+nyap+ti le khaM pra da dau te ShAM b+ha ga ba taHkr-i te/ /kA le nIp+d+haM sa mut+tI d+ya prAp+taste ni dzAM pu riM/ /pra Na myA be d+ya tat+b+r-it+taM da durle
<p>76a.4</p>gyi/ /spyod pa'i lugs ni ma lus smras/ /de nas de yi gtam gyis de/ /sngar skyes dge ba rgyas pa thob/ /bcom ldan slad du gsol ba yi/ /spring yig de dag rnams la bskur/ /dus kyi chu gter yang dag bsgral/ /rang gi grong khyer thob nas des/ /bdag nyid che la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi
<p>76a.5</p>khaM ma hAt+mA ne/ /b+ha ga bA na pi sarba dz+nyAHpUrbe me ba bi b+hA bya tata/ /muk+tA la tA yAHkr-i pa yA swa yaM le kha ma ba tsa ya ta/ /a ho sma ra Na me ba te ki ma pi pu N+ya at+pa taM b+ha ba ti b+ha ba b+hai Sha dzaM
<p>76a.6</p>gtam bshad spring yig phul/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan gyis/ /de ni mngon nyid mkhyen gyur kyang / /mu tig 'khri shing la brtse bas/ /rang nyid kyis ni spring yig bklags/ /kye ma bsod nams tshong zong dag gi rnyed par gyur pa khyod ni dran pa nyid/ /rgud dang gdung ba dang ni
<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>bya sa na tA pa tr-iSh+TA pr-i haM/ /b+ha ga ban+ma ya ka thA kra mo pa na ta sam+bi dA swA da b+hUHsa e Sha b+ha ga ban+ma hA na mr-i ta saM bi b+hA go ma ma/ /i ti saM k+Ship+ta le khAr+thaM bi b+hA bya b+ha
<p>76b.2</p>sred pa 'joms pa'i srid pa'i sman bzang ci yang yin/ /bcom ldan las byung gtam gyi rim pas nyer bskrun yang dag rig pa myong ba'i sa/ /bcom ldan 'di de bdag gi bdud rtsi yang dag bgo skal chen por gyur pa yin/ /de ltar mdor bsdus spring yig don/ /bcom ldan rang
<p>76b.3</p>ga ba na swa yaM/ /I Shata smi ta twi Sha sa twa pra kA sha ma da sha d+hi shaM/ /ta tash+tsi tra ka ra shakyAM pra b+ha pA tA nu pU ri taM/ /b+ha ga bAn prA hi Not+ta s+yai n+ya tAM swa pra ti mAM pa Te/ /su naHpra ba ha nA rU D+hA
<p>76b.4</p>gis rtogs gyur nas/ /cung zad 'dzum pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs kyi sems can rab gsal mdzad/ /de nas 'od tshogs rjes rgyas shing / /ri mo mkhan gyis mi nus pa'i/ /rang gi sku gzugs ras la bkod/ /bcom ldan gyis ni de la springs/ /de yi bka' yis phyi nas yang / /tshong
<p>76b.5</p>ba ni dza ste tad dz+nya yA/ /a bA s+ya siM ha la dwI baM ta s+yai pa Da ma daR+sha yan/ /he ma siM hA sa na n+yaste pa Te dr-iSh+T+wa ta thA ga taM/ /dza nastan+ma ya tA d+h+yA na de kI b+hA ba mi ba ya yau/ /a d+hastA ta li khi tan+ta smin
<p>76b.6</p>pa de dag gzings la zhon/ /sing ga la yi gling phyin nas/ /de la thang sku rab tu bstan/ /gser gyi seng ge'i khri bkod pa'i/ /ras la de bzhin gshegs mthong nas/ /de las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyis/ /skye bo dgongs pa gcig bzhin gyur/ /de yi 'og na bris pa ni/ /bsod nams
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>pu N+yA brA s+ya ma dr-i sh+ya ta/ /ti sraHsha ra N+yA ga ta yaHpany+tsa shik+ShA pa dA ni tsa/ /pa sra tI t+ya sa mut+pa daHsA nu lo ma bi paR+Ya yaH/ /AR+YaSh+Ti gasta thA mArgaHpa ra mA mr-i ta nir+b+ha
<p>77a.2</p>kyis 'thob mthong gyur pa/ /skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dag dang / /bslab pa'i gnas ni lnga yang ngo / /lugs las 'byung dang ldog bcas pa'i/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung dang bcas/ /de bzhin 'phags lam yan lag brgyad/ /mchog gi bdud rtsis rdzogs gyur
<p>77a.3</p>raH/ /swa yaM g+ha ga ba tA nastaM ta s+yo pa ri su b+hA Shi taM/ /pA b+hAHse b+ha ba nA lI nab+h+rA dziSh+Nu ka na kA k+Sha raM/ /bi Sha ma bi Sha yA lo la byA lA ba lI ba la yA ku lAta ta ru Na ti mi rAn+niSh+bA mya smAta pra
<p>77a.4</p>pa'o/ /de yi steng du legs bshad ni/ /gser gyi yi ge rab mdzes par/ /dgongs pa mnyam gzhag bcom ldan 'das/ /rang gi bkod pas mdzes gyur pa/ /skye dang 'chi ba'i nyon mongs kyis btab gdung ba drag po rab rgyas dag /mi bzad yul ni g.yo ba'i sbrul gyi 'phreng bas
<p>77a.5</p>mo hA gr-i hAta/ /dza na na ma ra Na kle shA be shA pra br-it+ta pra thu bya thA bra dza ta sha ra NaM baud+d+haM d+har+m+maM nA tra b+ha bAta b+ha yaM/ /dzi na pra kr-i ti kr-i tiM pu N+yaM pa shin+tA pAr+thi bAt+ma dzA/ /a nA di kA lo
<p>77a.6</p>dkris shing dkrugs gyur pa/ /rab rib rab rgyas rab rmongs phug gi khang pa 'di las phyir thon la/ /sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su song zhig der ni srid la 'jigs pa med/ /dag byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs la/ /sa yi bdag po'i bu mos bltas/ /thog med dus nas
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>pa tsai tAM mu mau tsA dz+nyA na bA sa nAM/ /prAM shuSh+ka bta kAny+tsa na kAn+ta kA yaM su skan+d+ha mA dzA nu b+hU dzA b+hi rA maM/ /d+h+yA nA ba d+hA twAr+ha ni mI li tAk+ShaM lA ba N+ya d+hA rA yi ta tuM ga nA saM/ /swa b+hA ba g+ha bya pra be
<p>77b.2</p>bsags pa yi/ /mi shes bag chags btang bar gyur/ /rab mtho gser zhun lta bur mdzes pa'i sku/ /phrag mdzes dpung ba pus mo'i bar mngon dga'/ /bsam gtan la chags phyed ni zum pa'i spyan/ /mdzes sdug rgyun bzhin rab tu mtho ba'i shangs/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mdzes par rtogs
<p>77b.3</p>b+hA sa mA naM pra lam+ba nir+b+hU Sha Na kar+Na pA shaM/ /bA la pra bA lA ru Na balka lAM kaM saM sak+ta san+d+h+yA b+h+ra mi ba driM/ /tri ShA di shAM shi la mi bA di shan+ta mA nan+da dA nod+Ya ta bag+t+ra tsan+t+raM/ /k+Sha mA gu NaM k+Sh+mo mi ba shik+Sha
<p>77b.4</p>bya ba/ /rgyan med snyan gyi zhags pa ring du 'phyang / /thun mtshams sprin chags lha yi ri bo bzhin/ /lo 'dab gsar pa ltar dmar na bzas mtshan/ /'od kyi phyogs la tshul khrims ston pa bzhin/ /zhal gyi zla bas kun dga' sbyin par brtson/ /bzod pa'i yon tan sa la slob pa bzhin/ /
<p>77b.5</p>yan+taM pu N+yo tsi tAM sA su b+ha gaM bi lo kya/ /pra NA ma paR+Yan+ta ka po la tsum+bi kar+N+yot+pa lA driHpa ri bar+t+ta ne na/ /ni ra s+ya niHsA ra sha rI ra tr-iSh+Ti sa t+yA nu b+hA baM pa ra maM pra pe de/ /sro taHsa mA pat+ti pha la pra kA sha
<p>77b.6</p>bsod nams las skyes skal bzang lan gsum du/ /bskor nas btud pas rna ba'i ut+pal dag /'phyang ba mkhur tshos la reg des mthong nas/ /snying po med pa'i lus la blta ba spangs/ /bden pa'i mthu ni dam pa skyes par gyur/ /rgyun du yang dag zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dag /rab tu
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>mA sA d+ya sA ta tra k+Sha lab+d+ha bo d+hiH/ /bi tsit+ta yan+tI su ga ta pra b+hA baM sa ma b+h+ya d+hAta bisma ya haR+Sha b+hU miH/ /a ho ma hA mo ha ta mo ha re Na dU ras+thi te nA pi ta thA ga te na/ /pra sa h+ya g+hA swad+pa pu ShAr+pi te
<p>78a.2</p>gsal byas de tshe byang chub thob/ /de yis bde gshegs mthur ni rnam bsams shing / /ya mtshan dga' ba'i sa yis mngon par smras/ /kye ma rmongs pa'i mun chen 'phrog byed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dang ldan pa'i sku/ /ring du gnas kyang rnam par rgyas pa yi/ /dpal
<p>78a.3</p>yaM bi kA sha lak+Sh+mIHku sha lam+bu dza s+ya/ /tIr+No b+ha baHsat+p+ra Ni d+ha na mAp+taM pra ban+ta yan+taHka ra NaM k+Sha Ne na/ /a ho nu tr-iSh+NA pa ri tA pa shAn+t+yai sa muts+tsha lan+tI ba sha mA mr-i tau g+hAH/ /i t+yuk+t+wa sA b+ha ga ba te muk+ta rat+na n+Yu pa ya naM/ /bi tId+ya
<p>78a.4</p>'di dge ba'i chu skyes dag la ster/ /skad cig gis ni srid bsgral dam pa yis/ /smon lam thob cing nang gi byed rab dang / /kye ma sred pa'i yongs gdung zhi ba'i slad/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsi'i chu bo rab 'phyur bzhin/ /'di brjod de yis bcom ldan la/ /mu tig rin chen rnams kyi skyes/ /dge 'dun
<p>78a.5</p>saM g+ha pU dzA yai bi sa sardza ba Nig+dza ni/ /te ma ho da d+hi mut+tI bya prAp+tA b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM /tan+muk+ta rat+na ni ka ra pra Na mya smai bya be da yan/ /ba Nig+b+hiHka thi tAM shru twA tat+ka thaM ta tra b+hik+Shu NA/ /A nan+da nAm+nA pr-iSh+Tau tha ba
<p>78a.6</p>mchod slad tshong ba yi/ /skye bo la bskur btang bar gyur/ /de dag chu gter che sgrol nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin/ /de yis mu tig rin chen tshogs/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni de la phul/ /der ni tshong pas de yi gtam/ /bshad pa thos nas dge slong ni/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya bas dris/ /de nas
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>b+hA She b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /yA sau pu rA ro hi tA khyA dA si shAkyA gr-i ha b+ha bta/ /sai ba muk+tA la tA dzA tA sa t+kar+m+ma pra Ni d+hA na taH/ /a b+hU da ma hA d+ha no nA ma bA rA Na s+yAM ba Ni ka pu rA/ /ta s+ya rat+na pa tI nA ma pat+nI pu N+yo
<p>78b.2</p>bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs/ /gang 'di shAkya'i khyim du sngon/ /ro hi ta zhes 'bangs mor gyur/ /de nyid mu tig 'khri shing du/ /smon lam dam pa'i las kyis skyes/ /nor chen zhes pa'i tshong pa ni/ /bA rA Na sIr sngon byung gyur/ /de yi khyim thab bsod nams can/ /rin chen ldan
<p>78b.3</p>ci tA b+ha bta/ /sA pa t+yau pany+tsa tA yA te niHpu trA stU pa she kha re/ /pU dzAM kr-i twA ma hA hA raM b+hak+ti yuk+tA n+ya be da yata/ /te na pu N+ya bi pA ke na siM ha lA d+hi pa teHsu tA/ /dzA tA muk+tA la tA sai ba prAp+tA tsa pa ri ni r+b+r-i
<p>78b.4</p>zhes bya bar gyur/ /bdag po lnga pa nyid gyur tshe/ /bud med de yis mchod rten rtser/ /do shal chen po gus ldan pas/ /mchod pa byas nas phul bar gyur/ /bsod nams rnam smin des de nyid/ /sing ga la yi bdag po yi/ /bu mo mu tig 'khri shing gyur/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'ang
<p>78b.5</p>tiM/ /sai ba dzan+ma ni tsA n+ya smin+nai shwad+ya ma da mo hi tA/ /pU dz+yA d+hi k+She pa da k+Sha b+hUta dA sI te nA ti bats+tsa raM/ /dzan+ma te dza ne nop+taM yad+Yad karma shu b+hA shu b+haM/ /ta s+ya ta s+ya sa tad rU paM b+huM k+te pa ri Na ti pha laM/ /ni
<p>78b.6</p>thob/ /de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni/ /phyug pas rgyags shing rmongs gyur nas/ /mchod la smod cing sgrin gyur pa/ /de yis yun ring 'bangs mor gyur/ /dge dang mi dge'i las gang gang / /skye ba'i zhing la skye bos btab/ /de dang de yi rang bzhin de/ /yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu spyod/ /dge ba
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>khi la ku sha la mU lA kIrti puSh+pa dz+wa la shrI shu b+ha pha la b+ha ra sU tir+d+harma bal+lI na rA NAM/ /b+ha be ti tsa bi Sha bal+lI kilpi Sha kle sha mU la b+h+ra ma Ni pa ta na mo hA nan+ta saM tA ba he tuH/ /
<p>79a.2</p>mtha' dag rtsa ba grags pa'i me tog dpal rab 'bar/ /legs dpyad 'bru yi tshogs bskyed chos kyi 'khri shing mi rnams kyis/ /sdig dang nyon mongs rtsa ba 'khrul zhing ltung dang rmongs pa dang / /mtha' yas yongs su gdungs gyur dug gi 'khri shing dag kyang yin/ /
<p>79a.3</p>san+tap+te smin kha ra ta ra ma ru s+phA ra saM sA ra mArge pA paM pA pa t+ya dza ta dza na tAHsak+ta tI brA nu tA saM/ /pu N+yaM pu N+yaM ku ru ta sa ta taM pu N+ya pI yU Sha pik+tAHpu N+ye ts+tshA yA ta tu ta la b+hu baHshI ta lAHpu N+ya
<p>79a.4</p>rab rtsub mya ngam du gsal 'khor ba'i lam ni shin tu gdung ba 'dir/ /drag por rjes su gdung ldan sdig pa sdig pa bor cig skye bo dag /rtag tu bsod nams bsod nams mdzod cig bsod nams bsten pa rnam dag gi /bsod nams bdud rtsis bran pa'i bsod nams grib bsil
<p>79a.5</p>b+hA dzAM/ /i ti sat+p+ra Ni d+hA na s+ya pha laM ka tha ya ta swa yaM/ /b+hi k+Shu NA mu pa de sha yaM b+hek+t+ye b+ha ga bA tA kri taH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM muk+tA
<p>79a.6</p>shing gis gzhi bsil/ /de ltar smon lam dam pa'i 'bras/ /bshad pa yis ni gdams ngag 'di/ /dge slong rnams ni gus pa'i slad/ /bcom ldan rang gis mdzad pa yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>ya tA ba dA naM sap+ta maHpal+la waH// //kr-i tA pa kA re pi kr-i pA ku lA na krU re pya lam pal+la ko ma lA ni/ /dwo ShoSh+ma tap+te pya ti shI ta lA ni b+ha ban+ti tsit+tA ni bi dA sha yA nAM/ /pu rA su ra pu
<p>79b.2</p>shing las mu tig 'khri shing gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bdun pa'o// //bsam pa rig pa rnams kyi thugs dag ni/ /gnod pa byed pa la yang snying rje rgyas/ /drag por gyur pa la yang 'dab ltar mnyen/ /zhe sdang tsha gdung la yang shin tu bsil/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i
<p>79b.3</p>ro dA re pu re rA dza gr-i hA b+hi d+he/ /shrI gup+tA khyo gr-i ha pa tirba b+hU d+ha na do sa maH/ /dr-ip+taHsu dza na bi dwe ShI gu Ne Shu gi ra tA da raH/ /sa dA d+ha na ma dA d+h+ma taHsa dza hA sa ma tiM pa tAM/ /ka Thi ne Sh+wa ti ba kre
<p>79b.4</p>khab ces pa/ /lha yi grong ltar rgya cher sngon/ /khyim bdag dpal sbas zhes bya ba/ /nor sbyin lta bu byung bar gyur/ /skye bo legs la sdang zhing dregs/ /yon tan rnams la gus pa btang / /rtag tu nor gyis rgyags myos te/ /dam pa rnams kyi blo la rgod/ /sra zhing shin tu 'khyog pa dang / /
<p>79b.5</p>Shu shU n+ye Shu mu kha re Shu tsa/ /shaM khi Sh+wi ba kha le Sh+we lak+Sh+mIrtA k+Shi N+ya mA shri tA/ /ti ka dA tsi ta gu rur+dz+nyA ti pu traHk+Sha pa Na kaHkha laH/ /mi thaHswai raM ka thA sak+taHpu N+ya dwe ShA da b+ha Sha ta/ /ya e Sha gr-i d+h+ra kU TA khye gi
<p>79b.6</p>stong zhing mu cor sgrog pa yi/ /dung nyid la bzhin mi bsrun la/ /dpal 'byor yon du sten par byed/ /de la nam zhig zad byed pa/ /bla ma mi bsrun gnyen gyi bus/ /dben par dman pa'i gtam la chags/ /bsod nams dag la sdang las smras/ /gang 'di bya rgod spungs zhes pa'i/ /ri la
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>rau b+hi k+Shu sha ter+b+r-i taH/ /sarba dz+nya kIr+t+yo su ga ta s+t+ri dza ga ta pU dz+ya tAM ga taH/ /nai bA s+ya pra ti b+hAM kAny+tsita b+ha byA mu pa la b+hA ma he/ /nI taHkiM tUn+na tiM mUr+khair+b+ha ga bAn b+ha ga bA ni
<p>80a.2</p>dge slong lnga brgyas bskor/ /bde gshegs kun mkhyen zhes grags shing / /'gro gsum mchod bya nyid gyur pa/ /'di yi rdzu 'phrul mchog dag ni/ /ci yang bdag gis ma dmigs te/ /'on kyang blun pos bcom ldan 'das/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes mtho ba
<p>80a.3</p>ti/ /a bi tsAR+Yai ba sa ta taM pa rok+ta ma nu b+hA Sha te/ /ga tA nu ga ti kaHpra yaHpra sid+hi sa ra No dza naH/ /bra tA di ni ya masta s+ya daM b+ha e ba pi b+hA bya te/ /asnA ti mau na kr-it+mat+s+ya ne ka pa da bra to ba kaH/ /
<p>80a.4</p>thob/ /rtag tu rnam par ma dpyad nyid/ /pha rol brjod pa'i rjes su brjod/ /skye bo phal cher grags pa yi/ /lam du song ba'i rjes su 'gro/ /de yi brtul zhugs la sogs kyis/ /nges pa tshul 'chos nyid du rtogs/ /chu skyar mi smra rkang gcig gis/ /brtul zhugs bzung nas nya rnams za/ /
<p>80a.5</p>tasmAt+ta s+yo pa hA sA ya kr-i ya taM kA pi bany+tsa nAM/ /mA yA mo hi tA d+hUrtA nAM pa ro pi tu Sh+ya ti/ /i ti te nok+ta mA kar+N+ya shrI gup+taHkarma mo hi taH/ /pa ti tuM pA ga shwa b+h+re yuk+t+yA ta du pa diSh+Ta yA/ /
<p>80a.6</p>des na nye bar bgam pa'i slad/ /de la slu ba 'ga' zhig bgyi/ /g.yo sgyu can rnams sgyu ma yis/ /rmongs nas gzhan yang yongs sam 'gyur/ /de yis de skad brjod thos nas/ /las kyis rmongs pa'i dpal sbas ni/ /sdig pa'i g.yang la mchod ba'i slad/ /de yis bstan pa'i rigs pa yis/ /
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>pra dIp+ta kha di rAM gA rA pUr+NaM gU D+haM kha dAM gr-i he/ /kr-i twA pa bi Sha ma luny+tsa ya yau b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/ /te na mi th+yA bi hi ta ya b+hak+t+yA b+hok+tuM ni man+t+ri taH/ /bi dz+nyA ya sarbaM sarba dz+nyAsta the ti pra ha sa smi ta/ /
<p>80b.2</p>khyim du gsang dong seng ldeng gis/ /sol ba rab 'bar gyis khengs dang / /dug ldan zas kyang byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song / /brdzun gyis bskrun pa'i gus pa yis/ /de yi zas la mgron du song / /thams cad rnam rig kun mkhyen gyis/ /de bzhin no zhes 'dzum bcas gsungs/ /
<p>80b.3</p>mi ThAg+ni yo ga ku pi tAM pat+niM sad+d+harma bA dI nIM/ /gr-i he ba ban+d+ha shrI gup+taHshaM ki to man+t+ra bi shra bAta/ /a tha bi dz+nyA ta pr-i to pi b+ha ga bAn swa ya mA ya yau/ /ban+d+ya mA no dze ga ban+d+yai sh+tsa turmu kha mu khaiHsu
<p>80b.4</p>dug dang me sbyor la khros pa'i/ /khyim thab chos ni smra ba mo/ /gros ni zags su dogs pa yis/ /dpal sbas kyi ni khyim du bcings/ /de nas spyod yul mkhyen gyur kyang / /'gro bas phyag 'os gdong bzhi sogs/ /lha rnams kyis ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /bcom ldan rang nyid gshegs par
<p>80b.5</p>raiH/ /shrI gup+ta s+ya ta mA raM b+haM bi be da na ga re dza naH/ /dik+Shu d+hA ba ti pA pA nAM su gup+ta ma pi pA ta kiM/ /ta taHkash+tsi ta sa ma b+h+ye t+ya b+ha ga ban+ta mu pA si kaH/ /u bA tsa tsa ra NA nI nash+tsin+ta yan ga ha na
<p>80b.6</p>gyur/ /dpal sbas kyis ni brtsams pa de/ /grong khyer dag tu skye bos rig /sdig can rnams kyi sdig pa ni/ /shin tu sbas kyang phyogs rnams rgyug /de nas dge bsnyen dag cig ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /me dang dug la sems byed cing / /zhabs la rab tu gtugs
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>bi ShaM/ /mi th+yA na mraHpri yA lA pI gU D+ha ba h+ni bi ShAn+na daH/ /pa ri hAR+Y+YaHprat+ne na b+ha ga ban+na Sha durdza naH/ /nA R+YA da nAR+Ye nA shwA si kAR+Yan+ma d+huR+Ya mA shrI te/ /an+t+ra ts+tshe dI pi gIr+No
<p>81a.2</p>nas smras/ /rdzun gyis phyag 'tshal snyan par smras/ /gsang nas me dang dug zas ster/ /bcom ldan rab tu 'bad pa yis/ /skye bo ngan 'di yongs gtang 'os/ /dogs pas snyan smra la brten nas/ /'phags pa min rnams dbugs 'byin byed/ /gang phyir sbrang rtsis kha
<p>81a.3</p>hi ma d+hu dig+d+ha mu khaHk+Shu raH/ /nA n+ya stu tiM gu Na dwe Sh+wi sa ha te gu Ni nAM kha laH/ /san+tastu Sh+yan+ti ye ba na te na ku pyan+ti durdza nA/ /twa yaM lo ka tra ye ne tra sha ta pat+t+ra bi kA shi ni/ /a s+ya rA hoHpa daM prap+te nAn+d+hI
<p>81a.4</p>byugs pa'i/ /spu gri mid na rgyu ma gcod/ /yon tan la sdang mi bsrun pas/ /yon tan can gzhan bstod mi bzod/ /gang gis dam pa dges 'gyur nyid/ /de yi skye bo ngan pa khro/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mig dag ni/ /'dab brgya rnam par rgyas byed khyod/ /sgra gcan 'di yi gnas thob na/ /'gro
<p>81a.5</p>b+ha ba ti kiM dza gta/ /tats+tshu twA b+ha ga bA nU tse kiny+tsi ta smi ta si tAM shu b+hiH/ /tan+ni kA ro gra ti mi raM dU rAta pa ri ha ran+ni ba/ /na ma mAM gaM spr-i sha t+yag+niHpra b+ha ba t+ya pi bA bi ShaM/ /pa ra dwe Sha da ri dra NAM do Sho
<p>81a.6</p>ba long ba min pa ci/ /de nas bcom ldan cung zad ni/ /'dzum pa'i zer dkar dag gis de'i/ /gnod pa mi bzad rab rib dag /ring nas yongs su sel bzhin gsungs/ /bdag gi lus la mes reg dang / /dug gis kyang ni tshugs pa min/ /gzhan la sdang bas dbul rnams la/ /skyon
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>pi ni ru pa dra baH/ /a ro Sha shI ta la tse taHsik+taM ya s+ya sha mA mr-i taiH/ /kiM ka ro t+yo na la sta s+ya bi ShaM bA bi Sha ya dwi ShaH/ /bi ShA ya te tu pI yU Sha ku su maM ku li sha ya te/ /dwoSha dwo Sha tu ra s+yai ba tsan+da naM da na ya
<p>81b.2</p>gyis kyang ni nyer 'tshe med/ /gang gis sems ni mi khro bsil/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsis bran gyur pa/ /de la me yis ci bya ste/ /yul gyi dgra la dug gis kyang / /zhe sdang skyon gyis gzir ba la/ /bdud rtsi dug nyid bzhin du spyod/ /me tog rdo rje bzhin du spyod/ /tsan+dan sreg byed bzhin du
<p>81b.3</p>te/ /tiR+Yog+Ya ni ga ta s+yA pi bo d+hi sa twa pa da s+thi teH/ /kA ru N+yaM mai tri muk+ta s+ya nAg+nirda ha ti bi gra haM/ /pu rA ka liM ga nr-i pa tiHkhaN+Da dwI pA b+hi d+haM ba nI/ /da dA ha mr-i ga saM g+hA nAM saM k+She
<p>81b.4</p>spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /snying rje byams pa dag dang ldan/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas song gyur kyang / /lus ni me yis mi 'tshig go /ka ling ka yi mi bdag sngon/ /ri dwags tshogs rnams 'joms pa la/ /yang dag brtson pas dum bu'i gling / /zhes
<p>81b.5</p>pA sa sa mud+Ya taH/ /kA na ne dz+wa li te tasmin+ne kastit+ti ri sha ba kaH/ /mai t+yA bo d+hiM sa mA laM bya da ha na pra sha maM bya pAta/ /tasmA da dro ha ma na saM na b+ha phaM bi d+ye te kwa tsita/ /shrU ya tAM sa two
<p>81b.6</p>pa'i nags tshal bsregs par gyur/ /nags tshal rab tu 'bar ba der/ /byi'u ti ti ri gcig pu/ /byams pa'i byang chub la dmigs pas/ /sreg byed rab tu zhi bar bsgrubs/ /de las 'khu med yid ldan rnams/ /gang du yang ni 'jigs pa med/ /snying stobs phun sum
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>sa m+pat+te ri da ma n+ya ts+tsha kau tu ki/ /a br-i Sh+Ti bi Sha me kA le mu naHka s+ya tsi dA shra me/ /ma nu Sh+ya sa dr-i shA lA paHsha sha kaHsu tsi raM s+thi taH/ /k+Shu ta k+Sha ma m+mu ni mA lokya pha la mu la pa ri k+Sha yAta/ /u
<p>82a.2</p>tshogs pa yis/ /dge mtshan 'di dang gzhan yang nyon/ /char med mi bzad dus su ni/ /thub pa 'ga' yi bsti gnas na/ /mi dang 'dra bar brjod pa yi/ /ri bong zhig ni yun ring gnas/ /'bras bu rtsa ba yongs zad pas/ /ltogs rid thub pa mthong gyur nas/ /bsam
<p>82a.3</p>bA tsa tsa la saM kalpastad+b+ya thA bya thi tA sha yaH/ /b+ha ga bAn ma ma mA se na saM pra ti prA Na bar+t+ta naM/ /kri ya tAM rak+Sha NI yaM te sha rI raM d+har+m+ma sA d+ha naM/ /it+yUk+t+wA dA ba she ShA g+nau bi k+She pa sha sha kasta nuM/ /bArta mA
<p>82a.4</p>pa de yi gdung bas gzir/ /g.yo med kun tu rtag par smras/ /bcom ldan bdag gi sha dag gis/ /da ni srog gi rten po dag /mdzod cig chos ni sgrub bgyid pa/ /khyod kyi lus ni bsrung bar 'os/ /'di brjod nags sreg mjug gi mer/ /thub pas byams pas yang yang du/ /'bad pa
<p>82a.5</p>no pi yat+nai na pra Na yAta mu ni nA mu huH/ /ta s+ya sa twa pra b+hA be na dz+wA la dz+nyA lA ku lo na laH/ /pra ya yau many+dzu shiM dzA na b+h+ra ma rAM b+hau dza khaN+Da tAM/ /so pi di bya ba pu sta tra ka ma le ma ha ti s+thi taH/ /pra Na mya mA
<p>82a.6</p>yis ni bzlog gyur kyang / ri bong gi ni lus po 'phangs/ /de yi snying stobs mthu yis ni/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis dkrigs pa'i me/ /'jam pa'i sgra sgrogs bung ba can/ /pad+mo'i rdzing bur rab tu gyur/ /de yang lha yi lus kyis der/ /pad+ma chen po dag la gnas/ /thub pas phyag 'tshal
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>no mu ni ni bi da d+he d+harmade sha nAM/ /i ti bo d+hi pra br-it+tA nAM na ba h+nerna bi ShA ta ba yaM/ /b+ha ga bAn ka tha yi twe ti shrI gup+ta b+ha ba naM ya yau/ /ta tra te na pra bi sh+yai ba bi ni k+Shi p+te dak+Shi Ne pa de/ /ba b+hU
<p>82b.2</p>ldan pa la/ /chos rnams rab tu bstan pa byas/ /de ltar byang chub zhugs pa rnams/ /'jigs pa mes min dug gis min/ /de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das/ /dpal sbas kyi ni khang par gshegs/ /des ni de ru zhugs nyid na/ /zhabs ni g.yas pa bzhag pa yis/ /me yi dong ni
<p>82b.3</p>bAg+ni kha dA many+dzu gr-i dzata b+h+r-iM ga sa ro dza nI/ /dr-iSh+To pa biSh+TaM shrI gup+taM s+thaM sa ro ru ha ba sti re/ /tad dr-iSh+Ti naSh+Ta kA lu Sh+yaHsro bA tsa tsa ra NA na taH/ /b+ha ga bA na ma ma pA pa s+ya k+Shan+ta b+h+yau yaM bya ti kra maH/ /mo hAn+d+he
<p>82b.4</p>mtsho skyes can/ /bung ba 'jam sgrogs ldan par gyur/ /mtsho skyes khri la bzhugs pa de/ /dpal sbas kyis ni mthong gyur nas/ /de mthong sdig pa nyams pa yis/ /zhabs la btud de rab tu smras/ /bcom ldan bdag ni sdig can gyis/ /rim las 'das 'di bzod par bgyi/ /gti mug
<p>82b.5</p>pa ti taM ru ts+ya kA ru N+ya ma d+hi kaM sa tAM/ /ma mA ka l+yA Na mi tre Na yo yaM pA pa pa the kr-i taH/ /u pa de shaHpra mo he Na ta tra trA NaM b+ha ba ta smr-i tiH/ /bi Sha dig+d+ha ra saM sar+b+baM b+ho dz+yaM te kalpi tam+ma yA/ /a ho
<p>82b.6</p>gis long ltung chags la/ /dam pa rnams ni thugs rjes lhag /bdag ni mi dge'i bshes gnyen dag /rab tu rmongs pas sdig pa yi/ /lam la nye bar gdams pa byas/ /de la khyod nyid dran pa skyabs/ /khyod kyi zas dang btung ba kun/ /bdag gis dug gis bsgos pa byas/ /phyi nas
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>ma mai ba saM krAn+taM pash+tsat+tA pa ma yaM bi ShaM/ /i ti shru bA NAM shrI gup+taM sA shru ne tra kr-i pA ni d+hiH/ /dr-iSh+T+wA ba b+hA She b+ha ga bAn b+hik+Shu saM g+ha s+ya shri N+wa taH/ /bi ShA dam+mA kr-iHtha sA d+ho na ba
<p>83a.2</p>gdung ba'i rang bzhin dug /kye ma bdag nyid la rang la 'pho/ /'di brjod dpal sbas mchi ma dang / /bcas pa'i mig la snying rje'i gter/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas gsungs/ /dge slong dge 'dun nyan par byed/ /legs par yi mug ma byed cig /bdag
<p>83a.3</p>yaM bi mu khA sta yi/ /g+ho ra bai ra bi Sha t+ya gA ta na bAsmAn tA pa te pi Shi/ /bA rA Na s+yAM bu rA shrI mAn pra h+ma dat+to b+ha ba ta nr-i paH/ /a b+hU da nu pa mA nA ma ta s+tha pra Na sa mA shri yA/ /su bar+N+Na b+hA sa saM dz+nya s+ya ta ta pu rAn+ta
<p>83a.4</p>cag khyod la phyir ma phyogs/ /'jigs rung khyon gyi dug spangs pas/ /nged la dug gis gnod pa med/ /khyod ni bA rA Na sI ra sngon/ /dpal ldan mi bdag tshangs byin gyur/ /de yi srog dang mnyam pa yi/ /dga' ma dpe med ma zhes pa'o/ /de nas de yi grong khyer mtha'i/ /nags gnas rma
<p>83a.5</p>ba na s+thi teH/ /ra bam+ma yU ra rA dza s+ya sA ka dA thA shr-i No ta/ /sA ta s+ya shap+ta mA kar+N+ya bai re bI NA sra no pa maM/ /ki me ta di ti sa prats+tsha na ra nA thi sa kau tu kA/ /rA dza bad+d+ha nAstasmin+na sti rat+na ts+tsha daM shi khI/ /ma
<p>83a.6</p>bya'i rgyal mo ni/ /gser du snang ba zhes pa'i sgra/ /de yis nam zhig thob par gyur/ /gling bu pi wang gdangs lta bu/ /de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas/ /dge mtshan ldan pa'i 'di ci zhes/ /mi yi mgon la de yis dris/ /rgyal pos smras pa nags mtha' 'dir/ /rin chen sgra ldan rma bya yod/ /gang
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>d+hu raM b+hu ba na byA pi ya s+yai tata kaN+Tha kU dzi taM/ /i ti shru bA No nr-i pa tistat+san+daR+sha na mar+thi taH/ /pre ma pra yat+naiHpre ma s+yA pra ha san bu na ra bra bI ta/ /daR+sha ni durla b+haM mug+d+he tata bi d+hAta b+hU ta rU pi Na/ /
<p>83b.2</p>gis mgrin nas bsgrags pa 'dis/ /'jig rten rnams ni snyan pas khyab/ /de skad smras pa'i mi bdag gis/ /shin tu mdza' sdug rab 'bad pas/ /de mthong don du gnyer ba la/ /rab tu dgod cing yang smras pa/ /de lta'i ngo mtshar gzugs can rnams/ /mdzes ma mthong ba rnyed pa dga'/ /
<p>83b.3</p>ta thA pi ya di ni rban+d+haH kr-i ya te tata pa ri shra maH/ /i t+yUk+t+wA nr-i pa tista s+ya gra ha Na dzA lA dzi bi naH/ /bya sri dzan+tat+saM prA p+tai bi d+hA ya ba d+ha sam+bi diM/ /ba shI kr-i to na be Sh+we ba mo ha dak+ShI pa rIk+Sha yA/ /a nu rA gA ha taHs+t+rI
<p>83b.4</p>de lta na yang 'bad pa na/ /de la yongs su ngal ba bya/ /de skad brjod nas mi bdag gis/ /rgya yis 'tsho ba de gzung phyir/ /ma thob na ni gsod pa dag /yang dag rig par byas nas btang / /yongs su spyod pa'i mig rmongs pas/ /dbang du byas pa mi shes nyid/ /bud med rjes chags kyis bcom
<p>83b.5</p>b+hi ra kArmA N+ya pi kA d+ya te/ /prAp+tA nAM pra Na yAta bat+n+yaHbau d+hA yAHpA da bI Tha tAM/ /IR+Sha yai ba bi na shan+ti d+hI d+h+r-i ti smr-i ti kIrta yaH/ /ta taHshA ku ni kai n+yastAHpA sha ban+d+haH pa de pa de/ /pra b+ha bod+bar+hi
<p>83b.6</p>pas/ /bya ba min pa rnams kyang byed/ /mdza' las ma rungs khyim thob kyi/ /rkang pa'i stegs su gyur rnams kyi/ /blo dang dga' bran grags pa rnams/ /phrag dog gis bzhin rnam par nyams/ /de 'og bya bas gnas gnas su/ /zhags pas bcing ba bkod pa rnams/ /rma bya'i rgyal mo'i
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>rA dza s+ya bya shIR+Yan+ta pa saM ta taH/ /duHkhi tA na yat+na bai pha l+yAta b+hI tAn+n+r-i pa ti sha ba nAta/ /ma yU ra rA dzastAn dr-iSh+TA ka ru NA ku la taM ya yau/ /sa tsin+ta ya da ho b+hI tAHk+Sh+mA pa teHkrU ra shA sa
<p>84a.2</p>mthu yis ni/ /kun tu rnam par chad par gyur/ /'bangs 'bras med las sdug bsngal zhing / /mi bdag bka' yis 'jigs gyur te/ /mthong nas rma bya'i rgyal mo ni/ /snying rje 'khrugs pa nyid du gyur/ /de yis bsams pa kho mo dag /'chings par ma gyur sa bdag
<p>84a.3</p>nAta/ /mad ban+d+hA na bi sam+bA dAd+ba ra kA dzA lA dzI bi naH/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya kr-i pa yA spaSh+Da bA dwi bi sr-i dz+ya tA na/ /nr-i pa mA nA y+Ya tad besh+ma te nai ba sa hi to ya yau/ /sa ta trAn+taHsu re ni t+yaM sa b+hAR+Ye Na maM hI b+hU dzA/ /pU dz+ya
<p>84a.4</p>gi /bka' ni drag po'i 'jigs gyur pa/ /kye ma sdug pa rgya yis 'tsho/ /de ltar bsams nas rnying rje yis/ /gsal bas smras te de btang nas/ /mi bdag bkug ste de'i khyim du/ /de nyid dang ni lhan cig song / /pho brang nang der rtag tu de/ /sa bdag btsun mor bcas pa yis/ /mchod
<p>84a.5</p>mA na pa ri tsa yA u bA sa bi sr-i tA da raH/ /snig+b+ha s+yA mAM bu da te Shu pA lI la ma Ni besh+ma su/ /tsi tra pa tra ru tsA tsakre saM sak+ten+d+ra yu d+ha b+h+ra maM/ /a tha dig dza ya yA tra yaM ka dA tsid ba su d+hA d+hi paH/ /ya yau
<p>84a.6</p>cing yongs su 'dris pa las/ /gus pa rnam par spro zhing gnas/ /mthon mthing nor bu'i khang ba ni/ /'jam ldan chu 'dzin 'od de la/ /'dab ma mdzes bkra dbang po'i gzhung / /chags pa lta bur 'khrul pa byas/ /de nas de yi rim gro la/ /gus dang bcas pas lha mo bskos/ /phyogs
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>ta du ba tsA rA ya de bI mA di sh+ya sA da raH/ /ta tash+tsA nu pa mA de bI pa t+yau yA te bra mA di nI/ /rU pa yau ba na darbAn+d+hA nA lu lo ke ku la s+thi tiM/ /ta ru NaM pre k+Sh+ya rA gi N+yA sta s+yaHkaM darba bi bla be/ /b+hU ya
<p>84b.2</p>las rgyal ba'i bgrod pa la/ /nam zhig sa yi bdag po song / /de nas lha mo dpe med ma/ /bdag po song bas bag med cing / /gzugs dang lang tsho'i dregs pas long / /rigs kyi lugs ni mthong ma gyur/ /gzhon nu 'bangs la chags ldan ma/ /'dod pas rnam par bslad ma de'i/ /ngo tsha shin tu
<p>84b.3</p>pa laM b+ha b+hI te ba ladz+dzA dU ra ta raM ya yau/ /ma li naHku Di lastIk+Sh+NaHkar+Na saM spaR+sha no tsi taH/ /tsa ba lash+tsa pa lAk+ShI nAM su dr-i shAM sa dr-i shaHkra maH/ /bi bo d+haun+ma da kA ri N+yaHsaM sA ra ma ka rA ka re/ /tsa ran+ti prA Na hA ri N+yaH
<p>84b.4</p>ring song ste/ /yang yang dmigs pas 'jigs pa bzhin/ /dri ma ldan zhing gya gyu rno/ /rna ba dag la reg par bzod/ /g.yo ba g.yo ba'i mig can dang / /mig ni legs pa rim pa mtshungs/ /'khor ba chu srin 'byung gnas su/ /rnam pa mang pos myos byed cing / /srog 'phrog nag po brtsegs pa
<p>84b.5</p>kA la kU Da ts+tsha dAHs+t+ri yaH/ /ku su mA ta su ku mA ra s+ya kru ra s+ya ka ka tsA da pi/ /ko dzA nA ti pa rits+tsha daM stI NAM tsi tra s+ya tsa ta saH/ /ba hu rak+tI phri yAM kaN+The kr-i twA ye yAn+t+ri ni r+b+r-i ti/ /shI ta lAM bi ma lAM snag+d+hiM
<p>84b.6</p>yi/ /ri mo bud med rnam pa rgyu/ /me tog pas kyang shin tu 'jam/ /sog le bas kyang shin tu rtsub/ /bud med sems ni bkra ba dag /su yis yongs su gcod pa shes/ /mang chags dga' mas mgu byas nas/ /gang gi dga' bar bgrod byed de/ /bsil zhing dri med 'jam pa yis/ /
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>khaD+ga d+hA rAM pi bin+ta te/ /sA tsin+ta yata s+thi tiM sha l+ya ma yaM man+taHpu re ma ma/ /ma yU ra rA dzaHshI la dz+nyaHpu rU ShA lA pa beSh+Ti taH/ /ka tha yi Shu t+ya ba sh+yaM me br-it+ta me Sha ma hI pa teH/ /ni swaM
<p>85a.2</p>ral gri'i rno rgyun 'thung bar byed/ /des bsams bdag gi pho brang na/ /rma bya'i rgyal mo tshul khrims shes/ /skyes bu'i lugs bzhin kun brjod pa/ /zug rngu 'di ni gnas par gyur/ /bdag gi spyod 'di sa bdag la/ /gdon mi za bar 'chad par 'gyur/ /las ni
<p>85a.3</p>karma kr-i taM tA ba dA d+hA nA kiM ka ro mya haM/ /A s+thoM pa re dz+nyi ta dz+nya hI marma dz+nyo sau bi dag+d+ha d+hIH/ /dzA tA me kr-i ta pA pA yAHshaM kA ni sh+tsi ta ne Sh+wa pe/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya sA ta s+ya bi ShaM b+ho dza naM da dau/ /rA ga mat+tAHkha lA
<p>85a.4</p>smad 'os re zhig byas/ /da ni bdag gis ci zhig bya/ /'di ni gnas shes mchog gi blo/ /pha rol zur gyis 'dzin lta zhig /bdag gis byas pa'i sdig pa yis/ /dogs pa sems med rnams la'ang skye/ /de ltar bsams nas de yis ni/ /de la dug ldan bza' ba byin/ /chags myos mi bsrun
<p>85a.5</p>yat+tAH kiM kiM kur+b+ban+ti na s+t+ri yaH/ /te yo pA tsaR+Ya mA Na s+ya pa bi SheHpA na b+ho dza ne/ /bi br-id+d+hA bar+hi rA dza s+ya ru ru tse ru tsi rA ru tsiH/ /swa s+tha mA lokya taM di bI ra ha s+yod+b+he da saM kaM tA/ /sha naiHsho ka ma
<p>85a.6</p>dbang gyur pa'i/ /bud med ci dang ci mi byed/ /de yis nye bar sbyar ba yi/ /bza' dang btung ba dug ldan gyis/ /rma bya'i rgyal mo rnam rgyas shing / /mdangs bzang yid 'ong mdzes par gyur/ /lha mos rnal nas de mthong nas/ /gsang ba rab mched dogs pa yis/ /dal bu dal bus mya ngan
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>ya gra pA trastA ta t+yA dza dzI bi taM/ /e baM ta s+ya bi She NA pi nai pa glA ni ra dzA ya ta/ /ma hA tAM tsit+ta bai ma l+yaM ni rbi Shi ku ru te bi ShaM/ /rA gau bi ShaM bi ShaM mo ho dwe Sha sh+tsa bi Sha maM bi ShaM/ /bu d+d+ho d+harma sta thA saM g+haH
<p>85b.2</p>gyi/ /nad kyis bzung nas srog btang gyur/ /de ltar de yi dug gis kyang / /nad dang ldan pa nyid ma gyur/ /chen po rnams kyi sems yangs pa/ /dug gis dug med nyid du bgyid/ /'dod chags dug yin gti mug dug /zhe sdang dag kyang mi bzad dug /sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du/
<p>85b.3</p>sa t+yaM tsa pa ra mA mr-i taM/ /g+ho raM bi ShaM sr-i dza ti mo ha ma hAm+bu rA shi g+ho raM bi ShaM sr-i dza ti rA ga ma ho rA gash+tsa/ /g+ho raM bi ShaM sr-i dza ti bai ra ba nA ba nish+tsa dzan+ma kra mo sti bi Sha ma s+ya bi Sha pe nA n+yeH/ /
<p>85b.4</p>dge 'dun bden pa bdud rtsi'i mchog /gti mug chu tshogs chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro/ /chags pa'i ltos 'gro chen po 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro/ /sdang ba'i nags kyi phreng ba 'jigs su rung ba'i dug rnams spro/ /mi bzad dug rnams skye ba'i rim pa gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /
<p>85b.5</p>d+har+m+ma kA ma kri ta bA nai ba me bA n+yA dzan+ma ni/ /shrI gup+tog+ni khA dAM saM pi ta s+yA b+hUta sa ta s+yak+ti nI/ /i t+yuk+t+wa b+ha ga bAn sa myak+ka ru NA lo kA nAM bu b+hiH/ /tsa kA ra bI ta ra dza saM shrI gup+ta shAs non+mu khaM/ /ka li
<p>85b.6</p>'di bzhin skye ba gzhan la yang / /dpal sbas kyis ni me yi dong / /chos ni 'dod ma de la byas/ /de yang 'phral la pad ldan gyur/ /de skad brjod nas bcom ldan 'das/ /yang dag snying rjes gzigs pa'i chus/ /bstan pa dag la mngon phyogs pa'i/ /dpal sbas rdul dang bral ba byas/ /de nas dpal
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>ku sha laHshrI gup+to tha pra kA sha ba dAp+ta ye sha ra Na ga ma nA n+ye ba trI Ni sma ran bi ma la smr-i tiH/ /dzi na pa ri tsa yAta pu N+ya le b+he ba tAM hi lo ka naM b+ha ba ti ma ha te ka l+yA NA ya pra mo da su khA ya tsa/ /
<p>86a.2</p>sbas dge ba shes pas rab tu gsal ba'i gnas thob phyir/ /dri med dran pas skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nyid dran gyis gzhan ma yin/ /rgyal dang yongs su 'dris pas bsod nams 'thob ste gang phyir dam pa rnams/ /mthong bar gyur pa dge ba che dang rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i slad/ /
<p>86a.3</p>shrI gub+ta s+ya ni kA ra kilbi Sha dzu Sho pyA dz+nyA na mo hA pa haHkr-i twA ba sh+ya ma nu gra he Na b+ha ga bA na kA ru N+yod+Ya taH/ /b+hIk+Shu NAM b+ha ba saM k+Sha yA ya bi da d+he ni rbai ra tA shA sa naM ye nai ta na b+ha ban+ti ban+d+ha b+ha
<p>86a.4</p>mi shes rmongs pa sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje bsod nams la brtson pas/ /gnod byed sdig pa bsten pa'i dpal sbas kyang ni 'bad pas rjes su bzung byas nas/ /'ching ba'i khang par yang srid 'dud pa 'di dag rnams su gang gis mi 'gyur ba/ /srid pa yang dag gzhi la slad dge slong
<p>86a.5</p>ba ne b+hU yo b+ha ba gran+thA ya/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM shrI gup+tA ba dA na ma Sh+Ta ma pal+la baH// //d+ha n+yA nA ma shi baM bi b+harti shu b+ha tAM b+ha
<p>86a.6</p>rnams la kho na dang bral ba'i bstan pa bsgrubs/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dpang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dpal sbas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste brgyad pa'o// //skal ldan rnams la mi shes pa ni legs pa'i
<p>86a.7</p>bar 'dir 'bad pa'i skad dod yig 'bru gsum chad ba ma dpe rnams las ma rnyed par a pa sh+yaM gyi a shwa dang mtshams sbyar sh+yaM gyi klad skor ma srog med la a nu'i a drangs pa'i dngos bstan pa sh+ya ma'i 'bru gsum po 'di 'dar los gsar du bcug pa rgya dpe rnyed na dpyad/
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>bya swa b+ha bod+d+ha ba mUr+khA NI ku sha laM pra yA t+ya hi ta tA mi t+ye Sha lak+Sh+maHkra maH/ /nI shI g+han+ti mi rAn+d+h+ya mau Sha d+hi ba na s+yA t+yan+ta kAn+ti pra da me dats+tsau lu ka kU la dr-iSh+Ta ha ta ye sarba tra me tram+ma haH/ /pu ra
<p>86b.2</p>rang bzhin las byung dge nyid gyur/ /rmongs pa rnams la dge ba mi phan nyid 'gyur ba'i ni rim pa 'di yis mtshon/ /mtshan phyed smag rum mun pa sman gyi nags la mchog tu mdzes pa rab tu ster/ /gang yang nyi ma'i gzi byin 'ug pa'i rigs kyi mig ni kun tu nyams par byed/ /sa
<p>86b.3</p>rA dza gr-i hA b+hi khye bim+bi sA ra s+ya b+hU pa teH/ /a b+hUta pau ra su b+ha drA khyAHpa ri pUr+Na gr-i ha s+thi teH/ /mau r+kh+yAta mo ha pra pal+la s+ya sarba daR+sha na bi dwi ShaH/ /ta s+ya k+Sha pa Na ke Sh+we ba ba b+hU bA b+h+yA b+hi ka da raH/ /ta s+ya
<p>86b.4</p>bdag gzugs can snying po yi/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces pa/ /rab bzang zhes pa'i grong khyer ba/ /yongs rdzogs khyim na gnas pa byung / /lta ba kun la rnam sdang zhing / /gti mug rab tu rgyas pa des/ /rmongs las zad byed pa nyid la/ /mngon par gus pa lhag par gyur/ /de yi chung
<p>86b.5</p>pa t+ya ba twi nA ma dzA yA ti dza na shA li nI/ /gar+b+he mA d+ha tu pUr+Nen+du bim+baM pau rAn+da ri ba di ka / ka lan+da ka ni bA bA khyA be Nu kA na na saM shra yaH/ /ka dA tsi ta b+ha ga bAn bud+d+ha prAp+taHpiN+DA ya tad gr-i haM/ /pU dzAM sa
<p>86b.6</p>mtsho rigs can/ /bden ldan ma zhes bya ba yis/ /mngal bzung zla ba nya ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs kyi bzhin/ /ka lan dka'i gnas zhes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal du yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsod snyoms la/ /nam zhig de yi khang par gshegs/ /de ni chung mar
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>b+hAR+ya kr-i twAsmai pa taM sa prats+tsha sA da raH/ /gar+b+he s+thi ta ma pa t+yaM lata ki rU paM ta b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /sau ba data saM pa daM b+hu dz+ya pu traste di bya mA nu ShiM/ /pra bra dz+ya yA shA sa ne me saM yuk+to muk+ti me Sh+ya ti/ /yA ti b+ha
<p>87a.2</p>bcas pa yis/ /de la mchod byas gus bcas pas/ /bu ni mngal na gnas gang de/ /ci yi gzugs 'gyur de la dris/ /de yis bka' stsal khyod kyi bu/ /lha mi'i phun sum tshogs spyad nas/ /nga yi bstan la rab byung nas/ /yang dag ldan pas grol bar 'gyur/ /de skad gsal
<p>87a.3</p>ga ba ti spaSh+Ta mi t+yA di sh+ya ni dza shra maM/ /a b+h+yA ya yau gr-i ha pa ter+b+hU ri kaHk+Sha pa No gr-i haM/ /b+ha ga bta b+hU Shi taM tad+tu su b+ha dre Na ni be di tuM/ /shru twA k+Sha pa Na kaHk+Shi praM ma b+hUta dwe ShA bi ShA ku laH/ /ga Na yi
<p>87a.4</p>bar bka' stsal nas/ /bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs/ /khyim bdag khang par zad byed pa/ /b+hu ri ka ni mngon par 'ongs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de/ /rab bzang gis ni smras par gyur/ /zad byed pas thos myur bar ni/ /khong khro'i dug gis 'khrugs par gyur/ /shin tu yun
<p>87a.5</p>twA sa su tsi raM gra ha dz+nyA na kr-i ta sh+ya yaH/ /yaM de bok+taM b+ha ga ba tA prash+ne pa shan+ta thA bi d+haM/ /so tsin+ta ye da ho sa t+ya muk+tan+te na na paM sha yaH/ /tata pra b+ha bo pa ma dA ya kin+s+wa sa t+yaM ba dA mya haM/ /ta s+ya
<p>87a.6</p>ring des brtsis nas/ /ngal bas gza' ni shes byas te/ /dris lan bcom ldan gyis gsungs gang / /de lta'i rnam pa kho nar mthong / /des bsams kye ma the tshom dag /med par de yis bden par brjod/ /'on kyang de yis smras pa'i dngos/ /gzhil slad bdag ni mi bden brjod/ /bdag gi
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>sarba dz+nya tAM bit+ti su b+ha dro ya di mata gi rA/ /ta de Sha k+Sha pa Na shrad+d+hAM t+yak+t+ya ti shra ma NA da rAta/ /i ti saM tsi t+ya pA maR+shaHsa su b+ha dra ma b+hA Sha ta/ /a sa t+yame tata ka thi taM te na sarba dz+nya mA ni nA/ /ma ru Sh+yaHka
<p>87b.2</p>tshig gis rab bzang gis/ /gal te kun mkhyen de rig na/ /de las dge sbyong la gus 'dis/ /zad byed la dad gtong bar 'gyur/ /de ltar bsams nas khro ldan pa/ /de yis rab bzang dag la smras/ /kun mkhyen nga rgyal can de yis/ /'di dag mi bden pa nyid brjod/ /lha yi phun tshogs/
<p>87b.3</p>tha mAsno ti de bAr+hA di bya baM ba daM/ /pra bra dz+yA kiM tu pa t+ye ba kartun+te nA s+yA tsin+ti tA/ /k+ShI NaHk+Shu du pa tap+to tsA ya s+ya nAs+t+ya n+ya to ga tiH/ /ta s+ya ta s+ya su b+hik+ShAr+haM sha ra NaM shra ma Na bra taM/ /pa sh+yA mya haM gr-i ha pa
<p>87b.4</p>lha la 'os/ /mi yis ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ /'on te rab byung ldan nyid na/ /de yi 'di ni bsam par bya/ /dbul dang ltogs pas gdungs pa'am/ /gang la 'tsho thabs gzhan med pa/ /skya rgyal 'os pa de de yis/ /skyabs ni dge sbyong brtul zhugs yin/ /khyim bdag bdag gis mthong ba
<p>87b.5</p>te bra mA NaM ya di mang+ba tsaH/ /pra t+yA tA yaM shi shurdzA taHku laM saM tA pa yi Sh+ya ti/ /i t+yu dIR+ya k+Sha pa Na ke pA te gr-i ha pa ti sh+tsi raM/ /bi tsAR+ya bi da d+he tAM tAM yuk+tiM gar+b+ha ni pA ta ne/ /ya dA dra bya pra yo ge ShA nai
<p>87b.6</p>ni/ /gal te bdag gi tshig tshad na/ /bzlog par byis pa 'di skyes pas/ /rigs ni yongs su gdung bar 'gyur/ /'di brjod zad byed pa song tshe/ /khyim bdag gis ni yun ring du/ /rnam par dpyad nas mngal ltung slad/ /sbyor ba de dang de dag bsgrubs/ /gang tshe rdzas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mngal ni
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>ba gar+b+he pa ri ts+yu taH/ /ta dA s+yai pat+nI ma ba d+hI de kAn+te ha Tha marda naiH/ /ta taHshI ta ba naM ta s+yAM sh+ma shA naM te na pA pe na/ /pra pe tA yAM k+Sha pa NA kastad+bAr+t+tA nan+di ta dza guH/ /a ho ba tA bo sarba dz+nyaHshi
<p>88a.2</p>yongs su ma g.yos nyid/ /de tshe 'di yis bden par ni/ /chung ma drag pos mnyes te bsad/ /de nas sdig can de yis de/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du/ /rab tu bskyal tshe zad byed pa/ /de yis gtam thos dga' nas smras/ /a ho kye ma kun mkhyen 'dis/ /byis pa
<p>88a.3</p>sho sa t+yaM ta duk+ta bA na/ /sai yaM sU no ra dzA te s+yA dza na nI pany+tsa tAM ma tA/ /i yaM sA shrIHshi sho di Sh+yAn+te nok+tA di bya ma nu Shi/ /i yaM tsa sA s+ya pra bra dz+yA yat+kuk+Shau ni d+ha naM ga taH/ /i te te ShaM pra ba de na so pa hA me na sarba haH/ /sh+ma shA
<p>88a.4</p>la brjod de bden ldan/ /bu ni ma skyes ma dag ni/ /lnga pa nyid gyur 'di de yin/ /de yis brjod pa'i byis pa yis/ /lha mi'i dpal mchog de ni 'di/ /'di yi rab byung de yang 'di/ /gang zhig dkur ni shi gyur pa'o/ /de skad de dag rab smra zhing / /nye bar dgod pas thams cad ni/ /dur khrod blta
<p>88a.5</p>na daR+sha nA yai ba ba b+hU ba dza na saM ga maH/ /a trAn+ta re di bya dr-i shA b+hA ga bAn b+hU ta b+hA ba naH/ /sar+b+baM bi dz+nyA ya tad+bud+d+haHpra da d+h+yau pa smi taHk+Sha NaM/ /a ho mo hA nu ban+d+he na dU ra s+thai ra pi de hi nAM/ /A lo
<p>88a.6</p>ba kho na'i phyir/ /skye bo yang dag 'dus par gyur/ /skabs der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'byung po dgongs pas lha yi ni/ /spyan gyis de skad kun mkhyen nas/ /'dzum pa dang ldan skad cig bsams/ /kye ma gti mug gis bcings pas/ /rmongs pa ring du gnas pas kyang / /lus can
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>kash+tshA d+ya ta mUr+khairme g+hai ri ba kA ri b+hiH/ /shu b+haM k+Sha ya pa ya tA te na k+Sha pa Ne na sa mug+d+ha d+hIH/ /a ho gr-i ha pa ti pA pA da kAR+ya ma pi kA ri taH/ /i ti saMrtsin+d+ya b+ha ga bAn swa yaM b+hik+Shu ga Nair+b+r-i taH/ /ya yau shI ta ba naM/
<p>88b.2</p>rnams la snang ba sgrib/ /sprin gyi rnam par 'gyur bas bzhin/ /kye ma dge ba zad byed pa'i/ /zad byed pa de sdig pa las/ /khyim bdag dman pa'i blo can las/ /bya ba min pa byed du bcug /ces bsams snying rje rab rgyas pa'i/ /bcom ldan rang nyid dge slong gi /tshogs kyis bskor nas
<p>88b.3</p>k+Shi praM sh+ma shA naM ka ru NA ku laH/ /sh+ma shA na tsA ri kAM dz+nyA twA rA dzA b+ha ga ba taHswa yaM/ /biM bi swa raHsa hA myA t+yaistA ne ba b+hU ba mA ya yau/ /ta taHsa ta tra dzA yA yAM naM k+Ship+tA yaM tsi tA na le/ /ku k+ShiM b+hi twAm+pu dzA pI naHshi
<p>88b.4</p>myur bar ni/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod gshegs/ /bcom ldan rang nyid dur khrod na/ /rgyu ba shes nas rgyal po ni/ /gzugs can snying po blon dang bcas/ /sa de nyid du 'ongs par gyur/ /de 'og rab bzang chung ma ni/ /sreg pa'i me la bcug pa dang / /chu skyes la gnas byis pa dag /dku brtol
<p>88b.5</p>shuHsuR+Ya i bod+Ya yau/ /dzA li tA na la mad+h+ya s+thaM taM kash+tsin+nA gra hId+Ya dA/ /ta da dza na sa mU ha s+ya hA hA kA rau ma hA na b+hu ta/ /ta ta s+thaM paM tra mA bid+d+hA ta tiHsu ga ta sha sa nAta/ /ku mA ra b+h+r-i t+yo dza grA ha dzI bA khya ku mA ra/ /
<p>88b.6</p>nyi ma bzhin du 'thon/ /me 'bar dbus na gnas pa de/ /gang tshe sus kyang ma blangs pa/ /de tshe skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /hA hA zhes pa chen por gyur/ /de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i bkas/ /'tsho byed ces pa'i gzhon nu bsos/ /rmongs pa lta bu rang 'gro yis/ /gzhon nu 'od ldan de blangs gyur/ /
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>dzi nA ba lo ka ne nai ba bA la ka gra ha Na k+Sha Ne/ /a b+hUts+tsi tA na lan+ta s+ya ha ri tsan+da na shI ta lAH/ /dzI ban+taM dz+wa la nAn+muk+taM ru tsi raM bIk+Sh+ya dA ra kaM/ /bai lak+Sh+ye Na k+Sha pa Na kAHk+Sha NaM tas+thu mr-i tA i ba/ /ta taH
<p>89a.2</p>rgyal bas gzigs pa nyid kyis ni/ /byis pa rab tu len pa'i tshe/ /ro sreg me dag de la ni/ /ha ri tsan+dan ltar bsil gyur/ /byis pa 'tsho zhing me las grol/ /rab tu mdzes pa mthong gyur nas/ /skyengs pas zad byed pa rnams ni/ /skad cig shi ba bzhin du gnas/ /de nas
<p>89a.3</p>su b+ha draM b+ha ga bAn sarba b+hu ta hi te ra taH/ /ba b+hA She bisma yota b+h+rAn+taM pu tro yaM gr-i h+ya tA mi ti/ /sa tu do lA ku la ma tiHkiM ka ro mI ti saM sha yAta/ /k+Sha pa NA nA+oM mu khA n+ye ba shik+ShA yai k+Sha Na mai k+Sh+ya ta/ /te ta
<p>89a.4</p>rab bzang ya mtshan gyis/ /rnam par 'khrul la bcom ldan 'das/ /'byung po kun phan la dgyes pas/ /bu 'di blang bar gyis zhes gsungs/ /de yang the tshom dag las blo/ /ci bya snyam pa'i khyogs la 'phyang / /zad byed rnams kyis bzhin dag la/ /bslab pa'i slad du skad cig bltas/ /de la
<p>89a.5</p>mU tsu na bA lo yaM grA h+yaHsh+ma shA na bah+ni dzaH/ /ya trA yaM tiSh+Tha ta byak+taM na b+ha ba t+ye ba tang+g+r-i hi/ /i ti de ShAM gi ra mUr+khaHsa dza grA ha na taM ya ta/ /ta dA k+Shi ti pa t+tirbA la mA da de dzi na shA sa nAta/ /dzo tirma D+h+yA dA bAp+ta
<p>89a.6</p>des smras dur khrod kyi/ /me skyes byis pa 'di mi blangs/ /gsal bar gang du 'di gnas pa/ /de khyim brlag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de skad de dag tshig gis de/ /rmongs pas gang tshe de ma blangs/ /de tshe rgyal ba'i bka' yis ni/ /sa yi bdag pos byis pa blangs/ /me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>s+yate ShAM sa dri sha twa Sha/ /dz+yo ti dza i ti nA mA s+ya tsa kA ra b+ha ga bAn swa yaM/ /ta s+ya bra bar+d+ha mA na s+ya b+hU bA la b+ha ba ne shi shoH/ /de shAnA ra ga taHkA le mA tu laHsa mu pA ya yau/ /sa bi di twA swa su br-it+taM ni d+ha ne pu tra
<p>89b.2</p>gsal bas de rnams bar khyab pas/ /de yi ming ni me skyes zhes/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis mdzad par gyur/ /sa skyong khang par byis pa ni/ /rab tu bskyed par gyur pa de'i/ /zhang po yul gzhan song ba dag /dus kyis yang dag 'ongs par gyur/ /de yis sring mo shi ba dang / /bu skyes spyod tshul rig gyur
<p>89b.3</p>s+ya t+ye ShAM sogs phyed snga ma'i rkang pa gnyis pa'i bod skad mi 'dug pa za hor ban+des bsgyur ba slang ma dpe rnyed na dpyad/
<p>89b.4</p>dzam+ni/ /ko pAta su b+ha dra ma b+h+ye t+ya kaM ba mA naHsa ma b+h+ya d+hA ta/ /mUr+kha k+Sha pa Na b+hak+te na tata gi rA ha ta yo Shi tA/ /twa yA t+yak+ta swa pu tre Na kin+nA ma su kr-i ta kr-i taM/ /nish+tse ta nAHswa b+ha be na pa ra maM tra pa mut+thi tAH/ /ha san+to
<p>89b.5</p>nas/ /khro bas 'dar zhing mngon phyogs te/ /rab bzang la ni yang dag smos/ rmongs pa zad byed la gus shing / /de yi tshig gis chung ma bsad/ /khyod kyis rang gi bu dor na/ /legs byas ming ni ci zhig byas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni sems med cing / /gzhan gyi sngags kyis kun tu slad/ /skye bo ngan pa
<p>89b.6</p>pe bi ni g+h+ran+ti be tA DA i ba durdza naH/ /a d+hu nai ba na gr-ih+NA pi ya di ra dza gr-i hAta su taM/ /tat+te s+t+rI ba b+ha mung+g+hu Sh+ya kA ra yA myar+thaM ni gra hi/ /i t+yuk+taste tata b+hI t+yA pa b+hU pa ti gr-i hAta su taM/ /A ni nA tsi rAta muk+ta
<p>89b.7</p>dgod na yang / /rnam par 'joms byed ro langs bzhin/ /gal te rgyal po'i khab nas bu/ /da lta nyid du mi len na/ /bud med bsad pa bsgrags nas de/ /khyod nor chad pas gcod du 'jug /de yis de skad brjod pa des/ /'jigs nas sa bdag khab nas bu/ /len du bcug pas sa bdag ni/ /
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>ma kA me na ma hI b+hu dze/ /ta taHsu b+ha dre kA le na kA la s+ya ba sha mA ga te/ /a b+hUta ni d+hirbi b+hU tI nAM dz+yo tiSh+kAr+k+ka i ba twi ShAM/ /ar+thi kalpa dru maHprA pya sam+pa daM di bya mA nu ShAM/ /sa bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+ha
<p>90a.2</p>'dod dang ldan pas ring nas gtad/ /de nas rab bzang dus kyis ni/ /dus kyi dbang du song bar gyur/ /me skyes rnam par 'byor pa'i gter/ /'od kyis nyi ma bzhin du gyur/ /slong ba rnams kyi dpag bsam shing / /lha mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
<p>90a.3</p>Shu sha ra N+ye Sh+wa ka ra ro ma tiM/ /tata b+hak+tu pa na taM di bya rat+na saM tsa ya mad b+hu taM/ /pa da dau b+hi k+Shu saM g+he b+h+yaHpu N+ya rat+na rdza nod+Ya taH/ /tas+ya de ba ni kA ye b+h+yaHsAsh+tsaR+YA bi bi d+har+d+wa yaH/ /swa ya me bA ya yUrbesh+ma
<p>90a.4</p>'dun gyi/ /skyabs la de yi blo gros byas/ /de la gus pas nyer bskrun pa/ /rmad byung lha yi rin chen tshogs/ /bsod nams rin chen sgrub brtson des/ /dge slong dge 'dun rnams la phul/ /chu gter cher ni chu bo bzhin/ /de lta'i khyim du lha'i ris las/ /rnam mang phun tshogs ngo mtshar
<p>90a.5</p>ma ho da d+hi mi bA pa gAH/ /tr-i Ne rat+ne tsa pa ma d+hIr+b+ha ga bAn bi tad+b+r-i he/ /tsakra ta da nu ro d+ho na rat+na sA tra pa ri gra hi/ /sa di bya bas+t+ra yu ga laM ya sha sA mu pa mA k+Sha maM/ /prA pa pu N+ya pa na krI taM ni dzaM gI la
<p>90a.6</p>can/ /rang nyid kho na 'ongs par gyur/ /de yi khyim du bcom ldan 'das/ /rtswa dang rin chen mtshungs blos kyang / /de yi ngor ni rin po che'i/ /snod ni yongs su bzung bar mdzad/ /des ni lha yi gos zung dag /rang gi khyim bzhin dri ma med/ /grags pa rnams kyi dper bzod pa/ /bsod nams zong
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>mi bA ma laM/ /ka dA tsi da tha tad bas+t+raM snA nAr+d+raM n+yasta mA ta pe/ /sa mI ra Ne nA pa hr-i taM n+ya pa tata mUr+d+h+ni b+hU pa teH/ /bi lo kyA pUr+b+ba tu tsi raM dz+yo tiSh+ka s+ya ta daM shu kaM /di byashrI bi smi to rA dzA tri NaM me ne ni dza shri
<p>90b.2</p>gis myos nas thob/ /de nas nam zhig de yis gos/ /bkrus nas brlan pa nyi 'od bkod/ /yang dag g.yo bas rab bskyod nas/ /sa yi bdag po'i spyi bor lhung / /me skyes de yi gos dag ni/ /sngon med rab mdzes mthong gyur nas/ /lha yi dpal la ya mtshan pa'i/ /rgyal po rang dpal rtsa bzhin
<p>90b.3</p>yaM/ /b+hok+tuM ni man+t+ri taHprA pya ta s+ya rat+na ma yaM gr-i haM/ /nr-i pa tiHswarga mA dz+nyA sI dz+yo tiSh+ka b+ha ba nes+thi taH/ /a tha kA le na b+hU pA laHpu tre NA dzA ta sha trA NA/ /ts+tshad+ma lA rA dz+ya lub+d+he na d+harma shi lo ni pA ti taH/ /
<p>90b.4</p>sems/ /zas la mgron gnyer mi yi bdag /me skyes khyim na gnas pas de'i/ /rin chen rang bzhin khang pa dag /mthong nas mtho ris yin par sems/ /de nas dus kyis sa skyong ni/ /chos kyi ngang tshul ma skyes dgra/ /bu ni rgyal srid la chags pa'i/ /g.yo yis nges par bkrongs par gyur/ /
<p>90b.5</p>a tI te sad gu Ne rAdz+nyi tasmin kr-i ta yu go pa mo/ /a d+harma i ba ba prA pa rA dz+yaM rA dza ba rAta ma dzaH/ /sa b+hU b+h+r-id+durla b+haM dr-iSh+T+wA dz+yo tiSh+ka s+ya gr-i he shri yaM/ /ta mu bA tsa se ma b+h+ye t+ya ma ta pi trA twaM bi bar+d+hi taH/ /b+h+ya tA ta bA
<p>90b.6</p>rgyal po yon tan dam pa can/ /rdzogs ldan lta bu de 'das tshe/ /rgyal po mchog gi bu de yis/ /chos min bzhin du rgyal srid thob/ /me skyes dag gi khyim gyi dpal/ /sa bdag la dkon des mthong nas/ /yang dag mngon par song ste smras/ /khyod ni pha mas rnam par bsos/ /khyod dang pha spun
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>haM d+har+m+meN bi b+ha bAr+d+haM pra yats+tsha me/ /na tse b+hA ga d+ha na dro hAta ka li re ba pra dzA ya te/ /i t+yuk+teste na kau Ti l+yAta dz+yau tiSh+kaHkrU ra kA ri NA/ /rat+na pUr+Ni gr-i ha ta smin da twA pra yAta pa raM gr-i haM/ /sA di bya rat+na ru
<p>91a.2</p>chos dag gis/ /'byor pa phyed ni bdag la stsol/ /gal te min na nor skal la/ /'khu las rtsod pa nyid rab skye/ /gya gyus sdang bar byed pa des/ /de skad brjod pas me skyes ni/ /khang pa rin chen gyis gang ba/ /de la byin nas khyim gzhan song / /lha yi rin chen yid 'phrog
<p>91a.3</p>tsi ra s+phi tA lo ko pa kA ri NI/ /dz+yo tiSh+kA me pA nu ya yau shrIHpra ti b+he ba di bA ka raM/ /pu n+yastak+tA pi bA sam+pata sap+ta kr-i twaHpra b+hA ba tI/ /dz+yo tiSh+ka ma spr-iSh+Ta nr-i ba sA d+h+rI ba ti mi ba ya yau/ /sarba thA ha ra Nod+Yu k+taM da
<p>91a.4</p>rgyas/ /'jig rten phan byed dpal 'byor de/ /me skyes kho na'i rjes su 'brang / /nyin mor byed la 'od zer bzhin/ /yang yang me skyes kyis spangs kyang / /phun tshogs de ni lan bdun du/ /me skyes can song mi bdag gis/ /ma reg chung ma khyo can bzhin/ /chom rkun la sogs rigs pa yis/ /
<p>91a.5</p>s+yu tsau tA di yuk+ti b+hiH/ /dz+yo tiSh+kaHku pi ta dz+nyA twA ni rbir+NaHsa ma tsin+ta yata/ /a pu N+ya pa ri pA ke na pra dzA nAM dza na ko pa maH/ /sAM yA ta smr-i te she Sha twaM rA dzA bAt+pa l+ya pe sha laH/ /kau n+yastata sa dr-i shosmin+nir+b+ya
<p>91a.6</p>rnam pa kun tu 'phrog brtson cing / /khros par shes nas me skyes ni/ /yid byung gyur pas yang dag bsams/ /skye rgu'i bsod nams ma yin pa/ /yongs su smin pas pha lta bu/ /rgyal po mnyes gshin yangs pa ni/ /dran pa'i lhag ma nyid du gyur/ /'di na zol med drang po la/ /skye rgu
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>dza sha ra le pra dzAH/ /pi ta ri ba k-i tA shwA paHsu kha rA tri Shu she ra te/ /d+ha ni nas+t+r-i Na bta prA byAHpra pyan+te rat+na bad bu d+hAH/ /a mr-i tA da pi duHprA paHsau dza n+ya sha ra lo dza naH/ /nIr+b+ya dza pai dag+d+h+ya dzu ShA ma mug+d+ha sha ra
<p>91b.2</p>dbugs phyung pha ma bzhin/ /mtshan mo bde bar nyal byed pa/ /de dang mtshungs pa gzhan pa su/ /nor ldan rtswa bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /blo gros rin chen bzhin du thob/ /skye bo dam pa drang po ni/ /bdud rtsi bas kyang rnyed pa dka'/ /zol min mkhas pas bsten pa dang / /rmongs min drang po'i
<p>91b.3</p>lAt+ma nAM/ /a nud+d+ha ton+na tA nAM tsa bi ra laM dzan+ma tA dr-i shAM/ /a d+hu nA dwe Sha dur+b+r-it+taHpra br-it+ta ni kr-i ti nr-i paH/ /pA pa pA ke na lo kA nA ma kA li ka li rA ga taH/ /mi tre dza ga ti yA testaM tasmin b+hA swa ti b+hU pa
<p>91b.4</p>bdag nyid dang / /ma brtsigs mthon po nyid dag kyang / /de ltar skyes pa shin tu nyung / /da ni mi bdag zhe sdang gis/ /tshul ngan gnod byed la rab zhugs/ /'jig rten rnams kyi sdig smin gnas/ /dus min rtag tu rtsod ldan 'ongs/ /'gro bar sa bdag 'od ldan pa/ /bshes gnyen de ni nub pa'i
<p>91b.5</p>tau/ /do Sho da yaHpra br-id+d+ho ya man+d+ha kA ra ya tat+su taH/ /nU naM pa tA ma tI tA nAM niSh+kA ra Na su hrita kha laH/ /yad br-it+ta pa raHb+hA ge na ya shaste ShAM pra kA sha te/ /tasmA di yaM pa ri t+ya dz+yA nr-i pa t+ya d+hiSh+Thi tA ma hI/ /
<p>91b.6</p>tshe/ /de sras skyon skyed mtshan mo ni/ /mun pa'i slad du rab tu rgyas/ /mi bsrun dam pa 'das rnams kyis/ /rgyu med snying sdug yin nam snyam/ /gang zhig spyod tshul gzhan cha las/ /grags pa de dag rab gsal byed/ /de slad mi bdag ngan pa yis/ /byin brlabs sa 'di yongs gtang 'os/ /
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>kA le ka lau k+Shi tI she tsa dza nA nAM dzI bi taM ku taH/ /ba ra pa ri tsa yo dA rA dA rAHsa tAM gu NA nAM gu NAHku la ma bi ka laM b+ha byA b+hU tiR+Ya shaHsha shi san+ni b+haM/ /s+thi ti sa mu tsi
<p>92a.2</p>rtsod ldan dus kyi sa dbang la/ /skye bo rnams ni ga la 'tsho/ /mchog tu yongs 'dris yid 'ong chung ma dam pa rnams kyis rab sbyangs yon tan dang / /'chol pa min pa'i rigs dang legs ldan sa bdag ri bong can mtshungs grags pa dang / /lugs la yang dag
<p>92a.3</p>taM pr-it+taM bit+t+raM ni mit+ta ma nA pa dAM gu Na pa ti nr-i pe sarbaM b+ha ba t+ya bi paM Sh+Shu laM/ /d+harma dru ma s+ya d+ha na mU la sa murga ta s+ya ni rdo Sha kA ma ku su ma prA pa ro dz+wa la s+ya/ /lo kaHsu khA
<p>92a.4</p>'os pa'i spyod tshul dag ngang phongs med rgyu yi nor rnams te/ /mi bdag yon tan ldan na skyes bu rnams kyis thams cad rnam bslad min par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rtsa ba nor gyi ljon pas yang dag bskyed gyur pa/ /skyon med 'dod pa rnams kyis me tog rgyas shing rab 'bar ba/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bde
<p>92a.5</p>ni ki la pu N+ya pha lA b+huk+te ha tA na tse ta ku nr-i pa tirbi nir+pA taM bA taH/ /ka liHkA laHpa tirbA la stata pra tA pash+tsi tA na la/ /a kA la pi p+la pot+tA la kha la bet+tA la saM ku laH/ /pr-i tirbi ShaN+DA khin+nA d+hIH
<p>92a.6</p>ba nges par 'jig rten longs spyod de/ /rnam par ltung byed rgyal ngan rlung gis gal te ma bcom na'o/ /rtsod ldan dus dang bdag po byis/ /de yis rab gdung bsreg pa'i me/ /dus min rnam bslad rab tu drag /mi bsrun ro langs tshogs kyis gang / /dga' ba yid byung blo gros bskyod/ /bde
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>su kha shrI ya ta yo ba nAM/ /a thu nA bi b+ha bA b+ho ge b+ho ga yo ge na me ru tsiH/ /d+ha naM b+hU mir+g+r-i haM dA raHsu tA b+h+r-i t+yA pa rits+tsha dAH/ /a ho ni ra ba d+hiHpuM sAM mA d+hi byA di pa ri gra haH/ /ya thA ya thA bi bar+d+han+te grISh+moSh+mA bi
<p>92b.2</p>ba'i dpal gyi lang tsho song / /da ni 'byor pa longs spyod rnams/ /spyod dang ldan la bdag mi sred/ /nor dang khyim dang chung ma dang / /bu dang g.yog po yo byad rnams/ /mtha' med nad dang gdung ba ste/ /kye ma skyes bu'i yongs 'dzin no/ /so ga'i tsha ba mi bzad dpal/ /ji lta ji ltar rnam
<p>92b.3</p>Sha mAHshri yaH/ /ta thA ta thA dz+wa la t+ye ba tr-iSh+Na tA baHsha rI ri NAM/ /pra br-id+d+hi ra pi bit+tau g+hai rA dzan+mo pArdzi tai r+n+r-i NAM/ /la ba NAn+d+hai ri ba dza lairbi br-iSh+N+yaM nai ba dzA ya te/ /nAsti nAstI t+ya saM to ShAd ya e ba d+ha ni nAM dza paH/ /
<p>92b.4</p>'phel ba/ /de lta de ltar lus can rnams/ /sred pa'i yongs su gdung ba 'phel/ /skye ba kun tu nyer bsgrubs pas/ /nor gyi tshogs pa rab rgyas kyang / /lan tshwa'i mtsho yi chu yis bzhin/ /mi rnams sred bral nyid ma yin/ /gang zhig nor ldan tshog mi shes/ /med do med do zhes zlos pa/ /
<p>92b.5</p>pu nar+b+ha be b+ha beta ko ba sa e ba pra sha mAR+Ya di/ /keM bit+tai rdurni mit+teHka li ka la ha mo ha lo b+hA nu br-it+taiHkiM b+ho gairbi pa yo gair+b+ya sa na sha ta pa ta nA b+h+yA pa saM sak+ta ro gaiH/ /kiM bA mi th+yA b+hi mA nai rnar
<p>92b.6</p>gal te de yis rab zhi na/ /yang srid dag tu su zhig 'gyur/ /rtsod dang 'thab mo rmongs dang chags pa chen po rjes su 'brang ba'i ltas ngan nor gyis ci/ /rgud pa brgyar ltung yang dag chags pas nad skyed 'bral bar 'gyur pa'i longs spyod dag gis ci/ /yid nyams g.yog la mi bdag khengs
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>pa ti sa da na prAp+ta se pA ba mA nai rasmin bai rA gya me ba k+Sha ya sa ma ya b+ha ye b+ho gya mA ro gya yo gyaM/ /a ti krAn+te kA le swa dza na su hr-i dA lo ka bi ma le sa mA pan+ne mo ha pra ba la kA lu Sh+ya ma
<p>93a.2</p>pa thob pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dag gis ci/ /'dir ni chags bral kho na 'jig dus 'jigs par nad med longs spyod dag tu 'os pa yin/ /rang gi skye bo snying sdug dri med snang ba'i dus ni 'das gyur cing / /lhag par mi bsrun sdig pas rgyas pa'i rmongs pa yang dag 'ongs pa
<p>93a.3</p>li ne/ /su khA shwA saHpuM sAM pra sha ma pa li la snA ta ma na sAM pa ri t+yak+ta yA se bi dza na ba na bA se pa ri tsa yaH/ /i ti saM tsin+d+ya pa tsi raM pa raM bai rA gya ma ya yau/ /duHkhaM mo hA ya mUr+khA NAM bi bi
<p>93a.4</p>na/ /ngal dub yongs btang skye bo med pa'i nags kyi gnas la yongs 'dris pas/ /yid ni rab zhi'i chus bkrus skyes bu rnams kyi bde ba'i dbugs 'byin yin/ /de ltar yun ring de bsams nas/ /mchog tu 'dod chags bral bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal rmongs pa'i gti mug dang / /blo ldan
<p>93a.5</p>kA ya tsa d+hI ma tAM/ /sa da twA sar+b+ba mar+thi b+h+yaHpra ya yau su ga tA shra maM/ /shrI shr-iM kha lA b+hiHkr-i Sh+yaM na d+hi sa t+ya su khon+mu khAH/ /ya dai ba rA dza haM se na smaR+Ya te shu tsaM ma nA saM/ /sa dai bAsmai ba su ma tI sa ra
<p>93a.6</p>rnams kyis rnam 'byed slad/ /slong rnams la des kun byin nas/ /bde gshegs gnas su rab tu song / /gang phyir bden pa'i bder mngon phyogs/ /dpal gyi lcags sgrog gis mi khugs/ /gang tshe ngang pa'i rgyal po ni/ /rdzing bu gtsang ma dran pa na/ /de tshe nor gyi blo gros ma/ /ro ldan la yang da mi
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>sI bi na ro tsa te/ /yA te duHsa ha mo ha d+hU ma ma li ne b+ho gA nu rA gA na le san+to ShA mr-i ta nir+dz+ha re Na ma na si prA p+ta sha naiHshA+e ta tAM/ /ne tAHpA na ma do tu raM ga bi tsa lad+d+hA rAM ga nA b+haM gu ra b+h+ru b+haM ga k+Sha Na saM ga mAH
<p>93b.2</p>sred/ /longs spyod dag la rjes chags me ni bzod dka' rmongs pa'i du ba 'khyims gyur pa/ /chog shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis yid la bsil ba nyid ni dal bus thob gyur na/ /btung bas myos shing rab rgyug rnam par g.yo rgyun na chung g.yo ba'i smin 'khyog can/ /skad cig 'grogs pa'i dpal mo
<p>93b.3</p>sha ma ba tAM kurban+ti big+h+naM shri yaH/ /sarba dz+nya shA sa na bi na Sh+Ta b+ha bA d+h+wa kaSh+TaHpra bra dz+ya yA bi ma la me baM pa daM pra biSh+TaH/ /sA prA pya sarba sha ma tA ma sa ma pra kA sha nir+l+la k+Sha mok+Sha ga ma nA ya mu
<p>93b.4</p>'di dag zhi ldan rnams kyi bgegs ni byed ma yin/ /srid pa'i lam gyi sdug bsngal rnam nyams thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka'/ /dri med nyid kyi gnas su rab tu byung bas rab tu zhugs/ /zhi ba nyid ni thams cad thob nas mnyam med rab gsal zhing / /mtshon bral thar par 'gro ba'i slad du thub
<p>93b.5</p>nirba b+hU ba/ /taM bo d+hi sid+d+hi mA lokya dz+yo tiSh+ka s+ya sa bisma yaiH/ /b+hi k+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn br-iSh+TaHsrAg+b+r-it+tAn+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /dzan+ma k+She tra sha top+tA nAM bI dzA nA mi ba kar+m+ma NAM/ /b+hu dz+ya te pha la sam+pat+ti ra bi sA bA di
<p>93b.6</p>par de gyur te/ /me skyes byang chub grub pa de/ /mthong nas ya mtshan ldan pa yi/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /sngon gyi spyod pa'i mtha' rnams gsungs/ /skye ba'i zhing brgya la btab pa'i/ /sa bon lta bu'i las rnams kyis/ /'bras bu phun tshogs skye bo rnams/ /'chol pa med par
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>ni dza naiH/ /rA dz+nyo ban+d+hu ma taHpuR+YaM ban+d+hu ma t+yaM ma hA ya shaH/ /a b+hu da naM ga no nA ma shrI mAn gr-i ha pa ti pu rA/ /shastA tha sa myak+saM bud+d+ho bi pa sh+yI nA ma tAM pu rIM/ /dza na tsA ri ka
<p>94a.2</p>spyod par gyur/ /rgyal po gnyen dang ldan pa yis/ /grong khyer gnyen ldan dag tu sngon/ /khyim bdag bsam pa chen po ni/ /dpal ldan ma bsdams zhes bya byung / /de nas ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnam gzigs zhes pa grong khyer der/ /de dag rnams kyis legs
<p>94a.3</p>yA prAp+tAHka dA tsita su kr-i taiHpa tAM/ /dwA ShaSh+Thi b+hiHsa b+hik+Shu NAM sa ha sraiHpa ri bA ri tAH/ /shrad+d+ha yA nAM ga ne nai t+ya pra Na myo pa ni man+t+ri taH/ /sarbo pa kA ra naiste na trai mA sim pa ri bA ri taH/ /ya thA ta
<p>94a.4</p>byas kyis/ /nam zhig ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs/ /de ni dge slong stong phrag dag /drug cu gnyis kyis yongs bskor bar/ /ma bsdams pa yis dad nas phyin/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mgron du gnyer/ /de yis yo byad thams cad kyis/ /zla gsum rim gro bgyid pa nyid/ /ji lta de ltar rgyal pos
<p>94a.5</p>thai ba rA dz+nyA phi pra Ni pa t+ya ni man+t+ri taH/ /b+ho gaiHs+sar+d+hA nu ban+d+he na ba tA b+h+yA ma d+hi bA si taH/ /a naM ga ne na sa po rAr+hair+b+hU pA lAr+haish+tsa b+hu dzA/ /ga dza d+h+wa dza ma Ni ts+tsha tra tsA ma ro dA ra yA shri yA/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA pU dzi
<p>94a.6</p>kyang / /phyag 'tshal bas ni mgron du gnyer/ /grong ba la 'os ma bsdams pas/ /sa skyong la ros sa bdag gis/ /de dag [(]'gren [,]'gran [)]pas rjes bsgrubs pa'i/ /longs spyod kyis de lhag gnas byas/ /glang po rgyal mtshan nor bu gdugs/ /rnga yab rgya che'i dpal 'byor gyis/ /rgyal pos mchod pa
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>taM rAdz+nyA tsit+tAr+t+ta b+hU da naM ga naH/ /ta s+ya sa twA ba dA ta s+ya pak+Sha pA tI sha ta kra tuH/ /tsa kA ra di byA ya lak+Sh+m+yA swa hA y+YaM dzi na pU dza ne/ /sa ta yA di bya yA b+hU t+yA b+ha ga ban+ta ma pU dza ya ta/ /ya dA gre
<p>94b.2</p>de mthong nas/ /ma bsdams bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /snying stobs dkar bar gyur pa de'i/ /rgyal ba mchod la stong grogs ni/ /phyogs bdag mchod sbyin brgya pa yis/ /lha yi dpal 'byor rnams kyis byas/ /de yis lha yi 'byor pa des/ /bcom ldan 'das ni mchod gyur pa/ /gang mdun 'khor
<p>94b.3</p>bar 'dir 'od zer gyi skad dod yig 'bru bzhi chad pa ma dpe rnams las ma rnyed pa b+hA na bA kaM zhes pa 'di 'dar los gsar du bcug pa rgya dpe rnyed na dpyad/
<p>94b.4</p>tsakra bar+t+tI shrI ladz+dzA b+hA ja na taM ya yau/ /rat+nair+n+ya k+Sha ta tsan+d+ra sUR+ya b+hA na bA kaM kIr Nai rA ba NA b+hai ra m+lAm+ba ra gan+d+ha mA l+ya sha ba laiHkalpa dru mA NAM pha laiH/ /b+hak+ti pra hra shA tsI pi lA sa tsa la nA he lots+tsh+wa sats+tsA
<p>94b.5</p>los sgyur ba'i dpal/ /ngo tsha yis ni snod nyid gyur/ /nyi zla'i 'od zer nyams byed rin chen rnams dang sa srung 'od ldan glang po dang / /dri med gos dang spos 'phreng khrus dang dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu rnams dag gis/ /bde sogs gus btud rol pas g.yo zhing dal bus rnga yab dag ni rab
<p>94b.6</p>ma raM te nA b+h+yartsi ta mA ka la s+ya su ga taM ladz+dza na to b+hUta nr-i paH/ /i ti ba hu ta raM b+hak+t+yA shAstuHpha laM ya da naM ga naHshu b+ha pa ri Na toHpu N+yo dA raHpu rA sa ma pap+ta bAn/ /bi ma la ma na pasta s+yai bA
<p>94b.7</p>bskyod par/ /de yis bde gshegs mngon mchod mthong nas mi yi bdag po ngo tshas dman par gyur/ /de ltar ston pa la gus dge ba yongs smin 'bras bu rab mang dag /gang zhig bsod nams rgya chen ma bsdams pas sngon yang dag thob gyur cing / /dri med yid ldan de yis skad cig smon
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>sau k+Sha Na pra Ni d+hA na taHpa ra i pa ra bir+dz+yo tiSh+ko b+hU ta pa e ba pa da shri taH/ /i t+yA ha bi ma la dz+nyA na pra kA shi ta dza gat+t+ra yaH/ /pra Ni d+hA no ba de shA ya b+hik+Shu NAM b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /iti
<p>95a.2</p>lam nyid las de nyid ni/ /mchog gi nyi ma bzhin du dpal 'byor gyi gnas me skyes 'dir gyur to/ /'gro gsum dri med ye shes kyis/ /rab tu gsal mdzad bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal bas dge slong rnams la ni/ /smon lam gdams ngag de skad gsungs/ /zhes pa dge
<p>95a.3</p>k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba da na kalpa la tA yAM dz+yo tiSh+kA ba dA naM nA ma na ba ma pal+la baH// //tsaM pho pAn+te bi ma la na li nI tI ra paR+Yan+ta bA sI shAstA pUrbe pa ka la b+hU pa
<p>95a.4</p>pa'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las me skyes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste dgu pa'o// //'jig rten mtha' dag nye bar gzung slad rab zhugs ston pa dag ni sngon/ /grong khyer tsam pa dang nye dri med pad+ma'i
<p>95a.5</p>nA nu gra hA ya pra br-it+taH/ /kr-iSh+Ta spaR+sha ba ga ti ru tsi nA b+hik+Shu NA nan+da nAm+bA gar+b+hA ro b+hAta pra b+h+r-i ti dza na tA dza n+ma pr-it+tiM dza ga da/ /shuklaiHkr-iSh+NaiHsha ba la ru tsi b+hirde hi nAM karma sU traish+tsi traM lo ke ba hu ta ra shaM
<p>95a.6</p>rdzing ngogs 'gram na bzhugs/ /kun dga' bo zhes bya ba reg na bde ba'i 'od ldan dge slong gis/ /dris nas mngal brtsams la sogs skye bo'i tshogs kyi skye ba'i spyod tshul gsungs/ /'jig rten du ni dkar nag 'dren ma'i 'od can las skud kyis bkra ba'i/ /lus can rnams kyi skye ba'i gos ni rab
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>dri sh+ya te dzan+ma bas+t+raM/ /dzIr+Na s+yA pi bya pa na ma li na sne ha li naHpra yat+ne ya s+ya t+yan+taM tse ra pa ri Na tirne ba niR+YA ti rA gaH/ /puM saHshu kraM pi ga li ta d+h+r-i te rArta paM yo Shi tash+tsa spaR+sha be sha bya ti ka ra dzr-i ShoH
<p>95b.2</p>mang gnas skabs mthong gyur te/ /shin tu 'bad pas gang zhig yun ring yongs sgyur srul por gyur mod kyang / /gdung ba'i dri ma snum chags tshon ni med pa nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /skyes pa bud med dag kyang 'dzin pa rnam nyams reg par zhugs byas shing / /sbyor ba bsten pa'i khu ba zla mtshan yang dag
<p>95b.3</p>saM ga me saM ni pA tAta/ /e kI b+hU taM pra dza ti ni ya mAta ka s+ya tsi bI dza b+hA baM pon+testasmin b+ha ba ti sa ha sA paM ni kA she ya yAg+neH/ /rA gong+gA raHs+phA Ti ka sha ka laM me g+ha mam+b+ho d+hi pA thaHpuSh+pa mo dasti la ka mi bA sha naiH
<p>95b.4</p>'grogs la ltung gyur pa/ /gcig tu gyur cing nges pa 'ga' las sa bon dag gis dngos por gyur/ /su zhig khong der 'phral la 'jug ste dper na bsrubs pa'i me bzhin no/ /shel dum dag la tshon gyis rab dbye sprin la chu yi gter gyi chu/ /til la me tog dri bzang gser la me yis gdungs bzhin
<p>95b.5</p>kAn+tsa na bAg+ni tA paH/ /so yaM gar+b+haM bi sha ti ni ya tai ra s+ya saM lak+Sh+ya br-it+tirgA yurgan+d+hai ri ba ba hu bi d+haiHkarma b+hirbA s+ya mA naH/ /tasmin suk+Sh+ma kra ma pa ri Na tirmI na baR+YuSh+Ta ka so nA nA kA ra pra tsu ra ra tsa nA tsi tra rU po
<p>95b.6</p>dral bu yis/ /dri rnams kyis bzhin rnam pa mang po'i las kyis bsgos par gyur pa'i rlung / /spyod tshul byed po yis kyang yang dag mi mtshan 'di de nang du 'jug /der ni phra ba'i rim pas yongs su 'gyur zhing rang bzhin gyis btsir 'dir/ /ji srid dus su rnam par 'gyur ba med pa bzhin du
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>s+ya lak+Sh+yaH/ /kaM tsi ta kA laM ba ha ti bi kr-i ti nirbi kA rA ya mA nA mA yUHrAN+Di dza la ma ya i ba byak+ta b+hak+tirma yU raH/ /ta trA d+hA nAta g+ha na ka la la tA sha l+ya pa sh+yA d+ya ba s+thA t+yak+t+wA tAstA dza Tha ni te noSh+ma
<p>96a.2</p>rnam 'gyur 'dzin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rab mang bkod pa bkra ba'i gzugs ni mi mtshon te/ /rma bya'i sgo nga chu yi rang bzhin rma bya'i rnam par mi gsal bzhin/ /der ni mer mer nur nur nar nar gor gor la sogs gnas skabs bzung / /de dang de dag lto yis bskyed pa'i drod kyis smin cing
<p>96a.3</p>NA pa ts+ya mA naH/ /pUr+NiM mA sairna ba b+hi ra tha bA brta karma kra mo pau kle shaM b+huk+te ki ma pi bi kha mi duHkha saM dz+nyA pra pan+naH/ /kA l+ya br-it+tAta swa ya mi pa pha laM bi ts+yu taM kar+m+ma pA kAta tat+kA lot+thai ra bi ha ta dza baiHpre ri
<p>96a.4</p>btang byas nas/ /zla ba rdzogs pa'am yang na dgu yis 'khyil pa'i las kyi rim pa 'di/ /sdug bsngal 'du shes rab ldan ci yang rung ba'i mi bzad nyon mongs spyod/ /dus su yu ba dag las 'bras bu rang nyid ltung bzhin mngal smin pas/ /de dus langs pa'i ma yi rlung ni mi dman mgyogs pas
<p>96a.5</p>taHp+la ti bA teH/ /lak+Sh+ya b+h+yA pA ya ta na sa tsi bai rA tsi taHkarma ban+dairniR+Ya t+yaM taHsha ra i ba d+ha nuR+Yan+t+ra niR+Yan+t+ra muk+taH/ /ut+tA na s+yaHpa ra la ra sa na sh+tsu bu kA graM li hA no nastaM mA tuHbi ba ti ya da so nai
<p>96a.6</p>rab bskul nas/ /mtshon cha goms pa'i gnas kyi grogs po 'ching ba'i las kyis rdzogs gyur pa/ /gzhu yi 'khrul 'khor bkang nas btang ba'i mda' bzhin nang nas phyir 'thon 'gyur/ /gan rkyal kha gdangs ro 'dzin drag pos nu tog rtse la 'dzin byed cing / /ma yi nu zho 'thungs pas gang 'di rna bas
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>ba kar+Ne nA nAk+Sh+Na/ /dzan+mA b+h+yA sa bya pa na ba ta nA yA sa saM bA sa lI nA sA ta s+yA gre sa ka la ka la nA de shi nI ba pA nai ba/ /s+yu tai ran+tarbi bi Sha ya swA da saM bA da b+he dair+b+yAstaHsup+tairbi Sha pa i ba byak+ta taM tu
<p>96b.2</p>min zhing mig gis min/ /skye bar goms pa'i gdung pas bskyed pa'i nyon mongs gnas pa'i rol pa des/ /de yi mdun du spros pa mtha' dag ston byed bag chags kho na'o/ /rnam mang yul gyis nyams myong bskyed pa'i dbye bas grub pa nang khyab pa/ /gsal bar skud pa rab tu rgyas par legs sbyar pad rtse'i
<p>96b.3</p>pra tA naiH/ /mU D+haHso tha pra kr-i ti pa tsi bai ren+d+ri yairdat+ta saM dz+nyaHsta n+yA lA pA kr-i ti pa re ma ma spaR+sha nairbit+ti d+hA trIM/ /hastA kaR+SheHsha ya na ba pa nA g+haR+Sha NaiHpI D+ya mA naHs+thA ne s+tha ne ta ra li ta ta nuHkI Ta kair+b+ha k+Sh+ya
<p>96b.4</p>cha shas bzhin/ /de nas rang bzhin dbang po'i grogs kyis 'du shes byin pa'i rmongs pa de/ /nu ma'i don du brjod cing yongs su mnye ba'i reg pas ma ma rig /mal stan gos rnams lag pas bskyod pa'i 'dar byed dag gis mnan pa dang / /gnas dang gnas su ya yor 'gyur lus srog chags rnams kyis
<p>96b.5</p>mA NaH/ /ni t+yA kran+dI ba tsa na bi ra hAta kA ya kIM kle shai laM kan+bo brU te bi Sha ma bi pa dA mAspa da twaM pra yA taH/ /pI to dwan+tesh+tshu ri ta pa da naHprots+tsha lata k+ShI ra stu rai rut+tA no rasta la ni pa ti tai ruk+Shi to lak+Sh+ya te sau/ /mA yA ba
<p>96b.6</p>zos gyur pas/ /rtag tu ngu zhing tshig dang bral bas lus kyi nyon mongs brgyud ma ni/ /su la smra ste mi bzad rgud pa nyid kyi gnas su rab tu 'gyur/ /ltung ba skyugs shing rab 'thob 'o ma'i tshogs kyis bzhin ni sbags gyur te/ /gan rkyal brang gi dbus su lhung bas mtshan pas bran par gyur pa 'di/ /sgyu ma'i bud
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>d+hAHsma ra Na ha ra Na prau D+ha ke lI bi lA se ha pe ne bal+phu re ta ru tsi nA nir+b+hA ra byAp+ta kA yaH/ /so tha prAp+te li pi pa ri tsa ye he la yA dat+ta ha steHsaM sA resmin+na bi tsa la ta yA ban+d+ha le khya kri yA su/ /dzan+mA
<p>97a.2</p>med la 'grogs mchog tu rtse dga'i rol pa dran pa las/ /dgod pa'i 'od zer shin tu gsal bas rab tu khyab pa bzhin/ /de bas de ni rtse bas yig 'phreng yongs 'dris dag la lag gtad thob/ /'khor ba 'dir ni g.yo med 'ching ba'i rtsibs kyi ri mo'i las dag las/ /rang
<p>97a.3</p>brtaM ni dza mi ba la kha na dIr+g+ha mo kA ra mA dau brge bar+g+he bi ra ti ma tiM b+ho ga sarge ni biSh+TaH/ /prAp+taHpradz+nyAHka tha ma piM ga lad+bA la b+hA ba pra mo haHka mot+su kyA ta pu na ra pi pa ri yau ba ne naSh+Ta saM dz+nyaH/ /
<p>97a.4</p>gi skye ba'i 'khor mo ring du 'bri bzhin oM yig la sogs pa/ /sde dang sde la blo gros rab gsal longs spyod spros pa nges par 'jug /ji zhig ltar yang byis pa'i dngos po'i rab rmongs bral nas shes rab 'thob/ /slad nas kyang ni lang tsho dar la 'dod pas rab bslang 'du shes nyams/ /
<p>97a.5</p>nis+sA re Shu bya pa na bi la sad me g+ha sau dA mi nI nAM ba d+h+wa t+ya s+thAM s+thi ra ta ra d+hi ya yau Shi tAM bi b+h+ra me Shu/ /bA tsi shro traM ba pu ra bi tsa lA liM ga ne Sh+waM dza nA nAM g+hA NAM bak+ShaM pa ba pa ri mA le swa da naM tad ra se tsa/ /pA tri kur+b+ban
<p>97a.6</p>sdug bsngal mdzes pa'i sprin glog bud med rnams kyi rtse dga' rol pa dag /snying po med la rab tu brtan pa'i blo yis mngon par 'dod pa bcings/ /bud med rnams kyi tshig la rna ba lus ni g.yo med 'khyud pa la/ /kha yi chang gi dri la sna dang de yi ro la myong byed dang / /bzhin la mig kyang snod
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>dr-i sha ma pi mu She sup+ta sarba kri yo pau d+hat+te ma traM sta nu pa ri Na tAM nI sarbe na tri yA Ni/ /dweSh+Ti snig+d+haM pa ri tsi ta pa ri dwe Sha shI laHsa kA mI baM ts+tsha t+ya neM na ba na ba ra paHpa pra yot+na n+ya kA mAM/ /i t+ya
<p>97b.2</p>du bgyis nas bya ba thams cad bsnyal ba 'di/ /lus ni yongs su 'gyur ba'i dbang po thams cad chod dag 'dzin pa bzhin/ /sdang la mdza' zhing yongs su 'dres la yongs sdang ngang tshul 'dod ldan de/ /gsar pa gsar pa la chags 'bad bcas gzhan gyis 'dod ma gzhan dag 'dod/ /de ltar
<p>97b.3</p>n+yo n+yA nu tsi ta tsa ri tA lak+Sha bai lak+Shu pAk+Shu hA s+yA yai ba pra kr-i ti bi ra pa sh+tsi tra taM tro s+ya kA maH/ /a s+yA d+hA re bi Sha ya dza la d+hau madz+dza teHsadz+dza tash+tsa b+h+raSh+Ta s+ya pra ti ha te ga teHkuny+dza ra s+ye ba kam+be/ /kiM karta byA
<p>97b.4</p>phan tshun rigs min spyod pa mtshon nas skyengs pa mthong gyur pa/ /'di yi 'dod pa rang bzhin ro bral bkra ba'i rgyud 'dis bzhad slad nyid/ /nyin zhag dag ni nyung zhig gnas pa'i lang tshos long bar byas gyur cing / /'das la glang po bzhin du yul gyi chu gter dag ni mtha' de la/ /bying zhing mtha' la
<p>97b.5</p>ba ga ti ra hi tA dzA ya te mo ha mUr+ts+tsa nI ta s+yA n+d+h+yaM ka ti pa ya di na s+thA yi nA yau ba ne na/ /yA bta kha laM b+h+ra ma ti tsa la ti pri ya tai dzr-iM b+ha te sau sme raM sme raM ba da tiM da nA lim gi tai raM ga b+haM gaiH/ /tA bat+ta s+yo pa
<p>97b.6</p>rab lhung 'gro ba dag ni rab tu nyams pa 'di/ /ci zhig bya zhes nges pa'i shes pa dang bral rmongs pas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'di ni rtse zhing 'khyams dang g.yo dang dga' dang glal ba dang / /'dod pas 'khyud pa'i lus ni 'khyog pas 'dzum zhing 'dzum zhing smra byed pa/ /de srid de yis steng du
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>ri pa ri pa ta t+ya bA kA la pra muk+tAM pra le yA lI d+ha ba la pa li tats+tshad+ma nA ba d+h+ya mA nA/ /kA le kA le k+Sha Na ka la na ya mo hi ni drA ba se na prAp+taM nAsmin ba su Shi su Shi su kr-i ta ni ba dat+taM na
<p>98a.2</p>dus kyis rab 'phangs gsod rtags me tog 'phreng / /kha ba'i 'phreng ba ltar dkar skra dkar zol gyis yongs su 'bab pa nyid/ /gti mug gnyid la chags pas dus dang dus la skad cag ltar shes shing / /lus 'dir legs byas ma thob byin pa nyid min spyad pa nyid
<p>98a.3</p>b+huk+taM/ /i r+thaM tsau rai ri ba sa mu Shi ta sh+tsin+ta ya t+ye ba duHkhA ta saM mUD+hA nA ma nu sha ya pha laHpA ba sA daHpra mA daH/ /tasmin yA te la li ta ba ni tA puSh+pa bal+lI bA san+te duSh+karmAp+ta dra bi Na tu la yA yau ba ne swa sna kalpe/ /
<p>98a.4</p>min pa'i/ /rgyu 'dis de ni rkun pos brkus bzhin sdug bsngal dag la sems pa nyid/ /kun tu rmongs pa rnams kyis nyams nyes bag med 'gyod pa'i 'bras bu can/ /las ngan gyis thob nor dang mtshungs pas lang tsho rmi lam du rtag pa/ /bud med 'jo sgeg sos ka'i me tog 'khri shing song ba de yi tshe/ /
<p>98a.5</p>naSh+Ta she Sha pra kr-i ti ra khi laiHkhe di traM gairbi rak+tai rA dz+ya b+h+raM pe na br-i ba i ba su khaM po tha sho tsa t+ya tI tAM/ /A yurnI taM na tsa pa mu tsi taM yA tsa kA yo pa nI taM nA p+Yun+nI taM di shi de shi yA shaHsat+pa thaM na pra
<p>98a.6</p>yan lag ma lus skyo zhing chags dang bral bas rang bzhin mtha' dag nyams/ /rgyal srid las nyams mi bdag bzhin de de nas bde ba 'das pas gdung / /bdag gi tshe btang slong ba rnams la yang dag 'os pa'i sbyin ma btang / /phyogs phyogs rab tu grags pa'ang ma bskrun legs pa'i lam ni ma
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>tI ti/ /prI taM yats+nyA bi Sha ma d+hi ma taM s+phI ta saM tA pa shI taM b+hI tAM pA bA ta ki ma pi na ma yA yat+ta de ba pra NA+e taM/ /kwA sau he ma dru ma ru tsi ha rA hA ri NI yau ba na shrI kA yaHkwA yaM kr-i mi ha ta ta ru prA ya bits+tshA yA
