<p>98b.2</p>rtogs shing / /slong ba'i dug 'thungs tsha dang grang ba yongs su rgyas par lhag par thob/ /sdig las ci yang 'jigs par ma gyur gang zhig de nyid kho na bgyis/ /gser gyi ljon pa'i 'od 'phrog yid 'phrog lang tsho'i dpal ni gang na ste/ /smin zhing mdzes bral srin bus bcas pa'i shing mtshungs lus
<p>98b.3</p>pA kaH/ /dU rA de tAHpa ri kr-i ta dr-i sha kau na lI naM ta ru N+yaHshuSh+kaM shi taM tu ra mi ba ba ne bA na raM mAM ba dan+ti/ /so yaM kA yaHshra ya ti bi la yaM ne ba mA yA ti kA ya shrastAHsarbe da sha na ma Na yaste tsa
<p>98b.4</p>'di ga la zhig /na chung 'di dag mig gis ring nas yongs spong zur na zhen gyur pa/ /bdag la nags kyi spre'u bskams shing 'khyags pas 'khrugs pa bzhin zhes smras/ /lus 'di rnam par 'jig pa bsten te sgyu ma'i tshogs ni ma yin nyid/ /so yi nor bu kun dang skra de lhung ste skyon ni ma yin
<p>98b.5</p>ke shA na do ShAH/ /gA trot+sA he pra ha ra ti ma run nai ba mo ha pra ro he k+ShI Na s+ye yaM sha ya na sha ra Na s+yA pi tr-iSh+NA k+Sha yA me/ /baM tsin+t+ya ti pra sr-i ta bi Sha ma shwa sa hik+kA di te pau ba s+ya s+t+ya k+tuM tsi ra pa ri ti tA mud+Yato lo
<p>98b.6</p>nyed/ /lus kyi brtson 'grus rlung ni rab tu stor te gti mug myu gu min/ /mal stan la brkyangs zad par gyur kyang bdag gi sred pa zad ma yin/ /de ltar bsams nas mi bzad dbugs brtsegs hig sogs rab tu rgyas gyur pas/ /'di ni yun ring 'dris pa'i 'jig rten spyod tshul 'phral
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>ka yA traM/ /mU kI b+hU taHsA dza na bi ra haM d+h+yA ya ti d+h+wasta d+haiR+YaHshak+tits+tshe tA dr-i Na mi ba ma hata prAp+ta kA lo da ri draH/ /b+hU m-iM ge haM ba su pa ri dza naM bu tra dA rA di tsA n+yan+tA bat+tA bat+ka la ya ti
<p>99a.2</p>la gtong rtsom ste/ /lkugs gyur rang gi skye bo dang bral sems shing nus pa chad pa las/ /bstan pa nyams gyur dus la bab pa dbul ba bu lon chen po bzhin/ /re zhig sa dang khang pa nor dang g.yog 'khor bu dang chung ma dang / /srog ni mthar thug dus su blo yis de
<p>99a.3</p>d+hi yA prA NA paR+Yan+ta kA le/ /yA badz+dzan+ma n+ya pi pu na ra tsau sne ha mo hA nu ban+d+haistaistai ran+taHkr-i ta pa ri tsa yastan+ma yI b+hA pa me ti/ /duHkhaM duHsa ha pA pa kar+m+ma dza ni taM kum+b+hi sa ha prAn+ta re b+hUk+t+wa rau ra ba kA la sU tra
<p>99a.4</p>snyed gzhan yang bsams byas pa/ /ji srid skye ba la yang 'di nyid slad nas chags rmongs 'ching bdag /de des nang du yongs su 'dris byas de yi rang bzhin ngo bor 'gro/ /zangs chen stong phrag nang du sdig las kyis bskyed bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal dag /spyad nas ngu 'bod thig
<p>99a.5</p>na ra keSh+wA brta te yo ni Shu/ /yad+bA pu N+ya ka nArdzi taM su kha pa daM ta da saM k+Sha ye duHkha daM pA nA gA mi pha lap+ta ye bi ma la d+hIsta smAta sa mA d+hI ya taM/ /i ti b+hI ma b+ha bAM b+ho d+hi san+tA ra Na kr-i ta
<p>99a.6</p>nag dmyal ba rnams kyi skye gnas dag tu 'khor gyur cing / /gang yang bsod nams chas bsgrubs bde ba'i gnas de yang dag zad nas sdug bsngal ster/ /de slad phyir mi 'ong bcas 'bras thob slad du dri med blo yis ting 'dzin mdzod/ /sems can rnams kyi dge thob slad/ /de skad srid pa'i chu gter
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>pra taH/ /sa mA di de sha b+ha ga bAn sa twA nAM ku sha lAsta ye/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twa ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM gar+b+ha ba kran+ti da sha ma pal+la waH// //
<p>99b.2</p>ni/ /'jigs rung las sgrol brtul zhugs mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag bshad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mngal nas 'byung ba bstan pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu pa'o// //
<p>99b.3</p>te ke pi sa twa hi ta san+ni hi tA nu ka pA b+ha bya b+ha ban+te b+hu ba ne b+ha pa tI ti b+hA dzAM/ /bAt+sa l+ya be sha la d+hi yaHku sha lA ya puM sAM kur+b+han+ti ye pa ra ma nu gra ha mA gra he Na/ /n+ya gro d+hA rA
<p>99b.4</p>gang zhig mnyes gshin byams pa'i blo yis dge ba'i slad du ni/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten skyes bu rnams kyis mchog tu rjes 'dzin dag /'bad pas mdzad pa de dag sems can rnams la snying rje dang / /rjes su brtse bas nye bar gnas pa'i legs ldan su zhig lags/ /ser skya'i
<p>99b.5</p>ma ni ra taM draSh+Tu ka pi la bAstu ni/ /b+ha ga bAn+taM ya yau man+daHshAkya rA dza su taHpu rA/ /naiSh+k+ra mya de sha nA man+t+ra ka thAn+te pu raHs+thi taM/ /u bA tsa b+ha ga bA na prI t+yA pra bra dz+ya gri h+ya tA
<p>99b.6</p>gzhi la n+ya gra d+ha'i/ /kun dga' rar bzhugs bcom ldan 'das/ /blta phyir shAkya'i rgyal po'i bu/ /dga' bo song bar gyur te sngon/ /nges 'byung gtam dang gros dag gis/ /gtam mthar mdun na gnas pa la/ /rab tu byung ba mdzod cig ces/ /bcom ldan dgyes pas
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>mi ti/ /pra sA d+ya b+hi ni d+yA s+ya taM nan+daHpra t+ya b+hA Sha ta/ /b+ha ga pa na pu N+ya la b+hA pi pra pra dz+yA b+ha ma tA na me/ /ta bo pa s+tha ya ko b+hU twA b+hik+Shu saM g+haM ya thaip+si taiH/ /sarbo
<p>100a.2</p>bka' stsal to/ /de yi drin la mngon dga' nas/ /dga' bos de la lan gsol pa/ /bcom ldan bsod nams 'thob mod kyang / /rab byung bdag ni mngon mi 'dod/ /khyod kyi nye gnas su gyur nas/ /yo byad ci ltar bzhed kun gyis/ /re
<p>100a.3</p>pa ka ra NaistA bta b+hak+Sh+yA pa ri tsa rA mya haM/ /i t+yuk+t+wa rat+na mu ku TaM spr-iSh+Ta stat+pA da pi ka dzaH/ /rA dza pu traHswa b+ha ba naM ya yau dza yA sa mut+su kaH/ /sa pun+da rI sa mA sA d+ya da yi tAM ra ti pun+da riM/ /
<p>100a.4</p>zhig dge slong dge 'dun la/ /gus pas bdag ni rim gro bgyi'o/ /'di brjod rin chen cod pan gyis/ /de yi zhabs pad la reg nas/ /rgyal po'i bu ni btsun mo la/ /chags pas rang gi khyim du song / /de ni mdzes ma yid 'ong ma/ /dga' zhing mdzes dang yang dag phrad/ /
<p>100a.5</p>bi dza hA ra ba ro d+YA naM mu hUr+t+ta bi ra hA sa haH/ /ta taHka dA tsi ta b+ha ga bAn pra kr-i t+yai ba gu Ni pri yaH/ /swa yaM nan+da s+ya b+ha ba naM b+hi k+Shu saM g+haiHsa hA ya yau/ /sA nan+da ba da naHkr-i twanan+dastat+pa
<p>100a.6</p>yud tsam 'bral bar mi bzod pas/ /skyed tshal mchog tu rnam par rol/ /de nas nam zhig rang bzhin gyis/ /yon tan ldan dgyes bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slong tshogs dang bcas pa dag /dga' bo'i khyim du rang nyid gshegs/ /kun dga'i bzhin ldan dga' bo yis/ /de yi
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>da ban+da nAM/ /ta ma hA d+hA sa nA si naM pU dza yi twA bya dzi dz+nya pata/ /ke ShAM pu N+ya pra ro hA NAM pa ri bA ko ya mI dri shaH/ /kr-i to yaM yad b+ha ga ba tA daR+sha nA nu gra haHsra yaM/ /s+pha ra NaM shra ba
<p>100b.2</p>zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing / /cher 'os stan la bzhugs de la/ /mchod pa byas nas rim gro bskyed/ /gang zhig bcom ldan rang nyid kyis/ /gzigs pas rjes su bzung byas pa/ /'di 'dra bsod nams myu gu rnams/ /gang zhig yongs su smin pa'i 'bras/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams
<p>100b.3</p>NAM bA pi daR+sha naM bA ma hAt+ma nAM/ /se yaM ku sha la bal+lI nAM ma ha tI pha la san+tiH/ /a s+ya mai tra s+ya ma ha tasta dA lo kA s+ya daR+sha nAn+ta/ /hri da yA p+dza bi ka sa shrIHka s+ya nA ma na dzA ya te/ /da na da pi pri ya ta raM pu N+yA dA
<p>100b.4</p>dran nam/ /thes pa dang ni mthong gyur pa/ /'di de dge ba'i 'khri shing gi/ /'bras bu chen po dag gi rgyun/ /khyod kyi snang ba byams pa ni/ /chen por gyur pa 'di mthong nas/ /snying gi chu skyes rgyas pa'i dpal/ /su zhig gis ni mi bskyed 'gyur/ /bdag nyid che rnams mthong ba ni/ /sbyin pa bas kyang
<p>100b.5</p>pi ma hA pha laM/ /sa da tsA ra da pi sh+la g+h+yaM ma ha tAM ke la daR+sha nAM/ /i ti ta s+ya bru bA Na s+ya b+hak+ti pra Na ya se sha laM/ /a b+hi nan+da pu raHpU dzI b+ha ga bAn gan+tu mud+Ya yau/ /a nu bA bra dza taM nan+daHswa ts+tsha
<p>100b.6</p>shin tu dka'/ /bsod nams pas kyang 'bras bu che/ /spyod bzang pas kyang bsngags bar 'os/ /de skad brjod de'i gus pa dang / /mdza' zhing byams pa nyid dag dang / /sngon du mchod la mngon dgyes nas/ /bcom ldan 'das ni gshegs par brtson/ /dga' bo de yi rjes 'brang ba/ /rang gi gser
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>ka na ka b+hA dza ne/ /ba ro pa tsA ra ma dA ya ma d+hu raM swa mi ba sha yaM/ /pash+tse d+p+ra dzan+ta mA lo kya b+hak+t+ya b+ha ga ba taHpa ti/ /na raMk+Sh+ya ta ka TAk+Sha Na pun+da ri bi ra hA sa haH/ /gu rU NA ma gre sA sa ra
<p>101a.2</p>gyi snod du ni/ /mchog gi nyer spyad dngar po dag /rang gi bsam pa bzhin du blangs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin du/ /gus pas bdag po bgrod mthong nas/ /'bral ba mi bzod mdzes ma yis/ /zur mig gis ni nges par bltas/ /bla ma rnams mdun mig gi 'gros
<p>101a.3</p>la ta ra lA lo tsa na ga tiM bi hA ye ba t+ya srAM tsi ta mu ku li tA k+ShI pri ya ta maM/ /ni rI k+Sh+ya la k+Sh+yaM ya ta k+Sha Na ma ba na tA b+hUt+ta da d+hi kaM na gan+ta byaM nA the t+ya ba da di ba mau nA da ba tsa naM/ /nan+daHpra Na yi ni dr-iSh+TA so ts+tshA sAM tsa
<p>101a.4</p>ni drang zhing rab tu g.yo ba dag /yangs pa nyid kyis zur mig rab mdzes cung zad bye bas mdzes pa'i mchog /blta bya ba bltas nas gang zhig skad cig tu gyur de phyir lhag par ni/ /'gro bar mi bya mgon po zhes ni thub pa tshig med gsungs pa bzhin/ /mdza' mo shugs rings ldan pa la/ /dga' bo
<p>101a.5</p>li tA na nAH/ /a yA mA la ta e bA ha mi bi tsA rA di t+ya b+hA Sha ta/ /ta taHswa mA shra maM pra p+taM b+ha pan+taM kr-i tAny+dza liH/ /bra dzA mi swa gr-i han+tA ba da t+yA ha bi ra hA sa haH/ /ta ta sta mA sa nA sI naHpra Na taM b+ha ga pA na pu raH/ /
<p>101a.6</p>bzhin ni phyir phyogs nas/ /bdag ni ring por mi thogs par/ /'ong ba 'di nyid ces rab smras/ /de nas bcom ldan rang nyid kyi/ /gnas su byon la thal sbyar nas/ /re zhig rang khyim mchi'o zhes/ /'bral ba bzod pa med pas smras/ /de nas khrir bzhugs bcom ldan gyi/ /mdun du rab tu btud de la/ /
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>u bA tsa sa smita ke yaM ga ma ne saM pra ti twa yA/ /bi Sha yA swA da sau hA rda saM mo hA d+hi tse ta saM/ /a ho gr-i ha su kha swe ba ni rbe da bi mu khA ma tiH/ /gu NA b+ha ra Na me bA yurbi be kA b+ha ra Na gu NaH/ /pra sha mA b+ha ra Na sh+tsa
<p>101b.2</p>'dzum dang bcas gsungs da lta nyid/ /myur bar 'gro ba 'di ci zhig /yul gyi ro la gcags pa yi/ /kun rmongs kyis gzir sems ldan rnams/ /kye ma khyim gyi bdag nyid la/ /yid 'byung las ni phyir phyogs blo/ /tshe yi rgyan ni yon tan te/ /yon tan rgyan ni dben pa'o/ /'di yi rgyan ni rab zhi ste/ /zhi
<p>101b.3</p>sau bai rA gyA b+ha ra NaHsha maH/ /tadz+dza D+yaM ta da sa h+ya sha l+ya sha la kaM N+ya staM su hr-its+tse ta si prAdz+nyestang+ga Ni taM bi tsA ra sa ma ye bai pha l+ya me bA yu ShaH/ /ya d+bai rA gya pi be ka shu N+ya ma na sa me te sa shU nAM ya thA yAn+t+ya yAn+ti tsa tsakra ne me ca la
<p>101b.4</p>ba'i rgyan ni chags bral lo/ /snying sdug sems la bkod pa'i blun po de dang bzod dka'i zug rngu'i dum bu ste/ /blo ldan rnams kyis de ni rnam par dpyad tshe tshe ni 'bras bral nyid du brtsis/ /gang yid phyugs bzhin chags bral dben pa yis stong mtshan nyid med pa rnams dag gis/ /skad cig 'di dag 'ong
<p>101b.5</p>nai rni lak+Sha Na nAM k+Sha NaH/ /pu N+yaM sa twa ba tAM shrU tam+ma ti ma tAM shi laM tsa bi d+yA ba tAM sarbaM b+hA gya ba tAM su khaM sha ma ba tAM nai ba kwa tsi durla b+hi/ /duSh+p+rA d+hastu sa map+ta bstu ba sa teHswalpaM sha ke pyA yu
<p>101b.6</p>dang 'gro ba yang ni 'khor lo'i mu khyud g.yo ba bzhin/ /snying stobs ldan pa'i bsod nams blo ldan gyis thos rig byed ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / /skal ldan dag gi thams cad zhi ldan rnams kyi bde ba 'gyur yang rnyed dka'i min/ /mtha' dag dngos po'i rten gyur tshe ni shin tu chung ba'i cha yang rnyed
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>Shastad+ya s+ya k+Sha ya me ti ni s+pha la ta yA sho ts+yA ya tasmai na maH/ /bA mA bar+t+te bi Sha ya dza la d+ho pur+Na lA ba N+ya sa re dar+p+yot+pa pyad+bi Sha ma ma ka raM kod+b+ha ba k+Sho ba b+h+ya mA ne/ /ni t+yA san+na pra tsa la bi ra ha
<p>102a.2</p>dka' ste/ /'bras med nyid kyis gang gis zad 'gyur mya ngan 'os pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yul gyi chu gter g.yon ma'i klong 'khyil 'jo sgeg chu yis gang gyur pa/ /dregs pa mi bzad chu srin rab langs mtshan ma 'khrugs pa rab bskyed cing / /lhag par 'bral ba'i rta gdong
<p>102a.3</p>bral+lo pad+bA Da bag+nau puM sAM se tusta ra Na sa ra Nai tI bra bai rA gya me ba/ /tasmata gri hA Na pra bra dz+yaM rA dza pu tra dzi ten+d+ri yaH/ /e tAHs+t+ri ya i ba k+Shi praM sa mA ga su khAHshri yaH/ /kr-i ya tAM ku sha lA yai ba brah+ma
<p>102a.4</p>me ni rab 'bar rtag tu gnas pa la/ /skyes bu rnams ni sgrol lam chags bral drag po kho na bsdams pa'i stegs/ /de slad rab byung gzung bar mdzod/ /rgyal po'i sras ni dbang po thul/ /bud med bde dang dpal 'byor 'di/ /myur du yang dag 'grogs pa bzhin/ /dge ba nyid slad tshangs pa yi/ /spyod pa
<p>102a.5</p>tsaR+Ya pa ri gra haH/ /t+ya dza tA me Sha niHsA ra gr-i ha saM sA ra dur+g+ra haH/ /i ti shru twa b+ha ga ba taHka ru NA b+ha ra NaM ba tsaH/ /pra t+ya b+hA Sha ta tan+nan+daHpUdz+ya pra Na ya yan+t+ri taH/ /sa dA b+ha ba du pA yai ba pra bra dz+ya b+ha ga
<p>102a.6</p>yongs su bzung bar mdzod/ /'khor ba snying po med pa'i khyim/ /gdon ngan 'di ni gtang bar mdzod/ /bcom ldan gsung ni snying rje yis/ /brgyan pa 'di skad thos gyur nas/ /don gnyer mchod 'os kyis gdams pa'i/ /dga' bos de la lan gsol pa/ /rtag tu khyod nyid bsnyen pa nyid/ /bcom ldan bdag
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>bAn+ma ma/ /b+hi k+Shu saM g+hau pa kA rAr+he gr-i ha e bA da ra pa raM/ /i t+yu k+t+wA b+ha ga ba bAkya ma ti krAn+tu ma nA shwa raH/ /kri Sh+ya mA NaHpri yA presla so b+hUd+do lA ku lA sha yaH/ /pu naHpu nash+tsa kA rA s+ya b+ha ga bAn bra ta de sha
<p>102b.2</p>gi rab byung yin/ /dge slong dge 'dun rim gror ni/ /'os pa'i khyim la mchog tu gus/ /de skad smras nas bcom ldan gsung / /bsgom bya'i dbang phyug min pa dang / /dga' ma la dgas drangs pas 'di'i/ /bsam pa khyogs la phyang mo yug /yang dang yang du bcom ldan gyis/ /'di la brtul zhugs nyer
<p>102b.3</p>nAM/ /u pa kA rod+Ya tAHsaM tash+tsin+ta yan+taM na yo gya tAM/ /ya dA nets+tsha ti nan+dastAM pra braSh+kA ma dze tin+d+ri yaH/ /ta dA s+ya b+ha ga bad+bA kya sa pa tata ba pu Shi swa yaM/ /muN+DaHkA ShA ya par+N+Na naHpA tra bA NaHta ta k+Sha Na/ /ba b+hau tsa mI ka ra ru tsirma hA
<p>102b.4</p>bstan mdzad/ /phan par brtson pa'i dam pa rnams/ /mi 'os pa nyid mi bsam mo/ /dbang po ma thul dga' bo ni/ /gang tshe rab byung mi 'dod pa/ /de tshe de yis lus la de/ /bcom ldan gsung gis rang nyid lhung / /der ni de tshe dur smrig gos/ /mgo zlum lag na lhung bzed can/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams
<p>102b.5</p>pu ru Sha lak+Sha NaiH/ /sa sha sa nAdz+dzi na s+yA b+hU dA ra N+ya biN+DaHpA ti kaH/ /a gA rA da nA gAR+ya tAM pra yA taHpAM shu kU li kaH/ /pri yA mu bA ha sa ta taM sh+yA maM pra bra dzi to pi sa/ /sha shA ka i ba saM bak+taM hr-i da ye lAny+tsha
<p>102b.6</p>kyis/ /gser gyi 'od zer lta bur mdzes/ /dgon pa pa dang bsod snyoms par/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis der gyur to/ /khyim las khyim ni med nyid dang / /phyag dar khrod pa nyid du gyur/ /de ni rab tu byung gyur kyang / /snying la yang dag gcags pa yis/ /sngo bsangs dga' ma rtag tu 'dzin/ /zla ba'i mtshan ma
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>nats+tsha biM/ /ma na saHs+pha Di ka s+yai ba na bid+maHke na bar+t+ma nA/ /rA gaHko pi bi sha t+yan+tarnA pe te k+Sha li to pi yaH/ /bi ra ha pAN+Du ra ru tsiHsaM sak+tA ru Na tsI ba raH/ /sa san+d+ya b+h+ra da laM ka s+ya dza hA ra sha
<p>103a.2</p>mdzes pa bzhin/ /gang yang sems kyi chags pa dag /bkrus kyang 'dag pa min pa gang / /lam ni gang nas lam du zhugs/ /shel gyi bzhin du mi shes so/ /bral bas skya bor gyur pa'i 'od/ /chos gos dmar po yang dag chags/ /de ni thun mtshams sprin dum gyis/ /mtshan pa'i
<p>103a.3</p>shi niHshri yaM/ /bi tsa ran bi ha ran k+Sha maHsa bi smri ta d+h+ri tirba ne/ /dzan+ma bi d+ya ma naM ga s+ya na bi sa smA ra sun+da rI/ /saM pUr+Na tsan+d+ra ba da nA ba da na d+h+yA na nish+tsa laH/ /a tsin+ta d+hats+tsi raM tat+ta du pa bi sh+ya shi lA ta le/ /
<p>103a.4</p>zla ba'i dpal 'phrog gyur/ /nags na rgyu zhing rol byed la/ /rid cing 'dzin pa brjed pa de/ /lus med skye ba'i rig byed kyis/ /mdzes ma dag ni brjed ma gyur/ /rdo ba'i gzhi la bsdad nas ni/ /yongs rdzogs zla ba'i bzhin ras kyi/ /bzhin la bsam gtan g.yo med kyi/ /yun ring dag tu de de bsams/ /
<p>103a.5</p>a he b+ha ga bA tA pre Sha kr-i to yat+na da nu gra haH/ /nA yA ti ma ma bai mya l+yaM rA gA d+hiSh+Thi ta tse ta saH/ /shru taM saM sA ra tsa ri taM niHsaM ga bra ta mA shri taM/ /ta thA pi mr-i ga sha bA k+ShIn+na bisma ra ti me ma
<p>103a.6</p>kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /'bad pas rjes bzung 'di dag kyang / /chags pas byin brlabs bdag gi sems/ /dri ma dang bral nyid mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i spyod tshul thos gyur cing / /grogs med brtul zhugs bsten mod kyang / /ri dgas gzhon nu'i mig can ma/ /bdag gi yid la brjed pa
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>naH/ /kAn+t+wa kuM ku ma lag+na rA ga su b+ha ge gA tre kri taM tsI ba raM tat+si na sta na maN+Da la pra Na yi nA pA traM d+h+r-i tam+pA Ne nA/ /rA ga yaM ma ma bar+ha te s+ya ya di bA n+yA s+ye ba brid+d+hiHpa raM yad+bo d+hi bya ba d+hA na b+hU ta ma ni
<p>103b.2</p>med/ /mdzas ma'i gur gum gyis reg chags pa'i skal bzang lus la snam sbyar legs par bgos/ /de yi nu rgyas dkyil 'khor rab tu nyed pa'i lag pas lhung bzed legs par bzung / /gang zhig byang chub gegs su gyur pa de la dmigs pa'i nyin mtshan bsam gtan can/ /bdag gi chags pa dag ni
<p>103b.3</p>shaM d+h+yA naM ta da laM ba naM/ /k+Sha Ne na mAM prAp+ta ma be hi mug+d+h+we tA me ba muk+t+wa ga ma ne pu rastA ta/ /a ho ma yA daR+sha na big+h+ni b+hU taM pash+tsAta kr-i tag+h+na bra ta me ta dAt+taM/ /no gan+ta bya mi ti pra kam+pa ta ra lA bAkya ya du tse na sa
<p>103b.4</p>gal te 'phel na mchog tu rigs pa nyid du 'phel/ /mdzes ma skad cig gis ni bdag 'ong zhes/ /sngon ni de la de ltar 'ong bar brjod/ /kye ma phrad pa'i bgegs gyur brtul zhugs 'di/ /byas pa mi gzo bdag gis phyi nas blangs/ /gang de'i rab tu 'dar zhing g.yo ba'i tshig gis 'gro bar mi bya zhes smras shing / /bla
<p>103b.5</p>saM t+ya dz+ya bya dza naM s+thi te gu ru dza ne dza grA ha paN+pAM tsa laM/ /yat+pa de na li khan+na pi k+Shi te ta laM mA maik+Sha tA la k+Shi tA te nA t+yaM ni She d+ha mug+d+ha bi d+hi na bar+d+hAn+ta yA me ma naH/ /mad+bi yuk+tA na sA nu naM she te sho ka pra lA pi nI/ /
<p>103b.6</p>ma'i skye bo gnas tshe gang zhig rlung yab dor te thu ba nas kyang bzung / /gang zhig rkang pas sa la 'dri zhing mthong ba min yang bdag la zur mig mtshon/ /dgag pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i rim pa de yis bdag gi yid ni de yis bsdams/ /bdag bral ri dgas mig can de/ /'jug ngogs ngur pa mo bzhin du/ /
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>su li ne tsakra bA kI ba harmye ha ri Na lo tsa na/ /hA pri ye t+yak+ta sa t+ye na ki ta be ne ba ke ba laM/ /shri taM twats+tshit+ta tsau re Na pi th+yA bra ta mi dam+ma yA/ /tak+t+wa bra ta mi dan+tA bta gats+tshA mi dA yi tAM kaM /a nu rA gAg+ni tab+tA naM ta
<p>104a.2</p>ba gam can na mya ngan dag /sgrog cing mi nyal yod dam snyam/ /kyi hud dga' ma g.yo can gyis/ /'ba' zhig pa bzhin bden pa btang / /khyod kyi sems kyi chom rkun ngas/ /rdzun gyi brtul zhugs 'di la brten/ /re zhig brtul zhugs 'di btang nas/ /mdzes ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya/ /gang phyir chags pa'i mes gdungs
<p>104a.3</p>pastA po hi duHsa haH/ /rA dza pu trI tsi rA yA taM nr-i shaM sa ma ba lokya maM/ /man+Yu nA na ba lag+ne na na dzA ne kiM ka ri Sh+ya te/ /na sarba tra bi kA rA ya ni kA raHpre ma duHsa haH/ /durni pA ro b+ha ba t+ye ba sne ha li no ra dzaH
<p>104a.4</p>pa'i/ /dka' thub gdung ba bzod par dka'/ /sdig can yun ring nas 'ongs pa/ /bdag mthong rgyal po'i bu mo de/ /gsar du skyes pa'i khro ba yis/ /ci byed par 'gyur yongs mi shes/ /mdza' la chags pa'i rdul gyi cha/ /gnod cing dga' med bzod dka' ba/ /nges par zlog pa dka' ba nyid/ /kun tu rnam 'gyur
<p>104a.5</p>ka naH/ /yasmin k+Sha Ne b+ha ga ba tA pa sh+ya mi ra hi taM ba naM/ /ma yA ta de ba gan+ta bya gr-i ha ma t+ye Sha nish+tsa yaH/ /asmin+ne ba shi lA paT+Te ru tsi rairgi ri d+hA tu b+hiH/ /li kha mi tAM sha shi mu khI saM pra t+yA lam+ba naM d+h+ri teH/ /a tha bA ka tha
<p>104a.6</p>nyid kyis bslad/ /gang gi dus na bcom ldan gyis/ /nags 'di btang bar mthong gyur pa/ /de tshe kho na bdag khyim du/ /'gro bar bya zhes 'di nges so/ /da ni dga' ba'i dmigs rten du/ /rdo yi glegs bu 'di nyid la/ /ri yi khams ni yid 'ong gi/ /zla bzhin ma de bdag gis bris/ /yang na gang gis mdzes
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>mA le khya bi Sha yaM yA ti sA pri yA/ /son+daR+Y+Ya bin+da bo ya s+yAHsu d+hA ku ba len+da baH/ /dr-iSh+Tirmug+d+ha ku raM gI tsa la da li byap+tot+pe lA brti ni lA ba N+yo da d+hi ku la bi dru ma ba naM bim+bA d+ha ro gra twe ShaH/ /nirdo ShA mr-i ta rasmi sAr+tha sha ra
<p>104b.2</p>sdug thigs/ /bdud rtsi'i ut+pal zla ba 'dra/ /mdzes ma de ni ri mo yi/ /yul du ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog ri dwags mig ni bung ba g.yo bas khyab pa'i ut+pal 'khyil ba bzhin/ /'jo sgeg chu gter 'gram du byu ru'i nags ltar mchu ni bim pa'i 'od rab gsal/ /gang yang kha yi 'od de skyon med bdud rtsi'i
<p>104b.3</p>NiHsA kA pi bak+t+rad+Yu tiHpun+daR+Ya ka tha me ti tsi tra pA da bI mash+tsaR+ya pA raM ba puH/ /i te sa tsin+t+ya pa sha nai ra li le kha shi lA ta le/ /pun+da rI ma ka tha ma s+ya shru snA ta kaM pAM ku lAM gu liH/ /sa saM kalpa sa mud gIr+N+NaM pra ti bim+ba
<p>104b.4</p>zer gyi don mthun dag gi lam/ /mdzes ma lus ni ngo mtshar snying po ri mo'i lam du ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'di bsams de yis rdo gzhi la/ /mchi mas bkrus shing 'dar ba yis/ /'khrugs pa'i sor mos ji ltar yang / /mdzes ma dag ni dal bus bris/ /de yis rtog pas gsal byas pa'i/ /gzugs
<p>104b.5</p>mi bA shri tAM/ /kr-i twa pu raHpri ya ta mA ma tsA darbASh+pa gang+ga daH/ /pri yA mA li khya haM ni khi la su kha pr-iSh+Ti na ya na yorna par sh+ya myud+bASh+paHk+Sha Na ma pi sha rats+tsan+d+ra ba da nAM/ /a yaM n+tu naM ta n+wI bi ra ha na pe k+Shu bra ta
<p>104b.6</p>brnyan lta bu la brten par/ /sngon du byas nas mdzes ma la/ /mchi mas 'dzer 'dzer skad du smras/ /mig gnyis ma lus bde ba'i char rgyun ston ka'i zla ba'i bzhin ras can/ /mdzes ma bdag gis bris te mig chus rgyas pas skad cig kyang ma mthong / /gzugs can ma dang bral la ltos med brtul zhugs ldan pa
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>ba taHs+phu ran+ta baHsha paHki ma pi ma ma pA bA duHpa na taH/ /phul+lAM b+ho dza ba na twi ShA spr-i ha dwa shA sak+tA su tA yaM ba pustAt+ka lo pa ga tAn+ta rA ya dza ni taHko paHsa mut+p+r-i dz+ya tAM/ /haM ho pun+da ri de hi me pra ti ba tsa ta kiM mau
<p>105a.2</p>bdag la ni/ /sdig las ci yang gdung ba rab bskyad dmod pa zug pa ma yin nam/ /rgyas pa'i chu skyes nags kyi 'od 'dra dga' ba'i mig gis rjes su chags pa'i lus/ /de yi dus na nye bar gyur pa'i bar chad kyis bskrun khro ba yang dag thong / /kwa ye mdzes ma bdag la tshig lan byin cig mi smra bar
<p>105a.3</p>na mA lan+pa se sa t+yaM twan+ma ya rA ga tsI ba ra mi baM tsin+ta bra taM me bra taM/ /i ti bru ba NaM taM dr-iSh+T+wA dU rA dA li khi taM ma naM/ /pA sU yA b+hi k+ShA bo b+h+ye t+ya b+ha ga ban taM ba b+hA Shi te/ /b+ha ga ban durbi nI ta s+ya bAd+sa l+yA de ba
<p>105a.4</p>ni ci la 'dug /bden par bdag kyang khyod la chags pa'i chos gos 'di bsam brtul zhugs brtul zhugs so/ /de skad smra zhing bud med dag /bris pa ring nas mthong gyur nas/ /khro ldan dge slong rnams kyis ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs smras/ /bcom ldan khyed kyis ma dul la/ /mnyes gshin
<p>105a.5</p>ge ba laM/ /shu naHku su ma mA le ba pra bra dz+ye yaM twa yarbi tA/ /A le khya pun+da rI ma kha nan+da swai raM shi lA ta le/ /tat+p+ra lA ba dza dA sak+t+ya d+h+yA nA lam+ba na tAM ga taH/ /e ta dA kar+N+ya b+ha ga bAn+nan+da mA hAy+Ya kA na nAta/
<p>105a.6</p>'ba' zhig pa nyid las/ /rab tu byung ba 'di byin te/ /khyi la me tog 'phreng ba bzhin/ /mdzes ma bris nas dga' bo ni/ /rdo ba'i gzhi la dal bu yis/ /de brjod bzlas pa la chags shing / /bsam gtan la ni dmigs par 'gyur/ /de dag thos nas bcom ldan gyis/ /dga' ma bral ba'i rmongs gyur pa'i/ /
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>ki me ta ri ti sa prats+tsha pri yA bi ra ha mo hi taM/ /so bra bI ta b+ha ga ban sa t+yaM kAn+tarak+ta s+ya me pa raM/ /b+hik+Shu NAM sam+ma te s+yasmin ba ne nar ma te ma tiH/ /i di nan+da ba tsaHshru tA ta mU tse b+ha ga bAn dze naH/ /mI la yan+ne ba bak+t+re n+du
<p>105b.2</p>dga' bo nags nas bos nas ni/ /'di dag ci zhes rab tu bris/ /de smras bcom ldan bden par ni/ /mchog tu mdzes ma la chags bdag /dge slong rnams ni 'dod gyur kyang / /nags tshal 'di la blo mi dga'/ /de skad dga' bo'i tshig thos nas/ /zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /'dod chags chu skyes 'dzum
<p>105b.3</p>kAn+t+ya rA ga sa ro tu haM/ /sA d+ho b+ha ba na yuk+te saM rA gA da nu tsi tA ma tiH/ /bi g+h+nairnA kr-i Sh+ya te tse taHka l+yA NA b+hi ni be shi nAM/ /kwA yaM yo gasta nu tr-i Na tu lA t+yak+ta b+ho gA b+hi yo gaHkwa yaM nin+d+yaHk+Sha Na su kha
<p>105b.4</p>pa bzhin/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas de la gsungs/ /kun tu chags las mi rigs blo/ /dam pa khyod kyi rigs ma yin/ /dge la mngon par dga' rnams kyis/ /sems ni bgegs rnams kyis mi khugs/ /longs spyod rtswa yi gzegs ma dang mtshungs btang la mngon sbyor rigs pa 'di ni gang / /skad cig bde ba'i cha
<p>105b.5</p>la bA swA da saM bA daH/ /dzA t+yai bA yaM ha ra ti ku sha laM dusta ro mA ra mArgaH pre mAn+d+hA nA b+ha bti sa ha sA duHsa ho ya tra yA taH/ /i t+ya s+ya b+ha ga bAn kr-i twA tsi raM bai rA gya de sha naM/ /tat+s+thA ta byA mi he
<p>105b.6</p>yi ro myang tshogs dang 'grogs pa smad 'os 'di ni gang / /chags pas long ba rnams ni gang du 'phral la ltung byed bzod dkar gyur pa yi/ /bsgral dka' bdud kyi lam 'di rigs nyid kyis ni dge ba 'phrog par byed pa yin/ /de skad de la chags bral dag /yun ring bstan bar mdzad nas ni/ /'dug bya zhes brjod
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>t+yuk+t+wa swa kr-i t+yA ya swA yaM ya yau/ /ta me bA ba sa ran+nan+daHsaM tsiM t+ya ga ma ne tsi taM/ /pra tas+the swa gr-i haM hriSh+TaHpun+da rI daR+sha not+su kaH/ /bra dzan dwA ri pi d+hA nAp+tairbi hA rairba hu b+hish+tsa rAta/ /na ga rA b+hi mu khaM
<p>106a.2</p>bcom ldan rang / /rang gi bya ba'i slad du gshegs/ /mdzes ma lta la chags pa yi/ /dga' ldan dga' bo'i gnas skabs der/ /'gro bar 'os par bsams nas ni/ /rang gi khyim du chas par gyur/ /gtsug lag khang ni mang po yi/ /sgo rnams bcad pas yun ring na/ /grong khyer mngon phyogs lam
<p>106a.3</p>mArgaM ka thaM tsi da bAp+ta bAn/ /a tha bi dz+nyA ya sarba dz+nyastaM rA gA ta gan+tu mud+Ya taM/ /u ba tsA b+h+ye t+ya b+ha ga bAn nan+da tUr+N+NaM kwa ga mya te/ /sa dza gA da ba ne tA bad+b+ha ga ban+nAsti me ra tiH/ /na h+ya bi shrAn+ta tsit+ta nAM kri yA kA tsita
<p>106a.4</p>dag ni/ /ji zhig ltar stes thob nas 'gro/ /de nas chags las 'gro brtson de/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan gyis/ /mkhyen nas mngon phyogs bka' stsal pa/ /dga' bo mgyogs par gang du 'gro/ /de nas bcom ldan re zhig ni/ /nags na bdag la dga' ba med/ /sems ni ngal bsos min rnams kyis/ /bya ba
<p>106a.5</p>pra sI da ti/ /sA shrIsh+tsa ma ra hA si nI ma Ni mA yI sA ra mya harmya ba lI sA bA lA ni la lo la tsU ta la ti kA kAn+tA na bod+YA na b+hUH/ /sA ta n+wi ku su me Shu kArmu ka la tA k+Sha mo da rI pun+da rI no dzan+mAn+ta ra bA
<p>106a.6</p>gang yang dag pa min/ /dpal ni rnga yab bzhad ldan de dang nor bu'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i ba gam 'phreng ldan de/ /a mra'i 'khri shing rlung bzhon gyis bskyod skyed tshal gsar pa'i sa gzhi mdzes pa de dang ni/ /me tog mnga' can gzhu yi 'khri shing gzugs bzang lto ba phra ba'i mdzes ma de dag la/ /skye ba
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>sa nA i ba ma naHsak+taM pi muny+tsan+ti me/ /sA rA ge Nai ba ma na sA brah+ma tsaR+ya tsa rA mya haM/ /bra ta pany+dza ra ban+d+he na bi haM ga i ba yan+t+ri taH/ /tak+t+wa bra dzA mi pra bra dz+ya mastu me na ra ke k+Sha
<p>106b.2</p>gzhan gyi bag chags bzhin du bdag gi yid ni chags las rnam par mi grol lo/ /yid ni chags bcas kho na yis/ /tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /brtul zhugs 'ching ba'i gzeb dag gis/ /mkha' la 'gro ba bsdams pa bzhin/ /gos ni tshon gyis dmar ba yis/ /'dod chags bral ba nyid
<p>106b.3</p>yaH/ /na bI ta rA ga tA me ti many+dziSh+ThA rak+ta maM shu kaH/ /i ti bru bA Na ma sa kr-i ta swa pa daM gan+tu mud+Ya taM/ /ni bAR+YA nu gra ha d+hi yA ta mU tse b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /mA kr-i thA bi sla baM nan+ta ni n+di taM bi shu ta shu taH/ /bid+ba ta
<p>106b.4</p>mi 'gyur/ /rab byung btang nas bdag 'gro'o/ /bdag gi dmyal ba zad gyur cig /de skad lan gcig min smra zhing / /rang gnas 'gro bar brtson de la/ /ldog cing rjes bzung blo gros kyis/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /shes ldan skye bo nyer sten la/ /so so'i skye bor mi 'gyur bzhin/ /dga' ba
<p>106b.5</p>dza no pa tuSh+De na ya thA yA ti pri thag+dza naH/ /bi be ka byasta do ShA NAM bi du ShAM shI la shA li nAM/ /niHsA ra su kha lo b+he na na d+hi pra brta te/ /gA D+ha rA ga gr-i hI ta s+ya dzu gup+pa yA ta ne pa raM/ /dza ga n+ya karma n+yA sak+tiH
<p>106b.6</p>thos pas rnam par grags/ /smad cing bslad pa ma byed cig /rnam par rig pas skyon bshig cing / /tshul khrims ldan pa mkhas rnams blo/ /snying po med pa'i bde ba la/ /chags pas bya min la mi 'jug /mchog tu smad pa'i khang par ni/ /ngan pa'i las la kun tu chags/ /rgya chen 'dod chags 'dzin
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>kiM ladz+dzA dza na nI te/ /yo ni dza yo ni saM sak+taHsta na pA sta na mardi naH/ /a ho ra ta na ladz+dzan+te dzan+ma n+ye ba la yaM ga taH/ /sa dA sadz+dza na brdzi tAHdza na nI dza g+ha nA sak+ti/ /saM mo hA ha ta tsit+tA nAM pa shu na me ba dr-i sh+ya
<p>107a.2</p>pa khyod/ /ngo tsha skye ba min pa ci/ /skye gnas las skyes skye gnas chags/ /nu ma 'thungs pa nu ma nyed/ /kye ma ngo tsha mi byed pa/ /skye ba nyid la brlag par 'gyur/ /rtag tu dam pa'i skye bo spangs/ /ma yi sbrom la chags gyur pa/ /sems ni kun rmongs kyis bcom pa'i/ /phyugs rnams
<p>107a.3</p>te/ /rA mA ra ma Na mA no yaM bi ra mya t+ya dz+ya tAM twa yA/ /b+ho gaiHsa ha b+hu dza gA nAM dr-iSh+To b+ha ba bi le k+Sha yaH/ /dza g+ha n+yA dza na ya t+ye ba na ka s+ya bi ra tiM ra tiH/ /ya s+yAM b+ha ba ti paR+Yan+te sha pi nA ma pa
<p>107a.4</p>nyid la mthong ba yin/ /bud med skyes pa'i nga rgyal 'di/ /khyod kyis dga' dang bral nas thong / /srid pa'i khung bur lag 'gro rnams/ /longs spyod dang bcas 'jig pa mthong / /sgrom las skyes pa'i dga' ba dag /su yi yid 'byung skyed mi bskyed/ /gang gi mjug tu khyi rnams kyang / /nges par kha ni
<p>107a.5</p>rAd+mu khaH/ /gr-i ha dzA la bi muk+ta stAM kin+t+ra de bA b+hi d+hA ba ta si/ /na hi nirga t+ya ba raM gaHpu narbi sha ti bA gu rAM/ /i ti bAkyA ta b+ha ga ba taHshA sa ne na bi yan+t+ri taH/ /tsin+ta yan pun+da rI nan+daHpra bi be shA shra ma pu
<p>107a.6</p>phyir phyogs 'gyur/ /khyim gyi rgya las rnam grol khyod/ /de nyid du mngon rgyug pa ci/ /gang phyir ri dwags thar gyur pa/ /slar yang rgyar ni 'jug pa min/ /de skad bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa'i/ /bka' yis nges par gdams pa yi/ /dga' bo mdzes ma sems byed cing / /slar yang gnas su rab
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>naH/ /ta taHka dA tsi dA di sh+ya man+da mA shra ma mArdza ne/ /A sa nA nu gra ha bya graHpra ya yau b+ha ga bAn bu nAH/ /tats+tshA sa nAta pra brit+ta s+ya nan+da s+yA shra ma shwo d+ha ne/ /na b+hU ta lA da pa ya yau ra dzau rA ga i bA
<p>107b.2</p>tu zhugs/ /de nas nam zhig dga' bo la/ /gnas khang phyag dar bsgos nas ni/ /phongs pa'i rjes 'dzin la brtson pa'i/ /bcom ldan slar yang rab tu gshegs/ /de yi bka' yis gnas khang dag /spyod la rab zhugs dga' bo yis/ /bsams pa las ni 'dod chags bzhin/ /sa las rdul
<p>107b.3</p>sha ya ta/ /ta s+yA hartuM ga ta s+yA r+tha sha li laM pA ri b+ho gi kaM /mu huHpUr+Na sa mut+k+wip+taHshun+ye e pa b+ha bta g+ha TaH/ /te na big+h+na na ga ma ne su ta rAM khin+na mA na saH/ /tak+t+wa tu pra ya yau nan+daHpun+da rI daR+sha not+pu kaH/ /a
<p>107b.4</p>rnams yongs ma song / /yongs su spyod pa'i chu dag ni/ /len du song bar gyur pa de'i/ /yang yang bkang zhing rab blangs tshe/ /bum pa stong pa nyid du gyur/ /bgegs ni de yis yid dag ni/ /shin tu skyo nas 'gro ba'i slad/ /mdzes ma blta bar 'dod pa 'di/ /dga' bos btang nas rab tu song / /de
<p>107b.5</p>tha bi dz+nya ya sarbastaM yat+taM di bya tsak+Shu ShA/ /ba b+hA She sa ha sA b+h+ye t+yastaM b+ha mA na ma no ra thaH/ /ba tra yo ge na tab+ta s+ya sh+yA ma rak+ta ru tseHpa raM/ /a ho sne ha ka laM kaste dI pa s+ya ba na shA mya ti/ /a laM bA mA b+hi la She Na nI lI
<p>107b.6</p>nas re ba brtan pa yis/ /'gro ba de ni kun mkhyen gyi/ /lha yi spyan gyis mkhyen gyur nas/ /'phral la mngon phyogs bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma mdza' ba'i snum gyi dri/ /snod du sbyar bas tsha byed cing / /khyod kyi chags pa mtshan mo'i 'od/ /mar me bzhin du zhi mi 'gyur/ /g.yon ma mchog tu mngon 'dod pas/ /
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>rA ga i bai Sha te/ /saM sak+taHko pi hr-i da ye yan+na d+yA d+hi bi ra dz+ya se/ /an+d+hi ka ro ti pra raM b+he ra tistata kA la ka ta raM/ /A ling+ga ti dzu gup+se ba pra brit+te mu khyAM ga saM ga me/ /bi Sha ya swA da saM
<p>108a.2</p>ci yang khyod snying la chags 'di/ /da dung yang ni mi 'bral te/ /gang zhig rams kyi tshon bzhin no/ /chags pa rab tu brtsams pa'i tshe/ /de dus 'jigs shing long bar byed/ /yan lag gtsor bgrod rab zhugs tshe/ /smad pa nyid kyis kun tu 'khyud/ /yul gyi nyams myong dang
<p>108a.3</p>ge na pa pA mi trai ri ben+d+ri yaiH/ /duHsa ha bya sa nA brte yA t+ya te na ra ke na raH/ /a d+hi bA sa ya ti spaR+sha le she nA pi ku saM ga maH/ /pra klin+na mat+sa ku Na pA ta pU ti gan+d+ha i bong+ga taH/ /ka l+yA Na mi tra saM brkaHsarba
<p>108a.4</p>'grogs pa/ /sdig pa'i grogs lta'i dbang po yis/ /sdug bsngal bzod dka' 'khyil ba yis/ /dmyal bar mi rnams 'phen par byed/ /'grogs ngan reg pa'i cha yis kyang / /lhag bar rab tu sgo bar byed/ /nya dang ro ni rul pa yis/ /dri nga rab tu ldang ba bzhin/ /dge ba'i grogs kyis reg gyur pa/ /
<p>108a.5</p>thA ku sha la ba haH/ /shu b+ha mo da i ba byap+ta yaHka ro tI ma hAr+ha tAM/ /i t+yuk+t+we ta s+ya b+ha ga bAn sA k+ShA ta sa da sa twaH/ /pa thiHspaR+she na saM daR+sh+ya tsakre tat+saM ga re sha nAM/ /a tha nan+di sa mA da ya b+ha ga bAn gan+d+ha ma da ni/ /ya
<p>108a.6</p>rnam pa kun tu dge ba 'dzin/ /dge ba'i dri bzang gis khyab bzhin/ /gang zhig rin ni chen por byed/ /'di brjod de la bcom ldan gyis/ /dam pa dam pa min pa'i lam/ /mngon du reg pas dri bstan nas/ /grogs ni de dag bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas dga' bo bcom ldan gyis/ /khyer nas ri yi dbang po ni/ /spos
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>yau gI rin+d+raM tsa ma rI bA la bya dza na bI dzi taM/ /ta tra dA bA na la p+luSh+Ta ma niSh+Ta kliSh+Ta bi graM haM/ /kA NAM marka Di ka ma s+yai daR+sha yi twa ba dadz+dzi naH/ /i maM pa sh+ya pi kiM nan+da mAn+d+ya nin+d+ya ta rA kr-i tiM/ /ka smai tsi du tsi tA tse
<p>108b.2</p>ngad ldang ba'i ri dwags kyi/ /rnga ma'i rlung yab g.yob par gshegs/ /der ni nags mes tshig gyur cing / /mi sdug shin tu rid pa'i lus/ /spra mo zhar ma de la ni/ /bstan nas rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /dga' bo 'di ni mthong ngam ci/ /dman pas shin tu smad pa'i yid/ /'di la'ang su zhig 'os
<p>108b.3</p>yaM ro tsa ti pri ya daR+sha nA/ /sat+tA sa da sa to nAstI rA gaHpa sh+ya ti ra mya tAM/ /sa ta s+ya kha li to lo ke yo ya s+ya da yi to dza naH/ /pak+Sha pA taM sa muta sr-i dz+ya sa t+yaM nan+da twa yo ts+ya tAM/ /a s+yA sta s+yAsh+tsa pun+daR+YA lA ba N+ya s+ya ki man+ta
<p>108b.4</p>pa yi/ /dga' mar mthong nas sred pa yin/ /legs dang mi legs yod nyid min/ /dga' ba nyid du chags pas lta/ /'jig rten na ni skye bo gang / /gang gi dga' de de yis dga'/ /'di dang mdzes ma de yi ni/ /mdzes pa'i bar na ci zhig yod/ /dga' bo khyod kyi phyogs lhung dag /rab tu thong la bden par
<p>108b.5</p>raM/ /a na r+thi twad+ba yaM ne ba saun+daR+YAn+da ra be di naH/ /ar+thi pri ya twa ma yA ti tsa tsA tu taM/ /pa sh+yA mya haM bi she ShaM tu nA s+ya ta s+yash+tsa kriM tsa na/ /ra mya twaM mAM sa tsarmA s+thi yan+t+re sa ma yA mA tra kAM/ /i ti
<p>108b.6</p>smros/ /bdag gis don du ma gnyer slad/ /mdzes pa'i khyad nyid rig pa med/ /don du gnyer na dga' bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba nyid na mdzes pa nyid/ /'di dang de la khyad par dag /ngas ni cung zad ma mthong ste/ /sha pags rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor la/ /dga' bar dam tshig byas tsam nyid/ /de skad
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>pr-iSh+To b+ha ga ba tA nan+da staM pra t+ya b+hA Sha taH/ /a t+yan+tA nu tsi ta prash+naHko pi gau ra ba yan+t+ri taH/ /ki me tata b+ha ga bAn bak+ti ke laM sho ke bi Dam+ba nAH/ /ka pya bA bi shwa gu ra bo bi ni yA pra b+ha baMSh+Na baH/ /ra tiHsA d+hi
<p>109a.2</p>bcom ldan gyis dri ba/ /shin tu rigs min dris gyur cing / /gang yang bla mas gdams gyur pa'i/ /dga' bos de la lan gsol pa/ /bcom ldan de skad ci la gsungs/ /gang 'di mya ngan la co 'dri/ /kun gyi bla ma gtso bor ni/ /gyur pa su yis rnam par dul/ /mdzes ma yi ni dga'
<p>109a.3</p>pun+daR+YAHpa ra b+ha ge na rA dz+ya te/ /yaM dr-iSh+Ta dza ga tAM dze tA na ra ti sma ra ti sma raH/ /dz+yot+s+na ye ba na tat+kan+t+yA mo da te ku mu dA kA raH/ /gu NAn+ta raM na dza nA ti pra sid+d+hi sha ra No dza naH/ /brtan+ta yA ba da na sau ra b+ha sA ra
<p>109a.4</p>ba de/ /mchog gi cha la mdzes pa ste/ /'gro las rgyal ba'i dran pa yang / /gang mthong dga' ma mi dran no/ /de yi mdzes pas ku mud tshal/ /dga' bzhin zla ba'i 'od kyis min/ /grags pa'i lam 'gro blun po yis/ /yon tan khyad par yongs mi shes/ /de yis me tog tshogs rnams bzhin gyi dri bzang
<p>109a.5</p>tsau ra mA lo kya puSh+pa ni tsa yaM pri thu ke sha pa she/ /ma n+ye bi lA sa ga ti lo tsa na kAn+ti tsau rai r+b+hA t+ye ba haM sa ha ri Nairba na me ba yA taM/ /a nalpaiHsaM kalperba hu bi d+ha be kalpai ra nu pa mA na sA gA raM gAk+Shi li
<p>109a.6</p>nor la ni/ /brkus par mthong nas rab tu rgyas pa'i skra tshogs dag la bcings/ /'jo sgeg 'gros dang mig gis mdzes pa dag la brkus gyur pa'i/ /ngang pa ri dgas 'jigs bzhin nags nyid du ni bros sam snyam/ /ri dwags mig can dpe med ma de yongs 'dris brtag pa mi nyung zhing / /rnam mang rnam par rtog
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>khi tu ma pi shAkya pa ri tsi taiH/ /tu lA ro he ya s+ya ba da na pa ra b+hA ge la g+hu ta yA sa nU naM tA rA NAM ga ga na ma d+hi rU D+haHpa ri br-i D+heH/ /pu N+ya pra pyaM la li ta pa li ta b+h+ru la tA lA s+ya lI lA ra mya ta s+yA ya di na ba da naM nan+da naM la b+h+ya te
<p>109b.2</p>pas kyang ni dri bar nus pa nyid ma yin/ /gang gi bzhin mdzes dag dang srang la gzhal tshe yang ba nyid kyi na/ /rgyu skar bdag po de ni mkha' la lhag par 'dzeg pa ma yin nam/ /bsod nams kyis 'thab yad 'ong smin ma'i 'khri shing g.yo ldan sgeg cing rol/ /de yi bzhin ni yid 'phrog dga' dang ldan
<p>109b.3</p>tata/ /pra bra dz+ye yaM su kr-i ta ma d+hi kaM kiM ka ri Sh+ya to me ka smA de taM bra ta pa ri ka raM b+hA ra b+hU raM ba hA mi/ /i ti nan+da ba tsaHshru twA b+ha ga bA na rA ga nir+b+ha raM/ /ut+k+Shi s+ya pra b+ha be na taM ni nA ya su rA la
<p>109b.4</p>te gal te mi 'thob na/ /rab byung 'dis bdag legs byas lhag par ci zhig bgyid 'gyur 'di yi slad/ /brtul zhugs yo byad khur du gyur pa 'di dag ci slad bdag 'khur lags/ /de skad dga' bo'i tshig thos nas/ /chags pa rab tu rgyas pa de/ /bcom ldan rang gi mthus blangs nas/ /lha yi gnas su
<p>109b.5</p>yaM/ /a daR+sha pats+tsha ta tra s+ya lI lod+Ya ne sha ta kra toH/ /su d+hA man+tha sa mud+b+hU tAHkAn+tA s+t+ri da sha yo Shi taH/ /a ru NaiHkAn+ti san+t+rA naiHpA da pad+ma ba no di taiH/ /a nu yA tA i bAM b+ho d+hi kU la bi dru ma kA na naiH/ /bi shA
<p>109b.6</p>phyin par gyur/ /brgya byin dga' tshal de ru ni/ /bdud rtsi bsrubs las rab 'khrungs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo mdzes pa dag /de la rab tu bstan par gyur/ /rkang pa pad tshal las 'khrungs pa/ /mdzes pa'i rgyud ni dmar po yis/ /chu gter dogs kyi byu ru yis/ /nags kyi rjes su 'khrid pa bzhin/ /yongs 'du
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>la lA s+ya sa tsi baiHpa Ni b+hirbi dzi tAM bu dzAH/ /saM sak+taiHsa ha dza s+yai ba pA ri dzA ta s+ya pal+la baiH/ /kAn+tirma d+huR+Ya la li tairma da nA nan+da bAn+d+ha beH/ /he la ni mI li tAM b+ho dza ba da naish+tsan+d+ra sau da reH/ /sa m+mo
<p>110a.2</p>lhan cig skyes pa yis/ /yal 'dab chags pa ltar gyur pa/ /rol zhing sgeg pa'i grogs po yis/ /lag pas chu skyes dag las rgyal/ /mdzes shing yid 'ong rol pa dang / /'dod pa kun tu dga' ba'i grogs/ /chu skyes bde blag nyid du ni/ /'dzum byed zla ba'i 'gran zla dang / /kr-iSh+Na
<p>110a.3</p>ha ne rdzI ba naish+tsa kr-iSh+Na sA rairbi lo ka naiH/ /ka la kU Dats+tsha Da spr-iSh+Tai ra mr-i to g+hai ri bA br-i tAH/ /pUr+NA yau ba na lA ba N+yaHsa ha sai ba bi lokya tAH/ /nan+da sA nan+da ba da naHswe da snA ta i bA b+hA bta/ /pad+ma na nA su
<p>110a.4</p>sA ri'i mig dag dang / /kun rmongs gso bas nag mo ni/ /brtsegs pa'i ri mos reg pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bzhin/ /mdzes sdug lang tsho rdzogs gyur pa/ /de dag mthong nas 'phral nyid du/ /kun dga'i bzhin ldan dga' bo ni/ /rdul gyis bkrus pa bzhin du gyur/ /pad+mo'i bzhin ras
<p>110a.5</p>bi pu lot+pa la lo tsa nA su kun+da smi tA pu ni bi Dasta ba ka sta nI Shu/ /nan+da s+ya tA su hr-i da yaM yu ga pa ta ni pa ta do lA bi lA sa ta ra lA lI tu lA ma bA pa/ /ta taHpro bA tsa b+ha ga bAn nan+daM tad+ga ta mA na saM/ /a s+yA saM daR+sha ne nan+da pri t+ya te ra ma te
<p>110a.6</p>dang ni ut+pal rgyas pa'i mig /kun da'i 'dzum dang me tog tshom bu'i nu rgyas can/ /de dag rnams la dga' bo'i snying ni cig car du/ /phyogs lhung bung ba rol cing g.yo ba dang mtshungs thob/ /de la yid song dga' bo la/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /dga' bo 'di dag mthong ba dang / /chags pas
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>ma tiH/ /A sA ta s+yash+tsa pun+daR+Ya lA ba Ne ki ya dan+ta raM/ /ut+kaR+ShaHpa ra b+hA ge na s+phu Da e ba bi b+ha bye te/ /ni rasta pun+da ri rU paM rU pa map+sa ra pAM ya di/ /ta de tA e ba kA le na ka ri Sh+ya mi twe da shra yAH/ /
<p>110b.2</p>khyod blo dga' 'am ci/ /'di rnams dag dang mdzes ma de'i/ /mdzes sdug khyad par ji snyed cig /gzhan gyi cha las rab gyur pa/ /gsal ba kho nar rtogs par bya/ /gal te lha mo rnams kyi gzugs/ /mdzes ma'i gzugs bas lhag pa na/ /de phyir de dag kho na nyid/ /dus kyis khyod la brten par byas/ /
<p>110b.3</p>A ra ge Nai ba ma na sA brah+mA tsad+yaM pra san+sa d+hiH/ /tsa ra tA bat+ta tasne haM dA s+ya myap+sa ra sAM ga NaM/ /e baM b+ha ga ba to bAkyA na nan+daHsaM dzA ta nish+tsa yaH/ /ta the t+yuk+t+wa bra te tse tash+tsa kre swargAM ga nA shA yA/ /man+da da raHswa
<p>110b.4</p>re zhig rab tu dang ba'i blo/ /yid ni chags bral kho na yis/ /tshangs spyod spyod cig de nas ngas/ /lha mo'i tshogs ni khyod la byin/ /de ltar bcom ldan gsung gi ni/ /nges pa skyes pa'i dga' bo yis/ /de bzhin zhes brjod brtul zhugs sems/ /mtho ris bu mo'i bsam pas byas/ /de dang 'grogs 'dod
<p>110b.5</p>dA re Shu swa b+hut+tat+saM ga bAM ts+tsha yA/ /gu Na pa N+ya tu laM prI ternAsti sne ha s+ya sa t+ya tA/ /a ho bi smr-i ta saM ba sa pra ba sa pa ri sho Shi tA/ /puM sA mA b+h+yA si kI prI tiHsa ha pA n+ya tra d+hA ba ti/ /k+Sha Na yau ba na ra myA Ni pre ma Ni
<p>110b.6</p>gyur pas des/ /rang gi chung ma la gus dman/ /yon tan zong mtshungs dga' ba yis/ /mdza' ba bden pa nyid ma yin/ /skyes bu'i goms skyes mdza' ba ni/ /gzhan du yongs su dman pa yis/ /kye ma gnas ni brjed gyur nas/ /'phral la gzhan du rgyug pa nyid/ /skad cig lang tsho dga' ba yis/ /mdza'
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>pra Na ya bya yaiH/ /na pa d+hA ni na ni t+yA ni su khA ni ba sha rI ri NAM/ /ta to b+ha ga ba tA nan+daHk+Sha NAn+ni ta swa mA shra maM/ /tan+nish+tsa yAt+b+rah+ma tsaR+Ya tsa tsA ra ni ya ta bra taH/ /sa bi sa smA ra pun+daR+YAHkAn+ti sa
<p>111a.2</p>ba gcugs pa nyams pa yis/ /bden pa ma yin rtag min te/ /lus can rnams kyi bde ba bzhin/ /de nas dga' bo bcom ldan gyis/ /skad cig gis ni rang gnas khyer/ /des pa de yis tshangs spyod ni/ /dul ba nyid kyis brtul zhugs spyad/ /mdzes ma'i mdzes sdug phun tshogs pa/ /
<p>111a.3</p>pa da ma n+ya d+hIH/ /k+Sha Na pra mu Shi tA prI ti ma lA ni yA ti gu Ne Sh+wa pi/ /ta taHka da tsid+bi tsa ra na nan+daHkwA pi bya lo ka ya ta/ /ka rA la na ra kA sak+ta b+hI mA kum+b+hI b+h+r-i tA b+hu baM/ /taM bi lo kyai ba sA kam+paHki me ta di ti
<p>111a.4</p>gzhan gyi blo des brjed par gyur/ /skad cig rab nyams dga' ba ni/ yon tan la'ang dman par gyur/ /de nas nam zhig dga' bo ni/ /rgyu bas rab 'jigs dmyal ba'i tshogs/ /'jigs rung zangs chen 'dzin pa yang / /'ga' zhig dag tu mthong bar gyur/ /de mthong nyid la sdug bsngal zhing / /'dar bar
<p>111a.5</p>duHkhi taH/ /sa pa prats+tsha ta dA sak+tan g+ho ran na ra ka ki ka rAn/ /te ta mU tsu ri yaM b+hU mista pa na kum+b+hi sha tA tsi tA/ /kalpi tA rA dza pu tra s+ya nan+da s+yA tan+da rA gi NaH/ /me th+yA bra taHba nA d+yA bi b+ha dza te bI ta rA ga tAM/ /brah+ma tsaR+YaM
<p>111a.6</p>gyur pas 'di ci zhes/ /de yis de nas tshogs pa yi/ /'jigs rung dmyal srung rnams la dris/ /de la des smras tsha ba'i sa/ /zangs chen rgya ni rdzogs pa 'di/ /shin tu chags ldan rgyal po'i bu/ /dga' bo la ni byas pa yin/ /chags bral nyid ni da dung yang / /brtul zhugs log pa de mi sten/ /mtho ris bud
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>tsa ra t+ye ba swargas+t+rI pa ga mA sha yA/ /mi th+yA pra tA nAM lub+d+hA nAM rA ga dwe sha ka ShA yi nAM/ /e to su ni t+ya tap+tA su kum+b+hI Sh+we bA k+Sha yaHk+Sha yaH/ /i ti nan+daHsa mAk+N+ya dzA ta ro mAM tsa kaM tsu kaH/ /ta tra ts+yu tA mi
<p>111b.2</p>med 'grogs bsam pas/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa nyid/ /brkam chags log pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /chags sdang snyigs ma can rnams kyi/ /rtag tu tsha ba'i zangs chen ni/ /'di dag 'jig pa med pa'i gnas/ /de ltar dga' bos yang dag thos/ /spu long gos ltar rgyas gyur cing / /der ni rjes su
<p>111b.3</p>ba ta nuM pash+tsAt+tA pA da ma n+yA ta/ /sa ma b+h+ye t+ya t+yak+ta rA ga saM bA sa bA sa naHswa yaM/ /ba b+hU bA nut+ta ra brah+ma caR+Ya paR+YAp+ta saM ya maH/ /g+ha na mo hi k+ShayAt+ta s+ya bi muk+te saM sha man+ta taH/ /ma na pra sA da ma pe
<p>111b.4</p>gdung ba yis/ /lus po dum bur gyur bzhin sems/ /gnas su mngon song 'dod chags kyis/ /bag chags zhen pa btang byas nas/ /bla med tshangs par spyod pa ni/ /yongs su rdzogs shing dul bar gyur/ /nang du the tshom rnam grol cing / /stug po'i rmongs pa zad las de'i/ /yid ni rab dang thob gyur te/ /
<p>111b.5</p>de sha ra dI ba da dI pa yaH/ /niSh+kA maHpra sha ma prAp+t+ya pa raM niSh+ThA mu pA ga taH/ /shud+d+ha d+hIHsa ma b+h+ye t+ya b+ha ga ban+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /nAp+sa ro tirna pun+daR+Yo b+hA ga ba na kr-i t+ya ma sti me/ /a tAHpaR+YAn+ta bits+tshA yaHpA pa thA bi Sha ya shri
<p>111b.6</p>stan ka'i klung gi chu bzhin no/ /'dod pa med cing rab zhi thob/ /mchog tu nges par der zhugs pa/ /dag pa'i blo yis bcom ldan la/ /yang dag mngon du phyogs te smras/ /bcom ldan bdag la bya ba ni/ /lha mos yod min mdzes mas min/ /gnod pa dang bcas yul gyi dpal/ /'di dag mjug ni mdzes dang
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>yaH/ /ya thA yA the yaM b+hA bA nAM b+hA bya te niHswa b+hA bA tA/ /ta thA ta thA pra sI dan+ti ni rA bA ra Na brit+ta yaH/ /i ti nan+da s+ya ba da taHprap+ta s+yA r+ha ta pa dam sha naiH/ /b+ha ga bA na pa ri nirbA Na shud+d+haM sid+d+hi
<p>112a.2</p>bral/ /ji lta ji ltar dngos rnams kyi/ /ngo bo nyid med 'di bsgoms pa/ /de lta de ltar sgrib pa dang / /bral ba'i spyod tshul rab gsal gyur/ /de skad smras pa'i dga' bo dag /rim gyis dgra bcom gnas thob pa/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa dag /'grub bar
<p>112a.3</p>ma ma n+ya ta/ /ke ShAM ku sha la lU lA nAM nan+de nA sA di taM pha laM/ /i ti b+hik+Shu b+hi ra b+h+ye t+ya pr-iSh+Ta ta na ba da dz+dzi naH/ /dzan+mAn+ta rA rdzi taiHpu N+yaiHsu kr-i tA b+h+ya sa kA ri NA/ /prAp+ta ku sha la mU lA
<p>112a.4</p>bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gi/ /'bras bu dga' bos thob gyur ces/ /dge slong rnams kyis mngon phyogs dris/ /rgyal bas de la bka' stsal pa/ /skye ba gzhan bsgrubs bsod nams kyis/ /legs byas goms par byas gyur pa/ /dga' bos dge ba'i rtsa
<p>112a.5</p>nAM nan+de na pha la sam+pa taH/ /bi pu la bi ma le baM she dzan+ma sma ra pra ti mA ta nu su kha dza na sa khI la k+Sh+mI br-it+tiHpri yA sa ta taM sa tA ma/ /pra sha ma sa li la snA tai tse taHswa b+hA ba ga tirga tiHku sha la ku su ma s+ya yaM puM
<p>112a.6</p>ba yi/ /'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /dri med yangs pa'i rigs su skyes shing dran pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus/ /dpal 'byor skye bo bde ba'i grogs mo spyod tshul dam pa rtag tu dga'/ /sems ni rab tu zhi ba'i chus bkrus rang bzhin lugs kyi 'bros ldan 'di/ /skyes bu rnams kyi dge
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>saM pi shA la pha long+ga tiH/ /stu be pi pa sh+yi naHsamyaka sa bud+d+ha s+yarda raHpu rA/ /na gaR+YA ma ru NA ba t+yA mA ru Ne na ma hi b+hu dzA/ /kri ya mA Na ma Ni ma yai mai t+t+ro nA ma dwi dzAt+ma dzaH/ /ma ha taHbu N+ya b+ho ga s+ya
<p>112b.2</p>ba'i me tog dag gi 'bras bu cher 'khrungs yin/ /a ru NA ldan grong khyer du/ /sngon chos bdag a ru NA sa/ /dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin byed pa la/ /byams ldan zhes pa bram ze'i bu/ /bsod nams chen po'i bgo
<p>112b.3</p>b+hA gI kA ra ka taM ya yo/ /sa e pa b+hik+Shu saM g+ha s+ya dzen+tA ka s+thA na pa tra kr-i ta/ /ta ta pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na dzA to gr-i ha pa ti ku le/ /sa pu N+ya shi laHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ho pa s+thA ya kaHsu rA/ /stu paM tsa kre sho b+ha
<p>112b.4</p>skal gyis/ /skal ldan byed po nyid du gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni dge slong gi/ /dge 'dun bsro khang sbyin khrus byas/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/ /khyim bdag gi ni rigs su skyes/ /bsod nams ngang tshul de ni sngon/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas gyur/ /mdzes ldan 'phreng bas
<p>112b.5</p>nastaM mA lA b+hi b+ha ra No dzA laM/ /tata pu N+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na kr-it+taHkA shi pa tiHsu taH/ /so b+ha bta d+Yu ti mAn nA ma di bya la k+Sha Na la k+Shi taH/ /kA sh+yA pa s+ya r+ha taHsamyak+saM bud+d+ha s+yA n+ta nr-i r+b+r-i tau/ /
<p>112b.6</p>mngon brgyan pa'i/ /rab 'bar mchod rten dag kyang byas/ /de yi bsod nams smon lam gyis/ /de ni legs skyes zhes bya ba/ /kA sha'i bdag po kr-i kI'i bu/ /gsal ba'i mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur/ /dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od srungs mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar/ /
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>sap+ta rat+na ma yai stu pe kr-i te kA shi ma hI b+hu dzA/ /tat+su nu d+Yu ti man hi ma ts+tsha t+t+ra mA ro bya b+hA swa raM/ /dzA tastat+p+ra Ni d+hA ne na nan+da shAkya ku le d+hu nA/ /i ti su kr-i ti sa mut+thaiHpurba
<p>113a.2</p>mchod rten rin chen bdun rang bzhin/ /kA shi'i sa yi bdag po'i byas/ /de yi bu ni legs skyes kyis/ /'od gsal gser gyi gdugs dag btsugs/ /dga' bo de yi smon lam gyis/ /da lta shAkya'i rigs su skyes/ /de ltar sngon skye'i rim pas thob pa
<p>113a.3</p>dzan+ma kra mAp+taHki ma pi bi pu la pu N+ya re ba nan+daHprA pe de/ /ku la ma ma la mu da raM rU pa ma gyaM tsa b+ho gaM sha ma pa ri tsi ta man+te sat+pa da so ga taM/ /ka tha yi twa ti b+ha ga bA na nan+da
<p>113a.4</p>legs byas kyis bslang ba'i/ /gang yang yangs pa'i bsod nams kho nas dri med rigs dang ni/ /yid 'ong gzugs dang longs spyod mchog dang zhi ba yongs 'dris mthar/ /dam pa'i gnas su legs par 'gro ba dag kyang dga' bos thob/ /dga' bo dge bar mdzad pha la/ /
<p>113a.5</p>ka l+yA Na kA ra NaM/ /tsa kA ra b+hik+Shu saM g+ha s+ya tAM tAM su kr-i ta de sha nAM/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA pa dA na kalpa la tA yAM pun+da rI nan+dA ba dA na me kA da shaHpal+la
<p>113a.6</p>de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan gyis/ /dge slong gi ni dge 'dun la/ /legs byas de de bstan par mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mdzes dga' bo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>waH// //a ro ha ti pa da mun+na ti ma ma la ma tirbi ma la ku sha la so pA naiH/ /na ra ka ku ha re Shu ni pa ta ti ma li na ma ti g+ho ra ti mi re Shu/ /shAkyA nAM na ga re pUrba s+phi te ka pi la bstu ni/ /ma ha taHshAkya
<p>113b.2</p>gcig pa'o// //gong na med pa'i gnas su dri med blo/ /dri ma dang bral dge ba'i skas la 'dzegs/ /blo gros dri ma can ni dmyal ba'i khung / /'jigs rung mun pa 'thibs pa dag tu lhung / /shAkya rnams kyi grong khyer sngon/ /ser skya'i gzhi ni rab rgyas par/ /shAkya'i gtso bo
<p>113b.3</p>mu kha s+ya su mu khI dA pa ka n+ya kA/ /shAs+t+re kr-i ta shra mA sarba ka la kau sha la shA li nI/ /mal+li kA nA ma kA ma s+ya mA li ke ba gu No tsi ta/ /pra b+ho gi rA ba rod+YA ne ku su mA ba tsa yod+Ya taH/ /b+h+ra man+taM sa mA
<p>113b.4</p>chen po yis/ /'bangs kyi bu mo bzhin bzang ma/ /bstan bcos dag la ngal ba byas/ /sgyu rtsal kun la mkhas dang ldan/ /yon tan rigs ldan 'phreng can ma/ /zhes pa 'dod pa'i 'phreng ba bzhin/ /skyed tshal mchog na rje bo yi/ /tshig gis me tog 'thu brtson pa/ /de yi mdun du bde
<p>113b.5</p>yAn+taM da daR+sha su ga taM pu raH/ /ta s+yan+te mA lo kye ta pra san+na ma b+ha ban+ma naH/ /sha rad kA la i ba swats+tshaHpra pA da ya ti mA na saM/ /so tsit+ta yat+ta dA lo kaM prA t+yA hr-i di kr-i tA s+ya dA/ /su kr-i te piN+Da pA taM me gr-ih+Ni
<p>113b.6</p>gshegs ni/ /'chag cing yang dag 'ong ba mthong / /de mthong nyid na de yi yid/ /rab tu dang ba dag tu gyur/ /ston ka'i dus ni dri med kyis/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba bzhin/ /de mthong las bsgrubs dga' ba dag /gnas par byas pa des bsams pa/ /bdag gi bsod snyoms legs byas
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>yA ta b+ha ga bA na pi/ /bi dz+nya ya ta s+yaHsarba dz+nya saM kalpaM ka ru NA ku laH/ /pA trAM pra mAr+dz+ya b+ha ga ban b+ha dre de hI t+yu bA tsa tAM/ /da twA pra Na mya bA ta s+yai pa ri pUr+Na ma nor thaH/ /
<p>114a.2</p>kyis/ /bcom ldan len par 'gyur na zhes/ /snying rje rgyas pa'i kun mkhyen gyis/ /de yi brnag pa kun mkhyen nas/ /lhung bzed bstan nas bcom ldan gyis/ /bzang mo byin zhes de la gsungs/ /re ba yongs su rdzogs pa de/ /de la phyag byas phul nas ni/ /
<p>114a.3</p>pra Ni d+hA naM pra bi da d+he dA s+ya duHkha ni br-it+ta ye/ /ta taHka dA tsi dA ya taHpi tusta s+yaHsa khA rwi dzaH/ /nai mit+ti ka staM pra de sha dr-iSh+T+wA bi smi to ba data/ /a ho gr-i ha pa te ta s+ya pu trI twaM shrI ma taHsu
<p>114a.4</p>'bangs mo'i sdug bsngal zlog pa'i slad/ /smon lam dag ni byas par gyur/ /de nas de yi pa yi grogs/ /gnyis skyes nam zhig 'ong ba yis/ /mtshan ma ldan pa'i phyogs mthong nas/ /ya mtshan gus pas de la smras/ /kye ma dpal ldan khyim bdag de'i/ /bu mo gnyen dang bral
<p>114a.5</p>tA/ /ban+d+ha hI nA ga ta dA s+yaM d+ha na b+ho ga bi brdzi tA/ /a ho mo ha g+ha nA ram+b+ha k+Sha Na d+ya ta na bid+Yu taH/ /saM sA ra sarba sa ra nA bi lA sa tsa pa lA shri yaH/ /ka l+yA NaM mA kr-i thash+tsin+tAM dzA ne haM
<p>114a.6</p>gyur cing / /nor dang longs spyod spangs nas ni/ /bu mo khyod ni 'bangs mor gyur/ /kye ma gti mug sprin dag gis/ /brtsams pa'i skad cig gsal ba'i glog /'khor ba sbrul gyi lce dag gis/ /rol pa bzhin du dpal 'byor g.yo/ /dge ma dogs pa ma byed cig /ngas shes
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>hasta lak+Sha NaiH/ /a tsi re Nai ba bU brtu rbal+la b+hA twaM b+ha bi Sh+yA pi/ /i dam+pa sh+yA mi te pA Nau lak+Sh+mI ka ma la ko ma le/ /mA la tsa krAM ku sha kA ra mi t+yu k+t+wa pra ya yo dwi dzaH/ /a tha man+ma tha saM
<p>114b.2</p>lag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /ring po min pa nyid na khyod/ /sa yi bdag po'i dga' mar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi lag pa dpal mo yi/ /pad ltar mnyen pa'i 'phreng ba dag /'khor lo lcags kyu'i dbyibs 'di mthong / /de skad brjod nas gnyis skyes song / /de nas yid srubs
<p>114b.3</p>b+ho ga swa hr-in+me d+hU pa ban+d+ha baH/ /la tA liM ga na sau b+hA gya b+ha byo dr-i sh+ya ta ma d+ha baH/ /ma d+ho ki sha ri Nasta s+ya kAn+ta mA na dwi pa dwi ShaH/ /bi ba b+ho dzr-im+b+ha mA Na s+ya dzi hwe bA shwa ka many+dza
<p>114b.4</p>longs spyod grogs/ /sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa rnams kyi gnyen/ /skal bzang 'khri shing 'khyud byed pa/ /legs ldan dpyid ni mthong bar gyur/ /mdzes ma'i nga rgyal gnyis 'thung dgra/ /dpyid ni ral pa ldan pa dag /glal bar byed pa'i lce bzhin du/ /mya ngan med pa'i dog
<p>114b.5</p>rI/ /bA la ka po la lA ba N+ya tsau rash+tsam+pa ka saM tsa yaH/ /su dr-i shAM ke sha pA she Shu ya yau ban+d+ha na yo gya tAM/ /sa ha kA pairbi ra hi NI ni d+ha naM bi da d+he ma d+huH/ /ni ra pe k+ShaHpa ra ba d+he bi d+hu rAHpra
<p>114b.6</p>pa mdzes/ /gzhon nu'i 'gram pa mdzes pa yis/ /rkun po tsam pa ka yi tshogs/ /mig bzang ma yi skra zhags la/ /bcings par 'os pa nyid du gyur/ /dpyid kyi a mra'i me tog gis/ /khyo dang bral rnams pha rol bsgral/ /mthu ldan rnam par ma thul ba/ /gzhan dag
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>b+ha biSh+Na baH/ /ya yurma d+hu la hAM tsu ta la tA nir+b+ha ra b+h+yo gya tAM/ /sa ha sai ba bi dag+d+hA nA mi ba mug+d+ha bi b+hU ta yaH/ /tsU tA yu d+ha sh+tsu ta la tA tsA pa nesta shI li mu khaH/ /
<p>115a.2</p>'joms la ltos pa med/ /sbrang rtsi 'thungs pas a mra yi/ /'khri shing mchog tu spyad byar gyur/ /yid 'ong longs spyod mkhas rnams kyis/ /'phral nyid gcad par bya ba bzhin/ /a mra'i 'khri shing gzhu la mda'/ /bkod pa a mra'i mtshon dang ldan/ /
<p>115a.3</p>dza ya tI ti dza gau ba ban+di kan+dar+b+ya s+ye ba ko ki laH/ /a smin+na ba sa re shrI mA na ko sa len+d+ra pra se na dzi ta/ /mr-i gA yA nirga to shwa na hU tastaM de sha mA ya yau/ /bin+da ma no b+ha bA kA raHso ba tIR+Ya tu raM ga
<p>115a.4</p>rgyal gyur cig ces bdag dregs la/ /slong mo pa bzhin khu byug sgrogs/ /skabs 'dir ko sa la yi dbang / /dpal dang ldan pa gsal rgyal ni/ /ri dwags 'ded du song ba dag /rta yis khyer nas yul der 'ongs/ /gzhu ldan yid 'byung rnam pa can/ /rta las babs par gyur
<p>115a.5</p>mA ta/ /da daR+sha na n+ya lA ba N+ya ra ti mi bA pa raM/ /tad+bi lo ka na bi s+t+rI r+Ni ma nasta s+ya ma hAt+ma naH/ /pisma diSh+Ta mArge Na pra bi be sha ma no b+ha baH/ /tAM ladz+dzAM ba na tAM dr-iSh+T+wA sa ha sod b+hU ta sA
<p>115a.6</p>pa das/ /mdzes ma dga' ma gzhan pa bzhin/ /mdzes sdug gzhan yod min pa mthong / /mig gi lam nas ya mtshan las/ /yid 'byung rab tu zhugs gyur te/ /bdag nyid chen po de yi yid/ /de la lta 'dod rnam par rgyas/ /'phral la 'jigs pa rab gyur cing / /ngo tshas gdong btud
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>d+h+wa sAM/ /a tsin+ta ye ran+na ra pa tiHkAn+tI kal+lo li nI hr-i taH/ /ke yaM na bA sha shI mu khI sh+yA mA ta ra lA ta rak+ta/ /yat+kAn+tirni shaM ne tra sha ta pa tra bi kA shi nI/ /ba ku lA mo da bi b+hAn+ta b+h+ra ma re pA Ta lA
<p>115b.2</p>de mthong nas/ /mdzes ma'i rlabs can gyis phrogs pa'i/ /mi yi bdag pos bsams par gyur/ /gang gi mdzes pas nyin mtshan du/ /mig gi 'dab brgya rnam rgyas byed/ /gzhon nu zla bzhin sngo bsangs ma/ /mig 'bras g.yo ldan ma 'di su/ /pA Da la mchu ba ku la'i/ /dri bzang la ni bung ba
<p>115b.3</p>d+ha re/ /kAn+taM ba san+taM pa sh+ya mi mu khe s+yAHku mu dA yu d+haM/ /a ho lA ba N+yA ma m+lA naM tA ru N+yA b+ha ra NaM ta noH/ /d+hI ra s+yA pi d+h+r-i tiR+Ye na shaM ke shaM ka li te ba me/ /a hon+na ma d+hU ma d+hU many+dzaR+YAH pra ram+b+he s+yad+b+hu to gu NaH/ /
<p>115b.4</p>bzhin/ /'di yi bzhin la me tog mtshon/ /dpyid dang mdzes pa mthong bar gyur/ /kye ma mdzes sdug mi dman zhing / /lang tshos rnam par brgyan ba'i lus/ /brtan ldan bdag gi 'ang brtan pa ni/ /gang gis brkus pa bzhin du dogs/ /kye ma sbrang rtsi'i dog pa dag /rmad byung yon tan rtsom pas kyang / /rkang
<p>115b.5</p>ye na gan+tuM na shak+no ShaT+pa do bi pa dA ta pa raM/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya b+hu pA la staM ma twA ba na de ba tA/ /br-iSh+T+wa bi be da tad+b+r-it+taM kra me Na ka thi taM ta ya/ /ta tasta tra kr-i tA ti th+yasta yA pal+la ba bi dza naiH/ /shu tsi
<p>115b.6</p>drug pas kyang rkang las rkang / /gang gis 'gro ba'ang ma nus so/ /de ltar bsams nas sa skyong gis/ /de mthong nags kyi lha ru shes/ /de yis rim gyis bshad pa yis/ /de yi spyod tshul rnam par rig /de rjes der ni gus byas te/ /de yis yal 'dab rlung yab dang / /gtsang zhing
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>shI tesh+tsa sha li leHprap+ta bA na ni r+b+r-i taM nr-i paH/ /shrAn+taHsaM bA he na ta s+ya ta yA tsa ra Na pad+ma yoH/ /kr-ite kA rAk+ta saM spaR+she sa ni drAM sa ha sAp+ta bAn/ /k+Sha Ne na pra ti bud+d+ho tha pa shrAn+ta mr-i ga yA shra maH/ /de
<p>116a.2</p>bsil ba'i chu yis kyang / /mi bdag bde ba thob par gyur/ /de yi zhabs kyi pad+mo dag /de yis mnyes shing lag pa yi/ /chu skyes reg pas ngal ba de/ /'phral la gnyid dag thob par gyur/ /de nas skad cig gis rab sad/ /ri dwags bdas pa'i ngal ba bsos/ /de ni lha
<p>116a.3</p>bya spaR+she na tAM me ne ra tiM rU pAM tA rA ga tA/ /ma hA na pi ta taHshAkya saM prAp+taM ko sha le shwa raM/ /shru twA taM de sha ma b+he t+ya pU dzAr+ha taM ma pA dzata/ /sA da re NAr+the tAn+te na swa su ta mi ba mA li kAM/ /ra t+nA d+hA ya
<p>116a.4</p>yis reg pa yis/ /dga' ma gzugs gzhan gyur par shes/ /de nas shAkya chen pos kyang / /ko sa la dbang 'ongs pa dag /thos nas de la mngon phyogs te/ /mchod par 'os pa de la mchod/ /gus bcas blangs pa'i 'phreng can ma/ /'dod pa'i bkra shis me tog 'phreng / /de yis rang gi
<p>116a.5</p>da dau tasmai sma rA mAM ga la ma li kAM/ /tA mA da ya ma no dzan+ma bai dza yan+tiM si tA smi tAM/ /ni dzaM dza gA ma na ga raM ga dza mA ru h+ya b+hu pa tiH/ /tasmin nA ga na got+saM ge pa lo lA la ka ShaT+pa daH/ /ba b+hau rA dza ba sen+ta na saM ga tA na ba mA
<p>116a.6</p>bu mo bzhin/ /rin chen 'os pa de la byin/ /'dzum dkar yid las skyes pa yi/ /ba dan de ni blangs byas nas/ /sa yi bdag po glang po la/ /zhon nas rang gi grong khyer song / /glang po ri bo'i steng de na/ /lan bu g.yo ba'i bung ba can/ /rgyal po dpyid dang 'grogs pa yi/ /gsar ba 'phreng
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>li kA/ /rA dzA d+hA niM pa mA sA d+ya pun+daR+YA sa hi tasta yA/ /rat+na harmya ka ro dA ra man+di re bi dza hA ra saH/ /baR+Sha kA rA b+hi d+hA de bi rAdz+nyaHpra tha ma pal+la b+hA/ /a b+hin na br-it+ti tA me ne rA dza lak+Sh+mI mi ba k+Shi
<p>116b.2</p>can ma de mdzes/ /mdzes ma de dang lhan cig tu/ /rgyal po'i pho brang phyin nas de/ /rin chen ba gam 'od zer can/ /yid 'ong khang par rnam par rol/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo sngon ma ni/ /lha mo dbyar gyis rnam pa'i ming / /spyod tshul tha dad nyid min sems/ /rgyal po'i dpal mo sa gzhi
<p>116b.3</p>tiM/ /di bya spaR+she na sA ta s+yaHsA tsA s+yA ru pa sam+pa dA/ /pa raspa ra gu Not+kaR+ShA bisma ya mA ya tuH/ /di bya rU pa ba tI dz+yeSh+ThA di bya spaR+sha ba tI pa ra/ /i ti pra bA daHpAsh+tsaR+ye sta yo lo ke Shu pa pra the/
<p>116b.4</p>bzhin/ /de ni de yis reg pas dang / /de dang de yi gzugs bzang gis/ /phan tshun yon tan phul byung bas/ /mchog tu ya mtshan ldan par gyur/ /sngon ma lha yi gzugs ldan dang / /phyi ma lha yi reg ldan zhes/ /ngo mtshar ldan pa de dag gtam/ /'jig rten dag tu rab tu grags/ /
<p>116b.5</p>a trAn+ta re ta yordi bya rU pa saM spaR+sha kA ra NaM/ /A shra me b+hik+Shu b+hiHpriSh+TaHpro bA tsa b+ha ga wAn dzi naH/ /pu rA shru ta bA rA khya s+ya dwi dza s+ya gr-i ha me d+hi naH/ /kAn+tA shi rI Sha kA tse ti pri ye b+hAR+Ye ba b+hU ba tuH/ /sa ka
<p>116b.6</p>bar der de dag lha yi ni/ /gzugs dang yang dag reg pa'i rgyu/ /gnas su dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/ /sngon tshe thos mchog ces bya ba/ /gnyis skyes khyim par gyur pa yi/ /chung ma mdza' ngo mdzes ma dang / /shi ri Sha ka zhes par gyur/ /de nas
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>dA tsi da thA kAn+tA yA tra pra bra dzai yA sha naiH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha tAM yA taHswa sur+b+ha ba na mA ya yau/ /trai mA bi ko pa tsA re Na sa ta yA pa t+yu rA dz+nya yA/ /b+hak+t+ya ni man+t+ri tistas+thau tata pa pat+n+ya ba pU dzi
<p>117a.2</p>nam zhig mdzes ma yi/ /ming po rab byung khad kyis ni/ /nyi tshe'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur pa/ /sring mo'i khang par 'ongs par gyur/ /bdag po'i bka' yis de yi de/ /zla ba gsum gyi rim gro yis/ /gus pas mgron du gnyer te gnas/ /de yi chun ma yis kyang
<p>117a.3</p>taH/ /te tsA ru mr-i du b+hir b+ho gaista ma g+h+yar+ts+yA n+ya dzan+ma ni/ /dzAte d+hu nA tsA tu rU pa de bya saM spaR+sha saM yu te/ /kr-iSh+De Shu pra tha maM pra yuk+ta bi na yA mA dA ya go sam+pa dA sat+ke tre Shu ta paHpra tap+ta ta nu ShuprAste
<p>117a.4</p>mchod/ /mdzes 'jam longs spyod dag gis te/ /de dag gis mchod skye ba ni/ /da lta lha yi gzugs mdzes dang / /reg pa yang dag ldan par skyes/ /dang po 'dul ba dag dang rab ldan phun sum tshogs pa'i 'go bzung rmos byas shing / /dka' thub dag gis rab gdungs lus kyi zhing
<p>117a.5</p>Sh+wa tI bA du tAM/ /yat+kA le shu b+ha bI dza sup+ta mu tsi taM sat+kar+m+ma shak+taiHpa raM b+hU dz+yan+te pha la saM pa daHsu ma ti b+hista s+yai ba pa ko dzra lAH/ /e ti sarba dz+nya pa tsa naM ta th+ya mA kar+N+ya b+hi k+Sha baH/ /
<p>117a.6</p>bzang shin tu gshin par gyur pa la/ /gang gi dus su dge ba'i sa bon rigs btab de ni smin cing rab 'bar ba'i/ /'bras bu phun tshogs mchog tu dam pa'i las la chags pa'i blo bzang rnams kyis spyod/ /de skad thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung / /bden pa dge slong rnams kyis thos/ /
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>tat+ta the ti bi nish+tsa t+ya ba b+hU nuHshAn+ta saM shra yAH/ /a tha kA la na b+hU b+harturmA li kA yA ma b+hU ta su taH/ /bi rU D+ha kA khya nA mI ya khyo bi d+yA su tsa kr-i ta shra maH/ /pri yastu l+ya ba yasta s+ya pu ro hi ta s+ya pu to b+ha bta/ /mA turduHkhe na
<p>117b.2</p>de de bzhin zhes nges byas nas/ /zhi ba la ni brten par gyur/ /de nas dus kyis sa bdag gi /sras ni 'phreng can ma la 'gyur/ /'phags skyes po zhes bya ba ste/ /rig dang sgyu rtsal rab sbyangs pa'o/ /de yi mdun na 'don gyi bu/ /ma yis sdug bsngal gyis btsas pas/ /ma la gnod ces
<p>117b.3</p>dzA tra twad bi shru to duHkha mA tri kaH/ /ka dA tsi ta sa hi taste na ha yA rU D+ho bi rU D+ha kaH/ /prA pa shAkya pu rod+YA naM mr-i ga yA ke nirga taH/ /n+yak+ka rany+tsa kri re ta tra shAkyasta s+yod+ma tA yu d+hAH/ /a yaM dA pI su tAsma ka mi ti
<p>117b.4</p>rnam grags pa/ /na tshod mtshungs pa mdza' bor gyur/ /nam zhig de dang lhan cig tu/ /'phags skyes po ni rta la zhon/ /rtse zhing sngon la song ba dag /shAkya'i grong gi skyed tshal phyin/ /'di ni nged kyi 'bangs mo yi/ /bu zhes dregs pa rab smra ba'i/ /shAkya rnams kyis mtshon bzung nas/ /
<p>117b.5</p>dar+p+ya pra bA di na/ /ga twa swa su raM te ShAM bai ran+da bya ma tsin+ta yata/ /ku la dar+pA pa do hi sha l+ya to daHsha rI ri NAM/ /ta s+ye nirda h+ya mA na s+ya tata pra tI kA ra tsin+ta yA/ /rA dz+yA pa dzA tA dza na ke dzI ba t+ya pi pa raH
<p>117b.6</p>der ni de la tho 'tshams byas/ /rang gi grong khyer song nas des/ /de ni khon lan bsam par gyur/ /rigs kyi dregs pas smad pa ni/ /lus can zug rngu lcags kyu yin/ /de la lan bya'i bsam pa yis/ /yid ni nges par bsregs pa de/ /yab ni 'tsho yang rgyal srid la/ /mchog tu
<p>117b.7</p>bar 'dir zhes bya ba'i srang dor yig 'bru gsum ma tshang ba ma dpe rnams las ma rnyed pa nA mI ya zhes pa 'di 'dar los gsar du bcug pa rgya dpe rnyed na dpyad/
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>spr-i hA/ /sa tsA rA ya Na mu khyA nAM man+t+ri NaM sha ta pany+tsa kaM/ /swa ba shaM pi turA kr-i Sh+ya bi da d+he b+he da yuk+ti b+hiH/ /ta taHka dA tsi ta saM dzA ta bi be kaHpri thi bI pa tiH/ /d+harmo pa de sha shra
<p>118a.2</p>'dod pa skyes par 'gyur/ /de yis ring spyod la sogs pa'i/ /blon po brgya phrag lnga dag ni/ /pha las spyad nas dbye ba yis/ /rigs pa rnams kyis rang dbang byas/ /de nas nam zhig sa yi bdag /gsal rgyal rnam rig yang dag skyes/ /chos kyi gdams ngag
<p>118a.3</p>ba Ne bar+d+hA mA nA da raHpa raM/ /tsA rA ya Na gr-i hI tA shwa ra tha mA tu h+ya saM ya taH/ /draSh+TuM dza gA ma sarba dz+nyaM b+ha ga ban taM pra se na dzi ta/ /prA s+yA shra maM b+ha ga ba taHkr-i twA bA dA b+hi ban+da
<p>118a.4</p>mnyan pa la/ /gus pa mchog 'phel legs bsdams pas/ /ring spyod kyis ni rta bzung ba'i/ /shing rta dag la zhon nas ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bcom ldan 'das/ /blta ba'i slad du song bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas phyin te/ /zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal
<p>118a.5</p>naM/ /d+harma n+wa yaM sa shu shrA ba tat+p+rA sA da pra san+na d+hiH/ /tsA rA yA No pyA shu ga twA ra the na na ga raM dza bAta/ /a ka re dan+ta re tasmin rA dza pu trA b+hi She tsa naM/ /b+ha ga ban+ta ma thA man+t+rA nr-i pa tirgan+tu mud+Ya traH/ /
<p>118a.6</p>nas/ /de yi drin gyis dang ba'i blos/ /chos kyi rjes 'gro de yis thos/ /mgyogs pa nyid du ring spyod kyang / /shing rtas grong khyer myur song nas/ /skabs der rgyal po'i bu dag ni/ /mngon par dbang ni bskur bar byas/ /de nas bcom ldan la zhus nas/ /mi yi bdag po 'gro brtson pas/ /
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>da daR+sha nA nu ga na gre na ra thaM na tsa man+t+ri NaM/ /sa bad+b+h+ya me ba sha na kaiHpra s+thi taM pri thi bI pa tiH/ /dU rA da pa sh+ya dA yan+taM baR+ShA kA rA sa mA li kAM/ /te pr-iSh+T+wa tang+gi rA dz+nyA twA so b+hi Shik+ta bi rU D+ha kaM/ /
<p>118b.2</p>mdun du rjes 'brang mthong ma yin/ /shing rta ma yin blon po'ang min/ /rkang pa nyid kyis sa bdag de/ /dal bus rab tu 'gro ba yis/ /dbyar gyi rnam pa 'phreng can mar/ /bcas pa ring nas 'ong ba mthong / /'phags skyes po ni dbang bskur ba/ /der dris de yi tshig gis shes/ /
<p>118b.3</p>bi sa sardza su tai shwad+ya pa ri b+ho gA ya mA li kAM/ /baR+ShA kA rA sa mA dA ya sa mi tra s+ya ma hI pa teH/ /a dzA ta sha tro na ga raM prA pa rA dza gr-i hA b+hi d+haM/ /sa tap+tash+tsha tra bi ra hAta k+Shut+pi pA sA shra mA n+wi taH/ /
<p>118b.4</p>bu yi dpal 'byor yongs spyad slad/ /'phreng can ma ni de yis btang / /de yis dbyar gyi rnam pa bzung / /grogs po sa yi bdag po dag /ma skyes dgra yi grong khyer ni/ /rgyal po'i khab ces brjod par phyin/ /gdugs dang bral bas de gdung zhing / /bkres skom ngal ba dang ldan pa/ /
<p>118b.5</p>ya yau ba man+ni Shats+tsh+wa saM dir+g+haish+tsa ma ra mA ru taiH/ /su kha mam+b+ha li taM ke na prAp+ta ka s+yA yu rA ya naM/ /na ka s+yA nu pa daM dr-iSh+DaHsa pa di sam+ba daH/ /sa dzIr+Na mU la ka b+huk+t+wA karma mU la mi bA ya taM/ /k+Sha raM bI twA tsa
<p>118b.6</p>rnga yab rlung dag ring po yis/ /shugs ni gtong ba bzhin du gyur/ /'jigs med bde ba su yis thob/ /tshe ni su yi dbang du gyur/ /su la phun sum tshogs pa ni/ /myur bar rjes su nyams ma mthong / /de yis las kyi rtsa ba bzhin/ /ring ba'i la phug rnying pa zos/ /chu yang 'gyur byed
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>pA nI ya ba pA tAp+ta bi su tsi kaH/ /a ni t+ya tA ma bi dz+nyA ya mo hA ya ba ta te dza naH/ /sa tsA pA ya ni kA ya s+ya kA ya s+yo pA ya tr-iSh+Na yA/ /a dzA ta sha truHshru twe ba ko sha le shwa ra mA ga taM/ /a
<p>119a.2</p>'thungs pa yis/ /gnod pa kun gyi tshogs gyur pa/ /lus kyi thabs la sred pa yis/ /mi rtag pa nyid mi shes par/ /rmongs pa'i slad du skye bo 'bad/ /ma zhu'i nad kyis thebs nas 'gyel/ /ma skyes dgra yis ko sa la'i/ /dbang po 'ongs pa thos gyur nas/ /song
<p>119a.3</p>b+h+ye t+ya pAM shu pUr+NA s+yaM bi ga tA guM da daR+Sha taM/ /ta s+ya dzA yA nu yA ta s+ya sa kr-i twA de ha sad kri yAM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM ya yau draSh+TuM su ga taM duHkha shAn+ta ye/ /sa taM pra Na mya pra bA tsa b+ha ga bAn ko sha le shwa raH/ /

<p>119b.1</p>mA ba diM/ /su hr-in+nai pha l+yA mA yA te yA s+ya kin+te na dzI ba tA/ /mi tro pa ka ra NaM lak+Sh+mI dI no pa ka ra NaM d+ha naM/ /b+hI to pa ka ra NaM prA NA ye ShAM te ShAM su dzI bi taM/ /ku karma kiM kr-i taM te na b+ha ga ba na
<p>119b.2</p>grogs thob pa'i/ /grogs po 'bras med nyid gyur te/ /gang zhig 'tsho ba de yis ci/ /grogs la phan pa'i dpal dang ni/ /phongs la phan pa'i nor dag dang / /'jigs la phan pa'i srog gang yin/ /de dag 'tsho ba legs pa yin/ /bcom ldan skye ba snga ma la/ /de yis las
<p>119b.3</p>pUrba dzan+ma ni/ /ya s+ya sA ke na pra pe de po pi durd shAM/ /a ti pr-iSh+TaHk+Shi ti she na b+ha ga bAn pA shru tsak+Shu ShA/ /tA mu tse tA pa sha ma nIM di shan da sha tsan+d+ri kaM/ /mA shu tsa pr-i thi bI pA la swa b+hA bo yaM

<p>119b.5</p>b+ha bas+thi teH/ /e baM bi d+hai ba b+hA bA na ma sa t+yA nA ma ni t+ya tA/ /bi pA ri sa sA ra ba nAn+tesmin ne sarga lo laHkI la kA la b+h+r-iM gaH/ /swa ts+tshan+da yA tI dza na puSh+pa dzI ba kiM dzalpa puM dzaM ka pa li ka ro tu/ /ta raM gA to b+ho gash+tsa
<p>119b.6</p>rang bzhin no/ /rnam pa 'di ltar dngos po ni/ /bden pa min rnams mi rtag nyid/ /'khor ba'i nags nang rnam par yangs pa 'dir/ /rang bzhin gyis g.yo dus kyi bung ba dag /rang dgar 'bab pas 'gro srog me tog gi /ge sar tshogs la kham zas byed pa nyid/ /longs spyod rba rlabs

<p>120a.1</p>ki ta ha ri NI lo tsa na tsa laHk+Sha Na lak+Sh+yA lak+Sh+mIrdza na dza la da bi d+yo ta na ta Di ta/ /sha rI rAb+dze bA la ta pa tsa pa la rA gAM na ba ba yaHk+Sha yaM yA ti k+Shi praM b+ha ba ma ru ta De dzI

<p>120a.3</p>bi ka NaH/ /ma no mai tri pA traM pa ra hi ta ra tir+d+har+m+ma d+ha na tA ma dor+b+he dots+tshai da k+Sha ma sa ma bi tsA re pa ri tsa yaH/ /a yaM ta twa n+we Sh+wa bi Sha ya su kha bai mu khyA su khi nA ma sA re saM sa ri pa ri hr-i ta bi kA raHpa ri

<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>bi praHsu sharmA khya ku tash+tsi ta prA pya mU la kaM/ /bi d+hA ya dza na nI haste ya yau snA tuM na dI pa TaM/ /sA pi pra t+ye ka bud+d+hA ya tAM prAp+ta ya ta dan+ta re/ /pra Na tA pA tra hasta ya ta de bA b+hi ma taM da dau/ /a tha bA snA
<p>120b.2</p>bde zhes pas sngon/ /'ba' zhig las rnyed la phug dag /ma yi lag tu bzhag nas ni/ /khrus la klung gi ngogs su song / /skabs der ma dag 'ongs pa yis/ /phyag na lhung bzed rang sangs rgyas/ /de nyid mngon par bzhed gyur pa/ /des kyang rab tu btud nas byin/ /de nas de yi bu
<p>120b.3</p>sa ma yA tan+te na bu tastA ri taM k+Shu d+hA/ /dza na nI b+ho dza nA raM b+he ya yA tse ni dza mU la kaM/ /bu N+yaM pu trA nu mo da pA tan+ma yA ti tha ye\u0f85r+pi taM/ /i ti mA turba tsaHshru twa so b+hu brid+d+ha i be Shu Na/ /sa d+h+yo bi sU tsa kArta s+ya

<p>121b.1</p>bi ru D+ha kaH/ /a ba tIR+Ya ra tha da gra ma b+h+ye t+ya pra Na to ba data/ /sat+su snig+d+ha pa lA sha Shu g+ha na ts+tshA ye Shu shA khe Shu/ /b+ha ga ban+na tra bi shrAn+tiHkiM shuSh+ka ta ro ra d+haH/ /i t+yuk+taHk+Shi ti pA le na taM prA ha b+ha ga

<p>121b.5</p>te shAkya dz+nyA ta yasta ta pu ran+ti kai/ /dzA taHpri yo yaM ta ta prI t+ya shuSh+ka sha khA bi pA da paH/ /shru twai tad+bi ra tA maR+Sha shAkyA nAM pak+Sha pa ti naM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM bi di twai ba n+ya brte na bi rU D+ha kaH/ /b+ha ga bAn pi shAkyA nAM
<p>121b.6</p>dag gnyen/ /de la dga' bas de dag gis/ /grong 'gram 'dab ma bskams pa yi/ /rkang 'thung 'di la dga' ba skyes/ /de dag thos nas bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya'i phyogs su lhung par ni/ /rig nas khro dang bral ba yi/ /'phags skyes po ni log par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

<p>122a.1</p>dz+nya twA ga mi b+ha yaM ta taH/ /shre ya se shud+d+ha sa twA nAM bi da d+he d+harma de sha naM/ /shro tAsti pha laM kaish+tsi ta sa kr-i dA gA mi tsA ba raiH/ /a nA ga mi pha laM tsA n+yaiHsaM prAp+taM ta s+ya shA sa nAta/ /

<p>122a.4</p>lhag ma blo gros blun po yis/ /shAkyas gnas de ma thob ste/ /gang zhig nyin par rab rib dag /'byung ba'i bya ni 'ga' zhig yod/ /de nas mi bdag log pa yis/ /khon gyi sbrul dag nyal ba dag /mdun na 'don gyi bu yis ni/ /rab tu sad pa rnam par bsgrubs/ /de yis bskul bas
<p>122a.5</p>tash+tsa kre ma tiM shAkya ku la k+Sha ye/ /bai rA na laM pra tsa la naM ka ro ti pi shu nA ni laH/ /g+ho ra durdza na man+t+re Na sa ha sot+thA pi tAHkha lAH/ /be tA lAH k+Shi ti pA lAsh+tsa na ka s+ya prA Na hA ri Na/ /sai n+ye ga dza ra tho da gre
<p>122a.6</p>shAkya'i rigs/ /gzhom pa'i blo gros de yis byas/ /khon gyi me ni rab 'bar bar/ /phra ma yi ni rlung gis byed/ /'jigs rung skye bo ngan pa yis/ /sngags kyis 'phral bslad mi bsrun pa'i/ /ro langs dang ni sa skyong dag /su yi srog ni 'phrog byed min/ /de nas de yi dmag dpung ni/ /
<p>122b</p>
<p>122b.1</p>ta tasta pra sarba ti/ /ba b+hu ba pu ra saM k+Sho b+haHshAkyA nAM rud+d+ha war+t+ma nAM/ /tasmin b+ha ga bAn pi shAkya naM rak+ShA pA te naM/ /sa mud+Ya taM ta tra ma hA maud+ga l+ya ya na ma bra bI ta/ /shAkyA nAM karma do Sha ye
<p>122b.2</p>glang po shing rta'i mchog rab dkrigs/ /lam bkag shAkya rnams kyi ni/ /grong khyer yang dag 'khrugs par gyur/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / /shAkya bsrung slad phyogs lhung zhing / /yang dag brtson pa mau gal/ /chen po dag la bka' stsal pa/ /shAkya rnams kyi las kyi skyon/ /
<p>122b.3</p>sarba thA sa mu pa s+thi taH/ /ta tra rak+Sha bi d+hA naM te ga ga ne se tu ban+d+ha naM/ /puM sA ma tsin+t+yA bi b+ha bA ni shu b+hA shu b+hA ni yAn+ti pra yAn+ti tsa mu hurni ra pa gra hA Ni/ /karmA k+Sha ra Ni ni dza dzan+ma pa da swa hasta nastA
<p>122b.4</p>rnam kun nas 'di nye bar gnas/ /de la bsrung ba sgrub byed pa/ /nam mkha' la ni bgrod stegs brtsigs/ /skyes bu rnams kyi bsam yas 'byor pa dge dang mi dge dag /'ong dang rab tu 'gro yang yud tsam rang dbang med pa ni/ /las kyi yi ge rang gi skye ba'i gnas la rang lag gis/ /
<p>122b.5</p>ni nA ma na b+ha ban+ti ni rar+tha kA ni/ /i ti pA kyAta b+ha ga ba tastasmin yA te pra Na mya taM/ /tsa kri re saM bi daM shAkyAHpra t+yA san+nerbi rU D+ha kai/ /hiM sA smA b+hirna karta byA prA Ni ma tra s+ya na s+ya tsita/ /sha rAHsha rI ra
<p>122b.6</p>bkod pa dag ni nges par don med can du 'gyur ba min/ /de skad bcom ldan gsung gis ni/ /de la phyag 'tshal der phyin te/ /'phags skyes po ni nyer lhags pas/ /shAkya rnams kyis bgro ba byas/ /srog dang ldan tsam su la yang / /yu cag 'tshe bar mi bya'o/ /dgra yis rab tu 'phangs pa'i
<p>123a</p>
<p>123a.1</p>masmA kaM bi shan+t+wa ri sa mI ri tAH/ /i ti saM bi da mA d+hA ye te tu pA yaSh+Ti pA Na yaH/ /d+hI rAHpa rod+Ya me tas+thu ra bA ra yi ta kArmu kAH/ /a trAn+ta re kArma yo gAn+ni dza de sha na ba s+thi taH/ /a dz+nyA twa saM
<p>123a.2</p>mda'/ /yu cag lus la 'dzugs su bas/ /de dag de ltar gros bzung ste/ /khro bas lam na mdung bzung ste/ /gzhu ni rab tu bdungs byas nas/ /pha rol 'jug la brten pas gnas/ /skabs der don gyi sbyor ba las/ /rang gi yul na mi gnas pa/ /shAkya sham pa
<p>123a.3</p>bi daM shAkyaHshaM pA kaHsa mu pa ya yau/ /sa dr-iSh+Ta na ga rA bar+d+ha san+nad+d+haM ba su d+ha d+hi paM/ /ko pA de kash+tsa kA rA s+ya ra Ne su b+ha Da saM k+Sha yaM/ /yud+d+he pu ru Sha siM he na ha tAp+te bI ra kuny+dza rAH/ /pra ya yuH
<p>123a.4</p>ka yis gros/ /ma shes pa ni yang dag 'ongs/ /de yis sa bdag go bgos pas/ /grong khyer bsdams pa mthong nas ni/ /khros te gcig pus g.yul du phyin/ /de yi dpal rnams brlag par byas/ /g.yul du skyes bu seng ge yis/ /dpa' bo glang po de dag bsad/ /mu tig gis
<p>123a.5</p>spr-i ha NI ya twaM ya sho b+hirmok+ti kai ri ba/ /sa ko pi ta s+ya dza dz+wa la ko bi ta s+ya pa rai ra si/ /sa ya yau yata pra tA pe na bi pu lAM ri pu bA hi NiM/ /b+hag+ne pra yA te swa pu riM naSh+Tot+sA he bi rU D+ha ke/ /pra be shaM na da duH
<p>123a.6</p>bzhin grags pa yis/ /dga' bar byas pa nyid du gyur/ /gzhan la khros par gyur pa de'i/ /ral gri de ni ci yang 'bar/ /gang gis rab tu gdung bas des/ /dgra yi chu bo yangs par sod/ /'phags skyes po ni spro ba nyams/ /'pham nas rang gi grong khyer song / /dgra ni bsad pas sham
<p>123b</p>
<p>123b.1</p>shAkya sam+bA ka s+ya dwe ShAM ba d+hAta/ /swa dza no pi pa ri t+yak+taHsha tairni s+t+riM sha karma NA/ /nirdzi te pi bi mu khAHkru re sA d+ha bo d+harma bAn+d+hAH/ /d+ha nA da pi pa da n+ya twaM su kr-i taM swa dza nAd pi/ /sa ta mau tsi d+ya ni d+yA nA mA
<p>123b.2</p>pa ka /shAkyas nang du 'jug ma ster/ /sdig las kyis de de dag gis/ /nang mi yin yang yongs su btang / /dam pa chos kyi gnyen ldan rnams/ /rang gi'ang ma rungs la phyir phyogs/ /dam pa 'os nyid rtag pa rnams/ /nor rdzas las kyang gtong phod dang / /nang mi bas kyang legs byas
<p>123b.3</p>yu Sho pi ya shaHpri yaM/ /nirbA saM taHsa taiHprAp+taHsha nair+b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/ /ya yA tse b+hU da ya yai ba taM kiM tsin+ni dza lAM ts+tsha naM/ /rid+d+h+yA b+ha ga ba tA dat+ta ni dza ke sha na khAM sha kaM/ /sa dza gA mA sa mA mA dA ya
<p>123b.4</p>dang / /tshe srog pas kyang grags pa dga'/ /de dag gis ni bskrad pa de/ /mthar gyis bcom ldan drung du phyin/ /de la dge legs slad nyid du/ /rang gi mtshan ma cung zad blangs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /rang gi dbu skra sen cha byin/ /de yis blangs nas ba hU Da/ /zhes
<p>123b.5</p>bA ku DaM nA ma maN+Da laM/ /ta tra pra dz+nyA pra b+hA be na sauR+Yot+sA ha gu Ne na tsa/ /sa prA pa rAdz+yaM d+hI rA NAM sarba tra su lA b+haHshri yaH/ /dak+Sha NAM lak+Sha NaM lak+Sh+mIHsa ha dzaM bi du ShAM ya shaH/ /n+ya ba sA ya sa hA yA hAM ka la traM
<p>123b.6</p>pa'i dkyil 'khor dag tu song / /der ni shes rab mthu dag dang / /rtul phod spro ba yon tan gyis/ /de yi rgyal srid thob ste dpal/ /blo ldan rnams la kun tu mod/ /dpal 'byor grung po'i mtshan nyid de/ /grags pa mkhas pa'i lhan skyes yin/ /grub pa thams cad chung ma ni/ /rtag 'grus
<p>124a</p>
<p>124a.1</p>sarba sid+d+ha yaH/ /ta tras+thi to b+ha ga ba taHso tha ke sha na khAM sha ke/ /stu pa pra tiSh+Tha ma ka rod ba ra rat+na bi rA dzi tAM/ /bi rU D+ha ki pi shAkyA nAM bai ra pA ra tIR+Ya yA/ /su naR+Yug+t+ya pu raM dwA
<p>124a.2</p>ldan pa rnams kyi yin/ /de nas der ni der gnas te/ /bcom ldan dbu skra sen cha la/ /rin chen mchog gis rab mdzes pa'i/ /mchod rten rab tu gnas par byas/ /'phags skyes po'ang khon gyis ni/ /pha rol bsgral 'dod slad nas yang / /sgo dbye'i rig pas 'phral
<p>124a.3</p>ra b+he de na ha sA bi shata/ /ha twA ta tra sa ha prA Ni shAkyA nAM sap+ta sap+ta tiH/ /bad+d+ha ka n+yA ku mA rA NAM sa ha sra ma thA ha rata/ /sha tA ni pany+tsa shAkya nAM ga dzairlo hesh+tsa marda naiH/ /saM pra mr-i dz+ye pu rIM tsakre kr-i
<p>124a.4</p>nyid la/ /shAkya rnams kyi grong du zhugs/ /der ni shAkya stong phrag dag /bdun cu rtsa bdun rab tu bsad/ /de nas bu mo gzhon nu rnams/ /stong phrag de yis bcings nas khyer/ /shAkya brgya phrag lnga rnams ni/ /lcags dang glang po'i 'joms byed kyis/ /rab tu bcom nas grong khyer ni/ /
<p>124a.5</p>tAn+ta na ga rI mi ba/ /b+ha ga bAn pi shAkyA nAM sha trU NAM b+ha de naM kr-i taM/ /karmA nu bad+d+haM bi dz+nyA ya ba b+hU ba bi ma nA k+Sha NaM/ /pa prats+tshu sta sa ma b+h+ye t+ya b+hik+Sha baHka ru NA ku lAH/ /kiM karma bi hi taM shAkyair+g+ho
