<p>124a.6</p>mthar byed grong khyer bzhin du byas/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang shAkya rnams/ /dgra rnams kyis ni brlag byas pa/ /las kyis rjes su bcings mkhyen nas/ /skad cig thugs ni 'byung bar mdzad/ /snying rje rgyas pa'i dge slong rnams/ /de la mngon du phyogs te dris/ /shAkya rnams kyis las ci
<p>124b</p>
<p>124b.1</p>raM ya s+ye dr-i shaM pha laM/ /b+ha ga bA ni te taiHpr-iSh+TaHsarba dz+nyastA na b+hA ShA twaM/ /ni dza karma bi sa ken shAkyA nAM me Sha saM k+Sha yaH/ /kr-iSh+Tau pu ra ma hAmat+sau d+hi ba raiHsa ri ton+ta rAta/ /sa dA ni kr-i tau mat+sa s+ya
<p>124b.2</p>bsgrubs/ /'jigs rung gang gi 'bras 'di 'dra/ /de skad des dris bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad mkhyen pas der bka' stsal/ /rang gi las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /shAkya rnams ni brlag pa 'di/ /nya pa rnams kyis chu nang nas/ /sngon tshe nya chen gnyis shig drangs/ /nya ni rtag tu rab bcad pa'i/ /
<p>124b.3</p>b+hU ya stad+b+ya tha ya na tau/ /kA le na tsau ra tAM yA taistai re bA pa ra dzan+ma ni/ /ha tau gri ha pa tI dag+d+hA tA be ba d+ha na hA rI b+hIH/ /tau mat+sau tau gr-i ha s+thau bi rU D+ha ka pu rau hi to/ /dA sA nAM taska rA NAM tsa shAkyA nAM mr-i t+yu
<p>124b.4</p>gdung ba chen po dag gis bsad/ /dus kyis skye ba gzhan la ni/ /de rnams chom rkun nyid gyur pa/ /nor ni 'phrog pas de dag nyid/ /chom rkun du gyur bsregs nas bsad/ /nya de dag dang khyim bdag de/ /'phags skyes po dang mdun na 'don/ /nya pa dang ni chom rkun pa'i/ /shAkya rnams kyis
<p>124b.5</p>tAM gtau/ /i ti shru twA b+ha ga ba taHkarma NAM pha la san+ta tiM/ /a bi paM bA di ni me ba me ni re sarba b+hik+Sha ba/ /bi rU D+ha ko ko tha swa pu raM prAp+ta bi dza ya durma daH/ /dze tA nAm+nA su te nok+taHpra NA yad+bA la lI la yA/ /
<p>124b.6</p>bsad par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di thos nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis las rnams kyi/ /'bras bu'i rgyu ni bslu ba dag /med pa nyid du nges par gyur/ /de nas rgyal bas ngan rgyags pa'i/ /'phags skyes po ni rang grong song / /bu ni rgyal byed ces bya ba'i/ /byis pa rtse bas mdza' la smras/ /
<p>125a</p>
<p>125a.1</p>de ba ki ni hi tAHshAkya ta tesmA kaM kr-i tA sha saH/ /i ti bru bA Na ma ba d+hI na ni dza sU nu bi ru D+ha kaH/ /ni pA ta ma ti mr-id+nA ti ni hin+ta na ka ro ti kaM/ /ma da lab+d+ha ba d+ha ya sAn+mA taM ga i ba durdza nAH/ /sa dza gA
<p>125a.2</p>lha gcig shAkya ci la gsod/ /des ni su la gnod ma bgyis/ /de skad brjod pa'i rang gi bu/ /'phags skyes po yis bsad par gyur/ /myos thob gnod pa goms pa las/ /glang po bzhin du skye bo ngan/ /nges par sdang dang nyed pa dang / /'joms pa nyid du ci mi byed/ /rang gi dpung
<p>125a.3</p>da sa b+hA si naHswa b+hU dza ba lo ka yan/ /a ho nu ma hA pAk+nau dwi Shad+b+hiHsa la b+hAyi taM/ /kr-i tAn+ta to ra Nastam+b+hau prA h+yau ma ma b+hU dzA bi mau/ /niHshe Sha ba d+ha dIk+Sha yaM shAkya naM gu ru taM ga tau/ /tAM ta s+ya bi kra ma sh+lAg+h+yaM
<p>125a.4</p>pa lta byed cing / /mdun sar 'dug nas des smras pa/ /kye ma bdag gi gzi byin mer/ /dgra rnams phye ma leb ltar bcom/ /bdag gi dpung sbram 'di gnyis ni/ /mthar byed rta babs ka ba ste/ /shAkya rnams ni ma lus pa/ /gsod pa gdams byed bla mar gyur/ /de yi rtsal la bsngags
<p>125a.5</p>hr-i tAstAHshAkya ka n+ya kAH/ /shru twA ba b+hA Sha re tI bra mud+be gA na tA na naH/ /karma pA sha ni bad+d+hA nAM kha gA nA mi ba de hi nAM/ /ni d+hA nol+laM g+ha shag+ti nAsti pak+Sha tsa tA ma pi/ /ye nag+niHsha ma me ti tat+ki
<p>125a.6</p>pa de/ /shAkya'i bu mo bzung ba des/ /thos nas yid 'byung drag po yis/ /gdong pa btud nas rab smras pa/ /las kyi zhags pas bcings pa yi/ /lus can rnams la bya bzhin du/ /'chi ba bsgom pa'i nus pa dag /gshog pa ldan yang yod ma yin/ /gang gi me ni zhi bar byed pa'i rgyu de dag
<p>125b</p>
<p>125b.1</p>la dza laM prAsnA t+ya laM bA Da bstig+mAM sho gra haNaM ka ro ti sa ma ye he lA ba le dz+yaM ta maH/ /paR+YA lo tsa na bar+t+ma nA ma bi Sha yaM sAsh+tsaR+ya tsaR+ya pa daM sarba kArmi ka tan+t+ra yan+t+ri ta mi daM kaHka s+ya kartuM k+Sha maH/ /e ta dA kar+N+ya nr-i pa
<p>125b.2</p>ni rta gdong gis za lo/ /'bad rtsol chung dus za ba'i mun pa dus su tsha zer ldan pa 'dzin par byed/ /yongs su blta ba'i lam gyi yul min ngo mtshar dang bcas spyod pa dag gi gnas/ /las dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyi gdams pa 'di kun su yi bya bar bzod/ /de dag thos nas mi yi
<p>125b.3</p>tiHpa dAn+ta ra i bo ra gaH/ /ka rats+tshe daM di de sha s+ya g+ho ra maR+Sha bi Shot+ka DaH/ /tI re ya s+yAHkr-i taM tA paM pA Nits+tshe da na bai sha saM/ /sA d+yA pi hasta gar+b+he ti khyA tA puska ri NI b+hU bi/ /la tA swa bi ku kU lA g+hIM
<p>125b.4</p>bdag /rkang pas bcom pa'i ltos 'gro bzhin/ /'jigs rung khro ba'i dug rgyas nas/ /'di yi lag pa chod ces bskos/ /gang gi 'gram du de yis ni/ /lag pa gcod pa'i sdig las byas/ /rdzing bu lag pa'i snying po zhes/ /da lta yang ni sa la grags/ /'khri shing la yang lci snying
<p>125b.5</p>kra ka tsa na li nI Sh+wa pi/ /ma lAsu bi shi lA brdzaM pA ta yan+t+ye bA nir+g+h+r-i NAH/ /tAsh+tshin+na pA Ni ka ma lAsta tra tI bra bya thA tu rA/ /b+ha ga ban+taM d+hi yA d+h+ya twA sha ra NaM sha ra NaM ya yuH/ /tA pAM bi dz+nyA yA sarba dz+nyA tIM
<p>125b.6</p>me/ /pad ldan la yang sog le'i so/ /'phreng ba la yang rdo rje'i char/ /brtsa med 'bebs su 'jug pa nyid/ /lag pa'i pad+mo bcad de rnams/ /der ni gdung ba drag pos gzir/ /bcom ldan skyabs 'os blo yis ni/ /bsgoms nas skyabs su song bar gyur/ /de dag gnad bsnun gdung
<p>126a</p>
<p>126a.1</p>bri marmA ha tiM bya thAM/ /sha tsI ma tsit+ta yed+da bIM tat+sa mAshwA sa no tsi tAM/ /tata spaR+sha dzA ta hastAp+dzastid+da bya ba sa nA br-i tAH/ /ya yush+tsit+ta pra sA de na tAHswargaM t+yak+ta bi gra
<p>126a.2</p>ba ni/ /drag po kun mkhyen gyis mkhyen nas/ /de dag yang dag dbugs 'byin par/ /'os pa bde sogs lha mor bsams/ /de yis reg pas lag pad skyes/ /de yis lha yi gos kyis g.yogs/ /de dag sems ni rab dang bcas/ /lus btang mtho ris song
<p>126a.3</p>hAH/ /de ba kalpA tA mA sad+ya di bya pad+mot+pa lAM ki tAH/ /d+harma de sha na yA shAs+t+rastAHprA pu bi pu la pa daM/ /b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn pr-iSh+Ta stad karma pha la ma b+h+ya d+hAta/ /pA Ni tsA ba la me ta b+hiHkr-i taM b+hik+Shu
<p>126a.4</p>bar gyur/ /lha pad ut+pal gyis mtshan lus/ /lha yi bu mo nyid thob nas/ /ston pas chos 'di bstan pa yis/ /de dag yangs pa'i gnas su song / /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /de dag las 'bras mngon par gsungs/ /'di dag lag pa g.yo bzhin du/ /dge slong
<p>126a.5</p>pi DaM ba ne/ /karma Nasta s+ya pA ke na pi shA se pa ti tAHpa raM/ /ma yi tsit+ta pra sA de naprAp+tAsh+tsai tAHshu b+hAM ga tiM/ /i t+yuk+t+wa b+ha ga wAn karma pha la pA ka bi tsi tra tAM/ /b+hik+Shu NAM tat+p+ra saM ge na bi da d+he d+harma de sha
<p>126a.6</p>dag la tho 'tshams byas/ /de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /mi 'dod par ni rab tu ltung / /nga la sems ni dad pa yis/ /'di dag dge ba'i 'gro ba thob/ /las 'bras smin pa rnam bkra nyid/ /de skad brjod nas bcom ldan gyis/ /de yi zhar la dge slong dag /rnams la chos ni bstan
<p>126b</p>
<p>126b.1</p>nAM/ /a trAn+ta re gU D+ha tsa rI rA dz+nyA pra Ni hi tash+tsa raH/ /b+ha ga bats+tsa ri taM dz+nyA twa bi rU D+ha ka mu pA ya yau/ /so ba dad+de ba b+hik+Shu NaM te nai daM ka thi taM pu raM/ /swa karma pha la mA san+naM ta s+ya pa
<p>126b.2</p>par mdzad/ /skabs 'dir rgyal pos btang ba yi/ /gsang gnas spyod pa'i nyan rna yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod shes nas/ /'phags skyes po dang nye bar song / /de smras lha gcig dge slong rnams/ /mdun du de yis 'di skad gsung / /sa bdag de yi rang las kyi/ /'bras bu
<p>126b.3</p>sh+yA mi b+hU pa te/ /sap+tA he nAg+ni nA dag+d+haHsa pA mA t+ya pu ro hi taH/ /a bI tsi nAm+ni na ra ga duHsa he ni pa ti Sh+ya ti/ /i ti tata ba tsa naM shru twA nr-i pa tiHsa pu ro hi taH/ /yat+na du pa sa sap+ta haM dza laM ta tra gr-i
<p>126b.4</p>nye bar bdag gis mthong / /blon po mdun na 'don bcas te/ /zhag bdun na ni mes tshig nas/ /dmyal ba mnar med ces bya ba/ /bzod dka' dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /de skad de yi tshig thos nas/ /mi bdag mdun na 'don dang bcas/ /chu yi 'khrul 'khor khang nang du/ /zhag bdun
<p>126b.5</p>hAn+ta raM/ /k+Sha NA ba she She sap+tA he tasmin+taHpu raM ga te/ /sUR+Ya kAn+tArka saM tA pa yo gAta dza dz+wa la pA ba kaH/ /u da d+h+r-i te na pra la ya sa ba nA brti ne ne ba be gAn+ni dag+d+ho so d+ha gi ti shi khi nA nA ra kaM prA pa
<p>126b.6</p>'bad pas gnas par byas/ /zhag bdun mjug na skad cig la/ /pho brang 'khor du song ba des/ /me shel nyi ma'i 'od dag gi /sbyor bas me ni rab tu 'bar/ /'jig pa'i rlung gis gtsubs pa lta bur rab tu 'bar ba rtse mo can/ /rdeg ces sgrogs pas de ni myur bas nges bsregs dmyal
<p>127a</p>
<p>127a.1</p>ba h+niM/ /asmin lo ke dz+wa la na dza Di lA pA pi nAM pre t+ya rA gAHsarba trai bas+thi ra su khartabaHshI ta lAHpu N+ya b+hA dzaM/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la
<p>127a.2</p>ba'i me dag thob/ /sdig can rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan du'ang phyogs kun 'bar bas khengs/ /bsod nams bsten la thams cad kho nar brten zhing gdung ba'i sa gzhi bsil/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod ba dpag
<p>127a.3</p>tA yAM bi rU D+ha kA pa dA nAM dwA da sha pa l+la waH// //duHkhaM nu dan+ti su kha sam+ba da ma di shan+ti saM dzI ba yan+ti dza na tAM ti mi raM ha ran+ti/ /san+mA na sa s+ya ka la yan+ti bi kA sha
<p>127a.4</p>bsam gyi 'khri shing las 'phags skyes po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //dam pa bdud rtsis brlan pa'i zhal dang ri bong can zer dag /sdug bsngal zhi byed bde ba phun sum tshogs pa sbyin par byed/ /skye bo rnams ni yang dag 'tsho byed rab rib 'phrog
<p>127a.5</p>hA saM san+ta su d+har+d+ra ba da naHsha shi naHka rash+tsa/ /bim+bi sA raHk+ShiteHsA re pu re rA dza gr-i hA b+hi d+he/ /sA raHsa map+ta b+hU pA nA ma b+hU ta b+hU mi pu ran+da raH/ /k+Sha mA d+hA re b+hU dze ya s+ya k+Sha ma d+hA re tsa tse ta si/ /bA
<p>127a.6</p>par byed/ /dam pa'i yid kyi mtsho ni rnam par rgyas shing dgod par byed/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces pa/ /sa yi snying por gzugs can snying / /mtha' dag sa bdag snying po ni/ /sa yi brgya byin byung bar gyur/ /gang gi dpung pa sa yi rten/ /sems ni bzod pa'i rten dag la/ /khur
<p>127b</p>
<p>127b.1</p>h+yaHsa map+ta tsit+tA nAM mA shu n+ya sta ka ro dza na/ /kurba tas+t+yA ga sauR+YA NA mA shA yA pa ri pu ra NaM/ /pA Ni bi muk+to rat+no g+he swa bad+d+ho b+hU da si gra he/ /ka dA tsi ta b+ha bat+ta s+ya ba p+la bo na ga re gu ru/ /na bA b+hU da
<p>127b.2</p>ni bkod pa'i skye bo rnams/ /bsam pa mtha' dag phyi rol gyur/ /gang gis gtong dang rtul phod kyis/ /re phyogs yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /lag pa rin chen tshogs la yang / /ral gri 'dzin la dam par gyur/ /nam zhig de yi grong khyer du/ /nye bar 'tshe ba lci ba byung / /mi bsrun gsar
<p>127b.3</p>ya saM dzA ta darba kA la i bA ku laH/ /tamA s+thA na sa mA sI naM dza na tsin+tA kr-i ta k+Sha NaM/ /bya dzi dz+nyi pa ta sau ra dza na pra dzA nAM dza na ko pa maM/ /de ba de byi pra b+hA ba s+ya ni ya ta shA sa ne na te/ /dza naHsa dA sa
<p>127b.4</p>du mngon dar bas/ /kun tu dregs skyes bzhin du 'khrugs/ /skye bo'i bsam pa'i skabs phye ste/ /mdun sar yang dag bzhugs pa ni/ /skye rgu'i pha ltar gyur de la/ /grong khyer pa yi skye bos zhus/ /lha gcig lha yi mthu ldan pa/ /khyod kyi bka' yis dul ba yi/ /skye bo rtag tu rgya ldan
<p>127b.5</p>mu dro yaM maR+YA dAM nA ti brta te/ /dza na s+yA s+ya pra kr-i ta saM br-it+ta s+ya san+mArge sarga taH/ /u pa sargo da ga mAHkasma dasmA da ya mA ga taH/ /swa d+har+m+ma saM br-it+te na karma NAsharma NA nr-i NAM/ /su nr-i pe Na tsa gu h+yA nAM nA pa tan+ti bi
<p>127b.6</p>'di/ /lugs la rab tu mi 'da'o/ /dam pa'i lam nas rang bzhin gyis/ /rab zhugs skye bo 'di dag la/ /nye bar 'tshe ba rab rgyas 'di/ /glo bur dag tu ga nas 'ongs/ /rang gi chos la zhugs dga' ba'i/ /las dang rgyal po bzang pos kyang / /sbas par gyur pa'i mi rnams ni/ /rgud pa dag tu
<p>128a</p>
<p>128a.1</p>parta yaH/ /hr-i yan+te naHpra sU tA nAM gr-i hi NI nAM gr-i he/ /a pa t+yA ni pha lA nI ba sat+k+ri yA NA ma saM ya mA ta/ /kiM tu b+hU taMn bid+mastan mA yaM tsA pi ma hI ya pI/ /yatapra b+hA be na nI yan+te ku lA ni ni ra pa
<p>128a.2</p>ltung ba min/ /bdag cag rnams kyi khyim khyim du/ /sbrum ma btsas pa'i bu tsha rnams/ /bya ba legs pa'i 'bras bu dag /ma bsdams pa las bzhin du 'phrog /de ci mi shes 'byung po'am/ /yang na shin tu che ba'i rgyu/ /gang gi mthu yis rigs dag ni/ /bu brgyud bral ba nyid
<p>128a.3</p>t+ya tAM/ /i ti te gi rAb+hU b+h+r-i da b+hU ta saM krAn+ta tad+b+ya thaH/ /pa raM duHkhaM bi sha t+yan+taHsa tAM ka dA ra ba raM bta/ /sarbA ga byA pi nA te na dza na duHkhe na b+hU ya sA/ /pi Sha Nai bA br-i ta swa b+hU dur+b+h+rAn+ta hr-i da yaHk+Sha NaM/ /
<p>128a.4</p>du byed/ /de dag tshig des sa bdag la/ /de yi gdung ba 'phos par gyur/ /dam pa'i nang du pha rol gyi/ /sdug bsngal zhing la chu bzhin 'jug /yan lag kun la khyab byed pa/ /skye bo'i sdug bsngal chen po des/ /dug gi bzhin du bsgrubs pas de/ /skad cig snying ni rab 'khyam gyur/ /
<p>128a.5</p>so bra bI tA kiM ka ro mya tra b+hU dzA d+hI ni bi pau tu She/ /kan+tha nA ma pra brtaM te durlak+She Shu pra ti kri yA/ /de na me kaM pra dzaM twa d+ya b+ha ban+to ni dza maspa da/ /sa bra tash+tsin+ta yA mye ba rak+taM baHpra sa ba k+Sha ye/ /i ti rA dza ba
<p>128a.6</p>de smras dpung ba'i dbang dang ni/ /skyes bu min pa 'dir ci bya/ /mi mtshon pa de phyir bcos pa/ /ji ltar kho nar brtsam par bya/ /khyod rnams de ring nyi ma gcig /rang rang gnas su 'gro bar byos/ /khyod kyi bu tsha 'jig bsrung ba/ /brtul zhugs bcas pas nges par bsam/ /de skad rgyal ba'i
<p>128b</p>
<p>128b.1</p>tsAshru twA hr-iSh+TaHpau ra ma hat+ta maH/ /dza ga du staM sa mA brdza pU dza byaM dza na maM dza liM/ /de ba twa da ba d+hA ne na pra Na ya karna ne na tsa/ /twa yi bi n+yasta tsin+tA nAM nAsmA ka ma d+hu nA shra maH/ /a nud+d+ha ta mu
<p>128b.2</p>gsungs thos nas/ /grong pa chen po mgu rnams kyis/ /mchod pa gsal byed thal mo dag /yang dag sbyar nas de la smras/ /lha gcig khyod kyi nges 'dzin dang / /khyams dang rjes su thos pas kyang / /khyod la bsam pa rnam bkod pa/ /bdag cag da ni ngal ba med/ /khyod kyi bka' drin mi
<p>128b.3</p>dA raM tsa twat+p+ra sA dA bA lo ka naM/ /i da me ba dza na s+yA s+ya dzI bi ta nI ba baR+Sha ti/ /kiM pu naHbri ya me tat+te pI yU Sha sa dr-i shaM pa tsaH/ /tA pA pa hi mr-i du swA du kiM kiM na bi da d+hA ti naH/ /kr-i tI kri ta dz+haHka ru
<p>128b.4</p>rtsub cing / /yid du 'ong bas rab gzigs pa/ /'di nyid skye bo 'di dag ni/ 'tsho ba nyid kyis char 'bab bzhin/ /ci yang khyod kyi gsung 'di dag /bdud rtsi dag dang mtshungs shing dga'/ /gdung ba 'phrog byed 'jam zhing mnyen/ /nged kyis ci dang ci mi sgrub/ /mkhas shing byas shes snying
<p>128b.5</p>N+ya ni d+hiHsu la b+ha daR+sha naH/ /la b+h+ya te b+hA gya b+ho gye na sau dza n+ya sha ra la pra b+huH/ /pI yU ShA da ti pe sha laHpa ri tsa yaHshra byaM ba tsaHpany+tsa mA dA tsaHraHsha ri daM du br-ind ma hA so s+yA nan+da san+do ha da// /
<p>128b.6</p>rje'i gter/ /mthong ba rnyed sla drang por gyur/ /skye bo legs pa'i rje bo ni/ /skal ba spyod pa dag gis thob/ /dam pa'i sems la gnas pa'i dam pa rnams kyis yongs 'dris bdud rtsi dag pas kyang / /shin tu mnyes gshin tshig ni lnga pa bas kyang mnyan 'os ston zla'i 'od tshogs pas/
<p>129a</p>
<p>129a.1</p>sa ts+tsit+te ba sa tAM sA tAM ki ma pa ra puSh+pAn+ma naHko ma laM sau dza n+yaM ha ri tsan+d+ra na A da pi pa raM san+ta pa ni rbA pa NAM/ /i t+yuk+t+wa pra pa ya yuHpau rAstAM pra Na mya pra sA di ni/ /kiM ran+tastad gu No dA rA mA shA
<p>129a.2</p>spyod pa'i kun dga'i tshogs ster gzhan pa ci zhig yid ni me tog pas kyang 'jam/ /skye bo legs pa ha ri tsan+dan pas kyang yongs gdung mchog tu zlog par byed/ /ces brjod drin dang ldan de la/ /phyag 'tshal de yi yon tan ni/ /yid 'ong me tog phreng ba dag /phyogs
<p>129a.3</p>ku su ma mA li kAM/ /rA dzA pi na ga re kr-i twa b+hu ta pU dza bi d+hi kra maM/ /shAn+ti swasti ka saM b+hA raM tsakra ra ni ya ta pra taH/ /yak+Shi hA ri ti kA nA ma bA la kAn pu ra bA si nI/ /ha ra tI ti sa shu shrA
<p>129a.4</p>su 'grems shing grong pa song / /rgyal po yis kyang grong khyer du/ /'byung po mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim/ /byas nas zhi dang shis pa yi/ /tshogs kyis nges pa'i brtul zhugs byas/ /'phrog ma zhes pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /grong khyer gnas pa'i byis pa rnams/ /'phrog ces grong khyer lha
<p>129a.5</p>ba pu ra de ba ta yo di taM/ /tataHpo ra dza n+yaiHsAdz+haM sA mA t+yaHpr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /ka laM da ka ni bA pA khye s+thi taM be Nu ba nA shra mai/ /b+ha ga ban+taM ya yau draSh+TuM su ga taM do Sha bAn+ta ye/ /sarba duHkha dz+wa rA yA
<p>129a.6</p>dag gis/ /brjod pa de yis thos par gyur/ /de nas sa bdag blon dang bcas/ /grong khyer skye bos lhan cig tu/ /ka lan da ka'i gnas zhes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal gyi gnas bzhugs pa/ /sdug bsngal rim gyis gdung ba dag /bsten pa kun gyi mi tsha'i sman/ /bde bar gshegs pa bcom
<p>129b</p>
<p>129b.1</p>sa dzu Sha ma ka Tu kau Sha d+haM/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA nr-i pa tirdu rAta pra Na mya pri ya daR+Sha naM/ /u pa bi sh+yA gra tasta smai pau ra duHkhaM n+ya be da yata/ /b+ha ga wAn pi bi dz+nyA ya pau rA NAM san+ta tik+Sha yaM/ /tsin+tA nish+tsa la tAM k+Shi praM mu
<p>129b.2</p>ldan 'das/ /skyon rnams zhi slad blta ru song / /mthong ba dga' ste mi bdag gis/ /ring nas mthong nas phyag 'tshal te/ /mdun du 'khod nas de la ni/ /grong khyer pa yi sdug bsngal smras/ /grong khyer pa yi brgyud dag ni/ /nyams pa mkhyen nas snying rje'i gter/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang myur bar ni/ /
<p>129b.3</p>ba hA ka ru Na ni d+hiH/ /sa bi pri dz+ya dza gad+ban+d+huHsa nr-i paM sau ra maN+Da laM/ /pA tra tsI ba ra ma dA ya ya yau yak+Shi Ni ke ta naM/ /ta yA bi ra hi taM prA pya tad+g+r-i haM b+ha ga bA na dzi naH/ /pri yaM ka rA khya tatU
<p>129b.4</p>thugs ni g.yo ba med nyid 'dzin/ /'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor mi bdag dang / /bcas pas bskul nas 'gro ba'i gnyen/ /de ni lhung bzed chos gos bzung / /gnod sbyin mo yi khang par gshegs/ /de yis dben pa de yi ni/ /khyim du bcom ldan rgyal bas byon/ /dga' byed ces pa de yi bu/ /
<p>129b.5</p>traM ni nA yai ka ma daR+sha naM/ /yA ta b+ha ga ba te k+Shi praM yak+Shi swa gr-i ha ma ga tA/ /pra b+hU tapu trA nA pa sh+ya pri yaM pu traM pri yaM ka raM/ /ta mI k+Sha mA NA pA be shA kr-i ta bat+pe ba d+he nu kA/ /ba b+h+rA ma saM b+h+ra mot+t+rAn+tA sA dza ni
<p>129b.6</p>gcig ni snang ba min par mdzad/ /bcom ldan gshegs nas gnod sbyin mo/ /myur bar rang khyim 'ongs pa yis/ /rab mang bu las dga' ba'i bu/ /dga' byed dag ni mthong ma gyur/ /de ni 'tshol zhing rmongs bcas pas/ /drus ma be'u stor ba bzhin/ /'jig rten dang ni nags rnams kyang / /
<p>130a</p>
<p>130a.1</p>Shu pa ne Shu tsa/ /hA pri yaM ka ra hA pu tra kwa nu pa sh+yA mi te mu khaM/ /i ti pra lA pi nI tA raM niHshe ShaHsA ya yau di shaH/ /sA pi tsin+t+yA shu sarbA sA ni ra shA pu tra daR+sha ne/ /kre shan+tI sarba ta dwi pa sa mu
<p>130a.2</p>rings pa rab 'khrul de yis bskor/ /kye hud dga' byed kye hud bu/ /khyod kyi bzhin ni gar mthong na/ /zhes pa che bar rab sgrogs shing / /de ni ma lus phyogs su song / /de yis phyogs kun mgyogs btsal nas/ /bu ni mthong re med pa yis/ /mya ngan byed cing ri dang gling / /rgya mtsho'i
<p>130a.3</p>dra ba la yaM ya yau/ /mar+t+ya b+hU mi ma ti kra mya g+ho reShu na ga re Shu sa/ /swargod+de she Sh+wa shi k+She Shu bi mA nod+YA na shA li Shu/ /shrAn+ta kwa tsin+na bi shrAn+tA ya ti nI pra Ni yA ti nI/ /pu tra ma n+wi Sh+ya nA pa sh+ya ta lo ka pA la
<p>130a.4</p>dkyil 'khor dag tu song / /mi yi sa las 'das nas ni/ /'jigs su rung ba'i grong khyer dang / /mtho ris phyogs ni ma lus pa/ /gzhal yas khang dang skyed tshal gnas/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i grong khyer du'ang / /ngal zhing gang du'ang ngal mi gsol/ /phyogs ni 'tshol zhing rab song ste/ /btsal yang
<p>130a.5</p>pu re Shu tsa/ /ku be ra s+yA tha pa tsa sA ga twA tsa su ga tA shra maM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM bi yo gat+ta sha ra N+yaM sha ra NaM ya yau/ /ta yA tad duHkha br-it+taM taM sa ni sha mya ni bi di taM/ /tA ma bo tsata sho tsin+tAM kiM tsita smi ta
<p>130a.6</p>bu ni rnyed ma gyur/ /de nas lus ngan tshig gis ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas song ste/ /bcom ldan skyabs su 'os pa la/ /'bral bas gzir ba skyabs su song / /der ni de yis rang spyod mtha'/ /nges par bshad pa des gsan nas/ /cung zad 'dzum gyi dkar ba'i mchus/ /mya ngan
<p>130b</p>
<p>130b.1</p>si tA d+ha raH/ /hA rI ti ta baHpu trA NAM san+ti pany+tsa sha tA n+ya ho/ /i ya ti kiM bi yo gArti re kasmin+ne ba hA ri ti/ /i ti te nok+ta mA kar+N+N+ya yak+Shi duHkhA k+Sha tA ba data/ /pu tra lak+Sha pi b+ha ga ban sa h+yA nai
<p>130b.2</p>can ma der bka' stsal/ /'phrog ma khyod la bu dag ni/ /kye ma brgya phrag lnga dag yod/ /gcig nyid kho na stor ba la/ /'di snyed bral ba'i sdug bsngal ci/ /zhes des bka' stsal sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyams pa gnod sbyin mos thos smras/ /bu 'bum yod kyang bcom ldan 'das/ /
<p>130b.3</p>kapu tra k+Sha tiH/ /pu trA ta pi ya ta raM nA n+ya ta kiM duHkhaM tat+k+Sha yA ta ba raM/ /pu tra bA ne ba dzA nA ti pu tra sne ha bi Sha bya thAM/ /sa ha dzai ba su ta prI ti ra ka ra Na Ni ban+d+ha nA/ /ma li no bi ka la k+ShI NaH
<p>130b.4</p>bu gcig brlag pa yongs mi bzod/ /bu las mchog dga' gzhan na med/ /bu chags dug gis gdung ba ni/ /de brlag las gzhan sdug bsngal ci/ /bu dang ldan pa kho nas shes/ /rgyu med nges par gdams pa yi/ /bu yis dga' ba lhan skyes nyid/ /ma chang rid dang dri ma can/ /su
<p>130b.5</p>ka s+ya nen+du sa maHsu taH/ /i ti yak+Sha ba d+hu bA kyaM shru twA bat+pa l+ya bi hwa laM/ /b+hU tA nu kam+pI b+ha ga bAn sa smi tastA ya b+hA Sha ta/ /sho ko yaM ba hUM trA yA ya d+ye kA bi ra he ta ba/ /hr-i te twa yai ka bat+pA nAM pu tra ke
<p>130b.6</p>yi bu ni zla mi mtshungs/ /de skad gnod sbyin chung mi'i tshig /mnyes gshin gyis 'khrugs gsan gyur nas/ /bcom ldan 'byung po la brtse bas/ /'dzum bcas de la bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyi bu ni mang po las/ /gal te gcig bral mya ngan 'di/ /bu gcig rnams kyi bu khyod kyis/ /phrogs
<p>131a</p>
<p>131a.1</p>kIM dr-i shI bya thA/ /twaM pra bi sh+ya sa dA ge haM s+t+ri nAM pu tra nA lak+Shi tA/ /a sha nA si pu traM mA tA pi byA g+h+rI ba mr-i ga shA ba kAn/ /ye na ye na swa de ha s+ya duHkhaM yA t+yus b+ho ga tAM/ /na tata pa ra s+ya kurbi ta saM mA nan+no
<p>131a.2</p>pa'i gdung ba ci zhig 'dra/ /rtag tu khyim du ma mthong bar/ /khyod zhugs bud med rnams kyi bu/ /bu yi mas kyang stag mo yis/ /ri dwags rnams kyi bu bzhin zos/ /rang gi lus la gang gang gi/ /sdug bsngal nyer spyod nyid 'gyur ba/ /mya ngan nyams myong mtshungs pas na/ /
<p>131a.3</p>b+ha ba shu tsAM/ /twaM bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+hA nAM trI Ni shi k+ShA sa dA ni tse ta/ /gr-ih+NA si hiM sA bi mu khI tat+p+rAp+no si pri yaM su taM/ /i t+yuk+t+wa sA b+ha ga ba tA pras+thi shik+ShA pa dA ta taH/ /hiM sA bi ra mAt+tad+gan+tuM pu traM prA pa pri
<p>131a.4</p>de ni gzhan la bya ba min/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyi/ /bslab pa'i gzhi gsum gal te khyod/ /'dzin cing 'tshe las phyir ldog na/ /dga' ba'i bu de khyod kyis 'thob/ /de skad bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal/ /de yis bslab gzhi bzung de nas/ /'tshe ba spangs las dga' byed du/ /de yis byin nas
<p>131a.5</p>yaM ka raM/ /tat+p+rAg+dzan+ma br-it+tAn+tAn+taM ta s+yaHkarma pha lA n+wa yaM/ /b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn pr-iSh+Tastad+b+r-it+tAn+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /pu rAsmin+ne ba na ga re pau raHke pyu pa b+ho gi na/ /sarba tod+YA na yA tA yAM bi dza h+ma narta bA di teH/ /a tha te na pa thA kA pi
<p>131a.6</p>thob par gyur/ /de yi skye ba snga ma yi/ /spyod mtha' yas kyi rjes 'gro de/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /spyod pa'i mtha' de bka' stsal pa/ /sngon tshe grong khyer 'di nyid du/ /grong pa kha cig longs spyod can/ /ri dang skyed mos tshal 'gro zhing / /gar dang rol mos rnam par rtse/ /de nas lam der ba rdzi yi/ /
<p>131b</p>
<p>131b.1</p>go pA kAn+tAg+ha na sta nI/ /ma thi taM pa N+ya mA dA ya ha ri NAk+ShI sa mA dA yau/ /gar+b+ha b+ha rA la sa ga tiHpra t+yut+pA ga dza ga mi ni/ /pa sha nai rU pa sarban+tI sa spr-i haM tA na bya lo ka yata/ /ta s+yA ba na mr-i gI mug+d+hai rA ba
<p>131b.2</p>mdzes ma su zhig nu rgyas shing / /ri dgas mig ldan dar ba dag /khyer nas 'tshong du yang dag 'ongs/ /rang bzhin gyis ni glang po'i 'gros/ /mngal khur le lor bgrod ldan ma/ /de yi dal bus nyer bgrod cing / /chags bcas de dag rnams la bltas/ /nags kyi ri dwags ltar mdzes ma/ /
<p>131b.3</p>dag+d+hairbi lo ka naiH/ /a saM br-it+tA lA ShAdzrai pi sot+kaN+Tha tAM ya yuH/ /pA tairni man+t+ri tA tra ma da na k+ShI ba tAM ga tA/ /hA ri tAM sa hA sA shI laM na bi be da pra ma di nI/ /ta ta ste Shu pra yA te Shu ta s+yA ra
<p>131b.4</p>yid 'ong ma de'i lta tshul ni/ /mngon 'dod ma bsgribs brlan pa des/ /de dag rnams kyang sred ldan gyur/ /'dod pas myos pa nyid gyur cing / /ngang tshul 'phral la nyams pa dag /ma rig bag med pa de ni/ /de dag rnams kyis der don gnyer/ /de nas de dag rab song tshe/ /chags pas ngal
<p>131b.5</p>ti shra ma ta/ /pa pA ta sa ha d+haiR+Ye Na gar+b+ha ko pA di bA ru NaH/ /a t+r+wAn+ta re sa mA yA taM tat+pu N+yaiste na bar+t+ma nA/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+haM sA drAk+ShI ta kA ya tsit+ta pra sA da naM/ /sAsmai ma thi ta mU l+yAp+ta ma mrA NAM R+sha ta pany+tsakaM /
<p>131b.6</p>nas de yi mngal/ /khros pas dmar por gyur pa bzhin/ /brtan pa dang ni lhan cig lhung / /skabs der de yi bsod nams kyis/ /lam de nas ni rang sangs rgyas/ /lus dang sems ni rab dang ba/ /legs par 'ong ba de yis mthong / /dar ba'i rin gyis thob pa nyi/ /a mra lnga brgya de yis ni/ /
<p>132a</p>
<p>132a.1</p>dU rAta pra NA ma bi na tA ma na sai ba n+ya be da yata/ /ta tra pu N+yA r-id+d+hi ma t+ya smin dzA ta yak+Sha ku le d+hu nA/ /dzA ta mA mrAr+pa Ne nA pya pu trA NAM sha ta paM tsa kaM/ /hiM sA ba tI pa pa t+yA ga shI la bi sma ra NA ta pa
<p>132a.2</p>ring nas phyag 'tshal rnam btud nas/ /yid nyid kyis ni de la phul/ /bsod nams de las gnod sbyin rigs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan 'dir da lta skyes/ /a mra phul bas 'di la bu/ /lnga brgya dag ni skyes par gyur/ /ngang tshul brjed nas bdag po dag /btang bas 'tshe ba ldan gyur
<p>132a.3</p>raM/ /pra t+yeka bud+d+ha pra Na teHprAp+tA shik+ShA pa dA d+ya sA/ /i ti bi bi d+ha bi pA kaM kar+m+ma tan+t+raM bi tsi traM ki ma pi sa ka tha yi trA ta tra yak+ShAM ga nA yAH/ /ka li ta ku sha la se tuHsaM b+ha bAb+d+hau dza nA nA ma kr-i ta su kri ta tsit+taM
<p>132a.4</p>sngon/ /rang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bas/ /de yis bslab gzhi de ring thob/ /de skad der ni gnod sbyin mo yi las kyi rgyud ci yang / /rnam mang rnam smin rnam par bkra ba dag ni bka' stsal nas/ /'jig rten kun gyi legs byas bsams byas ston pa de yis ni/ /skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i
<p>132a.5</p>sarba lo ka s+ya shAstA/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ha rI ta kA da ma nA ba dA naM tra yo da sha pal+la waH// //yaHsaM kalpa pa thA si nai ba tsa ra ti pro dzrim+b+ha
<p>132a.6</p>mtsho la dge ba'i zam stegs mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las 'phrog ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu gsum pa'o// //gang zhig rtog pa'i lam du'ang rgyu ba nyid min rmad byung rab tu
<p>132b</p>
<p>132b.1</p>mA NAd+b+hu taM swap+naiR+Ya s+ya na saM ga tiHpa ri tsa yau yasmin+na pUrba kra maH/ /bA NI mau na ba tI tsa ya tra hi nr-i NAM yaHshro tra ne trA ti thistaM nir+b+yA dza dza na pra b+hA ba bi b+ha baM mA nai ra me yan+na maH/ /pu re rA dza gr-i hA b+hi khye biM bi
<p>132b.2</p>'phel dang ldan/ /rmi lam gyis kyang gang dang 'grogs min gang la yongs 'dris sngon chad med pa'i rim/ /gang la mi rnams tshig ni mi smra nyid dang gang zhig rna ba mig gi mgron/ /rgyu med skye bo'i mthu ni 'byor pa tshad kyis gzhal bya min pa de la bstod/ /grong khyer rgyal bo'i khab ces par/ /
<p>132b.3</p>sA re Na b+hU b+hu dzA/ /pU dz+ya mA naM dzi naM dr-iSh+T+wA s+thi taM be Nu ba nAM shra me/ /mAt+saR+ya bi Sha saM tap+tA mUr+khAH sarba dz+nya mA ni naH/ /na se hi re ta dut+kAR+ShaM pra kA sha mi pa kau shi kAH/ /ma li naiHswa bi ni shA ya pa
<p>132b.4</p>sa bdag gzugs can snying po yis/ /'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa yi/ /rgyal ba mchod pa mthong gyur nas/ /rmongs pa kun mkhyen nga rgyal can/ /phrag dog dug gis rab gdungs pas/ /de yi khyad 'phags ma bzod de/ /ko'u shi kas snang ba bzhin/ /nub mor gyur pa'i rab rib tshogs/ /
<p>132b.5</p>ra b+hA go di taiHpa dA/ /kri ya te bA sa ra spar+d+ha sharba raisti mi rot+ka raiH/ /maska rI saM dza yI bai rA da dzi taHka ku dasta thA/ /pU ra Na dz+nya ti pu tra d+ya mUr+khA k+Sha pa Na kAHsa re/ /U tsu r+n+r-i pa ti ma b+h+ye t+ya mA ra mA yA bi
<p>132b.6</p>dri ma can ni shar cha nas/ /'char bar rtag tu nyin par la/ /rang nyams bya slad 'gran par byed/ /gnag lhas bu dang yang dag rgyal/ /mi pham nog can de bzhin du/ /rdzogs byed gnyen gyi bu la sogs/ /rmongs pa zad byed gzhan dag kyang / /bdud kyi sgyu mas rmongs byas shing / /'gran 'dod
<p>133a</p>
<p>133a.1</p>mo hi taH/ /saM g+haR+She dwe Sha do She Na d+hU me ne bAn+d+ha kA ri tAH/ /e Sha sarba dz+nya tA mA na ba ne yaHshra ma NaHs+thi taH/ /r-id+d+hi pra b+hA bo b+ha ba tA tasmA kaM tsa dr-i sh+ya tAM/ /r-id+d+hi pra b+hA bats+tsa yat+kiny+tsita
<p>133a.2</p>zhe sdang skyon gyis ni/ /du bas bzhin du mun gtibs pas/ /mi bdag la mngon phyogs nas smras/ /nags na 'dug pa'i dge sbyong gang / /'di ni kun mkhyen nga rgyal can/ /khyod kyis de dang nged rnams kyi/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu ni blta bar byos/ /rdzu 'phrul mthu las gang cung zad/ /
<p>133a.3</p>dza na byA bA dza nordzi taM/ /daR+sh+ya te ma ha dAsh+tsaR+yaM prA ti hAR+yaM ta du ts+ya te/ /shak+tiHsaM sa di ya s+yAsti prA ti hAR+ya s+ya daR+sha ne/ /asma kaM ta s+ya bA rA dzan pU dz+ya sastu dza gat+t+ra ye/ /i ti te ShAM ba tsashru twA tad+dar+p+ya bi mu kho nr-i
<p>133a.4</p>skye bo mgu bar rab spel ba/ /ngo mtshar che ba mthong gyur pa/ /de dag cho 'phrul zhes su brjod/ /rgyal po bdag cag gam dang de/ /mdun sar cho 'phrul ston pa yi/ /nus pa gang la yod gyur de/ /'gro ba gsum du mchod 'os 'gyur/ /zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas/ /mi bdag de dregs las phyir
<p>133a.5</p>paH/ /u bA tsa bAM ts+tsh+wa ke yaM baHpa shU nAM gi ri laM g+ha ne/ /a pa maM dza pa mai bai tata kA spar+d+hAg+ne paM taM ga kaiH/ /ne tad+bA ts+yaM su narbA dI mA yA niSh+kA s+ya te pu rata/ /i ti rA dza gu Na dz+nye na pra t+yA khyA tod+Ya mAHkhA laH/ /pra ya yuste
<p>133a.6</p>phyogs/ /smras pa khyed bsam 'di ci zhig /'phye bo ri la 'dzeg par 'dod/ /'di ni rigs min phye ma leb/ /rnams kyis me la 'gran nam ci/ /'di ni smra bar mi bya yang / /smra na bdag gis grong las 'byin/ /rgyal po yon tan shes pa yis/ /de skad spro zhing bshad pas na/ /mi bsrun de dag
<p>133b</p>
<p>133b.1</p>ni rA lam+be lam+ba mA na i bAM ba re/ /bim+bi sA ro na ra pa tirmaur+kh+yata pak+Sha pA ta bAn/ /a n+yaM bra dzA mo b+hU pA la mi ti tes ma tsin+ta yan/ /a trAn+ta re b+ha ga ba ti shrA bsti ma b+hi ta pu rIM/ /prAp+te
<p>133b.2</p>mkha' la bzhin/ /rten med par ni song bar gyur/ /mi bdag gzugs can snying po 'di/ /rmongs las phyogs su lhung gyur pas/ /sa skyong gzhan dag 'gro bya zhes/ /de dag rnams kyis bsams par gyur/ /skabs der bcom ldan mnyan yod kyi/ /grong khyer dang nye rgyal byed tshal/ /kun dga'
<p>133b.3</p>dze ta ba nA ra maM di gaM tA me ba te ya yuH/ /te pra se na dzi taM ta tra prA s+ya ko sa la b+hU pa tiM/ /prA ti haR+Yati tata spar+d+hA tA me bAsmai n+ya de da yan/ /gu NAn+ta ra dz+nyo nr-i pa tiste ShAM dar+pa pak+Shets+tsha yA/ /r-id+d+hi san+daR+sha not+sA hAd ya yau b+ha ga ba
<p>133b.4</p>ra bar byon par gyur/ /phyogs de nyid du de dag song / /de dag der phyin ko sa la'i/ /sa yi bdag po sa rgyal la/ /cho 'phrul rmad byung 'gran pa ni/ /de nyid kho na de la brjod/ /yon tan khyad shes mi bdag ni/ /de dag dregs pa gzhom 'dod pas/ /rdzu 'phrul lta bar spro ba'i slad/ /bcom ldan 'das
<p>133b.5</p>ton+ti kaM/ /sa ma b+h+ye t+ya bi na yAta pra N+ya mi pa t+ya ta ma pra bIta/ /b+ha ga ban dar+p+ya da la naM tIr+th+yA nAM kartu mar+d+ha pi/ /r-id+d+hi spar+d+hA nu ban+d+he na twat+p+ra b+hA ba di dr-ik+Sha yAH/ /swa gu Na sh+la g+ha yAsmA kaM taiHkar+N+Nau ba d+hi rI kr-i tau/ /
<p>133b.6</p>kyi drung du song / /mngon du phyin te dul ba yis/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni rab gsol pa/ /bcom ldan mu stegs rnams kyi ni/ /dregs pa zhi bar mdzad par 'os/ /rdzu 'phrul 'gran pa'i nye sbyor gyis/ /khyed kyi mthu ni blta bar 'dod/ /de dag rang gi yon tan bsngags/ /bdag cag rna ba 'on par byed/ /
<p>134a</p>
<p>134a.1</p>pra kA sha ya ni dzaM te dzaHsadz+dza na brdza naM bi b+ho/ /tIr+th+yA b+hi d+ha na ma khi laM pra yA tu pra la yaM ta maH/ /i ti rA dza ba tsa shru twA nirbi gA ra ma hA sha yaH/ /b+ha ga bAn bi ra ta maR+Sha pa g+haR+Shasta ma b+hA Sha
<p>134a.2</p>gtso bo dam pa mgu ba yis/ /rang gi gzi brjid rab gsal mdzod/ /mu stegs zhes pa ma lus pa'i/ /mun pa brlag par rab tu thob/ /de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /bsams pa chen po rnam 'gyur med/ /'gran bzhed khro ba dang bral ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis der
<p>134a.3</p>ta/ /rA dzan+na n+yo pa mardA ya bibA dA ya ma dA ya bA/ /bi be+e kA b+ha ra NArdo yaM kr-i ya te gu Na saM gra haH/ /mAt+saR+ya ma li naiH kiM tairbi tsA ra bi gu Nairgu NaiH/ /ye ha ran+ti pa rot+kaR+Sha spar+d+hA ban+d+ha pra sA ri
<p>134a.4</p>bka' stsal/ /rgyal po gzhan dag nyer gzhom dang / /rtsod dang rgyags pa'i phyir yang min/ /rnam dben rgyan du 'os pa yang / /yon tan 'di ni gzung bar bya/ /'gran pa'i rgyu yis rab bsgrubs gang / /pha rol bsngags 'phrog yon tan ni/ /phrag dog dag gi dri ma can/ /rnam dpyad yon tan bral
<p>134a.5</p>taH/ /gu Na ts+tsha da na ma n+ya s+ya swa gu Ne na ka ro ti yaH/ /d+harmaste nA pra shaste na swa ya me ba ni d+hA ti taH/ /sad gu NA nAM pa rIk+Shai ba pa re bai lak+Sh+ya kA ri NI/ /u tsi ta na hi shud+d+hA nAM tu la ro ha bi DaM ba
<p>134a.6</p>des ci/ /gang zhig rang gi yon tan gyis/ /gzhan gyi yon tan sgrib byed pa/ /bsngags par 'os pa min pa des/ /rang nyid kho nas chos chud gson/ /yon tan dam pa yongs brtag nyid/ /mchog tu skyengs par byed pa yin/ /gang phyir dag pa srang la ni/ /gzhal ba'i tho 'tshams rigs pa
<p>134b</p>
<p>134b.1</p>nA/ /gu Na bA na pi nA yA ti yaHpa re Sh+wa pra san+na tAM/ /sa dI pa hastastad pA trats+tshA ya yA ma li nI kr-i tAH/ /lo ke ta e ba sarba dz+nya bid+maHki ma d+hi kaM pa ya/ /pa rA b+hi mA nA b+hi b+ha ba prA gal+b+h+yaM swa pa rA b+ha
<p>134b.2</p>min/ /gang zhig yon tan ldan na yang / /gzhan la rab dngas nyid mi 'gyur/ /lag na mar me thogs de de'i/ /snod kyi grib mas mun par byed/ /de nyid 'jig rten na kun mkhyen/ /bdag gis lhag pa ci zhig rig /pha rol mngon khengs zil gnon par/ /rtul ba brtan pas rang zil
<p>134b.3</p>baH/ /i ti shru twA b+ha ga ba taHpra sha ma b+hi ma taM ba tsaH/ /b+h+r-i sha ma b+h+yar+tha nAM rA dzA tsa kA rAsh+tsaR+Ya daR+shane/ /ta taHkr-its+tsh+rata b+ha ga ba tA kr-i tAh+Yu pa ga mo nr-i paH/ /rA dza d+hA niM ya yau hr-iSh+TaHsap+tA hA ba d+hI
<p>134b.4</p>gnon/ /de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /rab zhi mngon par bzhed thos nas/ /rgyal pos ngo mtshar bstan pa la/ /mchog tu mngon par zhu ba byas/ /de nas tshogs kyi bcom ldan gyis/ /zhal bzhes mdzad pas mi yi bdag /mgu bas zhag bdun dus btab ste/ /rgyal po'i pho
<p>134b.5</p>saM bi dA/ /asmin+nab sa ra b+h+rA tA b+hU mi b+hartu ra po da raH/ /tsa tsA rAn+taHpu ro pAn+te prA sA da ta la bar+t+ma nA/ /sa lI la bra dza tasta s+ya karma bA tai ri be ri tA/ /ku su ma srak+pa thAM taMshe rA dza pat+nI ka
<p>134b.6</p>brang song bar gyur/ /skabs der sa yi bdag po yis/ /ma gcig min pa'i spun zla zhig /pho brang 'khor dang nye ba yi/ /khang bzang gzhi yi lam nas rgyus/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo'i lag nas 'phos/ /rtse dga' dang bcas 'gro ba de'i/ /phrag par mi
<p>135a</p>
<p>135a.1</p>rats+Yu tAM/ /ta s+ya bi dz+nyA ta do Sha s+ya do ShaM saM b+hA byA pAk+Shi b+hiH/ /pi shu nAHkiM ba dan+ti tAM tsa kri re rA dza gA mi nA/ /ts+tshi tra malpa ma pi prA pya k+Shu drAHsarbA pa kA ri NaH/ /dwi dzi hwAHpi shu na pra bi shan
<p>135a.2</p>tog 'phreng ba lhung / /skyon ni rig par gyur pa de'i/ /skyon rnams dbang pos bsal byas nas/ /phra ma mkhan gyis gtam de dag /rgyal po yis ni rtogs par byas/ /rje bo'i bsam pa stong par ni/ /chung yang bu ga rnyed par gyur/ /gnod pa kun byed lce gnyis pa/ /phra ma rab
<p>135a.3</p>pra b+hU nAM shU n+ya mA sha yaM/ /pi shu Na pre ri to rA dzA b+h+rA tu rIR+Sh+ya bi Sho lwa NaH/ /ts+tshe daM pA lA di sha shu pA Ni pA da s+ya mUr+ts+tshi taH/ /ni kr-it+ta pA Ni tsa ra NaHku mA raHkarma bi p+la bAta/ /pa ba d+h+ya ba su d+hA shA yI bi be sha bi Sha mA
<p>135a.4</p>tu 'jug pa nyid/ /rgyal po phra mas bskul ba yis/ /phrag dog dug rgyas rgyal gyur pas/ /spun zla'i lag pa rkang pa dag /myur du chod ces yang dag bsgos/ /lag pa rkang pa rnams bcad pa'i/ /gzhon nu las kyi rnam bslad pas/ /gsod pa'i nor 'dzin la nyal te/ /mi bzad rgud par
<p>135a.5</p>pa daM/ /ti pra bya thaM pa ri pr-i taM sho tsad+b+harmA tr-i ba na d+hU b+hiH/ /da tr-i shustaM k+Sha pa Na kAHk+Sha NaM/ /tAn sa ma b+h+ye t+ya sho kArta ste rA dza su ta bA na bAH/ /dza ga dusta ta pa ri tA Na lup+tAHsarba prA Ni
<p>135a.6</p>zhugs par gyur/ /ma dang gnyen ni mya ngan can/ /gdung ba drag pos yongs bskor te/ /skad cig mig ni g.yo ba yi/ /zad byed rnams kyis mthong bar gyur/ /de ni yongs bskyabs la chags shing / /kun la phyag 'tshal mya ngan gyis/ /gzir ba'i rgyal bu gnyen de rnams/ /de dag la mngon phyogs
<p>135b</p>
<p>135b.1</p>naH/ /a do ShAM ni gr-i hI to yaM kA lo nA ma nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/ /sarba dz+nya bA di no yU yaM pra sA do s+ya bi d+hI ya tAM/ /i ti taiHpra sa rad+bASh+pai rar+tha mA nAHpra lA pi b+hiH/ /tai mau ni no niSh+p+ra ti b+hA bai lak+Sh+ya da n+ya to ya yuH/ /a
<p>135b.2</p>nas smras/ /kA la zhes pa mi bdag bu/ /skyon med 'di ni chad pas bcad/ /khyed rnams kun mkhyen smra ba po/ /'di la bka' drin bsgrub par mdzod/ /de skad mchi ma rab zags shing / /rab smras de yis gsol btab pas/ /mthu med de dag mi smra zhing / /skyengs nas gzhan du song bar gyur/ /de
<p>135b.3</p>tha te na pa thA ya to b+hi k+ShuHsu ga ta shA sa nAta/ /a nan+do bi da d+heM gA ni ta s+ya sa t+yo pa yA tsa nAta/ /rA dza pU drastu saM dzA ta pA NipA daHpra san+na d+hIH/ /dzi na sha ra Na ma b+h+ye t+ya ta du pa s+thA ya ko b+ha bAta/ /sap+ta
<p>135b.4</p>nas dge slong kun dga' bo/ /bde gshegs bka' yis lam de nas/ /'ongs te bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /de yi lus ni rnam par bsgrubs/ /rkang lag yang dag skyes pa yis/ /rgyal po'i bu yang dang ba'i blos/ /rgyal la skyabs su mngon song ste/ /de yi nye gnas dag tu gyur/ /de nas zhag
<p>135b.5</p>rA tre bya tI te tha prA tI hA R+yaM gr-i haM ma hata/ /dr-i d+hiM b+ha ga ba to draSh+TuM ma hI pa ti ra kA ra yata/ /u pa biSh+Te nr-i pe ta tra sa ha k+Sha pa Na kA di b+hiH/ /kalpa br-ik+Shi ki tA b+hU mi ra b+ha ba ta su ga tets+tsha yA/ /ta taHprAp+te
<p>135b.6</p>bdun bzlas pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /cho 'phrul blta 'dod sa bdag gis/ /khang pa chen po byed du bcug /der ni zad byed pa sogs dang / /lhan cig mi bdag bzhugs pa la/ /bde gshegs bzhed pas sa gzhi dag /dpag bsam shing gis brgyan par gyur/ /de nas bcom
<p>136a</p>
<p>136a.1</p>Shu de be ShurdaSh+TuM b+ha ga ba taHpra b+hAM/ /rat+na pra di paM b+ha ga bAn b+he dze siM hA sa naM ma hata/ /te dzo d+hA tuM pra ban+na s+ya ta s+ya gaN+Da sa mud+ga teH/ /byastaHpA tsa ka saM g+hA tai ra b+huta b+hu ba na maN+Da laH/ /shan+te
<p>136a.2</p>ldan 'das kyi mthu/ /lta ru lha rnams 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri/ /rin chen rab 'bar che ba bsten/ /me yi khams la rab zhugs pa/ /de yi 'gram pa las 'khrungs pa'i/ /me yi tshogs kyis srid pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni khyab par gyur/ /srid par
<p>136a.3</p>sha naiHkA ma la kA na na san+ni kA she ba h+nau sa map+ta b+hU ba na s+thi ta b+haM ga b+hi t+yA/ /de hIt+ta to b+ha ga ba taHka ru NAm+bu ra sheHpUr+NA mr-i to rmi bi ma lA ru Na yaHpra su sruH/ /lA ba N+ya sA ra dzi ti tsan+d+ra sa ha sra kAn+tiM te
<p>136a.4</p>gnas pa mtha' dag 'jig pa'i 'jigs pas dal bu yis/ /pad+ma'i tshal dang mtshungs pa'i me ni zhi bar gyur pa la/ /de rjes bcom ldan sku ni snying rje'i chu yi phung po las/ /bdud rtsis gang ba'i rba rlabs dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phros/ /stong phrag zla ba'i mdzes pa las rgyal mdzes pas khengs gyur
<p>136a.5</p>dza pra tA na bi pha lI kr-i ta sUR+ya tsakraM/ /taM nA ga nA ya kA ni kA ya bi lo tsa nA ni prI t+yA pa puHsu kr-i ta lab+d+ha ma pUr+b+ba haR+ShaM/ /bai DUR+ya nA la bi pu lA ru Na rat+na pa tra kAn+tol+la sat+ka na ka ke sa ra kar+Ni
<p>136a.6</p>cing / /gzi brjid rab tu rgyas pas nyi ma'i 'khor lo 'bras med mdzad/ /'dren pa de ni skye bo'i tshogs kyi rnam par lta byed kyis/ /legs byas kyis thob sngon med mgu zhing dga' bas 'thungs par gyur/ /chu ba bai DUR+ya ldan rin chen dmar po'i 'dab ma yangs/ /mdzes shing rab tu 'bar ba'i gser gyi
<p>136b</p>
<p>136b.1</p>ka ni/ /a b+h+yud+Ya yuHk+Shi ti ta lA da tha ta t+sa mI pe pad+mA ni sau ra b+ha rAhu ta ShaT+pa dani/ /te Shu pa biSh+Ta ma tha kAny+tsa na tsa run+ti snig+d+he k+Sha Na su ga ta tsakra ma dr-i sh+ya tA rAta/ /pIyU Sha
<p>136b.2</p>ge sar ze 'bru can/ /rkang drug pa rnams dri bzang tshogs kyis 'bod pa'i pad+ma ni/ /de nas de yi drung du sa gzhi dag las mngon 'khrungs gyur/ /de dag rnams la nye bar bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs 'khor lo ni/ /gser 'od mdzes shing 'jam pa'i rgyan ldan de nas nye bar mthong / /bdud rtsi mnyes
<p>136b.3</p>pe sha la sha shi d+Yu ti shI ta le na yas+yo da ye na sa ha pA su khA mA pa lo kaH/ /teShAM pra b+hA ba bi b+ha baM b+ha ga bAn ba b+hA ra ma d+h+ye d+hi kaM ka na ka shai la i pA tsa la naM/ /su skan+d+ha ban+d+ha ra g+ha na R+Yu ti san+ni be shaH
<p>136b.4</p>gshin ri bong can 'od bsil bar gyur pa dag /gang zhig shar bas 'jig rten dag gis 'phral la bde thob gyur/ /de dag dbus na bcom ldan 'das ni mthu yi 'byor pa dag /ri rnams dag las gser gyi ri bo bzhin du lhag par 'dzin/ /phrag pa legs mtho sdug cing mdzes par yang dag
<p>136b.5</p>praM shu su rak+Shi ti ru hA mi ba pA ri dzA taH/ /swargAM ga nA ka ra ku she sha ya kIR+Ya ma nair m+lA na mA l+ya ba la yaiHka li tot+ta mAM gAH/ /ta s+yA na nAM bu dza bi lo ka na ni rni me Sha mar+t+yo a pi k+Sha
<p>136b.6</p>gnas pa ni/ /lha yi ser skyes rnams las yongs 'du bzhin du rab tu mtho/ /mtho ris bu mo'i lag pas me tog rnams ni gtor gyur pa'i/ /mi dman 'phreng ba'i tshogs kyis yan lag mchog rnams rgyas gyur cing / /de zhal chu skyes rnam par blta la mig ni 'dzum bral bas/ /mi rnams dag kyang
<p>137a</p>
<p>137a.1</p>Na ma bA pu ra mar+t+ya b+hA paM/ /byo mAM ga Ne Sha su ra duM du b+hi shaM kha tUR+YaM g+ho ShA br-i te ku su ma baR+Sha ma hAT+Ta hA sa/ /gan+d+har+b+ha kin+na ra mu nI shwa ra tsA ra NA nAM spI tash+tsa tsA ra b+ha ga ban stu ti
<p>137a.2</p>skad cig mi yi dngos min thob par 'gyur/ /de nas lha yi rnga chen dung dang rnga sgras khyab gyur cing / /me tog char pa gad rgyangs cher bzhad nam mkha'i do rar ni/ /dri za mi'am ci dang thub pa'i dbang phyug spyod rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan bstod pa'i tshig gi sgra ni
<p>137a.3</p>bA da nA daH/ /ta trA ru NA d+ha ra da lA dr-i sha nAM shu shu b+h+raHbyA kIr+Na ke sha ra ku lA da sha nA ra bin+dA ta/ /sat+sau ra b+haM b+ha ga ba taHswa ra san+ni br-it+taM d+ha n+yaHsa surma d+hu ra bAd+ma d+hu pu N+ya su taM/ /
<p>137a.4</p>bsgrags par gyur/ /der ni bcom ldan zhal gyi pad+ma mchu yi 'dab dmar zhing / /'od zer dkar bas kun dkris so yi ge sar rdzogs pa las/ /bsod nams kyis gtsang shin tu dngar ba'i gsung gi sbrang rtsi ni/ /rang nyams dang mthun dam pa'i dri bzang skal dang ldan pas 'thungs/ /
<p>137a.5</p>pA paM bi muM tsa ta ni ShiM tsa ta pu N+ya bI dzaM bai raM pa ri t+ya dza ta shA mya su khaM b+ha dza d+h+waM/ /dz+nyA nA mr-i taM pi ba ta mr-i ta bi ShA pa hA ri Ne yaM ta nuHku sha la karma sA khI ci ra ya/ /lak+Sh+mi sh+tsa lA ta ru Na tA
<p>137a.6</p>sdig pa'i tha ba thong la bsod nams dag gis sa bon thob/ /kho na ni yongs su dor la zhi ba'i bde ba bsten par byos/ /'chi ba'i dug ni nyams byed ye shes bdud rtsi 'thungs shig dang / /dge ba'i grogs por gyur pa'i lus 'di ring po mi gnas so/ /dpal 'byor g.yo zhing lang tsho
<p>137b</p>
<p>137b.1</p>tsa dza rA nu yA tA kA yo bya pA ya ni tsa ya s+ya ni kA ya i ba/ /pA NAHsha rI ra ka ku TI mu hUrta pan+thA ni t+yo da ye ku ru ta d+harma ma ye pra yat+naH/ /i t+yA di b+hir+b+ha ga ba ta pra bi b+hak+ta dip+ta dz+nyA
<p>137b.2</p>nyid kyang rga bar rjes su 'gro/ /lus kyang gnod pa'i tshogs rnams dag gi gnas nyid gyur pa yin/ /srog ni ngan pa'i lus kyi khyim gyi yud tsam mgron yin pas/ /chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu skyed la rab tu 'bad par mdzod/ /de la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis nyer bstan ye
<p>137b.3</p>nairbi be ka bi ma lauHku sha lo pa de sheH/ /badzrai ri bA shu da lA shaHpra ya yau dza na sat+kA ya dr-iSh+Ti ma ma biM sha tri shr-ing+ga shai laH/ /r-id+d+hi pra b+hA b+ha ga ba taHpra bi b+hA pya tIr+th+yA man+t+ra ha tA pi Sha d+ha rA i
<p>137b.4</p>shes kyi/ /snang ba dri ma med pas dben zhing dge ba'i mthu stobs kyis/ /skye bo'i ngar 'dzin 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo'i rtse mo ni/ /nyi shu rdo rjes bzhin du myur bcom rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul 'od ldan bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu stobs mu stegs rnams/ /sngags kyis bcom
<p>137b.5</p>pa b+hag+na darbAH/ /di pA e bArka ki ra Na pra ti b+hA ti b+hu tAsh+tsi trarbi tA i ba ya yush+tsi ra nish+tsa la twaM/ /a trAn+ta re b+ha ga ba taHsa ta taM bi pak+Sha na sarbAt+ma nA k+Sha pa Na ka na ba d+hArma
<p>137b.6</p>pa'i dug 'dzin bzhin du dregs pa nyams gyur cing / /nyi ma'i 'od kyi mthu yis mar me bzhin du zil gyis mnan/ /yun ring g.yo ba med pa ri mo bkod pa bzhin du gyur/ /skabs der gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes zad byed pa rnams ni/ /bdag nyid kun gyis rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
<p>138a</p>
<p>138a.1</p>yak+ShaH/ /k+Ship+ta shra bAta bri ta baR+Sha b+ha raish+tsa kA ra bi drA bya ran+d+ha sha ra NA na b+hu bi badzra pA NiH/ /ud+d+hi sh+ya ta na tha kr-i pAr+d+ra b+ha yA sha ra N+yaHsarbo pa de sha bi Sha yaM b+ha ga bAn
<p>138a.2</p>mi mthun phyogs/ /yin par shes nas drag po'i rlung gis dkris pa'i char dag spros/ /rnam par rmongs nas sa yi khung bur bskyabs pa dag tu byas/ /de nas de dag la mtshon bcom ldan skyabs 'os snying rje yis/ /brlan par gyur pas nye bar bstan pa
<p>138a.3</p>ba b+hA She/ /b+hU b+h+r-i ta ba nA pa ni ma nirbi ba rA di sarbaM te ne tad b+ha ye Shu sha ra NaM ki la kA ta rA NAM/ /bud+d+hiM bra bo d+ha ma ma d+hAm+ni ni d+hA ya bud+d+hiM d+harmaM sa saM g+ha ma pi ye sha ra NaM pra
<p>138a.4</p>kun gyi yul bka' stsal/ /ri dang nags dang sa dang rlung dang khungs la sogs/ /'di kun nges par sngar ma rnams kyi 'jigs la skyabs mi 'gyur/ /rab tu sad pa'i rang bzhin gnas la blo gros bskyed byas nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bcas la gang zhig skyabs
<p>138a.5</p>pan+nAH/ /te ShAM dza ga ta k+Sha ya b+ha ye Sh+wa pi nir+b+ha yA NAM nai bA n+ya taHsha ra na dai n+ya pa ri gro hosti/ /durbA re pa ra lo ka tI bra ti mi re d+harma pra br-id+d+hoM shu mAn dA naM duHsa ha pA paM tA pa bi pa dA ma
<p>138a.6</p>song ba/ /de dag 'gro ba 'jigs pas 'jig pa la yang 'jigs pa med/ /dman pa yongs 'dzin skyabs ni gzhan na yod pa nyid ma yin/ /'jig rten pha rol mi bzad mun pa zlog dkar chos ni rab rgyas tsha zer can/ /bzod dkar sdig pa'i gdung ba phongs pas mngon par
<p>138b</p>
<p>138b.1</p>b+h+yung+ga me ba ri daH/ /pradz+nyA mo ha ma hA pra pA ta bi Sha ma shwa b+h+re ka rA lam+ba na dai n+yA krAn+ta bi hI na me ba sha ra NaM sarba tra pu N+yaM nr-i NaM/ /i ti ti mi ra br-i tAk+ShaM tsak+Shu run+mI la nAr+ha da sha na
<p>138b.2</p>bskyed pa sbyin pa chu gter yin/ /mi bzad gti mug g.yang sa chen po'i gcong la shes rab lag pas 'chel ba ste/ /kun tu mi rnams kyis ni bsod nams kho na dman dang cho nge bral ba'i skyabs/ /de ltar rab rib kyis bsgribs mig can rnams kyi mig ni dbyer 'os shing / /tshems
<p>138b.3</p>ma Ni ma rI tsa bya dz+ya mA na pra kA shaM/ /sa b+ha pi su ga ta tsan+d+raHshud+d+ha d+harmo pa de shaM s+thi ra pa da mi ba kr-i twA kA na naM swa dza gA ma/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM
<p>138b.4</p>kyi nor bu'i 'od zer dag ni rab gsal ldan pas gsal byas nas/ /mdun sar bde gshegs zla bas dag pa'i chos ni nye bar bstan pa dag /brtan par gyur pa'i gnas bzhin mdzad nas rang gi nags su gshegs par gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang
<p>138b.5</p>bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM pra ti hA R+yAb dA naM nA ma tsa turda shaHpal+la wa// //dza ya ta ma hA tAM pra b+hA baHpash+tsa da gre tsa brta mA nA yAH/ /dza na ku sha la karma sha ra NiH
<p>138b.6</p>chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las cho 'phrul gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //rjes dang mdun dang mngon du gyur par yang / /skye bo'i dge ba'i las kyi lam dag ni/ /gsal bar byed pa bdag nyid chen po'i
<p>139a</p>
<p>139a.1</p>pra kA sha rat+na dI pa i baH/ /pu rA su ra pu re pAN+Du kam+ba l+yA khye shi lA ta lA/ /sa mI pi pa ri dzA ta s+ya ko bi dA ra s+ya su pra b+he/ /kr-i twA tri da sha saM g+hA nAM b+ha ga bAn d+harma de sha nAM/ /a nu
<p>139a.2</p>mthu/ /rin chen sgron ma lta bur rgyal gyur cig /sngon tshe lha yi grong khyer du/ /yongs 'du ko bi da ra'i drung / /la ba dkar po zhes bya ba/ /'od bzang rdo leb steng du ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs gsum pa'i/ /tshogs la chos ni bstan mdzad nas/ /mi rnams
<p>139a.3</p>gra hA ya mar+t+yA nAM dzaM bU dwI pa ma bA ta ra ta/ /a ma rai ra nu pA ta s+yA ta s+ya ba ta ra to b+hu baM/ /bi mA na kA na nAkAr+NiM ba b+hU ba b+hU ba nAM ga NaH/ /ta s+ya daM taM shu saM tA nai ru pa de sha mi bA tsi taM/ /
<p>139a.4</p>rjes su gzung ba'i slad/ /dzam+bu'i gling du babs par gyur/ /sa la babs par gyur pa de'i/ /rjes su 'chi med rnams 'brangs pas/ /gzhal yas khang gi tshogs kyis ni/ /sa gzhi mnyam pa khengs par gyur/ /zla ba'i 'od ldan rnga yab ni/ /de yi tshems kyi 'od rgyun gyis/ /
<p>139a.5</p>dza grA ha tsan+d+ra ru tsi raM tsa ma raM tsa tu rA na naH/ /ts+tsha traM sha ta sha lA kaM ka ma naM ke naM ka pA Nu raM/ /pra sA da mi ba sA kA ra mA da de s+ya pu raM da raH/ /shaM ka sh+ya na ga ro pAn+ta kA na no dum+ba
<p>139a.6</p>rgyas pa'i nye bar bstan pa bzhin/ /gdong bzhi pa yis blangs par gyur/ /thur ma brgya yis mtshan pa'i gdugs/ /mtshan med ri dwags mtshan ltar dkar/ /de yi bka' drin rnam bcas bzhin/ /brgya byin gyis ni blangs par gyur/ /grong khyer shang kA sh+ya yi 'gram/ /u dum bA ra'i
<p>139b</p>
<p>139b.1</p>rAM ti ke/ /a ba tIr+NaM su kr-i tri naHsA nan+dA staM ba ban+di ri/ /tasmin+nut+pa la par+NA khya b+hik+Shu kI dza na saM ga me/ /a lab+d+hA ba sa rA ti Sh+TuM nr-i pa rU pa mu pa da de/ /pra dIp+ta rat+na mu ku TaM gaN+Da
<p>139b.2</p>nags drung du/ /babs pa de la legs byas ldan/ /kun dga' bcas pas phyag 'tshal gyur/ /skye bo'i tshogs der dge slong ma/ /ut+pal mdog ma zhes pa yis/ /blta ba'i gnas skabs ma thob nas/ /mi bdag gzugs ni nye bar blangs/ /rin chen cod pan rab gsal zhing /
<p>139b.3</p>tAN+Da bi kuN+Da laM/ /tr-iSh+T+wai bA s+ya na baM rU paM dza hA soSh+NI Sha pal+la ba/ /sA tsin+ta yan+tI bA yaM dza nairni rbi ba raHsu raH/ /an+ta raM nr-i pa rU paM me tr-iSh+T+wa dA s+ya ti sA da ra/ /
<p>139b.4</p>rna rgyan 'gram par rab mdzes pa/ /de yi gzugs gsar mthong gyur nas/ /gtsug tor yal 'dab dgod pa bzhin/ /de yis bsam pa shin tu yang / /skye bo'i mdun 'di bar mtshams med/ /bdag gi rgyal po'i gzugs mthong nas/ /gus bcas skabs ni ster bar 'gyur/ /
<p>139b.5</p>a to n+ya thA tu b+ha ga bta pra Na tirma ma durla b+haH/ /na gu NAM gau ra ba s+thA na mI shaR+Ya pra Na yI dza naH/ /a ho tr-i Na tu la lo lairniHpA ra bi ra sed d+ha naiH/ /hr-i ya te bA sa nA b+h+yA sAta nirbi tsA ra ta
<p>139b.6</p>'di las gzhan yang bcom ldan la/ /phyag 'tshal bdag gis rnyed par dka'/ /dbang phyug la dga' skye bo yis/ /yon tan zhes pa'i gnas ma yin/ /kye ma rtswa mtshungs g.yo ba'i nor/ /ro bral snying po med pa yis/ /bag chags goms par gyur pa las/ /ma dpyad nyid
<p>140a</p>
<p>140a.1</p>yA dza naH/ /dat+tAn+ta rA saM sa hA sa dza ne na nr-i ba gaur bAta/ /lo lA hA raM b+ha ba te pra NA ma ma ka rota pu raH/ /asmin+na ba sa ra b+hik+Shu ru dA yI nA ma saM pa di/ /tAM bi lo kya ta
<p>140a.2</p>kyis skye bo 'phrog /'phral la skye bo'i mi bdag la/ /zhe sar byas nas skabs byin des/ /do shal g.yo bas bcom ldan la/ /mdun du phyag kyang byas par gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni mdun sa ru/ /'char ka zhes pa'i dge slong gis/ /de lta'i gzugs de
<p>140a.3</p>thA rU pA ma ba da ta sa smi tA na naH/ /i ma mut+pa la bar+NA khyA b+hik+Shu kI nr-i pa rU pi NI/ /r-id+d+h+yA b+ha ga ba taHpA do ban+da te dza na ban+di tA/ /ut+pa lA mo da bar+NA b+hAM bi dz+nyA te yaM ma yA pu raH/ /i
<p>140a.4</p>mthong gyur nas/ /bzhin ni 'dzum pa dang bcas smras/ /mi bdag gzugs can dge slong ma/ /ut+pal mdog ma skye bo yis/ /phyag byas ma 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /bcom ldan zhabs la phyag 'tshal byed/ /ut+pal dri dang mdog dag gis/ /bdag gis 'di ni mdun du shes/ /de skad
<p>140a.5</p>t+yuk+t+wa bi ra te ta smin b+ha ga bA na pya b+hA Sha ta/ /a yuk+ta me ba b+hik+Shu kyA dar+b+yA dr-id+d+hi pra kA sha naM/ /ka ro ti pra sha maglA ni ma b+hi mA ne na tsu dzu raH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA b+ha ga bAn kr-i twA tAM tAM ku sha la de sha naM/ /prisr-i
<p>140a.6</p>brjod nas 'dug pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang bka' stsal pa/ /dregs las rdzu 'phrul rab ston pa/ /dge slong ma yi rigs min nyid/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rims gsar gyis/ /rab tu zhi ba nad par byed/ /de skad brjod nas bcom ldan gyis/ /dge ba de de bstan mdzad nas/ /lha rnams
<p>140b</p>
<p>140b.1</p>dz+ya dai bAn ya yau swa pa daM sa ha b+hik+Shu b+hiH/ /ta tro pa biSh+TaHsr-iSh+Ta staiHpra Na tair+b+hik+Shu kI ka thAM/ /prAb+dzan+ma karma sam+bad+d+h+waM sarba dz+nyA ma b+hA Sha ta/ /bA rA Na s+yA ma b+hu ta pU rbaM sAr+tha ba ho ma hA d+ha naH/
<p>140b.2</p>bzlog ste dge slong dang / /lhan cig rang gi gnas su gshegs/ /de ni nyer bzhugs de dag gis/ /rab tu dris shing kun mkhyen gyis/ /sngar skyes las kyis yang dag bsdams/ /dge slong ma de'i gtam gsungs pa/ /bA rA Na sIr sngon byung ba/ /ded dpon nor ni chen po yi/ /chung ma
<p>140b.3</p>sat+nI d+ha na ba tI nA ma ta s+ya prA Na sa ma b+ha bta/ /pA Ni pal+la bi nI ta n+wI yau ba nod+YA na many+dza rI/ /pha laM puSh+pa tI kA le sA ta smAta gar+b+ha ma dA de/ /a trAn+ta re dza la ni d+hi dwI pA nu ga ma nod+Ya taM/ /pra t+yA
<p>140b.4</p>nor ldan ma zhes pa/ /de yi srog dang mtshungs par gyur/ /gzugs bzang lag pa'i yal 'dab ldan/ /lang tsho skyed tshal snye ma dang / /'bras bu me tog ldan dus su/ /de yis de la mngal bzung gyur/ /skabs dar chu gter gling la ni/ /rjes su 'gro bar brtson pa yi/ /khyo la rab tu
<p>140b.5</p>san+na bi yo gArtI sA pal+la b+ha ma b+hA Sha ta/ /ki ya tI d+ha na sam+bat+ti br-i d+d+hi ma d+yA pi nI ya te/ /ya ta kr-i to g+ho ra gaM b+hI raM tIR+Ya te ma ka rA ka raH/ /ba hwa pA yaM d+ha nA dA naM ni ra pA yaM gu NA rdza naM/ /swa de shA ta pa ra lo
<p>140b.6</p>nye ba dag /'bral bas gzir ba de yis smras/ /ji snyed nor ni phun tshogs shing / /da lta yang ni 'phel ba thob/ /gang gi ched du 'jigs rung ba'i/ /chu srin 'byung gnas zab mo brgal/ /nor ni 'dzin pa gnod pa mang / /yon tan sgrub pa gnod pa med/ /nor ni don gnyer rang phul
<p>141a</p>
<p>141a.1</p>kaM hi gats+tsha dra bi NAr+thi naH/ /ke tsid+duHkhAn+ni bar+t+tan+ta dU raM ga twA pi ni s+pha lAH/ /nish+tsa la d+ha ni nash+tsa n+ye karma NA me ShA ni sh+tsa yaH/ /i ti pri yA ba tsaHshru twA sar+tha pa ta ra b+h+ya d+hA ta/ /
<p>141a.2</p>nas/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro/ /kha cig ring du song nas kyang / /sdug bsngal las ni 'bras med ldog /gzhan ni g.yo med nor dang ldan/ /'di yi nges pa las rnams so/ /de skad dga' ma'i tshig thos nas/ /don mthun bdag pos de la smras/ /
<p>141a.3</p>mug+d+he saM b+hA ba nA pA traM b+ha ba t+ye baM d+ha nod+Ya taH/ /d+ha nArdza naM bi hA nA nAM saM gu bta mU la b+hak+Sha NA ta/ /a d+ya shA naHsu khas+thA nAM b+hau gaiHsa ha pa ri k+Sha yaH/ /swa gr-i he pi da ri drA NAM dza naHkra ka tsa niSh+Shu
<p>141a.4</p>mdzes ma nor dag bsgrubs pa ni/ /bsngags pa'i snod nyid kho na yin/ /bder gnas nor sgrub kyis dman rnams/ /rtsa ba zos pa'i 'phye bo bzhin/ /de ring sang la longs spyod dang / /lhan cig yongs su zad par gyur/ /rang khyim du yang dbul rnams la/ /skye bo sog le
<p>141a.5</p>raH/ /d+ha ni nAM pa ra lo ko pi pre ma snig+d+ha dza nAM b+hu baH/ /k+ShI Na ma s+yut+Ya taM br-id+d+h+yai na be nuM ban+d+ha te dza naH/ /na tu sa pUr+N+Na ma s+yan+te pra t+yA san+na pa ri k+Sha yaM/ /mUr+kho pi bi du ShAM baM d+yaHs+t+rI NAM br-id+d+ho pi ba
<p>141a.6</p>bzhin du rtsub/ /'jig rten gzhan du'ang nor ldan ni/ /skye bo rnams kyi mdza' sdug sa/ /'phel bar rtsom slad zla tshes ni/ /phra mo la yang skye bo 'dud/ /mthar ni yongs 'dzad rab nye bas/ /yongs su rdzogs pa la yang min/ /skye bo mngon par dar la nye/ /rmongs pa'ang mkhas
<p>141b</p>
<p>141b.1</p>lU b+haH/ /klI bo pi pe byaHshU rA NAM mA san+no b+h+yu da yo dza naH/ /ke na n+ya ka ra NaM b+huk+t+wA pI twA kA byA mr-i trA ni bAta/ /k+Sha NaM bi tsak+Sha Ne nA pi k+Shut+pi pA se bi brdzi te/ /ya s+yAr+thaHsa gu Non+na taiHkr-i ta nu
<p>141b.2</p>pas phyag byar yod/ /rgan yang mo yi yid du 'ong / /ma ning yin yang dpa' bstan 'os/ /mkhas kyang bkres dang skom pa la/ /sgra yi bstan bcos zos pa'am/ /snyan ngag bdud rtsi 'thungs pas ni/ /skad cig su yis rnam par rgyal/ /gang la nor yod de ni yon tan gyis mtho
<p>141b.3</p>tiHkam+ba na d+hat+te gu NaM dA ri d+yA da ya do Shi du Shi ta ru tsAM ni rmA l+ya tu l+yA gu NAH/ /bit+te nai ba gu NA gu NiM na ru d+ha naM d+ha n+yo d+ha nI no gu NIM kA yA duHkr-i ta san+ni pA ta sha ma
<p>141b.4</p>bstod byas yon tan dag kyang cis mi 'dzin/ /dbul las nyams pa'i skyon gyis gzi byin sun phyung yon tan me tog snying mtshungs nor gyis ni/ /yon tan nyid de yon tan la ni nor min nor ldan bsngags 'os yon tan ldan pa min/ /slong ba'i ngan byas tshogs rnams zhi ba
<p>141b.5</p>nA dA yurgu NA nAM d+ha naM/ /i ti prA NA d+hi kAr+tha s+ya pa t+yu rA kar+N+ya sA ba tsaH/ /sAM dza nA shru ka Not+kIr+NA la te ba b+hu ta ShaT+pa dA/ /a tha pra ba ha naM b+he dze sAr+tha nA thasta yA pa ha/ /
<p>141b.6</p>dag las nor ni yon tan rnams kyi tshe srog yin/ /de skad srog las nor lhag pa/ /de yis bdag po'i tshig thos nas/ /'khri shing rkang drug pas brgyan bzhin/ /mig dman dang bcas mchi thigs rgyas/ /de nas de dang lhan cig tu/ /don mthun mgon gyi gru gzings bsten/ /
<p>142a</p>
<p>142a.1</p>tI bra dr-iSh+TA gr-i hI tA naM hasta pA traM ma ho da d+hiH/ /ta s+ya dzA yA sa kha s+yA sau kar+m+mA bA tA nu bar+t+tI naH/ /a b+ha dz+ya ta pra ba ha NaM sa ma no ra tha dzI bi taM/ /ta taHpha la kA bAs+t+ya b+ha ga she ShAts+tsa
<p>142a.2</p>sred pa drag po 'dzin rnams kyis/ /chu gter chen po lag pa'i snod/ /las kyi rlung gi rjes zhugs pa/ /chung ma'i grogs ldan de yi gzings/ /yid la re ba srog dang bcas/ /chu gter du ni zhig par gyur/ /de nas las kyi longs spyod kyi/ /lhag mas shing
<p>142a.3</p>kar+m+ma NaH/ /ka she ru dwI pi mA sA d+ya tat+pat+nI na bya ba d+yata/ /a nA thAM ta tra sho tsan+tiM bi haM gaHpu ru ShA kr-i tiH/ /tA mA pa pA da dIr+Na shaM su par+Na ku la saM b+ha baH/ /sa kAn+taM su mu kho nA ma tA mu ba tsa ru
<p>142a.4</p>dum bzung gyur pas/ /ka se ru yi gling phyin nas/ /de yi chung ma shi ma gyur/ /der ni bsam pa nyams gyur cing / /mgon med mya ngan byed de dang / /'dab bzang rigs las skyes pa'i bya/ /skyes bu'i dbyibs can phrad par gyur/ /mdzes pas phrogs pa bzhin bzang ming / /de
<p>142a.5</p>tsA kr-i taH/ /sa mA shwa si hi lo lA k+Shi nir+b+ha yo yaM ta pA shra yaH/ /de bye yaM su b+ha gA b+hU mi ba yaM twata pra Na yai Shi NaH/ /pu nardzA tA si ka l+yA Ni g+ho ro yaM ma ka rA ka raH/ /i t+yuk+t+wa te na sha na
<p>142a.6</p>yis mdzes ma de la smras/ /mig ni g.yo ma yid brtan mdzod/ /gnas 'dir khyod la 'jigs pa med/ /'di ni skal bzang mchog gi sa/ /bdag ni khyod kyi 'dod pa 'tshol/ /chu srin 'byung gnas 'di 'jigs rung / /dge ma khyod ni yang skyes so/ /de yis 'di brjod dal bu
<p>142b</p>
<p>142b.1</p>kairnI tA rat+na la yaM gr-i haM/ /saM pUr+Na gar+b+hA ta na yaM tsA ru rU pa ma pU ta sA/ /bar+d+ha mA na shi sho tasmin sA sha naiHsri ya bA di nA/ /mug+d+ha te na bi dag+d+he na saM b+ho gA b+hi mu khI kr-i tA/ /sa ra la twan+m+r-i du
<p>142b.2</p>yis/ /rin chen rang bzhin khang par phyin/ /mngal ni yongs su rdzogs de la/ /gzugs mdzes bu dag btsas par gyur/ /byis pa de ni cher skyes tshe/ /rim gyis snyan par smra byed pa/ /mkhas pa de yis mdzes ma de/ /longs spyod dag la mngon phyogs byas/ /drang nyid phyir dang
<p>142b.3</p>twAts+tsa sa mI pa pra Na yI dza naH/ /swa ya mA lik+Sh+ya te s+t+rI b+hiR+Ya tA b+hi ra ba pA da paH/ /di byod+YA ne Shu sA te na ra ma mA NA g+ha na sta nI/ /ku mA ra ru tsi rA kA raM su Shube sa tr-i shaM pi tuH/ /tasmin pad+ma
<p>142b.4</p>'jam nyid phyir/ /mdza' gcugs nye ba'i skye bo la/ /bud med rang nyid 'khyud gyur de/ /rkang 'thung dag la 'khri shing bzhin/ /de yis mchog gi skyed tshal du/ /nu rgyas de la rol pa las/ /gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rnam pa can/ /pha dang mtshungs pa btsas par gyur/ /pad+ma'i bzhin
<p>142b.5</p>mu khA b+hi khye yau ba nA laM kr-i tA kr-i tau/ /su mu khaHpak+Shi NAM rA dzA kA le lo kot+ta raM ya yau/ /ta taHpad+ma mu khaHshrI mA nA sa sA da pa daM pi tuH/ /gu Ni nA ma bi bA de na swa d+hi nAHku la sam+pa daH/ /prAp+tai
<p>142b.6</p>zhes bya ba de/ /lang tshe'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /dus su 'dab chags rgyal po ni/ /bzhin bzang 'jig rten gzhan du song / /de rjes dpal ldan pad+ma'i bzhin/ /pha yi gnas ni thob gyur te/ /yon tan can la rtsod med du/ /rigs kyi phun tshogs rang dbang 'gyur/ /kun
<p>143a</p>
<p>143a.1</p>shwaR+yaM ta ma ba data bi dza ne dza na nI su taM/ /tat+p+ra b+hA ba s+ya saM b+hA bya sarba tra pra b+ha biSh+Nu taM/ /pu tra prAp+tA n+wa ya la k+Sh+mI ri yaM ni dza ku lo tsi tA/ /a yaM tu sAr+tha bA hAn+me dzA taHpu tro ni raM sha kaH/ /
<p>143a.2</p>tu de yi mthu dag ni/ /gtso bo'i nus ldan nyid shes nas/ /dbang phyug thob pa'i bu de la/ /skye bo med par ma yis smras/ /bu gcig rang rigs la 'os pa'i/ /dpal 'byor 'di ni khyod kyis thob/ /ded dpon las skyes bdag gi bu/ /'di la skal pa yod ma yin/ /
<p>143a.3</p>bA rA Na s+yA ma yaM rA dzA swa shak+t+yA kr-i ya tAM twa yA/ /prI ti saM bA da sA swA daHswa de she swe ba sam pa daH/ /i ti mA turgi rA pak+Shi pak+Sha pA te na b+hu ya sA/ /skan+d+he b+h+rA ta ra mA ro s+ya byom+nA bA rA Na sIM ya yau/ /ta tra siM hA
<p>143a.4</p>bA rA Na sIr rang stobs kyis/ /khyod kyi 'di ni rgyal por gyis/ /rang yul nyid du phun tshogs pa/ /dga' ba nyams myong ro dang bcas/ /de skad ma yi tshig gis byas/ /gshog rlabs shin tu che ba yis/ /spun zla phrag pa la khyer nas/ /mkha' las bA rA Na sIr song / /de nas sa bdag
<p>143a.5</p>sA nA sI naM bra h+ma dat+taM ma hI pa tiM/ /sa dza g+hA nai kA dai na badzro gra na kha raiHkha raiH/ /a b+hi Shi ts+yA gra dzaM pUr+NaM tasmin+ne ba nr-i pA sa ne/ /A mA t+yA na pau ba data b+hi tAn sa ma grA na gra bi kra maH/ /ya s+ya
<p>143a.6</p>tshangs pas byin/ /seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa dag /drag rno rdo rje'i sder mo rnams/ /de yis lan gcig bsnun nas bsad/ /rgyal po'i stan ni de nyid la/ /phu bo rdzogs par dbang bskur nas/ /blon po 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /rtsal mchog ldan pa des smras pa/ /bdag
<p>143b</p>
<p>143b.1</p>rA dz+nyo b+hi Shik+ta s+ya ma yA yaHpra tsa li ka raH/ /so pya tI ta pra b+ho b+ha k+t+ya ta me bA nu ga mi Sh+ya ti/ /i t+yuk+t+wA pra ba rA mA t+yA na swi ri bi haM gaM pung+ga baH/ /ya yau b+h+rA ta ra mA man+t+r+ya pu narde sha na saM bi dA/ /sa e
<p>143b.2</p>gis rgyal por dbang bskur 'di/ /gang gis rab tu skyod byed na/ /de yang rje la gus pa yis/ /'das pa de rjes 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rab mchog blon la dal bu yis/ /'di smras bya yi gang zag ni/ /spun la phyis kyang phrad pa yi/ /'gro ba zhugs nas song bar gyur/ /tshangs
<p>143b.3</p>ba bra h+ma dat+to ya mi ti man+t+ri Na man+tI NaM/ /sa nri paHkhyA ti mA ye de swa dza ne Shu pa re Shu tsa/ /a trAn+ta re sa mA nI tA gar+b+hA hasti nI ba nA ta/ /na mu mo tsAr+d+ha niR+Ya taM gar+b+ha rud+d+ha mi bAn+ta re/ /sA d+h+wi
<p>143b.4</p>byin de nyid 'di'o zhes/ /blon po rnams kyis bgros pa las/ /rang gi skye bo gzhan la yang / /mi bdag de ni grags pa thob/ /skabs der nags nas blangs pa yi/ /mngal dang bcas pa'i glang mo zhig /mngal ni nang nas bkag pa bzhin/ /phyed ni phyir byung grol ma gyur/ /bud med
<p>143b.5</p>ka rA gra saM spaR+sha de yaM gar+b+he bi muny+tsa ti/ /i ti mU hUrtaM kA diSh+TaM rAdz+nye man+t+ri n+ya be da yata/ /shA sA nA da tha b+hU b+hartuHspr-iSh+T+wa haste na hasti nIM/ /an+taHpu rAM ga nAsh+tsa krusta tra sa t+yo pa yA tsa naM/ /tA sA
<p>143b.6</p>dag pa'i lag rtse yis/ /reg pas mngal ni grol bar gyur/ /ces pa rtsis pas bstan pa ni/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal la smras/ /de nas sa yi bdag po'i bkas/ /pho brang 'khor gyi bud med kyis/ /lag pas glang mo la reg nas/ /der ni bden pa'i byin brlabs byas/ /gang tshe
<p>144a</p>
<p>144a.1</p>sa t+ya gi rA gar+b+ha nA b+h+ya dzata ka ri NI ya dA/ /ta dA bi lak+Sh+yaHsarbo b+hU ta b+hU yA mAn+taHpu re dza naH/ /a tha gA+o pAM ga nA b+h+ye t+ya shI la sa t+yo pa yA tsaM naM/ /kr-i twA ba spaR+sha ka ri NIM ye nA sau gar+b+ha ma b+h+ya dza ta/ /
<p>144a.2</p>de dag bden tshig gis/ /glang mo'i mngal ni ma grol ba/ /de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gi/ /skye bo thams cad skyengs par gyur/ /de nas ba glang rdzi mo zhig /mngon phyogs ngang tshul bden pa'i tshig /smras nas glang mo la reg pa/ /gang gis mngal 'di grol bar gyur/ /
<p>144a.3</p>ra dzA pi ni dza dzA yA nAM dz+nyA twA shI la da ri dra tAM/ /me ne go pAM man+sa me ba hAM dza gat+ti ta yi pi tAM/ /sa sa tI dzA ti lo b+he na so sum+b+hA nA ma tata su taM/ /pa ri NI yA nI nA yA gre te bI shap+da s+ya pA dra tAM/ /ta s+yaH
<p>144a.4</p>rgyal po'ang rang gi btsun mo rnams/ /tshul khrims kyis dbul nyid shes nas/ /ba glang rdzi mo de nyid ni/ /'gro ba gsum na dag par sems/ /dag pa'i rigs la chags pa des/ /de yi bu mo so sum bA/ /zhes pa mdun du yongs blangs pa/ /lha mo'i sgra yi snod nyid gyur/ /bud med
<p>144a.5</p>saM rtsi t+ya la ba N+yaM tsa pa latwaM tsa yo Shi tAM/ /sa sarba gA mi nIM ni drA ma pi ta t+yA dza shaM ki taH/ /asmin+na ba sa re duSh+TaM b+hA ta raM bi haM gA d+hi paH/ /ya yau b+ha dra mu khaHsne hA da ti sha yot+su kaH/ /b+hU
<p>144a.6</p>g.yo ba nyid dag dang / /de yi mdzes pa bsams pa las/ /dogs pa'i kun tu 'gro ba yis/ /gnyid kyang de yis btang bar gyur/ /bar skabs der ni spun zla la/ /mdza' las shin tu gcugs pa yi/ /bya yi bdag po pad+mo'i bzhin/ /de la blta ru 'ongs par gyur/ /sa
<p>144b</p>
<p>144b.1</p>pA lo pi ta ma liM gya srI t+yA bi hi ta sat+k+r-i tiH/ /bi dza ne swa ka thA masmai ni be d+ya pu na ra bra bIta/ /shi la sa t+ya tu lA ro hAta dr-iSh+Ta do She Na yo Shi tAM/ /ma mAn+taHpu ra bai mu khyAta bi bA ho b+hi na baHkr-i
<p>144b.2</p>bdag gis kyang de la 'khyud/ /dga' ba yis ni bkur sti bsgrubs/ /skye bo med sar de la ni/ /rang gtam bshad nas yang smras pa/ /ngang tshul bden pa'i srang gzhal bas/ /bud med rnams kyi skyon mthong nas/ /bdag ni btsun mo'i tshogs las phyir/ /phyogs te bag ma
<p>144b.3</p>taH/ /rU pa yau ba na gA mi n+yAM ta s+yA ma pi na me d+h+r-i tiH/ /e ka tra dr-iSh+Ta do ShA NAM sarba trA shaM ka te ma naH/ /tasmAt+ta ba pu re trAM tarnirmA nu Sh+ye ni b+hI ya traM/ /shI la saM kA pa ri t+yA dz+ya b+ha bA mi bi ga ta dz+wa
<p>144b.4</p>gzhan gsar blang / /gzugs dang lang tsho 'gro ldan ma/ /de la'ang bdag ni mi ston te/ /gcig la skyon ni mthong ba rnams/ /kun la yid ni dogs pa skye/ /de slad spun zla khyod kyis ni/ /grong khyer mi med dag tu bzung / /ngang tshul la ni dogs btang nas/ /bdag ni rims dang bral bar
<p>144b.5</p>raH/ /tasmAta pra ti ni shaM pak+ShI shA sa nAt+tA ba mad gr-i haM/ /prA pa yi Sh+yan+ti taM swai ta mi t+ya yaM me ma no ra thaH/ /i ti b+h+rA tur+pa tsaHshru twA ta mu bA tsa bi haM ga maH/ /iR+Sh+yaHshaM kA ka laM ke na rA dzan+mi th+yai ba mA kr-i
<p>144b.6</p>'gyur/ /de las de ni mtshan de bzhin/ /khyod kyi bka' las 'dab chags kyis/ /dal bus khyer nas bdag khyim du/ /'ong bar 'gyur ba 'di bdag 'dod/ /de skad phu bo'i tshig thos nas/ /mkha' la 'gro bas de la smras/ /dogs pa'i dri mas phrag dog ni/ /rgyal po rdzun pa nyid ma
<p>145a</p>
<p>145a.1</p>thAH/ /na nA ma ra ma ter mye nA swA daM bet+ti b+ho dza ne/ /na pa sh+ya ti na ni dra ti ni t+ya mIR+Sh+yA bi ShA tu raH/ /kli baHkA mI su khI bi dwAn d+ha nI na mraHpra b+hUHk+Sha mi/ /ar+thI mA n+yaHkha laHsnig+d+haHs+t+rI
<p>145a.2</p>byed/ /phrag dog dug gis rtag gzir ba/ /dga' bar bya ba des mi dga'/ /bza' ba rnams kyi ro mi rig /blta ba ma yin gnyid ma yin/ /ma ning 'dod ldan bde ldan mkhas/ /nor ldan dud pa rje bzod ldan/ /slong ba khengs pa mi bsrung des/ /
<p>145a.3</p>sa tI ti ka thai ba kA/ /sa ra la twa pi ku Ti lAHs+thA pi n+yo pya ti tsaM tsa laH/ /ku lI nA a pi pAr+sh+was+thA mA liM gaM t+ye ba lA la tAH/ /dr-iSh+Tirlo lA d+ha ro rA gi b+hUrbak+tA ka thi nista nau/ /dr-i sh+ya te nai
<p>145a.4</p>bud med dag ces gtam nyid ci/ /drang po la yang gya gyu can/ /gnas pa na yang shin tu g.yo/ /rigs ldan yin yang logs gnas pa'i/ /bud med 'khri shing 'khyud par byed/ /mig g.yo mchu ni chags dang bcas/ /smin ma 'khyog cing nu ma sra/ /bud med rnams
<p>145a.5</p>ba ni rdo ShaHs+t+rI NA ma ba ya be Sh+wa pi/ /b+hu dz+yaM te ku sha laiHsh+yA mA b+h+rA ma b+hA ma ra bi b+h+rA maiH/ /mU lA n+we ShI sa ro dza n+yAHpaM ke nai bo pa li pya te/ /ne kasmin bisma ya b+hu bAM pa smi tA nAM ni yan+t+ra
<p>145a.6</p>kyi cha shas la'ang / /skyon med mthong ba nyid yod min/ /mkhas pas g.yo ldan bung ba yi/ /rnam par rol bas bud med spyad/ /mtsho skyes rtsa ba btsal ba na/ /'dam gyis nye bar gos pa nyid/ /'dzum bcas ya mtshan dag gis ni/ /gtsang sbra ngang tshul dag
<p>145b</p>
<p>145b.1</p>d+he/ /shu tsi shI la bi rA ma NAM rA mA NAM ra ma Ne ma tiH/ /ta thA pi ya di nirban+d+haHkri ya tAM dA b+hIp+si taM/ /pra t+ya haM ma ta pu rot+YA ne ni rdza na sA ni d+hI ya tAM/ /i t+yuk+taHpak+Shi NA b+h+rA tA nr-i pa tirbi pa
<p>145b.2</p>dang bral/ /bud med rnams ni nges bsdams pa'i/ /dga' ba gcig la blo ma yin/ /de lta na yang gal te 'bad/ /gang zhig mngon par bzhed par mdzod/ /nyin re bdag grong skyed mos tshal/ /skye bo med sa de gzhag bya/ /spun zla 'dab chags kyis de smras/ /ka se ru ka'i
<p>145b.3</p>sardza tAM/ /kAM tAM ka she ru ka dwI pa taM tsa sat+k+r-i t+ya sA da raH/ /pA pi pra ti ni shaM b+h+yom+na kha gA rU D+hA sa mA ya yau/ /di bya gan+d+hA ma yI mA lA mA dA yA dwI pa saM b+ha bAM/ /pA ri dzA tA n+wa ya ta ros+t+rA ni puSh+pA N+ya bA pa
<p>145b.4</p>gling du ni/ /de dang mdzes ma mi bdag gis/ /gus bcas bsnyen bkur byas te btang / /de yang gling du skyes pa yi/ /dri mchog rang bzhin 'phreng ba blangs/ /bya la zhon nas mtshan re zhing / /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs par gyur/ /yongs 'du'i rjes 'gro ljon pa yi/ /me tog de dag de
<p>145b.5</p>sA/ /khyA tA ni ti mi rA NI b+h+ra mata b+h+r-iM gAn+d+ha ka rA taH/ /a tha bA rA Na sI bA sI kA dA tsin+mA na bA b+hi d+haH/ /pra ya yau sa mi d+ha hA rI dwi dzan+mA kA na naM yu bA/ /ta tra kin+na ra kA mi n+yA sa triSh+TaHspaSh+Ta man+ma
<p>145b.6</p>yis thob/ /bung ba g.yo ba'i mun gtibs pas/ /grags pa yi ni rab rib bzhin/ /de nas nam zhig mA na ba/ /zhes pa gnyis skyes gzhon nu ni/ /bA rA Na sIr gnas pa cig /nags nas yam shing len du song / /der ni mi'am ci mo yis/ /yid srubs gsal ba de
<p>146a</p>
<p>146a.1</p>thaH/ /ya s+ya saM daR+sha ne nai ba sA b+ha bta bi smr-i ta smr-i tIH/ /ta s+yai ba na bA b+hi lA Shi Na dza na ke ne ba sarbi tA/ /kAn+tA kAn+ti ma yI nA ma bi dza hA ra gu hA gr-i he/ /ta trA b+ha ra Na rat+naM shuH
<p>146a.2</p>mthong gyur/ /gang zhig mthong ba nyid kyis de/ /dran pa rnam par brjed par gyur/ /gsar du mngon par 'dod pa yis/ /phas bzhin de la de gtad nas/ /mdzes ldan zhes pa'i mdzes ma dang / /phug gi khang par rnam par rol/ /rin chen rgyan gyi 'od zer
<p>146a.3</p>pI ta ti mi rot+ka re/ /ra ma mA NA tsi ran+te na kA le pu tra ma bA pa pA/ /ba la bAn ma ru ta dza baHsa bA n+yo pi ya dA shi shuH/ /ta dA s+ya mA tA saM dz+nyA shI g+h+ra ga i t+ya sA d+ha b+hU ta/ /sA nirbig+h+nA saM b+ho ga su khA
<p>146a.4</p>gyis/ /rab rib tshogs ni des bsal te/ /de dang yun ring rtses pa las/ /dus su bu ni de yis thob/ /bu de byis pa nyid la yang / /gang tshe stobs ldan rlung ltar mgyogs/ /de tshe ma yis de yi ming / /myur 'gro zhes par bsgrubs par gyur/ /bgegs med longs spyod bde ba
<p>146a.5</p>tr-ip+tA gu hAn+ta re/ /pri yi d+h+r-i twA ba dA yA ti pi d+hA ya shi la yA gr-i haM/ /ka dA tsi da tha br-it+tA nAM ni dzi pi trA ni bi de taM/ /A kar+N+ya shI g+h+ra gash+tsin+ta bismA yA ku li to ba da ta/ /
<p>146a.6</p>yis/ /ngoms med de yang phug gzhan du/ /mdza' bo bzhag nas rdo ba yis/ /phug ni bsgribs shing rtag tu 'gro/ /de nas nam zhig pha yis ni/ /rang gi spyod pa'i mtha' rnams bshad/ /myur 'gro yis thos bsam pa ni/ /ya mtshan dag gis rgyas pas smras/ /
<p>146b</p>
<p>146b.1</p>shi lA ni bad+d+hA dwA re smin+na tha ka s+ye ma gr-i hAn+ta re/ /a hosne ho pye yi tA ta ta ba ban+d+hA na tAM ga taH/ /e hi bA rA Na sI me ba gats+tshA bste ni dzA spa daM/ /bi su lA ma pya yaM me na shi lA mut+sA ra yA mya haM/ /swa de sha bi
<p>146b.2</p>khyim gzhan sgo ni rdo ba yis/ /long ba bzhin du bsdams pa 'dir/ /kye ma yab khyod mdzes pas kyang / /bcings pa 'di nyid dag tu gyur/ /tshur shog khyod kyi rang gi gnas/ /bA rA Na sI nyid du 'dong / /che yang 'bad pa med par ni/ /rdo ba bdag gis bsal bar byas/ /rang yul
<p>146b.3</p>ra ha kle shaM duHsa haM sa ha se ka thaM/ /tak+taM na shakya te kaish+tsi da di sho de ha i ba swa kaH/ /b+hA raM dra bi NaM saM b+hA raM bet+ti gran+thi gu Na gu NaM/ /b+ho ga ni ru pa yo gany+tsa swa de sha bi ra hI dza naH/ /
<p>146b.4</p>bral ba'i nyon mongs ni/ /bzod par dka' ba ji ltar bzod/ /rang gi lus bzhin yul dag ni/ /sus kyang gtang bar mi nus so/ /rang yul bral ba'i skye bo rnams/ /nor gyi tshogs ni khur bo dang / /longs spyod nye bar longs spyod min/ /yon tan thag pa'i mdud par rig /
<p>146b.5</p>i t+yuk+t+wa sa gu hA ge hA dut+pA d+ya bi pu lA shi lAM/ /kr-i tA b+h+yu ta ga me nA shu dza na ke na ya yau sa hA/ /pra yA ta yostUr+NaM sa ma b+he t+yA tha kin+na rI/ /shU n+yaM dr-iSh+T+wA gu ha ge haM nirbe dA di t+ya tsin+ta ya ta/ /
<p>146b.6</p>ces smras phug gi khang pa nas/ /rdo ba chen po des bsal nas/ /khas blangs pa yi pha dang ni/ /lhan cig mgyogs par song bar gyur/ /de dag myur du song de nas/ /mi 'am ci mo mngon par 'ongs/ /phug khyim stong pa mthong gyur nas/ /snying mi dga' ste 'di ltar bsams/ /
<p>147a</p>
<p>147a.1</p>a hon+ne bi smr-i ta sne haHsa ga taHkwa pi durdza naH/ /dwi dzi hwA nAM b+hU dzaM gA naM kau Ti l+yaM bA ki ma da b+hu taM/ /na ra man+te pa lA yan+te su kha rA gi NaH/ /tsi ras+thA a pi niHsne hAHshu ka i ba
<p>147a.2</p>kye ma bdag la gcugs pa brjed/ /skye bo ngan pa de gar song / /lce gnyis pa dang lag 'gro yis/ /gya gyu nyid la'ang rmad byung ci/ /bde la chags ldan mjug tu ni/ /dga' bar mi byed 'gros par byed/ /ring du gnas kyang mdza' gcugs med/ /
<p>147a.3</p>dwi dza ta yaH/ /i ti saM tsinyA sA pa t+yurni kA rA ta prI ti ma t+ya dzata/ /puSh+po sa mA ni sre mA Ni na sa han+te ka dar+tha nAM/ /bi d+yA gu Ne na kai nA sau pu tro mai b+hu bi dziM ba ti/ /a ti d+h+yA twA sa khI haste tasmai bI NAM
<p>147a.4</p>skye gnyis ldan pa ne tso bzhin/ /de ltar bsams nas de yis ni/ /gnod las khyo la dga' ba btang / /me tog lta bu mdza' ba yis/ /gnod pa bzod pa ma yin no/ /bdag gi bu ni rig byed dang / /yon tan gang gi sa la 'tsho/ /zhes bsams grogs mo'i lag tu ni/ /de
<p>147a.5</p>di de sha sA/ /saM b+ho ga su kha pa N+yai ba srI tiHpa tiShu yo Shi tAM/ /a paR+Yu Sha ta bAt+sa pyAHpu tra prI tistu nish+tsa lAH/ /dza be na gra dza tostur+Na ta yor+d+do rdza n+ya ladz+dza yA/ /shI g+h+ra gA ya da do bI NaM tat+sa
<p>147a.6</p>la de yi rgyud mang springs/ /longs spyod bde ba'i zong dag gis/ /bud med rnams ni khyo la dga'/ /mnyes gshin yongs su ma nyams pa/ /bu la dga' ba g.yo ba min/ /de dag tshul ngan ngo tsha nas/ /mgyogs pas myur du 'gro ba la/ /de yi grogs mo mgyogs 'gro
<p>147b</p>
<p>147b.1</p>khI be ga ga mi nI/ /A d+yA tan+t+ri ri yaM nA s+yAHspaSh+Ta byA big+h+na kA ra NI/ /i t+yA b+hA Sh+ya ta yA dat+tAM pI NAM prA pya dza gA ma sAH/ /ta taHswa de she dza na kaM swa gr-i he bi ni be sh+ya saH/ /bI NA pra pI NaHpa Tu sarba
<p>147b.2</p>mas/ /myur 'gro la ni rgyud mang byin/ /'di yi rgyud ni dang po 'dir/ /reg par mi bya gegs byed yin/ /de skad smras nas de byin pas/ /rgyud mang blangs nas de song gyur/ /de nas rang yul rang khyim du/ /de yi pha ni bzhag byas nas/ /rgyud mang bsgrengs pa mkhas pa
<p>147b.3</p>tra lA b+haM bU dza bAp+ta bAn/ /ta taHka dA tsid+bi ni dzA soM bu d+hi rwi pa gA mi nA/ /a ro pi taHpra ba ha NaM di bya bI NA nu ra gi NA/ /bI NA mUr+ts+tsha na yA ta s+ya shro tra pI yU Sha d+hA ra yA/ /k+Sha Ne k+Sha Ne sa
<p>147b.4</p>yis/ /kun tu rnyed dang mchod pa thob/ /de nas nam zhig tshong pa dag /chu gter gling du 'gro ba rnams/ /lha yi rgyud mang la chags pas/ /de ni gzings la skyon par gyur/ /de yis rgyud mang yid 'phrog pa/ /rna ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun dag gis/ /skad cig skad
<p>147b.5</p>mu dro pi nista rAM ga i ba b+ha bta/ /a thA d+ya ta trI saM spaR+sha dut+pan+no pa sla pot+p+la te/ /b+hag+ne pra ba ha Ne sarba ba ni dzA ma b+ha bat+k+Sha yaH/ /ta taHpha la ha kA bap+t+yA pa ba ni sre ri tAHk+Sha NA ta/ /
<p>147b.6</p>cig rgya mtsho yang / /rlabs ni med pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas dang po'i rgyud dag la/ /reg pas nyer 'tshe rab bskyed de/ /gzings ni rab tu 'bar zhing chag /tshong pa thams cad brlag par gyur/ /de nas las kyi lhag ma yis/ /myur 'gro yis ni shing du ma thob/ /
<p>148a</p>
<p>148a.1</p>ka she ru dwI pa mA be de kar+m+ma she She Na shI g+h+ra gaH/ /ta trAb+b+hi kU la saM lI naM di byod+YA naM pra bi sh+ya saH/ /sh+yA mAM da daR+sha so shuM bA mud+b+haMn+na sta ba kasta nA/ /grA th+na tIn+ti mi rA khyA nAM puSh+pA nA mudz+dz+wa la
<p>148a.2</p>rlung gis bskyod nas skad cig gis/ /ka se ru yi gling du phyin/ /der ni chu gter ngogs 'gram gyi/ /skyed tshal mchog tu rab zhugs des/ /nu ma me tog chun po dag /rab rgyas bud med so sum bA/ /me tog dri sar zhes bya ba'i/ /'phreng ba rab 'bar
<p>148a.3</p>shri yaM/ /ni ban+d+ha naM ta nu gu NeHkurbA NA ma pya tsi ta pAM/ /sA pi taM ru tsi rA kA raM dr-iSh+T+wA bisma ya mA ya yau/ /d+hI raM shai sha ba tA ru N+ya san+d+hi ma d+h+ya s+thA tA ga taM/ /mA ra mA ru ta saM
<p>148a.4</p>rgyud byed cing / /sems med rnams kyang lus kyi ni/ /yon tan gyis nges 'ching byed mthong / /des kyang mdzes pa'i rnam pa can/ /brtan pa byis pa lang tsho yis/ /mtshams kyi dbus gnas nyid gyur pa/ /de mthong ya mtshan dag tu gyur/ /'dod pa'i rlung gis rab
<p>148a.5</p>pA tsa sa kalpa ka ra pal+la bA/ /sA shIr+Na shI la ku su mA la te ba pra Na nA ma taM/ /sa ha sA tsi rA rU D+he ba prI tiHpro D+ha ta yo ra b+hu ta/ /prAg+dzan+masne ha paM lI naM na muny+tsa ti ma nam+ma naH/ /
<p>148a.6</p>bskyod pas/ /lag pa'i yal 'dab g.yo ldan zhing / /ngang tshul me tog lhung ba des/ /'khri shing bzhin du de rab btud/ /'phral la yun ring 'grogs pa bzhin/ /de dag mchog tu mdza' bar gyur/ /skye ba snga ma'i mdzar gcags pa/ /yid kyis yid ni mi mthong ngo / /
<p>148b</p>
<p>148b.1</p>ra ma mA Na di bA te na ni shA yAM tsa ma hI b+hu dzA/ /ma ne tsA ri ta ba ma twAta pri yaM gU D+ha kA mu kaM/ /te ne ba bA rA Na sI gan+tu dz+nyA tuM br-it+te nA sAr+thi tA/ /tan+na nA ya kha gA rU D+hA tang+gi rA mI li te k+Sha
<p>148b.2</p>nyin par de dang dga' byed cing / /mtshan mo yang ni sa bdag dang / /sbas pa'i 'dod ldan mdza' bor ni/ /g.yon ma'i spyod pa nyid la bsams/ /spyod tshul shes pa des de la/ /bA rA Na sIr 'gro don gnyer/ /de yi tshig gis mig btsugs nas/ /bya la zhon nas de yis
<p>148b.3</p>NaM/ /bA ri to pi byom+ni na ya pon+mA la ne ta yA/ /so b+ha bta sa ha sai bAn+d+ha tsa pa lAd+bi br-i te k+Sha NaH/ /sA ta man+taHpu rod+YA ne ni d+hA ya b+ha ya kA ta rA/ /bi be sha sho ka san+tap+tA shay+YA besh+ma ma hI pa
<p>148b.4</p>phyin/ /de yis zlog par gyur mod kyang / /mkha' la mig ni phye ba yis/ /chu gter g.yo ba'i bsgribs pa'i mig /de ni 'phral nyid long bar gyur/ /pho brang 'khor gyi skyed tshal du/ /de yis de bzhag 'jig pa yis/ /skrag cing mya ngan gyis gdungs pas/ /sa bdag gzims
<p>148b.5</p>teH/ /dU ya mA ne na ma na sA ra dza nI ma ti bA h+ya tAM/ /prA tarna gan+tuM na s+thA tuM tsin+hA krAn+tA sha sha ka sA/ /a trAn+ta re sa mud+b+hU ta tsU ta sau ra b+ha nir+b+ha raH/ /ma d+hu mA bau bi lA sA nAM yau
<p>148b.6</p>pa'i khang par zhugs/ /yid ni shin tu gdung pa yis/ /mtshan mo de ni 'das byas nas/ /tho rangs bsam pas zil non des/ /'gro dang sdod par nus ma gyur/ /skabs der tsU ta dri bzang gi/ /tshogs ni yang dag rgyas gyur cing / /me tog gzhu can rtse dga' yi/ /
<p>149a</p>
<p>149a.1</p>ba naM puSh+pa d+ha nA naH/ /ko ki lA li ku ku leHkA laHkA laHkA lo bi yo gi nAM/ /kIr+Na sho ka na bA sho ka duHsa haHpra t+ya dr-i sh+ya te/ /rA dza pya bi ra taut+pu kyA dud+YAnaM gan+tu mung+Ya taH/ /
<p>149a.2</p>lang tsho dpyid kyi zla ba ni/ /khu byug zung bas gnag gyur cing / /dus kyi bral ba rnams kyi dus/ /bzod dka' mya ngan 'grems byed pa/ /mya ngan med gsar rab tu mthong / /'dod pas rmongs pa'i rgyal pos kyang / /sred dang ma bral skyed mos tshal/ /
