<p>149a.3</p>di na me kaM na ta t+yA dzA sau shum+bAM kA ma mo hi taH/ /sa ta yA sa ha rA ga s+ya ma da s+ya ma da na s+ya tsa/ /saM sA ra mi ba bi shrA ti pa da puSh+pa ba naM ya yau/ /ta tra bA lA ni la lo la la tA bai lak+ShA ka ri
<p>149a.4</p>blta bar brtson pas nyi ma gcig /so sum bA ni btang ma gyur/ /de ni de dang lhan cig tu/ /chags dang rgyags dang 'dod pa yis/ /'khor ba bzhin du ngal gso'i gnas/ /me tog gi ni nags su seng / /der ni rlung gzhon gyis bskyod pa'i/ /'khri shing skyengs par
<p>149a.5</p>NA+e/ /pa sh+yan pra mo da mA pe de da yi tA me ba b+hU pa tiH/ /a n+ya rA ga bi ShA krAn+tA pA s+ya b+hUn+mA li na smr-i tiH/ /su kha ma pyasu khaM bet+ti tsin+dA sha l+yA ku lam+ma naH/ /an+targa ta b+hu dzaM ga b+hiH

<p>152b.1</p>bi d+h+yaM gi re ri ba/ /tA mut+pA ta ya tAM te ShAM kud+dA la b+hU dza radz+dzu b+hiH/ /mA so dza gA ma na twa s+yAHsa ha prAM she s+ya b+hU ta k+Sha tiH/ /a tha saM sA ra saM tA pa pra sha mA mr-i ta dI d+hi tiH/ /A ya yau b+ha ga bAn sar+b+ba mA na

<p>153a.1</p>yaM na prAdz+nyAHkarma kur+b+ba te/ /i t+yuk+t+wA tsa ra NAM guSh+Tha g+haT+Ti tAm+bA ma pA Ni nA/ /bi n+ya s+ya dak+Shi Ni pA Nau b+ha ga bA na bi pu la shi lAM/ /bi sr-i dz+yaM bra h+ma lo kan+ta ma paR+Yan+ta pa

<p>153a.3</p>pa rA kra maH/ /tsa kA rAsh+tsaR+ya tsaR+YA yA dU tI mi ba dza gat+t+ra ye/ /k+Shi p+tA yAM sa ha pA ta s+yAM te nA t+yad b+hU ta kA ri NA/ /ud b+hU ta ga ga nod b+hU ta i ba byAp+tA dza naHswa naH/ /a ni t+yAHsarba saM skA ra i t+ya b+h+rAn+ta bi d+hA yi naH/
<p>153a.4</p>rten mthar btang ste/ /'gro ba gsum du ngo mtshar gyi/ /spyod pa pho nya bzhin du mdzad/ /shin tu rmad byung mdzad pa des/ /de ni 'phangs pa'i 'phral nyid la/ /rlung ni rab tu langs pa bzhin/ /skye bo khyab pa'i sgra rab byung / /'du byed thams cad mi rtag nyid/ /'di ni 'khrul ba med par byed/ /
<p>153a.5</p>sarba d+harma ni rAt+ma naHshAn+tan+nirbA Na me ba pata/ /i ti s+phu To di te shab+de shi lA b+ha ga ba taHka re/ /gi rIn+d+ra shi Sha rA kA rA s+thi tA pu na ra draM sh+ya ta/ /k+Sha Ne na sA b+ha ga ba tA k+Ship+te ba da na mA rU taiH/ /kr-i ta bi
<p>153a.6</p>chos rnams thams cad bdag med dang / /zhi ba myang 'das kho na yod/ /de skad gsal ba'i sgra brjod de/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo ba ni/ /ri dbang rtse mo'i rnam pa can/ /slad nas kyang ni gnas par mthong / /skad cig gis de bcom ldan gyi/ /zhal gyi rlung gis gzhig byas te/ /mchog gi
<p>153b</p>
<p>153b.1</p>sA ri Ni dik+Shu ba ra mA Nu pa raM pa rA/ /pu na re kI kr-i tA me ba b+ha ga bA na pa ra mA Nu b+hiH/ /shi lA ma n+ya tra bi da d+he bisma yaM tsa dza gat+t+ra ye/ /Ash+tsaR+ya ni sh+tsa la dr-i shasta to mal+lA ba lo r+dz+dzi
<p>153b.2</p>ngo mtshar brgyud ma ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bkram pa byas/ /slad nas phra rab rdul rnams ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig nyid byas/ /gzhan du rdo dang 'gro gsum du/ /ma mtshan dag kyang bzhag par mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan brtson 'grus dang / /stobs ni rdzogs pas gyad
<p>153b.3</p>taM/ /bIR+ya b+ha ga ba to bIk+Sh+ya pra Na tAstaM ba b+hA Shi re/ /a ho ma hA b+hA bo yaM pa la bIR+yaM da yasta ba/ /nish+tsa yA d+hi ga me ya s+ya na pra gal+b+haHsu rA a pi/ /a nu gra ha pra br-it+te na pa le na gu ru NA
<p>153b.4</p>rnams dag /ngo mtshar mig ni mi g.yo bas/ /mthong nas phyag 'tshal der gsol pa/ /kye ma khyod kyi mthu chen po/ /stobs dang brtson 'grus rgyas pa 'di/ /gang zhig nges par rtogs pa yi/ /nus pa lha rnams la yang med/ /khyed kyi stobs dang bla ma ni/ /rjes su 'dzin la rab
<p>153b.5</p>ta ba/ /a d+ho ga ti ni mag+ne yaM dza na te bod+d+h+r-i tA shi lA/ /bIR+ya pra dz+nyA ba lA dI nAM pra mA NA ba d+hi ni sh+tsa yaM/ /a pi dzA nA ti te kash+tsi dAsh+tsiR+ya ta ra kA ri NaH/ /i ti bru bA NA nAsh+tsar+ya
<p>153b.6</p>zhugs pas/ /rdo ba bying zhing gting dag tu/ /song 'di skye bo bzhin du bton/ /ngo mtshar mchog mdzad khyod kyi ni/ /brtson 'grus shes rab stobs sogs kyi/ /tshad kyi mtshams ni nges pa dag /su zhig gis kyang cang shes sam/ /de skad smras zhing ngo mtshar

<p>154a.1</p>@#/ nIsh+tsa lA ba lo kya tAn/ /ta s+yAM shi lA yA mA sI naHpro bA tsa b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /ba laM ya te kI b+hU tA nAM b+hU tA naM b+ha ba na tra ya/ /su ga ta s+ya ta de ka s+ya lo ke nai ba saM gi kaM pa laM/ /aM b+haM pi kum+b+hai ram+b+ho
<p>154a.2</p>ni/ /g.yo med de rnams la gzigs nas/ /rdo ba de la rab bzhugs te/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /srid gsum 'byung po rnams kyi stobs/ /gcig nyid du ni gyur pa gang / /bde gshegs gcig gi stobs de dang / /'jig rten na ni mnyam pa min/ /chu gter chu ni bum pa
<p>154a.3</p>d+herdza gan+ti pa ra mA Nu b+hiH/ /shakyA n+ya laM ga Na yi tuM pra b+hA bo ra tu sau ga taH/ /saM khyAM su me roR+Yo bet+ti tu la mA ne na ta twa taH/ /su ga tA nAM na dzA nA ti so pi sad gu Na gau ra baM/ /ka tha yi twe ti b+ha ga bA na saM prAp+te su ra maN+Da le/ /
<p>154a.4</p>dang / /'gro rnams phra rab rdul dag gis/ /bgrang ba ru ni shin tu nub/ /bde gshegs mthu ni ma yin no/ /gang gi srang gi tshad kyis ni/ /lhun po'i de nyid grangs rig pa/ /des kyang bde gshegs yon tan ni/ /dam pa'i lci ba nyid mi rtogs/ /de skad gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das/ /brgya byin pad+ma'i gnas
<p>154a.5</p>sa shakra pad+ma ni la ye tsakre ku sha la de sha naM/ /mal+la sta du pa di she na tat+ta da bo d+hi sa ma shrA yAta/ /sa shrA ba kA khyAM pra t+ya ka samyak+saM bud+d+ha tAM ya yuH/ /shro taHprAp+ti pha laM kainy+tsi ta sa kr-i dA gA mi tsA pa raiH/ /a nA gA
<p>154a.6</p>dang bcas/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor 'ongs pa la/ /dge ba dag ni bstan pa mdzad/ /de yis de de nyer bstan pas/ /gyad rnams byang chub la brten nas/ /nyan thos zhes bya nyi tsher bcas/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid gyur/ /'ga' yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob/ /gzhan gyis lan gcig phyir 'ong yang / /phyir
<p>154b</p>
<p>154b.1</p>mi phaM laM tsA n+yaiHprAp+ta mar+ha ta pa daM pa raiH/ /i t+yA sha yA nu sha ya d+ha tu ga tiM ni rI k+Sh+ya dz+nyA twA ta thA pra kr-i ti ma pra ti mo pa de shaM/ /te ShAM tsa kA ra b+ha ga bIsh+tsa tu rAR+ya pa t+ya sa myak+p+ra kA sha bi sha daM ku
<p>154b.2</p>mi 'ong 'bras gzhan gyis te/ /gzhan gyis dgra bcom gnas thob gyur/ /de ltar bsam pa phra rgyas khams dang 'gro ba gzigs gyur cing / /mkhyen nas rang bzhin de ltar mtshungs pa med pa'i gdams ngag ni/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po yang dag rab gsal dri med pa/ /de dag rnams kyi dge ba spel
<p>154b.3</p>lo da yA ya/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA naM kalpa la tA yAM shi la ni k+She pA ba dA ni sho Da sha pal+la waH// //a saM ga mo nA ma bi shud+d+hi yA ma shre yAM
<p>154b.4</p>slad bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las brag nges par 'phangs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu drug pa'o// //chags pa med rnams nges par rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ /dge
<p>154b.5</p>si sU te ku sha lA b+hi kA maH/ /saM sA ra bA maHsu kr-i tA b+hi rA maHma no ma lairbai ra ra dzo bi rA maH/ /pu rA gaM gA ma nut+tIR+Ya nA gA nAM pha Na se tu nA/ /b+ha ga bAn su ga ta su prA pya b+hik+Shu na b+hA Sha
<p>154b.6</p>ba mngon 'dod 'khor ba'i g.yon dang legs byas la/ /mngon par dga' zhing yid kyi dri ma rnams dag gi/ /khon gyi rdul dang bral ba dge legs bskyed pa yin/ /sngon tshe klu rnams gdengs ka yis/ /zam pas gang+gA legs par bsgral/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs pha rol tu/ /byon nas dge slong rnams la
<p>155a</p>
<p>155a.1</p>ta/ /e ha rat+na ma ya pUrbaM yU po b+hU dad+b+hu tad+Yu tiH/ /daR+sha yA mi ta ma trai ba traSh+TuM baHkau tu kaM ya di/ /i t+yuk+t+wA b+ha ga bAn b+hU mo pA Ni nA di bya lak+Sh+ma NA/ /spr-iSh+T+wA nA ga ga Nota k+Ship+taM rat+na yU pa ma
<p>155a.2</p>gsungs/ /'dir sngon rin chen rang bzhin gyi/ /mchod sdong rmad byung mdzes pa byung / /gal te dge mtshan khyed blta na/ /'di nyid du de bdag gis bstan/ /zhes gsungs sa la bcom ldan gyi/ /mtshan mchog ldan pa'i phyag dag gis/ /reg pas klu yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /rin chen mchod
<p>155a.3</p>daR+sha yata/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA b+hik+Sha paHsarbe narni ni rni me k+Sha NAsh+tsi raM/ /ba b+hU push+tsi tra li khi ta i ba nish+tsa la ni gra haH/ /tat+ka thA ma thA taiHpr-iSh+TaHpro bA tsa b+ha ga bAn pu naH/ /a tI tA nA ga ta dz+nyA naM dan+tA lo kaiHki ran+ni pa/ /
<p>155a.4</p>sdong blangs nas bstan/ /dge slong thams cad de mthong nas/ /yun ring mig ni mi 'dzum zhing / /lus ni g.yo ba med pa dag /ri mor bris pa bzhin du gyur/ /de dag gis dris bcom ldan gyis/ /de gtam slar yang rab gsungs te/ /'das dang ma 'ongs mkhyen pa ni/ /tshems kyi snang bas 'grems pa bzhin/ /
<p>155a.5</p>de ba pu tra pu rA kash+tsi ta kA le swarga pa ri ts+yu taH/ /ma hA pra NA da nA mA b+hU ta nri pa tiHsha kra shA pa nAta/ /d+har+m+ma br-it+tA nu sa ra NA sma ra Na ya ma hI ta le/ /u tsi taM lak+Sha NaM kiny+tsi ta pa ya yA tse sha ta kra tuM/ /ta taHsu ra pa terbAkyAd+pi
<p>155a.6</p>sngon tshe lha yi bu 'ga' zhig /dus kyi mtho ris las yongs 'phos/ /brgya byin bka' las mi yi bdag /mang pos bkur ba zhes par gyur/ /sa yi gzhi la chos kyi ni/ /spyod pa rjes 'jug dran pa'i slad/ /de yis mchod sbyin brgya pa la/ /rig pa'i mtshan nyid cung zad blangs/ /de nas lha yi bdag po'i bkas/ /
<p>155b</p>
<p>155b.1</p>shwa kar+m+ma ta dA la ye/ /b+hA shwa raM bi da d+he rat+na yU paM pu N+ya mi bon+na taM/ /ta tastad+daR+sha na pak+te dza na kau tu ka nish+tsa le/ /kr-i Sh+ya di karma N+yats+tshan+na rA dz+nyAHko Sha k+Sha yo b+ha bta/ /ta taste na k+Shi ti b+hu dzA k+Ship+to yaM dzA
<p>155b.2</p>bi sho karmas de gnas su/ /'od ldan rin cen mchod sdong ni/ /bsod nams bzhin du mtho ba bsgrubs/ /de nas de ni blta la chags/ /skye bo dge mtshan g.yo ba med/ /rmos sogs las rnams rgyun chad pas/ /rgyal po'i bang mdzod zad par gyur/ /de nas sa bdag de yis de/ /gang gA yi ni chu la
<p>155b.3</p>h+na bI dza le/ /tiSh+Tha t+ya d+yA pi pA tA le rat+naiHsUR+Yai ri bA tsi taH/ /b+ha bi Sh+ya t+ya s+ya kA le na pa rits+tshin+naHpa ri k+Sha yaH/ /na tadz+dza ga ti nA mAsti pa ri NA me ya da k+Sha yaM/ /A gA mi sa ma ye puM sAM baR+ShA shI ti sa ha sra ke /shaM kha shu b+h+ra
<p>155b.4</p>'phangs/ /da lta yang ni sa 'og na/ /rin cen gyis brgyan nyi mas bzhin/ /dus kyis de ni yongs chad nas/ /yongs su 'jigs par 'gyur ba yin/ /yongs su gyur pas mi 'jig gang / /'gro na nges par de yod min/ /ma 'ongs dus na skye rgu lo/ /stong phrag brgyad cu pa yi tshe/ /rgyal po grags pa dung ltar
<p>155b.5</p>ya shAM shaM kho nA ma rA dzA b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /pu N+yA lap+d+ha mi yaM yU paM nr-i paHkalpa dru mo pa maH/ /sa pu ro hi ta pu trA ya mai tre yA ya pra dA s+ya ti/ /mai tre yo pya ya mA dA ya kr-i twA sa pa di khaN+Da shaH/ /ar+thotsin+tA ma Nirlo ka ma da ri
<p>155b.6</p>dkar/ /dung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi bdag dpag bsam shing rta des/ /mchod sdong bsod nams kyis 'thob 'di/ /mdun na 'don gyi bur gyur pa/ /byams pa la ni rab sbyin 'gyur/ /slong ba'i yid bzhin nor gyur pa/ /byams pa yis kyang 'di blangs nas/ /'phral la dum bur byas nas ni/ /'jig
<p>156a</p>
<p>156a.1</p>draM ka ri Sh+ya ti/ /yU paM da twA tha mai tre yaHsamyak+saM bud+d+ha tAM ga taH/ /a nut+ta ra dz+nyA na ni d+hir+b+ha bi Sh+ya ti su ra rtsi taH/ /shaM kho rA dzA sa ha srA NA ma shI t+yA pa ri taH/ /sAn+ta
<p>156a.2</p>rten dbul po med byed 'gyur/ /byams pas mchod sdong byin de nas/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid 'thob/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes gter/ /lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /btsun mo blon po'i tshogs dang bcas/ /stong phrag brgyad cu dag gis ni/ /yongs
<p>156a.3</p>pu ra mA t+ya ga No rA dzA bi pra bra dzi Sh+ya ti/ /prAg+dzan+ma pra Ni d+hA ne na shaM kha s+ya ku sha lo da yoH/ /kr-i ta s+yA pa sh+yA b+ho gya twAta pa ri NA me pha li Sh+ya te/ /ma d+h+ya de she pu rA rA dzA pA sa bo bA sa po pa maH/ /d+ha na sam+ma
<p>156a.4</p>su bskor nas dung zhes pa'i/ /rgyal po'ang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skye ba snga ma'i smon lam gyis/ /dung gis dge ba rgyas pa dag /byas pa nges par longs spyod slad/ /'bras bu yongs su smin par gyur/ /yul dbus su sngon rgyal po ni/ /nor lha'i bu lta nor lha'i bu/ /byang phyogs su yang
<p>156a.5</p>ta nA mA tsa nr-i po b+hU dut+ta rA pa the/ /ta yorbi b+ha ba saM g+haR+Sho b+hU da bai rAg+ni tap+ta yoH/ /a b+hUd+Yu d+ha pa mA raM b+ha saM b+hA ra ra b+ha mam+ma naH/ /na ga raM tsa pra pi sh+yA tha ba me t+ya d+ha na pam+ma taH/ /tsa kre ga dza ra thA nI
<p>156a.6</p>mi bdag ni/ /nor gyis bkur ba zhes pa byung / /'byor pa 'gran pa las 'khrugs pa/ /khon gyi mes gdungs de dag gi /yid ni g.yul dag rtsom pa la/ /lhag par rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /de nas nor gyis bkur ba 'ongs/ /grong khyer du yang rab tu zhugs/ /glang po shing rta'i tshogs
<p>156b</p>
<p>156b.1</p>kai gaM gA tI raM ni raM ta baM/ /ta tra rat+n+ra shi khI nA ma samyak+saM bud+d+ha tAM ga taH/ /dr-iSh+Taste nA r+ts+ya mA naM g+h+ri brah+ma shakrA di b+hiHsu raiH/ /so tsin+ta ba dat+to rA dzA bA sa baHpri thu pu N+ya bAn/ /bi Sha
<p>156b.2</p>rnams kyis/ /gang+gA'i 'gram ni bar med byas/ /der ni rin can gtsug ces pa/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas nyid thob/ /brgya byin tshangs sogs lha rnams kyis/ /zhabs la mchod ldan de yis mthong / /des bsams rgyal po nor lha'i bu/ /kye ma bsod nams chen por ldan/ /gang
<p>156b.3</p>yAn+te ba pa t+ye Sha ya s+ya tri da sha pan+di taH/ /ta tasta s+yA nu b+hA ba na ta tra b+hU pA la yo sta yoH/ /ya yau bai ra ra dza shAM t+yA mi tho mo ha pa ri k+Sha yaM/ /kr-i ta san+d+hiHpa re NA tha bA sa baHpri thi bI pa heH/ /b+ha ga ban+taM sa ma b+h+ye
<p>156b.4</p>la skabs gsum pas phyag byas/ /'di ni yul gyi khong na gnas/ /de nas de yi mthu yis ni/ /der ni sa skyong de dag gis/ /khon gyi rdul ni zhi ba yis/ /log par rmongs pa yongs zad gyur/ /de nas sa bdag nor lha'i bus/ /pha rol dang ni bsdums byas nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon
<p>156b.5</p>t+ya sar+b+ba b+ho gai ra pU dza ya ta/ /pra Ni d+hA naM tsa bi da d+ha pU dzan+te pra Na mya taM/ /a haM ku sha la mu le na s+yA me te na ma hA ni ti/ /asmi ne na pa sa re b+hA paM shaM kha shan+de sa mung+ga te/ /pro bA tsa taM rat+na shi khI
<p>156b.6</p>phyogs te/ /longs spyod kun gyis mchod pa byas/ /mchod pa'i mjug tu bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis/ /bdag ni chen por gyur cig ces/ /smon lam dag kyang byas par gyur/ /skabs 'dir shin tu che ba'i sgra/ /dung las yang dag 'khrungs pa'i tshe/ /phyag 'tshal mdun du gnas
<p>157a</p>
<p>157a.1</p>pra Na taM su ra ta s+thi ti/ /shaM kho nA ma ma hi pA lash+tsakra bar+t+ta b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /paR+Yan+te bo d+hi yuk+tash+tsa ku sha la sa ma bAs+s+ya bi/ /e baM sat+p+ra Ni d+hA na taHk+Shi ti pa tiHpu N+yo da yA dwA sa baHshaM kho
<p>157a.2</p>de la/ /rin cen gtsug gis bka' stsal pa/ /dung zhes bya ba'i sa skyong ni/ /'khor los sgyur bar spyod 'gyur te/ /mjug tu byang chub ldan pas kyang / /dge ba yang dag thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar dam pa'i smon lam bsod nams rgyas pa la ni sa bdag nor lha'i bu/ /mi yi
<p>157a.3</p>nA ma nr-i paHsa rat+na shi khi nA diSh+TaHshri yaM srAb+s+ya ti/ /mai tre yaHpra Na yAta ka ri Sh+ya ti ta thA bo d+hau bi shud+d+haM d+hi ye ka l+yA NA b+hi ni be sha pu N+ya sha ra Ne rA d+ya hi sat+saM ga maH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa
<p>157a.4</p>bdag po dung zhes bya bas blo gros thob 'gyur rin cen gtsug gis bstan/ /de bzhin byang chub tu ni rnam dag blo gros byams pas byams las mdzad par gyur/ /gang gi dam pa'i grogs ni dge la mngon 'jug bsod nams lam gyi dang po yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub
<p>157a.5</p>twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM mai tre ya bya ka ra NA pa da nAM nA ma sap+ta da shaHpal+la paH// //tsit+ta pra pA da pa la la pra Na ya dz+wa la s+yA swalpa s+ya da na ku su ma s+ya pha lAM sha ke na/ /he mA dri ro ha Na na gan+t+re su
<p>157a.6</p>sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las byams pa lung bstan pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu bdun pa'o// //sems ni rab tu dngas pa'i dri med mnyes gshin rab 'bar ba/ /shin tu chung ba'i sbyin pa'i me tog 'bras bu'i cha shas ni/ /ri dbang gser ri ro ha na dang bdud rtsi'i
<p>157b</p>
<p>157b.1</p>d+hAb+d+hi dA na sam+sat+pha laM na hi tu lA ka la na mu pai ti/ /pu rA ma no dz+nye sar+b+ba dz+nyaHsh+yu bas+t+yAM dze ta kA na ne/ /a nA tha paN+Di dA rA me bi dza hA ra ma hA ya shaH/ /AR+yo pa ma hA kA sh+ya pA khyastats+tshiSh+yaHka ru NA ni d+hiH/ /
<p>157b.2</p>gter sbyin pa'i/ /'bras bu phun tshogs dag dang mtshungs pa nyid du nyer mi 'gro/ /sngon ni kun mkhyen dgongs pa che/ /yid 'ong mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /mgon med zas sbyin dag gi ni/ /kun dga' ra bar bzhugs par 'gyur/ /de yi slob ma snying rje'i gter/ /'phags pa 'od srungs che zhes bya/ /
<p>157b.3</p>na ga ro pa ba na s+yan+taM dza na tsA ri kA yA ya yau/ /ta tra su durga ti yo Shi ta na ga rA shra ba lam+bi kA/ /a pa sh+yata kuSh+Tha ro gArdzA kA sh+ya pa ti ya dr-its+tsha yA/ /sA taM dr-iSh+Ta pra sA di n+yA shrad+d+ha yA sa ma tsin+ta yata/ /pA tre s+ya
<p>157b.4</p>grong khyer nye ba'i nags kyi mthar/ /ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs par gyur/ /der ni grong khyer mthar brten pa/ /shin tu ngan 'gro'i bud med dag /mdze yi nad kyis gzir ba yis/ /'od srungs de ni ci 'dod mthong / /de yis de mthong rab dang zhing / /dad pa dag gis yang dag bsams/ /'di snod bsod snyoms
<p>157b.5</p>piN+Da pA tAr+ha kiM na dzA nA smi pu N+ya taH/ /bi dz+nyA ya ta s+yaHsash+tsaR+ya shrad+d+ha yuk+taM m+ma no ra thaM/ /prasaR+Ya pa traM dza gra ha piN+Da taM kri pA ku laH/ /ti bra tsit+ta pra sA de na b+hak+ta sa ra ma marba Ne/ /duSh+Thi n+ya ni pa phA tA s+yaHpA tri shIr+N+Na ka
<p>157b.6</p>su 'os pa/ /bsod nams las ni cis ma skyes/ /de yi 'dod pa ngo mtshar can/ /dad pa dang ldan rnam mkhyen nas/ /snying rje rgyas pa'i lhung bzed dag /rab tu brkyangs nas bsod snyoms blangs/ /sems ni dang ba drag po yis/ /'bras chan rab mang phul ba'i tshe/ /mdze mo de yi lag pa yi/ /sor mo brul nas snod du
<p>158a</p>
<p>158a.1</p>raM gu liH/ /ta taHpa pA ta ka mi ba t+yak+t+wA ni t+ya ka Di ba ra~M`/ /de bA nAM tu Shi tA khyA nAM niye sa ma dzA ya te/ /shakra sta dad+b+hu taM dz+nyA twA dA na pu N+yo di di ta rA/ /yat+nata kA sh+ya pa sa t+pa tri ng+ha ya sa pU ra ya ta/ /
<p>158a.2</p>lhung / /de 'og de yis sdig pa bzhin/ /mi rtag lus dag dor nas ni/ /dga' ldan zhes bya lha rnams kyi/ /nang du yang dag skyes par gyur/ /rmad byung de shes brgya byin ni/ /sbyin pa'i dge la gus rgyas pas/ /'bad pa'i 'od srungs dam pa'i snod/ /bdud rtsi dag gis yongs su bkang / /
<p>158a.3</p>su d+har+b+ba Nai pya sau b+hik+Shu rni spri has+t+ri Na lI la yA/ /pra sha mA mr-i ta saM pUr+Na sh+tsakre pA tra ma d+ho mu khaM/ /b+ha dzan+te pra Na ya prI ti kri pa Ne Shu kri pa ku lAH/ /saM taHsam+pata sa mA d+h+mA ta ba da ne mI li tA da raH/ /shru twA tAM tu
<p>158a.4</p>dge slong rab zhi'i bdud rtsi yis/ /khengs des bdud rtsi byin la yang / /dga' med rtswa yi rtse mo yis/ /lhung bzed thur du kha bstan gyur/ /dam pa'i snying rje rgyas pa rnams/ /dman la mdza' gcugs dga' ba sten/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'bar ba yis/ /bzhin la gus pa dman par gyur/ /de ni dga'
<p>158a.5</p>Shi to de ba ni kA ya ni ra tAM nr-i paH/ /pra se na dzi ta b+ha ga ba tash+tsakre b+ho dz+yA d+hi bA sa nAM/ /rA dz+nyasta s+ya gr-i he dr-iSh+T+wA lak+Sh+mI mAsh+tsaR+ya ka ri NaH/ /AR+yA nan+den b+ha ga bAn pr-iSh+Tastata pu N+ya ma d+h+ya d+ha ta/ /pu ru gr-i ha pa teH
<p>158a.6</p>ldan lha tshogs na/ /gnas pa thos nas mi yi bdag /gsal rgyal gyis ni bcom ldan gyi/ /mchod ston lhag par gnas par byas/ /rgyal po de yi khang pa ni/ /dpal 'byor ngo mtshar byed mthong nas/ /'phags pa dga' bos bsod nams de/ /dris shing bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal/ /sngon ni khyim bdag
<p>158b</p>
<p>158b.1</p>sU nurdA rA+e drAd+dA sa tAM ga taH/ /k+She tra kar+m+ma Ni saM sak+taHk+Shu ta k+Shu maHklan+ti mA ya yau/ /sa dza n+yA mA nI tAM niHsne ha la ba NaM tsi rata/ /kal+mA Sha piN+Di mA sA d+ya b+hok+tuM sA da ra ma ya yau/ /d+hau na hasta k+Sha Ne tasmin
<p>158b.2</p>cig gi bu/ /dbul ba las ni 'bang nyid gyur/ /zhing las dag la yang dag chags/ /ltogs shing rid pas ngal bar gyur/ /yun ring zhig na ma yis ni/ /snum dang tsha med gzan chang zhig /khyer nas 'ongs pa des thob nas/ /gus dang bcas pas za ru song / /lag pa bkrus pa de yi tshe/ /ci
<p>158b.3</p>saM prap+tA ya ya dr-its+tsha yA/ /da dau pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha ya tAM pra san+ne na tse ta sA/ /dzA taHsa a ba kA le na b+hu pa lo yaM pra be na dzita/ /ta s+ya dA na ka Na s+ye yaM bi b+hu tiHpra tha maM pha laM/ /shru twai ti b+ha ga bad+bA kyaM b+hi k+Shurbasma ya ma ya yau/ /rA dzA
<p>158b.4</p>dgar yang dag 'ongs pa yi/ /rang sangs rgyas la de nyid ni/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis byin/ /de nyid dus kyis skyong ni/ /gsal rgyal 'di ru skyes par gyur/ /'byor ba 'di ni sbyin pa yi/ /thigs pa de yi dang po'i 'bras/ /de skad bcom ldan gsungs thos nas/ /dge slong dag ni ya mtshan gyur/ /rgyal
<p>158b.5</p>pi pi pu lAM bu dzAM bi da d+he b+ha ga ba taHpu raH/ /rA dzAr+he ra khi ler+b+ho geHkr-i twA b+hak+ti ni be da naM/ /sa ko t+ya tai laM kum+b+ha nAM dI pa mA lA ma kalpa ya taH/ /dI pa me kaM da dau ta tra swalpa kaM durga tAM ga nA/ /sne yak+Sha yAta pra ya te Shu
<p>158b.6</p>po nges kyang yangs pa yis/ /mchod pa bcom ldan mdun du byas/ /rgyal pos longs spyod ma lus pas/ /gus pas zhal zas phul byas nas/ /'bru mar bum pa bye ba yis/ /mar me yi ni 'phreng ba byas/ /der ni dbul mos mar me ni/ /shin tu chung bdag cig phul/ /thams cad snum ni rab zad nas/ /rab
<p>159a</p>
<p>159a.1</p>sar+b+be Shu Na dza gA ma yaH/ /tsen+ti stAM pra Ni d+hA ne na ta yA bi ma la tse ta pA/ /b+hA bi nI shAkya mu ni tAM sar+b+ba dz+nyo s+yAHsa ma b+h+ya d+hAta/ /rat+na dI pA ba li da twA rA dzA b+ha ga ba taHpu raH/ /u pa bi sh+ya pra Na myA gre Na pra
<p>159a.2</p>tu bzlas tshe gang ma song / /de yi sems ni dri med kyis/ /smon lam de yis rnam bsams pa/ /shAkya thub pa nyid du ni/ /'gyur bar kun mkhyen gyis bka' stsal/ /bcom ldan mdun du rgyal po yis/ /rin cen sgron me'i 'phreng phul nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni mdun bsdad de/ /
<p>159a.3</p>Na yAt+taM bya dzi dz+nya pa ta/ /b+ha ga bta pra Ni d+hA ne na tat+tat+pu N+yA nu b+hA ba taH/ /na ga s+yA nut+ta rA sa myak+saM bo d+hir+b+ha ga ba tar+pi tA/ /b+ha bta pra sA da pra Na ya prAp+ta mits+tsha mi tA ma haM/ /nirbi kalpa pha lA bas+t+yai se byan+te kalpa
<p>159a.4</p>gus pa yis ni der gsol pa/ /bsod nams de de'i mthu dag las/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi smon lam gyis/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /khyod kyis su la ster mi bgyid/ /khyod kyi bka' drin brtse ba las/ /de ni thob par bdag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par mi rtog 'bras thob slad/ /dpag bsam
<p>159a.5</p>pA dA paH/ /i ti rA dzA pa tsa shru twA b+ha ga bAn swa ya ma b+hA ShaT/ /durla b+hA nut+ta rA samyaka saM bo d+hiHpri thi bI pa twe/ /suk+Sh+mA mr-i NA la tan+tu p+h+yo gi ri b+h+yo pi ga ri ma pI/ /sa mu dre b+h+yo pi gaM b+hI rA sA su khe na na lab+h+ya te/ /na da
<p>159a.6</p>rkang 'thung bsten pa lags/ /de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub sa bdag rnyed par dka'/ /pad+ma'i skud pa bas kyang phra/ /ri bo las kyang shin tu brling / /rgya mtsho bas kyang zab pa ste/ /bde blag tu ni 'thob ma yin/ /bdag
<p>159b</p>
<p>159b.1</p>nairba hu b+hirlab+d+ha ma yai bA n+ye Shu dzan+ma su/ /tsit+ta pra sA da bi Sha daM dz+nyA naM tat+kA ra NaM dza guH/ /tsa tur+d+wi pa d+hi pa t+ye na ma yA man+d+hA tr-i dzan+ma ni/ /tsi raM dA na pha laM b+huk+taM bo d+hirnA pi ga tA tu pA/ /dA ne na tsakra brti shraHsA su daR+sha
<p>159b.2</p>gis skye ba gzhan rnams su/ /sbyin pa mang pos thob ma gyur/ /sems ni rab dang dri med kyi/ /ye shes de yi rgyu ru gsungs/ /nga las nu yi skye ba la/ /bdag gi gling bzhi'i bdag po yis/ /yun ring sbyin ba'i 'bras bu spyad/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /blta sdug skye bar sbyin pa yis/ /'khor los sgyur
<p>159b.3</p>dzan+ma ni/ /b+huk+ta ma yA ma ha tI bo d+hirnA pi gA tA tu pA/ /pu rA da twA ga dzA n+yoSh+Tau be lA ma dI dza dzan+ma ni/ /ma yA prAp+tam+ma hat+pu N+yaM bo d+hir+n+ra pi ga tA tu pA/ /ku rU pa ku sha lAt+mo haM rA dzA pu traHpu rA b+ha baM/ /yaHbi shA tso ya
<p>159b.4</p>ba'i dpal de ni/ /shin tu che ba bdag gis spyad/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /gnyis skyes skye ba be la mar/ /glang po brgyad ni sngon byin pas/ /bsod nams chen po bdag gis thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /gang zhig rang gi chung mas 'di/ /sha za zhes brjod rnam par spangs/ /dge ba'i bdag nyid rgyal
<p>159b.5</p>mi t+yuk+t+wa ni dza pat+n+ya bi pardzi taH/ /pauR+Yai shri d+hauSh+Ti b+hU t+yA ge prI tiR+Ya s+ya pa dAs+thI tA/ /sa duHkhI rU pa bai ka l+yA ta kwa ba sarba gu No da yaH/ /taM rU pa bi ra he de ha t+yA gA rU D+ha sha tsI pa teH/ /di bya tsU DA ma NiHda twa
<p>159b.6</p>po'i bu/ /gzugs ngan du ni sngon bdag gyur/ /dpal la dpal dang dpung par sa/ /gtong la dga' ba rtag gnas gang / /de ni gzugs dman sdug bsngal ldan/ /su zhig yon tan thams cad rgyas/ /gzugs bral lus ni gtong ba la/ /zhugs de bde sogs bdag po yis/ /lha yi gtsug gi nor byin nas/ /
<p>160a</p>
<p>160a.1</p>tsakri pany+tsa sha ro pa maM/ /ShaSh+ThiHsu ra sa ha sra Ni ta s+ya ya dz+nye Shu pa dz+wa laH/ /he ma yU pA b+hi rU pa Ni prA pur+m+me ru ba la shri yaM/ /tasmin+ma yA ti dA nAr+d+ra su kr-i te ku sha la dzan+ma ni/ /tA ni pu N+yA ni lAp+tA ni
<p>160a.2</p>mda' lnga pa dang mtshungs par byas/ /mchod sbyin byed de'i mchod sbyin la/ /grong khyer stong phrag drug cu ni/ /gser gyi mchod sdong ltar sngon gzugs/ /ri bo lhun po'i dpal thob gyur/ /dge ba'i skye ba de la ni/ /bdag gis mchog tu sbyin sogs byas/ /bsod nams de dag rnams kyang
<p>160a.3</p>bo d+hirna d+hi ga tA tu pA/ /hA tA pa t+ya pra b+hA be na tri shaM ku nr-i pa dzan+ma ni/ /ma yA br-iSh+TaHsa dur+b+hi k+Sha bo d+hirnA d+hi ga tA tu pA/ /mi thi lA yAM ma hA de ba nr-i pa dzan+ma ni ya dz+wa yA/ /ma yAp+ta pu N+ya sam+bat+tirbo d+hirna d+hi ga tA tu pA/ /mi thi lA
<p>160a.4</p>thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /rtse gsum rgyal po'i skye ba la/ /bdag gis bden pa'i mthu yis ni/ /char med mu ge dang bcas bcom/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /mi thi lar ni mchod sbyin byed/ /lha chen rgyal po'i skye ba la/ /bsod nams phun tshogs bdag gis thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /sa skyong ni
<p>160a.5</p>yaM pu rA pu N+yaM ni mi b+hu pA la dzan+ma ni/ /prAp+taM da na ta po yadz+nyairbo d+hirnA d+hi ga tA tu pA/ /pu rA nan+da s+ya nr-i pa tesh+tsa twA raHpi shu nAHsu tAH/ /ba b+hU pu rA daR+sha mu khaHpany+tsa mash+tsa gu NA d+hi kaH/ /ka le nA pan+na paR+Yan+taHsa b+hu pa ti ra tsin+ta yata/ /
<p>160a.6</p>mi'i skye ba la/ /mi thi lar sngon dka' thub sbyin/ /mchod sbyin gyis ni bsod nams thob/ /byang chub de ni thob ma gyur/ /sngon ni mi bdag dga' bo la/ /phra ma ldan pa'i bu bzhi dang / /lnga pa dag kyang me long bzhin/ /yon tan lhag pa byung bar gyur/ /dus kyi mthar ni nye ba'i tshe/ /sa yi bdag po de yis bsams/ /
<p>160b</p>
<p>160b.1</p>e te ma dan+te tsa twA ro rA dz+yaM nAr+han+ti karka shaH/ /pu tre ma mA daR+sha mu khe rA dz+yA shrIHpra ti bim+biHtAH/ /su pr-it+te la b+ha te sho b+hAM pradz+nyA bai ma l+ya shA yi ni/ /d+h+yA twe t+ya mA t+yA na sau bA dI ta sa b+ha bad+b+hirnA re shwa rAH/ /kA yon+taHsu ra
<p>160b.2</p>bdag gi mthar ni rgyal srid la/ /rtsub mo 'di bzhi 'os pa min/ /bdag gi bu ni me long bzhin/ /legs spyod shes rab dri med dang / /ldan pas rgyal srid dag gi dpal/ /gzugs brnyan mdzes pa thob pa yin/ /'di bsams de yis blon la smras/ /skye gnas kyis bslang btsun mo yi/ /tshogs kyis
<p>160b.3</p>brgai Na yo n+yut+thA ne ne pU dz+ya te/ /mau lirna kam+pa te ya s+ya pa me ba ma Ni pa du ke/ /dwa ra dru mA dri bA pI Shu ni d+hi ShaT+kaM tsa pa sh+ya ti/ /i t+yuk+t+wa tri di paM yA te nr-i pa tau man+t+ri NaHkra mAta/ /ta du k+tairlak+Sha Nesh+tsakru rA
<p>160b.4</p>mchod par 'gyur ba dang / /gang gi dbu rgyan mi g.yo la/ /nor bu'i rkang rjes dag la'ang mnyam/ /sgo yi ljon pa'i bang so la/ /gter drug mthong bar gyur pa ni/ /khyod kyis mi yi dbang por bya/ /zhes brjod mi bdag mtho ris su/ /gshegs tshe blon pos me long bzhin/ /de yis brjod pa'i mtshan nyid
<p>160b.5</p>daR+sha mu kha mI shwa raM/ /d+har+m+ma nir+N+Na ya kAR+ye Shu yaM pA di pra ti ba di naH/ /bi lo kyai pa swa yaM ta s+thur+n+ya y+Ye dza ya ma pa ra dza ye/ /pu rA ni rA b+hi san+d+ha na prAp+ta bai sha pa kilpa ShaM/ /brAh+ma NaM daN+Di naM nA ma dA yA luHpradz+nya ya pu raH/ /
<p>160b.6</p>kyis/ /rim pa rnams kyis dbang por byas/ /chos ni nges pa'i bya ba la/ /rgol dang phyir rgol rnams kyis gang / /mthong ba rnams kyi rang nyid ni/ /rgyal pham rigs pa dag la gnas/ /sngon ni rgyu mtshan med pa ru/ /mi 'dod sdig pa thob gyur pa/ /bram ze dbyug can zhes pa la/ /brtse ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni/ /
<p>161a</p>
<p>161a.1</p>go yu gAr+the gr-i has+the na sr-i ta na pa Da bA ha teH/ /kwa bi da pA tA ta pat+b+ya tak+Sh+Na pA sI bi ba da taH/ /shauN+Di ke nAt+ma dza ba b+hA dI k+Shi p+taM tu l+yA ni gra haM/ /te da bi pak+Sha b+ha ya yok+t+wa tata saM t+yak+ta ma mo
<p>161a.2</p>ba lang zung don khyim bdag gis/ /rgod ma bsad las shing rta pas/ /ste'u lhung las 'jog por ni/ /gnas pa'i chung mas rnam par rtsod/ /bu ni bsad las chang 'tshong mas/ /rtsod la mtshungs pa'i chags pa ni/ /de yi mi mthun phyogs 'jig slad/ /brjod nas de btang rnam
<p>161a.3</p>k+Sha ya ta/ /a ma nu ShA NAM satwA nAM ma d+h+ya sha ya bi sha Sha taH/ /tsa kA ra tsit+tA nu gu NaM tat+ta ta saM de ha nir+Na yaM/ /a br-iSh+Ti mr-iSh+Te dur+b+hik+She ye na dwa da sha baR+Sha ke/ /bi hi taHsatwA nA ma sha na prA Na brta naM/ /i t+ya b+hun+ma
<p>161a.4</p>par bkrol/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par las/ /sems can mi ma yin rnams kyi/ /sems kyi rjes sbyangs the tshom ni/ /de dang de dag nges par byas/ /gang gi char med kyis dag pa'i/ /mu ge lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /zas kyis sems can kun gyi srog /rab tu 'tsho ba nyid du bsgrubs/ /de ltar me long
<p>161a.5</p>ma pu N+yap+ti rA daR+sha mu kha dzan+ma ni/ /na sA tu sa myak+saM bo d+hirbi bo d+hi ta ma ho da yAM/ /ba hu dzan+ma sha tA b+h+ya sa pra yA se na ma hi ya sA/ /a d+ya tu dz+nya na bai ma l+yAn+ma yAp+ta lup+ta saM br-i tiH/ /dz+nyA na pra dz+nyA d+hi ga myA ki
<p>161a.6</p>bzhin skyes tshe/ /bdag gis bsod nams thob par gyur/ /che rgyas yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /de ni nam yang ma rtogs so/ /'bad rtsol shin tu che bar ni/ /skye ba mang po brgyar goms pa'i/ /dri med shes pa'i kun rdzob ni/ /btsom pas da lta bdag gis thob/ /gang yang shin tu mchog gyur bla med bden
<p>161b</p>
<p>161b.1</p>ma pi pa ra ta rA nut+ta rA pa t+ya saM bita saM myak+saM bo d+hi re ShA na nu kha lu nr-i pa te la b+h+ya te dA na pu N+yeH/ /mo ha sh+yA nA bi rA me ga ta g+ha na ga ga na byak+ta bai ma l+ya b+hA dzAM nir+b+yA dzAM nan+da b+hu mir+b+ha ba ti b+ha bta mash+tshe di nA sA
<p>161b.2</p>pa rig pa'i yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di/ /mi bdag ye shes rab dag gis rtogs bya nges par sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyis mi 'thob/ /rmongs pa'i mtshan mo dang bral sprin song nam mkha' rab gsal dri ma med pa dag gis bsten/ /zol med kun dga'i sa gzhi de ni srid pa'i mun pa
<p>161b.3</p>di na shrIH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba da na kalpa la tA yA mA daR+sha mu khA ba dA na maSh+TA da shaHpal+la baH// //ne daM ban+d+hurno su hr-it+so da ra ba ne dam+mA tA
<p>161b.4</p>gcod byed nyin mo'i dpal 'byor yin/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las me long gi bzhin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bco brgyad pa'o// //gang yang ye shes slob dpon dge ba'i rgyu/ /'khor
<p>161b.5</p>si tA bA a ka ro ti/ /yat+saM sA rI b+ho d+hi se turbi d+hat+te dz+nyA nA tsaR+yaHko pi ka l+yA Na he tuH/ /ka lan+ta ka ni bA pA khye ra mye bi Nu ba nA shra me/ /b+ha ga bAn bi ha ran bud+d+haHpu re rA dzA gr-i he pu rA/ /kau li taM tso pa ti Sh+yany+tsa
<p>161b.6</p>ba'i chu gter zam pas gang bsgrubs pa/ /'di ni gnyen dang mdza' bshes spun zla dang / /ma dang pha dag gis kyang byed pa min/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi/ /ka lan ta ka'i gnas zhes pa/ /'od ma'i tshal gnas dga' bar sngon/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal
<p>162a</p>
<p>162a.1</p>dau pa ri prA dza kau pu rA/ /pra pan+no b+hi k+Shu b+hA be na tsa kA ra sha ma br-i tau/ /ta tash+tsa shA ri pu tra s+ya b+hik+ShoHsaM de sha nAM bya pAta/ /ya yA bA k+Shata kr-i tar+ha twaHso b+hud mok+Sha ga ti k+Sha maH/ /ta s+ya taM mad b+hu taM dr-iSh+TA d+ha
<p>162a.2</p>te/ /kun tu rgyu ni gnyis po sngon/ /dge slong dngos por rab rdzogs pas/ /zhi ba dag tu zhugs par byas/ /de nas yang dag bstan mdzad pas/ /dge slong shA ri'i bu dag ni/ /gang gis dgra bcom mngon byas te/ /de ni thar par 'gro bzod gyur/ /de yis rmad byung bsngags 'os de/ /
<p>162a.3</p>ne tAM sar+b+pa b+hik+Sha baiH/ /sa prats+tshaHpurba br-it+tAn+tAM sa tsA tad+b+h+yo b+hA Shi ta/ /brAh+ma Na s+yag+ni mi tra s+ya b+hAR+ya gu Na pa rA b+ha pa ta/ /sUrbi ke ti kr-i taM pi twA kr-I DA nA ma tsa bi b+h+ra tI/ /b+h+rA tA pra tha ma shI lA khyaHta s+yaHsUr+pA pa bi paH/ /
<p>162a.4</p>dge slong kun gyis mthong gyur nas/ /de la sngon gyi spyod mtha' dris/ /des kyang de dag rnams la gsungs/ /bram ze me yi grogs po yi/ /chung ma yon tan mchog gyur ba/ /pha yis rtsed mor ming dag kyang / /sur pi ka zhes btags par gyur/ /de yi ming po sUr pA pa/ /zhes pa rang sangs rgyas nyid gyur/ /
<p>162a.5</p>pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha tAM yA tA ka dA cid gr-i ha mA ya yau/ /sa tayA b+hartu rA de shAta gr-i ha b+hak+t+yA d+hi ba si tAH/ /pra Na tiHpra Na yA tsa rai sto Shi taHpa ri tsaR+ya yA/ /ka dA tsits+tsI pa re ta s+ya kur+b+bA Na s+ya bi pA tra naM/ /sU tsI kar+m+ma bA shAta
<p>162a.6</p>dang po'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba/ /nam zhig khyim du 'ongs par gyur/ /de yi khyo yis bstan pa las/ /khyim pa'i gus pas de mgron gnyer/ /rab btud gus pa'i spyod pa dang / /rim gro dag gis tshim par byas/ /nam zhig chos gos drub pa yi/ /bya ba dag ni byed pa de'i/ /khab kyi las dbang mthong
<p>162b</p>
<p>162b.1</p>dr-iSh+T+wa pra Ni d+hA na sa mA da d+he/ /ya the yaM karta rI tik+Sh+NA ya tha gaM b+hI ra gA mi nI/ /sU tsi ta thA ma ma pa raM pradz+nyA s+yA di ti sA da rA/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha bi na yAta pra Ni d+hA nai na te na tsa/ /pai bAsmin dzan+ma ni ga tA sa pradz+nyA shA
<p>162b.2</p>gyur nas/ /smon lam dag ni gus bcas pas/ /ji ltar chen po rno 'di dang / /ji ltar zab mor 'gro ba'i khab/ /de ltar bdag gi shes rab ni/ /mchog tu gyur ces yang dag btab/ /rang sangs rgyas la gus pa dang / /smon lam dag ni de yis kyang / /shes rab ldan pa shA ri'i bur/ /skye ba 'di la
<p>162b.3</p>ri pu tra taM/ /sa e Sha shA ri pu tro d+ya b+hik+Shu k+ShuN+Na ta rA gra d+hIH/ /ka l+yA Na pA tra tAM yA taHkalpa bal+lI hi san+ma tiH/ /bA kyaM b+ha ga ba taHshru twA pa prats+tshur+b+hi k+Sha baHpu naH/ /kasmIn+na T+ya ku le dzA taHshA ri pu tro na rA d+ha me/ /ta ta stan b+ha
<p>162b.4</p>de gyur to/ /dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di de/ /da lta rab rno blo mchog ldan/ /dge ba'i snod gyur gang gi phyir/ /dam pa'i blo ni dpag bsam shing / /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis yang zhus pa/ /mi las smad pa zlos gar mkhan/ /rigs su shA ri'i bu cis 'khrungs/ /de nas bcom
<p>162b.5</p>ba/ ba nU tse pUr+b+basmin+ne Sha dzan+ma ni/ /a b+hUn+ma hA ma tirnA ma rA dza pu traM sa tAM ma taH/ /shrI ma to pi ma tista s+ya pra bra dz+yA yA ma dzA yata/ /pa ri ga mi pra san+nA nAM kA nu Sh+yA ya na saM pa daH/ /pra bra dz+yA rA dza pu trA NAM yU nA nai ba ku lo
<p>162b.6</p>ldan 'das kyis der/ /bka' stsal skye ba sngon nyid la/ /blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyal bu dam pas 'dod par gyur/ /dpal dang ldan yang de yi blo/ /rab tu byung la phyogs par gyur/ /rab tu dad pa yongs smin la/ /phun sum tshogs pas sgrib mi byed/ /rgyal sras gzhon nu rnams dag ni/ /rab byung rigs
<p>163a</p>
<p>163a.1</p>tsi tA/ /i t+yuk+t+wa dza na kaHprI t+yA taM yat+ne na n+ya bA ra yata/ /ka dA tsita kuny+dza rA rU D+haHsa pra dza ba na bar+t+mA ni/ /dr-iSh+T+wA da ri draM s+tha bi raMkA ru N+yA di da ma pra bIta/ /a d+ha n+ya d+ha ni no lo ke ban+d+hu ban+d+ha na yan+ti
<p>163a.2</p>la 'os min nyid/ /ces brjod pha yi byams pa yis/ /'bad pas de ni bzlog par gyur/ /nam zhig glang chen la zhon nas/ /skye bo'i lam du 'gro ba des/ /rgan po dbul po mthong gyur nas/ /snying rje las ni 'di dag smras/ /skal med nor ldan 'jig rten na/ /gnyan gyi 'ching bas
<p>163a.3</p>tA/ /pra bra dz+yaM nAp+nu ban+t+ye pa twaM tu ke na ni bA ri tAH/ /so n+ya be da yan+me da ri dra s+ya na pA traM na tsa tsI pa raM/ /b+ha no pa ka ra NA N+ye ba sha mo pa ka ra NA n+ya pi/ /rA dza sU nu ri ti shru twA ga twA mu ni ta po ba na/ /pra bra dz+yAM
<p>163a.4</p>bsdams rnams kyis/ /rab byung thob pa min pa nyid/ /khyod kyang su yis rnam par bzlog /des smras dbul po bdag la ni/ /lhung bzed med cing chos gos med/ /zhi ba'i yo byad dag la yang / /nor ni nye bar mkho ba nyid/ /rgyal po'i sras kyis de thos nas/ /thub pa'i dka' thub nags song ste/ /de ni rab tu
<p>163a.5</p>kA ra yi twA s+ya pra da do pA tra tsI pa raM/ /so tsi re Nai ba kA le na yA taHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha tAM/ /rA dza pu traM sa ma b+h+ye t+ya di bya mr-id+d+hi ma daR+sha yata/ /ta s+ya pra b+ha ba ma lo kya sa pra da d+h+yo nr-i pAd+ma dzaH/ /a ho maho da ya
<p>163a.6</p>'byung bcug nas/ /lhung bzed chos gos rab tu byin/ /yun ring min pa'i dus kyis de/ /rang sangs rgyas ni nyid gyur nas/ /rgyal po'i sras la mngon phyogs te/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog rnams bstan par gyur/ /de yi mthu rnams mthong gyur nas/ /mi yi bdag po'i sras des bsams/ /kye ma dar ba che nyid phyir/ /
<p>163b</p>
<p>163b.1</p>twAt+me pra bra dz+yA durla b+hA b+ha bta/ /dA ri d+h+ya da bi be kats+tsa nI tsA nA ma pi durla b+hA/ /dzA ye yaM ya d+ya d+ha ma ku le tasmA dasmi bi be ka pAn/ /sa e ba shA ri pu tro yaM dzA tastata pra Ni d+ha na taH/ /pra bra dzi to b+ha ga ba tA kA sh+ya se nA n+ya dzan+ma
<p>163b.2</p>bdag la rab byung dkon par gyur/ /dbul zhing rnam 'byed med las ni/ /dman rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/ /des na dman rigs rnam 'byed dang / /ldan par bdag ni skye bar shog /de yi smon lam dag las ni/ /de nyid shA ri'i bu 'dir skyes/ /skye ba gzhan du bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs kyis ni rab tu
<p>163b.3</p>ni/ /te nA yaM ni ya ma pri yi Ni bi na yI sa myak+p+ra sA do da yA dI diSh+TaHku sha lA ya sat+ya ni d+hi nA pradz+nyA ba tA ma gra NIH/ /kA le shAkya mu nir+b+ha bi She ta ma taHshi Sh+ya twa yau gAta pa raM maud+gA l+ya ya Na e Sha tsA tra ka thi taHsam+bin+ma yA
<p>163b.4</p>phyung / /bden pa'i gter de nges par dgyes pas 'dul ldan 'di ni dge bdag gi slad/ /yang dag rab tu dang ba rgyas pas dus su shes rab ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /shAkya thub pa'i slob mar 'os pa dag las mchog tu bzhed par 'gyur bar bstan/ /mau gal bu 'di'ang 'di ru gsungs zhes yang dag rig pa'i
<p>163b.5</p>nAM ba dAH/ /a n+ya dzan+ma ni da ri dA kAm+bi kaHka na tsita pa da ya yA ma haR+Shi NA/ /dat+ta pA tra tsI pa rau b+ha ban+daR+shi tar+d+hi ra tu la pra b+hA ba bAn/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yaM shA ri pu tra pra bra
<p>163b.6</p>rang bzhin ldan rnams smra/ /skye ba gzhan du dbul po las byed la/ /drang srong chen po 'ga' zhig brtse ba yis/ /lhung bzed chos gos dag ni byin gyur nas/ /mtshungs med rdzu 'phrul mthu yang rab tu bstan/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi
<p>164a</p>
<p>164a.1</p>dz+yA ba dA nan+nA mo na biM sha tiHpal+la baH// //sa ko pi pu N+yA ti sha yo da ya s+ya ba ra pra b+hA ba pa ra ma k+Sha yo yaH/ /pra t+yak+ShaHlak+Sh+maHshu b+ha pak+ShA sA k+ShI dzan+man+ta re lak+Sha
<p>164a.2</p>'khri shing las shA ri'i bu rab tu byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bcu dgu pa'o// //gang yang mchog tu mi zad mthu ldan gang / /de ni bsod nams phul byung dar ba'i mchog /mngon sum gyis mtshon dge ba'i phyogs kyi dpang / /skye
<p>164a.3</p>Na tA mu pai ti/ /ra mye pu rA b+ha ga pa ti shrA bas+t+yAM dze ta kA na ne/ /a nA tha piN+Da dA ra ma bi hA ri Ni ta thA ga te/ /ba b+hU ba bA sa ba grA me ba la se nA b+hi d+ho gr-i hI/ /pU ri tA shaHpha
<p>164a.4</p>gzhan mtshan nyid nyid du nye bar gyur/ /sngon tshe mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /dga' bar mgon med zas sbyin gyi/ /kun dga' ra bar bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur/ /khyim bdag stobs kyi sde zhes pa/ /grong ni nor las byung bar gyur/ /'bras bu'i tshogs
<p>164a.5</p>la b+ha raish+tsha yo ta ru be d+har+thi nA/ /dzA yA yAM dza ya se nA yAM ka le ka ma la lo tsa naH/ /a dzA ya ta su tasta s+ya pu N+yairmUr+t+ta i bot+sa baH/ /sa ha dzA rat+na di partsi ra b+hUta kar+Na s+ya kar+Ni kA/ /nA b+hUta mU
<p>164a.6</p>kyis slong ba yi/ /phyogs rdzogs grib bsil ljon pa bzhin/ /de yi btsun mo rgyal sde la/ /dus su pad+ma'i mig can gyi/ /bu zhig bsod nams dag gis bcas/ /dga' ba dag ni gzugs can bzhin/ /lhan skyes rin cen sgron ma'i 'od/ /de yi rna ba'i rna rgyan gyur/ /gser ni bye ba brgya
<p>164b</p>
<p>164b.1</p>l+ya tu la yA s+ya he ma ko Ti sha tai ra pi/ /shra ba Na nak+Sha tra dzAto sau rat+na ko T+yar+ha kar+N+Ni kaH/ /sa shro Na ko TI kar+NA khyaHku mA rau b+hUta gu No tsi taH/ /sa nir+m+ma Sha ru tsiHkAn+taHka la b+hi pa ri pu ri taH/ /a man+dA nan+da ni Sh+yan+di na ka s+yen+du ri bA b+ha bta/ /
<p>164b.2</p>yis kyang / /gang gis rin la mtshungs ma gyur/ /'di ni rgyu skar gro bzhin skyes/ /rna rgyan rin cen bye ba ri/ /gro bzhin bye ba rna zhes de/ /gzhon nu yon tan ldan par gyur/ /de ni dri med gsal zhing mdzes/ /cha rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs/ /mi dman kun dga' rgyas gyur pa/ /su yi zla ba bzhin ma gyur/ /
<p>164b.3</p>na yu bA bAR+ya ma No pi pi trA d+ha na da sam+pa dA/ /dza na nI sA shru na ya nA pa raM pa rU Sha yA gi rA/ /pri yam+ba do pi nir+b+hat+s+ya bi Sha baR+ShI pa tsan+d+ra mA/ /ma hA sAr+the na rat+nar+thi du ra dwI pan+ta raM ya yau/ /ma ka rA ka ra
<p>164b.4</p>mig ni mchi ma ldan pa'i ma/ /mchog tu rtsub pa'i tshig dag gis/ /snyan smra yin yang smad bya ste/ /zla bas dug gi char phab bzhin/ /nor sbyin lta bur phun tshogs pa'i/ /pha yis bzlog kyang gzhon nu de/ /rin cen don gnyer don mthun ni/ /chen pos gling gzhan rings par song / /chu srin 'byung
<p>164b.5</p>mut+tIR+Ya pra dza tasta s+ya nirdza ne/ /karmormi bi p+la be nA b+hUta swa pAr+tha bi ra ha pa thi/ /sAr+tho pi tam nA sA d+ya bi ni pr-it+taHshu tsA sha naiH/ /swa de sha mardzi taHkle shaHbra bi pe sha bi shr-iM kha laH/ /po pi tap+ta ma
<p>164b.6</p>gnas rab bsgral nas/ /skye bo med pa'i lam bgrod de/ /las kyi rlabs kyis rnam bslad pas/ /rang gi don mthun bral bar gyur/ /don mthun gyis kyang de ma rnyed/ /mya ngan gyis zlog dal bu yis/ /nyon mongs bsgrubs nas rang yul du/ /'ching dang bral bar rab tu zhugs/ /de yang ngal zhing ngal gso
<p>165a</p>
<p>165a.1</p>ru shre NI lak+Sha NAM dak+Shi NI di shaM/ /shrAn+taHpra shan+ta bi shrAn+tirbA pi gA ha bya gA ha ta/ /so tsin+ta ya da ho bit+te pa ti pit+tAr+dz+dza nod+Ya maH/ /ma mA ya mA na ye nai ba dzA ta kle sha pa lo da yaH/ /a ho
<p>165a.2</p>dang / /rab tu bral bas chu tshogs brgal/ /gdung ba'i mya ngan 'phreng ba yis/ /mtshan pa lho yi phyogs su song / /des bsams nor ni chen po dag /yod la nor sgrub la brtson pa/ /nyon mongs 'bras bu dar ba 'di/ /bdag gi tshul min nyid kyis bskyed/ /mi rnams
<p>165a.3</p>d+ha nArdza nA be shaHsan+to Sha bi ra nAta nr-i NAM/ /sarbA pa ba da saM bA da niM d+ya nAM bi dAM pa daM/ /he mA tsa le pi sa prA p+te na par+ya p+ting+d+ha na rdza ne/ saM sA re bA sa nA b+h+ya sA de Sha mo haHsha rI ri NI/ pr-i thu pra yA
<p>165a.4</p>chog shes bral ba las/ /kye ma nor sgrub la 'jug pa/ /gnod pa thams cad 'byung ba yis/ /smad 'os rgud pa dag gi gnas/ /'khor bar nor ni sgrub pa la/ /bag chags goms las lus can rnams/ /rmongs pa 'di ni gser gyi ri/ /thob kyang yongs su tshim pa med/ /ngal dub rab rgyas ro
<p>165a.5</p>sa bi ra sA dip+tA shri ri bA yata/ /tr-iSh+NAM ta no ti ni ta rA mi yaM ma ru ma hI ma la/ /a ho ba ta ku raM gA Na dr-iSh+T+wAn+d+hA na pa de pa de/ /ma me bi dza na yan+t+ye ta mo haM ma ru ma rI tsi kA/ /i yaM dr-iSh+T+wA shra mash+tsa ya mi mA ni
<p>165a.6</p>dang bral/ /'og gi mya ngam sa gzhi 'di/ /'bar ba'i dpal bzhin rings par ni/ /bdag gi sred pa rab rgyas byed/ /kye ma gnas dang gnas rnams su/ /ri dwags skom pas long ba bzhin/ /mya ngam gyi ni smig rgyu yis/ /bdag la rmongs pa bskyed pa nyid/ /skom pa 'di dang ngal ba 'dis/ /chu ni med pa'i
<p>165b</p>
<p>165b.1</p>ru da gA b+hu baH/ /kiM ka ro mi kra gats+tshA mi pa sh+yA mi dz+wa li tA di shaH/ /i ti saM tsi t+ya pa sha naiHpra sarban sha li lA sha yA/ /A yA sa mi bA sA kA raM da daR+sha pu ra mA ya paM/ /g+ho raM dwA ri s+thi taM ta re paM tras s+ye ba sod raM/ /da daR+sha pu
<p>165b.2</p>sa gzhi ni/ /phyogs ni 'bar bar bdag gis mthong / /ci zhig bya zhing gang du 'gro/ /de ltar bsams shing dal bus de/ /chu yi bsams pas song ba na/ /ngal dub rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/ /lcags kyi grong khyer mthong bar gyur/ /shin tu skrag pa'i spun zla bzhin/ /'jigs su rung ba'i skyes bu ni/ /dus ltar
<p>165b.3</p>ru ShaM kA le ka rA laM rak+ta lo tsa naM/ /sa te na pr-iSh+TaHpA nI yaM ya dA no bA tsa kiM tsa na/ /ta dA swa yaM pra biSh+The na pre ta lo ko bi lo ki taH/ /dag+d+ha kASh+Tho pa mAM d+hU lI ma la lip+tAn+ni ram+ba rAn/ /puSh+kAs+thi snA yu she ShAM gAn pre
<p>165b.4</p>rtag cing mig dmar ba/ /sgo der gnas pa mthong bar gyur/ /de yis de la btung ba dris/ /gang tshe ci yang mi smra ba/ /de tshe rang nyid nang zhugs pas/ /yi dwags 'jig rten rnam par mthong / /rus pa chu rgyus lhag lus bskams/ /gos med rdul gyi 'phreng bas gos/ /shing bsregs lta bu'i yi dwags rnams/ /
<p>165b.5</p>tAn dr-iSh+T+wA sa bi bya the/ /taiR+YA tsi taHsa pA ni yaM pA ni ya bi ra hArdi taH/ /pa ri d+ya dza ni dzA mAr+t+ti ma b+hUt+tad+duHkha duHkhi taH/ /tI bra tr-iSh+NA tu rA nU tse sa te nAr+t+ta pra lA pi naH/ /ma mAsmin+ma ru kAn+tA ra niHkr-i pa s+ya ku taHpa yaH/ /kr-its+tsh+re
<p>165b.6</p>mthong bas de ni gdung bar gyur/ /chu dang bral bas gzir de la/ /de dag gis ni chu bslangs pas/ /rang gi gdung ba yongs btang ste/ /de yi sdug bsngal gyis gzir gyur/ /gdung ba rab smra skom pa ni/ /drag pos gzir de la des smras/ /brtse med bdag la mya ngam gyi/ /dgon pa 'dir ni chu gang las/ /khyed su
<p>166a</p>
<p>166a.1</p>smin duHkha sa he n+yastAHke yu yaM ke na karma NA/ /yuSh+mad pra kri yA ban+d+hash+tsa taHkr-its+tsha twa re tra haM/ /ni drA niHsha l+ya kalpa s+ya su kha sig+te ba ta s+ya yaH/ /nArtAn pa sh+ya ti dr-iSh+T+wA bA te ShaM kle sha
<p>166a.2</p>las ni ci zhig gis/ /sdug bsngal bzod dka' 'di la bkod/ khyed rnams phyir bcos 'bras med pas/ /'di las bdag ni mya ngan byed/ /gzir ba ma mthong mthong yang gang / /de dag nyon mongs 'joms bzod pa/ /zug rngu med par brtag pa de'i/ /gnyid ni bde
<p>166a.3</p>k+Sha ye k+Sha maH/ /te ta mU tsurbi rut+d+he na karma NA kr-i ta sharma NA/ /a ni bar+t+ya ba yaM mar+t+yaHk+Ship+tA bya pa na saM ka Te/ /a d+hi k+She pAn+k+She pa k+Sha pi ta pa ra d+haiR+Yer+m+ma da b+ha rA da nA yair+m+mA seR+Sha bya sa na b+hi ra bAR+ya
<p>166a.4</p>bas bran pa bzhin/ /de la des smras bdag cag ni/ /thar med ma yin 'gal ba'i las/ /rmongs pa las ni rab bsags pa/ /gdung ba mi bzad gnas su 'phangs/ /lhag par smod cing smod pas gzhan gyi bstan pa nyams byas rgyags pa rgyas pa las/ /'phags pa min zhing phrag dog dag
<p>166a.5</p>bya ti ka raiH/ /kr-i tA smA b+hirni t+yaM su dza na hr-i da ye nirda ya ta yA ba tso b+hirnA rA tsairbi Sha pa ri tsi taiHshA l+ya ka la nA/ /da naM na dat+tAM hr-i ta me ba tsit+taM hiM sA ni mits+tshaM kr-i ta me ba tsit+taM/ /
<p>166a.6</p>gis gdung ba rnam par brtson pa ma bzlog pa/ /bdag cag rnams ni brtse ba med pas skye bo legs pa'i snying la rtag tu ni/ /tshig gi lcags mda' dug gis yongs su bsgos pas zug rngu rab tu zug par byas/ /sbyin pa ma byin nor ni phrogs pa nyid/ /'tshe ba'i slad du sems ni byas pa nyid/ /
<p>166b</p>
<p>166b.1</p>a smA b+hi raM gai rbi hi tA bi kA rAHpa ra s+ya dA hr-i ti pra kA raH/ /te ba yaM ku ha kA shak+dA da k+ShaHk+ShuHdre Shu ka rma su/ /pra ye ta pre ta na ga re g+ho re smin kA sha pA tra taM/ /i ti te ShAM ba tsaHshru twA so n+ya tra tsa
<p>166b.2</p>bdag cag lus kyis gzhan gyi chung ma dag /'phrog pa'i rnam 'gyur rab tu byed pa bsgrubs/ /de dag dman pa la chags shing / /ngan pa'i las la mkhas gyur pa/ /yi dwags grong khyer 'jigs rung 'dir/ /bdag cag nyon mongs snod nyid gyur/ /de dag tshig de des thos shing / /gzhan du'ang
<p>166b.3</p>ta thA bi d+han/ /pre tAn br-iSh+T+wA na b+hi pre ta nA ka ru NA ku li to b+ha bta/ /nirga mya durga mAt+tasmA ta pu rAta pu N+ya ba le na saH/ /bi ma laM shI ta lats+tsha ya mA sa sA da ba nAn+ta raM/ /a tha du rA d+h+wa saM tap+taHpa ri shan+taHsha naiHsha naiH/ /
<p>166b.4</p>rnam pa de lta yi/ /yi dwags mngon par mi 'dod pa/ /mthong nas snying rje rgyas par gyur/ /ngan 'gro'i grong khyer de las ni/ /bsod nams stobs kyis thon nas de/ /dri med grib ma bsil ba yi/ /nags kyi nang du phyin par gyur/ /de nas lam ring gis dub cing / /yongs ngal dal bu dal bu yis/ /
<p>166b.5</p>ni pa pA tA tsa lA dan+d+hau tr-iSh+Tar+t+tA i ba b+haska raH/ /di ne pu N+ya i ba k+ShI Ne ni she ShA shA pra kwa sha ke/ /saM mo ha ma li naM lo ke ta maHpA pa mi bod+Ya yau/ /li na b+h+r-iM ga bi haM gA nAM na li nI nAM pra saM gi nI/ /bi kA
<p>166b.6</p>skom bas yongs gdungs long ba bzhin/ /'od byed ri las lhung bar gyur/ /ma lus phyogs rnams gsal byed pa'i/ /bsod nams bzhin du nyin zad tshe/ /kun rmongs nag po'i mun pa dag /'jig rten du ni sdig bzhin byung / /bya dang bung ba chags gyur pa/ /pad+mo can gyi phun tshogs rgya/ /rnam rgyas rab
<p>167a</p>
<p>167a.1</p>sha sa pa dA mu drA ni dre ba sa ma dzA ya ta/ /kA ru N+ya di ba shI tAM shu dz+yot+s+nA mr-i ta sha lA ka yA/ /smA ra tA raM dza gan+ne traM tsa kre bi ti mi raM ta taH/ /k+Sha yo da ya pa rA br-irtI daR+shi ta ne ka bi b+h+ra maM/ /saM
<p>167a.2</p>tu 'grogs pa yis/ /gnyid bzhin yang dag byung bar gyur/ /snying rjes las bzhin bsil zer gyi/ /zla 'od bdud rtsi'i thur ma yis/ /rab gsal skar ma 'gro ba'i mig /de nas rab rib bral bar byas/ /'khor ba nyin mo nub mo yi/ /'char nub gzhan du gyur pa dag /rnam
<p>167a.3</p>sA ra di na yA min+Yordza hA se ba su d+hA ka raH/ /ne tra nan+da su d+hA baR+She su kha s+pha le ni shA ka re/ /dig+ba d+hU ba da na daR+she haR+She mU rtA i bo di te/ /shro Na ko Ti da daR+shA gre bi mA na mA na naM d+Yu teH/ /kau tu kA da n+ya rU pa
<p>167a.4</p>'phrul du ma mthong ba las/ /bdud rtsi'i 'od ni rgod pa bzhin/ /mig ni kun dga'i bdud rtsi'i char/ /reg bde mtshon byed phyogs kyi ni/ /bu mo'i bzhin gyi me long dag /dga' ba gzugs can bzhin shar tshe/ /ltad mo la ni gzhan gzugs kyis/ /mtho ris sa la 'ongs pa yis/ /mdzes pa'i gdong bzhin
<p>167a.5</p>Na swargata b+hu ba mi bA ga taM/ /tasmin+na pa sh+yat+sa ma dIsh+tsa ta sras+t+ri da shI gA nA/ /di shash+tsan+d+ro da yA nan+da bi ha ra ye ba saM ga tAH/ /tA sAM ma d+h+ye ba rA kA raM ra ma mA Ne ba lo ka yata/ /ta ru Na pre ma saM b+ha ra mi ba sA kA ra tAM ga
<p>167a.6</p>gzhal yas khang / /gro bzhin bye bas mdun du mthong / /der ni lha yi bu mo dag /rgyags pa dang bcas bzhi mthong ste/ /zla ba shar ba'i kun dga' dang / /rnam par rtse phyir 'grogs pa bzhin/ /de dbus mchog gi rnam pa can/ /dga' ba dang ldan mthong gyur te/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba'i tshogs rnams dag /
<p>167b</p>
<p>167b.1</p>tAH/ /rin chen rna rgyan ces nas bos par gyur gyi bar tshigs bcad gsum d+har+m+ma pA las 'gyur chad bsabs pa'o/rat+na kuN+Da la ki yU ra ki rI Ti ka tsi rAM shub+hiH/ /A li khan+ta mi bash+tsaR+ya ma maR+YA daM di shaM mu khe/ /ta s+ya tA mad+b+hu tAM dr-iSh+T+wA saM b+ho ga su kha saM pa daM/ /me na sa su kr-i tA khya
<p>167b.2</p>rnam bcas nyid du gyur pa bzhin/ /rin chen rna rgyan dpung rgyan dang / /zur phud 'od zer ring po yi/ /mtshams las 'das pa'i ngo mtshar dag /phyogs kyi gdong la 'dri ba bzhin/ /der ni legs byas las byung ba'i/ /ljon shing rgyas pa'i 'bras bu'i dpal/ /longs spyod bde ba phun sum
<p>167b.3</p>s+ya ta ro spI tAM pha la shri yaM/ /prI t+yA te na kr-i tA ti th+yaHswA du pA nA sha nA di b+hiH/ /tAM shro Na ko Ti kar+N+No tha ni nA ya ra dza nIM su khaM/ /tA rA ku su ma bA tA lI pra b+hA pra b+hA ti kI ta taH/ /a ni t+ya te ba sha shi nash+tsa kre lak+Sh+mI pa ri
<p>167b.4</p>tshogs/ /rmad byung de dag mthong bar gyur/ /de nas gro bzhin bye ba rna/ /de dag dga' bas mgron gnyer de/ /zhim pa'i bza' btung dag la ni/ /mtshan mo bde bar bos bar gyur/ /de nas rgyu skar me tog gi/ /rlung chen tho rangs 'od dag gis/ /mi rtag pas bzhin zla ba yis/ /dpal 'byor yongs su
<p>167b.5</p>k+ShaM yaM/ /k+Sha yaM k+Sha pA yAM yA ta yAM b+hA nor+b+hu ba na tsak+Shu Shi/ /u di te sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAM su kha duHkhai ka pak+Shi Ni/ /bi mA naM su ra nA t+yash+tsa k+Sha Ne nA dr-i sh+ya tAM ya yuH/ /bi naSh+Ta pa da nats+tsha yaHpu ru Shash+tsa pa tat+k+Shi tau/ /ta tasta
<p>167b.6</p>nyams par byas/ /mtshan mo dag ni zad gyur cing / /srid pa'i mig ni nyi ma dag /'byung po kun gyi bde sdug gi/ /dbang po gcig pu shar ba'i tshe/ /gzhal yas khang dang lha mo rnams/ /skad cig gis ni mi snang gyur/ /skyes bu yang ni mdzes pa'i bzhin/ /rnam par nyams nas sa la lhung / /de nas de yi
<p>168a</p>
<p>168a.1</p>s+yA ba tata pr-iSh+The shu nAM saM g+ho ti b+hI Sha NaMH/ /trai lokya shA ba pA pot+thaHkle sha rA shi ri pA khe laH/ /sa tair+g+rI bA mu khA rab+d+ha mAM sa grA so gra kaR+Sha NeH/ /A kran+di ru d+hi rak+ShI bai b+ha k+Sh+ya mA NaHk+Sha yaM ya yau/ /di
<p>168a.2</p>rgyab tu ni/ /shin tu 'jigs rung khyi tshogs byung / /'gro gsum dmod sdig gis bslang ba'i/ /nyon mongs phung po ma lus bzhin/ /kha dang mgron pa nas brtsams sha /za zhing drag spyod khrag gis myos/ /de dag rnams ni cho nge ldan/ /de ni zos shing zad par gyur/ /nyin mo'i mthar
<p>168a.3</p>nAn+te pu na rA yAn+taM tad+bi mAn ma dr-i sh+ya ta/ /tsa ta sro\u0f85spa ra san+tosh+tsa pu ru ShaHsa tsa kAn+ni mAn/ /taM shro Nako TI kar+No tha pa prats+tsha t+yaM ta bi smi taH/ /sa khe ki me ta rAsh+tsaR+yaM dri sh+ya te ka th+ya tA mi ti/ /sa te na pr-iSh+TaHpro bA tsa tsa ya s+ya
<p>168a.4</p>ni slad nas yang / /gzhal yas khang de byung ba mthong / /lha mo bzhi po de dag dang / /mdzes ldan skyes bu de yang ngo / /de nas gro bzhin bye ba rna/ /shin tu ya mtshan nas de la/ /grogs po ngo mtshar 'di dag ni/ /mthong ba ci yin smros zhes dris/ /des dris de yis rab smras pa/ /grogs
<p>168a.5</p>shru ya tA mi daM/ /twAM shro Na ko TI kar+N+Na khyaM dzA nA mi su kr-i to tsi taM/ /a b+ha baM bA sa ba grA me duHkr-i ti pa shu pA la kaH/ /pa shU nAM mAM sa mut+k+r-i t+ya bi krI taM sa ta taM ma yA/ /piN+Da pA tA ya saM prAp+to mA maR+yaH
<p>168a.6</p>po 'di ni mnyan par gyis/ /khyed ni gro bzhin bye ba rna/ /ngas shes legs byas ldan pa yin/ /nor las byung ba'i grong du bdag /sdig can phyugs dag skyong bar gyur/ /rtag tu bdag gis phyugs rnams kyi/ /sha la rab tu bcad nas btsongs/ /kA t+yA ya na zhes 'phags pa/ /snying rje'i
<p>168b</p>
<p>168b.1</p>ka ru NA ni d+hiH/ /kA t+yA ya nA khyAHpro bA tsa bi ra mAta ku karma NaH/ /hiM sA ma yaHpra yA so yaM duHsa haH sa ha sai ShaM NAM/ /swa sha rI re pa ta t+ye ba ts+tshin+na mU la i ba dru maH/ /i t+yA haM bAR+ya ma No pi
<p>168b.2</p>gter ni bsod snyoms la/ /byon pas bdag la rab gsungs pa/ /las ngan 'di las rnam par log /bab col tshol ba'i nyon mongs rnams/ /'tshe ba'i rang bzhin bzod dka' 'di/ /rtsa ba bcad pa'i ljon shing bzhin/ /rang gi lus la ltung ba nyid/ /de ltar bdag nyid bzlog gyur kyang / /gang
<p>168b.3</p>te na nAR+yAHkr-i pAt+na na/ /ya dA na bi ra taHpA pAt+ta dA sa pra ha mAM su naH/ /di bA twaM ku ru se hiM saM sar+b+bA thA ya di nirda yaH/ /ra drau shI la sa mA dA naM gr-i hA Na sa ma yAta ma ma/ /i t+yuk+tA te na yat+ne na sar+b+ba
<p>168b.4</p>tshe sdig las ma log pa/ /de tshe 'phags min la brtse ba/ /de yis bdag la slar gsungs pa/ /gal te rnam kun brtse med khyod/ /nyin par dag ni 'tshe ba byos/ /mtshan mo dag gi dam tshig las/ /tshul khrims sdom pa yang dag long / /sems can kun la phan bzhed pa/ /de
<p>168b.5</p>pa twa hi te Shi NA/ /dat+tA shI la sa mA dA na ma yI pu N+ya ma tirma ma/ /kA le na ka la ba sha gaHprAp+ta so ha mi mAM da shAM/ /tap+tAM ga ra su d+hA baR+Shai ri ba kir+N+NA di bA ni shaM/ /ra trau shi

<p>172a.1</p>dA pI tse yaM Sh+Nu Sha tsa me/ /nak+Sha tra yo ga pU dzA yAM pu r+'aM sadz+dzi kr-i te ma yA/ /b+hok+Sho pa ha re me ge ha mad+yaHkA t+yA ya no bi shata/ /ma yA tsit+ta pra sA di n+yA piN+Da pA te na sortsi taH/ /kur+b+ban+ni ba ya
<p>172a.2</p>deg /bdag gi 'bang mo mna' ma yin/ /rgyu skar sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/ /zas kyi nye sbyor bdag gis sngon/ /legs par byas tshe bdag khyim du/ /'phags pa kA t+yA ya na byon/ /bdag sems rab tu dang ldan pas/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni de la mchod/ /mdzes pas phyogs

<p>172b.1</p>mAM sA da na pA di nI/ /i yaM tsa dA sI b+hok+Sh+ya NaM cauR+YAta bya ya kA ri NI/ /A k+Ship+tA sa t+yaM na ka rota pU ya sho Ni ta bA di nAM/ /ta tra te pre ta tAM yA tAHswa bAkya sa dri shA sa nAH/ /a haM twaR+ya pra sA de na di bya b+ho go sa b+ho gi nI/ /twa yA

<p>173a.1</p>rau shu shrA ban d+h+ya mu ba ga tau/ /b+hik+Shu dwi dzA ti thi ga Ne pU dz+ya mA ne su ra la ye/ /swa kaM pi tr-i di nAM dr-iSh+T+wA pa raM bisma ya mA ya yau/ /nish+tsa t+ya sarbaM b+hA bA nAM k+Sha Ni ka twA da ni t+ya tAM/ /sne ha rA gi sa

<p>173a.6</p>'di la nges pa'i tshogs ni gang / /dpal 'byor 'khor ba'i sprin rum 'khyams par yongs 'dris gser gyi sred pa'i 'od/ /re ba phyogs rnams rdzogs par 'ching ba'i klog bzhin reg pa med cing rab tu g.yo/ /lus ni gnod pa kun dang 'jig dang 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang rga dang na ba dang / /sdug

<p>173b.1</p>ro god+be gaista da bi na bi rA gasta nu b+h+r-i taM/ /shri ye swasti sa map+ta yai swa dza na s+yA ya many+dza liH/ /dAk+Shi N+ya k+Sha ma taM s+t+ri Shu pra dz+yai ba pri yA ma ma/ /i ti d+h+yA twA sa pi ta rau sa mA shwA s+yAp+ta lo tsa nau/ /bud+d+hau
<p>173b.2</p>bsngal dag gis yongs su 'gro ste de lta na yang lus 'dzin yid mi 'byung / /dpal 'byor mtha' dag shis gyur cig /thal mo 'di sbyar nang mi la/ /bud med rnams la yongs bzod mdzod/ /bdag ni rab byung kho na dga'/ /'di bsam de yi pha ma dag/ /yang dag dbugs phyung mig dag thob/ /chos
<p>173b.3</p>d+harma pa the shud+d+ha sha ma d+hAm+ni n+ya be sha yata/ /sAr+tha b+h+raSh+Tash+tsi rA yA taHkr-i sho pi su dza na s+ya tsa/ /a lup+ta sa twa bi b+ha ban+na kr-i pA spa da tAM ya yau/ /a nu kaM s+ya ya d+ye ShaM saM sA ra kle sha bi hwa laM/ /sa taHka s+yA nu
<p>173b.4</p>lam dag cing zhi ba yi/ /gnas la blo ni bkod par gyur/ /don mthun nyams gyur yun ring na/ /'ong zhing rid kyang snying stobs 'byor/ /ma zhum pas na rang mi yang / /brtse ba'i gnas nyid du ma gyur/ /'khor ba'i nyon mongs kyis rnams 'khrugs/ /de dag gal te brtse ba na/ /dam pa su la rjes mi
<p>173b.5</p>kaM s+yAste sam+pa ta sam+par+k+ka ni spr-i hA/ /pa shu pA la ka pi pra s+t+rI saM de sha di ya tho di taM/ /ni ga d+ya de b+h+yaHka na ka prAp+ti pra t+ya ya lak+Sha NaM/ /shAn+taHkA t+yA ya naM pra s+ya bra dz+yAM sa sa mA da de/ /mug+d+hA nAM yad+bi ShA dA ya tad+p+ra sA
<p>173b.6</p>brtse/ /de dag phun tshogs thob mi 'dod/ /phyugs skyong bram ze bud med la/ /gser thob mngon sum mtshan nyid can/ /'phrin sogs ji ltar brjod pa bzhin/ /de dag rnams la bzlas byas te/ /kA t+yA ya na dang phrad nas/ /zhi ba de yis rab byung blangs/ /blun po rnams kyi sgyid lug rgyu/ /de ni blo ldan rab

<p>174a.1</p>da ya d+hi ma tAM/ /sa sa mA sA d+ya bi Sha daM shro ta prAp+ti pha laM ta taH/ /sa kr-i dA gA mya na gA mi pha la mar+ha pha laM ta thA/ /trai d+hA tu ko bI ta ra gaHsa ma loSh+T+wa sh+ma kany+tsa naH/ /A kA sha pA Ni tu l+yo b+hu twa

<p>174a.3</p>si tsan+da na yoHsa maH/ /shrA bas+t+yaM be Nu ga ha ne dzi ni dze ta ba ne s+thi taM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM ya yau draSh+TuM so tha kA t+ya ya naM ga yA/ /pra Ni sA tI kr-i ta ti th+yaHbri t+ya b+ha ga ba ta swa yaM/ /taM shro Na ko Ti karno

<p>174b</p>
<p>174b.1</p>ba te pa raM/ /na spr-i ha s+yA bi te mur+t+tiHku ru te ka s+ya na spri hAM/ /nirle pa s+yA pi te dr-iSh+Ti ra ho haR+She Na lim+pa ti/ /twat+ka tha twa da nu d+h+yA naM twat+p+rap+ti s+t+wan+ni She ba naM/ /e taHku sha la mU lA nAM s+phI taHpha la

<p>174b.6</p>gro bzhin bye ba rna ba yi/ /rab zhi phun tshogs de mthong nas/ /sngon gyi spyod tshul dge slong gis/ /dris shing bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /bA rA Na sIr rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'od srungs zhes pa sngon/ /mdzad pa rdzogs nas myang 'das kyi/ /dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /mi bdag kri ki zhes
<p>175a</p>
<p>175a.1</p>nr-i pash+tsai t+yaM ta s+ya rat+nai ra ka ra yata/ /swa yaM tata pu N+ya saM b+hA raM swarga bka tu mo bid+ga taM/ /shir+Na s+pha Ti ta saM skA re tasmi na saM dz+nya b+h+ri tan+d+ha naM/ /tat+pu traHprAp+ta rA dz+nyo tha na da dau lo b+ha mo hi taH/ /a

<p>175a.5</p>kar+N+No yaM pu N+yaiHprAp+ta pa daM ma hata/ /tad+bi d+he nai ba saM yA taHkar+N+Na b+hU Sha Na lak+Sha NaH/ /pra s+thA na sa ma ye mA ta shra bi tA pa ru ShaM ba tsa/ /yasmA da ne na te nA s+ya ba b+hU bA s+ya shra mo ma hAn/ /ma d+h+ye Shu ma hA taHshukla gu Na sat+karma ba pa
<p>175a.6</p>'di/ /bsod nams dag gi gnas chen thob/ /de lta kho na'i rna ba'i rgyan/ /mtshan nyid dag dang ldan par gyur/ /gang phyir 'gro ba'i dus su 'dis/ /ma yi tshig ni rtsub mo dag /thos par byas nas de yis ni/ /ngal dub chen po dag tu gyur/ /dag pa yon tan dam pa yis/ /las kyi ras chen dbus su

<p>175b.1</p>saH/ /kr-iSh+Na kar+m+ma la baM sho pi spu Ta e bA ba d+haR+Ya te/ /su kr-i ta sa tsi raHsa twot+sa haHpra bA sa sa khI d+h+r-i ti bi Sha mi ta ra Ne bIR+yaM se turbi pa d+ya d+hi kr-i pA/ /sha ma pa ri tsi tA paR+Yan+te

<p>175b.6</p>yal 'dab ste nyi shu pa'o// //lce gnyis 'grogs la 'tsho ba ji ltar yod/ /gtso bo mang la bde ba ji ltar yod/ /las kyis bcings la rang stobs ji ltar yod/ /shes rab mchog la gnod pa ji ltar yod/ /lus 'phags kyi ni mi thi lar/ /mi bdag chu yi sems dpa'i ming / /gang gi
<p>176a</p>
<p>176a.1</p>b+hud b+hu dza b+hu dzaM ge s+ya bi shran+taHpr-i thi bi b+ha raH/ /khaN+Do na ma ma hA mA t+yap+ta s+ye khaN+Da la sam+pa daH/ /ba b+hU bA she Sha ShAD+gu N+ya pa ri dz+nya na br-i has+pha tiH/ /nI ti dz+nyo gau ra bAt+ta s+ya nr-i pe bak+t+ra na lo ki ni/ /

<p>176a.3</p>sa dA b+ha bta mu kha srek+Shi sar+b+baHkAR+Ya ba shAdz+dza naH/ /ga tA nu ga ti ka twe na pra bA ha pra Na yI b+ha raH/ /bar+d+ha te bAR+Y+Ya mA Na s+ya swa dza na s+ya dza la s+ya tsa/ /sarbaM taM ma ya mA lo kya dza naM mAt+sa R+ya mUts+tsha taH/ /man+t+ri NaHsaMha tAsta s+ya

<p>176b.1</p>t+ya yAHpa raM/ /a shi kyA da pi shaM kan+ti do Sha she ke s+ya shaM ki tAH/ /a bi she Sha dz+nyash+tsa pa lA b+hU pA lAHkA ka shaM ki naH/ /pra b+horbi rak+ta ling+gA ni bi lo kyA mA t+ya suM ga baH/ /swa su tau go pa siM hA khyau swa

<p>176b.3</p>shaM kaHsai ra ma bra bIta/ /d+hUr+t+tair+m+me bi ra tA shwA saHpi shu ner+n+r-i pa teHkr-i taH/ /pra t+ya yaM nai ti hr-i da ye bi dAR+YA pi bra daR+sha te/ /bi rat+kaHs+tha gi tA lA pa daR+sha na shra ba Na pra b+huH/ /pa phA i ba br-id+d+ha s+ya ya taHshi thi la

<p>176b.5</p>tAM ma ma/ /bi shu nod+b+ha ba b+hin+na s+ya pram+NaHsan+d+hirna bi d+ya te/ /na ma NiHsh+li Sh+ya ti pu naHpa Sha Na sha ka lI kr-i taH/ /dwi dzi hwa ku Ti lA kran+taHpra b+hush+tsan+da na pA da paH/ /pA yA t+yar+tha kri yA kA rI gu Na bA na s+ya se bya tAM/ /ka thaM nr-i pa ni

<p>177a.1</p>d+hA nAr+thI ku sha laM b+ha dza te na raH/ /g+ho ra dwe Sha bi ShA bi sha dza Sha hwA g+hA tA bi hwa laH/ /tasmAd+b+ra dza maHsaM t+ya dz+ya dwe Sha do She Na b+hU ba teH/ /shaM kA sha l+ya ma yI br-it+herma smin de she na te na kim/

<p>177a.5</p>daH/ /phra yAn+ti nr-i pa tir+dz+nya twa ni brta na sa taH/ /yat+ne na pi na sha taM prA pa not+s+r-iSh+TaM la b+h+ya te pu naH/ /mUr+khAHsad su kr-i ta ba dz+nyA bi mu h+yan+te k+Sha Ne na taiH/ /yA ti te ShAM tu sarba tra ko na na twI kr-i tAr+tha tAm/ /d+hi mA
<p>177a.6</p>song / /'gro bar shes nas mi yi bdag /bzlog la yang dag rab brtson pa'i/ /'bad pa yis kyang ma thob ste/ /rab tu spangs pa slar thob min/ /rmongs pa dam pa'i legs byas smod/ /skad cig de rnams blun par byas/ /de ni kun tu su zhig gis/ /don gnyer don byas min par gyur/ /yon na

<p>177b.1</p>na mA t+yaHprAp+to tha kr-iSh+To bai shA li kairgu NaiH/ /pU dzi taHpraN yA tsA raiHsaM g+ha mu khye pa de s+thi taH/ /tad+bud+d+hi bi b+ha bAp+ta shriHso tha tat+p+ra mu kho ga NaH/ /ka dA tsi da na ya nAta le b+he na pa rA b+ha pa sA tra tAM/ /
<p>177b.2</p>tan gyis bkug blo ldan blon/ /'ongs pa yangs pa can pa yis/ /gus pa'i spyod pas mchod de nas/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo'i gnas su bzhag/ /de nas de yi 'byor bas dpal/ /des thob de yi gtso bos kyang / /tshogs pa nam yang tshul min las/ /gzhan gyi gnod pa'i snod ma gyur/ /
<p>177b.3</p>a tha ka le na siM ha s+ya man+t+ri pU noHka nI yA paH/ /a dza yA ta su tA kAn+tA tsai lA nA ma gu No tsi tAH/ /dwi tI yA tsau ba tsa lA khyA su tA dzA tA s+ya sun+da rI/ /dzan+ma n+ye ba tA yoHpra ha ni mit+ta dz+nyo bi tsa k+Sha NaH/ /tsai lA yAsta na yo b+hA bi
<p>177b.4</p>de nas dus kyis blon po'i bu/ /gzhan par gyur pa seng ge yi/ /bu mo yon tan ldan ma ni/ /mdzes ma tse la zhes pa btsas/ /de yi bu mo gnyis pa yang / /nye ba'i tsai la zhes pa skyes/ /mdzes ma'o de dag skyes nyid la/ /mtshan mkhan mkhas pas rab smras pa/ /tsai la'i bu ni pha bsad nas/ /
<p>177b.5</p>pi tr-i ha tA ma hI pa tiH/ /gu Na pa nu pa tse lAyAHpur+N+Na lak+Sha bA ni ti/ /dz+yeSh+Tho man+t+ri su taHta sauR+YA ta go paHprau D+ha ma dor+d+ha taH/ /ud+YA na marda na k+She pairga NA nAM dwai Sh+ya taM ya yau/ /tat+bi turgau ra bAta tasmai
<p>177b.6</p>sa yi bdag po dag tu 'gyur/ /nye ba'i tsai la'i yon tan can/ /rdzogs pa'i mtshan ldan 'gyur zhas so/ /blon sras thu bo sa 'tsho ni/ /dpa' bas cher rgyags ma bsdams pas/ /skyed tshal dkrugs pa'i gnod pa yis/ /tshogs rnams sdang 'os nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag de yi pha dag la/ /gus

<p>178a.1</p>sA nu dzA yA bi ma n+ya baH/ /bi shA la shA la tA man+te drir+Nod+YA na dwa yaM da duH/ /su ga ta pra ti ma tsakre ta trai kaHsu kr-i to tsi taH/ /bi hA ra bai b+ha bo dA raM b+hu ba nA b+ha ra NaM pa raH/ /a tha bi trA

<p>178a.3</p>ba lot+sik+teHsu taHpra t+yan+ta maN+Da le/ /ga Na ko pa b+ha yAta go paHkarman+to pArdza ne d+h+r-i taH/ /kA le na tri di baM yA te tasmin man+t+ri ba re ga NaiH/ /ka nI yAta sa d+hu twAta siM hasta s+ya pa de d+h+r-i taH/ /go ba
<p>178a.4</p>dkyil 'khor du/ /pa yi stobs rgyas sa srungs bu/ /tshogs pa'i khro bas 'jigs pa las/ /las mtha' nye bar bsgrub slad bzhag /blon po'i mchog de dus kyis ni/ /mtho ris bzhud tshe tshogs rnams kyis/ /legs pa nyid phyir gzhan pa'i bu/ /seng ge de yi gnas su bzhag /tshogs
<p>178a.5</p>pi tu ra saM prA s+ya pa daM ga Na bi mA ni tAH/ /tad+de sha bA sa bi ra saHpa ri hA ra ma tsin+ta yata/ /bsta byaM kaN+Ta kA kI Ne byA g+h+rA g+h+rA te ba ram+ba ne/ /a ne ka swA mi saM b+hin+na dza ne na tr-i bi shr-iM kha le/ /na nA sad+k+r-i
<p>178a.6</p>pa gus bral sa 'tsho yis/ /pha yi gnas ni ma thob nas/ /yul dang gnas ni de dag la/ /chags pa yongs su gtang bar sems/ /tsher mas gtams shing stag gis snom/ /nags tshal mchog tu gnas par bya/ /rje bo mang pos rab phye ba/ /ma bsdams skye bo'i nang du min/ /tha dad dam pa'i
<p>178b</p>
<p>178b.1</p>yA lA baHka tha mA rAd+h+ya te ga NaH/ /sa mI hitaM ma de ka s+ya ta da n+ya smai na ro tsa ta/ /i ti mA nI pa saM tsi t+ya ga twA rA dz+ya gr-i ha pu raM/ /bim+bi sA raM na ra pa ti gu Na shri ya ma shi shri yata/ /sa te na
<p>178b.2</p>bya ba smras/ /gang zhig gcig gis 'dod gyur pa/ /de la gzhan dag yongs mi sred/ /tshogs pa ji ltar bsten par bya/ /zhes bsams nga rgyal can de yis/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu phyin/ /mi bdag gzugs can snying po yi/ /yon tan gyi ni dpal 'byor bsten/ /de yi dges
<p>178b.3</p>mA ni taHprI t+yA ta s+ya bi shraM b+ha b+hu ra b+hUta/ /tsi ra rU tse ba tat+kA la mA b+hA tigu Na saM ga tiH/ /rAdz+nye tha bim+bi sA ra s+ya bal+la b+hA pany+tsa tAM ya yo/ /tad+bi yo gAg+ni san+tapaM taM bitsin+t+ya pa bud+d+hi mAn/ /u pa tsai lAM
<p>178b.4</p>pas de mchod nas/ /de yis yid brtan gnas su gyur/ /de dus yon tan gyis 'grogs pa/ /yun ring 'dris pa bzhin du mdzes/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs snying gis/ /btsun mo lnga pa nyid gyur de'i/ /'bral ba'i me yis gdungs de dang / /nye ba'i tsai la nu po yi/ /bu mo btsun mor blangs
<p>178b.5</p>su tAM b+h+rA tr-istad+bi bA hotsi tAM ba d+hUM/ /gU D+ha tsA rI ta dA de shAta bai sha la ka pu ri ya yau/ /ka n+ya ga No pa b+ho gyai ba na kasmai tsita pra dI ya te/ /i ti bai shA li kaiHpUr+b+ba swa de she ni ya ma kr-i taH/ /tat+pu re dwa ra rak+Sha yai yak+Sha s+tha
<p>178b.6</p>'os pa/ /blo ldan de yis rnam bsams nas/ /gsang nas rgyu zhing de yi bkas/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer song / /tshogs kyi nye bar spyad bya nyid/ /mdzes ma su la sbyin mi bya/ /zhes pa yangs pa can pas sngon/ /rang gi yul du nges pa byas/ /de yi grong khyer sgo bsrung phyir/ /gnod sbyin
<p>179a</p>
<p>179a.1</p>nA ba lam+bi nI/ /ba ra pra de she ku ru te shap+taM g+haN+Ti g+ha TI ya si/ /te pra bi sh+ya ta to b+h+ra turgU D+ha mud+YA na tsA ri NIM/ /u pa tsai lA sa mA hartuM ga tash+tsai lA ma bAp+ta bAn/ /yA tastAM ra tha mA ro s+ya g+haN+DA shan+da da b+hi dru
<p>179a.2</p>gnas na 'phyang ba yi/ /dril bu shin tu gsang ba ni/ /pha rol zhugs tshe sgra sgrog byed/ /nu bo'i skyed tshal 'phreng bar ni/ /gros kyis gsang ste de rab zhugs/ /nye ba'i tsai la len pa la/ /phyin pas tsai la thob par gyur/ /de ni shing rta la bskyon song / /dril sgra las ni mngon 'dod
<p>179a.3</p>tAn/ /sa ha twA bI ra pu ru ShA na bA pa nr-i pa teHpu raM/ /ta mU tsa de ba ka n+ye yaM prap+tA bi ni ma yAt+ma yA/ /pr-i tri haM twa su to h+ya s+yA ni mit+ta dz+nye na mUtsi taH/ /tasmA de Sha na ra pa te ma hi ShI na ta bo tsi tA/ /twa yi
<p>179a.4</p>pa'i/ /skyes bu dpa' rnams des bcom nas/ /mi yi bdag po'i grong khyer phyin/ /de la des smras mdzes ma 'di/ /bdag gi bsam pa min pa thob/ /'di yi bu yis pha gsod ces/ /gang phyir mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras/ /de slad mi yi bdag po ni/ /khyod kyi btsun mor 'os pa min/ /khyod ni 'tsho
<p>179a.5</p>dzI ba ti dzI ban+ti pra dzA nAM sar+b+ba saM pa daH/ /i t+yuk+taste na tAM dr-iSh+TA t+yak+tu nai ba sha shA ka saH/ /ni rud+d+ha kar+m+ma na h+ye ba tan+mu khA le khya le kha yA/ /so ba da ta kwa ka dA dr-iSh+TaHpu tre Na ni ha taHpi tA/ /swa yaM ma yA b+hi Shik+ta byaHsu to
<p>179a.6</p>na skye rgu yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'tsho/ /de yis 'di brjod tshe na des/ /de mthong gtang bar yongs ma nus/ /de gdong la bris ri mo yis/ /las kyi slad nyid bcings pa bzhin/ /de yis smras pa bu yi pha/ /gsod pa gang du gang tshe mthong / /gal te bu ni byung gyur na/ /rang nyid bdag gis
<p>179b</p>
<p>179b.1</p>ya di b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /i t+yuk+t+wa nr-i pa tiHka n+yAM sa ri NI yA b+ha bta mu khI/ /kr-i taHkar+m+mormi ni rmA NaiHpra b+ha ban+ti na bud+d+ha yaH/ /b+ho gi nasta s+ya kA le na ta s+yAM su nu ra dza ya ta/ /dz+yo tiSh+ka tsa ri te ya s+ya br-it+taM muk+ta pi tr-i dru haH/ /ta po
<p>179b.2</p>dbang bskur bya/ /de skad brjod nas mi yi bdag /mdzes ma len la dga' bar gyur/ /las kyi rlabs kyis sprul pa yis/ /phrogs pa'i blo la mthu yod min/ /dus kyis longs spyod ldan pa de'i/ /bu ni de las skyes gyur te/ /gang gi spyod tshul brtsis pa yis/ /pha ni gsod par brjod gyur pa'o/ /dka'
<p>179b.3</p>pa na mr-i ga g+hA na mr-i ga ya bya sa ne ba ne/ /e baM bi d+ho h+ya b+hUt+ta s+ya mu ni sha paHsu tA kr-i tiH/ /a trAn+ta re ma hAn+na ma bai sha li ka ga NA gra NIH/ /ka n+ya mA mra pa nA ta prA pa ka da lI skan+d+ha bi nirga tAM/ /sA ta s+ya b+ha ba
<p>179b.4</p>thub nags kyi ri dgas rnams/ /bsad phyir nags su rngon la zhen/ /de la thub pa'i dmod pa ni/ /bu yi dbyibs can 'di ltar gyur/ /skabs der chen po zhes bya ba/ /yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi gtsos/ /a mra'i nags las chu shing gi /sdong po las 'khrungs mdzes ma thob/ /de yi khyim du
<p>179b.5</p>nekAn+tA bar+d+ha mA nA sha naiHsha naiH/ /bi da d+he bi pu lAM prI tiM da na tsin+taM tsa tse ta si/ /pra Na yA dA mra pA lI ti ban+d+hu b+hiHsA kr-i tA bi d+hA/ /su Nu hI na mi ba d+yak+t+wa ba l+ya yau ba na ma da de/ /tad+bi ba hod+Ya ta s+yA tha
<p>179b.6</p>mdzes ma de/ /dal bu dal bus bskyed bsrings te/ /dga' ba che dang sbyin pa yi/ /bsam pa yis kyang sems ma bzung / /gnyan gyi mdza' las de yi ming / /a mra skyong ma zhes su btags/ /bu mo dman pa bzhin btang nas/ /lang tsho dag ni bzung bar gyur/ /de nas de gtong brtson pa'i pha/ /
<p>180a</p>
<p>180a.1</p>na se he tat+pi turga NaH/ /ga No pa b+ho gyA ka n+ye ti sa ma ya s+ya bya ti kra maM/ /pi ta raM duHkha san+tap+taM pa me t+ya tha dza gA da sA/ /b+ha bA mi ga Na b+ho gyai ba kin+t+we Sha sa ma yo ya di/ /e ka s+yo pa ri
<p>180a.2</p>mdzes ma tshogs kyi nyer spyad bya/ /zhes pa'i dam tshig 'das gyur pa/ /tshogs pa dag gis bzod ma gyur/ /de nas sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i/ /phal btud nas des smras pa/ /bdag ni tshogs kyi spyad bya nyid/ /gal te 'on kyang dam tshig 'di/ /gcig gi steng du gzhan
<p>180a.3</p>nA n+ya s+ya pra be shaHswaM pa des+thi tiH/ /pa NaHkAR+ShA pa Na sha taiHpany+tsa b+hiHpra t+ya ha ma ma/ /sap+tA he nai ba bi tsa yaHkAR+Yo be sh+ma ni nA n+ya dA/ /i t+yasmin sa ma ye ba d+h+yaHsar+b+ba s+yai ba bya ti kra mI/ /i ti tata sa ma yaM dz+nyA twA tat+pi turba tsa sa ga NaH/ /
<p>180a.4</p>dag ni/ /mi 'jug rang gi gnas su sdod/ /nyi ma re la bdag gi zong / /kaR+Sha pa Ni brgya phrag lnga/ /zhag bdun dag ni khyim dag ni/ /rnam par blta bya gzhan du min/ /zhes pa'i dam tshig 'di 'das na/ /kun gyi spyad bya nyid 'gyur pa'o/ /zhes pa de yis dam tshig dag /shes nas de yi phas smras pa/ /
<p>180a.5</p>a ka ro da bA D+ha mi t+yuk+t+wAdr-i D+hI nish+tsa ya ma da rAta/ /ta taHsa rat+na b+ha ba ne ba rA b+ha ra Na b+hU Shi ta/ /he ma harmya sa nA rU D+hA di de sha di na tsan+d+raM kAM/ /ta taHpA Ni kr-i taHkA mI yo yastAM sa mu pA ya yau/ /ta s+ya ta s+yA b+ha
<p>180a.6</p>tshogs kyis rung zhes smras nas ni/ /gus pas nges pa brtan po byas/ /de nas rin cen khang par de/ /mchog gi rgyan gyis rab brgyan cing / /gser gyi ba gam khri stan la/ /'dzegs nas nyin par zla 'od byas/ /de nas 'dod ldan gang gang gis/ /zong byin de can nye bar song / /de dang de yi gzi brjid
<p>180b</p>
<p>180b.1</p>bat+ta s+yaHpra b+ha be nau dzesaHk+Sha yaH/ /draSh+Tu me ba na she ku ste kim+pu naHspraSh+Tu mA ku lAH/ /b+hu dzaM ga b+ho ga saM rud+d+hAM tAM tsan+da na la ta mi ba/ /ta taHsa pun+da rI b+he dze yau ba na s+ya bi yau ba ni/ /gu ru na sta na b+hA re Na ma d+h+ya b+haM ga b+ha ya
<p>180b.2</p>ni/ /de yi mthu yis rab tu nyams/ /blta ba nyid du'ang mi nus na/ /reg pas 'khrugs pa slar yang ci/ /de ni tsan dan 'khri shing dag /lag 'gros longs spyod bgags pa bzhin/ /de nas mdzes ma de yis ni/ /nu ma rgyas pa'i khur dag gis/ /rked 'khyog 'jigs pa rab ster ba/ /lang tsho yi yang
<p>180b.3</p>pra daM/ /sma ra saM b+ho ga ra hi taM tat+ta s+yA rU pa mar+b+hu taM/ /shwa b+h+ra he ma la tA puSh+pa mi ba niSh+pha la tAM ya yau/ /kau tu kA shA bi no dA la nA nA de shAn+ta rA ga taiH/ /a kA rats+tsi tra ka rer+b+hU pa la pra ti ma
<p>180b.4</p>lang tsho bsten/ /de yi gzugs ni rmad byung de/ /'dod chags rdzogs shing longs spyod bral/ /g.yang pa'i gser gyi 'khri shing gi /me tog bzhin du 'bras med gyur/ /ltad mo'i bsam pas rtsed mo'i slad/ /tha dad yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i/ /ri mo mkhan gyis sa skyong gi /gzugs ni de yi khang
<p>180b.5</p>gr-i he/ /b+hi d+ha ya tsi tra li khi tAn pA kra me Na na re shwa rAn/ /da daR+sha bim+bi sA ra s+ya dr-iSh+TaM ra ti pa te ri ba/ /ta mA lo kyai ba sa ha sA sa mud+b+hU ta ma no b+ha bA/ /sa ye na li khi tasta tra taM pa prats+tsha ku ru ha
<p>180b.6</p>par bris/ /mi dbang rnams ni ri mo la/ /bris shing bltas pas rim gyis de/ /gzugs can snying po'i gzugs dag ni/ /dga' ma'i bdag po bzhin du mthong / /de mthong nyid na 'phral la ni/ /'dod chags yang dag langs par gyur/ /gang zhig de ni bris de la/ /der ni dge mtshan dag las
<p>181a</p>
<p>181a.1</p>lAta/ /ko yaM sa khe sri ti la tA mA d+ha bo ba su d+hA ba tsaH/ /prI NA ti lo tsa ne ya s+ya su d+hA pa ri tsi tA ru tsiH/ /d+ha n+yA kA nA ma b+hU b+hartu ra s+ya pra Na ya b+ha gi nI/ /lak+Sh+m+yaHsau b+hA gya dzaM garba
<p>181a.2</p>dris/ /gang gi mdzes sdug bdud rtsi yis/ /yongs rgyas mig gi dga' bskyed pa/ /dga' ma dag gi 'khri shing dpyid/ /grogs po sa bdag 'di ni su/ /gang gi dpal mo lha mo'i yang / /skal bzang las skyes dregs 'joms pa/ /sa bdag 'di yi mdza' gcugs kyi/ /
<p>181a.3</p>mur+b+ba sha hr-i taM ya yA/ /i ti pr-iSh+Tasta yA swai ra tA mU tse tsi tra ko bi daH/ /b+hU pa tirbim+ba sa ro yaM sA raM su kr-i ta saM ba dAM/ /sauR+ya ru pa tu lA ro he de bAHke nA ka nA ya kaH/ /shaM ke ka ro ti nai bA s+ya man+ma
<p>181a.4</p>skal ldan bsod nams ldan pa su/ /de yis dris la dal bur ni/ /ri mo mkhas pas de la smras/ /legs byas phun tshogs snying po 'di/ /sa bdag gzugs can snying po yi/ /rtul phod gzugs ni srang gzhal ba/ /mtho ris 'dren pa'i lha su yis/ /'di las yid srubs dag kyang ni/ /re ba
<p>181a.5</p>tho ba ma no ra thaM/ /i t+yuk+te te napA ta s+tho b+hU pA la n+yasta lo tsa nA/ /sa ha sai bA b+hi lA She Na na bi nA b+hI mu khI kr-i ta/ /a tran+ta re bim+bi sA raHswai ra besh+ma ni nirdza ne/ /ka thAn+te go pa ma ba data kiM tsita smi ta si
<p>181a.6</p>med pa nyid du dgos/ /de yis de skad brjod tshe de/ /mngon par 'dod pa gsar pa yis/ /'phral nyid mngon du phyogs byas te/ /sa skyong la ni mig gtad nas/ /skabs der gzugs can snying po yis/ /mi med khang par dal bus ni/ /gtam gyi mjug tu sa 'tsho la/ /cung zad 'dzum dkar
<p>181b</p>
<p>181b.1</p>tA d+ha raH/ /shru ya tAM yan+ma ma sa khe kiny+tsim+man si bar+t+ta te/ /ni R+Yan+t+ra mi ta swats+tshan+da bA daHko bi su d+hA ra saH/ /bai sha le kairbI ra rau ho ga NaiHpa d+hA ra Ni kr-i tA/ /raM b+ho rUM shru ya te kAn+tAM raM b+ha gar+b+ha sa mud+b+ha
<p>181b.2</p>mchu yis smras/ /grogs po cung zad bdag gi ni/ /yid la gang zhig rgyu ba nyon/ /ma bsdams grogs po rang dbang du/ /smra ba ci yang bdud rtsi'i ro/ /yangs pa can pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /thun mong du byas bud med mchog /mdzes ma byin pa chu shing 'dri/ /chu shing nang nas byung bar
<p>181b.3</p>bAM/ /ta ta pra b+ha ba bi naSh+Ta she ste dza swi pra Na yo tsi tA/ /sA tairna dU Shi tA d+ya pi mA taM gai ri ba pad+mi ni/ /shra ba NA de ba sA nan+da ma paR+Ya Shi ta kau tu kaM /na ka ro ti ma naHka s+ya tata s+t+rI rat+na ma yo ni dzaM/ /a b+hi la Shi ma
<p>181b.4</p>thos/ /gzi ldan snying sdug du 'os des/ /de mthus re nyams de dag gis/ /da lta yang ni su ma phyin/ /pad+ma ldan pa glang pos bzhin/ /bud med rin cen skye gnas las/ /ma skyes pa de thos nyid las/ /yid ni kun dgar bcas pa yis/ /dge mtshan mi gzhan su mi byed/ /bdag gi mig dang
<p>181b.5</p>nasta s+yAM dza taM me sa ha tsak+Shu ShA/ /tad gu Na shru ti d+ha n+yA ya shro trA ya spr-i ha yA mya haM/ /i t+yuk+te b+hU mi pa ti nA go pasta pra d+ya b+ha Sha ta/ /b+hU dza ga ga Na saM rud+d+haHsa rA dza na mAn+ma tho ni d+hiH/ /a t+yalpas+kha li taM pra s+ya duH
<p>181b.6</p>lhan cig tu/ /yid ni de la mngon par chags/ /de yi yon tan thos pa yi/ /skal ldan rna bar bdag dga' 'o/ /sa yi bdag pos 'di brjod tshe/ /sa 'tshos de la lan smras pa/ /rgyal po 'dod chags gter de ni/ /lag 'gro'i tshogs kyis yang dag bkag /shin tu chung ba 'khrul gyur na/ /
<p>182a</p>
<p>182a.1</p>sa hA pa ta durga maH/ /e Sha te bi Sha maHpan+tha daR+shi to bi Sha me Shu Na/ /la b+ha tai sA nirgan+tuM na yuk+taM ga ma naM tsa te/ /ki masmin bi ra to pA ye bai dA myu b+ha ya saM sha ye/ /i t+yuk+taste na nr-i pa
<p>182a.2</p>bzod dka'i g.yang sa ngan par 'gro/ /mi bzad lam 'di khyod la ni/ /mi bzad mda' chen dag gis bstan/ /de ni blang du 'thob pa min/ /khyod kyang 'gro bar 'os pa min/ /gnyis ka the tshom thabs dang bral/ /'di la bdag ni ci zhig smra/ /de yis de brjod mi bdag gis/ /
<p>182a.3</p>tirnot+kaN+Tha gra ma t+ya dza ta/ /bi dwAM so s+yu tsi tAM ni tAM na sma ran+ti sma rA tu rAH/ /bai sha li ka pu rIM ga to go pe na sa hi to tha paH/ /pra bi be shA n+ya pe she na man+di ra ha ri Ni dr-i shaH/ /pA tsi tra daR+sha ne nai ba dr-iSh+T+wA pa ri
<p>182a.4</p>'dod pa'i gdon ni ma gtang ste/ /'dod pas gzir na rigs pa'i lugs/ /mkhas pa rnams kyang mi dran no/ /de nas sa 'tsho lhan cig de/ /grong khyer yangs pa can song nas/ /ri dwags mig can khang par ni/ /chas gzhan dag gis rab tu zhugs/ /ri mo mthong ba nyid kyis ni/ /mig dag
<p>182a.5</p>tsi ti dr-i shoH/ /na ra nA thaM sa bai lak+Sh+m+yA shA lak+Sha NaM k+Shi ti mai k+Sha ta/ /ladz+dzA ni rut+ta re ta s+yeHkam+pa bya ti ka re pa raM/ /ra Nan+tA+e ra pa nA tsa kre swa ga taM nr-i pa ti ri ba/ /bi lo kya d+ha n+ya tA mA nI tra twa tsi tre ni dzi ba
<p>182a.6</p>yongs 'dris mi yi mgon/ /de yis mthong nas skad cig ni/ /skyengs pa dang bcas sa la bltas/ /ngo tshas lan dang bral ba de/ /'dar bas rab tu bskyod pa yis/ /dril chung sgra ldan mi bdag la/ /legs par 'ongs sam 'dri ba bzhin/ /der ni rang lus ri mo la/ /skal bzang mthong nas khengs ldan
<p>182b</p>
<p>182b.1</p>suH/ /tI lA ba N+ya na dIM rA dzA na ya nAM dza li nA pa pau/ /ladz+dzA be sha na sun+daR+Y+Ya mA b+hi dzA t+ye na b+hU pa tau/ /A pad+d+ha mau na yauHk+Shi praM go pastAM smi to ba data/ /a yaM te tsi tra lI khi tA kA ra d+h+ya na baHd+hA nata/
<p>182b.2</p>pa'i/ /rgyal pos de yi mdzes sdug gi / chu rgyun 'dren byed snyim pas 'thungs/ /ngo tsha 'bebs pas mdzes ma dang / /mngon par mtho bas sa yi bdag /smra ba gcad las sa 'tsho yis/ /'dzum pas myur bar de la smras/ /lha 'di'i rnam pa ri mor bris/ /bsam gtan nges par brjod pa las/ /
