<p>182b.3</p>byak+ti b+hak+ti bi sha She Na de baHpra t+ya k+Sha tAM ga taH/ /twa yA twa yaM li khi tash+tsi tre twa ma ne na tu tse ta si/ /na dzA ne yu ba yoHko nu pra yA ta pre ma du ta tAM/ /i t+yA di b+hiHka thA ban+d+haiHpa ri pUr+Na pra mo da yoH/ /yad
<p>182b.4</p>khyod kyi gus pa'i khyad par gyis/ /mngon sum nyid du gsal bar gyur/ /khyod kyis 'di ni ri mo la/ /bris shing 'dis kyang sems la khyod/ /khyed gnyis mdza' ba'i pho nyar ni/ /su zhig rab song ngas mi shes/ /zhes sogs gtam gyi skyor ba yis/ /rab dga' yongs rdzogs de dag gis/ /gang
<p>182b.5</p>ya ta sma rA diSh+TaM tat+ta dA sra da tAM ga taM/ /g+haN+Ta ra bA ku le lo ke rA dza pra ts+tshan+na kA mu kaH/ /sap+ta rA tra mA nA lo kye tas+thau tad b+ha ba ne ra haH/ /la te ba puSh+pi tA kA le ta smAd+gar+b+ha ma bA s+ya sA/ /tsa kre
<p>182b.6</p>gang 'dod chags kyis bstan pa/ /de de nyams su myong bar gyur/ /dril sgras 'jig rten dogs pa skyes/ /rgyal po 'dod ldan rab bsgribs pa/ /lta bar mi 'os de yi khyim/ /dben par zhag bdun gnas par gyur/ /'khri shing me tog ldan pa bzhin/ /dus su de las mngal thob des/ /ngo tshas dman
<p>183a</p>
<p>183a.1</p>bi di ta br-it+tAn+taM taM ladz+dzA ba na tA sha naiH/ /A san+ne besh+ma bai tsa ye da twAsmai nr-i pa tiR+Ya yau/ /b+hA bi pu tra pa ri dz+nyA na pra t+ya ya daM gu lI ya ka /yA te b+hA sota ba pu Shi nr-i pa tau sam+ma te lo tsa nA nAM sa d+yaHpro d+yad+bi ra
<p>183a.2</p>zhing dal bu yis/ /de la spyod mtha' rig par byas/ /khyim ni spyod la nye ba na/ /byung na bu ni yongs shes pa'i/ /yid ches slad du sor gdub dag /de la byin nas mi bdag song / /mi bdag 'od ldan lus can mi rnams dag gis bkur ba gshegs gyur tshe/ /'phral la rab skyes
<p>183a.3</p>ha ti mi nak+ti ba mI lan+mu khA b+dza/ /sA b+huta sA yan+ta na ta nu ta rA pA ra bA tA b+hi b+hU tA sa shrots+tsha sa bya ti ka rA ba tI haR+Sha hI nAk+ti nI ba/ /ka po laM pA Ni ta le na saM kalpe na ma hI pa tiM/ /na baM tA na
<p>183a.4</p>'bral ba'i rab rib kyis gtibs bzhin gyi pad+ma zum/ /srod la char dang 'jam pa'i rlung gi zil gyis mnan pa'i pad ldan bzhin/ /mchi ma dang bcas shugs rings rab ldan de ni dga' ba dman par gyur/ /lag pa'i stan gyis 'gram pa dang / /brtag pa yis ni sa bdag dang / /lus kyi gsar
<p>183a.5</p>ra maM ge na ba han+tI ni mi mI la sA/ /ta taHkA le na ka l+yA NIpra ti bim+po pa maM pi tuH/ /a dzI dza nata sA ta na yaM bi na yaM sA d+hu d+hI ri ba/ /bar+d+ha mA ne sha nai stasmin kA le bim+ba i ban+de be/ /bim+bi sA ra s+ya pu
<p>183a.6</p>du nyam chung nyid/ /'dzin cing de ni nges par dman/ /de nas dus kyis dge ldan ma/ /de las bu ni btsas gyur te/ /pha yi gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs/ /legs pa'i blo bzhin rnam dul ba'o/ /de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /rim gyis bskyed par gyur pa'i tshe/ /'di ni gzugs can snying
<p>183b</p>
<p>183b.1</p>tro ya mi ti lo keShu pa pra the/ /a pa bA da pa raistai stai staM yA t+ya nu tsi te raR+Ya dA/ /ba d+han+te shi sha baHkrI DA bra saM ge \u0f85 maR+Sha paM ya tAH/ /ta taHsA pre Sha yA mA sa pu traM bi d+yArdza no tsi taM/ /ba Ni ka sAr+the na ma ha tAM bAM
<p>183b.2</p>po yi/ /bu zhes 'jig rten rnams su grags/ /gang tshe rigs la mi 'os pa'i/ /ngan smras mda' ni de de yi/ /rtsed grogs byis pa khro ba dang / /ldan pa rnams kyis smad pa'i tshe/ /de nas rig pa bsgrub 'os bu/ /sor gdub dang bcas pha yi ni/ /gnas su tshong pa'i tshogs chen la/ /de yis
<p>183b.3</p>gu li yaM pi tuHpa daM/ /bim+bi sA ro bi saM prA s+ya sa dr-i shA kA ra mAt+madzaM/ /haR+Shad+baSh+paHpa ri Sh+wa dz+ya tsa kre ta s+ya b+ha yA bi d+haM/ /br-it+tAn+te bi shru te tasmin+nA mra pA l+yAHsa kau tu kaiH/ /b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn pr-iSh+Tastat+ka
<p>183b.4</p>rab tu springs par gyur/ /gzugs can snying po dag gis kyang / /dbyibs mtshungs bu ni yang dag thob/ /yongs 'khyud dga' ba'i mchi ma yis/ /de ni 'jigs med rnam par bsgrubs/ /a mra skyong ma'i spyod mtha' de/ /thos nas dge mtshan ldan pa yi/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das/ /
<p>183b.5</p>thA ma ba dadz+dzi naH/ /pu re DA dza gr-i he rA dza bal+la b+hod+YA na kA na ne/ /ba b+hu ba mA la tI nA ma pUr+b+ba mud+YU na pA li kA/ /sA ka dA tsit+p+ra sA dAr+d+raM pu raHprap+taM ya dr-its+tsha yA/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+haM rA dzAr+hesh+tsu
<p>183b.6</p>rgyal bas de yi gtam rgyud gsungs/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo'i skyed tshal gyi/ /nags su skyed tshal bsrung ba sngon/ /'phreng ba can zhes bya bar gyur/ /dang bas brlan pa'i rang sangs rgyas/ /nam zhig 'dod dgar mdun du 'ongs/ /rgyal po la 'os tsu ta yi/ /me tog
<p>184a</p>
<p>184a.1</p>ta puSh+pai ra pU dza yata/ /a yo ni dza nr-i pa s+ya haM pat+ni s+yA mi ti ta tra sA/ /pra Ni d+hA na pu rash+tsa kre ta s+ya tsit+ta pra sA di nI/ /pu N+ya puSh+pa pha la b+ho ga shA li nI sai ba di bya ta nu rA mra pA li kA/ /it+yu
<p>184a.2</p>rnams kyis de la mchod/ /der ni skye gnas las ma skyes/ /mi bdag btsun mor bdag gyur ces/ /sems ni rab tu dang ldan des/ /de yi mdun du smon lam btab/ /bsod nams me tog 'bras bu'i longs spyod ldan/ /de nyid mchog gi lus ldan a mra skyong / /de
<p>184a.3</p>dA ra tsa ri tA ni ga mya te b+hi k+Sha baHsa b+ha pi bisma yo ya yuH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi rA tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twa ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM mA mra pA l+yA ba dA na me ka bid+sha ti ta maHbal+la waH// //
<p>184a.4</p>skad rgya che'i spyod tshul thos gyur nas/ /dge slong de dag mdun sar ya mtshan gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las a mra skyong ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //
<p>184a.5</p>dr-iSh+TaM muSh+Ti ni biSh+Ta pA ra da ka NA kA ra na rA Nan+d+ha na d+ha n+ya sau ya sha sA sa hA k+Sha ya pa de yad+Ya s+ya bi d+yota te/ /dI nA nA tha ga Nod+ba No pa ka ra NI b+hU ta pra b+hU ta shri yaHpu N+yA rA ma
<p>184a.6</p>mi rnams nor ni dngul chu'i thigs pa khu tshur dag gis bsdams pa'i rnam par mthong / /dbul dang mgon med rnams la ster zhing nye bar mkho bar gyur pa rab tu rgyas pa'i dpal/ /bsod nams dga' tshal gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bcom ldan sku gzugs rab gnas la sogs
<p>184b</p>
<p>184b.1</p>bi hA ra tsai t+ya b+ha ga bid+bam+ba pra tiSh+ThA di b+hiH/ /shri mAn ba b+hU ba shrA bas+t+yaM dat+to nA ma gr-i ha d+hi paH/ /su tasta s+ya su dat+to b+hU dA ka raHpu N+ya sam+pa dAM/ /sa ba la e ba laM kA ra ya tsa ke b+h+yaHsa dA
<p>184b.2</p>kyis/ /nor ldan 'di ni grags pas lhan cig mi bzad gnas su gang zhig gang gi rnam par mdzes/ /dpal ldan mnyan du yod par ni/ /khyim bdag sbyin pa zhes pa byung / /de yi bu ni rab sbyin dag /bsod nams phun tshogs 'byung gnas gyur/ /de ni byis ba nyid na rgyan/ /slong pa rnams la rtag
<p>184b.3</p>da dau/ /prag+dzan+ma bA sa nA b+h+ya saHka s+ya ke na ni bAR+Y+Ya te/ /ni t+ya mA b+ha ra Na t+yA gAta pa raM pi trA ni bA ri taH/ /na dI pa mud+d+hatA n+yasmai sa de bA nA n+ya daR+sha yata/ /ni d+hi daR+shi sa sarba tra bi ta ri ti di baM ga te/ /dI nA nA
<p>184b.4</p>tu ster/ /skye ba sngar goms bag chags ni/ /su yi gang gis bzlog par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rgyan rnams ster ba las/ /pha yis mchog tu bzlog pa na/ /klung las gter ni yang dag blangs/ /de la rab tu bstan par gyur/ /pha ni mtho ris song ba'i tshe/ /kun tu gter ni mthong ba des/ /dbul dang mgon
<p>184b.5</p>tha pra dA ne na ba b+hU bA nA tha piN+Da daH/ /kr-i ta dA naHsa kA le na pu tra bAn pu tra bat+pa laH/ /a b+hUt+pu tra bi bA hAr+thi ka n+ya n+we Sha Na yat+nabAn/ /ka n+ya kA yA tsi tuM kAM tsita pu raM rA dza gr-i haM ta taH/ /ma d+hu skan+d+hA b+hi d+haM dAk+Sha d+ha
<p>184b.6</p>med la byin pas/ /mgon med zas sbyin zhes par gyur/ /dus kyis sbyin pa byas pa des/ /bu ldan bu la mnyes gshin pas/ /bu yi khyim thab don gnyer zhing / /mdzes ma 'bad pas 'tshol bar gyur/ /de nas bram ze sbrang rtsi yi/ /phung po zhes pa mkhas pa la/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu ni/ /
<p>185a</p>
<p>185a.1</p>h+ma Na bi ba sar dza saH/ /A sA d+ya ma ga d+hAn rA dza gr-i ha na ga ra me t+ya paH/ /ma ha d+ha naM gr-i ha pa ti ya yA tsa ka n+ya kAM dwi dzaH/ /a nA tha piN+Da don ma shrA bas+t+ya mas+t+yi bi shru taH/ /tat+pu tra ya su dzA ta yaka
<p>185a.2</p>mdzes ma dga' zhig slong du btang / /de yis ma ga d+har phyin nas/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong song ste/ /khyim bdag nor ni chen po la/ /mdzes ma mchog ni bram zes bslangs/ /mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba/ /mnyan yod na yod grags ldan de'i/ /bu ni legs par skyes pa la/ /
<p>185a.3</p>n+yAM de hI t+yu bA tsa saH/ /so bra bId+de sha sam+ban+d+haHpa ra masmAta ku lo tsi taH/ /baM shesmA kaM tu ka n+yA nAM shulka mA dI ya te ma hata/ /sha taM sha taM ra thA grA NAM ga dzA shwash+tsa tu ra s+ya tsa/ /dA sI nI tsa pa ni skA nAM dI ya tAM ya di shakya te/ /
<p>185a.4</p>mdzes ma byin zhes de yis smras/ /de smras yul dang 'brel ba dag /mchog tu nged kyi rigs la 'os/ /nged kyi brgyud kyi bu mo rnams/ /rin ni shin tu che ba ste/ /shing rta mchog ni brgya phrag dang / /glang po rta dang 'bangs mo dang / /gsar srang rnams ni bzhi phrag brgya/ /gal te nus na sbyin par gyis/ /
<p>185a.5</p>i t+yuk+te te na taM bi praHsa smin taHpra bya b+ha Sha ta/ /a nAtha piN+Da da gr-i he dA s+ye s+ye ta dalpa kaM/ /brA h+ma Ne nA khi la ta smin ka n+yA shulke pra ti shu te/ /tamA da rAta gr-i ha pa tir+b+ho dza nA ya n+ya maM tra ya ta/ /sa b+huk+t+wA
<p>185a.6</p>de yis de skad brjod de la/ /bram zes 'dzum zhing lan smras pa/ /de dag mgon med zas sbyin gyi/ /khyim gyi 'bangs kyi yin yang chung / /bram zes bu mo'i rin rnams ni/ /ma lus kha yis blangs pa'i tshe/ /khyim bdag gis ni gus pa yis/ /de ni zas la mgron du gnyer/ /der ni de yis
<p>185b</p>
<p>185b.1</p>bi bi d+haM ta tra b+hak+Sh+ya b+ho dz+ya ma yan+t+ri taH/ /ra trau bi shU tsi kA kran+tash+tsu kro sha bi pu laM bya thaH/ /ye klin+na sh+nan+ti lau l+ye na ni shi ni drA su khA ba haM/ /dzan+ma karma ka thaM pa ra lo ka su khA ya te/ /ta t+yA dza shu tsi
<p>185b.2</p>ma bsdams par/ /bza' ba bca' ba rnam mang zos/ /mtshan mo ma zhu'i nad kyis btab/ /gdung ba chen po'i cho nge bton/ /gang zhig sred pas 'ju min zos/ /mtshan mo gnyid kyi bde min 'dzin/ /'jig rten gzhan du bde slad de/ /skye ba'i las ni ji ltar byed/ /mi gtsang bas 'jigs
<p>185b.3</p>b+hI t+yA taM gr-i hA ta pa ri dza no ba hiM/ /Asba daM nai ra pek+Sh+ya s+ya dza t+yA dA sa dza naHsha ThaH/ /shu b+he na karma NA ta s+ya saM prastaste na bar+t+ma nA/ /sa maud+ga l+yA ya na\u0f85sha ri pu traHka ru N+ya pe sha laH/ /taM baM sha mi da lA greN
<p>185b.4</p>khang pa las/ /de ni phyi ru 'bangs kyis dor/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis ma rabs rnams/ /g.yo ldan ltos pa med pa'i gnas/ /de yi dge ba'i las dag gis/ /snying rjes gnyen pa shA ri'i bu/ /mau gal bu dang 'grogs nas ni/ /lam de nyid nas yang dag 'ongs/ /de dag gis ni dal bus de/ /
<p>185b.5</p>nirli khya pi ta yA mr-i dA/ /pra k+ShA l+ya d+har+m+ma mA de sh+ya tau ta s+ya ya ya tuHsha naiH/ /so pi tsit+taM ta yo ra gre pra sA d+ya t+yak+ta bi gra haH/ /tsa turma hA rA dzi ke Shu de beShu sa ma dzA ya ta/ /ta tra bi shra ba NA de shA ta mar+t+ya lo
<p>185b.6</p>smyug ma'i rtse mo grol ba yis/ /phyis shing lan brgyar sa yis kyang / /bkrus te de la chos bstan song / /de dag mdun du de yang sems/ /rab tu dang bas lus btang nas/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi rigs kyi ni/ /lha yi nang du skyes par gyur/ /der ni rnam thos sras kyi bkas/ /mi yis
<p>186a</p>
<p>186a.1</p>ke ni ke ta ni/ /sa tsa kre shi bi dwA re pU dzA d+hiSh+ThA n+ma saM ni d+hiM/ /le kha bi dz+nyA ta sam+ban+d+ha nish+tsa yo tha ya tho daM taM/ /a nA tha piN+Da daHshu lka mA da ya swa ya mA ya yau/ /sa saM ban+d+hi gr-i haM prA s+ya da
<p>186a.2</p>'jig rten khang pa dang / /lha khang sgo ni mchod pa la/ /de yis lhag par nyer gnas byas/ /de nas 'brel pa nges pa ni/ /spring yig gis shes brjod pa bzhin/ /mgon med zas sbyin rang nyid ni/ /rin rnams khyer nas 'ongs par gyur/ /'brel pa'i khyim du phyin pa na/ /
<p>186a.3</p>daR+shA sh+tsaR+Ya kA ri NIM/ /shi khA rA kA ra rA dzAr+ha b+hak+Sh+ya saM b+ha ra sam+pa daM/ /sa bismA yAta gr-i ha pa tiM pa prats+tsha swats+tsha mA na saH/ /b+hU ri b+hok+Sh+yot+sa baHko ya ma pi rA dza ni man+t+ri taH/ /ba taM ba b+hA She b+ha ga bAn bud+d+ha
<p>186a.4</p>rgyal po la 'os zas kyi tshogs/ /phun tshogs ri yi rnam pa can/ /ngo mtshar bskyed pa de yis mthong / /khyim bdag la ni ya mtshan las/ /dri med yid ldan de yis dris/ /bza' ba rab mang bshams pa 'di/ /rgyal po mgron du gnyer ram ci/ /de yis der smras sangs rgyas ni/ /bcom
<p>186a.5</p>saM g+ha pa ri gra haH/ /ma yA ni man+t+ri taHsa d+h+ye po yaM ma ma ma hot+sa baH/ /i ti bud+d+ha b+hi d+ha ne na dz+nyA ta ro mAM tsa ka Na Tu kaH/ /in+du s+yan+di ri bAkIr+NaHsa ha se ba ba b+hU ba saH/ /a bi di ta pa ra mAr+the ka s+ya
<p>186a.6</p>ldan dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ /bdag gis bdag gi dga' chen ni/ /rang gi bsod nams la mgron gnyer/ /zhes pa sangs rgyas mtshan brjod pas/ /sku long gis ni rab rgyas te/ /'phral nyid zla ba'i khu ba yis/ /de ni yongs su bkang bzhin gyur/ /don dam rnam par rig min su zhig
<p>186b</p>
<p>186b.1</p>tsita nA ma mA tre s+phu ra ti sa ha dza b+hA baHko pi dzan+mA nu ban+d+haH/ /a b+hi na ba g+ha na nA de byak+ta haR+Sha b+hi lA ShaHspr-i sha ti la li ta nr-i t+tod+b+r-i t+ta br-i t+tiM ma yU raH/ /so ba dad+ba da nAM bo dza saM dzA tab+hi na tiH/ /
<p>186b.2</p>gi ni ming tsam las/ /gang yang skye bas bcings pa'i lhan skyes dngos po rab tu rgyas/ /rab gsal sprin gyi sgra la dga' zhing mngon 'dod gsar pa yis/ /rma bya rol sgeg gar dang 'phyar ba'i spyod la reg par byed/ /'od zer rab gsal bzhin ras kyi/ /pad+mo las skyes des smras pa/ /
<p>186b.3</p>ka e Sha b+ha ga bAn bud+d+haHkash+tsa saM g+ho b+hi d+hI ya te/ /i ti pr-iSh+To gr-i ha pa ti ste na pro bA tsa sa smi taH/ /a ho ba ta na dzA nI She shAstA raM b+hU ba na tra ye/ /saM sA ra pA sha b+hI tA nAM sha ra N+yaM sha ra Ne Shi
<p>186b.4</p>sangs rgyas bcom ldan zhes pa su/ /dge 'dun zhes ni su la brjod/ /de yis 'di dris khyim bdag gis/ /'dzum dang bcas pas rab smras pa/ /kye ma sa gsum dag gi ni/ /ston pa khyod kyis mi shes sam/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas 'jigs nas skyabs/ /'tshol ba'i skyabs
<p>186b.5</p>NAM/ /dzi naM yasta na dzA nA ti sa lo ke b-i tsi taHpa raM/ /kiM te na mo ha lI ne na bi pha li kr-i ta dzan+ma nA/ /a dz+nyA na sha ra No bA yi ba yo ye na bya yI kr-i taM/ /gaut+ta mo b+ha ga wAn bud+d+ha shAkya rA dza ku lod+b+ha
<p>186b.6</p>gyur rgyal ba de/ /'jig rten na ni su zhig gis/ /mi shes pa de mchog tu bslus/ /skyabs kyi thabs ni mi shes par/ /gang gis na tshod zad par byas/ /gti mug gis reg ske ba ni/ /'bras med byas pa de yis ci/ /go'u tam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya'i rgyal po'i
<p>187a</p>
<p>187a.1</p>baH/ /saM bud+d+he nut+ta rAM samyaka saM bo d+hi ma na ga ri kaH/ /pash+tsat+p+ra bra dzi tA nAM tsa ta s+yai bA nu grA hAHpa raM/ /b+hi k+ShU NAM ga ta rA gA NAM sa mu haHsaM g+ha u ts+ya te/ /sa e Sha bud+d+ha
<p>187a.2</p>rigs las 'khrungs/ /khyim spangs bla med byang chub tu/ /yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ /de yis mchog tu rjes bzung bas/ /phyi nas rab tu byung gyur pa/ /'dod chags bral ba'i dge slong gis/ /tshogs la dge 'dun zhes su brjod/ /sangs rgyas gtsor
<p>187a.3</p>pra mu khaHsaM g+haiHswa ku sha le bi NA/ /ma yA pu N+ya pa naM prA s+ya pra Na ye na ni maM tri taH/ /i ti tad ba tsa ne shru twa tata smr-i t+ya na tha piN+Da daH/ /bud+d+ha lam+ba na b+ha be na ni shi ni drAM sa mA ya yau/ /
<p>187a.4</p>byas dge 'dun ni/ /bsod nams zong gis rnyed gyur nas/ /rang gi dge ba'i 'tshol byed pa/ /bdag gi gus pas mgron du gnyer/ /de skad de yi tshig thos nas/ /mgon med zas sbyin de dran zhing / /sangs rgyas la dmigs bsgom pa yis/ /mtshan mo gnyid du yang dag song / /
<p>187a.5</p>ra dza n+yAM yA ma she ShA yAM sa mA kr-iSh+Ta i bot+su kaH/ /pra b+hA ta mi ti sa dz+nya twa pu ra dwA re Na niR+Ya yau/ /shi bi kA dwA ra mA sA d+ya pa saM prA s+ye ba de ba tAM/ /ma d+hu skan+d+he na ni diSh+TiM shre yaHsaM thA na mAp+ta bAn/ /b+ha
<p>187a.6</p>mtshan mo'i lhag ma'i thun la ni/ /'dod pas yang dag drangs pa bzhin/ /tho rangs zhes shes grong khyer gyi/ /sgo nas de ni phyi rol song / /sgo yi lha khang du phyin pas/ /de yi lha dang yang dag phrad/ /sbrang rtsi'i phung pos bstan pa yi/ /mchog gi lam ni thob par gyur/ /de nas de
<p>187b</p>
<p>187b.1</p>ga bAn+taM ta taHprA s+ya sa tr-iSh+NArta i bA mr-i taM/ /ba b+hU bA nu sa mA swAdaM pra mo dA mau dA nir+b+r-i taH/ /taM dr-iSh+NA sA da ra du rAtats+tshA yA ta ru mi bA d+h+wa gaH/ /a bA pa ga ta saM ta paHshAn+tiM bi shran+ti shI ta
<p>187b.2</p>yes bcom ldan thob/ /skom pas gdungs pas bdud rtsi bzhin/ /rab dga'i dri bzang bde ba yis/ /nyams su myong ba dpe med gyur/ /lam mgron skom pas gus bcas par/ /ring nas grib bsil ljon pa bzhin/ /zhi zhing ngal bsos bsil ba de/ /thob cing yongs su gdung ba
<p>187b.3</p>lAM/ /ta s+ya tad daR+sha ne nai ba le b+hi ga tAM ma naH/ /sha ra ta sa mA ga me ne ba g+ha na d+h+wAn+todz+dz+hi taMn b+haH/ /sa ko pi pu N+ya shI lA nA ma nu b+hA ba pra sA di nI/ /b+ha ban+ti yata pra sA de na nirbig+h+nash+tsit+ta br-it+ta
<p>187b.4</p>bral/ /de yi yid ni dri ma dang / /bral ba de mthong nyid kyis thob/ /nam mkha' ston dang phrad pa yis/ /sprin gyi tshogs dang bral ba bzhin/ /gang yang bsod nams ngang tshul dang / /bka' drin ldan pa'i mthu de ni/ /rang gi drin gyi sems kyis ni/ /spyod tshul bgegs med 'gyur pa
<p>187b.5</p>yaH/ /so tsin+ta ya da ho mo ha bi lInaHko s+ya la ma naH/ /a nuts+tshe da bi kA ro yaM dzA taHpra sha ma sam+pa daH/ /baM tsi to smi na yata pUrbaM dr-iSh+To yaM b+ha ga bAn ma yA/ /nA d+ha n+yAnA mi yaM yA ti mUr+t+ti lo tsa na gau
<p>187b.6</p>yin/ /de bsams kye ma bdag gi ni/ /yang dag rmongs pa 'di dang bral/ /rnam 'gyur 'di ni rjes su bcad/ /rab tu zhi ba phun tshogs skyes/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis sngon/ /gang zhig mthong bar ma gyur bslus/ /sku 'di skal ldan min pa yis/ /mig gi spyod tshul mi
<p>188a</p>
<p>188a.1</p>tsa raM/ /a mr-i ta ma hu ro dA rA dr-iSh+Dir+d+Yu tiHsha shi pe sha la ta ru Na ka ru Na yat+tA br-it+tiHpra sA da ma yI ma tiH/ /a ya ma ti sha yaHpra t+yA san+naHka ro ti bi rA ga tAM bi ga ta
<p>188a.2</p>'gyur ro/ /gzigs pa'i bcud kyi bdud rtsi yid 'ong rgya che'i ri bong can ltar nyams su bde/ /spyod tshul snying rje dar la bab pa'i dbang gyur rab tu dang ba'i rang bzhin blo/ /'khor ba dag ni med par dgyes kyang yongs su 'dzin cing rab tu nye bar gnas/ /phul du
<p>188a.3</p>ra dza sAM niHsaM sA raHpri yo pi pa ri gra haH/ /i ti tsit+ta pra sA de na tsit+ta yan+nu pa sr-i t+ya saH/ /bi da d+he ta s+ya sA nan+daHpA da pad+mA b+hi ban+da naM/ /b+ha ga bAn prAb+ti tata prAp+ti pra sA dA nan+da
<p>188a.4</p>byung ba 'di ni rdul bral rnams kyi chags pa nyid dang bral bar bgyid/ /ces bsams kun dga' ldan pa des/ /nye bar btud nas de yi ni/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag 'tshal ba/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis bsgrubs/ /der ni 'ongs la bcom ldan yang / /rab dang dgyes pa'i
<p>188a.5</p>lak+Sha Ni/ /u bA ha ba da nats+tshA yaM pUr+N+Na kA ru N+ya dU ti taM/ /dr-iSh+Ta mA shwA sa dza na nIM kA maM kA ma pi ta s+ya saH/ /bi sa sardzA dza lAM dzan+ma ra dzaHshud+d+h+yai su b+hA na dI/ /a thA s+ya b+ha ga bAn b+ha d+yeM bi da d+he
<p>188a.6</p>mtshan nyid can/ /snying rje rdzogs pa'i pho nya yis/ /bzhin ras mdzes pas bka' stsal pa/ /de yi dbugs 'byin skyed pa'i spyan/ /skye rdul dag slad bdud rtsi yi/ /chu bo rab 'bar ci yang ni/ /nges par de la rnam par spros/ /de nas de la bcom ldan gyis/ /'phags pa'i bden
<p>188b</p>
<p>188b.1</p>d+harma de sha nAM/ /tsa tur+NA mAR+ya sa t+yA nAM pra ti ba d+he b+hi d+ha yi nIM/ /sa shA sa na nAd byasta sa map+ta kle sha san+ti tiH/ /ni dzaM dza n+ma ni bi d+yasmai pra Na tasta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /a ti krAn+to smi b+ha ga bAn b+ha
<p>188b.2</p>pa bzhi po rnams/ /rab tu rtogs pa sgrub byed pa/ /legs ldan chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /ston pa'i bka' las nyon mongs kyi/ /rgyud ni mtha' dag zhig pa des/ /rang gi skye ba brjod byas nas/ /de la phyag 'tshal der gsol pa/ /bcom ldan bdag ni shin tu 'das/ /bcom
<p>188b.3</p>ga ban+taM sha ra NaM ga taH/ /bi pal+la bA sa nA b+h+yA saHsaM sA re na rA me pa raM/ /ka ro t+ya ku sha laM dU re shu b+ha mA shu pra sats+tsha ti/ /sU tsa ya t+yu tsi tA tsA raM ma ha tA ma ba lo ka naM/ /su khAr+haM te bi hA rA
<p>188b.4</p>ldan 'das la skyabs su song / /goms pa'i bag chags rnam par zhig /'khor bar mchog tu bdag mi dga'/ /chen po rnams kyis gzigs pa ni/ /mi dge ba dag ring du byed/ /dge ba myur bar rab tu ster/ /rigs pa'i spyod pa gsal bar byed/ /khyed ni bzhugs slad
<p>188b.5</p>ya bi hA ra ba ra mA dA rAta/ /rat+na sA ra pu ro dA raM swa pu re kA ra yA mya haM/ /ka ro tu ta tra b+ha ga bAn sa ta taM s+thi t+ya nu gra haM/ /d+ha n+yai rA sai bi to sma b+hiHsa paR+YA pa ri tsaR+Ya yA/ /
<p>188b.6</p>gus pa las/ /gtsug lag khang mchog bder 'os pa/ /yid 'ong rin chen snying po'i gnas/ /rang gi grong du bdag bgyid do/ /der ni skal ldan bdag cag gis/ /mchod dang rim gros bsten pa na/ /bcom ldan rtag tu bzhugs pa yis/ /rjes su bzung ba dag tu mdzod/ /
<p>189a</p>
<p>189a.1</p>i t+yar+tha nAM tA the t+ya s+ya b+ha ga bAn pra t+ya pa d+ya ta/ /pra Na yi prAr+tha nAM b+haM ga pra gal+b+hA na hi sA d+ha paH/ /b+ha ga ban+ta ma thA maM t+r+ya shra bstI sa pu rIM ya yau/ /tA dA dISh+Te na sa hi taHshA ri pu
<p>189a.2</p>ces pa'i don gnyer de bzhin zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gnang / /gang phyir dge ba gus pa yis/ /don gnyer 'joms la bstan pa min/ /de nas bcom ldan la zhus nas/ /de yi bka' yis dge slong ni/ /shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig tu/ /de ni mnyan yod
<p>189a.3</p>tre Na b+hik+Shu NA/ /ta tra dze ta ku mA re Na hi ra N+yar+g+he Na b+hu ya sA/ /dat+taM kA na na mA dA ya bi ha ra ma sU tra ya ta/ /b+hak+t+yut+sA hA da thA ram+b+ha kr-i ta sA hA ya kaHsu raiH/ /bi hA re tri di bA kA rA tsa kA rA
<p>189a.4</p>grong khyer song / /der ni rgyal byed gzhon nu yis/ /gser gyi rin ni chen po la/ /nags tshal byin pa blangs nas des/ /gtsug lag khang gi thig rnams btab/ /de nas mgon med zas sbyin ni/ /lha rnams dag gis grogs byas pas/ /mtho ris rnam pa'i gtsug lag khang / /gus
<p>189a.5</p>nA tha piN+Da daH/ /ta tradze taHku mA ro pi b+hak+t+ya b+ha ga bA taHpa raM/ /ya shaHpu N+ya pra tiSh+ThA yai bi da b+he dwA ka roSh+Tha kaM /a tha tIr+th+yAsta ma lo kya bi hA rA raM b+ha mad+b+hu taM/ /sA pa bA da bi
<p>189a.6</p>shing spro bas rab tu brtsigs/ /der ni rgyal byed gzhon nu yang / /mchog tu bcom ldan la gus pas/ /grags dang bsod nams bsgrub pa'i slad/ /sgo yi khang pa byas par gyur/ /de nas rmad byung gtsug lag khang / /de brtsams zhe sdang gis 'khrugs pa'i/ /mu stegs kyis mthong
<p>189b</p>
<p>189b.1</p>ba de na tsakre dwe ShA ku laHka liM/ /rak+tA k+Sha pra mu khaste ShAM mAt+saR+yAta k+Shu dra paN+Di taH/ /sa pak+Sha i ba kr-iSh+Na hish+tsa ki ta sa daH/ /rud+d+he bi hA ra saM b+hA re te na bA da dza yA ba d+hiH/ /a nA
<p>189b.2</p>smod byas shing / /'gal ba brjod pas rtsod pa byas/ /de dag gis gtso mig dmar ni/ /sbrul nag phyogs dang bcas pa bzhin/ /ngan mkhas dag gi phrag dog las/ /mdun sa dag ni 'jig par byas/ /de yis rtsod pa rgyal ba'i bar/ /gtsug lag khang gi tshogs bkag tshe/ /mgon
<p>189b.3</p>tha piN+Da da gi rA shA ri pu traHsa ma ya yau/ /rak+tA k+Sho tha ta mA hU ya pra b+hA bot+kaR+Sha daR+sha ne/ /in+d+ra dzA la ba lot+phul+laM sa ha kA ra ma daR+sha yata/ /shA ri pu tra b+hA bo t+thairbi pu laistu mu lA ni laiH/ /un+mI
<p>189b.4</p>med zas sbyin tshig dag gis/ /shA ri'i bu ni yang dag 'ongs/ /de nas mig dmar dag gi mthu/ /khyad 'phags bstan phyir de bos nas/ /mig 'phrul stobs kyis rab rgyas pa/ /sa ha ka ra'i ljon pa bstan/ /shA ri'i bu yi mthus bslangs pa'i/ /rlung stug chen po che ba yis/ /mu
<p>189b.5</p>la taHsha ka la tAM tir+th+yot+sA ha i bA pa saH/ /rak+tAk+Sha bi hi tAM kul+la ka ma lAM pad+mi nIM ta taH/ /paM ka she ShA dwi pash+tsa kre shA ri pu tra bi nirmi taH/ /rak+tA k+Sha dIk+Sha ni k+Ship+taHsap+tashIR+Sha mo ho ra
<p>189b.6</p>stegs byed kyi spro ba bzhin/ /rtsa nas 'thon zhing dum bur gyur/ /de nas mig dmar gyis sprul pa'i/ /me tog rgyas pa'i pad+mo can/ /shA ri'i bu yis rnam sprul pa'i/ /glang pos 'dam rdzab lhag mar byas/ /mig dmar stobs kyis bzhag pa yis/ /ltos 'gro chen po mgo bdun
<p>190a</p>
<p>190a.1</p>gaH/ /shA ri pu tre Na ni k+Ship+tastAr+k+Sha pak+ShA gra mA ru taiH/ /ta dA hU to tha be tA laHsha ri pu tre Na kI li taH/ /pre ri tau man+t+ra Na rak+tAk+ShaM han+tu mud+Ya yau/ /be tA lA b+hi ha tas+t+rA san na
<p>190a.2</p>pa/ /shA ri'i bu yis bya khyung gi/ /gshog pa'i rtse mo'i rlung gis 'phangs/ /de nas des bkug ro langs la/ /shA ri'i bu yi phur bus btab/ /sngags kyi brtson 'grus kyis bskul nas/ /mig dmar gsod du rab tu song / /ro langs kyis bcom skrag pa las/ /
<p>190a.3</p>sh+yan+mA na ma da dz+wa raH/ /sha ra NaM pA da pa ti taHshA ri pu traM dza gA ma saH/ /rak+tAk+Sha te na b+haM ge na sha ra N+yaM sha ra NaM ga taH/ /pra bra dz+yA yAM bI ta rA ga sa shud+d+hA bo d+hi mAp+ta bAn/ /tIr+th+yA s+t+wa n+ye pa ri dwe Sha kro d+ha
<p>190a.4</p>nga rgyal rgyags pa'i ri zhi nas/ /de ni zhabs la gtugs byas te/ /shA ri'i bu la skyabs su song / /bcom pa de yi mig dmar de/ /skyabs 'os dag la skyabs song nas/ /rab tu byung ba 'dod chags bral/ /dag pa'i byang chub thob par gyur/ /mu stegs gzhan rnams yongs sdang dang / /
<p>190a.5</p>pA ra ti tAR+sha baH/ /ta tra kar+m+maka ra byA dzA tas+thur+b+hik+Shu ba d+hod+Ya tAH/ /te tha d+harma bru haHkA le shA ri pu tre Na lak+Shi tAH/ /tad+d+r-iSh+Ti bA ta mA tre Na ba b+hU purmai tra mA na sAH/ /A sha yA nu sha ya d+hA tuM pra
<p>190a.6</p>khro ba'i pha rol bsgral 'dod pa/ /dge slong dag la gnod brtson zhing / /de na las byed zol gyis gnas/ /de nas de dag shA ri'i bus/ /dus su de las 'khu shes nas/ /de yi spyan zur tsam nyid kyis/ /yid ni byams dang ldan par gyur/ /khams dang bsam pa bag la nyal/ /rang bzhin
<p>190b</p>
<p>190b.1</p>kr-i tiM tsa bi tsA R+ya saH/ /d+harma de sha na yA te ShAM di de shA nut+ta raM da shAM/ /a tha ta s+ya bi hA ra s+ya nir+b+big+h+na raM b+ha karma Ni/ /a nA tha piN+Da daM prA ha shA ri pu traHsmi tA na naH/ /bi hA ra sU tra
<p>190b.2</p>dag kyang spyad nas de/ /chos ni bstan pas de dag rnams/ /bla med gnas skabs dag la bkod/ /de nas gtsug lag khang de'i las/ /brtsams pa bgegs dang bral ba'i tshe/ /'dzum pa'i bzhin ldan shA ri'i bus/ /mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ /gtsug lag khang gi thig
<p>190b.3</p>pA ta s+ya tu la e ba k+Sha Ne ma hAn/ /he mo bi hA raHsaM br-it+tastu Shi te de ba pad+ma ni/ /e ta dA kar+N+ya sa dzA ta pra sA da dwi gu Na da raH/ /he ma rat+na ba rA gA raM bi hA rA ma kA ra ya ta/ /bi b+ha bai
<p>190b.4</p>btab pa'i/ /dus mtshungs nyid du dga' ldan gyi/ /lha yi gnas su gser gyi ni/ /gtsug lag khang chen yang dag grub/ /de thos gus pa nyis 'gyur gyis/ /rab tu dang ba yang dag skyes/ /rin chen gser mchog khang pa yi/ /gtsug lag khang ni de yis byas/ /de nas bcom ldan
<p>190b.5</p>ra tha rA dzAr+hai pa thi te no pa kalpi taiH/ /bi dz+nyAp+ti s+t+ri dai baiHsAr+d+ha mA ya yau b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /ta dA ga ma nA haR+She Na pra san+ne b+hu ba na tra yai/ /a nA tha paN+Di dastasmai bA ri d+hA rA ma pA ta yata/ /ta smin ya dA na pra de she bA
<p>190b.6</p>rgyal ba la/ /gsol te lha dang lhan cig ni/ /lam du de yis nyer bsgrubs pa'i/ /rgyal po la 'os 'byor pas byon/ /de ni byon pa la dga' nas/ /srid gsum rab tu dang ba'i tshe/ /de la mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ /chu yi rgyun ni rab tu bsgrengs/ /gang gi tshe na phyogs de ru/ /chu yi rgyun
<p>191a</p>
<p>191a.1</p>ri d+hA ra pa pA ta sA/ /ta dA b+ha ga ba to bAkyA da ba tat+saM ta tA n+ya taH/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA kau tu kA ta br-iSh+To b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga ban pu raH/ /u pA tsa shrU ya tA me tad bA ri stam+b+ha s+ya kA ra NaM/ /a ne na pArba bud+d+he
<p>191a.2</p>ni ma babs pa/ /de tshe gzhan du bcom ldan gyi/ /gsung las rgyun dang ldan par babs/ /de mthong mtshar nas dge slong gis/ /zhus shing bcom ldan 'das kyis slar/ /bka' stsal chu 'dir rengs pa yi/ /rgyu ni rab tu mnyan par gyis/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la
<p>191a.3</p>b+h+yo\u0f85smin+ne be da mAspa daM/ /pra ti pA di ta mi t+ye Sha bA ri d+hA rA n+ya tash+ts+yu tA/ /a ne nai ba su rI sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya bi pa sh+yi ne/ /a ya me ba ba rA rA ma pra de shaHpra ti pA di taH/ /bud+d+hA ya shi khi ne pra
<p>191a.4</p>'dis/ /gnas 'di yi ni 'di nyid du/ /rab tu byin par gyur to zhes/ /chu rgyun 'di ni gzhan du lhung / /sngon gyi yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rnam par gzigs la 'di nyid kyis/ /mchog gi kun dga' ra ba yi/ /sa phyogs 'di nyid rab tu byin/ /rgyal gyi skye ba dag la yang / /
<p>191a.5</p>dAta pu Sh+ya dzan+ma n+ya yaM pu naH/ /ta to da dau bi shwa b+hu be dzi nA ya ra g+hu dzan+ma ni/ /b+ha ba tat+tA b+hi d+ho b+hU twA kra kuts+tshan+dA ya dAt+tA ya/ /da dau br-i haspa tir+b+hu twa ka na kA khyA ya tA yi ne/ /kA sh+ya pa ya pu na sh+tsa yaM prA dA dA
<p>191a.6</p>sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phul/ /de nas rag+hu'i skye ba la/ /rgyal ba thams cad skyob la phul/ /srid pas byin zhes gyur pa na/ /'khor ba 'jig la rab tu phul/ /chen po'i bdag tu gyur pa'i tshe/ /skyob pa gser zhes bya la phul/ /A ShA Da yi skye ba la/ /slar yang 'od srungs
<p>191b</p>
<p>191b.1</p>Sha Ta dzan+ma ni/ /a ne ni bA d+hu na ma h+yaM deshwa yaM pra ti pA di taH/ /kA le na su d+ha nA khyo yaM mai tre yA ya pra dA s+ya ti/ /sa twa bAn k+ShAn+ti shI la twAn+ni d+hA nA n+ye Sha pa sh+ya ti/ /su rash+tsa yaM gr-i ha pa tir+b+hU twA he ma pra dA b+hi
<p>191b.2</p>la 'di phul/ /da lta nga la 'di nyid kyis/ /yul 'di dag ni rab tu byin/ /dus kyis nor bzang zhes pas 'di/ /byams pa la ni 'bul bar 'gyur/ /snying stobs bzod pa tshul khrims dang / /ldan phyir 'di yis gter rnams mthong / /sngon yang khyim gyi bdag po 'di/ /gser sbyin zhes par
<p>191b.3</p>d+haH/ /tsakre pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha s+ya saM skA raM pa ri nir+b+r-i tau/ /rat+naM kum+b+he tad s+thI ni ni d+h+r-i twa tata pra Ni d+hA ta/ /a d+hu nA rat+na ko shAr+haHsaM dza to yaM su bar+N+Na b+hAka/ /shru twe ti shAsturba tsa nA b+hi d+hA naM te b+hik+Sha
<p>191b.4</p>gyur pa na/ /rang sangs rgyas ni mya ngan las/ /'das pa'i legs par bya ba byas/ /rin chen bum par de yi gdung / /bcug nas smon lam btab pa las/ /da lta rin chen mdzod 'os pa'i/ /gser gyi snod du 'di gyur to/ /dge slong de dag rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i snying po bzhin/ /
<p>191b.5</p>baHsA ra mi bA mr-i ta s+ya/ /kartuHpra tiSh+ThArdzi ta pUr+N+Na puN+ya pu Sh+pA d+hi bA se na b+h+r-i sha na nan+duH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba bA na kalpa la tA yAM dze ta ba na pra
<p>191b.6</p>ston pa'i gsung gis mngon par brjod pa 'di thos nas/ /byed por rab gnas kyis bsgrubs bsod nams rgyas pa yi/ /me tog lhag par gnas pas mchog tu dga' bar gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi
<p>192a</p>
<p>192a.1</p>ti gra hA ba dA naM nA ma dwA biM sha tiHpal+la waH// //a ho ma har+hA ma Ni ban+ma ha twaM b+ha byA b+ha dzan+te gu Na gau ra be+e Na/ /bi nA guNA yad+ba puSh+paM gu ru twaM s+thu lo pa
<p>192a.2</p>'khri shing las rgyal byed kyi tshal yongs su bzung ba'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //kye ma legs ldan rin thang che ba'i chen po nyid/ /nor bu bzhin du yon tan bla ma nyid kyis 'thob/ /yon tan med par gang zhig lus kyi bla ma nyid/ /rdo las
<p>192a.3</p>la na mi ba nis+pha laM tata/ /shrI mAn pu rA shAkya pu re na ren+duHshud+d+ho da naHshud+d+hi su d+hA ni d+hA naM/ /bai ra gya yo gAta su ga ta twa mAp+ta smr-i twA su taM sot+su ka tA ma bA pa/ /bo tsit+ta yata pu N+ya gu
<p>192a.4</p>rags pa bzhin du de ni 'bras bu med/ /shAkya'i grong gi mi yi dbang po sngon/ /dpal ldan zas gtsang dag pa'i bdud rtsi'i gter/ /chags bral ldan las bde gshegs nyid thob pa'i/ /sras ni dran nas 'dod dang bcas par gyur/ /de bsams bsod nams yon tan lhag
<p>192a.5</p>NA d+hi pA saM sa ra swa tI bA sa sa ro ru ha shre/ /ma naHpra sA da s+ya bi lA sa sau d+haM trak+Sh+yA mi su norba da naM ka dA haM/ /e hI ti tad+daR+sha na lA se na ye ye ma yA dze ta ba naM bi sr-iSh+TaH/ /te te ta dA lo ke
<p>192a.6</p>gnas shing / /dbyangs can gnas dang mtsho las skyes pa'i dpal/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rtse dga'i gnas/ /bu yi bzhin ras gang tshe bdag gis mthong / /de ni blta bar sred pas 'dir byon ces/ /bdag gis gang gang rgyal byed tshal du btang / /de de mig mi 'dzums pas de blta
<p>192b</p>
<p>192b.1</p>na nirni me Sha ta tretrai ba tiSh+ThAM t+ya mr-i taM pi ban+taH/ /saM pre Shi tasta s+ya ma yA sa mA ya yo byat+ma tu l+yaHpra Na yA du dA yI/ /sa le kha hastas+t+ri di ba b+hi rA me ta trai ba le kha twa mi bA b+hi ya taH/ /saM de sha bAkyaM pra hi tam+ma yA yata tad+bi
<p>192b.2</p>zhing / /de nyid du ni bdud rtsi 'thung zhing 'dug /gang yang mdza' las bdag mtshungs 'char ka ni/ /de dgug slad du bdag gis yang dag btang / /spring yig lag de lha rnams mngon dga' ba/ /de nyid du ni lha nyid bzhin du gyur/ /de yi kha la bdag gi 'phrin gyi tshig /springs pa gang de
<p>192b.3</p>smr-i taM ta s+ya mu khe na nU naM/ /sar+b+bo hi nA ma swa hi tA b+hI lA ShI d+hat+te pa rAr+tho kil shI ta la twaM/ /bi lo ka ne nai t+ya ni Shiny+tsa tUr+NaM pI yU Sha pU re Na ma mAM ga sang+gaM/ /niHsaM ga tai Sha k+Sha ma tAM mU hUr+t+taM da yA bi d+he ShaH
<p>192b.4</p>brjed pa ma yin nam/ /gang phyir thams cad nges par rang phan 'dod/ /gzhan gyi don la bsil ba nyid 'dzin lo/ /chags med 'di ni yud tsam ngal gso mdzod/ /rtag tu bdud rtsis khengs pa'i rnam gzigs kyis/ /myur du bdag gi lus la chags gyur pa/ /brtse ba'i dbang gis
<p>192b.5</p>ku ru ban+d+hukAR+YaM/ /e t+ye ta dA kar+N+ya ka the sa kuR+YAta k+Sha NaM bi lam+baM ma ma daR+sha ne pi/ /tats+tse ta saHpal+la ba pe sha la s+ya na hi swa b+ha baHpra Na yA bi b+haM gaH/ /ma no ra the ne ti pu raHpra yA te tad+daR+sha nA ye ba d+ha
<p>192b.6</p>gnyen gyi don 'di mdzod/ /ces pa 'di thos bdag dang phrad pa la/ /skad cig kyang de phyi bshol ji ltar mdzad/ /de yi thugs ni yal 'dab mnyen pa la/ /rang bzhin mdza' gcugs rnam rgyan med dam ci/ /yid la re ba 'di yis sa yi bdag /de blta'i slad bzhin mdun du
<p>193a</p>
<p>193a.1</p>rA d+hi nA the/ /pra bra dz+yaM ya byany+dzi ta tat+p+ra sa daHsa ma ya yau haR+Sha ra sa du dA yI/ /dr-iSh+T+wA ta mA nan+da bi pUr+Na mA sa pra bra dz+ya yA tat+sa dr-i shA nu b+hA baM/ /ut+kaN+Thi taHkuN+Thi ta d+haiR+Ya br-it+tiHsaM mo ha mur+ts+tshaM
<p>193a.2</p>song ba'i tshe/ /de yi drin gyis rab byung gsal byas pa'i/ /dga' ba'i ro ldan 'char ka yang dag 'ongs/ /rab tu byung ba de dang mtshungs pa'i mthu/ /kun dga' rnam par khyab pa de mthong nas/ /brtan pa'i spyod tshul nyams shing 'dod ldan pas/ /mi bdag kun tu
<p>193a.3</p>nr-i pa tiHpra pa de/ /sa lab+d+ha saM dz+nyAHshi shi raiHpa ye b+hiHsa prats+tsha taM kin+nu sa me Sh+ya tI ti/ /so s+ya bra bId+de ba di nair+b+ha ban+taM sa saM b+h+r-i taiHsA da ra me Sh+ya tI ti/ /ta taHpra yA te Shu di ne Shu byo m+na sha nair+b+hi k+Shu
<p>193a.4</p>rmongs pas brgyal bar gyur/ /bsil ba'i chus bran 'du shes rnyed pa des/ /de la ci slad byon pa min zhes dris/ /lha gcig khyod can nyin zhag tshogs kyis des/ /gus bcas 'byon par 'gyur zhes des kyang smras/ /de nas nyin zhag rnams ni rab 'das tshe/ /gzhon nu don kun
<p>193a.5</p>ga NA nu yA taH/ /sa hA ya yau nA ka sa dAM ni kA yaiHsar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+hair+b+ha ga bAn ku mA raH/ /d+Yu pun+da rI pA Ni sa ro dza muk+ta man+da ra mA lA ka li tash+tsa kA she/ /swarga gaM gA s+phu Ta phe na ku Ta bi lA sAM ga i bA ma
<p>193a.6</p>grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slong tshogs kyi rjes 'brang lha rnams kyi/ /tshogs dang bcas pa mkha' la dal bus byon/ /mtho ris mdzes ma'i lag pad kyis gtor ba/ /man+da ra ba'i 'phreng rgyas mdzes pa de/ /mtho ris gang gA'i dbu ba rab gsal brtsegs/ /mdzes shing dgod
<p>193b</p>
<p>193b.1</p>rA triH/ /saM g+haT+Ta b+hin+nA b+h+ra sa kheHs+kha ladab+hiHshap+da dzaM bU na da kiM ka nI kaiH/ /ba b+hurbi mA naiHka ku baM mu khA ni b+hak+te ba shAsturbi hi tastu bA ni/ /ni ran+ta rai ran+ta ri bA ke tA raiHsu raiHsa
<p>193b.2</p>pa'i lha yi ri bo bzhin/ /sprin gyi grogs rnams dkrigs pas 'byed cing 'phrul/ /dzam+bu na da'i dril chung sgra ldan pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang gi phyogs kyi gdong mdzes pa/ /gus pas ston pa'i bstod pa bsgrubs pa bzhin/ /bar med nyi ma'i 'od zer sgrib byed pa/ /rig 'dzin grub
<p>193b.3</p>bi d+yA d+ha ra sid+d+ha saM g+haiH/ /paR+YAp+ta se sak+ta si tA ta pa trair+b+yA p+taM sa mAp+tiM ga ga naM dza gA maH/ /taM sar+b+ba lo ko pa kr-i ti pra pan+naM sar+b+bA kr-i tiM sarba ma yA ba b+hA saM/ /sa mA sa tan+taM na b+ha so tha
<p>193b.4</p>pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha/ /yongs rdzogs gdugs dkar yang dag chags pa yis/ /khyab pas nam mkha' yang dag rdzogs par gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten kun la phan rdzogs pa/ /kun dbyibs kun gyi rang bzhin rnam par snang / /legs par byon pa de ni skad cig
<p>193b.5</p>dig+b+h+yaHk+Shi tesh+tsa sarbe da tr-i shuHk+Sha Ne na/ /pra haR+Sha rA shiM dza na lo tsa nA nI pu N+ya pra mA N-i su kr-i tot+sa bA nAM/ /lo kastu mA lo ka ni d+hiM bi lokya sa mul+la la sots+tsha li tAd b+hu tor+m+miH/ /Ash+tsaR+ya ru tsi
<p>193b.6</p>gis/ /mkha' dang phyogs dang sa las kun gyis mthong / /skye bo'i mig gi rab dga' spungs pa dang / /dge la dga' ba'i bsod nams tshad gyur pa/ /snang ba'i gter de mthong nas 'jig rten rnams/ /shin tu rangs pa'i rba rlabs rmad byung byung / /ngo mtshar mdzad gyur mdzes
<p>194a</p>
<p>194a.1</p>ra pra b+hA ba mu dA yi nA sU tsi ta mA ka ma s+yA dza nata/ /dza gad+gu ruM b+hU mi pa tiHku mA raM kr-i tAny+dza listaM pra Na nA ma dU rAta/ /a thA btIR+YAr+ya dza nA nu yA taHsaM pU dz+ya ma nAHpra Na ye na rA dz+nyA/ /s+phIta pra
<p>194a.2</p>pa'i mthu ldan pa/ /'char kas legs par bshad la rab shes nas/ /gzhon nu 'gro ba'i bla ma de la ni/ /sa bdag ring nas thal mo sbyar nas btud/ /de nas babs te 'phags skye'i rjes 'brang bcas/ /rgyal po gus pas yang dag mchod gyur pa/ /phyogs cha gzi
<p>194a.3</p>b+hA b+hA si ta dig+bi b+hA gAM n+yA gro d+hi niM rat+na b+hu baM bi be+e sha/ /he mA sa naM shA sa na san+ni biSh+Ta lo ka tra yaHsaM ga ta pA da bI ThaM/ /sa ta tra rat+nAM ku ra tsi tra pa traM b+hA swan+pa surme ru mi bA ru ro ha/ /tan+mA na sen+du na ya
<p>194a.4</p>byin rgyas pas mdzes pa yis/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi rin chen sa gzhir byon/ /'jig rten gsum po bka' la legs gnas de/ /der ni rkang stegs ldan pa'i gser gyi khri/ /rin chen myu gu bkra ba'i 'dab ldan la/ /lhun po la ni 'od ldan lus bzhin 'dzegs/ /yid kyi zla ba mig gi bdud
<p>194a.5</p>nA mr-i tau g+haM ma no ra tha prAr+tha na yo sa yA taM/ /bi lo ka yan+ni r+b+r-i ti nirni e ShaHk+Sha NaM k+Shi tI shas+t+ri da sha twa mA pa/ /pa taM dza ga dA shru ni rud+d+ha kaN+Tha sot+kaR+Sha haR+ShA ku li taM ku mA raM/ /hA rA gra rat+nA pra tibim+ba sak+taM
<p>194a.6</p>rtsi'i rgyun/ /yid la re bas don gnyer 'ongs pa de/ /dga' bas mig mi 'dzums par bltas pa las/ /skad cig sa yi dbang pos lha nyid thob/ /dga' ba'i ro las nang du zhugs pa bzhin/ /do shal rin chen mchog la gzugs brnyan chags/ /gzhon nu khyad 'phags dgyes pa rgyas de
<p>194b</p>
<p>194b.1</p>pra be+e sha yan pra ti ra sA di bAn+taH/ /san+to Sha shI tA tsa la swa b+hA bA ta sarbaM ra man+te ku sha la s+tha li Shu/ /kr-i tas+t+wa yAsmA ka ma yaM tu kasmAta sat+s+wa pa ka rI bi ra ho pa de shaH/ /sne hAta pra mo dA ta
<p>194b.2</p>la/ /mgrin pa mchi mas 'gags pa de yis smras/ /yongs tshim g.yo med bsil ba'i rang bzhin las/ /thams cad dge ba'i thang la dga' bar byed/ /yongs su gdung byed bral ba'i nyer bstan 'di/ /bdag cag rnams la khyod kyis ci phyir mdzad/ /mdza' dang rab dga' yon
<p>194b.3</p>gu Na gau ra bAts+tsa d+hIr+b+hA ba trI yaM twa yi me pra sa h+ya/ /A liM ga nA ya s+thi ra saM ga mA ya pA da pra NA mA ya tsa tu l+ya me ba/ /yad+bista kiM tsit+ta di da tra ya me shro ta bya me ba pra Na yo pa ro d+hAta/ /gu Nodz+dz+hi taM bA bi
<p>194b.4</p>tan la gus pas/ /'khyud pa dang ni brtan par 'grogs pa dang / /zhabs la phyag bgyi'i slad du mnyam nyid du/ /bdag gi blo ni 'phral la khyod can rgyug /cung zad gang de bdag gis brjod pa 'di/ /bdag la byams ngor khyod kyis gsan par bya/ /yon tan spangs pa'i chags bral rim pa
<p>194b.5</p>ra sa kra maM dA na sne ha mo ha s+ya b+ha ba t+ya bA ts+yaM/ /pra t+yar+N+Na rat+na pra ti bim+bi tArka pro D+ha pra b+hA pra ba ra NA n+ya mU ni/ /twaM he ma ha rmyA Ni bi hA ya kasmAta bi gA h+ya se shU n+ya ba nAn+ta rANi/ /kAn+tA ka rA brdzi ta he ma kuM b+haHsata
<p>194b.6</p>ni/ /mdza' bas rmongs pas brjod bya min pa nyid/ /nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan ldan pa'i rin chen gyis/ /legs spras lhag pa'i 'od zer rab rgyas pa/ /gser gyi khang bzang 'di dag ci yi slad/ /btang nas khyod ni nags na stong par 'khyam/ /na chung lag pas gser gyi bum btud cing / /dri
<p>195a</p>
<p>195a.1</p>sau ra b+hAM b+haHpra sa tA b+hi Shik+taH/ /e kaHga thaM snA si bi kA si pAM su yaM tap+ta to yA su ma ru s+thi lI Shu/ /gaN+Da s+kha lata kuN+Da la rat+na kAn+ti kiM maN+Da na me ba bot+si/ /kasmA da ka smAt+ta ba niHsu kha s+ya na
<p>195a.2</p>bzang chu yis mchog tu mngon bkrus pa/ /mya ngan thang la yongs su tsha ba'i chu/ /rdul gyis rgyas pas gcig pu ji ltar 'khru/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i rna cha 'gram par 'phyang / /rgyan rnams 'dor bar byed pa ci zhig rigs/ /ci slad bde med khyed ni glo bur du/ /tsan+dan
<p>195a.3</p>tsan+da naM nan+da na min+du shu b+h+raM/ /ma hA bi tra ne sha ya ne nr-i pAr+he she She Na kiM she Sha bi she Sha shu b+h+re/ /lak+Sh+mI na bA liM ga na b+ho ga yo gya ka thaM ta nuste sa ha te ku shay+YAM/ /kAn+ta smi tor+m+mi pra ti mAM shu kAr+haM kiM tsI ba ra s+yo tsi ta
<p>195a.4</p>zla ltar dkar bas dga' ma yin/ /mi bdag la 'os khri stan bla re che/ /lhag ltar khyad par dkar la cis mi gzims/ /dpal mos gsar 'khyud longs spyod 'os gyur pa/ /khyod kyi lus kyis stan ngan ji ltar bzod/ /mdzes 'dzum rlabs kyis gzugs brnyan gos 'os pa/ /
<p>195a.5</p>me ta daM gaM/ /pA Nau tsa lI lA ka ma lA s+ya de smin pA traM ka thaM te pri ya ma d+ya dzA taM/ /a yaM bi hA ra sta ba kaN+Da pI thaHsot+kaN+Tha kAn+ta b+hu dza ban+d+ha nAr+haH/ /saM b+ho ga lak+Sh+m+yaHk+Sha pi ta pra mo daHka ro t+ya
<p>195a.6</p>lus 'di la ni chos gos ji ltar 'os/ /khyod kyi phyag ni pad+mo'i rol gnas 'dir/ /da lta lhung bzed dga' ba ji ltar skye/ /khyod kyi mgrin pa rgyab kyi gnas 'di dag /sred ldan mdzes ma'i lag pas bsdams 'os pa/ /longs spyod dpal mo'i rab dga' nyams gyur cing / /glo bur
<p>195b</p>
<p>195b.1</p>kIN+Di pra Na yA ba b+haM gaM/ /rU paM bi lak+Sh+mI kr-i te puSh+pa tsA paM mat+te b+ha kum+p+hots+tsa ku tsA bi b+hu tiH/ /ra terbi lA so pa ba naM ba yash+tsa ke nA sa maste na ka li to bi rA gaH/ /shru twe ti taM shI la ni d+hirba
<p>195b.2</p>nyid du mdza' gcugs nyams par byed/ /me tog gzhu ldan skyengs par byed pa'i gzugs/ /glang chen myos bum ltar mtho'i nu rgyas 'byor/ /lang tsho dga' ba'i rtse sa nye ba'i nags/ /ci slad khyod kyi mi bzad chags bral byas/ /zhes gsan tshul khrims gter gyis
<p>195b.3</p>b+hA She sha shAM ka le khA la lita smi te na/ /saM krAn+ta nA nA nr-i pa rat+na rA gaM kurban+na lak+ShA mi ba rA dza lak+Sh+mI ma/ /rA dza na dza rA ro ga ha te ba na s+yA tu raM ga lo lA ya di dzI ba br-it+tiH/ /tat+ka s+ya na s+yA da ni shaM pra haR+Sha
<p>195b.4</p>bka' stsal te/ /zla ba'i cha bzhin rol pa'i 'dzum dag gis/ /mi bdag sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phros pa'i/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni mi snang 'dzad pa bzhin/ /rgyal po chu rgyun ltar g.yo 'tsho ba'i srog /gal te rga dang na bas mi 'joms na/ /rab dga' bdud rtsi'i char lta'i yul rnams
<p>195b.5</p>pI yU Sha baR+Sha bi Sha yA b+hi lA ShaH/ /sha mA mr-i tA swA da na su s+thi rA NA ma pa ti ni shu n+ya ba nAn+ta b+hU miH/ /bi b+hU ti lI lA ma da bi hwa lA nAM harmya Ni ni pA ta nA ni/ /sa ku ma ku maiHsnAn+ti nr-i pAHsa
<p>195b.6</p>la/ /rtag tu su zhig mngon par 'dod mi bgyi/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsi nyams myong brtan rnams kyis/ /nags nang stong pa'i sa gzhi gnod med yin/ /'byor pas rgyags shing rtse dgas 'khrugs rnams kyi/ /ba gam ldan pa mthar ni rnam par lhung / /gang zhig gur kum dang bcas
<p>196a</p>
<p>196a.1</p>yau b+hiHsa rA ga taM yaiHsa ta taM pra yAn+te/ /saM to Sha shI lastu ma naHpra sA da shud+d+haM bu d+hau tA bi ma lI b+ha ban+ti/ /shro taM shru te nai ba na kuN+Da le na dA nen pA Ni rna tu kaM ka Ne na/ /bi b+hA ti
<p>196a.2</p>chus bkrus pa'i/ /mi bdag rtag tu chags dang ldan par gyur/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i chus bkrus pa'i/ /chog shes ngang tshul dri ma bral bar 'gyur/ /snying rje rgyas pa rnams kyi lus mdzes pa/ /gzhan phan gyis yin tsan+dan byugs pas min/ /rna ba thos pas
<p>196a.3</p>kA yaHka ru NA ku lA nAM pa ro pa kA re Na na tsan+da ne na/ /e tA ni mo hA ha ta bal+la b+hA ni saM sak+ta muk+tAM shu si ta smi ta ni/ /sa taM na b+ho gyA ni b+ha ban+ti b+hU b+h+r-i duts+tshiSh+Ta shiSh+TA ni bi b+hU Sha NA ni/ /rA gA tu rA
<p>196a.4</p>yin gyi rna chas min/ /lag pa sbyin pas yin gyi gdub bus min/ /sa bdag gis spyad lhag mar gyur pa'i rgyan/ /mu tig 'od chags dkar ba'i 'dzum dang bcas/ /rmongs pas dga' ba ma bcom 'di dag ni/ /dam pa rnams kyis spyad par 'os pa min/ /chags pas gzir
<p>196a.5</p>NaM ri pu tA pi tA nAM ni drA d+ha na d+h+yA na ba tAn+na nA ma/ /sha y+YA su kha spaR+sha ba tI Shu rA dz+nyAM sar+b+ba tra shAn+taHsu kha me ba she te/ /nirmo ka kAn+te na ba rAM shu ke na b+hu dzaM ga pr-it+tirna tu tsI ba re Na/ /pA tra pa
<p>196a.6</p>dang dgra yis gdungs gyur pa/ /nor gyi bsam gtan ldan pa'i rgyal po la/ /reg na bde ba'i lam na gnyid yod min/ /zhi ba rnams ni kun tu bde bar gzims/ /lag 'gro'i spyod tshul sbrul shun mdzes pa yi/ /gos bzang gis min chos gos dag gis yin/ /lhung bzed
<p>196b</p>
<p>196b.1</p>bi trA Ni sa mA p+lu hA ni pI yU Sha mai trA N+ya sha nA ni sU te/ /ts+tsha trA Ni bak+t+ra b+h+r-i ShaM ma pra kA shaM ma No bi lo laM bya dza nA ni lo g+hAH/ /saM sak+ta dzA D+yaM hr-i da yaM nr-i pA NAM kur+b+ban+ta hA rA ha ri tsan+da nAr+d+rAH/ /bi
<p>196b.2</p>kyis ni zas dag gtsang ba dang / /yongs rdzogs bdud rtsi'i grogs po nyid du bskyed/ /gdugs kyi bzhin ni mchog tu mi gsal zhing / /rlung yab rlung gis yid ni rnam par g.yo/ /ha ri tsan+dan gyis brlan do shal gyis/ /mi bdag snying la bsil ba reg par byed/ /'byor pa
<p>196b.3</p>yo ga ro gA nu ga tA bi b+hu tiHkAn+tAHk+Sha Nan+tA bi ra so bi lA saH/ /yasmin+na pA yaHsa ta tA nu shA yI sa ka s+ya b+ho gaHsu b+ha go pa yo gaH/ /dzA D+yaM sa dzr-iM b+ha dza na ya t+ya dza sraM ta no ti tr-iSh+NA b+h+ra ma mo ha mUr+ts+tshaH/ /ka ro
<p>196b.4</p>bral ba'i nad kyi rjes su 'gro/ /rtse dga' ro bral mdzes ma skad cig mtha'/ /gang gi lus la gnod pa rtag gnas de/ /su yi longs spyod skal bzang nye bar rigs/ /'phral du zil gnon longs spyod nyer spyod ni/ /rgyun du glal bcas blun pa nyid bskyed cing / /sred 'khrul
<p>196b.5</p>t+ya sa h+yaM sa ra sa twa me ba b+ho go pa b+ho gaHpra sa b+ha pi yo gaH/ /ya dA su kha shrirna ba tsan+d+ra le khA pra b+hA ta puSh+pa n+ya pi yau ba nA ni/ /kar+m+mar+m+mi mA lA gra ha NaMsha rI raM ta dA ma mA yaM ga mi to nu rA gaH/ /satsA ma rAHd+h+wa dza puM dza
<p>196b.6</p>rmongs dang brgyal ba rgyas pa dang / /mi bzad chags dang bcas pa nyid du byed/ /gang tshe bde dpal zla tshes ri mo dang / /long tsho yang ni snga dro'i me tog ste/ /lus ni las kyi rlabs kyis 'phreng ba 'dzin/ /de tshe bdag ni rjes su chags dang bral/ /rnga yab dang bcas dar dang rgyal mtshan
<p>197a</p>
<p>197a.1</p>paT+TA sa bA dzi bA la dwi pa kar+Na tA lAH/ /swa b+ha ba lo laHki la rA dza lak+Sh+m+yaHsar+b+be bi la sA k+Sha Na b+haM ga saM gaH/ /kuk+t+we ti tata tata ku sha lA yA rA dz+nyAsh+tsit+ta pra sA daM pa ra maM bi d+hA ya/ /sa shAn+ti
<p>197a.2</p>thogs/ /rta dang bcas pa'i glang zhon rna ba'i stabs/ /rang bzhin gyis g.yo rgyal po'i dpal 'byor gyi/ /longs spyod thams cad skad cig 'jig pa'i grogs/ /rgyal po'i thugs ni rab dang mchog bsgrub cing / /dge ba'i slad du de de bka' stsal nas/ /zhi ba'i rlabs
<p>197a.3</p>kal+lo la su d+hA pra bA haM ki ran dr-i shA pAR+Sha da mA lu lo ke/ /ma nI Shi NaM shAkya ku lod+ga tA naM sap+tA yu tA ni pra ti pA d+yad+har+m+maM/ /tsakri sa ha su Ni sap+ta ta tra saM prAp+ta saR+YA p+ta bi she Sha b+hAM dzi/ /shuklo
<p>197a.4</p>ldan bdud rtsi'i rgyun rgyas shing / /de yi spyan gyis 'khor la rnam par gzigs/ /shAkya'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'i mkhas pa ni/ /khri phrag bdun gyis chos ni rtogs byas shing / /de la stong phrag bdun yang yongs rdzogs kyi/ /khyad par yang dag 'thob pa'i snod nyid mdzad/ /de
<p>197a.5</p>da nA ye ku sha lo sa ban+nai ga Ne tha tat+tu l+ya sa ha sra saM khyaiH/ /tro No da nA d+yai ra mr-i to da nA d+yaish+tsit+ta pra sa daHsu ma hA na bap+taH/ /ke tsid+Ya yuHshrA ba ka bo d+hi yuk+ta pra t+ye ka bo d+hau ni ratAsh+tsa ke tsita/ /
<p>197a.6</p>nas de dang grangs mtshungs stong phrag tshogs/ /zas dkar la sogs rnams kyis dge ba thob/ /bre bo zas sogs bdud rtsi zas sogs kyis/ /shin tu che ba'i sems ni dad ba thob/ /kha cig nyan thos byang chub ldan par gyur/ /nyi tshe'i byang chub reg dang la la dag /de bzhin
<p>197b</p>
<p>197b.1</p>samyak+ta thA nut+ta ra bo d+hi sak+tAHpa re ba b+hU burga ga na pra san+nAH/ /shro taHpa ri prAp+ta pha laM ta to n+yai sa sa kr-i dA gA mi pha laM ta tha n+ye/ /an+ye s+ya nA gA mi pha laM ta dA pu rar+hat+pha laM kle sha bi muk+ti ra n+ye/ /
<p>197b.2</p>yang dag bla med byang chub zhugs/ /gzhan ni mkha' bzhin rab tu dang bar gyur/ /de nas gzhan gyis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu thob/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis lan gcig phyir 'od dang / /phyir mi 'ong 'bras de yang gzhan gyis te/ /nyon mongs rnam grol gzhan gyis dgra bcom thob/ /
<p>197b.3</p>e kastu ta trA dzi ta pA pa sha pasta maHsa mu ho pa hi ta pra mo haH/ /mA yo ha mi t+yA ha ha san dza na nAM sa t+ya s+thi tiM saM sa di de ba dat+taH/ /nr-i paM tu bAt+sa l+ya ni lI na me ba pu tro da yAta pra t+yu ta dzA ta dar+p+paM/ /
<p>197b.4</p>mdun sar de ni lha sbyin gcig pu zhig /mun pa'i tshogs kyis gtibs shing rab rmongs pas/ /sdig dmod ma thul skye bo rnams kyi lugs/ /bden pa la bkod 'di ni sgyu zhes smra/ /mi yi bdag kyang mnyes gshin gyis chags shing / /sras ni dar las zlog par dogs skyes pa/ /
<p>197b.5</p>maud+ga l+ya b+hik+Shu dzi na shA sa ne na ma har+d+hi b+hirbI ta ma daM tsa kA ra/ /dr-iSh+T+wA phi rA dzA b+ha ga bta pra b+hA pi na t+yad+b+hu taM pau ru Sha me ba me ne/ /a b+h+yA sa lI nA ni dza na s+ya nU nAM sot+kaR+Sha kr-i t+yA ni na bisma yA ya/ /a
<p>197b.6</p>rgyal ba'i bka' las dge slong mau gal bus/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos rgyags dang bral bar byas/ /bcom ldan mthu ni rgyal pos mthong gyur kyang / /shin tu rmad byung skyes bu nyid mi sems/ /phul byung mdzad pa goms pas reg pa ni/ /nges par skye bo'i ya mtshan rgyu ma yin/ /de
<p>198a</p>
<p>198a.1</p>tha pa re d+Yur+b+ha ga bAn su ren+d+ra saM pa di te he ma ma hA bi mA na/ /<p>]lhun po'i lcog ltar sogs tshig rkang gcig gi skad dod chad pa 'dar los bcug pa slar dpyad/[</p>/su me ru shIR+Sh+yi sa ma kAsha ru tseHsiM ha sa ne rat+na ma yai n+ya ShI data/ /bra h+men+d+ra mu khe Shu ta taHsru re Shu ta tro pe biSh+Te Shu pr-i thu pra b+he
<p>198a.2</p>nas nyi ma gzhan la lha dbang gis/ /rab bsgrubs gser gyi gzhal yas khang chen du/ /lhun po'i lcog ltar gsal zhing mdzes pa yi/ /rin chen seng ge'i khri la bcom ldan 'das/ /de nas der ni tshangs dang dbang po sogs/ /'od zer che ba'i lha rnams nyer
<p>198a.3</p>Shu/ /ba b+hup+ta duSh+Ni Sha shi khI bi lA saish+tsan+d+rAM shu mA lA dza Ti lA i bA shAH/ /a n+yo n+ya saM g+haT+Ta bi lo pa hA rair+g+ha nA ba hA raiHtri da sherbi shad+b+hiH/ /ni ran+tAM tAM b+hu ba me ba rA dzA dwA rai Shu mArgA na tsa tuR+Shu le b+he/ /
<p>198a.4</p>gnas tshe/ /de yi gtsug tor rtse las 'phros pa'i phyogs/ /zla 'od 'phreng ba'i ral pa bzhin du mdzes/ /do shal phan tshun reg cing g.yo ba yis/ /lha rnams stug por babs shing zhugs pa yis/ /bar mtshams med pa'i sa der rgyal pos ni/ /sgo bzhi rnams su lam nyid thob ma gyur/ /
<p>198a.5</p>sa b+h+ru b+h+ra maste tra ku be+e ra mu khyai rni bAR+ya mA NA b+hi ma taHpra be shaH/ /bi ts+tshA ya bak+t+yaHs+kha li tA b+hi d+hA yI b+hU b+h+r-i ta pa raM niSh+p+ra ti b+ho ba b+hU ba/ /pra bi shi tastairdzi na shA sa ne na ka dA tsi dA sha d+ya ta da gra b+hu miM/ /
<p>198a.6</p>ku be ra sogs smin ma g.yo ldan pas/ /der ni mngon par 'jug 'dod zlog gyur pa/ /bzhin ni mdzes bral brjod pa 'khrul gyur pa'i/ /sa bdag mchog tu gzi byin med par gyur/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis de dag rnams kyis btang / /ji zhig ltar stes nge mdun sa gzhi thob/ /
<p>198b</p>
<p>198b.1</p>shud+d+ho da nastaM pra Ni pa t+ya mUr+d+h+nA tsit+ta pra sA de na pu re s+ya tas+thau/ /shAstA ta tasmai tsa tu rA R+ya sa t+ya pra bo d+ha k+ShiM d+harma ka thAn+di de sha/ /dz+nyA ne na yA biM sha ti shr-iM ga ma s+ya sat+ka ya tr-ig b+hU d+ha ra mas+ya b+hAM k+ShIta/ /ta taH
<p>198b.2</p>zas gtsang spyi bos de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi mdun na rab dang sems kyis gnas/ /de nas ston pas de la chos kyi gtam/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab tu rtogs byed bstan/ /gang zhig shes pas de yi 'jig tshogs la/ /lta ba'i ri rtse nyi shu dag kyang bcom/ /de nas skye
<p>198b.3</p>sa ga twA kr-i ta kr-i t+ya dzan+mA shuklo da naM pra b+ha dza swa rA dz+yaM/ /swa s+ya bra bIt+taM b+ha ga bat+p+ra diSh+TaM dats+tshA sa naM mo da yi taM na rA dz+yaM/ /tro No da ne rA dz+ya pa rA mu khe pi bai rA gya yo gA da mr-i to da na tsa/ /dza grA hA shud+d+ho da
<p>198b.4</p>ba'i bya ba byas pa de/ /song nas zas dkar la smras rgyal srid gzung / /des smras bdag ni bcom ldan gyis gnang ba/ /bstan pa la dga' rgyal srid ma yin no/ /bre bo zas kyang rgyal srid las phyir phyogs/ /bdud rtsi zas kyang chags bral ldan gyur tshe/ /de nas zas gtsang gis
<p>198b.5</p>na saM pra diSh+TaM tAM rA dz+ya lak+Sh+mI mtha b+ha tri kA khyaH/ /rA dzAr+ha b+ho gai ra tha pU dza yi twA dzi naM dza ne shaHshu tsi saM pra NI taiH/ /n+ya gro d+ha d+hA ma pra ti pA d+ya tsA s+yai shud+d+ho da naHshud+d+ha ma no ra tho b+hUta/ /troNo da na s+yA bi su tau yu bA nau rA
<p>198b.6</p>gnang rgyal po yi/ /dpal 'byor de ni bzang ldan zhes pas bzung / /de nas rgyal pos longs spyod gtsang ma rnams/ /rab phul 'gro ba'i dbang gis rgyal ba mchod/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi gnas ni de rab phul/ /zas gtsang yid la re ba dag par gyur/ /de nas bre bo zas kyi bu gzhon gnyis/ /ma yis
<p>199a</p>
<p>199a.1</p>dzA dz+nya yA pre ra Na yA tsa mA tuH/ /e kasta yaHpra dzi to ni rud+d+haHpa ro ma hAn+nA ma gr-i hI ba b+hu ba/ /a thA b+ha bats+tse ta si b+ha tri ka s+ya rA dz+nyo bi rak+ta s+ya ba nA b+hi lA ShaH/ /bi be ga b+hA dzAM pra sha ma pra br-it+ti
<p>199a.2</p>bskul bas de las gcig rab byung / /rgyal po'i bka' yis bkag pas gzhan ma ni/ /chen po zhes pa khyim na gnas par gyur/ /de nas chags bral rgyal po bzang ldan gyi/ /yid ni nags tshal mngon par 'dod par gyur/ /rnam rig ldan pas rab zhir zhugs pa'i yid/ /
<p>199a.3</p>na bA bi lak+Sh+mIrna ma no ru Nad+d+hi/ /ta taHsa mA hu ya sa de ba dat+naM radz+yA b+hi She ka pra ti pan+na tsit+taM/ /u bA tsa me pra bra dza na s+ya ka la kra mA ga taM kiM b+ha ba tA bi de yaM/ /taM pra t+yU bA tsAt+ta bi be ka daM b+haHsu
<p>199a.4</p>gsar pa'i dpal 'byor gyis kyang khegs pa min/ /de nas de yis rgyal srid dbang bskur ni/ /'thob 'dod sems ldan lhas byin yang dag bos/ /smras pa bdag ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus/ /rim pas long la khyod ni ci zhig brjod/ /dben pa'i tshul 'chos 'dzin pa'i lhas byin gyis/ /
<p>199a.5</p>saM br-i taHsaM sA ri de ba dat+taM/ /rA dzan+na rA dz+yesti ma mA b+hi lA ShaHpra bra dz+ya yA twad sa dr-i sho b+ha bA mi/ /shru twe ti rA dzA ku Ti l+ya s+ya ta s+ya mi th+yA bi nI ta s+ya bi dar+sh+wa bA kyaM/ /u dI ri taM shAkya ga Na sta ba yaM saM
<p>199a.6</p>mdun sar legs bsdams de la slar smras pa/ /rgyal po bdag la rgyal srid 'dod pa med/ /rab tu byung bas khyod dang bdag mtshungs 'gyur/ /zhes pa gya gyu'i dul brdzun ldan pa des/ /'khyog tshig brjod pa rgyal pos thos gyur nas/ /shAkya'i tshogs 'di khyod kyi brtag pa yis/ /dbang
<p>199b</p>
<p>199b.1</p>kalpa sa k+ShI ti ha saM tu bA tsaH/ /a thAr+tha tA po ha taHpra da d+h+yau b+h+yo gA nu rA gA di ti de ba dat+taH/ /ma yA ki me tad bi pA ta muk+taM b+ha dze tha bA pra dzi to pi rA dz+yaM/ /rA dz+yaM sa mut+s+r-i dz+ya ni dzaM pra dzan+taHshAkya ku mA rAHsa
<p>199b.2</p>du gyur ces 'dzum zhing rab tu smras/ /de nas lhas sbyin 'gyed pas nye bar gdungs/ /longs spyod rjes su chags las 'di ltar bsams/ /ci slad bdag gis phyin ci log 'di brjod/ /yang na rab byung yang na rgyal srid bsten/ /bzang ldan sogs bcas shAkya gzhon nu rnams/ /rang gi rgyal
<p>199b.3</p>hA b+ha tri kA d+yAH/ /shud+d+ho da naM niR+Ya yu rAR+Ya br-it+ta prI tiM pu raskr-i t+ya ra thai d+h+wi pash+tse/ /bra dzat+su sar+b+ba Sh+wa tha de ba dat+taHki rI Ti sak+taM pr-i thu pad+ma rA gaM/ /dza hA ra rak+tAk+ta mi bA mi ShAr+thI sh+ye naHpra b+hA pal+la ti
<p>199b.4</p>sring btang nas bgrod pa yis/ /'phags pa'i spyod tshul la dgyes zas gtsang gi/ /mdun bdar glang po shing rtas nges par byung / /de nas thams cad 'gro tshe lhas byin gyis/ /cod pan la chags pad+ma rA ga che/ /mkha' mchog 'od kyis 'dab gsar ldan byed pa/ /khrag gis byugs 'dra
<p>199b.5</p>tAm+ba rA graM/ /nai mit+ta kai ruk+ta ma tha s+ya lak+Sh+ma dr-iSh+T+wA ta du graM na ra ka pra yA NaM/ /tsit+taM sa do ShaM ki na durni mit+taM ni mit+ta ma n+yat+pu na ruk+ta me ba/ /ko kA li khaN+Dot+ka Ta mo ra kA NAM ti th+yA di nAm+na ma durma dA
<p>199b.6</p>sha 'dod khra yis khyer/ /de nas mtshan mkhan gyis de'i khrag gi rtags/ /sems ni skyon bcas mtshan ma ngan gyur pa/ /drag po'i dmyal bar 'gro ba de mthong nas/ /mtshan ma gzhan dag slar yang brjod pa nyid/ /ko ka bung ba nyams drag ma he dang / /'tshe sogs ming dang chang gis rab
<p>200a</p>
<p>200a.1</p>nAM/ /saM sU tsi tA nA t+ya yI kA ni tan+t+ra ta thA bi d+hA n+yai ba hu lak+Sha Na ni/ /b+hU pa pra mo dA da tha b+ha dri ko pi tai rde ba dat+ta pra mu kheHsa hai ba/ /pra bra dz+ya yA tsI ba ra pu tra yo gAts+tsa kA ra be rA gya ma yI
<p>200a.2</p>myos pa/ /der ni rnam pa de lta'i gegs gyur pa/ /ngan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni yang dag bshad/ /de nas rab dga'i sa bdag bzang ldan yang / /lhas byin la sogs de rnams bcas pa nyid/ /rab byung chos gos lhung bzed ldan gyur pas/ /sa gzhi chags bral rang bzhin
<p>200a.3</p>bi bak+Sh+yaM/ /rA dz+nyAsta thA rA dza ku mA ra kA Na mut+s+r-iSh+Ta hA rAM ga da kuN+Da lA nAM/ /sA sro bi rA gA da ba tAR+Ya te ShAM ke shA nu pA lI ki la kalpa ko b+huta/ /mUr+khaHsa nI tso bi dzi nA dz+nya yai ba pra bra dz+ya yA pU dz+ya ta ro ba b+hU ba/ /
<p>200a.4</p>byas pa bzhin/ /rgyal po dang ni de bzhin rgyal sras dag /do shal dpung rgyan rna rgyan rab spangs pa/ /de dag rnams kyi skra lhung nye bar 'khor/ /'dreg mkhan chags bral mig chu ldan par gyur/ /de ni rmongs shing dman yang rgyal ba'i bkas/ /rab tu byung nas mchod 'os mchog tu gyur/ /
<p>200a.5</p>tsit+ta pra sA da s+ya ba ra s+ya ma n+ye na kA ra NaM paN+Di ta tA na dzA tiH/ /sA mI tsi kA yA ma tha b+ha dra ko pi dz+nyA twA nr-i paHpaR+sha di kaM taM/ /nI tsa s+ya pa dau ka tha ma s+ya ban+de ma hi pa tiHsan+ni ti nish+tsa lo b+huta/ /ta ma
<p>200a.6</p>sems ni mchog tu rab tu dang ba'i rgyu/ /mkhas pa nyid min rigs ldan min nam snyam/ /de nas phyag la mi bdag bzang ldan gyis/ /'dreg mkhan de yang 'khor der 'khod shes nas/ /sa bdag gyur nas dman pa 'di yi ni/ /rkang la 'dud ces ji ltar g.yo med gyur/ /rnam par rtog ldan
<p>200b</p>
<p>200b.1</p>bra bI da s+kha li tA b+hi mA naM bi kalpa b+hi n+naM b+ha ga bAn bi hA s+ya/ /pa bra dz+ya yA mo hA nu ban+d+hi saM t+ya dz+ya te dzA ti ma yo bi mA naH/ /shru twe ti rA dz+nyA sa ha rA dza pu traiHkr-i te pra NA me pr-i thi bI tsa kam+pe/ /na de ba dat+ti pa
<p>200b.2</p>khengs dang ma bral ba/ /de la bcom ldan 'dzum zhing bka' stsal pa/ /rmongs pas cher bsdams rigs las byung ba yis/ /mngon par khengs pa rab tu byung nas gtong / /zhes thos rgyal po'i sras bcas rgyal po yis/ /phyag 'tshal tshe na sa gzhi rab tu g.yos/ /bcom ldan gsung gis
<p>200b.3</p>ru ShA b+hi d+hA yI pa dau ba ban+de b+ha ga bAn gi rA s+ya/ /kam+pA ta k+Shi terbisma ta mA na se na pr-iSh+Tasta to b+hik+Shu ga Ne na shAstA/ /u bA tsa rA dz+nyA ki la kalpa ka s+ya dzan+mAn+ta re s+ya s+ya kr-i ta pra NA maH/ /pu ra yu bAM kA shi pu re
<p>200b.4</p>de yi rkang pa la/ /lhas byin tshig rtsub brjod cing phyag mi byed/ /de nas sa g.yos ya mtshan yid can gyi/ /dge slong tshogs kyis dris shing ston pa yis/ /bka' stsal rgyal po skye ba gzhan la yang / /'dreg mkhan 'di la nges par phyag 'tshal byas/ /kA shi'i grong du dbul po gzhon nu yis/ /
<p>200b.5</p>bi lo kya b+ha drA b+hi d+hA nAM ga Ni kaM da ri draH/ /se pAM bya d+hA tA pun+da ra kasta dA s+yai go hi sarba bya sa no pa deSh+TA/ /ta yA bi sr-iSh+TaHku su mots+tsa yA ya pu naHpu nar+b+h+r-id+ga i bA d+hi kAr+thI/ /tat+saM ga mA naM ga ma no ra the na shrAn+taH
<p>200b.6</p>smad 'tshod bzang mo zhes pa sngon mthong gyur/ /mdzes pas de tshe de yi g.yog rnams byas/ /gang phyir chags pa rgud kun nye bar ston/ /de yis btang nas me tog btu ba'i slad/ /yang yang lhag par don gnyer bung ba bzhin/ /de dang 'grogs pa'i lus med re ba las/ /nags nang
<p>201a</p>
<p>201a.1</p>sa ba b+h+ra ma ba nAn+ta re Shu/ /a trAn+ta re shrAn+ta ta raHk+Shi tI shaHprAp+to ba nan+taM mr-i ga yA ra se na/ /taM brah+ma dat+taHbra sha mI k+Sha gI taM ta s+ya shr-i Nota ts+tshan+na ta nurla tA b+hIH/ /na pha na ba ku su mA sha yA ki me
<p>201a.2</p>rnams su de yis ngal zhing 'khyam/ /skabs der rngon la chags pas rab ngal zhing / /nags nang phyin par gyur pas sa yi dbang / /lus ni 'khri shing gis bsgribs tshangs byin gyis/ /de ni rab mthong de yi glu dag thos/ /me tog gsar pa gsar pa 'dod pas sbrang rtsi
<p>201a.3</p>baM ma d+hu ka ra tA pa ha to si gats+tsha tUr+NaM/ /bi ka si ka ma lA na nab+dzi nI sa b+ha ba ti hi saM ku tsi tA di bA ba sA ne/ /te ne te gI taM nr-i pa ti ni sha mya smi tats+ts+laT+Ta g+ha Ti ta hA ra kAn+tiH/ /u ba tsa taM tri bra ka rArka tA
<p>201a.4</p>byed/ /ci ste de ltar gdung bas khyod 'joms myur du song / /bzhin ras me tog rnam rgyas chu skyes ldan pa de/ /gang phyir nyin mo'i mjug tu zum par gyur pa yin/ /mi bdag gis ni de yi glu skad thos/ /'dzum zer do shal mdzes pa la reg cing / /der smras nyi 'od drag pos gdungs pa
<p>201a.5</p>pe ko yaM sa khaM gI ta rA sa b+hi yo gaH/ /so s+ya bra bIta b+hU pa te na nA ma tap+to ra bistap+ta ta rastu kA maH/ /swa karma duHkhA ni bi han+ti lo ke na grISh+ma dag+d+ha ni ma ru s+tha lA ni/ /i t+yar+tha pad+bA kya gu NArba ne na sa b+hU pa te
<p>201a.6</p>la/ /grogs po glu yi nyams dga' 'byor pa ci/ /des kyang smras pas bdag nges par ni/ /nyi ma mi gdung 'dod pa mchog tu gdung / /'jig rten na ni rang las sdug bsngal 'dzin/ /so ka'i mya ngam thang ni sreg byed min/ /don ldan tshig 'di'i yon tan phul ba yis/ /de ni sa yi
<p>201b</p>
<p>201b.1</p>bal+la b+ha tA ma bA pa/ /saM pA da saM spaR+sha su b+hA Shi taM hi ke ShAM tsa sat+kA ra pa daM na yA ti/ /te nA tha rA dzA bi dza ni shra mA tuHshI to pa tsA rai ra pa nIta tA paH/ /prI t+yA tamA dA ya ta taHsa hai ba sa rA dza d+hA nI ma
<p>201b.2</p>bdag po'i mdza' bor gyur/ /legs bshad yang dag brjod pas reg pa ni/ /su zhig dag gis bsnyen bkur gnas mi 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po mi med ngal gyur pa/ /de yi bsil ba'i rim gros gdung ba bral/ /de nas byas shes de yis dga' bas de/ /blangs nas lhan cig rgyal
<p>201b.3</p>ga mat+k+r-i ta dz+nyaH/ /ta trA s+ya dzI ba pra da i t+yu dat+ta san+to Sha saM pU ri ta tsit+ta br-it+taH/ /rA dz+yAr+d+ha dA nA b+hi mu khaHsa ta s+thau tsit+ta nu br-it+ta s+ya ka maR+ya de yaM/ /rA dz+ya b+ha dA na bra sr-i te tha tasmin na tsin+ta yad+pun+da ra kaHkr-i pA
<p>201b.4</p>po'i pho brang song / /de la 'di yis srog rab byin zhes nas/ /lhag par tshim pas sems kyi spyod tshul rdzogs/ /rgyal srid phyed sbyin mngon phyogs de gnas te/ /sems rjes zhugs la sbyin min ci zhig yod/ /de ni rgyal srid phyed sbyin brtson pa'i tshe/ /mdzes pas mtshan mo bsams pa bdag
<p>201b.5</p>yAM/ /b+ha traM bi nA rA dza su khe na kiM me d+ha n+yo hi tata prI ti su d+hA b+hi Shik+taH/ /ma h+yaM na rA dz+yA da bi ro tsa ter+ha ma khaN+Di tAlpA pi hi sho b+ha te shrIH/ /e kAr+tha yo ge sa dA bibA dI dwa yor+hi b+ho gaiHka li re ba mur+t+tAH/ /
<p>201b.6</p>la ni/ /bzang mo med na rgyal srid bde bas ci/ /der mdza'i bdud rtsis dbang bskur skal ldan yin/ /rgyal srid las kyang phyed la bdag mi sred/ /dpal ni chung yang nyams pa med na mdzes/ /don gcig ldan pas rtag tu 'gal bar brjod/ /gnyis ka longs spyod rtsod la gzugs can nyid/ /
<p>202a</p>
<p>202a.1</p>tasmAd nr-i paM ku D+haM ma haM ni pA d+ya sa map+ta rA dz+ye na b+ha bA mi pUr+NaH/ /k+Sha NaM bi tsin+t+ya t+ya nu tA pa tap+tasti shre ma naMHswa s+ya pu naHpra da d+h+yau/ /kiM tsita tri taM niM d+ya ta raM ma yai tata ko yaM pra kA raHkha lu
<p>202a.2</p>de slad mi bdag nang nas bkum pa na/ /rgyal srid mtha' dag gis ni bdag rdzogs 'gyur/ /zhes pa skad cig rnam bsams 'gyod pas gdungs/ /drag po'i shugs btang de yis slar bsams pa/ /bdag gis ci bsams mchog tu smad 'os 'di/ /nges par rno ba'i
<p>202a.3</p>tIk+Sh+Na tA yAH/ /kr-i ta g+h+na sa kalpa ka laM ka le pA da ho nu ladz+dza ni dza tse ta so pi/ /swas+t+yastu rA dz+yA ya na maHsu khe b+h+yaHsaM mo ha mA tA k+Sha ma tAM tsa lak+Sh+mIH/ /ye ShA ma nA swA di ta tsin+ti tA nA me baM bi d+hA d+hIHpra tha maH
<p>202a.4</p>rab byed 'di lta ci/ /las ngan rtog pa'i dri mas rab bsgos pa/ /kye ma rang sems la yang ngo re tsha/ /rgyal srid shis gyur bde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun rmongs ma gcig dpal 'byor bzod par mdzod/ /gang dag nyams su ma myong bsam nyid na/ /dang po'i blo yi rang bzhin 'di ltar
<p>202a.5</p>swa b+hA baH/ /ba maM ni d+hat+te bi da d+hA tirmUr+ts+tshA ni pA ta ya t+ye ba ta masta no ti/ /A g+h+rA ta mA trai ba ka ro ti pUMsA ma ho bi nA shaM bi Sha bal+la rI shrIH/ /tsi raM bi tsin+t+ye ti sa dzA ta tsit+taHpra t+ye ka bo d+hi bi ma laHpra b+hA te/ /a
<p>202a.6</p>gyur/ /kye ma dpal dang dug shing bsnams tsam gyis/ /skyes bu rnams ni rnam par nyams par byed/ /'khrul pa skyed byed brgyal ba nyid du byed/ /rnam par lhung byed mun pa rgyas par byed/ /yun ring 'di bsams rang nyid byang chub la/ /chags bral de yi sems skyes snga dro ni/ /mi yi
<p>202b</p>
<p>202b.1</p>b+h+yar+th+ya mA no pi na re shwo re NarA dz+yaM na grA ha ni br-it+ta tr-iSh+NaH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha twa ma bAp+ta me naM kA le na dr-iSh+TA nr-i pa tirma har+d+hi/ /tat+pA da pad+ma ts+yu ti mau li mA l+yash+tsit+ta pra sA do tsi ta mi t+ya bo tsata/ /sa ko pi
<p>202b.2</p>dbang pos mngon par gsol btab kyang / /sred pa dang bral rgyal srid bzung ma gyur/ /dus kyis rang sangs rgyas nyid thob pa de/ /rdzu 'phrul che ldan mi bdag gis mthong nas/ /mgo 'phreng de yi zhabs pad la 'phos pas/ /sems ni dang bar 'os pa de dag smras/ /gang yang dam pa'i las
<p>202b.3</p>sat+kar+m+ma bi pA ka dzan+mA ban+p+yo bi be kaHpra sha mA b+hi She kaH/ /ya s+ya pra b+hA bAd+bi ra ta spri ha NAM t+ya dz+ye ba rat+nA ka ra me kha lA b+h+yUH/ /shru twe ti rA dz+nyA ka thi taM ta dar+tha dzA taM ta da b+h+yar+tha ma yA bi b+hA ya/ /tat+kalpa kaH
<p>202b.4</p>kyi rnam smin skyes/ /rab zhi'i dbang bskur dben de phyag byar 'os/ /gang gi mthu las chags pa bral rnams kyis/ /chu gter ske rags ldan pa btang bar 'os/ /zhes pa de don phyis bskyed rgyal pos brjod/ /thos nas de don don du gnyer nas bzung / /'dreg mkhan de ni zhi ba'i
<p>202b.5</p>shAn+ti pa daM pra pe de se bAn+ta raM gaHki la gaM gA pA laH/ /prAp+taM ta ma pyut+ta ma kar+m+ma yo gA ta pra bra dz+ya yA sadz+dza na pU dz+ya b+hA baM/ /rA dzA ba ban+de pra Na taHpr-i the byaHkam+pasta dA b+hU da pi ShaT bi kA raH/ /so yaM rA dzA bi hi ta bi na twar+b+ha
<p>202b.6</p>gnas thob nas/ /de nyid dman pa gang gA skyong ba po/ /mchog gi las kyi sbyor bas rab byung las/ /dam pa'i dngos po mchod 'os thob de la'ang / /rgyal pos rab btud phyag 'tshal de yi tshe/ /rnam 'gyur drug ldan sa yang g.yos par gyur/ /rgyal po rnams 'dud bsgrubs pa de ni bzang
<p>203a</p>
<p>203a.1</p>dr-i ko brah+ma dat+to pa sh+yo pA lI sa ki la ku sha lI kalpa ko gaM gA pA laH/ /i t+yAsh+tsAR+yaM b+ha ga ba du di taM b+hik+Sha bste sha mya swa ts+tshaM tsit+taM su kr-i ta sha ra Ne me ni re he tu me ba/ /i ti k+She
<p>203a.2</p>sbyin dag dang tshangs pas byin/ /gang yang nye bar 'khor de dge ldan 'dreg mkhan gang gA skyong ba po/ /zhes pa'i ngo mtshar bcom ldan gyis gsungs dge slong de dag rnams kyis thos/ /sems ni rab dang kho na legs pa'i lam la rgyu nyid yin par sems/ /zhes pa dge
<p>203a.3</p>men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM pi tA pu tra sa mA dA naM tra yo biM sha ti pal+la waH// //tsin+tA rat+na de d+hi ka ru tsa yaHsar+b+ba lo ke Sh+wa niM d+yA ba d+yo ste
<p>203a.4</p>ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las yab dang sras mjal ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //gang zhig sems can don rnams dag gi bu dang chung ma la sogs mchog tu ni/ /
<p>203a.5</p>n+yaHphu ru Sha ma Na yaHke s+ya pUr+b+ba pra b+ha baH/ /ye ShAn+ne ba pri ya ma pi pa raM pu tra dA rA di da twA sa twAr+thA nA b+ha ba ti ba da na m+lA na tA dai n+ya dU tI/ /b+ha ga bAn b+hik+Shu b+hiHdr-iSh+TaH
<p>203a.6</p>phangs pa'ang btang nas dman pa'i pho nya bzhin ni log pa gyur ba med pa nyid/ /yid bzhin rin chen las lhag mdzes shing 'jig rten kun gyis smad par mi 'os pa/ /skyes bu'i rin chen gzhan pa sngon med mthu ldan su zhig de rnams phyag bgyi 'os/ /shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon/ /lha
<p>203b</p>
<p>203b.1</p>pu rA shAkya pu re dzi naH/ /dza gA da pur+b+ba br-it+tAM taM de ba dat+ta ka thAn+ta re/ /pu rI ba b+hU ba bi shwA khyA bi shwA sa ba sa tiHshre yaH/ /bi shro pa kA ra sak+ta s+ya su kr-i ta s+ye pa dzan+ma b+hUH/ /saM
<p>203b.2</p>sbyin gtam gyi mjug thogs su/ /dge slong gis dris bcom ldan 'das/ /rgyal bas sngon gyi spyod mtha' gsungs/ /dpal 'byor yid gcugs gnas gyur pa/ /sna tshogs zhes pa'i grong khyer byung / /kun la phan pa'i nus pa can/ /legs byas skye ba'i sa gzhi bzhin/ /der ni mi bdag
<p>203b.3</p>dza yA khyo b+ha pat+ta s+yA ma mi tra ti mi rAM shu mAn/ /ne trA nan+da su d+hA sU tiM bi tsi tra tsa ri to nr-i paH/ /ta s+ya bi shwan+ta ro nA ma ba dA n+yastan yo b+ha bta/ /a pUr+b+ba t+ya gi nA ye na kr-i taM kalpa ta roR+Ya shaH/ /IR+Sh+ya bi
<p>203b.4</p>spyod tshul bkra/ /grogs min mun pa'i tsha zer can/ /mig gi kun dga' bdud rtsi'i gzugs/ /kun tu rgyal ba zhes pa byung / /de yi bu ni gtong phod can/ /thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gyur/ /gang gis sngon med gtong ba yis/ /dpag bsam shing gi grags pa phrogs/ /phrag dog spangs
<p>203b.5</p>ra hi tA tustu l+yaM bi dag+d+he na pra sA ta d+hi tAH/ /sa t+ya na b+hA ra ti ye na dA ne na shrIHshru te na d+hIH/ /ad+yA pe ya s+ya dik+kAn+tA kar+N+NA b+ha ra Na tAM ga taM/ /bi b+hA ti ke ta kI gar+b+haHpa la sha bi sha daM ya shaH/ /sa ka dA tsid+da dau di bya rat+nA
<p>203b.6</p>nas dus mnyam du/ /mkhas pa yis ni rab brgyan pa/ /bden pa gang gi tshig dang ni/ /sbyin pas dpal dang thos pas blo/ /gang gi grags pa ke ta ka'i/ /nang gi 'dab ltar dri med pa/ /phyogs kyi na chung rna rgyan du/ /gyur pa da lta'ang rnam par mdzes/ /nam zhig de yis slong ba la/ /shing rta
<p>204a</p>
<p>204a.1</p>laM kA ra mar+thi ne/ /ra thaM bi dza ya sA mra dz+yaM ma no ra tha ha raM twi ShA/ /dat+te ra the ba ri tasmin bisma ye nA khi lo dza naH/ /ba b+hU bA krAn+ta hr-i da yash+tsin+tat+ta ya ba na re swa raH/ /ma hA mA t+yUn thA hU ya haR+Sha
<p>204a.2</p>rgyal srid rnam par rgyal/ /'od kyis yid la re ba 'phrog /rin chen mchog gis brgyan pa byin/ /shing rta mchog de byin pa la/ /skye bo mtha' dag ya mtshan gyis/ /snying ni kun tu non gyur cing / /bsam pas kyang ngo mi yi dbang / /de nas sa bdag dga' ba zhan/ /
<p>204a.3</p>hI no ma hI pa tiH/ /u bA tso pa tsi tod+be ga tsin+ta krAn+ta ma no ra thaH/ /tat+to ra thaHku mA re Na sa dzai traHsha tru mar+d+da naH/ /yat+p+ra b+hA bAp+dz+dzi tA se yaM ma hA ra tha ba rU thi nI/ /lak+Sh+mAHsu kha ni ShaN+NAM me yA tA
<p>204a.4</p>yid la re ba bsams pas non/ /mi dga' ba ni nyer bsags pas/ /blon po che rnams bos te smras/ /shing rta chen po'i bde 'di ni/ /gang gi mthu yis rab bsgrubs pa/ /dgra 'joms rgyal bar byed pa yi/ /shing rta de ni gzhon nus byin/ /gnyis la bdag gi dpal 'byor ni/ /
<p>204a.5</p>nish+tsa la tAM dwa ye/ /ra the sauR+Ya pa the tasmin dza ya kuny+dze ba kuny+dza re/ /i ti rA dzA ba tsaHshru twA ta ma b+hA Shan+ta man+t+ri NaH/ /rA dzan+da do Shasta be bAyaM bAt+sa l+ye na pra mA d+ya taH/ /d+har+m+maHka s+ya na haR+Ya ya dA naM ka s+ya
<p>204a.6</p>g.yo med gyur cing bde bar gnas/ /shing rta rtul phod lam de dang / /glang po rgyal ba'i gter la'o/ /de skad rgyal bo'i tshig thos nas/ /blon po rnams kyis der smras pa/ /mnyes gshin nas ni bag med pa/ /'di ni rgyal po khyod kyi skyon/ /chos ni su yi dga' ba min/ /sbyin pa su yi
<p>204b</p>
<p>204b.1</p>na sam+ma taM/ /kin+tu mU la ha tA br-ik+ShAn+ni bar+t+tan+te pha lAr+thi naH/ /bi kr-I taHpa ra de she tsa ra thaste na dwi dzan+ma nA/ /i t+yuk+t+wA man+t+ri NaHsar+b+baM sha l+ya bar+d+hA i bA b+ha ban/ /a tha kA le na saM prAp+te ba san+te ma
<p>204b.2</p>bkur bya min/ /'on kyang rtsa ba nyams pa yis/ /shing las 'bras bu don gnyer ldog /gnyis skyes de yi shing rta yang / /gzhan gyi yul du btsongs bar gyur/ /ces smras blon po thams cad ni/ /zug rngus zug pa bzhin du gyur/ /de nas dge ba'i rnam smin bzhin/ /snying
<p>204b.3</p>da not+sa be/ /bi pA ke su kr-i ta s+ya ba hr-i da yA nan+da dA yi ni/ /swa yaM gra ho pa dzI bya s+ya ma d+horma d+hu ka rAr+thi naH/ /lo ke puSh+pa ba nai yA teHya sho b+hi ri ba shu b+h+ra taM/ /a sho ka lo ka sats+tsha ya mu
<p>204b.4</p>la kun dga' ster byed pa/ /dus kyis myos byed dga' ba yi/ /dpyid ni yang dag byung gyur cing / /dpyid ni don gnyer bung ba rnams/ /rang nyid kyis bzung bsten 'os pa'i/ /me tog tshal gyi 'jig rten ni/ /grags pa bzhin du dkar ba dang / /'gro ba ljon pa mya ngan med/ /'jig
<p>204b.5</p>pa kA ro d+ya taM dru maM/ /ma d+hau bi d+hA tuM san+nad+d+he ka li kA laM kr-i ta dza gta/ /rA dzA pu tra sa mA ru h+ya kuny+dza raM rA dz+ya bar+d+ha naM/ /ya yau phul+lA na ba ne duSh+NaM mar+thi kalpa ta rusta run/ /bra
<p>204b.6</p>rten grib bsil phan par brtson/ /me tog gzhon nus rab brgyan pa/ /dpyid kyis bsgrub par brtsams pa'i tshe/ /rgyal sras slong ba'i dpag bsam shing / /rgyal srid 'phel byed glang po la/ /zhon pa me tog rgyas pa yi/ /ljon pa gzigs su nags su gshegs/ /rgyal
<p>205a</p>
<p>205a.1</p>dzan+taM pra ti sA man+ta pra yuk+tAsti dwi dzAHpa thi/ /ba b+hA Shi re sa ma b+h+ye t+ya swasti bA da pu raHsa rAH/ /tsin+tA ma Nirgi ya se twaM sh+lA g+h+yo dza ga ti dzaM ga maH/ /ya s+ya san+daR+sha ne nAr+thI gA D+ha
<p>205a.2</p>phran gzhan gyis btang ba yi/ /bram ze lam du bgrod de la/ /mngon phyogs shis pa brjod pa'i tshig /sngon du btang nas rab smras pa/ /legs pa khyod ni 'jig rten na/ /g.yo ba'i yid bzhin nor bur sgrogs/ /gang dang phrad pas slong ba rnams/ /dpal gyi
<p>205a.3</p>mA lik+Sh+ya tre shri yA/ /dwA be ba bi shru tot+kaR+Sha bi she Shau b+ha dra dzan+ma ni/ /dA nAr+d+ra hasta s+t+waM lo ke ga dzesh+tsA yaM s+thi ron+na tiH/ /asma b+h+ya su kr-i to dA ra kuny+dza ro da yaM pra dI ya tAM/ /twa da n+ye na ba dA n+ye na
<p>205a.4</p>mchog tu 'khyud par gyur/ /phul phyin khyad par grags pa ni/ /gnyis nyid bzang po'i skye ba la/ /sbyin pas lag brlan 'jig rten na/ /khyod dang mtho brtan glang 'di 'o/ /legs byas rgya che'i glang po 'di/ /bdag cag la ni gnang bar mdzod/ /khyod las gzhan gyis gtong
<p>205a.5</p>dA tu me me Sha shAkya te/ /i t+yar+thi ta staiHsot+sa hAHsa te b+h+yastu da dau rwi paM/ /sa dzI ba mi ba sA mrA dz+ya sa shaM kha d+h+wa dza tsA ma raM/ /da twA bo d+hi prad+hA ne na pra Ni d+hA ne na shud d+ha d+hIH/ /ra tha
<p>205a.6</p>phod ni/ /'di ni sbyin par mi nus so/ /de yis de blangs spro ldan de/ /srog ldan yang dag rgyal srid bzhin/ /dung dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab bcas/ /gnyis 'thung de dag rnams la byin/ /byang chub gtso bo sman lam gyis/ /rin chen mang ldan glang po'i dbang / /byin nas
<p>205b</p>
<p>205b.1</p>rat+naM dwi pen+d+rany+tsa so b+hU dA nan+dir+b+ha raH/ /shru twai ba nr-i pa tirdat+taM bi shru taM dza ya kuny+dza raM/ /rak+ShA pra kA ra ra hi tAM rA dza lak+Sh+mI ma ma n+yata/ /sa rA dz+ya b+h+rAM sa b+hI te na ku pi te na ma hI b+hU
<p>205b.2</p>dag pa'i blo ldan de/ /kun tu dga' ba rgyas par gyur/ /rgyal ba'i glang po byin pa yi/ /grags pa mi bdag gis thos nas/ /rgyal po'i dpal 'byor bsrung ba yi/ /thabs dang bral ba nyid du bsams/ /de nas sa bdag rgyal srid ni/ /nyams pas 'jigs shing khros pa
<p>205b.3</p>dzA/ /niHkA si taHku mA ro\u0f85tha pra tas+the pra ni pa t+ya taM/ /mA drU da yi ta yA sAr+d+haM dzA li ni nA ma dA ra kaM/ /kr-iSh+NA b+hi d+hAM ta thA ka n+yA mA dA ya sa ya yau ba naM/ /ba ne pi she Sha sa da dau bA ha nA di ka mar+thi
<p>205b.4</p>yis/ /nges par bskrad nas gzhon nu de/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni chas gyur te/ /btsun mo ma dris lha gcig des/ /gzhon nu dris ldan zhes pa dang / de bzhin kr-iSh+Na zhes pa yi/ /bu mo khyer nas nags su song / /slong ba rnams la nags su yang / /bzhon pa la sogs lhag
<p>205b.5</p>ne/ /sa maM hi ma ha tAM sa twaM saM pat+su tsa bi pat+su tsa/ /ma d+yAM ka dA tsid+YA tA yAM puSh+pa mU la pha lAp+ta ye/ /brAh+ma NaHkash+tsi da b+h+ye t+ye rA dza pu tra ma b+hA Sha ta/ /pa ri dA ra ka hI NA ya tsa tu rau
<p>205b.6</p>ma byin/ /gang phyir chen po'i snying stobs ni/ /phun sum tshogs sam rgud kyang snyoms/ /nam zhig ma dris me tog dang / /rtsa ba 'bras bu bsgrub pa'i slad/ /song tshe bram ze su zhig gis/ /rgyal po'i sras la mngon phyogs smras/ g.yog 'khor med pa bdag la ni/ /bu sring
<p>206a</p>
<p>206a.1</p>bA la kA bi mau/ /de hi ma h+yaM ma hA sa twA sar+b+ba do h+ya saM bi shru taH/ /shru twai ta ra bi ba dA ra kau da yi to pa raM/ /da twA sa tasta smai sa hA sA se te tad+bi ra ha bya thaM/ /d+ha na
<p>206a.2</p>sbyang po 'di dag blang / /gang phyir snying stobs chen po khyod/ /thams cad sbyin par rab tu grags/ /'di thos 'phral la ma dpyad par/ /mchog tu sdug pa'i bu sring dag /de yis de la byin nas ni/ /de bral mya ngan bzod par byas/ /nor dang bu dang
<p>206a.3</p>pu tra ka la trA di lo ke ka s+ya naM bal+la b+haM/ /dA nA da n+yad+ba dA n+yA nAM da yi taM nA da yA pa taM/ /a tha mA trA sa ma b+h+ye t+ya bA ma kau bA la bat+sa lA/ /a pa sh+yan+tI pu raHpa t+yuHpa ti tA t+pan+ta mUr+ts+tshitA/ /
<p>206a.4</p>chung ma sogs/ /'jig rten pa yi mchog tu phangs/ /brtse ldan gtong phod can rnams la/ /sbyin pa las gzhan phangs pa med/ /de nas bu la mnyes gshin pa'i/ /ma dris 'ongs pas bu sring dag /ma mthong shin tu brgyal nas ni/ /khyo yi mdun du 'gyel bar gyur/ /
<p>206a.5</p>sA la b+ha saM dz+nyA dIp+te na byAp+ta sho ka kr-i shA nu nA/ /shi shu pra dA na br-it+tAn+taM shru twA ba b+hUt+p+ra lA bi nI/ /ta s+yA shwe ta si duHkhAg+ni ra ba t+ya sne ha duHsa haH/ /pri ya pre mA nu br-i t+ye ba pra ya yau pu tra pA ka tAM/ /
<p>206a.6</p>mya ngan me ni 'bar ba yis/ /khyab cing cho nge 'don pa de/ /'du shes rnyed pas bu sring dag /byin par gyur pa'i byung mtha' thos/ /khyo la mdza' bas rjes zhugs de/ /bu la byams pa'i sdug bsngal me/ /bzod dka' de yi sems la ni/ /khong du rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ /
<p>206b</p>
<p>206b.1</p>a trAn+ta re sa ma b+h+ye t+ya bi pra rU paHsu re shwa raH/ /b+h+r-i t+yAr+thi da yi tAM pat+niM rA dza pu tra ma yA tsa ta/ /yA tsi ta ste na sa ha pA shu tsaM dzA yA bi yo ga dzAM/ /d+hI ya saM staM b+h+ya satwA b+b+hiHsa tasmai bi tA ra
<p>206b.2</p>skabs der lha yi dbang po ni/ /bram ze'i gzugs su mngon par 'ongs/ /rgyal po'i sras la btsun mo ni/ /sdug ma 'bangs mo'i don du bslangs/ /de yis bslangs pa'i 'phral la de/ /btsun mo dang bral mya ngan dag /blo yis bzod byas snying stobs kyis/ /chu gter de yis
<p>206b.3</p>tAM/ /sa d+yaHpra dA na ta ra lAM pAM trastAM ha ri NI mi ba/ /so ba da si tA man+taHka la yan+bo d+hi bA sa nA naM/ /sa mA shwa si hi ka l+yA Ni na sho kaM kartu mar+ha si/ /swap+na pra Na ya kalpo ya ma
<p>206b.4</p>de la byin/ /'phral la byin pas rab 'khrugs shing / /ri dwags mo bzhin rnam skrag pa'i/ /btsun mo la nges byang chub kyi/ /bag chag snang du 'jog cing smras/ /dge ma yang dag yid rton cig /mya ngan bya bar mi 'os so/ /mdza' ba 'di ni rmi lam 'dra/ /snying sdug
<p>206b.5</p>sa t+yaHpre ya saM ga maH/ /shu shrU ShayA dwi dza s+yA s+ya d+har+m+me te ra ma tAM ma tiH/ /bi lo la lo ka ya trA yAM d+har+m+maHs+thi ra su kr-i ta sa tAM/ /dr-iSh+TaHsar+b+be swa dza na su dza nA ban+d+ha bA sh+tsA nu b+hU tA n+yastAH
<p>206b.6</p>'grogs pa bden pa med/ /gnyis skyes 'di la gus pa yis/ /khyod blo chos la dga' bar gyis/ /g.yo ba'i 'jig rten bgrod pa la/ /dam pa'i chos ni brtan pa'i grogs/ /rang gi skye bo skye bo legs pa kun mthong gnyen rnams nyams su myong bar gyur/ /skad
<p>207a</p>
<p>207a.1</p>kaN+The k+Sha Na pa ri ma la m+lA yi nI mi tra mA lA/ /dA re pu tre k+Sha pi ta mA ni shaM yau ba naM dzI bi tany+tsa prAp+to nAp+ta s+thi ra pa ri tsa yaHko pi d+har+m+ma tr-i te n+yaH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA bal+la
<p>207a.2</p>cig yongs su gyur pas dri ma can 'gyur grogs kyi 'phreng ba mgrin par bkod/ /lang tsho dang ni srog dag chung ma bu yis rtag tu zad pa nyid gyur cing / /chos las gzhan pa'i thob pa gang yang yongs su 'dris pa brtan pa nyid ma thob/ /ces smras btsun
<p>207a.3</p>b+hAlo b+ha pa ri t+yA ga tu bA hA saH/ /d+yU tiM ba da na pad+me na d+hai R+Ya br-it+tany+tsa tse ta sA/ /bi yo ga sho ka bi ka lAM ma drIM dr-iSh+T+wA kr-i pA ku laH/ /ni dzaM rU paM sa ma d+hA ya sha tsi pa ti ru bA
