<p>207a.4</p>mo la chags pa/ /yongs btang de yi bzhin pad kyis/ /mdzes dang sems kyi brtan pa yi/ /spyod tshul dag ni de yis bzung / /'bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i/ /ma dris mthong nas snying rjes 'khrugs/ /bde sogs bdag pos rang gi gzugs/ /yang dag bzung
<p>207a.5</p>tsa tAM/ /bi ShA daM mA kr-i thAHpu tri de bo haM tri da she shwa raH/ /ar+thi b+h+ya s+t+wan+da dA t+ye Sha tasmA da si ma yAr+thi tA/ /a d+hU nA s+yai ba pa t+yu s+t+wAM n+yA sI b+hU tA ma yAr+pi tA/ /taM da dA t+ye Sha nA n+yasmai pa ra swaM
<p>207a.6</p>nas de la smras/ /bu mo mi dga' ma byed cig /nga ni skabs gsum dbang po lha/ /'di yis slong ba rnams la khyod/ /ster gyur de slad bdag gis bslangs/ /da ni khyo 'di nyid la khyod/ /bdag gis gtams par byas te gtad/ /gzhan la 'di yis khyod mi ster/ /ji ltar gzhan
<p>207b</p>
<p>207b.1</p>dI ya te ka thaM/ /ka ri Sh+yA mi ta bA ba sh+yAM dA ra kA b+h+yaM sa mA ga maM/ /i t+yu dIR+Ya sa ha srAk+ShaHsa ha sAn+ta ra d+hI ya ta/ /a tha to dA ra ko bi praHsa mA dA yAr+thi lip+sa yA/ /bi shwA mi tre pu raM ga twA lo b+ha ti kre tu mu R+ya
<p>207b.2</p>gyi nor ster gyur/ /khyod ni bu sring gnyis po dang / /nges par phrad pa bdag gis bya/ /zhes smras mig stong ldan pa ni/ /'phral la nyid du mi snang gyur/ /de nas bram ze bu tsha dag /khyer nas nor ni 'dod pa yis/ /thams cad shes kyi grong song nas/ /chags pa las ni 'tshod
<p>207b.3</p>tau/ /bi shwA mi traHpa ri dz+nyA ya rA dza pu tra s+ya dA ra kau/ /dza grA ma ha tA r+the na bASh+pa sa rud+d+ha lo tsa naH/ /kA le na tri di baM yA te bi shwA mi tri ma hI pa tau/ /b+he dze bi shwan+ta ro rA dz+yaM yau
<p>207b.4</p>bar brtson/ /rgyal po'i sras kyi bu sring dag /thams cad shes kyis yongs shes nas/ /mig ni mchi mas 'gags pa yis/ /nor ni chen po dag gis bslus/ /dus kyis sa bdag thams cad shes/ /mtho ris gshegs tshe grong khyer pa/ /blon po'i tshogs kyis gsol
<p>207b.5</p>rA mA t+ya ga NAr+thi taH/ /rA dz+ye bi ra dzasta s+ya s+yA dA na bya sa ni naHpa raM/ /sa twe na bar+d+h+ha ma nar+d+hir+n+na kash+tsit+YAtsa ko b+ha bta/ /tad+bi t+ta pUr+N+Na bi b+ha bo brA h+ma NaHso pidz+dza dz+dzu kaH/ /kr-i tag+h+naHswa pra b+hA bAt+me sam+pa
<p>207b.6</p>btab nas/ /thams cad sgrol gyis rgyal srid bsten/ /mchog tu sbyin pa la zhen pa/ /rdul bral de yi rgyal srid ni/ /phun tshogs snying stobs kyis rgyas pas/ /su yang slong ba por ma gyur/ /nor des 'byor tshogs sdig pa can/ /bram ze dz+dza dz+dzu ka de yang / /bdag gi rang mthus phun tshogs zhes/ /
<p>208a</p>
<p>208a.1</p>di t+ya b+h+ya d+hA dz+dza naM/ /bi shwan+ta raHsa e bA haM de bdat+taHsa tsa dwi dzaH/ /uk+t+wai ti tsakra b+ha ga bAn+b+hi k+ShU NAn+dA na de sha nAM/ /A laM ba na shwa b+h+ra sha tA ba sA te g+ho rAn+d+ha kA re su tsi ra pra kA shaH/ /
<p>208a.2</p>skye bo dag la mngon par smras/ /thams cad sgrol deng nyid de/ /gnyis skyes de yang lhas byin no/ /dge slong rnams la bcom ldan gyis/ /'di gsungs sbyin pa bstan pa mdzad/ /sbyin pa 'jig rten pha rol mi rnams gnyen/ /g.yang sa brgyar ni kun tu lhungs pa'i rten/ /
<p>208a.3</p>A shwA sa naM duHsa ha duHkha kA le dA naM na rA NI pa ra lo ka ban+d+huH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi rA tsi tA yaM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM bi shwan+ta rA ba dA nan+nA ma tsa tur+b+biM shaHpal+la waH// //
<p>208a.4</p>'jigs rung mun par yun ring rab tu gsal/ /bzod dka'i sdug bsngal dus su dbugs 'byin no/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las thams cad sgrol gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //
<p>208a.5</p>ta pa ti sa ka la lo kA lo ka sa rgA ya b+hA nuHpa ra ma ma mr-i ta br-iSh+T+yai pUr+N+Na ta me ti tsan+d+raH/ /i ya ti dza ga ti pU dz+yaM dzan+ma gr-i h+NA ti k+Shid+bi pu la ku sha la se tuHsa twa san+tA ra NA ya/ /pu rA shud+d+ho da naHshrI mAn rA dza
<p>208a.6</p>mtha' dag 'jig rten snang ba spro slad nyi ma 'od zer 'gyed/ /bdud rtsi'i char mchog dbab slad zla ba rdzogs pa nyid du 'gro/ /sems can bsgral ba'i slad du dge ba'i zam stegs chen po ni/ /kha cig 'di snyad 'gro bar bsngags par 'os pa'i skye ba 'dzin/ /shAkya'i grong khyer dag tu sngon/ /rgyal
<p>208b</p>
<p>208b.1</p>shAkya bu re b+ha bta/ /ya sha sha shAng+ka dza na kaHsu d+hA sin+d+hu ri bA pa raH/ /kha la sak+tA swa b+hA be na lak+Sh+mI ru Ni ga NAr+p+pi tA/ /Ash+tsaR+Ya kA ri Na ye na kr-i tA sat+pa k+Sha pA ti nI/ /a d+yA pya khi la dik+tIr+tha ba na sak+tair+b+bi
<p>208b.2</p>po dpal ldan zas gtsang byung / /grags pa'i ri bong can bskyed pa/ /bdud rtsi'i chu gter gzhan pa bzhin/ /ngo bos mi bsrun la chags dpal/ /ngo mtshar byed pa su zhig gis/ /yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la gtad/ /dam pa'i phyogs su lhung bar byas/ /da lta'ang ma lus phyogs dang ngogs/ /nags
<p>208b.3</p>be ke b+hiH/ /ya sho b+hiHsho tsi b+hAR+Ya s+ya mu ni bra ta mi bo dz+ya te/ /s+yA ma haM bud+d+ha mA te ti pu rA pra Ni d+hi taHki laH/ /bi shwa kar+m+ma su ta mar+t+ya mA dza gA mA ma lad+Yu tiH/ /kIrtiHsat+pu ru Sha s+ya ba ta s+yA b+hUt+pal+la
<p>208b.4</p>su chags shing dben ldan pa/ /gang gi grags pa rnam dag pas/ /thub pa'i brtul zhugs blangs pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas ma ru bdag gyur cig /ces pa'i smon lam sngon btab pas/ /dri med mdzes par mi yul 'ongs/ /bi shra karma'i bu mo lo/ /skyes bu dam pa'i grags pa bzhin/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul
<p>208b.5</p>b+hA pa raM/ /ma hA mA yA b+hi d+ha de pI tsan+d+ra s+ye ba ku mud+ba tI/ /sA pa sh+yad+dan+ti naM shwe taM swap+ne ku k+Shau bi hA yA sA/ /ga ti mA ro ha na shai lo pra Na tiny+tsa ma hA dza nata/ /a trAn+ta re bo d+hi satwa stu Shi te tri da shA la yAta/ /gar+b+haM ta s+yAH
<p>208b.6</p>che zhes pa/ /de yi yid 'ong mchog tu gyur/ /zla ba'i ku mud ldan pa bzhin/ /de yi rmi lam dku nang na/ /glang po dkar dang mkha' la 'gro/ /ri bo 'dzeg dang skye bo ni/ /chen pos rab tu 'dud pa mthong / /skabs der byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /rang nyid 'jig rten la brtsi bas/ /dga' ldan lha
<p>209a</p>
<p>209a.1</p>sa mA pa de swa yaM lo kA nu kam+pa yA/ /ba han+tI bo d+hi satwaM sA gar+b+ha b+hU ba na nan+da naM/ /in+du dug+d+hA bi be le ba ba b+hU ba pAN+Da ra d+yu tiH/ /ik+Sh+NA ku rA dza baM sh+ye na te na gar+b+hA s+thi te na sA/ /b+hun+ni
<p>209a.2</p>yi gnas dag las/ /de yi lhums su yang dag byon/ /'jig rten dga' byed byang chub sems/ /de yis lhums su bzung ba ni/ /'o mtsho'i rlabs kyi zla ba bzhin/ /dkar ba'i 'od dang ldan par gyur/ /bu ram shing skyes rgyal po'i brgyud/ /de ni lhums na gnas pas de/ /gter
<p>209a.3</p>d+ha na ba tI bA b+hUr+b+ha bya la k+Sha Na lak+Shi tI/ /ba b+hu ba do ha dasta s+yA dA na pu N+ya ma yo da yaH/ /aM ku re s+ya bi saM bA di sa ha kA ra s+ya sau ra b+haM/ /a tha kA le na saM pur+N+NaM sA lum+bi ni ba nes+thi tA/ /a sU ta ta na yan+de
<p>209a.4</p>dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi bzhin/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshon gyur/ /de yi sred pa byung gyur pa/ /sbyin pa'i bsod nams rang bzhin skyes/ /sa ha ka ra'i dri bzang ni/ /sol ba la yang slu ba min/ /de nas dus kyis yang dag rdzogs/ /lum+bi ni yi nags gnas pa'i/ /lha mo de la sras bltams
<p>209a.5</p>bI di bA ka ra mi bA di tiH/ /mA tur+g+gar+b+ha ma lA spr-iSh+TaM kuk+ShiM b+hi twA sa nirga taH/ /tAny+tsa kre tha swa b+hA be na swa s+thAM gi bi ga ta bye thAM/ /nir+g+ga ts+tshan+ne ba rud+d+ho sau ba la dzi dz+nyA sa yA k+Sha NaM/ /sha kre Na badzra sA rAM gasta s+yAM shAkya twa mA
<p>209a.6</p>te/ /a di ti las nyin byed bzhin/ /ma yi mngal gyi dri ma yis/ /ma reg de yi dku brtol byung / /de nas de yi rang bzhin gyis/ /gdung bral lus ni rnal gnas gyur/ /phyir byung nyid na brgya byin gyis/ /stobs shes 'dod nas skad cig ni/ /rdo rje snying po'i sku de bzung / /de ni nus med nyid du
<p>209b</p>
<p>209b.1</p>ya yau/ /dzA tA mA traHshi shur+g+ga twA swa yaM sap+ta pa dA ni saH/ /de sha bi lo ka yan+nu tse su byak+tA k+Sha ra yA gi rA/ /i yaM me nir+b+r-it+taHpUr+b+bA ma ti lo ke Shu dak+Shi NAH/ /bash+tsi mA dzA ti ra pye ShA saM sA rA di ya mut+ta rA/ /
<p>209b.2</p>gyur/ /bltams pa tsam gyis khye'u de/ /rang gi gom pa bdun phyin nas/ /yi ge rab gsal tshig gis ni/ /phyogs su rnam par gzigs shing smras/ /'di ni bdag gi myang 'das shar/ /'jig rten blo gros rjes mthun lho/ /'di yang skye ba'i mtha' dang nub/ /'di ni 'khor ba dag las
<p>209b.3</p>e ti ta s+ya bru bA Na s+ya pr-i thi bI sa ma kam+pa ta/ /ta ma sa k+Sha ba laM d+hAr+t+tu ma shak+ti ba dza gang+gu ruM/ /in+d+raM ta s+ya ya shaHshu b+h+raM satwa sme raM sa tsA ma raM/ /byo mAm+bA d+hA ra d+hau ta s+ya dza gr-i husta tra de ba tAH/ /
<p>209b.4</p>byang / /de skad de yis brjod pa na/ /sa ni kun tu 'dar gyur te/ /'gro ba'i bla ma mi zad stobs/ /de ni gzung bar ma nus bzhin/ /mkha' yi chu rgyun gyis bkrus pa/ /de yi grags pa dkar ba'i gdugs/ /snying stobs 'dzum pa'i rnga yab bcas/ /der ni lha rnams dag gis bzung / /
<p>209b.5</p>a smin+na ba sa re br-iSh+TaHswaHshre ye NA si tA b+hi d+haH/ /na ra de na pra b+hAM dr-iSh+T+wA kiShikan+d+ha dr-is+thi to mu niH/ /ka smA dar+k+ka sha tA lo ka i bA lo ke pra dr-i sh+ya te/ /ta mo da ri drA ye nai ti gi ra yaHsa gu ha gr-i hAH/ /bisma yA di
<p>209b.6</p>skabs der nag po zhes pa yi/ /thub pa kiSh+Ti de yi ring / /gnas la tsha bo mi sbyin gyis/ /'od zer mthong nas rab tu dris/ /phug dang khang par bcas pa'i ri/ /gang gi mun pas dbul byed pa/ /nyi ma brgya yi snang ba bzhin/ /snang ba mthong ba gang las lags/ /ya mtshan las des de
<p>210a</p>
<p>210a.1</p>ti te nok+taHso ba dad+di bya lo tsa naH/ /dzA ta pu N+yA ba b+hA so yaM bo d+hi satwa s+ya dzan+ma ni/ /a tsi re Nai ba taM bat+sa drak+Sh+ya baHku sha lAp+ta ye/ /i t+yuk+t+wA mu ni rA nan+da bi sh+r+'an+ti su khaM to\u0f85b+ha ba ta/ /pu tra dzan+ma
<p>210a.2</p>skad brjod/ /lha yi spyan ldan des smras pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba la/ /bsod nams snang ba 'di dag skyes/ /mnyes gshin mi ring nyid na de/ /dge ba'i slad du 'u cag blta/ /zhes brjod thub pa kun dga' zhing / /ngal bsos bde ba nyid du gyur/ /sras bltams
<p>210a.3</p>ni sar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+hiM shud+d+ho da naHpe rAM/ /dr-iSh+T+wA sar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+ho ya mi ti nA mA s+ya nir+m+ma me/ /shAkya bar+d+ha na nA mA b+hUd+Yak+ShaHshAkya pu rA shra yaH/ /yat+p+ra NA me na shAkyA nAM shi sha bo ni ru pa dra bAH/ /tat+s+thi t+yA pra
<p>210a.4</p>don kun mchog tu ni/ /grub pa zas gtsang gis mthong nas/ /'di ni don kun grub pa zhes/ /de yi mtshan yang btags par gyur/ /gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes pa/ /shAkya'i grong khyer dag na gnas/ /gang la btud pas shAkya yi/ /byis pa nyer 'tshe med par 'gyur/ /lugs des yab
<p>210a.5</p>Shi taM pi trA pra NA mA ya sa gu he kaH/ /twaM bo d+hi satwa mA lokya ni pA pa tA s+ya pA da yoH/ /a thot+saM ge sa mA da ya hr-iSh+Ta staM pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /lak+Sha NA ni ni mit+ta dz+nyai sta s+ya de he bya lo ka yata/ /lak+Sha Na
<p>210a.6</p>kyis phyag 'tshal ba'i/ /slad du gtang tshe gsang ba pa/ /de yis byang chub sems dpa' de/ /mthong nas de yi zhabs la gtugs/ /de nas sa bdag dgyes pa yis/ /de ni pang du blangs byas nas/ /de yi lus la mtshan rnams ni/ /mtshan mkhan dag gis rab tu bltas/ /de nas mtshan
<p>210b</p>
<p>210b.1</p>dz+nyAsta taHsar+b+be nr-i pa mU tsaHsa bisma yAH/ /de ba di bya ku mA ro\u0f85yaM lak+Sha Nai ru pa lak+Sha te/ /dzA ya te lak+Sha Ne re tai bi shwa bi shrAn+ta shA sa naH/ /shakrA d+hi pash+tsakra brtI b+ha ga bAn+bA ta thA ga
<p>210b.2</p>shes ya mtshan ldan/ /kun gyis mi bdag la smras pa/ /lha gcig gzhon nu mchog 'di ni/ /mtshan rnams dag gis nye bar mtshon/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag rnams kyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba brgya byin bdag /thams cad la gso'i skal ldan nam/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
<p>210b.3</p>taH/ /dIr+g+hAng+gu li da lau tsakra lAM ts+tsha nau su pra tiSh+Thi tau/ /a ru Nau tsa ra NA ba s+ya kAn+tau ka ma la ko ma lau/ /rA dza haM saM i ba prAM shu sa dzA lAng+gu li pal+la baH/ /e NI dzA nu yu gaHshrI mA nA
<p>210b.4</p>par 'gyur/ /'di yi zhabs gnyis rab tu mdzes/ /dmar zhing pad+ma lta bur mnyen/ /sor mo'i 'dab ring 'khor lo yis/ /mtshan zhing legs par rab tu gnas/ /mtho zhing ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /sor mo'i yal 'dab dra bar ldan/ /dpal ldan e ne'i byin pa zung / /pus mo'i
<p>210b.5</p>nu b+hu dza b+hu Shi taH/ /sa ko sha hasti gu h+yash+tsa n+ya gro d+ha pa ri maN+Da laH/ /dak+Shi NA bar+t+ta ro mang+kaHpa riNA ha sa mon+na tiH/ /ra dzo ma la la bA spr-iSh+Ta stap+ta dzAM bU na da d+yu tiH/ /hasta pA dAM sha kAN+ThA gra spaSh+Ta
<p>210b.6</p>bar du phyag gis brgyan/ /gsang ba sbubs bcas glang po bzhin/ /n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab/ /g.yas su 'khyil ba'i spu yis mtshan/ /rgya khyon dag dang mtshungs par snang / /rdul dang dri ma'i chas ma reg/ /'dzam+bu chu bo btso ma'i 'od/ /phyag zhabs phrag so mgrin pa'i mchog /rab gsal
<p>211a</p>
<p>211a.1</p>sap+ta ts+cha dA kr-i tiH/ /siM ha pUr+b+bAr+d+d+ha kA yash+tsa br-i hat+s+paSh+TAng+ga pi gra haH/ /tsa twA rIM shat+sa ma shre ta sap+ta dan+ta su nA si kaH/ /dIr+g+ha pra ta nu dzi hwash+tsa me g+ha dun+du b+hi ni sra naH/ /a
<p>211a.2</p>'dab ma bdun pa'i dbyibs/ /sku stod dag kyang seng ge 'dra/ /lus kyi yan lag che zhing gsal/ /tshems ni bzhi bcu mnyam zhing dkar/ /bar mtshams med cing shangs dag mdzes/ /ljags kyang ring zhing srab pa ste/ /'brug dang rnga yi sgra lta bu/ /spyan mthing rdzi
<p>211a.3</p>b+hi nI lAk+Sha go pak+Sh+mAM sa ha dzoSh+NI Sha masta kaH/ /si tor+N+NAng+ka su b+h+ru b+hA gaHswasti ko raHs+tha lodz+dz+wa la/ /le khA shr-iM gAb+dza hasto yaM ts+tshat+t+rA kA ra shi rAHshi shuH/ /rA dzan+na yaM te ta na yash+tsakra bar+t+tA b+ha biSh+ya ti/ /samya k+saM bo d+hi
<p>211a.4</p>ma pa yi 'dra/ /gtsug tor lhan cig skyes pa'i dbu/ /dbu ni gdugs dbyibs byis pa 'di/ /mdzod spu dkar mdzes smin char mtshan/ /thugs kar bkra shis rab tu 'bar/ /ri mo dung dang chu skyes phyag /rgyal po khyod kyi sras po 'di/ /'khor los sgyur ba'am kun mkhyen ni/ /yang dag
<p>211a.5</p>saM bud+d+haHsar+b+ba dz+nyo bA dza gang+gu ruH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA te Shu dzA te Shu le b+hehaR+ShaM ma hI pa tiH/ /sap+ta phir+d+di ba saiHshAstup+dza na nI tri di baM ya yau/ /ta s+ya dzan+ma ni shAkya nAM mu nI nA mi ba shAn+ta tA/ /dr-iSh+TA ya dA shAkya mu
<p>211a.6</p>rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla mar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod de dag song ba'i tshe/ /sa yi bdag pos dga' ba thob/ /nyin zhag bdun na ston pa yi/ /yum ni mtho ris dag tu song / /gang tshe de bltams shAkya rnams/ /thub pa bzhin du zhi ba nyid/ /mthong ba de tshe gzhon nu de/ /
<p>211b</p>
<p>211b.1</p>nir+n+nA mA b+hut+sa ta dA shi shuH/ /de bA nA ma pi de bo ya mi ti nish+tsi t+ya te dza sA/ /de bA ti de ba i t+ya s+ya nA ma tsakre ma hI pa tiH/ /nA ra de nA tha sa hi tasta twa daR+ShI ta po ba nAta/ /taM sa ma b+h+ya ya yau draSh+Tu ma da ra dA si
<p>211b.2</p>shAkya thub pa zhes par gyur/ /'di ni lha rnams dag gis yang / /lha zhes gzi brjid dag gis nges/ /sa yi bdag pos de yi mtshan/ /lha yi lha zhes btags par gyur/ /de nas mi sbyin dang 'grogs te/ /thub pa nag po de nyid mthong / /gus pas dka' thub nags tshal nas/ /de ni
<p>211b.3</p>to mu niH/ /sa bo d+hi satwAM bA lArka mi ba kalpa pra kA sha kaM/ /dr-iSh+T+wA bi kA shi bak+t+ra shrIr+l+la b+he ka ma la tu l+ya tAM/ /so bra bId+pi hi ta ti th+yaM nr-i pa tiM pra Ni taMmu niH/ /rA dzan+nu Na ga Ne nai ba spr-i ha NI yo pi pU nu
<p>211b.4</p>blta ru yang dag 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' skal ba ni/ /gsal byed nyi ma 'char kha bzhin/ /mthong nas bzhin gyi dpal rgyas pa/ /pad+mo nyid dang mtshungs pa thob/ /phyag dang mgron cha byas pa yis/ /rgyal ba thub pa des smras pa/ /rgyal po yon tan tshogs kyis bzhin/ /sras kyi khyod ni
<p>211b.5</p>nA/ /e tA ni lak+Sha NA n+ya s+ya mok+Sha lak+Sh+mI sa mA ga maM/ /ba dan+ti tsakra bar+t+tI shrIHpha laM n+ne ShAm+bi na shwa rA ta/ /a s+ya bo d+hi pra b+hA te na saM bud+d+ha s+ya mu khAm+bu dzaM/ /d+ha n+yaHpad+mA ka ra s+ya ba ni tra pA trI ka ri Sh+ya
<p>211b.6</p>dgyes par 'os/ /'di yi mtshan rtags 'di dag ni/ /thar pa'i dpal 'byor phun tshogs sam/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal du brjod/ /'bras bu 'di dag bslu ba med/ /'di yis byang chub snga dro yis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i chu skyes zhal/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas dag gi bzhin/ /skal ldan mig gi
<p>212a</p>
<p>212a.1</p>ti/ /bi bud+d+hAHshud+d+ha satwa s+ya bo d+hi dug+d+hi ma ho da d+heH/ /d+ha n+yA bA ga mr-i ta s+yA s+ya b+ha bi Sh+ya t+yu pa dzI bi naH/ /pu N+ya b+hA dzi dza gat+masman+nai ka e bAsmi pany+tsi taH/ /e tata saM daR+sha naM ya s+ya pUr+N+Na
<p>212a.2</p>snod du gyur/ /byang chub 'o ma'i rgya mtsho che/ /snying stobs dag pa 'di yi ni/ /gsung gi bdud rtsi mkhas pa dag /skal ldan rnams kyi nyer 'tshor 'gyur/ /gang gi dus ni yongs rdzogs pas/ /'di ni mthong ba rnyed dka' ba/ /bdag nyid gcig pu 'gro ba ni/ /bsod
<p>212a.3</p>kA la s+ya durla b+haM/ /i t+yuk+t+wA nr-i pa mAn+t+yA ga twA byo m+nA ta po ba naM/ /su pra pan+na ma naHkr-i twA de ha t+yA ga ma tsin+ta yata/ /sa paR+Yan+to de shA ya nA ra de nA b+hi tso di taH/ /ta mu bA tsA mr-i taM bat+sa
<p>212a.4</p>nams ldan pa 'di na bslus/ /zhes smras mi bdag la sbran nas/ /mkha' las dka' thub nags song ste/ /yid ni rab tu dang byas nas/ /lus ni rab tu gtang bar bsam/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i man ngag ni/ /mi sbyin dag gis mngon par zhus/ /de yis de la smras pa bu/ /bdud
<p>212a.5</p>ku mA ra ka tha yi Sh+ya ti/ /a d+hi ga myA mr-i taM tasmAta nr-i pa sU no ra nA ma yaH/ /ta ri Sh+ya si b+ha bAM b+ho d+hi mi t+yuk+t+wA ta nu ma t+ya dz+yata/ /sha rI ra sat+k+ri yAM ta s+ya kr-i twA pa pa di nA ra daH/ /ya yau bA rA Na sIM sid+d+h+yai la b+ha
<p>212a.6</p>rtsi gzhon nus ston par 'gyur/ /rgyal sras de las bdud rtsi ni/ /rtogs nas nad dang bral ba khyod/ /'khor ba'i chu gter las sgrol 'gyur/ /zhes pa smras te lus btang gyur/ /mi sbyin gyis ni 'phral la de'i/ /lus kyis legs par bya ba byas/ /ka t+yA ya na zhes thob nas/ /grub slad wa ra
<p>212b</p>
<p>212b.1</p>kA t+yA ya nA b+hi d+haH/ /bar+t+ta mA naHku mA ro tha sar+b+ba bid+yA su bA ra gaH/ /li bi pra bI No\u0f85b+hi na bAM li pi brAh+mIM nir+m+mame/ /nA gA yu ta sa ma prA Ne tasmin dza ga ti bi shru te/ /bai sha li kaiHpri yA yA smai pre Shi to
<p>212b.2</p>Na sIr song / /de nas gzhon nu skyed bsrings shing / /rig kun legs par pha rol phyin/ /yi ge mkhas pas tshangs pa yi/ /yi ge mngon gsar rnam par sprul/ /glang chen khri yi stobs mtshungs par/ /de ni 'gro la grags pa'i tshe/ /yangs pa can pas dga' ba'i slad/ /de la
<p>212b.3</p>man+ta kuny+dza raH/ /b+ha bi Sh+ya ti tsakra bar+t+ti twAt+ta s+ya prAp+ta mu pa ya naM/ /de ba dat+taHpa ri dwi ShAt+taM dza g+hA na ma hA ga dzaM/ /ts+yu taM tsa kaR+Sha dwi daM ta nan+daHsap+ta ba dA nI taM/ /ku mA rastu ta dut+k+Shi s+ya prA kA rAd+ba hi ra k+Shi
<p>212b.4</p>glang chen myos pa bsrings/ /'byung 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyir/ /de la skyes bu 'ongs pa yis/ /glang po che de lha sbyin gyis/ /yongs su sdang ba dag gis bsad/ /so gnyis rab tu lhung ba de/ /dga' bos gom pa bdun du khyer/ /gzhon nu yis kyang de blangs nas/ /ra ba dag las
<p>212b.5</p>pata/ /e ka nA ra tsa nir+b+hin+na sap+ta tA la ma hI ta laH/ /ts+tshe d+ya b+he byAs+t+ra shAs+t+re Shu sa e bA ti sha yaM ya yau/ /ta tastu twi gu NAM pat+niM rA dza sU nuR+Ya sho d+ha rI/ /a bA sa bi shru taM lo ke shud+d+ha shI la i bon+na
<p>212b.6</p>phyi rol 'phangs/ /ta la bdun dang sa yi gzhi/ /mda' gcig gis ni nges par phug /gcod 'bigs mtshon dang bstan bcos la/ /de nyid phul du phyin par gyur/ /de nas btsun mo yon tan mtshungs/ /grags 'dzin ma ni rgyal sras kyi/ /dag pa'i khrims bzhin 'jig rten na/ /grags pas
<p>213a</p>
<p>213a.1</p>tiM/ /a trAn+ta re ma hA bA ta bish+ts+yu taHsap+ta yo dza naH/ /sa rat+p+ra bA ha saM ro d+haM bi d+he bi su la dru maH/ /sA s+phA ra ta ru saM ru d+hA ro hi kA nA ma mu ni mr-i gA/ /shI la b+haSh+Te pa ba ni tA pra ya yau pra/ /
<p>213a.2</p>mtho ba blangs par gyur/ /skabs der rlung ni chen po yis/ /shin tu che ba'i ljon pa ni/ /dpag tshad bdun pa rnam par bsgyel/ /chu bo'i srol ni 'gags par byas/ /thur bgrod ro hi ka zhes pa/ /de ni shing chen gyis bkag pas/ /ngang tshul nyams pa'i bud med bzhin/ /rgyun las
<p>213a.3</p>ti lo ma tAM/ /rA dza pu tra sta mur+k+Shi pya b+haM k+t+wA bik+Shi s+ya sa dru ma/ /n+ya bA ra yat+p+ra dzA mAt+s+ye dza la kal+lo bi sla baM/ /ta taHka dA tsi du d+yA ne haM sa ni shi ta yan+taM NA/ /de ba dat+te na ni hi taM ku mA raHsa ma dzI ba yata/ /
<p>213a.4</p>rab tu bzlog ste song / /rgyal po'i sras kyis ljon pa de/ /blangs shing bcag ste 'phangs nas kyang / /skye dgu zhi slad chu yis ni/ /rba klong 'khrugs pa rnam par bzlog /de nas nam zhig skyed tshal du/ /ngang pa sgro ldan rnon po yis/ /lha sbyin gyis ni bsad par gyur/ /gzhon nu yis ni yang dag gsos/ /
<p>213a.5</p>saM tA saM tad+bi bA de na de ba dat+to\u0f85d+hi kaM ya yau/ /na sa han+ti hi ku Ti lAstu l+ya ku la gu Non+na tiM/ /ka dA tsing+go bi kA nA ma ku mA raM rA dza ka n+ya kA/ /kan+dar+b+pa rU pa mA lokya ki ma pyot+su ka mA ya yau/ /shud+d+ho da naH
<p>213a.6</p>de yi rtsod pas lha sbyin ni/ /lhag par shin tu gdungs par gyur/ /gang phyir rigs mtshungs yon tan gyis/ /mtho ba gya gyu mi bzod do/ /nam zhig gzhon nu 'dod pa yi/ /gzugs mtshungs rgyal po'i bu mo ni/ /sa 'tsho zhes pa mthong gyur nas/ /'dod pa ci yang skyes par gyur nas/ /zas gtsang
<p>213b</p>
<p>213b.1</p>su ta s+ye tAM dz+nyA twA tsit+to tsi tAM ba d+huM/ /a pU ra yad+bi bA he na man+ma tha s+ya ma no ra thaM/ /nai mit+ta kAsta to\u0f85b+he t+ya nr-i pa mU tsuHsa nish+tsa yAH/ /pu tra ste tsakra bar+t+ti bA sa mu nir+b+bA sap+ta me ha ni/ /
<p>213b.2</p>gis ni btsun mo 'di/ /sras kyi thugs la 'os shes nas/ /khab tu blangs te yid bsrubs kyi/ /yid la re ba rdzogs par byas/ /de nas mtshan mkhan nges bcas rnams/ /mngon phyogs mi bdag la smras pa/ /khyod sras nyi ma bdun pa la/ /'khor los sgyur ba'am thub par 'gyur/ /
<p>213b.3</p>tats+tsh+ru twA nr-i pa tiHsu nosh+tsa kra bar+t+ti pa dAp+ta ye/ /pra bra dz+yA tsa ki tash+tsin+tA di na saM khyA ma yIM ya yau/ /lo laM sar+b+ba shrI yaM bet+ti shAn+ta s+thi ra su khA ma pi/ /ta thA pi b+ho ga rak+t+wa nAM sa m+pat+s+wa ba da raHpa
<p>213b.4</p>de thos mi bdag sras kyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i gnas thob slad/ /rab tu byung la 'jigs pa yis/ /nyin grangs rang bzhin bsams par gyur/ /dpal ni thams cad g.yo ba dang / /zhi ba brtan pa'i bde ba'ang rig /'on kyang longs spyod la chags rnams/ /phun sum tshogs la
<p>213b.5</p>raM/ /ta taHka dA tsi dud+yA na bi hA rA ya nr-i pAd+ma dzaH/ /pra ya yau ra the mA ru h+ya balgu tung+ga tu rang+ga maM/ /sa bi bar+N+Na dza rA dzIr+N+Ni kir+N+Na shIr+NA shi ro tu haM/ /su shuSh+ka pa ru ShA kA raM da daR+sha pu ru ShaM
<p>213b.6</p>mchog tu gus/ /de nas nam zhig skyed tshal du/ /rnam par rtse slad rgyal po'i sras/ /mgyogs shing mtho ba'i rta ldan pa'i/ /shing rta dag la zhon te gshegs/ /de yi lam du skyes bu ni/ /rga bas 'khogs shing mdog mi sdug /mgor skyes gzegs shing brul gyur pa/ /skem zhing rtsub
<p>214a</p>
<p>214a.1</p>ba thi/ /sa taM dr-iSh+T+wA ni dzaM kA ya mA lo kyA tsin+ta yats+tsi raM/ /a ho paR+Yan+ta pA ko yaM kA ya s+yA s+ya dzu gub+si tAH/ /ba yaHpaR+Yan+taM mAp+to pi paR+Yan ti nA shra ya t+ya yaM/ /a tI ba pa li ta bya dzAdz+dza rA br-id+d+haM ha
<p>214a.2</p>pa'i rnam pa mthong / /de yis de mthong ring lus la/ /gzigs nas yun ring rnam bsams pa/ /kye ma lus 'di smin pa yi/ /mjug ni smad par 'os pa yin/ /'di ni na tshod mtha' thob kyang / /mtha' ni bsten par mi byed ces/ /rga ba 'di ni rgan po la/ /skra dkar zol gyis
<p>214a.3</p>sa t+ya sau/ /sha rI re san+ta tasnA yu pA sha pre tos+thi pany+dza ra/ /br-id+d+haHpuSh+NA ti ma n+yA ha ma ho mo ha bi haM ga maH/ /d+hA ra ke kiM ka ro t+ye Sha kiM na yA ti ta po ba naM/ /saM ko tsa me ti br-id+d+ha s+ya de he na sa ha bA ma tiH/ /
<p>214a.4</p>dgod pa bzhin/ /kye ma da ni rgan po dag /rus gzeb lus po chu rgyus kyi/ /rgyun gyi zhags pas spras pa ru/ /rmongs pa'i mkha' 'gro gso'am snyam/ /'di ni khyim du ci zhig byed/ /dka' thub nags su cis mi 'gro/ /rgan po'i lus dang lhan cig tu/ /blo yang rab tu 'khums
<p>214a.5</p>br-id+d+he\u0f85ba laM ba te yaSh+Ti na tu d+har+m+ma ma yaM d+hi yaM/ /dza rA ku Ti la kA ya s+ya swa b+hA bo nir+b+bi be ka tA/ /dzu gup+s+yaM dza na ye t+ye Sha br-id+d+haHpra s+kha li tAk+Sha raiH/ /ba tso b+hish+ts+yu ta dan+tA li ga lal+lA lA la bA ku laiH/ /naSh+TA
<p>214a.6</p>pa'am/ /rgan po 'khar ba la brten gyi/ /blo ni chos la ma yin no/ /rga bas lus ni 'khogs pa la/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dben pa med/ /so 'phreng lhung bas kha chu dag /zags pa'i cha yi 'khrugs pa'i tshig /yi ge rab tu 'khrul gyur pa/ /rgan po 'di ni smad par byed/ /lta byed
<p>214b</p>
<p>214b.1</p>dr-iSh+Ti kr-i shaHkA yaHshak+tirlup+ta ha tA shru tiH/ /ta thA pi mo hA d+d+r-iSh+T+wai ba br-id+d+ha s+ya ta ru NI pri yA/ /d+hat+te d+ha ba la tAM brid+d+haHki me tA ma ti gar+he tAM/ /lo lA pa raM bi rak+tA pi yad+Ya s+yA ti bri ya ta nuH/ /i
<p>214b.2</p>nyams shing lus po rid/ /stobs ni zhum zhing thos pa nyams/ /'on kyang rmongs las rgan po ni/ /gzhon nu ma yis mdzes par mthong / /dkar po 'di nyid smad pa nyid/ /yin yang rgan po ci ste 'dzin/ /mchog tu g.yo zhing chags bral yang / /gang 'di lus la shin tu phangs/ /de ltar
<p>214b.3</p>ti tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya nirbe daHsa ma dzA ya ta/ /ma n+ya mA na s+ya sa pA yaM kA ya ni tsa ya mA pa dAM/ /pu nash+tsa sa ma ye\u0f85n+yasmi nan+pa pa sh+yad+b+yA d+hi taM na raM/ /bi pa kwa ku Na pa prA yaM sa pU ya mi ba pAN+Da raM/ /
<p>214b.4</p>bsams shing lus dag ni/ /rgud pa rnams kyi tshogs gyur cing / /gnod pa dang bcas dgongs gyur pa/ /de yi thugs yid byung bar gyur/ /slar yang dus gzhan dag na des/ /rnam par gyur pa'i ro 'dra ba/ /gnag dang bcas pa skya bo bzhin/ /nad kyis thebs pa'i mi zhig mthong / /
<p>214b.5</p>sa pra d+ha d+h+yau ta mA lokya sa mud+d+hi sh+ya ni dzAn+ta nuM/ /a ho nu sa ha dzai bAsmin+kA ye ro ga ga Nong+ga tiH/ /i da me ba ma hats+tsi traMHmi yam+mAM sa ma yI ta nuH/ /nA yA ti kle da bai kla k+Sha ma Na ma paR+Yu Shi te bi yata/ /i
<p>214b.6</p>de yis de mthong rang nyid kyis/ /lus la dmigs te rab bsams pa/ /kye ma lus 'dir nad kyi tshogs/ /lhan skyes kho nar rab tu 'byung / /sha yi rang bzhin lus po 'di/ /dman pa yin yang skad cig gang / /nur zhing 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba/ /'di nyid ya mtshan shin tu che/ /'di
<p>215a</p>
<p>215a.1</p>ti d+h+yA ta sod+be gaHsha rI ra bi tsi kit+sa yA/ /ba b+hU ba rA dz+ya sam+b+ho ga rA ge bi ga li tA da raH/ /a thAsmin+k+Sha Ne mA l+ya bas+t+ro ts+tshA di ta bi gra haM/ /da daR+sha de ha sat+kA ra bya gra ban d+hu dza naM sha
<p>215a.2</p>bsams thugs ni byung ba ste/ /lus la the tshom zhugs pa yis/ /rgyal srid longs spyod chags pa la/ /gus pa dag dang bral bar gyur/ /de nas dus der phreng ba dang / /gos kyis g.yogs par gyur pa'i lus/ /lus kyi bya bas gnyen 'dun gyi/ /skye bo 'khrugs pa'i ro
<p>215a.3</p>baM/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA sa ha sod+be ga da yA duHkhA g+h+r-i NA ku laH/ /tsi raM niHsA ra saM sA ra pa ri hA ra ma tsin+ta yata/ /e Sha pre ta ba naM yA ti saM sak+tAM hr-i da ye ba han/ /dIr+g+haM pras+thA ne yA trA yAM mA lAM kar+m+ma mA yi mi
<p>215a.4</p>zhig mthong / /de mthong 'phral la chags bral zhing / /brtse ba sdug bsngal smod pas 'khrugs/ /'khor ba snying po med pa ni/ /yongs su gtang bar yun ring bsams/ /las kyi rang bzhin lta bu yi/ /phreng ba snying la reg par bzung / /ring du 'gro bar chas gyur pa/ /'di ni yi dwags gnas
<p>215a.5</p>ba/ /a ho nu bi Sha yA b+h+yA sa bi lA sa bya pA yi nAM/ /nr-i nA ma n+ya k+Sha Ne kaSh+TA kASh+ThA sA kha Na tu l+ya tA/ /ud+pe ga bA ri b+ha ba sA ga ra bud+bu de smin+kA lA ni lA ku li ta kar+m+ma la tA gra puSh+pe/ /mA yA ba d+hu
<p>215a.6</p>su 'gro/ /kye ma yul la goms par ni/ /rtse dga' dag la brtson pa yis/ /mi rnams dus mthar 'o brgyal bas/ /shing dang rdo ba mtshungs pa nyid/ /skyes bu rnams lus srid mtsho'i sdug bsngal chu yi chu bur dang / /dus rlung gis bskyod las kyi 'khri shing rtse yi me tog dang / /sgyu ma'i bud
<p>215b</p>
<p>215b.1</p>na ya na bi b+h+ra ma saM bi b+hA ge puM sAM ka e Sha ba pu Shi s+thi rA b+hi mA nAH/ /nok+taM kiM tsi ta pa ra hi ta yu taM na shru taM d+har+m+ma yuk+taM nai ba g+h+rA taHku sha la ku su maM sa t+ya rU pan+na dr-iSh+TaM/ /nai ba spr-iSh+TaM sha ma pa da mi ti byak+ta
<p>215b.2</p>med mig ni rnam par g.yo ba dag gi cha/ /'di la brtan pa nyid du mngon par khengs pa 'di ni ci/ /gzhan la phan par ldan pa cung zad ma brjod rigs pa'i chos ma thos/ /dge ba'i me tog bsnams pa nyid min bden pa yi ni tshul ma mthong / /zhi ba'i gnas la reg pa min zhes gsal bar
<p>215b.3</p>mA sak+ta tsin+ta bi shrAn+to yaM ba ha ti sa ha sA bai shA la twaM ga tA yuH/ /rA dzA sU nur+b+bi tsin+t+ye ti sha rI ra bi sa rA ru taM/ /a she Sha bi Sha yA saM ge pa raM niHsnai ha tAM ya yau/ /a thA gre nir+m+ma ta de baiHsa shud+d+hA bA sa
<p>215b.4</p>bsams pa la chags shing / /ngal bsos srog song 'di ni 'phral la g.yo ba med nyid 'dzin par gyur/ /de ltar rgyal po'i bu yis ni/ /lus ni mi brtan pa nyid bsams/ /ma lus yul la chags pa yi/ /mdza' ba mchog tu med par gyur/ /de nas mdun du gtsang ma yi/ /ris kyi lha rnams
<p>215b.5</p>kA yi kaiH/ /bya lo ka yat+p+ra pra dzi taM pA tra kA ShA ya d+hA ri NaM/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wai ba bA b+hU ba s+ya pra bra dz+yA b+hi mu khI ma tiH/ /ip+si tA lo ka na prI t+yA swa b+hA bo hi bi b+hA bya te/ /bai rA gya kA ra Na ta tra nr-i pa su noHpa de pa
<p>215b.6</p>kyis sprul pa/ /lhung bzed dur smrig 'dzin pa yi/ /rab tu byung ba mthong bar gyur/ /de mthong nyid na de yi blo/ /rab tu byung la mngon phyogs gyur/ /gang phyir 'dod pa mthong ba ni/ /dga' bas rang bzhin rgyas par gyur/ /gnas dang gnas der rgyal po'i sras/ /'dod chags bral 'gyur
<p>216a</p>
<p>216a.1</p>de/ /bi lokya sA ra thiHsar+b+baM k+Shi ti pA ya n+ya be+e da yata/ /ku mA ro tha pi tu bAkyAd+g+rA mA lo ka na ko tu kI/ /bra dzan+pa thi ni d+hA nA ni bi br-i tA ni bya lo ka ya ta/ /tan+pUr+b+ba pu ru Sha n+yastaiHs+t+rI ka
<p>216a.2</p>rgyu rnams ni/ /mthong ba thams cad kha lo pas/ /sa yi bdag po dag la bshad/ /de nas yab kyi tshig gi ni/ /gzhon nu grong gzigs dge mtshan la/ /'gro bas lam du gter rnams ni/ /sna tshogs bzhag pa mthong bar gyur/ /skyes bus sngon bkod bud med kyi/ /
<p>216a.3</p>rot+thi to pe tA ni/ /ya dA sa na grA hIt+ta ni ta dA bi bi shu raM shu d+him/ /ta taHsa kaR+Sha kA na pAM shu b+h+yA pU pa ra shi ro tu hAn/ /bi dIr+N+Na pA Ni tsa ra NA na k+Shu ta pi pA sha shrA mA tu rAn/ /ha laM kud+dA la bi Sha mol+le kha pak+Sha
<p>216a.4</p>lag pas bton nas nye bar gnas/ /gang tshe de yis ma blangs pa/ /de tshe chu yi gter du zhugs/ /de nas de yi zhing pa rnams/ /mgor skyes rdul gyis gos shing skya/ /lag pa rkang pa rnam par gas/ /bkres dang skom pa ngal bas gzir/ /thong pa mi bzad 'jor dag gis/ /rko 'brud
<p>216a.5</p>bra NArdi tAn/ /bi lokya kle sha bi ba shan pa b+hU ba ka ru NA ku laH/ /bi d+hA sa da ya yA te ShAM dra bi Nai ra da ri dra tAM/ /sa br-i ShA NAM br-iSha ta nI ra taHkle sha muk+ti ma kA ra yata/ /ta taHpra ti ni br-it+to
<p>216a.6</p>phyogs ni rma yis nyen/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur mthong gyur nas/ /snying rje rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /brtse bas de dag nor rnams kyis/ /dbul po nyid ni min par bsgrubs/ /bsod nams dgyes des glang bu rnams/ /nyon mongs dag las grol bar byas/ /de nas rgyal sras rjes
<p>216b</p>
<p>216b.1</p>tha sA nu gaHpAr+thi bAt+ma dzaH/ /ma d+h+yA h+na pri thu san+tA pe ta ra No ta ra Ni twi ShaH/ /ra tha g+ho Shon+mu kha shi khi sh+ya mi kr-i ta di shAM ta raH/ /swe da pA ri ka NA kIr+N+NaHprA b+ha snig+ha ba na s+tha liM/ /so ba ru h+ya ra thAt+ta
<p>216b.2</p>'brang bcas/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer rab rgyas pa/ /nyin gung tshad pa chen po'i tshe/ /de nas phyir ni log par gyur/ /shing rta'i sgra yis gtsug phud can/ /gyen phyogs phyogs na sngon por byas/ /rdul gyi chu yi thigs rgyas pas/ /nags tshal gzhi ni bsil bar sleb/ /der ni shing rta las
<p>216b.3</p>tra gaN+Das+kha li ta kuN+Da laH/ /bi shrAn+t+yai bi shru ta ya shA dzaM pUts+tshA yA ma shi shri yata/ /sa ba b+hA ro ra si byak+tAM swe dAM bu ka Na saM ta ti/ /pa ra sA sh+le kha la li tAM hA ra s+ya ba ku Dum+bi nIm/ /ts+tshA yA su
<p>216b.4</p>babs nas/ /snyan par grags shing rna rgyan ni/ /rnam par 'phyang des ngal gso'i slad/ /'dzam bu'i grib ma bsten par gyur/ /de yi rdul gyi chu thigs rgyun/ /gsal ba snying gar 'dzin pa dag /do shal dag gi 'brel pa ni/ /chags ldan sbyar bas mdzes pa bzhin/ /rim gyis shing
<p>216b.5</p>pa ri br-it+tA su sha na kaiHsar+b+ba sA khi rAM/ /ta s+ya dzam+bu ta ruts+tshA yA na tsa tsA la ta nusta noH/ /sA ta s+ya shI ta lats+tshA yA tA pa klAn+ta ma bA ra yata/ /saM sA ra bi ra ta s+ye ba tI bra bai rA gya ba sa nA/ /pu tra daR+sha na sot+kaN+Tha
<p>216b.6</p>rnams thams cad kyi/ /grib ma yongs su gyur pa'i tshe/ /de yi sku las 'dzam bu yi/ /grib ma chung ngu g.yos ma gyur/ /de yi grib ma bsil ba des/ /gdung bas nyen pa rab tu bzlog /chags bral drag po'i bag chags kyis/ /'khor bar dga' bral dag gi bzhin/ /de nas sa bdag
<p>217a</p>
<p>217a.1</p>stan+de sha ma tha b+hU pa tiH/ /A dza gA ma ga dzot+sar+p+pa tra b+h+ra ma ra grasta tsA ma raH/ /ts+tshA yaM sa ni sh+tsa lan+d+rISh+T+wA ku mA ra s+ya pra b+hA ba taH/ /go ra bAd+b+hu ta saM prAp+taHpra Na taM pra Na nA ma ti/ /ta taHsa
<p>217a.2</p>phyogs de ru/ /sras ni gzigs par bzhed ldan pas/ /glang po che la bung ba ni/ /rab 'dus rnga yab 'khrug cing 'ongs/ /gzhon nu'i mthu las grib ma ni/ /g.yo ba med pa des mthong nas/ /gus pas rmad byung yang dag thob/ /rab tu btud nas der phyag 'tshal/ /de nas
<p>217a.3</p>sa hi taHbi trA na ga ra gaM tu mud+Ya taH/ /a pa sh+yat+pu ra paR+Yan+te shA ni sha ba saM ku laM/ /sa dr-iSh+T+wA ku Na pA kIr+N+Na ma shi baM shi ba kA na naM/ /sobe gaHsA ra thi prA has+tha gi ta s+yan+da naM k+Sha Ni/ /sA ra the pa sh+ya dzaM
<p>217a.4</p>yab dang lhan cig de/ /grong khyer 'gro bar brtson pa de/ /grong khyer mtha' yi dur khrod ni/ /ro yis yongs su gang ba mthong / /zhi ba'i nags ni mi shis pa/ /ro yis khengs mthong chags bral can/ /de yi skad cig shing rta ni/ /bzung nas kha lo sgyur la smras/ /kha lo pa ltos srog chags
<p>217a.5</p>tU nAM kA yA bA ya ma yIn+da shAM/ /dr-iSh+Te da ma pi rA gA r+d+raM ma nA mo ha pra mA dI nAM/ /pa ra s+t+rI daR+sha nA tr-i p+taM ne tra mA swA d+ya sA ra raM/ /a s+ya sat+ya ba tI dza hwA pa sh+ya kA ko na kr-iSh+ya te/ /a
<p>217a.6</p>kyis/ /gnod pa'i rang bzhin lus kyi skabs/ /rmongs pas bag med rnams kyi yid/ /'di ltar mthong yang chags pas brlan/ /gzhan gyi bud med bltas ma ngoms/ /mig ni gus dang bcas par myang / /'di yi bden ldan min pa'i lce/ /bya rog gis ni gcod la ltos/ /'di yi
<p>217b</p>
<p>217b.1</p>s+yaHsta na mu kha n+ya sta na khol+le kha su khas+thi tiH/ /khaN+Da ya t+ya d+ha raM gr-i d+h+raHkA mI ba ma da ni r+b+ha raH/ /e te dr-iSh+Ta ni Shak+ta bA ya sa shra kr-i na niSh+ThA bi naHpA da pA muts+tshan+tI ba bi pA ka pU ya ku na pA g+h+rA Ne na niH
<p>217b.2</p>nu ma'i steng du ni/ /sen dmugs dgod cing bde bar gnas/ /'dod pas rgyas pa'i bya rgod kyis/ /mchu gcod 'dod ldan dag gis bzhin/ /rkang 'thung 'di dag g.yo ba'i bya rog chags pa'i lci bas skyug cing brgyal ba dang / /rnam par gyur cing rnags pa'i ro yi dri ngas nges par sgra
<p>217b.3</p>kU Ni tAH/ /dr-iSh+T+wA gr-i b+h+ra bi dA R+ya mA Na ma sha kr-it+kAr+N+Na r+d+ra tan+t+raM sha baM bak+t+raM bA ta bi lol+la pal+la ba ka rai rA ts+tshA da yan+tI ba tsa/ /k+Shi ba s+ye bA tsa la s+ya dru ta hr-i ta hr-i da yA dzaM bu kI kaN+Tha sak+tA rak+tA
<p>217b.4</p>ngan sgrogs pa bzhin/ /lan cig ma yin bya rgod kyis 'joms rlan ldan rgyu ma gzags pa'i ro mthong nas/ /rlung gis rnam par bskyod pa'i yal 'dab lag pas bzhin ras sgrib par byed pa bzhin/ /lang tsho ldan pa g.yo med myos pa'i snying dag myur du phrogs shing mgrin pa dag
<p>217b.5</p>b+hi byak+ta kA mA ki ma pi na kha mu khA le khya mA sU tra yan+tI/ /a swA d+yA swA d+ya yU naHk+Sha Na ma d+ha ra da laM dat+ta dan+ta bra NAd+kaM lag+nA nag+na kr-i yA yA mi ya ma ti ra d+ha sit+kaR+Sha mA biSh+ka ro ti/ /i
<p>217b.6</p>la chags/ /ci yang khrag la 'dod pa mngon par gsal zhing sen mo kha yi ri mos kun tu mtshon/ /rma yi mtshan ma so yis btod pa'i mchu yi 'dab ma skad cig myangs shing myang byas nas/ /ce sbyang 'di ni gcer bu'i bya ba dag la shin tu chags pas dga' bar byed pa bzhin/ /zhes
<p>218a</p>
<p>218a.1</p>t+yuk+t+wA dzA ta bi ra tir+b+ha ba bi b+hat+sa kut+sayA/ /ka la ya na kle sha nir+b+bA Na pra bi she pu rAn+ta raM/ /ta tra harmya ga tA pa sh+yat+taM ka n+yA b+hi dza nodz+dz+wa lA/ /mr-i ga dzA nA ma mr-i ga dzA mo di nI

<p>218b.1</p>ba di shan+d+r-i shA/ /sa ta s+yA ste na ba tsa sA ba pU ShA tsa pra sA de taH/ /hA raM su br-it+tany+tsi tany+tsa bi k+She pA s+yai ku nau dz+dz+wa laM/ /A lo ka nA nu kU l+ye na b+hA ba bi dz+nyA ya b+hU pa tiH/ /pu tra s+yA taHpu ra pa de tA

<p>219a.1</p>s+ya swa yam+ma d+ye ta thA sA mA t+ya sai ni kaH/ /rA dza pu trA da tha prAp+ta gar+b+hi de bi ya sho d+ha rA/ /ba b+hA She sA ra bI ba d+yauHpra t+yA sen+nan+du pAN+Da rA/ /a ka rA trA ba she Sha \u0f85tha na ga re dwA ra rak+Sha Ne/ /

<p>219b.4</p>'khor dang / /drag po'i sdug bsngal brgya phrag dag gis gdung ba'i grogs yin yongs su gtang bar 'os/ /da ni khyim dag yongs su btang nas ljon pa'i 'og gi 'khri shing bsil ba yi/ /gzhi la rab tu zhi ba bde ba'i snying por bdag ni yongs su 'gyur bar 'os/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis rgyags pa'i

<p>220a.1</p>pAn/ /sa ra la srasta gA trA NAM ni ladz+dzA naM bi ba pa sAM/ /sup+tA nAM mr-i tA nAM tsa b+he daHko nA ma de hi nA ma/ /i ti ta s+ya bru ba Na s+ya saM dzA te ga ma nod+Ya me/ /mi thAHka tha sa la b+ha ban+na

<p>220a.3</p>ga ra dwA ra rak+Shi NAM/ /b+ho b+hoHkaHko\u0f85tra dzA gar+t+ti dza gra tA nA sti bi p+la baH/ /pra b+hU tsit+ta gra ha bya grAHsa ma grA e ba dzA gra ti/ /dzA gar+t+ti saM sA ra gr-i he ma nI ShI mo hAn+d+ha kA re Sh+wa pi ti pra mat+taH/ /pra dzA ga ro dzI
<p>220a.4</p>phan tshun gtam dag byung gyur pa/ /kye kye su su 'dir mel tshe/ /me la tshe ldan pa nyes pa med/ /rje yi thugs dor 'khrugs pa yis/ /mtha' dag nyid ni mel tshe byed/ /'khor ba'i khang par mkhas pa mel tshe byed/ /rmongs pa'i mun par bag med gnyid par byed/ /mel tshe rab ldan
<p>220a.5</p>bi ta me ba lo ke mr-i ta s+ya sup+ta s+ya tsa ko bi she ShaH/ /i ti harmya s+thi taHshru twA rA tau rA trau rA dza su taHka thAH/ /pra thi taM sat+pa the ne ba ni dzaM me ni ma nor thaM/ /nir+b+r-it+ter+l+lA k+Sha NaM dr-iSh+T+wA sa swap+naM k+Sha Na ni dra
<p>220a.6</p>'jig rten dag na 'tsho/ /shi dang gnyid kyis log la bye brag ci/ /mtshan mo rgyal sras khang bzang na/ /gnas pas gtan de thos gyur nas/ /rang gi 'dod pa legs pa yis/ /lam nas song ba bzhin du sems/ /de yi myang 'das mtshan nyid kyis/ /rmi lam skad cig gnyid kyis

<p>220b.1</p>yA/ /a nut+ta ra dz+nyA na ni d+hiM pra d+yA san+na ma ma n+ya ta/ /ta taHpra bud+d+ha sa ha sA trastA de bi ya sho d+ha rA/ /ta ta kA lo pa na taM swap+naM da yi tA pa n+ya be da ya ta/ /paR+YaMd+kA b+ha ra NAM gA ni swap+ne b+hag+nA na me bi d+ho/ /shrIr+b+ra

<p>220b.3</p>dzan+tI ma yA dr-iSh+T+wA tsan+d+rArkau tsa ti to hi tau/ /i t+yA kar+N+N+ya sA tA mU tse mug+d+he sa t+ya bi ba p+dz+dzi taH/ /saM sA ra e ba swap+no yaM swap+ne swap+no pi kI dr-i shaH/ /swap+ne d+ya nA b+hi saM dzA ta la tA byA p+ta bi hA sa sA/ /me rU pa d+hA na shi ra
<p>220b.4</p>kyang bsgribs gyur pa/ /rmi lam du ni bdag gis mthong / /de thos de yis der smras pa/ /mdzes pa bden spangs 'khor ba 'di/ /rmi lam nyid ni rmi lam gyi'ang / /rmi lam de ni ci zhig 'dra/ /de ring rmi lam lte ba nas/ /'khri shing skyes pas nam mkha' khyab/ /lhun po mgo yi sngas
<p>220b.5</p>sA pUr+b+ba pash+tsi ma bA ri d+hI/ /b+hu dzA b+h+yAM tsa ra NA b+h+yAny+tsa dak+Shi NA b+d+hir+m+ma yA b+h+r-i taH/ /b+ha dre swap+naHshu b+ho yaM mes+t+rI NAM b+har+t+ri shu b+haM shu b+ham/ /i t+yuk+te bo d+hi satwe na no tse kiny+tsad+Ya sho d+ha rA/ /pu na sh+tsa ni drA b+hi mu khe
<p>220b.6</p>su byas/ /shar dang nub kyi chu gter gnyis/ /lag pa gnyis dang rkang pas kyang / /lho yi rgya mtsho nga yis bzung / /bzang mo bdag rmis 'di ni dge/ /bud med bdag po dge bas dge/ /byang chub sems dpas de brjod tshe/ /ci yang mi smra grags 'dzin ma/ /slar yang gnyid la mngon

<p>221a.1</p>@##/ /ba b+hU bA mi li te k+Sha Na/ /sha kra brah+ma mu kha sar+b+be sa me t+yA tha su d+hA b+hu dzaH/ /tsakri re bo d+hi satwa s+ya swal+sot+sA ha pra pU ra NaM/ /tai rde ba pu tra sh+tsa twA raHsa mA diSh+TA ma hA dza bAH/ /sa hA
<p>221a.2</p>phyogs te/ /mig ni zum pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs la sogs/ /bdud rtsi spyod rnams yang dag 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spro ba ni/ /shin tu chung ba rab rdzogs byas/ /de dag rnams kyis lha yi bu/ /sa ri chu gter 'dzin bzod pa/ /shin tu
<p>221a.3</p>yA ga ma ne tas+ya b+hU shai lAb+d+hi d+h+r-i ti k+Sha mAH/ /sha krA diSh+Te na yak+She Na pAny+tsi ka khye na nir+m+mi teH/ /sa harmyA sak+ta so pA ne ra ba tIR+Ya bi yau/ /swap+naM sa ra thi mA dA yats+tshan+da kA khyi bo d+h+yi saH/ /ut+sA
<p>221a.4</p>mgyogs par gyur pa bzhi/ /de yi 'gro ba'i grogs la bsgos/ /brgya byin gyis bskos gnod sbyin ni/ /lngas rtse na zhes pas rnam sprul pa/ /khang bzang la reg them skas la/ /babs nas de ni phyi rol byung / /'dun pa zhes pa'i kha lo pa/ /gnyid ni sad par byas te bos/ /bsngags
<p>221a.5</p>na mi ba dza grA ha kan+thA kA khyi tu raM ga maM/ /taM tIk+Sh+Na ru tsi raM lak+Sh+mI ka TA k+Sha ta ra laM ha ri ma/ /sa tsakre saM ya mA li naM mUr+d+h+ni saM spr-i sh+ya bA Ni nA/ /sha mod+Ya ma su ma na sA sat+kA s+yan+tar+b+ba hi sa maH/ /sa
<p>221a.6</p>ldan zhes pa rta yi mchog /de yis spro ba bzhin du bzung / /dpal mo'i zur mig ltar g.yo ba'i/ /rno mdzes 'phrog byed de la ni/ /de yi phyag gis srab skyogs nas/ /bzung zhing spyi bor reg par byas/ /gang gi mthu yis phyugs rnams kyang / /g.yo ba dag ni rnam par gtong / /zhi
<p>221b</p>
<p>221b.1</p>sha bo pi bi muny+tsan+ti yat+p+ra b+hA be na tsA pa laM/ /ba la dzi dz+nyA sa yA n+ya staM te nA tha tsa ra NaM k+Shi tau/ /na te kam+pa yi tuM she kur+d+de ba pu trAHsa bisma yaH/ /ts+tshan+da ke na sa hA ru h+ya ni sta raM ga tu raM ga maH/ /sa dza
<p>221b.2</p>brtson legs pa'i yid kyis nges/ /nang dang phyi rol gang du'ang mnyam/ /de nas stobs ni shes 'dod nas/ /de yi zhabs ni sa la bkod/ /ya mtshan ldan pa'i lha yi bu/ /de dag rnams kyis g.yo ma nus/ /'drog pa med pa'i rta la de/ /'dun pa dang ni lhan cig zhon/ /rang gi bsam
<p>221b.3</p>gA he ma ha dad+b+yo ma bi ma la swa mi bA sha yaM/ /pra ya yau ta ra lA bar+t+ti nar+t+ti toSh+NI Sha pal+la baH/ /saM sar+p+pi pa pa nol+lA saiHsho kots+tsha sai ri ba shri yaH/ /ta s+yA d+ha ra Na rat+nAM shu le khA b+hiHsha ba laM na b+haH/ /dza
<p>221b.4</p>pa bzhin du ni/ /dri med che ba'i mkha' la gshegs/ /dpal gyi mya ngan shugs ring bzhin/ /g.yo ba'i rlung ni rab langs pa/ /gtsug tor thod kyi yal 'dab ni/ /g.yo zhing bsgyur zhing rab tu gshegs/ /de rgyan rin chen 'od zer gyi/ /ri mos nam mkha' rnam par bkra/ /skud
<p>221b.5</p>grA ha sU tra pa tra li bi tsi tra maM ba tsI ba raM/ /kIr+N+NA shru bin+du ka li lA bi lo la na ya not+pa mA/ /pra bra dzan+taM da dr-i shu dr-i sh+yasta man+taHpu ra de ba tAH/ /saM sA ra mi ba bistIr+N+NaM pu raM sa nr-i pa bAn+d+ha baM/ /
<p>221b.6</p>pa pa tra'i phreng ba yis/ /rnam bkra rnam sbyar blangs pa bzhin/ /bltar 'os pho brang 'khor gyi lha/ /'dren byed g.yo ba'i ut+pal/ /mchi ma'i thigs rdzogs gang gyur pa/ /rab tu gshegs pa de mthong gyur/ /'khor ba bzhin du rnam rgyal pa'i/ /mi bdag gnyen bcas grong khyer la/ /

<p>222a.1</p>dU rAt+p+ra dak+Shi NI kr-i t+ya k+Sha mya tA mi t+yu bA tsa saH/ /k+Sha pA yAM k+Sha Na she Sha yAM dza ne ni drA b+hi mu dri te/ /ta da daR+sha ma hA nA ma pra bud+d+ho rA dza bAn+d+ha baH/ /di bi dr-iSh+T+wA pra dzan+ta taM sha shA ng+ka sha ng+ka
<p>222a.2</p>ring nas g.yas skor mdzad nas ni/ /bzod par mdzod ces de yis smras/ /mtshan mo skad cig lhag ma la/ /skye bo gnyid kyis rgyas btab tshe/ /ming chen zhes pa rgyal po'i gnyen/ /rab tu sad pas de mthong gyur/ /mkha' la 'gro ba de mthong ste/ /ri bong can du
<p>222a.3</p>yA hr-i taH/ /U tse tsi raM bi ts+tsaiR+Yo ts+tsai rbASh+pAny+tsi ta bi lo tsa naH/ /tsi tra me tAd+bi rak+tA twaM ban+d+hu dzI bo pa ma s+ya te/ /ku mA ra ru tsi rA kA ra na yuk+taM yuk+ta kA ri NaH/ /baM shot+kaR+Sha bi she ShAr+thI ni bad+d+hA shaHpi tAM
<p>222a.4</p>dogs pas phrogs/ /yun ring dpyad nas mig dag ni/ /mchi ma rgyas pas skad cher smras/ /gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rnam pa can/ /ban+d+hu dzI ba lta bu khyod/ /rigs pa byed pa'i chags bral nyid/ /ngo mtshar 'di ni rigs ma yin/ /rigs mchog khyad par don gnyer ba/ /re ba khyod la
<p>222a.5</p>twa yi/ /kasmAn+ni rA shaHkri ya te sarbA shA b+hA ra Na twa yA/ /i ti shAkya s+ya ma ha taHshru twA bA kyaM nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/ /ta mU tse bAn+d+ha ba prI ti ban+d+ho ban+d+ha na shr-iM kha lA/ /a yaM kA ya k+Sha yaM yA ti mi th+yA gr-i ha su kha
<p>222a.6</p>gtad pa'i yab/ /re ba kun skong khyod kyis ni/ /ci slad re thag chad par byed/ /ces pa shAkya chen po'i tshig /mi bdag sras kyis thos gyur nas/ /des smras gnyen dang mdza' ba yi/ /'brel pa 'ching ba'i lcags kyi sgrog /log pa'i khyim gyi bde ba la/ /dga' ba'i lus 'di 'jig
<p>222b</p>
<p>222b.1</p>pri yaH/ /bi Sha yo gri bi ShAr+t+ta nA ma mr-i tA ya ta naM ba naM/ /hastA kr-iSh+Ta s+t+ri pha Ni pha Na b+h+r-in+masta ka n+ya sta mr-i t+ya kaN+ThA bad+d+ho t+ka Ta bi Sha la to pal+la bA lo la mA laH/ /dIp+tAM gA ra pra ka ra ga ha
<p>222b.2</p>bar 'gyur/ /yul gyi dug gis gzir rnams la/ /nags ni bdud rtsi'i khang pa yin/ /yul gyi tshogs kyi 'khor ba 'di na bag med rab tu dga' ldan zhing / /gdengs can gdengs ka gsum pa lag pas drangs nas mgo la 'chi ba bkod/ /drag po'i dug gi 'khri shing yal 'dab
<p>222b.3</p>NaM gA ha te dur+g+gaM mAr+g+gaM saM sA re smin+bi Sha ya ni tsa ye sa pra mo daHpra mA dI/ /i t+yu dIR+Sh+ya bra dzan+b+yo man bi lak+Sh+ya na ga raM k+Sha NA ta/ /ba hir+b+b+hU ta la ma b+h+ye t+ya sa ya yau bA dzi nA dza bta/ /
<p>222b.4</p>g.yo ba'i phreng bas mgrin pa bltams/ /sol ba 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis gang ba'i ngan 'gro'i lam du 'jug par byed/ /mkha' la gshegs shing 'di smras nas/ /skad cig gis ni grong khyer brgal/ /phyi rol sa gzhir mngon gshegs te/ /de ni mgyogs pa'i rta la zhon/ /
<p>222b.5</p>ma ha tA shAkya mu khye na bo d+ha sa t+ya s+ya tha b+hU pa teH/ /an+taHphu re tsa kAn+tA na mud+b+hU ta ka ru NaHswa raH/ /a tha brah+men+d+ra d+ha na da pra mu khai s+t+ri da shai r+b+b+r-i taH/ /rA dza sU nur+b+ba naM prA ba ga twA dwA da sha yo dza naM/ /
<p>222b.6</p>de nas shAkya'i gtso chen gyis/ /sa yi bdag bo de la sbran/ /pho brang 'khor du btsun mo rnams/ /snying rje'i cho de byung bar gyur/ /de nas tshangs dbang nor sbyin la/ /sogs pa'i lha rnams dag gis bskor/ /dpag tshad bcu gnyis phyin nas ni/ /rgyal po'i bu yis nags tshal sleb/ /
<p>223a</p>
<p>223a.1</p>a ba ru h+yA tha tu rA gad+bi mu ts+yu b+ha ra NA ni saH/ /u bA tsa sU tsi tA nan+da ts+tshan+da kaM ba da na twi ShA/ /gr-i hI twA b+hA ra NA ni twaM ha yany+tsa pra dza man+di ram/ /ne dA nI masti me kr-i t+ya me tairmA ya ni ban+d+ha
<p>223a.2</p>de nas rta las babs nas des/ /rgyan rnams dag ni rnam par bkrol/ /bzhin gyi 'od kyis kun dga' ni/ /gsal bas 'dun pa la smras pa/ /khyod ni rta dang rgyan rnams dag /bzung la khang pa dag tu song / /sgyu ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag gis/ /da ni bdag la dgos
<p>223a.3</p>naiH/ /ba nesmin+na ha me kA kI sha ma san+to Sha bAn+d+ha baH/ /e ka saM dzA ye ta dzan+tu re ka e ba bi pa d+ya te/ /bi Sha ma bi Sha ya yo gaMb+ho ga mut+s+r-i dz+ya ro ga sa ra sa ra ti bi she Sha kle sha shau Sha pra br-i
<p>223a.4</p>pa med/ /nags 'dir bdag rang gcig bu nyid/ /zhi ba chog shes gnyen dang ldan/ /skye bo gcig pur yang dag skye/ /gcig pu nyid du rnam par lhung / /mi bzad yul dang sbyor ba'i longs spyod dag gi nad btang zhing / /ro ldan dga' ba'i khyad par nyon mongs sems par rab
<p>223a.5</p>tAH/ /pa ri b+ha ba b+hu ba ne smIn+ne Sha naHsen+ni be shaHsha mi ta ma da na kAn+tiHshAn+ti me ba shra yA mi/ /i t+yuk+tA b+ha ra NA n+ya s+ya dIb+tAM n+yaM ke mu mo ba saH/ /t+yak+ta sho kA ni hA nI ba muk+tA sak+ka Na pany+tsa ye/ /tsU DaM
<p>223a.6</p>zhugs pa/ /yongs su zil gnon srid pa 'di ni 'di nyid bdag gi gnas/ /'dod pa'i mdzes pa zhi ba dag ni zhi ba kho na bsten/ /zhes smras de yis 'bar ba yi/ /rgyan rnams de yi lag tu gtad/ /mu tig mchi ma'i thigs tshogs kyi/ /de dag mya ngan gtong ba bzhin/ /ral gris
<p>223b</p>
<p>223b.1</p>niHkr-i t+ya kharge na sa bik+She sa na b+hasta le/ /shakrash+tsa taM sa mA dA ya ni nA ya di ba mA da rata/ /ke shaHkle sha i bot+k+r-it+ta ya tra te na ma hAt+ma nA/ /ke sha pra ti gra haM tse taM sad+b+hista tra ni be shi taM/ /
<p>223b.2</p>gtsug phud bcad nas ni/ /nam mkha'i gzhi la de yis 'phangs/ /brgya byin gyis kyang de blangs nas/ /gus pas lha yi gnas su khyer/ /gang du bdag nyid chen po des/ /nyon mongs bzhin du skra bcad pa/ /der ni dam pa rnams dag gis/ /dbu skra blangs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs/ /
<p>223b.3</p>ts+tshan+da ko pya shwA mA dA ya pra yA taHsap+ta b+hir+d+yi naiH/ /sha naiHprA bya pu ro pAn+taM sho kAr+t+taHsa ma tsin+ta yata/ /shU n+yat+tu ra ga mA dA ya pa ri t+ya dz+ya nr-i pAd+ma dzaM/ /draSh+TuM shak+no mi nr-i pa tiM ka thaM pu tra lA bi naM/ /bi tsin+t+ye
<p>223b.4</p>'dun pa yis kyang rta blangs nas/ /rab tu song ste nyin bdun gyis/ /grong khyer nye bar dal bus phyin/ /mya ngan dag gis gzir bas bsams/ /mi bdag sras ni yongs su dor/ /rta ni stong pa nyid du khrid/ /sras kyi cho de ldan pa yis/ /mi bdag blta bar ji ltar nus/ /de ltar
<p>223b.5</p>ti ha yaM t+yak+t+wA sa ta trai ba bya lam+ba ta/ /shU n+yA sa naHpu raM bA dzi swar+t+taHsho ka i bA bi shata/ /taM dr-iSh+TAn+taHpu ra dza naHsA mA t+yash+tsa ma hI pa tiH/ /pra ti prA lA pa mu kha rA sh+tsa kri re ni khi lA di shaH/ /ud+b+hU tAr+t+ta swa re kaN+ThaiH
<p>223b.6</p>bsams nas rta btang ste/ /de yi gnas de nyid du bsdad/ /stan stong rta ni grong khyer du/ /mya ngan gzugs can bzhin du zhugs/ /de mthong pho brang skye bo ni/ /sa bdag blon por bcas pa dang / /ma lus phyogs kyi so sor ni/ /cho nge'i ku co mu cor byas/ /mgrin pa gdung ba'i sgra
<p>224a</p>
<p>224a.1</p>sot+kaN+ThaiHsa bi ShA da bAn/ /sar+b+be gr-i hI ta kIr+N+NA shru bA dzI dzI bi ta ma t+ya dzata/ /sa bo d+hi satwa saM spaR+sha pu N+ya prAp+ti pa bi tri taH/ /dza grA hA brAh+m+ma Na ku le dzan+ma saM sa ra muk+ta ye/ /
<p>224a.2</p>rab bskyed/ /mya ngan ldan pa kun gyis 'jus/ /chags bral ldan pa'i rta de ni/ /mchi ma nyil zhing srog btang gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i reg pa yis/ /bsod nams thob cing gtsang ba des/ /'khor ba las ni grol ba'i slad/ /bram ze'i rigs su skye ba blangs/ /
<p>224a.3</p>shakra dat+taM ku mA rastu ya tra kA ShA ya ma gra hIta/ /kA ShA ya gra ha Ni ta tra tsai t+yaM tsa kre ma hA dza naH/ /bi b+ha ba ma b+ha ba br-i t+yai dzan+ma pra muk+t+yai bi dza na ma bi dza nA nAM mo ha gar+t+tA ni br-i t+yai/ /i
<p>224a.4</p>gang du gzhon nu ngur smrig ni/ /brgya byin dag gis byin pa blangs/ /der ni dur smrig blangs pa yi/ /mchod rten skye bo chen pos byas/ /de ltar 'byor pa srid med 'jug slad skye ba skye ba rab grol slad/ /skye bos dben pa'ang skye bo rnams kyi rmongs pa'i 'khor lo zlog pa'i slad/ /yon tan
<p>224a.5</p>ti sa ku sha la kA maHkA ma mut+p+r-i dz+ya b+he dze gu Na kr-i ta dza na rA gaHsh+la g+h+ya tAM bi rA gaH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yA ma b+hi niHkra ma NA ba dA naM pany+tsa biM shaHpal+la
<p>224a.6</p>gyis ni skye bo chags mdzad chags pa dag dang bral gyur pa/ /dge ba 'dod cing 'dod pa btang nas bsngags par 'os pa nyid bsten to/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mngon par 'byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod
<p>224b</p>
<p>224b.1</p>waH// //dza yan+ti te dzan+ma b+ha ya pra muk+tA b+ha ba pra b+hA bA b+hi b+ha bA b+hi muk+tAH/ /yeHpun+da ri lo tsa na tsakra brtI mA rAHkr-i taHshA sa na de sha bar+t+ti/ /ta ta sta po ba ne smin
<p>224b.2</p>ba'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// //mdzes pa'i mig gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i bdud/ /gang gis bka' yi yul du bsgyur byas pa/ /srid pa'i mthu yis zil mnan mngon par grol/ /skye ba'i 'jig ma las rab grol de dag rgyal/ /de nas dka' thub nags tshal der/ /
<p>224b.3</p>bo d+hi satwe ta po dzu Shi/ /ta du pas+thA yak+Sha pany+tsa bA rA Na s+yaM pra ba bra dzuH/ /spr-i ha NI yo mu nIn+d+rA NAM ma tha shAkya mu niHsha naiH/ /swa yaM se nA ya nI gA maM dza na tsA ra ka yA yo yau/ /ta tra sa nA b+hi d+ha na s+ya ka n+yo gr-i ha pa teH
<p>224b.4</p>byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub bsten/ /de tshe de yi nye gnas lnga/ /wA rA Na sIr rab tu song / /de nas thub dbang 'dod 'os pa'i/ /shAkya thub pa dal bu yis/ /sde gdong dag gi grong du ni/ /rang nyid ljongs ni rgyu zhing gshegs/ /der ni khyim bdag sde zhes pa'i/ /mngon par brjod
<p>224b.5</p>su te/ /nan+dA nan+da ba lA khyA tsa tsA ru br-it+te ba b+hU ba tuH/ /shud+d+ho da na s+ya b+hU b+har+t+tu ste shru twA bi shru ta su taM/ /tsakrA ta dad+bi ba hA s+t+yai bra taM dwA da sha bAR+Shi kaM/ /A mo de nI nAM hr-i da ye sa dA sU tra ba dA s+thi
<p>224b.6</p>pa'i bu mor ni/ /gzhon nu ma dag dga' ma dang / /dga' stobs zhes pa byung bar gyur/ /de yis sa bdag zas gtsang gi/ /sras kyi grags pa thos gyur nas/ /khyim bdag dag tu de bsgrub slad/ /brtul zhugs lo ni bcu gnyis byas/ /phreng ba lta bu'i gzhon nu ma/ /dri bzang dga' ldan
<p>225a</p>
<p>225a.1</p>taH/ /mA lA nA mi ba bA lA nA ma b+hi lA ShaHsa b+hA ba dzaH/ /d+he nU nAM pi ta dug+d+hA nAM dug+d+han+tA b+h+yAM pu naHpu naH/ /gr-i hI twA s+pha Ti ka s+thA l+yA bra tAn+t+re pa ya saM shu b+haM/ /bi d+hi bad+pA ya se sid+d+he pi pra rU pa
<p>225a.2</p>snying la ni/ /mngon par 'dod pa rang bzhin skyes/ /skud pa bzhin du rtag tu gnas/ /yang yang 'o ma 'thungs pa yis/ /ba rnams 'o ma de gnyis kyis/ /blangs nas shel gyi snod du ni/ /dge ba'i 'o thug brtul zhugs mtha'/ /'o thug cho ga bzhin grub tshe/ /bram ze'i
<p>225a.3</p>su re shwa raH/ /taM sa ma b+h+yA ya yau de shaM de bash+tsa ka ma lA sa naH/ /haR+Sha da ti thi b+hA ge tha ka n+ya kA b+h+yAM sa mud+d+hi te/ /sha kro ba dat+sad+b+ba gu No da yA yA gre pra dI ya tAM/ /mat+to ya ma d+hi kastA pad+b+rAh+ma
<p>225a.4</p>gzugs su lha dbang dang / /pad+ma'i stan ldan lha dag kyang / /yul der yang dag mngon par 'ongs/ /mdzes ma de dag dga' ba yis/ /mgron gyi tshe ni rab blangs tshe/ /brgya byin gyis smras yon tan kun/ /rgyal po la ni thog mas phul/ /bdag las re zhig tshangs pa 'di/ /
<p>225a.5</p>pra tha ma NA te pi/ /i t+yu k+te su ra rA dze na pro bA tsa tsa tu rA nanaH/ /mat+to s+ya d+hi ka de bA ste shud+d+hA bA sa kA yi kAH/ /i t+yuk+te bra h+ma NA te pi dza ga durga ga na s+thi tAH/ /sar+b+ba pra ti bi shiSh+To sau bo d+hi satwa sta
<p>225a.6</p>lhag pas dang po nyid du 'os/ /lha yi rgyal pos de brjod tshe/ /gdong bzhi pa yis rab smras pa/ /gtsang ma ris kyi lha de dag /bdag las kyang ni lhag pa yin/ /tshangs pas de skad smras pa'i tshe/ /de dag gis kyang mkhar gnas smras/ /ni rany+dza na zhes pa yi/ /klung du zhugs shing
<p>225b</p>
<p>225b.1</p>baHkr-i shaH/ /na d+yAM ni rA dza nA khyA yAM bi gA h+yA sa li la s+thi taH/ /e ta dA kar+t+N+ya ka n+yA b+h+yA mA hU ya ma Ni b+ho dza ne/ /a ba tId+Y+YAr+p+pi taM b+h+yak+t+yad+dat+tAsmai ma d+hu pA ya paM/ /bo d+hi satwa sta dA dA ya rat+na pA triM da dau
<p>225b.2</p>chur gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyis/ /rid 'di kun las khyad par 'phags/ /de dag thos nas gzhon nu mas/ /bos te rin chen snod du ni/ /phog nas blugs te gus pa yis/ /sbrang rtsi'i 'o thug de la phul/ /byang chub sems dpas de blangs nas/ /rin chen
<p>225b.3</p>ta yoH/ /dat+to yaM na pu nar+g+rA h+ye t+yuk+t+wA dza gra ha tur+n+ne te/ /sA te na na d+yAM ni k+Shi p+tA nA gairnI tA pra b+hA ba tI/ /bi k+Sho b+h+yAb+tA hr-i dA te b+h+yastAr+k+Sha rU pe Na badzri NA/ /pra sA di bo d+hi satwo tha ka n+yA yu ga la mA
<p>225b.4</p>snod ni de la gtad/ /byin pa 'di ni slar mi blangs/ /zhes brjod de dag gis ma blangs/ /'od ldan de ni chu klung du/ /des 'phangs klu rnams dag gis thob/ /rdo rje can gyis de dag las/ /mkha' lding gzugs kyis bskyod thob blangs/ /rab dang byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /de nas
<p>225b.5</p>b+h+ya pAta/ /dA na s+ya pra Ni d+hA ne na b+ha ba h+yoHkiM sa mI hi taM/ /te ta mU tsa ru rA nan+da ni d+hiHshud+d+ho da nAt+ma dzaH/ /sar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+ho\u0f85b+hi ma taHku mA raHpa ti rA ba yoH/ /ud+Ya ma ka ma ra ha lI sa ra
<p>225b.6</p>mdzes ma zung la smras/ /sbyin pa'i smon lam dag gis ni/ /khyed gnyis ci zhig mngon par 'dod/ /de la des smras zas gtsang sras/ /mkhas pa kun tu dga' ba'i gter/ /gzhon nu don kun grub pa de/ /bdag cag bdag por mngon par 'dod/ /de dag tshig ni chags ldan zhing / /'dod
<p>226a</p>
<p>226a.1</p>san+tad+ba tsasta yoH/ /na li lim+pa ma nasta s+ya pad+maM da la mi bo da kaM/ /sa dza gA da ku mA ro sau na ki pra bra dzi taHshru taH/ /na ta s+ya lo la na ya naHpri yAHshri ya i bas+t+ri yaH/ /i t+ya nI p+sa ta mA kar+N+yaM dIr+g+haM ni shwa s+ya ka n+ya
<p>226a.2</p>pa'i rba rlabs lhag pa des/ /de yi thugs la ma gos te/ /chu yis pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin/ /de yis smras pa gzhon nu de/ /rab tu byung ba ma thos sam/ /de la bud med dpal mo bzhin/ /mig g.yo dga' ba med dam ci/ /zhes pa 'dod pa min thos nas/ /shugs ring phyungs te
<p>226a.3</p>ke/ /U tsa turdA na d+har+m+ma yaM sid+d+h+yai ta s+yai ba dzA ya tAM/ /a dr-iSh+Ta sne ha saM sh+liSh+TaHpra biSh+Ten+taHpa rAn+mu khe/ /na nA ma su tsi rA b+h+yastaHpak+Sha pA to ni bar+t+ta te/ /i ti tad+ba tsa naM shru twA bo d+hi satwaHpra san+na d+hIH/ /
<p>226a.4</p>gzhon nu mas/ /smras pa sbyin pa'i chos 'di ni/ /de yi grub slad nyid gyur cig /ma mthong byams pa yang dag sbyar/ /nang zhugs phyi rol phyogs tshe na'ang / /yun ring goms pa nges par ni/ /phyogs su lhung ba mi zlogs so/ /de dag tshig de thos nas blo/ /rab dang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /
<p>226a.5</p>pra ya ta ste sa mA mAn+t+ya bi shrA t+yai kA na nAn+ta raM/ /pA ya sA mr-i ta b+hA ge na la b+d+ha di bya ba lo da yaH/ /prats+tshA ya ta ru suts+tshA ya mA ru ro ha ma hI d+ha raH/ /paR+Yad+ka ban+d+hA bA pA ya ta tra tasmin+su khaM s+thi te/ /
<p>226a.6</p>nags kyi nang du ngal gso'i slad/ /de dag la ni glengs nas gshegs/ /'o thug bdud rtsi'i cha dag gis/ /stobs ni mchog tu rgyas pa thob/ /bsil grib mchog ldan shing dag gis/ /rab mdzes sa 'dzin dag la 'dzegs/ /der ni skyil krung bcings pa mdzad/ /de yis bde bar bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /
<p>226b</p>
<p>226b.1</p>a haM kA ra i bA t+yuts+tsa shi rAHso drir+b+yagi R+Yata/ /bi shrIr+N+Na b+hU d+ha re tasmin+sa pra da d+h+yau bi Shar+N+Na d+hIH/ /sa pak+ShA la ni kar+m+mA Ni ma yA kA ni kr-i tA n+ya ho/ /i ti tsin+tA sha tots+tshA saM ta mU tsur+b+yo ma de ba tAH/ /na twa yA bi hi taM
<p>226b.2</p>nga rgyal bzhin du rtse mo ni/ /rab tu mtho ba'i ri de zhig /sa 'dzin rnam par zhig pa der/ /thugs ni byung bzhin de yis bsams/ /kye ma dri med ma yin pa'i/ /las 'di bdag gis ci zhig byas/ /de ltar brgya bsam dbugs ring ba/ de la nam mkha' lha yis smras/ /dam pa khyod kyis mi
<p>226b.3</p>sA d+ho kar+m+ma kiny+tsi da sAM pra taM/ /ats+tshin+not+tap+ta ku la shaM d+har+t+tuM na k+Sha ma te k+Shi tiH/ /sa twa mut+tap+ta ku sha laHprots+tse she la sha tAng+gu ruH/ /ni rany+dza ni sa mut+tIR+Y+ya sa ri taM bra dza nish+tsa laM/ /sid+d+hi daM bo d+hi satwA nAM de sha badzrA
<p>226b.4</p>'os pa'i/ /las ni ci yang bsgrubs pa med/ /rgyun chad med par dge bsgrubs pa/ /sa yis 'dzin par bzod ma gyur/ /sems can dge ba rab bsgrubs pa/ /rab mtho ri bo brgya bas lci/ /chu bo ni rany+dza na ni/ /yang dag sgrol la g.yo med yul/ /byang chub sems la grub ster ba/ /rdo rje
<p>226b.5</p>sat+sa li lA ku lA/ /de ba tA biSh+Ta mAr+g+ge Na pras+thi ta s+ya d+h+wA b+hU ta le/ /pA da n+yA sai ra b+hUt+ta s+ya he ma pad+ma pa raM pa rA/ /pr-i thi bI bra dza ta sta s+ya prol+la sat+sa li lA ku lA/ /ra Nan+tI kAM s+ya pA trI ba bron+na nA ma na nA
<p>226b.6</p>gdan zhes brjod par song / /lha yis bstan pa'i lam nas de/ /rab gshegs lam gyis gzhi la/ /zhabs ni bkod pas gser dag gi/ /pad+ma brgyud pa byung bar gyur/ /de ni gshegs pa'i sa gzhi la/ /chu rnams rab tu rdol bas dkrigs/ /'khar ba'i snod bzhin sgra ldan zhing / /rab tu par
<p>227a</p>
<p>227a.1</p>ma tsa/ /tA ni tA ni paM mit+tA ni pra br-it+tA ni da daR+sha saH/ /ye ShA ma nut+ta ra dz+nyA na ni d+hA na sA d+ha naM pha laM/ /ni rany+dza nA ya b+hu ba ne nA gan+d+haHkA li kA b+hi d+haH/ /bud+d+hot+pA dAp+ta dr-ig+b+hU meHshap+da mA
<p>227a.2</p>zhes nems zhes kyang / /gang gi bla med ye shes gter/ /'grub par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu can/ /mtshan ma de dang de dag ni/ /byung bar gyur pa de yis mthong / /ni rany+dza na'i sa gzhi la/ /nag po zhes bya long ba'i klu/ /sangs rgyas byung bas mig thob cing / /sa yi
<p>227a.3</p>kar+N+N+ya niR+Ya yau/ /sar+b+ba lak+Sha Na sam+pan+naM dIp+ta dzam+bU na da d+yu tiM/ /sa bo d+hi sa twa mA lo kya pro bA tsa ra tsitAny+dza liH/ /na li na na ya na kAn+ta s+t+waM ba ne yau ba ne smin bi ha ra si bi ra hAr+t+ti sam+pa
<p>227a.4</p>sgra thos nges par 'thon/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rab rdzogs shing / /'dzam bu chu bo'i 'od zer 'bar/ /byang chub sems dpa' de mthong nas/ /thal mo sbyar byas rab smras pa/ /pad+ma'i spyan ldan mdzes pa khyod ni lang tsho dar la nags tshal 'dir/ /phun tshogs rnams la 'bral ba'i
<p>227a.5</p>dAmar+p+pa yi twA/ /a sha ma sha ma bi she Shon+me Sha san+to Sha he tur+b+ha ba si b+ha ba sa mu dre de hi NAM sa t+ya se tuH/ /ya thA muny+tsa n+t+ye te b+ha ya ta ra la tA ma tra ha ri NA ya thA lI lA
<p>227a.6</p>gdung ba rab tu byin nas rnam par gnas/ /mtshungs med zhi ba'i khyad par rab tu 'byed cing chog shes skye pa'i rgyu/ /khyod ni srid pa'i mtsho las lus can rnams kyi bden pa'i zam stegs 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'di na ri dwags 'di dag thams cad 'jigs pa'i g.yo ba nyid ni btang byas shing / /
<p>227b</p>
<p>227b.1</p>tsakraM bi ha ra ti sa mI pe kha ga ga NaH/ /sa sa twA sa twA nAM ki ma pi hr-i da yA shwA sa sa da naM ta thA ma n+ye baud+d+haM ba pu raM da ma nA yA sa su kha daM/ ka ri ka la d+ha gaHpad+ma
<p>227b.2</p>ji ltar mkhar bgrod tshogs rnams rtse dga'i 'khor los nye ba nyid du rnam par gnas/ /gang yang sems can rnams kyi snying gi yid brtan mtshungs pa nyid kyi gnas gyur pa/ /de ltar 'di ni ngal dub med par bde ba sbyin pa'i sangs rgyas sku yin snyam/ /lag ldan phru gu pad+mo la dga' lag
<p>227b.3</p>prI t+yA ka ro ti ha reHka raM su kha ya ti shi khi snig+d+hA lA saM ka lA pa shi khA ni laiH/ /b+ha ba ti ha ri NI lo lA yAM d+gA pu raHpra Na yon+mu khI pra sha ma sa ma ya s+ye yaM pu N+ya pra sA da ma yi s+thi tiH/ /
<p>227b.4</p>pa dag la lag pa 'jog par byed/ /gtsug phud ldan pa'i mjug rtse'i rlung gis snyan pa'i sgra dang ldan zhing bde bar byed/ /mig zur g.yo ba'i ri dwagasadags mo rnams mdun du gus pas gyen du phyogs par gyur/ /bsod nams rab dang rang bzhin 'di ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i dus kyi lugs/ /
<p>227b.5</p>a d+yai ba bud+d+ha twa ma bA s+ya shud+d+haM twaM bo d+hi ye Sh+ya t+ya khi lAM tri lo kiM/ /sad+yaHpra sA da pra ma dA ba dA tAM ku mud+ba tiM pUr+N+Na i bA mr-i taM shuH/ /a n+yo n+yan+di na nA tha dIp+ta ma ha saHsa d+yasta bA lo ka
<p>227b.6</p>de ring kho na dag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /'jig rten gsum po khyod kyis ma lus rtogs par bgyid/ /bdud rtsi'i zer gyis 'phral la ku mud ldan pa ni/ /rab dang rab tu dga' ba'i dkar ba rdzogs pa bzhin/ /nyin mo'i mgon bzhin gzi brjid rab 'bar khyod kyi snang bas 'phral la
<p>228a</p>
<p>228a.1</p>nAta lo kA nAM ka ma la pra bo d+ha ka la yA di bya pra kA sha spr-i shAM/ /naM R+Ya t+ya hr-i da yAn+ni bad+d+ha ma d+hu pa shre ba saM b+hi ta na tra stAn+tarna pu naHka ri Sh+ya ti ba daM mo hAn+d+ha kA ra ba li/ /i ti shru bA NaM
<p>228a.2</p>phan tshun du/ /rab rgyas pad+ma lta bus mchog gi snang ba la reg 'jig rten rnams dag gis/ /sbrang rtsi 'thung ba'i phreng bzhin gdung zhing skrag par des bcings snying las phyir byung ba/ /gti mug mun pa'i phreng ba slar yang nang du gnas ni byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dul bas de
<p>228a.3</p>bi na yAn+nA ga rA dzaM pra san+na d+hIH/ /bo d+hi satwaHsa mA b+hA Sh+ya sa mut+tIR+Y+Ya na dI ya yau/ /badzrA sa na pa daM prA pya bo d+hi mU la ma nA ku laM/ /dak+Shi NA graiHku shaish+tsa kre sha kra da staiHsa saM sta raM/ /ta tro pa

<p>228b.1</p>srA bak+Sha ya paR+Y+YaMn+ta paR+Y+YaMng+go yam+ma ma s+thi raH/ /ba ban+d+he ti sa saM kalpaM kr-i twA pra ti mu khIM smr-i tiH/ /a trAn+ta re sa ma b+h+ye t+ye mA raHsaM ya ma mat+sa raH/ /le kha hA rastan+nastUr+N+NaM po d+hi satwa ma b+hA Sha ta/ /
<p>228b.2</p>zad pa mthar thug pa/ /skyil krung 'di la bdag gnas so/ /zhes pa'i brtag pa byas nas des/ /dran pa'i sgo ni rab tu bcings/ /de nas skabs der bdud dag ni/ /zhi la phrag dog spring yig thogs/ /myur ba nyid du mngon par 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ /
<p>228b.3</p>a kA ma kA ma hA ke yaM lo ke ban+d+ha ba dA ma tA/ /a kA la ka li kA kA ra ma tiste kA s+ya bA ma nA/ /gr-i hI taM ha ta saM ke na de ba dat+ta ta baHpu ram/ /ni rud+d+hAn+taHpu ra shre Ni bad+d+haHshud+d+ho da no nr-i

<p>228b.5</p>paH/ /i ti shru twe ba ba tsa naM sho ka maR+sha bi Shodz+dz+hi taH/ /a shi k+Shi ta bi kA re NaHtse ta sa bya tsin+ta ya ta/ /a ho ba tAn+ta ra yaM me mA raHkar+t+tu sa mud+Ya taH/ /nar+t+ta ya t+ye Sha nir+b+r-i taHshi khaN+Di kr-I Da

<p>229a.1</p>@#/ ya dza gta/ /mA rA mA ra bi rA ma ste dor+dz+dza n+ya s+ya na dzA ya te/ /e ke na hiM sA ya dz+nye na prAp+te yaM ka ma tA twa yA/ /yadz+nyA dA na ta paHsh+lA g+h+yaM nAt+ma naHkar+t+tu mut+sa he/ /swa gu No dI ra Na m+lA

<p>229b.1</p>tA b+hi mu khAM b+ho dzairna li nI mA li nI kr-i tA/ /yau ba nA b+ha ra Nai raM gai ra nu rA ga bi la pA naiH/ /lA ba N+ya ba sa nai tA sAM kA mo b+hU da s+ya tse ta sAM/ /badzrA sa na mA d+hA na d+h+yA na nish+tsa la lo tsa

<p>229b.5</p>b+hag+na ma no ra thAH/ /man+ma tha pra thi tA ra b+ha sai n+ya saM b+hA ra mA da de/ /sar+b+ba pra ha ra Nair+b+yAstaM nA nA prA Ni mu khair+b+ha yeH/ /ShaT+t+riM shata ko Ti bi pu laM ba laM ta s+ya sa mung+Ya yau/ /swa ya ma kar+N+Na niSh+k+r-iSh+Ta ko pa

<p>230a.1</p>@#/ krU ra sa rA sa naH/ /ma raHs+pha ra bi kA re Na bo d+hi sa twaM sa mA dra bta/ /shas+t+ra br-iSh+Ti sta du t+p+r-iSh+TA sa ha pAM shu bi ShAsh+ma b+hiH/ /pra ya yau bo d+hi sa twa s+ya man+dA rA m+bu dza puny+dza tam/ /pu nar+m+mA ra ba lo tsh+r-iSh+Ta
<p>230a.2</p>ba'i bar du mda' bstan drangs/ /bdud kyi rnam 'gyur drag po yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu gtses/ /de yis rab 'phangs rdul dang ni/ /dug dang rdo ldan mtshon gyi char/ /man+dA ra dang pad+mo yi/ /tshogs su byang chub sems la gyur/ /slar yang bdud dpung gis
<p>230a.3</p>shas+t+ra br-iSh+Ti d+h+r-i ta k+Sha ma/ /tsakri re de ba tAsta s+ya badzra pra ti sa ma shra yaM/ /sma ro pi naSh+Ta saM kalpaHsa mA d+ho shro tra kaN+Da kaM/ /g+haN+TA pa Tu re Tat+pat+p+ra nir+m+ma mes+pha Ti ka dru maM/ /tan+tA ra mu kha raM br-ik+ShaM
<p>230a.4</p>'phangs pa/ /mtshon gyi char ni 'dzin bzod pa/ /de la rdo rje ra ba'i gnas/ /lha rnams dag gis rab tu byas/ /brtags pa nyams pa'i dran pas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi rna ba'i tsher/ /shel gyi ljon pa 'dab ma ni/ /dril bu gsal ba'i sgra ldan sprul/ /mu cor sgrogs pa'i shing de dang / /
<p>230a.5</p>mA rany+tsa sa ba lA yu d+haM/ /tsakra bA De sa mut+k+Shi s+ya tsak+Shi pur+b+b+yo ma de ba tAH/ /b+ha ga bA na tha saM prAp+ta pra san+nadz+nyA na nir+m+ma laH/ /sar+b+ba bit+sarba gaHsarba dzA ti smr-i ti pu ro ta bta/ /sa ta trA nut+ta ra dz+nyA na samyak+saM

<p>230b</p>
<p>230b.1</p>bo d+hi mA shri taH/ /da daR+sha sar+b+ba b+hU tA nI ga tiM kar+m+mor+m+mi nir+m+ma tAM/ /a tha shA kya pu re mA raHpra bA da ma sraM dzan+di baH/ /bo d+hi satwa pra ya tostaM ta paHkle sha ba shA di ti/ /ta tra shud+d+ho do no rA
<p>230b.2</p>pa'i byang chub brnyes pa des/ /las kyi rba rlabs kyis sprul pa/ /'byung po kun gyi 'gro ba mthong / /de nas shAkya'i grong khyer du/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' thub kyis/ /nyon mongs dbang gis 'das gyur zhes/ /mkha' la bdud kyis rab tu bsgrags/ /der ni rgyal po zas

<p>230b.4</p>gtsang ma/ /de thos rdo rjes bcom pa bzhin/ /bu la byams pa'i dug gis gzir/ /sa la rab tu 'gyel bar gyur/ /mi bdag btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas/ /srog ni btang bar byas pa'i tshe/ /legs spyod phyogs su lhung ba yi/ /nam mkha'i lha yis der smras pa/ /bdud rtsi
<p>230b.5</p>tra ta bA mr-i taM pI twA samyak+saM bud+d+ha tAM ga taH/ /te nA ba lo ka ta s+yA pi nA ste mr-i taMb+ha yaM/ /i ti sAn+taHpu rA mA t+yaHshru twA na ra pa tir+b+ba tsaH/ /a b+hUt+p+ra t+ya ga ta prA NaHsu d+hA sik+ta i ba
