<p>231a.1</p>@# /k+Sha NA ta/ /tasmin+ma hot+sa bA nan+de bo d+hi satwa bad+d+hUHsu ta/ /kan+ta ya sho d+ha rA mr-i ta rA hu gra ste ni sh+ya ka re/ /rA hu lA khyaHsa bA lo pi nr-i pa ter+dz+dzan+ma shaM ki te/ /dza na n+yA sa si
<p>231a.2</p>byung bar gyur/ /kun dga'i dga' ston chen po der/ /zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin tshe/ /byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo ni/ /grags 'dzin ma la sras mdzes btsas/ /sgra gcan zhes pa byis pa de'ang / /mi bdag des bskyed dogs pa'i tshe/ /ma yis dag
<p>231a.3</p>laHshud d+h+yai nik+Ship+tam+b+ha si pra p+lu bai/ /b+ha ga bA na pi sap+tA ha s+thi to ni sh+tsa la bi gra haH/ /badzra paR+YaM ka ban+d+he na de bA nAM bisma yaM bya bAta/ /sa brah+ma kA yi kA khyA b+h+yI de ba tA b+h+yAM bi bo d+hi taH/ /a
<p>231a.4</p>slad rdo dang bcas/ /'phangs tshe chu las 'phyo bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang nyin zhag bdun/ /sku ni g.yo ba med par gnas/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcings pa yis/ /lha rnams ya mtshan ldan par byas/ /tshangs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba yi/ /lha gnyis kyis ni bskul ba na/ /mchog
<p>231a.5</p>ba da ta pa ra mA nan+da sud+hA san+do ha pun+da raH/ /a ho ba ta ma yAdz+nyA tA pUr+b+ba ne ShA su kha s+thi tiH/ /ya yA su rA su re shwaR+Ya su khaM duHkha ga NA ya te/ /lA pa N+yaM b+haHp+lA bi tAM gAsta ru N+yaHpe yU ShA r+d+raHswar+g+ga
<p>231a.6</p>tu kun dga' bdud rtsi yi/ /tshogs ltar mdzes pas bka' stsal pa/ /lha dang lha min dbang phyug bde/ /gang gis sdug bsngal du rtsi ba/ /bde bar gnas pa 'di ni sngon/ /kye ma bdag gis shes ma gyur/ /mdzes sdug chus rgyas lang tsho ldan pa'i lus/ /bdud rtsis brlan pa mtho ris
<p>231b</p>
<p>231b.1</p>saM b+ho ga bar+g+gaH/ /a s+yA she Sha d+yA ga he la su kha s+ya spar+d+d+hA ban+d+he paM shu niHsA ra e ba/ /saM tap+to haM bi Sha ya bi Sha ma kle sha saM sA ra pAn+tha klAn+taHshAM t+yA pri ti mu pa ga tAsh+tsan+da nats+tshA ya ye ba/ /saM dzA te yaM
<p>231b.2</p>longs spyod tshogs/ /ma lus btang gyur rtsol med bde 'di yis/ /'gran zla snying po med pa'i rdul nyid do/ /mi bzad yul gyi nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam 'gron kun tu gdung gyur zhing / /nyon mongs can bdag zhi bas dga' ba nyer gyur tsan+dan grib mas bzhin/ /dbang po mtha'
<p>231b.3</p>sa ka la ka ra Na y+YA yi nI nI r+b+r-i tir+m+me bi shrAn+tA nAM sha ma hi ma ba ne kiM su kha s+yau pa mA naM/ /a smin+na ba sa re pu N+ya pa ri pA ke na tad+ba naM/ /ba ni dzau pr-i thu sAr+the na prA sto tra pu sa b+hal+li kau/ /de
<p>231b.4</p>dag tshim pa'i bde ba 'di yis bdag ni dga' ba skyes/ /zhi ba'i gangs ldan nags su ngal bsos pa rnams bde ba'i dpe ni ci/ /gnas skabs der ni bsod nams dag /yongs su smin pas nags tshal der/ /tshong pa ga gon bzang po dag /don mthun chen pos 'ongs par gyur/ /lha
<p>231b.5</p>ba tA pre ri to b+hak+t+yA b+ha ga ban+ta mut+pa t+ye tai/ /pra Na tau piN+Da pA to yaM gr-i h+ya tA mi t+ya b+hA Sha taM/ /da yA bi d+he yaHsar+b+ba dz+nyA sta dA kar+N+N+ya bi tsin+ta ya ta/ /pUr+b+baiHpA tre gr-i hI to yaM na pA No pA tra
<p>231b.6</p>yis bskul ba de dag gis/ /gus pas bcom ldan la phyogs te/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni bsod snyoms 'di/ /blang bar mdzod ces rab tu smras/ /brtse ba'i dbang gyur kun mkhyen gyis/ /de ni gsan nas rnam bsams pa/ /snga rabs rnams kyis snod du 'di/ /blangs kyi snod
<p>232a</p>
<p>232a.1</p>bas+dz+dzi te/ /i ti tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya ma hA rAdzA b+hi d+hAHsu rAH/ /da twA s+pha Ti ka pA trA Ni tsa twA ri tri di ba ya yuH/ /kr-i twA tha b+ha ga bAn+pA tre piN+Da pA tra pra ti gra haM/ /a nu gra haM
<p>232a.2</p>spangs lag par min/ /de ltar bsams pa de la ni/ /rgyal chen bzhi zhes bya ba'i lhas/ /shel las byas pa'i lhung bzed bzhi/ /phul nas lha yi gnas su song / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / /bsod snyoms rab tu bzhes mdzad nas/ /skyabs gsum
<p>232a.3</p>ta yosh+tsa kre sha ra N+ya tra ya shA sa nAta/ /bi ta ta su kr-i ta sA k+ShI pu N+ya ni k+She pa da k+ShaHk+Sha yi ta bi pa da she ShaHprAr+tha nA kalpa br-ik+ShaH/ /b+ha ba ti ku sha la mU leHka s+ya tsid+b+hA gya b+hA dzaHshu b+ha pa ri
<p>232a.4</p>dag gi bka' yis ni/ /de dag rjes su bzung ba mdzad/ /legs byas rnam par rgyas pa'i dbang po bsod nams ster la mkhas/ /rgud pa ma lus zad byed don du gnyer ba'i dpag bsam shing / /dge ba yongs gyur bslab pa'i rjes mthun dam pa dag gis grogs/ /skal ldan
<p>232a.5</p>Na ti dIk+ShA dak+Shi NaHsA d+hu saM gaH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa lA tA yAM mA rA bi dra ba NA ba dA naM nA ma ShaD+piM shaHpal+la waH// //baM shaHsa ko pi
<p>232a.6</p>'ga' zhig dag gi dge ba'i rtsa bas thob par 'gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bdud bcom pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //mdzes pa'i spyod tshul dang
<p>232b</p>
<p>232b.1</p>bi su laHku sha lA nu ban+d+h+hI yash+tsA ru br-it+ta mu tsi taM gu Na saM gra ha s+ya/ /rat+naM bi shud+d+ha ru tsi shrUrtsi ta sat+p+ra kA shaM muk+tA ma yaM dza ga ta laM ka ra Na pra sU te/ /n+ya gro d+hA rA ma ni ra taM pu rA ka si la
<p>232b.2</p>ldan yon tan sdud par 'os gyur zhing / /rin chen 'od zer rnam dag dam pa'i snang ba rgyas par byed/ /nad med mu tig rang bzhin 'gro ba'i rgyan ni skyed byed pa/ /gang zhig dge bas rjes 'brel ming chen rigs de 'ga' zhig yin/ /ser skya'i gzhir ni n+ya gro d+ha'i/ /kun dga' ra bar
<p>232b.3</p>bstu ni/ /shAkyaHswa baM shaM pa prats+tshur+b+ha ga ban+taM ta thA ga taM/ /taiHpr-iSh+TaHswa ku lot+sat+tiM sa maud+ga l+yA ya naM pu raH/ /bak+t+raM n+ya yuMk+ta kr-i twA s+ya bi ma la dz+nyA na daR+sha naM/ /sa bi lo kya ya thA ta twA
<p>232b.4</p>bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs la sngon/ /shAkya rnams kyis rang rigs zhus/ /des dris des kyang mau gal bu/ /de la dri med ye shes kyis/ /gzigs pa bskyed nas mdun du ni/ /rang gi rigs 'khrungs gsung bar bskos/ /de yi ye shes spyan gyis ni/ /
<p>232b.5</p>ma tI ta dz+nyA na tsak+Shu ShA/ /tA na bo tsa ta saM smr-i t+yA shru ya tAM shAkya saM b+ha baH/ /a she Shesmin dza la ma ye dza ga t+ya kar+N+Na be su rA/ /s+thi te pa ba Na saM spaR+shAta pa ya pa ya i bA b+ha bta/ /dza le tasmin g+ha na ta yA yA te ka thi
<p>232b.6</p>'das pa de nyid ji bzhin gzigs/ /yang dag dran pas de rnams la/ /smras pa shAkya byung ba nyon/ /ma lus 'jig rten 'di ni sngon/ /chu yi rang bzhin gcig nyid du/ /gnas tshe rlung gis bsrubs pa las/ /chu ni 'o ma bzhin du gyur/ /chu der stug po nyid kyis ni/ /dal bus sra
<p>233a</p>
<p>233a.1</p>na tAM sha naiH/ /a b+hUd+bar+N+Na ra sa spaR+sha shap+da gan+d+ha ma yi ma hI/ /ta s+yA mA b+hA swa ra de bash+ts+yu tAHkar+m+ma pa ri k+Sha yAta/ /tat+tu l+ya bar+N+Na saM b+h+r-i tA sa twAHsa twa ba lA d+hi kA/ /ang+gu l+ya ra sa mA swA
<p>233a.2</p>bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /kha dog ro dang reg dang sgra/ /dri yi rang bzhin sa gzhir gyur/ /der ni las dag yongs zad pas/ /'od gsal lha las lhung gyur pa/ /de mtshungs kha dog yang dag rgyas/ /sems can snying stobs stobs lhag pa/ /ro la chags pas rab
<p>233a.3</p>d+ya tat+t+r-iSh+NA ti pra mo hi tAH/ /A hA ra do ShAta prApurguru rUk+Sha bi bar+N+Na tAM/ /an+na pra sa bi nI te ShAM kra me NA b+hUta ba sun+d+ha rA/ /ta mo b+hish+tsa bi lup+tA nAM k+She trA gA ra pa ri gra haH/ /ne tA te ShAM k+Sha
<p>233a.4</p>rmongs pas/ /mdzub mos ro ni myang byas nas/ /kha zas skyon gyis lci ba dang / /rtsub cing kha dog ngan par gyur/ /de dag rnams kyi sa la ni/ /rim gyis sA lu 'khrungs par gyur/ /mun pas rnam par bcom rnams kyis/ /zhing dang khang pa yongs su bzung / /de dag nyams srung
<p>233a.5</p>ta trA NA ta k+Sha tri yaHk+Shi ti pA la ne/ /ma hA sam+mat+ta nA mA b+hUdz+dza na s+ya ma ha to ma taH/ /ta s+yA n+wa ya ma ha t+yA sIn+n+r-i baHshrI mA nu po Sha d+haH/ /a m+lA na kIr+t+ti ku su ma pa ri dzA ta e bo da d+hau/ /tsakra bar+t+ti
<p>233a.6</p>sa skyong la/ /rgyal rigs tshul dang ldan pa ni/ /skye bo mang pos bkur gyur pa/ /kun gyis bkur ba zhes pa byung / /de yi rigs brgyud chen po la/ /dpal ldan mi bdag gso sbyong 'phags/ /grags pa'i me tog nyams med byung / /chu gter la ni yongs 'du bzhin/ /de yi sras gyur
<p>233b</p>
<p>233b.1</p>su tasta s+ya mAd+hA tA b+hU da yo ni dzaH/ /dza ga t+ye ka ta pa tras+ya ya s+ya baM sho ma ha na b+hU ta/ /baM she sa ha sra baM sha s+ya kr-i kIsta s+yA b+ha ban+n+r-i paH/ /tsit+ta pra sA da ma ka rod b+ha ga bAn ya s+ya kA sh+ya paH/ /i
<p>233b.2</p>'khor los sgyur/ /skye gnas skyes min nga las nu/ /gang gi rigs brgyud 'gro ba na/ /gdugs gcig nyid ldan chen po byung / /de yi rigs ni stong phrag gi/ /rigs las mi bdag kr-i kI byung / /gang gi thugs ni bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs dag gis dang bar mdzad/ /de brgyud
<p>233b.3</p>k+Sh+wA ku ra n+wa ye ta s+ya ta s+ya tsA b+hUd bi rU D+ha kaH/ /pr-I t+yA kA ni ya sa sU no dz+yoSh+Thaste na bi bA si tAH/ /e kI b+hU ya ta taHsarbe swa de sha bi ga te spr-i hAH/ /ku mA raHka pi lA khya s+ya ma haR+Shi rA shra maM ya yuH/ /d+h+yA na kA lAn+ta rA
<p>233b.4</p>bu ram shing pa byung / /de las yang ni 'phags skyes po/ /de yi bu ni nu bo la/ /dga' bas phu po gnas nas bskrad/ /de nas gzhon nu thams cad ni/ /gcig tu 'dus nas rang yul la/ /chags dang bral bas thub pa che/ /ser skya zhes pa'i gnas su song / /byis pa sgra chen sgrogs
<p>233b.5</p>yA NA bA myA duts+tsaiHbra lA pi naM/ /so n+ya tra nir+m+ma me te ShAM pu raM ka pi la bs+t+we ti/ /kA la na pu tra bAt+sa l+yA da nu tA pa na b+hU pa tiH/ /A nI yan+tAM ku ma rA ste sa tsi bA ni t+ya b+hA Sha ta/ ta mU tsurman+t+ri NaHsarbe
<p>233b.6</p>ba yis/ /bsam gtan dus kyi gegs byed pa/ /de dag grong khyer gzhan du ni/ /ser skya'i gzhi zhes de yis sprul/ /dus kyis bdag bu la ni/ /mnyes gshin rjes su gdung ba yis/ /blon po rnams la gzhon nu ni/ /de dag khyer la shog ces smras/ /blon pos der smras rgyal po
<p>234a</p>
<p>234a.1</p>rA dza na prAp+ta pu rot+ta maH/ /pra t+yA ne tu ma shAkya ste dzA tA pa t+yA pr-i thu shri yaH/ /i ti te ShAM bi tusta tra shAkyA shAkya bi tsin+ta ne/ /ba b+hU buHshAkya saM dz+nyAste nr-i pu raste Shu baM sha kr-ita/ /tad+baM
<p>234a.2</p>lags/ /de dag kun gyis grong mchog thob/ /bu tsha skyes shing dpal 'byor che/ /slar yang dgug par mi nus so/ /de dag rnams kyi pha yis der/ /nus sam mi nus rnam bsams tshe/ /de dag shAkya'i ming can gyur/ /de rnams rigs la mi yi grong / /de
<p>234a.3</p>she Shu pany+tsa pany+tsa sa ha sra Shu ma hI b+hu dzAM/ /a tI te Shu k+Shi ti pa tiHshrI mAn+da sha ra tho\u0f85b+ha bta/ /ta s+yA n+wa ye siM ha ha nurba b+hU ba pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /na ra Ne siM ha mi ba yaM se hi re rA dza kuny+dza raH/ /dz+yeSh+ThaH
<p>234a.4</p>yi rigs las sa spyod ni/ /stong phrag lnga pa lnga 'das tshe/ /dpal ldan sa yi bdag po ni/ /shing rta bcu pa byung bar gyur/ /de yi brgyud la seng ge 'gram/ /sa yi bdag po byung gyur te/ /gang zhig seng ge bzhin du ni/ /rgyal po glang pos g.yul mi bzod/ /de sras
<p>234a.5</p>shud+d+ho da nasta s+ya su taHshuklo da naHpa raH/ /dro No da nasta da nu dzaHka nI yA na mr-i to da naH/ /ka n+yash+tsa ta sraHshud+d+hA khyAHshuklA dro NA mr-i tA ta thA/ /shud+d+ho da na s+ya b+ha ga bAn su nurnan+da sta thA pa raH/ /shuklo da na s+ya ta
<p>234a.6</p>thu bo zas gtsang ste/ /gzhan ni zas dkar de yi ni/ /rjes su skyes pa bre bo zas/ /bdud rtsi zas ni gzhon nu'o/ /bu mo bzhi ste gtsang zhes dang / /dkar bre bdud rtsi de bzhin no/ /zas gtsang sras ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gzhan ni dga' bo'o/ /de nas zas dkar
<p>234b</p>
<p>234b.1</p>yau dwo ti Sh+yA khyo\u0f85tha b+ha dri kaH/ /dro No da na s+ya dwau pu trA pa ni rud+d+ho ma hAsta thA/ /A nan+da de ba dat+tA khyA ba mr-i to da na saM b+hA bau/ /shud+d+hA su taHsu pra shud+d+haHshuklA sU nush+tsa mA lI kaH/ /dro Na
<p>234b.2</p>sras gnyis ni/ /skar rgyal zhes dang bzang ldan no/ /bre bo zas kyi sras gnyis ni/ /ma 'gags de bzhin chen po'o/ /kun dga' bo dang lhas byin zhes/ /bya ba bdud rtsi zas las 'khrungs/ /legs par rang rtogs gtsang ma'i bu/ /dkar mo'i bu ni phreng ba can/ /bzang
<p>234b.3</p>pu trash+tsa b+ha drA Ni pai shA l+ya s+ya mr-i tA su taH/ /rA hu lo b+ha ga ba taHsU nuR+Yasmin+baM shaHpra tiSh+Thi taH/ /i t+yudz+dz+wa laM dz+nyA na ma ye na te na baM shaM ya thA bta ka thi taM ni sha mya/ /shAkyA ba b+hU bur+b+ha ga bta pra b+hA baH
<p>234b.4</p>po bre bo ma yi bu/ /yangs pa can yang bdud rtsi'i bu/ /gang la rigs ni rab gnas pa/ /sgra gcan 'dzin ni bcom ldan sras/ /zhes pa rab gsal ye shes rang bzhin des/ /rigs ni ji ltar bshad bzhin thos gyur nas/ /mchog gyur khyad par dag pa shAkya rnams/ /
<p>234b.5</p>sam+b+hA bi tot+kaR+Sha bi she Sha shud+d+hAH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM shAkyot+sat+t+ya ba dA naM nA ma sap+ta biM shaHpal+la paH// //sa ko pi sa twas+ya bi
<p>234b.6</p>bcom ldan mthu yis rab tu 'khrungs par gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las shAkya byung ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //gos dag gla rtsi'i dri dang
<p>235a</p>
<p>235a.1</p>be ka ban+d+hoHpu N+yo pa san+na s+ya ma hAn pra b+hA baH/ /na sai ti yaHkA ya sha te Shu puM saHkastU ri kA mod i bAM shu kA s+ya/ /dzi na sar+b+ba dza gadz+dzAn+tu san+tA ba ka ru NA hra de/ /pu re rA dza gr-i he be Nu
<p>235a.2</p>ldan pa bzhin/ /skyes bu snying stobs dben pa'i gnyen ldan ba/ /bsod nams nye bar rdzogs pa'i mthu chen gang / /ci yang de ni lus brgyar med mi 'gyur/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab kyi ni/ /'od ma'i tshal gyi nags nang na/ /srog chags 'gro kun yongs
<p>235a.3</p>ba nAn+ta ra bi hA ri Ni/ /shrI mA na b+hud b+hu pa tish+tsam+pA yAM po ta lA b+hi d+haH/ /dza hA ra d+ha na dar+s+pAn+d+h+yaM d+ha ne na d+ha ma da s+ya yaH/ /a dzA ya ta su tasta s+ya ma no ra tha sha tA n+wi taH/ /d+ha nA nA mIs+si tA
<p>235a.4</p>gdung la/ /rgyal ba thugs rje'i mtsho bzhugs tshe/ /gang gi nor gyis nor sbyin ni/ /nor gyi dregs pas long ba 'phrog /dpal ldan gru 'dzin zhes bya ba/ /sa bdag tsam par byung bar gyur/ /de yi bu ni btsas gyur pa/ /yid la re ba brgya ldan pa'o/ /nor rnams 'dod pas
<p>235a.5</p>bAp+t+ya su kha sa khyo bi b+hU ta yaH/ /shra ba NA k+Sha Ne dzA ta s+ya sa sU no sta s+ya dzan+ma ni/ /prI t+yA da dau da ri dra s+ya ko TI nAM biM sha ti ya dA/ /sa shro Na ko TI biM shA khaHshi shu khyA tasta dA b+ha bta/ /bi b+ha baHsu kr-i te nai ba ye na baM sha
<p>235a.6</p>thob pa yi/ /rnam par 'byor pa bde ba'i grogs/ /gro bzhin dag las skyes gyur zhing / /bu skyes pa yi tshe na de/ /dga' bas bye ba nyi shu ni/ /dbul po la byin gang gi tshe/ /gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu zhes/ /de tshe byis pa de grags gyur/ /gang gi rigs ni rnam brgyan pa/ /legs
<p>235b</p>
<p>235b.1</p>bi b+hU Shi taH/ /prAp+ta bi d+yaHsa sar+b+bAr+thaiHsa ha br-id+d+hi mu pa gA taH/ /tsa kA ra su kha bi shrAn+ti bya ba hA ra d+hA raHpi tuH/ /sa ka dA tsita pra b+hA puny+dza mi ba sUR+ya s+ya maN+Da lAta/ /a ba tIr+N+Na pu ra prAp+daM
<p>235b.2</p>byas kyis ni 'byor ba bzhin/ /nor rnams kun dang lhan cig tu/ /rig pa thob cing 'phel bar gyur/ /pha yi lugs rnams bzung ba yis/ /bde ba nyid du ngal gso byas/ /nam zhig nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las/ /nyi ma'i tshogs bzhin mdun du ni/ /mau gal gyi bu babs
<p>235b.3</p>maud+ga l+yA ya na ma bra bIta/ /ko b+ha bA narka saM kA shaHpra kA shi ta di gan+ta raH/ /tri da she shaHsha shAd+ko bA de bo bA dra bi No shwa raH/ /sa taM pa b+hA She na su raHshi Sh+yo b+ha ga ba tasto haM/ /bud+d+ha s+ya bi bu d+hA d+hI
<p>235b.4</p>nas/ /'ongs pa la ni de yis smras/ /phyogs mtshams rab tu gsal byed pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ba khyod ni su/ /skabs gsum dbang ngam ri bong can/ /lha'am nor gyi dbang po'am/ /de la des smras bdag ni lha/ /ma yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /yon tan dpal ldan
<p>235b.5</p>sha ban+d+ya mA Na gu Na shri yaH/ /swats+tsha ta s+ya pra yats+tsha taM piN+Da pA taM ma hA mu neH/ /sa twa shud+d+ho da yA bAp+taM b+ho gyaM b+ha ga ba taHpri yaM/ /i ti shro Na s+ya b+ha ga bAn+nAm+nA shra ba Na ga mi nA/ /ra ba
<p>235b.6</p>lha dbang gis/ /phyag byed dag gi slob ma yin/ /thub chen de la khyod kyis ni/ /dri med bsod snyoms rab tu stsol/ /snying stobs dag cing rgyas pa las/ /thob pa'i longs spyod bcam ldan mnyes/ /zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan/ /gro bzhin rna bar song ba yis/ /nyi ma
<p>236a</p>
<p>236a.1</p>b+hak+ta s+ya dzA t+ya pi ro mAny+tsa sa ma dzA ya ta/ /prAg+dzan+ma bA sa nA s+Yu taHswa b+hA bo ya s+ya yaHs+thi taH/ /sa ta s+yo dI ra Ne nA bi s+phu Ta e ba bi b+hA bya te/ /sa tasmai biM sha ti s+thA lI pA gaM nAM ka dza no
<p>236a.2</p>la gus rigs yin kyang / /spu long rab tu rgyas par gyur/ /sngon skye'i bag chags kyis sbyar ba'i/ /rang bzhin gang la gang gnas pa'i/ /de la de ni brjod pas kyang / /gsal ba nyid du rtogs par gyur/ /de yis de la tshos pa'i snod/ /mtho ris skye bo la
<p>236a.3</p>tse taM/ /prA hi Nod+b+hak+ti saM sak+ta shra d+d+hA yuk+te na tse ta sA/ /tasta staM pre Shi taM te na b+ha ga bAn b+hak+ti saM sa dA/ /a nu gra hA gra ha bya graHsa ma graM swa ya ma gra hI ta/ /athAsmin+na ba sa re b+hak+t+yA
<p>236a.4</p>'os/ /nyi shu gus pas chags pa dang / /dad ldan sems kyis rab tu bskyur/ /de nas gus pas phun tshogs des/ /springs pa de dag mtha' dag ni/ /lhag par rjes su 'dzin brtson pa'i/ /bcom ldan rang gis bzhes par gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni gus pa yis/ /
<p>236a.5</p>s+thA li sA kaM nr-i so tsi taM/ /sa mA dA ya swa yaM rA dzA bim+bi sA ra sa mA ya yau/ /shro Na prA hi ta b+ho ga nA mA mo dan+tA tra pAr+thi baH/ /A g+h+rA ya sha kra bra hi taM sar+b+ba di bya ma ma n+ya ta/ /pA tra she
<p>236a.6</p>rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni/ /mi bdag la 'os tshos pa'i snod/ /rang gis bzung nas byung bar gyur/ /gro bzhin gyis springs longs spyod kyi/ /dri bzang der ni sa bdag gis/ /tshor nas brgya byin gyis springs pa/ /thams cad mchog ldan yin par bsams/ /lhung bzed
<p>236b</p>
<p>236b.1</p>ShaM b+ha ga ba tA dat+ta mA swA d+ya b+hU pa tiH/ /shro Ne na pre Shi taM shru twA ta da nu bisma yaM ya yau/ /b+ha ga bAn taM pra Na myA tha rA dza d+hA niM na re shwa raH/ /pra bi sh+yA tsan+ti tas+phI tAM di byAM shro Na s+ya sam+ba
<p>236b.2</p>lhag ma bcom ldan gyis/ /byin nas sa yi bdag pos myangs/ /zas de gro bzhin gyis springs par/ /thos nas ya mtshan 'dzin bar gyur/ /de nas mi dbang bcom ldan la/ /phyag 'tshal rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /rab tu song ste gro bzhin gyis/ /phun tshogs mchog tu rgyas par
<p>236b.3</p>daM/ /gats+tshA mi taM swa yaM draSh+TuM draSh+Ta byo\u0f85sau ma hA ya shAH/ /i ti nish+tsi t+ya sa tsi baiHsa yA tra ram+b+ha mA di shata/ /po ta laHk+Shi ti saM dz+nyA twA swa ya mA ga ya nod+YA naM/ /nI ti dz+nyA pu tra me kAn+te shro Na ko Ti ma b+hA Sha
<p>236b.4</p>bsams/ /rang nyid de ni lta ru 'gro/ /grags chen de ni blta bar 'os/ /blon bcas de ltar nges byas nas/ /de yis bgrod pa rtsom par bstan/ /sa bdag rang nyid 'ong bar ni/ /brtson pa lugs zhes gru 'dzin gyis/ /shes nas dben pa dag tu bu/ /gro bzhin bye ba la
<p>236b.5</p>ta/ /pu tra twAM draSh+Tu mA yA ti bar+N+N+ya shra ma gu ru nr-i baH/ /i te Sha b+h+r-i sha mut+kaR+ShaHsa do ShaHpra ti b+hA ti me/ /k+Shi tI sha lak+Sha taM yA taM pak+Sha yA tod+Ya tA i paM/ /a bi lam+bi ta yAg+h+nan+ti sha ra i ba gu
<p>236b.6</p>smras ba/ /mi bdag rigs kyi rten pa'i bla/ /bu khyod lta ru 'ong zhes pa/ /'di ni mchog dang khyad par du/ /skyon dang bcas par bdag gis rtogs/ /sa dbang mtshon cha nyid gyur na/ /gshegs pa sbyor bar brtson pa yang / /thogs pa med par 'joms 'gyur te/ /rgyud las
<p>237a</p>
<p>237a.1</p>Na ts+yu tAH/ /b+h+r-i t+yA na ma bi bi dwe Sh+yo b+ha ba t+ya ti sha yon+na tiH/ /a b+hi mA nai ka sA rA NAM kiM pu naHpr-i thi bI b+hu dzAM/ /rU pe ba ya si sau b+hA gye pra b+ha be bi b+ha be shru te/ swa pu ta
<p>237a.2</p>'bos pa'i mda' bzhin no/ /shin tu khengs pa g.yog rnams kyi'ang / /dgra bo 'os su gyur yin na/ /mngon par khengs pa gcig pu yi/ /sa yi bdag po slar yang ci/ /gzugs dang na tshod skal bzang dang / /mthu dang 'byor pa thos pa la/ /'gran
<p>237a.3</p>s+yA pi saM g+har+g+hA ti not+kaR+ShaM sa ha te dza naH/ /dza ne dwe Sha ma ye pu tra gu Na mAts+tsha d+ya dzI bya te/ /Ats+tshA di ta gu Na pad+maHpri yastIk+Sh+Na ru tse ra pi/ /ud+d+ha ta ka s+ya na dwi Sh+yaHpra Na ta ka s+ya na pri yaH/ /dru maM pA ta ya
<p>237a.4</p>las rang gi bu dag kyang / /khyad 'phags skye bos mi bzod do/ /sdang ba'i rang bzhin skye bo la/ /yon tan bsgribs pas 'tsho bya bu/ /yon tan bsgribs pa'i pad+ma ni/ /tsha zer can gyi yid du 'ong / /'phyar ba su yis sdang bya min/ /rab 'dud su yis snying sdug min/ /ljon pa rengs
<p>237a.5</p>tistab+d+haM na mraM rak+Sha ti ma ru taH/ /sa tsA b+hi ga myo b+hU bA la s+t+wAM ya di swa ya me Sh+ya ti/ /ta de Sha dar+s+sa mo haste shre ya se na b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /tasmA di taHswa yaM ga twA pra Na myA pra Na ma pra b+huM/ /nak+Sha tra rA si la
<p>237a.6</p>pa rlung gis skyel/ /rab tu dud pa srung bar byed/ /mngon par 'gro 'os sa skyong de/ /gal te khyod can rang nyid 'ongs/ /de la khyod dregs rmongs pa 'di/ /dge legs slad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de slad 'di nas rang song ste/ /rgyu skar phung po dang mtshungs pa'i/ /do shal skyes su
<p>237b</p>
<p>237b.1</p>dr-i shaM da twa hA ra mu pa ya naM/ /pi tu shru twe ti ba tsa naM shro Na ko TIrma hI pa tiM/ /pra ya yau nA ba mA ru h+ya draSh+TuM rat+na bi b+hu Shi taH/ /sa rA dza d+hA ni mA sA d+ya prA s+ya dr-iSh+T+wA tsa b+hU pa tiM/ /da dau hA raM pra Na
<p>237b.2</p>byin nas ni/ /phyag 'os gtso la phyag 'tshal byos/ /zhes pa pha yi tshig thos nas/ /gro bzhin bye ba rin chen gyis/ /rnam par brgyan pa'i gru zhon te/ /sa yi bdag po lta ru song / /rgyal po'i pho brang song nas des/ /phrad cing mthong nas rgyal po la/ /phyag 'tshal do shal de la
<p>237b.3</p>myAsmai haR+Sha hA sa mi ba shri yaH/ /taM dr-iSh+TA swa ya mA yA taM nr-i pa tisnig+d+ha yA dr-i shA/ /he ma ro mAd+ka tsa ra NaM bisma yA di t+ya b+hA Sha ta/ /a ho pu N+ya ma he shA khyaHko pi twaM satwa bAn+d+ha baH/ /ya s+ya saM daR+sha
<p>237b.4</p>phul/ /dpal ni dga' nas dgod pa bzhin/ /mi bdag mdza' ba'i spyan gyis ni/ /rkang pa gser gyi ba spus mtshan/ /rang nyid 'ongs pa de mthong nas/ /ya mtshan las ni 'di skad smras/ /kye ma bsod nams mthu chen ldan/ /gang dang phrad pa tsam nyid na/ /sems kyi spyod
<p>237b.5</p>ne nai ba ma no br-it+ti pra sI da ti/ /gu Ne b+h+yo pa ra maishwaR+Ya mai shwaR+YAd su kha mut+ta maM/ /su khi b+h+yaHpa ra mA ro gya mA ro gyAta sA d+hu saM ga maH/ /a bi dr-iSh+Tas+t+wa yA sA d+ho b+ha ga bAn be Nu kA na ne/ /
<p>237b.6</p>tshul rab dang ba/ /sems can gnyen khyod ci zhig go/ /yon tan las ni dbang phyug mchog /dbang phyug las ni bde ba mchog /bde ba las ni nad med mchog /nad med las ni legs pa'i grogs/ /dge ba khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das/ /'od ma'i tshal na cang mthong ngam/ /
<p>238a</p>
<p>238a.1</p>tat+pA da pad+ma yu ga laM draSh+Tu marda si me ma taH/ /i t+yug+t+we k+Shi ti nA the na sau dza n+yA ta pak+Sha pA ti nA/ /taM shro Na ko T+wI biM sho pi pra Na yAta pra t+ya b+hA Sha ta/ /asmA da tu l+ya ka l+yA NA pra sA dA de ba de
<p>238a.2</p>de yi zhabs pad zung dag la/ /blta bar 'os pa bdag 'dod do/ /skye bo legs las phyogs lhung ba/ /sa yi mgon pos 'di brjod tshe/ /gro bzhin bye ba nyi shus kyang / /gus pas de dag la smras pa/ /lha gcig khyod kyi bka' drin ni/ /mtshungs med dge ba
<p>238a.3</p>ba te/ /a d+hu nA yo gya taM yA ta b+ha ga bad+daR+sha ne ma ma/ /i t+yuk+te te na sa hi taHpra tas+thau s+thi ti ko bi daH/ /b+hak+t+yA ta thA ga taM draSh+Tu sad+b+h+yA me ba ma hI pa tiH/ /a spr-iSh+Ta pA da s+ya b+hu bA shro Na s+yA

<p>238a.5</p>dzan+ma bA sa rAta/ /ma hArta bas+t+raiHsra s+thA ne b+h+r-i t+yai rAts+tshA di tA ma hI/ /b+ha ga bad+b+hak+tirbi na yAta gau ra bAts+tsa sa b+hu pa teH/ /bas+t+rA N+ya bA ra ya ta b+h+r-i t+yair+l+la dza mA na i ba k+Shi tau/ /bA ri te Sh+wa tha bas+t+re Shu di bya bas+t+rair+b+r-i
<p>238a.6</p>me reg rkang pa yis/ /'gro tshe g.yog pos chen po la/ /'os pa'i gos kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/ /bcom ldan la gus dul ba dang / /sa bdag la yang rjes las/ /ngo tsha bzhin du g.yog rnams kyis/ /sa la gos ni 'gebs pa zlog /de nas gos ni bzlog pa'i tshe/ /lha yi gos
<p>238b</p>
<p>238b.1</p>ta ma hI/ /a pra yat+no pa ka ra NAHsam+pa daHpu N+ya shA li nAM/ /ni bA d+ya di bya bas+t+rA Ni b+hU mau te nAr+p+pi te pa de/ /bi tsa tsA lA tsa lA pr-i th+wI sa she la ba na sA ga rA/ /ta taHsa b+hU mi pa ti nA
<p>238b.2</p>kyis sa gzhi g.yogs/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i nyer mkho rnams/ /'bad pa med par phun sum tshogs/ /lha yi gos rnams bzlog nas ni/ /de yis sa la rkang bzhag tshe/ /ri nags rgya mtsho ngang bcas pa/ /g.yo med sa gzhi rnam par g.yos/ /de nas sa bdag dang 'grogs
<p>238b.3</p>sa ha prA s+ya dzi nA shra maM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM bi lo kyA s+ya bi da d+he pA da ban+da naM/ /u pa piSh+Ta s+ya ta s+yA gre hr-iSh+Ta s+yA lo ka nA mr-i taiH/ /tsakre sha ma bi be ka s+ya b+ha ga bAn b+hi She tsa naM/ /A sha
<p>238b.4</p>te/ /rgyal ba'i gnas su phyin pa des/ /bcom ldan 'das la rab bltas shing / /de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas/ /dga' dang zhi zhing dben ldan pa/ /mdun na gnas pa de la ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs pa yis/ /bdud rtsis mngon par dbang bskur mdzad/ /khams
<p>238b.5</p>yA nu sha yaM d+hA tu pra kr-i tiny+tsa bi tsAR+ya saH/ /sa t+ya san+daR+sha nA yA s+ya bi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /sat+kA ya dr-iSh+Ti shai lo\u0f85s+ya ta yA biM sha ti shr-id+ga bAn/ /dz+nyA na badzre Na nir+b+hin+naHshro taHprAb+ti pa da spr-i shaH/ /pra pra dz+yA yaM ta no ta s+ya
<p>238b.6</p>dang bsam pa bag la nyal/ /rang bzhin dag kyang spyad nas de/ /bden pa yang dag rtogs bya'i slad/ /de la chos ni bstan ba mdzad/ /de yi 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri/ /rtse mo nyi shu ldan pa ni/ /ye shes rdo rje de yis bcom/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i gnas la reg /de nas de yi lus la ni/ /

<p>239a.1</p>dzA tA yAM sa ha sA swa yaM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM pra Na myA tha bismi taHpra ya yau nr-i paH/ /tI bra bra te pi shro Na s+ya ka dA tsit+sa mA dzA ya ta/ /bA sa nA she Sha saM skA rAta ban+d+hu b+ho ga su kha smr-i tiH/ /sa

<p>239a.3</p>ta mA hU ya b+ha ga bAn bi lak+ShaM prA ha sa smi taH/ /ko yaM pa ri bi tar+k+kaste pra ti saM lI na tse ta saH/ /bi sh+liSh+TA t+yan+ta kr-iSh+TA bA tan+t+ri b+ha ba ti bi swA rA/ /sa mA mA d+hu d+ya mA yA ti ta smAta sa myaM sa mA shra yeta/ /
<p>239a.4</p>ldan 'dzum dang bcas pa des/ /skyengs pa de bos bka' stsal pa/ /sems ni kun tu yongs zhum pa/ /khyod kyis yongs su rtog 'di ci/ /dral ba'am shin tu drangs pa yi/ /rgyud mang dbyangs dang bral ba yin/ /mnyam pa las ni sgra snyan 'gyur/ /de slad mnyam pa bsten par bya/ /
<p>239a.5</p>i t+yA de shAta b+ha ga ba taHsar+b+ba sA mya mu pa ga taH/ /sa prA pa bi ma la dz+nyA na pash+tsAt+ta pa bi bap+dzi taH/ /ta s+ya tA mad+b+hu tAM sid+d+hiM bi lokya pr-i thu bisma yAH/ /sa prats+tshur+b+hik+Sha ba sar+b+be b+ha ga ban+taM sa tsA b+h+ya d+hA ta/ /shro Na
<p>239a.6</p>zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas/ /phyi nang gdung ba rnam par spangs/ /thams cad zhi ba nye bar gyur/ /de yis dri med ye shes thob/ /de yi rmad byung grub pa de/ /mthong nas ya mtshan che ba yi/ /dge slong kun gyis bcom ldan la/ /dris shing des kyang bka' stsal pa/ /gro
<p>239b</p>
<p>239b.1</p>s+ya shrU yaM tAM shre yaHkar+m+ma dzan+mAn+ta rArdzi taM/ /na h+ya pu N+ya nu b+hA bA nAM b+ha ban+t+yad+b+hu ta sam+ba daH/ /bi ba sh+yI b+ha ga bAn samyak+saM bud+d+haHsu ga taHpu rA/ /pu rIm+ban+d+hu ma tI nA ma dza na tsA ri
<p>239b.2</p>bzhin gyis ni dge ba'i las/ /skye ba gzhan la bsgrubs pa nyan/ /gang phyir bsod nams min pa yi/ /mthu ldan rmad byung phun tshogs min/ /sngon tshe yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs rnam par gzigs/ /gnyen ldan zhes pa'i grong khyer du/ /ljongs ni rgyu
<p>239b.3</p>ka yA ya yau/ /ta tra b+hak+t+ye su kr-i ti b+hir+b+hak+tA yo ba ni man+t+ri taH/ /bA re Na pra t+ya haM ge haM ya yau te ShAM sa hA nu gaH/ /ta to da ri dra saM prAp+ta bA re brAh+ma Na dA ra ka/ /in+d+ra so mA b+hi d+hash+tsa kre yat+nAM tad+Yo ga b+ho dza
<p>239b.4</p>zhing gshegs par gyur/ /der ni legs byas gus pa yis/ /gzan la nye bar mgron du gnyer/ /nyin re res kyis de dag gi/ /khyim du rjes 'brang bcas pa gshegs/ /de nas dbang po'i zla zhes pa/ /bram ze'i bu ni dbul po yi/ /res la bab tshe 'bad pa yis/ /de la 'os pa'i bza'
<p>239b.5</p>ne/ /sa pra yat+nA+e na ma ha tA b+ho dz+yaM b+hak+ti sa bi tr-i taM/ /Ats+tsha d+ya bas+t+rairba su d+hAM pra hwap+tasmai n+ya pe da ya ta/ /tad+bo sa pra Ni d+hA ne na dzA taHso yaM ma hA d+ha naH/ /so bar+N+NA ro ma tsa ra NaHshro Na ko TI su ro sa maH/ /
<p>239b.6</p>ba sbyar/ /de yi 'bad pa chen po yis/ /gus pas gtsang mar sbyar ba'i zas/ /gos kyis nor 'dzin g.yogs byas nas/ /rab tu btud de de la phul/ /longs spyod de yi smon lam gyis/ /gro bzhin bye ba lha lta bu/ /gser gyi spu yi rkang pa can/ /nor can 'dir ni de gyur to/ /
<p>240a</p>
<p>240a.1</p>na bas+t+ra ra hi tA b+hU miHspr-iSh+TA ne na ka dA tsa na/ /kam+bastats+tsa ra Na spaR+shA da ta a bA b+ha bta b+hU baH/ /i ti su ga ta ba tsaHsu d+hA ba dA taM da sha na ma yU Sha mi bon+mi Sha ta swa b+hA baM/ /pra Ni hi
<p>240a.2</p>gos dang bral ba'i sa gzhi la/ /'di yis nam yang rig pa med/ /'di nyid phyir na de yis ni/ /rkang pas reg la sa g.yos gyur/ /zhes pa bde gshegs gsung ni bdud rtsi ltar dkar ba/ /tshems kyi 'od bzhin rab tu gsal ba'i rang bzhin dag /dge slong
<p>240a.3</p>ta hr-i da yaHba raM ni pI ya s+thi ra ku sha lA ya ba b+hU ba b+hik+Shu saM g+haH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA pa dA na kalpa la tA yAM shro Na ko TI biM shA ba dA na maSh+TA bid+shaHpal+la
<p>240a.4</p>tshogs kyi thugs ni rnam par mi g.yeng bas/ /mchog tu 'thungs nas dge ba brtan pa'i slad du gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste
<p>240a.5</p>paH// //daur+dz+dza n+ya duHsa ha bi shA la kha lA pa kA rairnai pA sha ye bi kr-i ti rasti ma hA sha yA nAM/ /byA lelba Na k+Shi ti b+h+r-i dA ku li to pi sin+d+hurnai po sar+dz+dza hr-i da yA da mr-i ta swa b+hA
<p>240a.6</p>nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //mi bsrun skye bo ngan pa'i gnod pa bzod dka' chen po yis/ /bsam pa che rnams bsam pa rnam par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin/ /sbrul gyis rab bskor sa 'dzin dag gis dkrugs par gyur mod kyang / /rgya mtsho snying las bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rab tu gtong
<p>240b</p>
<p>240b.1</p>baM/ /pu re pu ra rA dza gr-i he b+ha ga bAn be Nu ka na ne/ /ka lan+da ka ni bA sa khye bi dza hA ra ma no ha re/ /ta tra bi tra si tA ne ki sha trunis+t+riM sha bAn+d+ha baH/ /a dzA tA sha tru nA ma b+hUta bim+bi sA ra su

<p>240b.3</p>to nr-i paH/ /shAkya baM shaHswa hr-it+ta s+ya de ba dat+ta b+hi to\u0f85b+ha ba ta/ /k+Shu dra man+t+re Na ya s+yA sIta sa be tA la i bot+ka TaH/ /sa ka dA tsita su khA sI naM ra haHprA ha ma hI pa tiM/ /na rA dzan pha li to\u0f85d+ya pi ma mA pi
<p>240b.4</p>zhes bya bar gyur/ /lhas byin zhes pa shAkya'i rigs/ /de yi snying gi grogs por gyur/ /gang gis ngan pa'i sngags kyis de/ /ro langs bzhin du drag por gyur/ /de yis nam zhig sa yi bdag /mdun sar bde bar 'khod la smras/ /rgyal po bdag gis khyed bsten pa'i/ /
<p>240b.5</p>twad sa mA shrA yaH/ /mi th+yo pA tsa ra ra hi taHsu kha niR+Yan+t+ra tan+t+ra yoH/ /mi tho ma no ra tha trA Nan+mi tra shab+daHpra bar+t+ta te/ /ya e Sha shAkya shra ma NaHsu kha be Nu ba nes+thi ta/ /taM ha twA prAp+ta mits+tshA mi tat+pa dan+de
<p>240b.6</p>'bras ni da dung grub pa med/ /bde bar yid gcugs grogs dag ni/ /phan tshun yid la re ba skong / /rdzun gyis rim gro bral ba la/ /grogs kyi sgra ni rab tu 'jug /gang 'di 'od ma'i nags tshal na/ /shAkya'i dge sbyong ba der gnas pa/ /de pas da lha yis phyag byas pa/ /de yi

<p>241a.1</p>ba ban di taM/ /k+ShI ya te na ya yA sha trur+l+la b+h+ya te na ya yA ya shaH/ /bar+d+ha te na ya yA mA naHkin+ta yA mi tra sam+pa daH/ /ma hA d+ha nA b+hi d+ha ne na tata so re Na ni man+t+ri taH/ /sa pu raM prA tarA
<p>241a.2</p>gnas ni thob par 'dod/ /gang gis dgra bo mi choms dang / /gang gis grags pa mi 'thob dang / /gang gis khengs pa mi 'phel ba/ /grogs kyi phun tshogs de yis ci/ /nor can zhes pa'i grong khyer bas/ /de ni zas la mgron du gnyer/ /tshul 'chos can de
<p>241a.3</p>gan+tA dAm+b+hi kaHsa hA b+hik+Shu b+hiH/ /rA dza mAr+g+ga pra bi sha taHsa ta s+ya byA la kuny+dzaraH/ /ut+s+r-i dz+ya tA ma b+hi mu khaHkro d+hAn+d+ho d+ha na pA la kAH/ /i t+yuk+te de ba dat+te na nr-i pa tir+m+mi tra t+sa <p>]pat+sa [</p>laH/ /bud+d+ha

<p>241a.5</p>pra b+ha baM sany+tsin+t+ya no tsi kiny+tsi na da pAd+mu khaH/ /de ba dat+to pi nirga t+ya rA dza sau hAr+d+da dur+m+ma daH/ /pra ha hasti ma hA mA traM hA raM da twA s+ya to Sha NaM/ /shra ma NAHbrA ta ra gan+tA pu raM b+hik+Shu sha ter+b+r-i
<p>241a.6</p>rgyas mthu ni bsams byas nas/ /gdong smad ci yang mi smra gyur/ /rgyal po'i grogs kyis ngan rgyags pa'i/ /lhas byin dag kyang phyir byung nas/ /glang po'i blon po chen po la/ /do shal rngan par byin nas smras/ /dge slong dge sbyong brgyas bskor nas/ /nang par grong khyer 'ong
<p>241b</p>
<p>241b.1</p>taH/ /pre rA NI yas+t+wa yA tasmai ga dza i t+yA ha b+hU pa tiH/ /de ba dat+ta ba tsaHshru twA ta thet+yuts+tsair+d+wi pA d+hi paH/ /shre NI hi me Sha mUrkA NA me ka yA tA nu pA ti nI/ /dz+nyA twA pi tA ma b+hi prA yaM sar+b+ba
<p>241b.2</p>bar 'gyur/ /de la khyod kyis glang po che/ /gtang bar byos shig sa bdag gsung / /lhas byin tshig thos gnyis 'thung gi/ /bdag pos de bzhin zhes pa smras/ /gang phyir lug dang rmongs pa'i phreng / /gcig song rjes su lhung ba nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen pas sdig can gyi/ /
<p>241b.3</p>dz+nyAHpA ba tse ta sAM/ /prA taHsa mA ya yau sar+d+hAM b+hik+ShU NAM pany+tsa b+hiHsha taiH/ /a tha hasti pa kot+s+raSh+TaM kr-iSh+Ta prA sA da pA da baH/ /ta ma b+h+ya d+hA ba dA b+hid+d+haH kro d+hAn+d+haHkrU ra kuny+dza riH/ /a nA yat+taHpa ri
<p>241b.4</p>sems kyi bsam pa mkhyen mod kyang / /dge slong lnga brgya dag dang ni/ /thabs cig yang dag byon par gyur/ /de nas glang chen bdag po yis/ /gnad du bsnun bkye glang po che/ /drag po khang bzang rkang 'thung 'joms/ /khro bas long bas de mdun rgyugs/ /yongs su 'dris las
<p>241b.5</p>ca yA daM ku sha s+ya gu ro ra pi/ /kha la bid+WA ni ba dwe ShI ma de na ma li nI kri taH/ /se bA bya sa na sak+tA nA ma sa kr-it+kar+N+Na tsa pa lAta/ /prA NA pa hA ri b+h+r-ing+gA NAM b+h+r-i t+yA nA mi ba duSh+pa tiH/ /
<p>241b.6</p>lcags kyu ni/ /lci ba yis kyang dbang mi 'gyur/ /mi bsrun rig byed ldan pa bzhin/ /sdang dang rgyags pas dri mar byas/ /lan cig min par rna bskyod pas/ /brten pa'i gdung ba la chags pa/ /bung ba rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /bdag po ngan pas g.yog gi bzhin/ /
<p>242a</p>
<p>242a.1</p>man+di ro pa dra be+e tasmin dru ma dro hi N+ya b+hi dru te/ /bi dru te sa ha sA lo ke hA hA kA ro ma hA na b+hUta/ /ta s+yany+tsata kar+N+Na tA lA ni la tu li ta sa rata sAn+d+ra sin+dU ra pU raiHsaM pUr+NaM
<p>242a.2</p>khang pa'i nyer 'tshes shing rnams ni/ /'joms pa de yis mngon par brgyugs/ /'jig rten 'phral la bros pa'i tshe/ /hA hA zhes pa chen po byung / /de yi rna ba rab bskyod stabs kyis blangs pa'i rlung gi rab zags li khri'i rgyun gyi tshogs/ /bud med 'jigs
<p>242a.3</p>rA dza mar+g+ge ts+yuta tsa ki ta ba d+hU ra k+ta bas+t+rA sa mA NaiH/ /ud+daN+DoMts+tsaN+Da puN+Da b+h+ra ma Na ba ra la sata sA d+h+wa pA yA si tA shA yo Shi l+lo lA la kA b+ha b+h+ra ma ra b+ha ra mi lad+bi b+h+ra maHsaM b+h+ra mo\u0f85
<p>242a.4</p>pa'i gos dmar lhung ba lta bur spyod pas rgyal po'i lam ni khengs gyur zhing / /rab gtum dbyug pa blangs 'dra'i sna ni g.yab mo'i tshogs 'gyed phyogs kyi bud med 'jigs pa yis/ /gdung bar gyur pa'i lan bu'i 'od ltar bung ba'i tshogs gtibs rnam par 'phrul
<p>242a.5</p>b+hUta/ /pU ra pra mA tha bya thi te dza ne ko la ha la ku le/ /A ru ro ha ma hA harmyaM de ba dat+taHpra mat+ta d+hIH/ /b+ha ga bad+g+ra ha NaM draSh+TuM so\u0f85b+ho bad b+h+r-i sha mut+su kaH/ /un+mU la ne na gu Ni nAM mat+tad+gaH
<p>242a.6</p>ba kun rmongs gyur/ /grong khyer bcom pas rab gdungs te/ /skye bo ku cos 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ /rab myos blo ldan lhas byin ni/ /ba gam che ldan steng du 'dzegs/ /de ni bcom ldan 'dzin pa la/ /mchog tu blta ni 'dod par gyur/ /yon tan can rnams rab bcom pas/ /gtum
<p>242b</p>
<p>242b.1</p>ba ri tu Sh+ya ti/ /bi dru te Shu ga dza trA sat+ta sarbe Shu b+hi k+Sha Shu/ /A nan+da e ka e bA b+hUta b+hik+Shur+b+yA ga ba to\u0f85n+ti ke/ /ta tra pany+tsA na nAHpany+tsa niR+Ya yur+b+ha ga ba taHka rAta/ /ka rA la ke sa ra saTAstAn+na
<p>242b.2</p>po dag ni yongs su tshim/ /der ni glang pos rab skrag nas/ /dge slong thams cad bros pa'i tshe/ /dge slong kun dga' gcig pu nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag las der/ /gdong lda ldan pa lnga 'thon te/ /'jigs su rung ba'i ral ba can/ /
<p>242b.3</p>khAM shu tsitA i ba/ /dwipastad+gan+d+ha mA g+h+rA ya dar+p+pA pa smA ra bA ra NaM/ /a b+huta shru ta sha kr-ita mU tra sa ha sai ba pa rAd+mu khaH/ /dza be na bi dru tasta tra dan+tI dar+p+pa dari dra tAM/ /prAp+taHpra dIp+ta da ha
<p>242b.4</p>de yi sen mo'i 'od tshogs bzhin/ /dregs pa'i rjed byed zlog byed pa/ /de yi dri tshor gnyis 'thung ni/ /chu dang gci ba zag byed cing / /'phral la nyid du phyir phyogs gyur/ /so ldan dregs pas dbul ba nyid/ /thob cing mgyogs par bros pas der/ /phyogs bcu rnams
<p>242b.5</p>nAHsa da daR+sha di sho da sha/ /sa bi lo kya dzA lad+ba h+ni dz+wa la dzA lA ku laM dza gta/ /pA da pad+man+ti kaM shAstuHshI ta laM sa mu pA ya yau/ /saM ko tsA b+hi ru tseHsa tsin+ta ma na saHpra d+h+wasta bak+t+rad+Yu
<p>242b.6</p>ni sreg byed kyis/ /rab tu 'bar ba mthong bar gyur/ /de yis 'gro ba me 'bar zhing / /'bar ba'i dra bas dkrigs mthong nas/ /ston pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma'i drung / /bsil ba dag tu nye bar song / /sred pa sngon zhum yid ni bsam gtan bzhin gyi mdzes pa rab tu
<p>243a</p>
<p>243a.1</p>tair+d+dai n+yA san+na bi hI na da na ma d+hu pa prA d+ha ko lA ha laH/ /lo b+hAn+d+ha s+ya ma hA bya yot+pa ba i ba kli shoSh+ma ni shwA si nastA s+yA b+hUta pa ri tA pa ni sh+la tha ga ter b+hA rA ya mA NaH
<p>243a.2</p>nyams gyur cing / /nyon mongs dro ba'i dbugs rgod de yi lag pa chags pas long ba dag gis ni/ /mang du mdzad pa rtsom bzhin bkren pa nyer gnas sbyin pas dman pa'i sbrang rtsi 'thungs/ /ca co sgrogs par song zhing yongs gdung dman par song ste
<p>243a.3</p>ka raH/ /taM pA da mU la mA yaM taM b+hI taM kA ru N+ya sA ga raH/ /shAstA ka re Na sa spaR+sha tsakra swasti ka lak+Sh+ma NA/ /kum+b+ha bi n+yasta hastastaM pro bA tsa b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /pu tra swa kar+m+ma Nai

<p>243a.5</p>be mAM prAp+ti si ma mi nA da shAM/ /bi be kA lo ka dza la daHkA yo\u0f85yaM mAM sa b+hU d+ha raH/ /b+hA raste mo hA saM b+hA raHpA pA du sa na taHpa raMH/ /i t+yuk+te ka ru NAr+d+re Na b+hI to b+ha ga ba tA ga dzaH/ /
<p>243a.6</p>pa 'di nyid bu/ /rang las nyid kyis thob pa yin/ /khyod lus sha yi ri bo ni/ /dben pa'i snang ba dag gi sprin/ /rmongs pa'i tshogs kyis khur gyur pa/ /sdig pas mchog tu bskrun pa yin/ /bcom ldan snying rjes brlan pas 'di/ /brjod tshe 'jigs pa'i glang po de/ /
<p>243b</p>
<p>243b.1</p>sa lab+d+ha shwa sa mA lA na li no nish+tsa la tAM ya yau/ /de ba dat+ta s+ya saM kalbe kUny+dza re tsa ma hot+ka Te/ /b+hag+nenirbi g+h+na haR+Sho b+hU ta sa mud+b+hu tAd+d+hu to dza naH/ /ta taHkr-i twA gr-i ha pa ter+g+r-i he b+ho
<p>243b.2</p>yid brtan thob nas gdags thag gis/ /btags bzhin g.yo med nyid du gyur/ /lhas byin gyi ni brtag pa dang / /glang po drag po chen po yang / /nyams tshe gegs med dga' ba yis/ /skye bo ya mtshan skyes par gyur/ /de nas khyim bdag khyim du ni/ /zas ni
<p>243b.3</p>dz+ya prA ti gra haM/ /b+ha ga bAn b+hi k+Shu b+hiHsA r+d+haM kA na nA gan+tu mud+Ya yau/ /a b+hi sr-i t+ya ga dzan+d+ro pi dzi na s+ya tsa ra NAp+dza yoH/ /kr-i twA ka re Na saM spaR+shaM ba busta t+yA dza kauny+dza raM/ /tsa turma hA rA dzi
<p>243b.4</p>rab tu blang mdzad nas/ /dge slong dag dang thabs cig tu/ /bcom ldan nags su gshegs brtson gyur/ /glang po'i dbang yang mngon btud de/ /rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /lag pas reg par byas nas ni/ /glang pos lus ni btang bar gyur/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i
<p>243b.5</p>ke Shu de be Shu bi Sha dad+Yu tiH /u ba pan+naHsa sa hA sa su ga taM dr-iSh+Ta mA ya yo/ /swa mA shra ma pa daM prA p+taMb+ha ga ban+ta mu pe t+ya saH/ /pra Na nA mArka saM kA shaM pra dIp+ta ma Ni kuN+Da laH/ /ta s+ya ke yU re
<p>243b.6</p>lha dag tu/ /nye bar 'khrungs shing mdzes pa ni/ /dri ma med de 'phral nyid la/ /bde bar gshegs pa lta ru 'ongs/ /rang gi bsti gnas phyin gyur pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /nor bu'i rna cha rab 'bar ba/ /nyi ma 'dra ba des phyag 'tshal/ /de yi dpung rgyan cod/ /
<p>244a</p>
<p>244a.1</p>mu ku Ta pra b+hA pal+la ba pU ri tAH/ /shakra tsA sai ri bA byap+ta bi re dzur+g+han rA dza yaH/ /bi na yA du ba bi sh+ya gre sa shAstuHshrastaM kal+ma ShaH/ /taM di bya puSh+pai rA kIR+ya satwa shu b+h+rai ra b+hA Shata/ /b+ha
<p>244a.2</p>pan gyi/ /'od kyi yal 'dab rgyas gyur pa/ /sprin gyi phreng ba brgya byin gyi/ /gzhu yis khyab pa bzhin du mos/ /sdig pa bral des ston pa yi/ /mdun du dul pas 'khod nas ni/ /lha yi me tog snying stobs bzhin/ /dkar bas gtor nas des smras pa/ /yongs
<p>244a.3</p>ga bAn b+ha ba taHpA da pad+ma saM spaR+sha ne na me/ /dur+d+da sha duHkha san+ta paHshAn+taHsan+to Sha shA linaH/ /sha mash+lA g+h+yA kA pi bya sa na bi Sha do ShoSh+ma sha ma nI su d+hA br-iSh+Tar+d+r-iSh+Tirba ta b+ha ga ba taHsnig+d+ha ma d+hu

<p>244a.5</p>rA/ /ya yA spr-iSh+Ta spaSh+TaM kha ra ta ra bi kA ra bya ti ka raM bi mu ts+yan+taHshAn+tiHshra ya ti ha ta mo haHpa shu ra pi/ /e ti ta s+ya bru bA Na s+ya b+ha ga bAn b+ha ba shAn+ta ye/ /sa t+ya daR+sha na saM shud+d+haM bi de d+he

<p>244b</p>
<p>244b.1</p>d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /mau li muk+taM shu shu b+h+re Na shi sA tsa ra Na dwa yaM/ /sa shAstuHpra ya yau na twA ha san+ni ba d+ha ba b+h+ra maM/ /ga te tasmin mu kha sha shi pra kA shi ta na b+ha ta le/ /b+ha ga bAn b+hik+Shu
<p>244b.2</p>chos ni bstan par mdzad/ /dbu rgyan mu tig 'od dkar ba'i/ /mgo yis ston pa'i zhabs dag la/ /phyag 'tshal srid pa'i 'khrul pa la/ /dgod pa bzhin du de rab song / /bzhin ras nam mkha'i zla ba'i gzhi/ /rab gsal byas nas de song tshe/ /dge slong gis dris bcom
<p>244b.3</p>b+hiHpr-iSh+Tastad+b+r-it+tAn+tA ma b+hA Sha ta/ /pUr+b+ba kalpAn+ta re shAstuHkA sh+ya pA khya s+ya shA sa ne/ /a b+hUt+p+ra bra dzi to pye Sha shik+ShA pa da ni rA da raH/ /a nA da rAta kuny+dza ra ta b+ho gaHsa g+ho pa sa ba nata/ /sa t+ya dr-iSh+Ti
<p>244b.4</p>ldan gyis/ /de yi byung ba'i mtha' bka' stsal/ /sngon dus gzhan la ston pa ni/ /'od srungs zhes pa'i bstan pa la/ /rab tu byung bar gyur kyang 'di/ /bslab pa'i gnas la gus ma gyur/ /ma gus pa las glang po yi/ /longs spyod nyid dang dge 'dun ni/ /bsten las bden
<p>244b.5</p>ba le nAn+ti saM prAp+taHshA sa na gra haM/ /prAg+dzan+ma bi hi taM kar+m+ma ka s+ya tsin+na ni bar+t+ta ta/ /karmo pa diSh+Ta sam+ban+d+ha b+hak+ti b+ho gyaiHsa tse ta saH/ /tasmin bya ti ka re g+ho re sar+b+bas+t+yak+tosmi b+hik+Shu

<p>245a</p>
<p>245a.1</p>b+hiH/ /na twA nan+da na ta trA pi shru ya tAM pUr+b+ba saM ga hiH/ /sha shAd+ka shI ti sa ra si b+h+rA ta rau ru tsi rau pu rA/ /pUr+N+NaHmu khash+tse ti rA dza haM sob b+hU ba tuH/ /ka dA tsid+b+ra h+ma dat+ta s+ya bA rA
<p>245a.2</p>btang la/ /der yang kun dga' bos ma yin/ /sngon tshe 'grogs pa mnyan par gyis/ /ri bong mtshan ma ltar bsil mtshor/ /gang ba gang ba'i bzhin zhes pa'i/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po spun dag ni/ /yid du 'ong bar sngon gyur to/ /nam zhig wA rA Na sI na/ /sa yi
<p>245a.3</p>Na s+yAM ma hi pa tiH/ /brah+ma ma tIM puSh+ka ri NI ra myAM pUr+N+Na mu kho ya yauH/ /sa ta s+yaM lo la ka ma lAkiny+dzalka pa ri pany+dza raH/ /bi dza hA ra pa ro dzi n+yaM haM sA nAM pany+tsa sha taiH/ /pUr+b+ba pu N+ye nu b+hA be na
<p>245a.4</p>bdag po tshangs byin gyis/ /tshangs pa ldan pa'i rdzing bu ni/ /dga' bar gang ba'i bzhin gyis phyin/ /g.yo ba'i pad+mas dkrigs pa yi/ /ze 'brus yongs su ser ba de/ /ngang pa dag ni lnga brgya dang / /mtsho skyes can der rnam par rol/ /sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis
<p>245a.5</p>taM rU pA ti sha yodz+dz+wa laM/ /da daR+sha kaR+YAN+yut+s+r-idz+ya dza no n+yish+tsa la lo tsa naH/ /taM shru twaM b+hU ba tista tra s+thi taM tad+daR+sha nod+su kaH/ /ku sha lAn gra ha Ne ta s+ya bya sr-i dza dzA la dzI bi naH/ /
<p>245a.6</p>ni/ /khyad 'phags gzugs rab 'bar ba de/ /bya ba dor ba'i skye bo yis/ /g.yo med mig gis mthong bar gyur/ /de ni der gnas sa bdag gis/ /thos nas de dag blta 'dod pas/ /rgya yis 'tsho ba'i mkhas pa dag /de bzung slad du btang bar gyur/ /
<p>245b</p>
<p>245b.1</p>tasmin gr-i hI te na li nI lI lAsmi ta shi ta twi Shi/ /sha tA ni pany+tsa haM sA nAM t+yak+t+wa taM pra ya yurdza bAta/ /e kastu ta s+ya sau dza n+yA da bad+d+ho pi su bad+d+ha bta/ /ta dar+tha bya thi tasta s+thau pre ma pA
<p>245b.2</p>pad+ma can gyi rol pa'i 'dzum/ /dkar ba'i 'od zer de bzung tshe/ /ngang pa lnga brgya dag gis ni/ /de btang mgyogs par rab tu song / /gcig ni de la gzhung bzang bas/ /bcings pa med kyang bcings pa bzhin/ /mdza' ba'i zhags pas dbang byas nas/ /
<p>245b.3</p>sha ba shI kr-i ta/ /ta tastaiHprA pi taM rA dza haM saM bi lo kya taM/ /sne ha pad+d+haM dwi tI yany+tsa bismi tAstA ba lo tsa yata/ /haM saHpUr+N+Na mu khaHso\u0f85ha mA nan+dasta s+ya tsA nu gaH/ /ga tAsta da
<p>245b.4</p>de yi don du gdung zhing gnas/ /de nas rgyal pos ngang pa yi/ /rgyal po de yis bzung ba dang / /gnyis pa mdza' bas bcings pa yang / /mthong nas ya mtshan de dag btang / /ngang pa gang ba'i bzhin de bdag /de yi rjes 'brang kun dga' bo/ /des na deng yang
<p>245b.5</p>d+ya tsa t+yak+t+wA mAM haM sA e ba b+hi k+Sha baH/ /pUr+b+ba smin na b+ha bat+kA le bA rA Na s+yAM ma hI pa tiH/ /oT+Ta nA ma ma naHbaT+Te li khi taM yad+Ya shaHba raiH/ /sa ha sra yo d+hasta s+ya b+hU dak+Shi NA t+yo ni ra t+ya yaH/ /ka ra
<p>245b.6</p>bdag btang nas/ /song ba'i dge slong ngang pa nyid/ /gang gi grags pa pha rol gyis/ /yid kyi glegs bu la bris pa/ /wA rA Na sIr sngon dus na/ /sa bdag a Ta zhes pa byung / /stong dang g.yul 'gyed lho phyogs pa/ /g.yul gyi dus su sngon 'gro zhing / /lag
<p>246a</p>
<p>246a.1</p>daN+DI ti ba khyA taHsaM grA mA gre sa raHpri yaH/ /ka dA tsita g+ho ra sa ma re pany+tsa mA t+ya sha tA ni taM/ /nr-i paM t+yak+t+wA ya yur+b+hI t+ya ka ra daN+DI tu nA t+ya dzata/ /a ha me ba sa b+hU pA la
<p>246a.2</p>pa'i mtshon zhes grags pa ni/ /de yi bslu med grogs por gyur/ /nam zhig 'jigs rung g.yul zhugs tshe/ /blon po lnga brgya dag gis ni/ /mi bdag de btang 'jigs nas song / /lag pa'i mtshon gyis gtang ma gyur/ /sa skyong de ni nga nyid de/ /
<p>246a.3</p>sa tsi ba te tsi b+hik+Sha baH/ /ka ra daN+Di sa e ba ya mA nan+do na dza hA ti mAM/ /dzan+mAn+ta ri pi siM ho haM kU pa ni pa ti taHpu rA/ /u pe k+Shi taHk+Sha NAd+b+h+r-i t+yaiHshr-iM gA laiR+Yed+yab+hik+sha baH/ /e ke na tsa nA
<p>246a.4</p>blon po de dag dge slong rnams/ /lag pa'i mtshon de kun dga' bo/ /'di nyid nga ni gtang ma gyur/ /sngon gyi skye ba gzhan la yang / /bdag ni seng ge khron par lhung / /wa skyes g.yog gis skad cig la/ /spangs pa gang de dge slong rnams/ /wa skyes gcig gi
<p>246a.5</p>khaiHkhA taM dIr+g+haM kr-i twAsmi mo k+She taH/ /dzam+bu ke na sa e bA ya mA nan+do\u0f85d+ya ma mA nu gaH/ /kU Ta pA sha ni bar+d+ha s+ya mr-i ga yU tha pa teHpu rA/ /lub+d+ha kA ga ma na tra bA dz+dzag+mustad nu gA mr-i gAH/ /
<p>246a.6</p>sder mo yis/ /ring du brkos nas bdag thar byas/ /de nyid kun dga' bo 'di ste/ /da lta bdag gi rjes 'brang gyur/ /sngon tshe ri dwags khyu yi bdag /rgya yi zhags pas bcings par gyur/ /de yi rjes 'brang ri dwags rnams/ /sred ldan 'ongs pas skrag nas bros/ /
<p>246b</p>
<p>246b.1</p>a nu rak+tA na ta t+yA dza taM mr-i gI sA shru lo tsa nA/ /prI ti shr-iM kha la yA bad+d+hA yA tA ni s+yan+da tA mi ba/ /a tha lub+d+ha ga ma yA taM dr-iSh+Ta mr-i ga ba d+hod+Ya taM/ /sA pa data ma ma bA Ne na pra

<p>246b.3</p>tha ma ha ra dzI bi taM/ /i ti spaSh+Ta gi rA ta s+yAHsne he na tsa pa bi smiH/ /mu mo tsa lub+d+ha kaHprI t+yA ha ri NaM ha ri NI sa khaM/ /mr-i ga yU tha ba ti so haM mA nan+daHsA ku ri gi kA/ /i t+yai Sha prI ti
<p>246b.4</p>yis bdag gi 'tsho ba phrogs/ /zhes pa de yi gsal ba yi/ /tshig dang mdza' bas mtshar skyes pa/ /rngon pa de ni byams pa yis/ /ri dwags ri dwags mor bcas btang / /ri dwags khyu yi bdag de nga / /ri dwags mo de kun dga' bo/ /de ltar mdza' pa'i 'brel ba 'di/ /

<p>246b.6</p>sngon gyi spyod pas rjes su zhugs/ /zhes pa bde gshegs gsung thos dge slong ni/ /de dag thams cad ngo tshas zhum pa bzhin/ /'dod pas brlan pas kun dga' dang bcas par/ /'od kyis mngon dga' kun dga'i bzhin pad bltas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas

<p>247a.1</p>tsi tA yAM bo d+hi satwA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM d+ha na pA lA ba dA naM u na bid+shaH pal+la waH// //dza ya ti sa satwa bi she ShaHsatwa ba tAM sar+b+ba satwa su kha he tuH/ /de
<p>247a.2</p>pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las nor skyong gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang zhig snying stobs ldan pa'i snying stobs kyi/ /khyad par sems can thams cad bde ba'i rgyu/ /lus
<p>247a.3</p>ha da la ne pi sha ma ya ti ko pAg+niM shAn+ti muts+tsaiR+Ya// /d+har+m+mo pa de she b+ha ga bAn kauN+Di n+ya s+yA gra bar+t+ti naH/ /b+hi k+ShoHka thA pra saM ge na pr-iSh+To b+hik+Shu ba b+hi ra bya d+hAd/ /brah+ma dat+ta s+ya ta na yo bA rA Na s+yaM ma hI pa teH/ /
