<p>247a.5</p>kA shi pun+da ra NA ma tsa kA la b+hush+tsa ba b+hU ba tuH/ /yo ba rA dz+ya b+ha be kAr+haHku mA ra kA shi pun+da raH/ /d+har+m+mA d+har+m+ma ma yaM rA dz+yaM bi tsAR+ya tsin+ta yats+tsi raM/ /k+Sha Na k+Sha yi Ni tA ru N+ye dzI bi ti bI tsi tsany+tsa le/
<p>247a.6</p>kA shi mdzes pa zhes pa dang / /dus kyis zhes bya ba byung / /rgyal tshab dbang ni bskur 'os pa/ /gzhon nu kA shi mdzes pa yis/ /rgyal srid chos dang chos min gyi/ /rang bzhin yun ring dpyad nas bsams/ /lang tsho skad cig 'jig pa dang / /srog ni chu rlabs g.yo ba'i tshe/ /
<p>247b</p>
<p>247b.1</p>rA dz+ye swasna bi bA hesmin mo ha mU le na me ma tiH/ /rA ga pra lA pa ba hu le mA yA mo ha ma he mu huH/ /be sh+ya ru da ta niHsA re saM sA re nAsti sa t+ya tA/ /pra bra dzA mya na g+hAstasmA dA gA rA da nA gA ri kaM/ /
<p>247b.2</p>rgyal srid rmi lam bag ma len/ /rmongs pa'i rtsa 'dir bdag blo med/ /chags pa'i cho nge rab mang zhing / /yang yang sgyu dang rmongs rang bzhin/ /'khor ba snying po med pa la/ /'phyon ma du zhing bden pa med/ /de slad khyim nas khyim med par/ /bdag ni sdig med rab tu 'byung / /
<p>247b.3</p>nis+t+riM sha br-it+ti saM sak+tA b+hiHrA ga kiM bi b+hu ti b+hiH/ /rA dza su nu bi tsin+t+ye ti bi be ka bi ma lA sha yaH/ /u bAtsA b+h+ye t+ya b+hU pA la ma ra N+ya ga ma not+su kaH/ /ma ma sam+b+ho ga bar+g+go yaM rA dzan+nai bo pa yu
<p>247b.4</p>ral gris gcod la reg gyur ba'i/ /rnam par 'byor la chags pas ci/ /de ltar rnam bsams rgyal po'i bu/ /dri med dben pa'i bsam pa can/ /nags su 'gro bar 'dod pa yi/ /sa skyong la ni mngon phyogs smras/ /rgyal po bdag la longs spyod kyis/ /tshogs 'di nye bar
<p>247b.5</p>dz+ya ta/ /yau ba rA dz+yA b+hi She kar+ha sa ma ram+b+ho ni bAR+ya tAM/ /ko sAg+ni tap+taHsu ta rA me tAstA ta ma me ma tAH/ /ba d+ha ban+d+ha b+ha yA yA sa dza na n+yo rA dza sam+pa daH/ /byAp+taHkru ra ta
<p>247b.6</p>mkho ba med/ /rgyal tshab dbang ni bskur 'os pa'i/ /kun tu rtsom pa'i zlog par mdzod/ /yab lags gsod 'ching 'jigs dang rdung / /skyed byed rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs/ /khro ba'i me yis rab gdungs pa/ /'di dag bdag ni yongs mi 'dod/ /dur khrod me yi rtse mo
<p>248a</p>
<p>248a.1</p>rAtsA rair+dz+wa li taHsAr+thi ba shri yaH/ /kur+b+ban+ti ta s+ya nod+be gaM sh+ma shA nAg+ni shi khA i ba/ /tsha tra saM tshA di tA lo kAsh+tsA ma rA ni la lo li tAH/ /pa tan+ti pA ta ka shwa b+h+re ma dak+ShI bAHk+Shi tI shwa raH/ /
<p>248a.2</p>bzhin/ /shin tu drag po'i spyod pas khyab/ /rab tu 'bar ba sa bdag dpal/ /su yi chags bral skyed mi byed/ /gdugs kyi snang ba yang dag bsgribs/ /rnga yab dag gi rlung gis bskyod/ /rgyags pas myos pa sa yi dbang / /sdig pa dag gi g.yang la lhung / /
<p>248a.3</p>mr-i du b+ho gAM shu kA b+h+yA sa su ku mA re ma hI b+hu dzAM/ /kA ye pa tan+ti paR+Yan+te kle shAHku li sha dA ru N+yaH/ /tsin+tA san+ta ta san+ta pa tI bra tr-iSh+NA pra lA pi nAM/ /rA dz+ya dz+wa ra dzu ShA nai ShAM mo ha mur+ts+tshA ni brta
<p>248a.4</p>'jam pa'i longs spyod gos goms pa/ /shin tu gzhon pa sa bdag gi/ /lus la mjug tu nyon mongs kyi/ /rdo rje mi bzad 'bab par gyur/ /rgyun du bsam pa'i gdung ba dang / /sred pa drag po'i cho nge can/ /rgyal srid rim bsten 'di rnams kyi/ /rmongs shing brgyal ba mi
<p>248a.5</p>te/ /bak+t+rA NAM rat+na dIp+tA nAM dwi dzi hwA nAM pa de pa de/ /tshi tra saM daR+shi nAM rAdz+nyAM byA pA raHpa ra mA ra NaM/ /dr-ip+tAM nr-i pa sha to ts+tshiSh+TaM ma n+ya taM mA ma na n+ya gAM/ /i tI ba shrIHk+Shi tI shA nAM hA ra tsA ma
<p>248a.6</p>zlogs so/ /gnas dang gnas su lce gnyis pa/ /'khyog cing rin chen sgron ma can/ /skyon khungs la blta rgyal po yi/ /bya ba gzhan dag gsod pa yin/ /mi bdag brgya lhag dregs ldan ma/ /bdag la gzhan du mi 'gror sems/ /zhes bzhin sa dbang dag gi dpal/ /do shal
<p>248b</p>
<p>248b.1</p>rahA pi nI/ /byany+dzi ta bya dza nots+tsh+rA sA lak+Sh+mIrmuk+tA shru san+ta taMH/ /rAdz+nyAM mo hA b+h+r-i tA tI ta b+hU pa ti sma ra NA di pa/ /tasmAd+b+ra dzA mi pra pra dz+ya bi brdzi ta dza nas+thi tiH/ /san+to Sha shA ta
<p>248b.2</p>rnga yab dag gis dgod/ /'das pa'i sa bdag dran pa las/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni rmongs pas bsgribs/ /rlung yab kyis gsal shugs ring dang / /mu tig mchi ma'i rgyun ldan bzhin/ /de slad rab tu byung ba yis/ /skye bo'i lugs ni rnam spangs nas/ /chog shes bsil ba'i grib ma
<p>248b.3</p>lats+tshA yaM san+tA pa sha ma naM ba naM/ /a bi shrAn+ta s+ya saM sA rA pa tha pan+tha s+ya dur+b+ba haH/ /kA yo s+ya yaM sa da pA yaHki pu naHpr-i thi bI b+ha raH/ /i ti pu tra ba tsaHshru twA b+hU pa tir+b+r-i sha ma pri yi/ /pra pra dz+ya shap+ta tsa ki taH
<p>248b.4</p>can/ /yongs gdungs zhi ba'i nags su 'gro/ /rtag tu gnod pa'i lus 'di yang / /ngal gso med pa 'khor ba yi/ /lam gyi 'gron pos bskur dka' na/ /sa yi khur lta slar yang ci/ /zhes pa mchog tu mi snyan pa/ /bu yi tshig thos sa yi bdag /rab tu 'byung ba'i sgra yis 'jigs/ /
<p>248b.5</p>sod+be gasta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /a s+ya baM sha s+ya ma hA taHsA mrA dz+ya s+ya tsa br-id+d+h+ra ye/ /A shA ni bad+d+ha br-id+d+he na twa yi pu tra ma yA pa raM/ /bat+pa saM kalpa b+had+gaM me na kA le kartu mar+ha si/ /i dan+tab nats+tshA yaM yau
<p>248b.6</p>mya ngan ldan pas de las smras/ /chen por gyur pa'i rigs 'di dang / /yang dag rgyal srid 'phel ba'i slad/ /rgan po bdag gis bu khyod la/ /re ba mchog tu rnam par bcings/ /mnyes gshin bdag gis brtag pa ni/ /dus min nyams par bya mi 'os/ /nags su khyod kyi lang tsho 'di/ /
<p>249a</p>
<p>249a.1</p>ba naM na ba no tsi taM/ /san+man+t+rA b+h+yA sa yuk+tA nAM shak+tA nA sAM d+hu daR+sha ne/ /dzi ten+d+ri yA NAM sar+b+ba tra nr-i pA nA ma ba naM ta paH/ /swa pa de pi sa ro dza s+ya niHsang+ga sa li la s+thi teH/ /dr-iSh+TA ba ne s+ya sho
<p>249a.2</p>gsar du mdzes pa 'os ma yin/ /dam pa'i sngags kyi goms par ldan/ /legs pa'i lta ba la chags pa/ /dbang po thul ba'i mi bdag ni/ /kun tu nags med dka' thub yin/ /rang gnas yin yang mtsho skyes ni/ /gos pa med par chu la gnas/ /nags nang yin yang mya
<p>249a.3</p>ka s+ya la la nA tsa rA NA ha tiH/ /swa ge ha su la b+hair+b+ho gaiR+YA bad+d+r-iSh+Ti bi sU tsi kA/ /tA ba de te pa ri t+yak+suM shakyan+te bi Sha yAHk+Sha NaM/ /su kha man+taHpa ri t+ya dz+ya swa dza na gr-i ha nirga taH/ /a b+h+yasta b+ho ga bi
<p>249a.4</p>ngan med/ /bud med rkang pas bsnun pa mthong / /rang khyim rnyed sla'i longs spyod kyis/ /ji srid mig ni rmus chung ba/ /de srid yul ni 'di dag rnams/ /skad cig yongs su gtang bar nus/ /rang gi skye bo nang gi ni/ /bde ba yongs btang khyim las 'thon/ /nyams myong longs spyod
<p>249a.5</p>raha kle shaM na sa ha te dza naH/ /shru ya te d+haR+Yar+m+maM kri ya te tsa su khAta gr-i hi/ /ba ne shu Sh+yan+tishuSh+kA NAM shra ba Na sma ra Na kri yAH/ /k+Sha rata k+Sha ta dza pA da s+ya dar+b+ha san+dar+b+ha shu tsi b+hiH/ /ta taHkiM duHkha ma pA raM pa
<p>249a.6</p>bral ba yis/ /nyon mongs skye bos mi bzod do/ /khyim du chos ni bde ba yis/ /nyan dang dran dang sgrub par byed/ /nags su skam po rnams kyis ni/ /nyan dang dran dang bya ba bskam/ /rtswa yi tshogs kyi khab rtse yis/ /rkang par rma skyes zag byed pa/ /de las 'jig rten pha rol du/ /sdug
<p>249b</p>
<p>249b.1</p>ra lo ke b+ha biSh+ya ti/ /b+huny+dzA nI dza na mI k+Sh+yan+te yA tash+tsarmAs+thi sha Sha tAM/ /pa ra dat+taM sa dAsh+nan+ti pre tA i pa ta pa swi naH/ /ba ne ni ba sa naM pu tra pAM shu prA ba ra No sa maM/ /pA la naM brah+ma tsaR+ya s+ya ma ka ra
<p>249b.2</p>bsngal gzhan pa ci zhig 'byung / /skye bo za ba rnams la lta/ /pags pa rus pa'i lhag mar gyur/ /rtag tu gzhan gyis byin pa za/ /dka' thub can rnams yi dwags bzhin/ /bu kwa nags na gnas pa ni/ /rdul gyi gos dang mtshungs pa ste/ /tshangs par spyod pa skyong ba ni/ /chu srin
<p>249b.3</p>ka ra sho Sha NaM/ /dA pAg+ni d+hU ma bi kaT bru ku TaM mu khe Shu go nA sa bA sa g+ha na g+hu ka gu hA gr-i he Shu/ /siM hAha ta dwi ra da lo hi ta lo hi te Shu t+yak+t+wA gr-i haM b+ha ba ti ka s+ya d+h+r-i tirba ne
<p>249b.4</p>'byung gnas skems pa yin/ /nags sreg me yi du ba rab rgyas khro gnyer ldan pa'i bzhin/ /pha wang gnas dang 'ug pa'i phug ni stug por gyur ba'i khyim/ /seng ges bsad pa'i so gnyis khrag gis dmar por byas gyur pa'i/ /nags su khyim btang nas ni su zhig dga' ba 'byung bar
<p>249b.5</p>Shu/ /kA mI saM ya ma mits+tshi te sma ra ti tsash+yA mA ra teHsaM ya mI tr-ip+tap+ti bra ta ra bra te Shu ra te b+hak+Sh+yaM k+Shu d+hA kAM k+Sha ti/ /e kA kI dza na mI ha te dza na ba nod+be gI ba naM bAny+tsa ti t+yak+tA n+we Sha Na tat+pa raH
<p>249b.6</p>'gyur/ /'dod ldan dag ni dul ba 'dod cing dul ba dang ldan sngo bsangs rtse dga' dran/ /tshim pa shin tu drag po'i brtul zhugs la dga' bkres par gyur pa zas dag 'dod/ /gcig pu dag ni skye bo'i tshogs 'dod skye bo'i tshogs kyi yid 'byung nags tshal 'dod/ /de ni mchog tu 'tshol
<p>250a</p>
<p>250a.1</p>pu na ra pi prAp+ta ba ma ni dza nAH/ /na mAM pu trA pa ri t+ya dz+ya ga ha naM gan+tu mar+ha si/ /b+ha ban+tu ta ba sha tru NAM ba na sa ma no ra thaH/ /byak+ta mauk+ti ka hA si n+yaHka ra bA la la tA i ba/ /
<p>250a.2</p>ba yongs su btang nas slar yang skye bo smad par gyur pa thob/ /bdag ni yongs su bor nas bu/ /nags su 'gro bar mi 'os so/ /khyod ni nags na gnas pa dag /dgra rnams yid la re ba yin/ /mu tig gsal bar dgod byed pa/ /rgyal po'i phun tshogs nga rgyal can/ /
<p>250a.3</p>t+yak+tA na pu na rA yan+ti mA ni n+yo nr-i pa sam+pa daH/ /i t+yuk+to s+ya sa kr-ita pi trA nish+tsa yan+na tsa tsA la saH/ /badzra rat+na shi khA kalpaHsaM kalpo hi ma hAt+ma nAM/ /dza na nI b+hi ra mA t+yaish+tsa ban+d+hu pau ra ma hat+ta moH/ /sa prAr+thi
<p>250a.4</p>btang nas slar yang mi 'ong ste/ /ral gri dag gis 'khri shing bzhin/ /pha yis lan mang de brjod kyang / /de ni nges pa las ma g.yos/ /bdag nyid chen po'i brtan pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rtse mo mtshungs/ /ma dang blon po rnams dang ni/ /gnyan dang grong pa che rnams kyis/ /gsol ba
<p>250a.5</p>to s+ya b+hUn+mau nI ni rA hA ro di na tra yaM/ /rA dza b+ho gI ta pa swI bA dzI ba twe Sha ni dzats+tshe yA/ /kA mA nu bar+t+tI lo ko ya mi t+yu tsuHsa tsi bA nr-i baM/ /sa ka thany+tsi da nu dz+nyA taHsA shru ne tre Na b+hU b+hu dzA/ /ya yau
<p>250a.6</p>btab kyang nyin gsum de/ /zas dang smra ba med par gyur/ /rgyal por spyod dam dka' thub can/ /'di ni rang gi 'dun pas 'tsho/ /'jig rten 'di ni 'dod rjes 'jug /ces pa blon pos rgyal la smras/ /mchi ma dang bcas sa skyong gis/ /ji zhig ltar stas gnang nas des/ /mi smra
<p>250b</p>
<p>250b.1</p>pau radza nA kran+da mau nI mu ni ta po ba naM/ /bi rA gya pa ri pA ke na ta tra mai tri pa bi tra tAM/ /b+ha dze sa sar+b+ba sa twe Shu bi be ka da yi tAM da yAM/ /ba b+hU bustata pra b+hA be na ta pra sar+b+ba ba nau ka sAM/ /
<p>250b.2</p>grong khyer ba rnams du/ /thub pa'i dka' thub nags su song / /chags bral yongs su smin pa yis/ /der ni sems can thams cad la/ /byams pas dag byas brtse ba dag /dben pa'i grogs su de yis bsten/ /de yi mthu yis de dag tu/ /nags na gnas pa thams cad kyis/ /
<p>250b.3</p>dzA ti bai rA nA la t+ya gshI ta lAsh+tsit+ta br-it+ta yaH/ /tak+te prA Ni ba d+hA pra sak+ta ha ri NI br-in+daiHpu lin+daiHpa raM siM hair+b+bA ra Na dA ra Na b+Yu pa ra me sar+b+bAd+ga sad+gI kr-i te/ /mA yU rAM ba ra Nairda
<p>250b.4</p>rang bzhin khon gyi me spangs nas/ /sems kyi spyod tshul bsil bar gyur/ /ri dwags tshogs la rab chags rngon pa rnams kyi srog chags gsod pa rab btang zhing / /seng ges glang chen 'joms pa dang bral yan lag kun gyis 'grogs par gyur pa la/ /der ni rngon pa'i bud med mu
<p>250b.5</p>ri dra dza g+ha nA muk+tA ka lA podz+dz+hi tAsta trots+tsh+wA sa bi rA ga shuSh+ya a da d+ha ra tAHki rA tAd+ga nAH/ /k+Sha maM t+yak+t+wAb+d+hi ra sa nAM sar+b+ba b+hU ta k+Sha ma shri taH/ /so\u0f85b+ha bta k+ShAn+ti bA dI ti bi shru ta kA shi pun+da raH/ /
<p>250b.6</p>tig tshogs rnams spangs pa'i rked skabs rma bya yi/ /gos kyis dbul zhing shugs rings dang ldan chags bral mchu ni rab tu bskams par gyur/ /chu gter ske rags can sa btang / /'byung po kun la bzod pa bsten/ /bzod pa smra ba zhes par ni/ /kA shi'i mdzes pa de grags gyur/ /
<p>251a</p>
<p>251a.1</p>a trAn+ta re ma hI haR+ShaM brah+ma dat+te di baM ga te/ /ud+be ga i ba b+hU tA nAM b+hU pA laHkA li b+hU ra b+hUta/ /a thA da b+h+ra b+h+ra mad+b+h+r-id+ga b+h+rU b+had+ga ma mi nA na naH/ /mu ni saM ya ma bi dwi She ba san+taHpra t+ye dr-i sh+ya
<p>251a.2</p>skabs der sa gzhi mgu ba yi/ /tshangs pas byin ni mtho ris song / /'byung po rnams kyi mya ngan bzhin/ /dus kyi sa ni sa skyong gyur/ /de nas rab mang bung ba'i tshogs/ /g.yo ba'i smin 'khyog bzhin ras log /thub pa'i dul ba la sdang ba'i/ /dpyid ni yang dag byung bar
<p>251a.3</p>ta/ /ma da non+mA da b+hU ta s+ya prod+b+hUta s+ya mr-i gi dr-i shI/ /mA na bi d+h+waM sa d+hU ta s+ya tsU ta s+ya ru ru tse ru tsiH/ /rak+tA sho ka s+ya par+sh+wa s+tha la tA ling gan shaM ki taH/ /IR+Sh+ya lu ri ba puSh+pA Ni dza hA ra ma la yA ni
<p>251a.4</p>gyur/ /ri dgas mig can khengs pa dag /nyams pa'i pho nya tsU ta ni/ /rab tu rgyas dag chags pa yis/ /myos pa'i rgyu yi 'od kyis mdzes/ /mya ngan med pa dmar po la/ /logs gnas 'khri shing gis 'khyud dogs/ /phrag dog can bzhin me tog rnams/ /ma la ya yi rlung gis
<p>251a.5</p>laH/ /ud+YA na yau ba ne tasmin kA le ko ki la saM ku le/ /san+ta po ro nr-i paHpra yA na ba na lo kA ne kau tu kI/ /nA nA bar+Na pa ta ta puSh+pa pra ka ra pra tsi tA ni saH/ /pa sh+yan ba nA ni ra myA ni sha naiHpra pa ta po ba
<p>251a.6</p>grogs/ /khu byug gis rgyas skyed mos tshal/ /lang tsho rgyas pa de yi tshe/ /nags tshal blta ba'i ltad mo la/ /rgyal po btsun mo'i tshogs bcas song / /kha dog sna tshogs me tog rnams/ /lhung ba'i tshogs kyis rab spras pa/ /dga' ba'i nags tshal blta zhing de/ /dal bus dka' thub
<p>251b</p>
<p>251b.1</p>naM/ /ba na s+tha li Shu kAn+tA su ta tra kA nA sa khish+tsi raM/ /bi hr-i t+ya ra ti bi shrAn+taHk+Sha NaM ni drA ma bAp+ta bAn/ /a pUrba ku su ma sme rAsh+tsi n+wA nAsta tra many+dza riH/ /an+taHpu rAng+ga nAsh+tse ruHsaM tsa ri N+ya la ta
<p>251b.2</p>nags su phyin/ /nags kyis gzhi mdzes pa der/ /mdzes pa'i grogs dang yun ring du/ /rol zhing rtse dga' ngal gso bas/ /skad cig gnyid ni thob par gyur/ /sngon med me tog 'dzum pa yi/ /snye ma rab tu 'thu zhing der/ /btsun mo'i tshogs kyi bud med rnams/ /g.yo ba'i 'khri
<p>251b.3</p>i ba/ /a trAn+ta re k+ShAn+ti bA di bi bik+tod+de sha nir+b+r-it+taH/ /e kAn+te nish+tsa lasta s+thau shAn+ti ma nu bi tsin+ta yan/ /a man+dA nan+da bi s+yan+di ban+da nI yo ma nI Shi NAM/ /kr-i sho s+ya kr-i sha son+daR+yaM sha shI ba
<p>251b.4</p>shing bzhin du song / /skabs der bzod par smra ba ni/ /dben pa'i gnas na rab dgyes bas/ /zhi ba rjes su sems byed cing / /gcig tu g.yo ba med par gnas/ /mi dman kun dga' la spro zhing / /mkhas pa rnams kyis phyag byar 'os/ /rid kyang mdzes sdug ma nyams pa/ /thog
<p>251b.5</p>pa tha mo di ta/ /pa ri NA ma ma no dz+nye na re khA saM s+thA na sho b+hi nA/ /pu rA Na tsi tra rU pe Na nA bi nA shu n+yA nA kritaH/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wa rA dza la la nAsh+tsit+ta dar+b+ba Na mAr+dz+dza naM/ /ta trai ba nish+tsa lasta s+thu stash+tsi trA li
<p>251b.6</p>ma'i ri bong can shar bzhin/ /yid 'ong yongs su gyur pa yi/ /ri mo'i dbyibs ni mdzes pa dag /ri mo rnying pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /gzugs kyis stongs par ma gyur pa'o/ /sems kyi me long dag byed pa/ /de mthong rgyal bo'i btsun mo'i tshogs/ /de dag ri mor bris pa bzhin/ /de nyid du
<p>252a</p>
<p>252a.1</p>khi ta i ba/ /pra bud+d+ho\u0f85tha nr-i paHk+Shi pri nA pa sh+yad+da yi taHpu raH/ /da daR+sha ba na ma n+wi Sh+ya pa ri s+thi tA mu niM/ /b+hu dzaM ga stA bi lo kyai ba shwa san+niR+Sh+ya bi ShA ku laH/ /bi sa sardza ba tso
<p>252a.2</p>ni g.yo med gnas/ /de nas mi bdag myur sad pas/ /mdun du btsun mo mthong ma gyur/ /nags su bltas pas thub pa la/ /yongs su bskor nas gnas pa mthong / /de mthong nyid kyi lag 'gro ni/ /dbugs rgod phrag dog dug gis 'khrugs/ /ha la ha la bzhin du
<p>252a.3</p>rU pe hA la ha la mi bot+ka TaM/ /kas+t+waM mu ni byany+dza na yA tsi tra kr-i tri ma mA tra yA/ /muSh+NA si mug+d+ha hr-i da yA nu naM nA ri pra tA ra kaH/ /pa ra sti ha ra Ne d+h+ya naM dza pastad+bi g+h+na ba ra Ne/ /d+hUr+t+wI naM
<p>252a.4</p>ni/ /rab grags tshig gi tshul gyis spros/ /thub pa'i mtshan mar bcos pa yi/ /chas kyis mtshar ba khyod 'dra su/ /blon po rnams kyi snying 'phrog khyod/ /nges par bud med rnams la 'brid/ /gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog bstan nam/ /de yi bgegs zlog bzlas pa dang / /drang po'i
<p>252a.5</p>pa ra mo pA yaHpa re lA shwa sa na ta paH/ /mu kha mA d+huR+ya d+hUr+t+ta s+ya kr-it+tar+b+balka li nasta ba/ /a ho nu mo ha dza na nI ba ne bi Sha ta ro ri ba/ /mu ni kalpo sa mA kalpash+tsa ri taM pu na rI dr-i shaM/ /dam+b+ha sam+b+hA
<p>252a.6</p>yid rton dka' thub ni/ /g.yo sgyu can gyi thabs mchog yin/ /kha dngar sgyu ldan shing shun can/ /khyod kyi pags pa nags kyi ni/ /dug gi ljon pa bcad pa bzhin/ /kye ma rmongs pa skyed pa yin/ /thub par brtag pa lta bu'i chas/ /spyod pa slar yang 'di 'dra ba/ /nang gi de nyid
<p>252b</p>
<p>252b.1</p>bi tam+ba bet+tikasta twa mAn+ta raM/ /i t+yuk+te b+hU b+hu dzA kro d+hA da kro d+ha ma d+hu rAsha yaH/ /nirbi kA re Na ma na pA k+ShAn+ti bA dI dza gA da taM/ /k+ShAn+ti pA dI mu ni ra haM na mAM shaM ki tu mar+haspi/ /e tA su nirbi
<p>252b.2</p>tshul 'chos kyis/ /bsgrubs pa'ang su zhig dag gis rig /sa bdag khro bas 'di brjod tshe/ /khro med phan pa'i bsam pa can/ /bzod pa smra bas rnam 'gyur dang / /bral ba'i yid kyis de la smras/ /bdag ni thub pa bzod pa smra/ /bdag la dogs pa bya mi 'os/ /mdzes ma 'di dag
<p>252b.3</p>she Sho me kAn+tA su tsa la tA su tsa/ /i ti te nok+ta mA kar+N+N+ya k+ShAn+tiM pa sh+yA mi te\u0f85d+hu nA/ /i ti bru ba Nash+tsish+tse hastau ta s+yA si nA nr-i paH/ /bi she She pi k+Sha mA shI laM nir+b+bi kA raM bi lo kya taM/ /tsa kar+t+ta tsa ra Nau
<p>252b.4</p>rnams dang ni/ /'khri shing dag la bye brag med/ /ces pa de yis brjod thos nas/ /da ni khyod kyi bzod pa blta'o/ /zhes pa brjod cing mi bdag gis/ /ral gris de yi lag gnyis bcad/ /bzod pa'i ngang tshul khyad par du'ang / /rnam 'gyur med pa de mthong nas/ /rab zhi la yang khro
<p>252b.5</p>ta s+ya pra sha me pi sa mat+sa raH/ /pra di shan+t+ra shi baM mArge dzi hwa yA dU Sha yan+ti tsa/ /lum+pan+t+yad+ga ni paR+Yan+te kha lAHkau le ya kA i ba/ /tA Da ne si k+Sha mA sak+tAHskan+d+ha ts+tshe de pi mau ni naH/ /shI ti lAstI bra tA
<p>252b.6</p>ldan pas/ /de yi rkang pa gnyis kyang bcad/ /lam du dge ba min pa ster/ /lce yis sun ni 'byin par byed/ /mjug tu lus ni yongs su gcod/ /mi bsrun pa rnams khyi bzhin no/ /brdegs par gyur kyang bzod par chags/ /phung po bcad kyang smra bcad ldan/ /drag por gdungs kyang
<p>253a</p>
<p>253a.1</p>pe pi sa ra lAHsa ra lA i ba/ /ni kr-it+ta pA Ni tsa ra NaHsa saM ta b+h+ya pri thu bya thA/ /rak+Shan+man+Yu ma na k+Sho b+haM k+Sha ma yA sa ma tsin+to yata/ /t+yak+tA n+ya kar+m+ma NA ne nats+tshi n+tA n+yad+gA me
<p>253a.2</p>bsil bar gnas/ /drang po rnams kyang thang shing bzhin/ /lag pa rkang pa des bcad pa'i/ /gdung ba drag po brnag byas nas/ /khro bas 'khrugs pa'i yid dag ni/ /bzod pas bsrungs shing de yis bsams/ /ji ltar 'di yis las gzhan rnams/ /btang nas
<p>253a.3</p>ya thA/ /saM sA ra bi Sha ma kle shats+tshe daM kuR+YA ma taM ta thA/ /ko pa mo hA da bi dz+nyA ya nr-i pa tau b+h+rA ta ram+mu niM/ /pu rIM pra yA te ra dza pA sho ka m+lA ne ba b+hU ra b+huta/ /ta tastad+duHkha ku pi tA rAdz+nye
<p>253a.4</p>bdag gi lus bcad pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis 'khor ba yi/ /mi bzad nyon mongs gcod gyur cig /mi bdag khro bas rmongs pa yis/ /thub pa spun zlar ma shes par/ /grong khyer song tshe rdul gyis sa/ /mya ngan byed bzhin dri mar gyur/ /de nas de yi bzod pa'i lha/ /de sdug
<p>253a.5</p>tat+k+ShAn+ti de ba tA/ /tsa kre na gaR+YaM dur+b+hik+Sha ma ra kA br-iSh+Ti bi sla baM/ /nai mit+ta ko b+h+yo mi dz+nyA ya rA dzA mu ni pa rA b+ha bta/ /de ba tA ko pa dzaM do ShaM taM pra sA da yi tuM ya yau/ /ni pa t+ya pA da yosta s+ya k+Sha
<p>253a.6</p>bsngal bas rgyal la khros/ /grong khyer du ni mu ge dang / /yams dang char med nyer 'tshe byas/ /rgyal pos thub la gnod byas las/ /lha rnams khros te bskyed pa'i skyon/ /mtshan ma mkhan las shes nas ni/ /de la dad par byed du song / /de yi zhabs gnyis la btud
<p>253b</p>
<p>253b.1</p>ma swe t+ya b+hi d+hA ya saH/ /pash+tsat+ta pa bi ShA de na nish+tse ta na i ba b+ha bta/ /ta ma bra bIta k+ShAn+ti bA dI rA dzan man+Yur+n+na me\u0f85NA pi/ /kar+m+ma re kha pa rits+tshe dAdI dr-i shi b+ha bi ta bya tA/ /sar+b+bA Ni nI ga Na ya ti
<p>253b.2</p>nas/ /bzod pa mdzod ces brjod nas de/ /phyi nas 'gyod pa'i mya ngan gyis/ /sems dang bral ba bzhin du gyur/ /bzod pa smra bas der smras pa/ /bdag la khro ba chung ngu'ang med/ /las kyi ri mos yongs bcad pas/ /rgyal po 'di 'dra myong bya nyid/ /thams cad za byed rang dbang
<p>253b.3</p>swats+tshan+da b+ha bi ta bya tA/ /na d+haiR+YaM na gu NaM nAr+thaM na ta po nA pi gau ra baM/ /an+da s+thi ta pra pa ba bi dza pa ram+pa ra Ni b+hin+na ni kA la pa ri pA ka bi tsi tri tA ni/ /dzam+ma s+tha le bi pu la mU la ba la s+ya dzan+tu b+huMk+te pa
<p>253b.4</p>du/ /nges par myong bya rtsi ba ni/ /brtan min yon tan min don min/ /dka' thub ma yin rje sa min/ /skye ba'i gzhi la rtsa ba'i stobs che ldan pa rang gi lus/ /gsar skyes dag gi 'bras bu dus kyis yongs su smin pa ni/ /rnam par bkra zhing tha dad gyur pa brgyud mar skyes pa yi/ /sa
<p>253b.5</p>lA ni ni dza kar+m+ma ma hi ru ha s+ya/ /twa yi tasman+na me kash+tsita bi kA rosti ma hi pa te/ /sa t+ye nA ne na me pa sh+ya ru d+hI raM k+ShI ra tAM ga taM/ /ad+ga ts+tshe de pya ka lu Shi ba b+hu ba ya di me ma naH/ /pa t+ye ne te na sh+liSh+TA
<p>253b.6</p>bon nang na gnas pa skye bo rnams kyis spyod pa yin/ /de slad sa bdag khyod la bdag /rnam 'gyur ci yang yod ma yin/ /bden pa 'di yis bdag gi khrag /'o ma nyid du gyur la ltos/ /yan lag bcad kyang bdag gi yid/ /gal te sdig med gyur pa na/ /bden pa de yis bdag
<p>254a</p>
<p>254a.1</p>ni tA n+ye bAd+gA ni san+tu me/ /i ti shud+d+ha d+hi yasta s+ya tI bra sa t+yo pa yA tsa nAta/ /sh+liSh+Ta n+yad+gA ni tA n+ye ba sa ha sA swAs+th+ya mA ya yuH/ /mu ku Taspr-iSh+Ta tsa ra Nasta mu bA nr-i pasta taH/ /mu ne ma hA
<p>254a.2</p>gi ni/ /yan lag de dag 'byar bar shog /ces pa dag pa'i blo ldan des/ /mchog tu bden pa brjod pa las/ /'phral la yan lag de dag nyid/ /'byar nas rnal du gnas pa thob/ /de nas mi bdag cod pan ni/ /zhabs la reg pas de la smras/ /thub pa khyod
<p>254a.3</p>pra b+hA bo si ta pa sA tata ki mits+tsha si/ /pu N+ya hastA ba lam+be na mo hAn+d+haM ka ru NA ni d+he/ /pA pA ba sA ta pa ti taM mAM twa mud+d+har+t+ta mar+ha si/ /i t+yar+thi taHk+Shi tI she na pra t+ya b+hA Sha ta taM mu
<p>254a.4</p>ni mthu chen po/ /de las dka' thub kyis ci bzhed/ /rmongs pas long ba sdig pa yis/ /g.yang la lhung bar gyur pa bdag /snying rje'i gter khyod bsod nams kyis/ /lag pa'i 'chel sas gdon par 'os/ /sa dbang gis der gsol btab pa'i/ /thub pas de la lan smras
<p>254a.5</p>niH/ /san+tA ra NA ya mag+nA nAM bat+d+ha nA ma pi muk+ta ye/ /a shwA sa nA ya b+hI tA nAM nirbA NA ya bi mu h+ya tAM/ /rA dzan+na nut+ta rAM sa myaka saM bo d+hi ma hA mar+tha ye/ /ya dA tu sa myak+saM bo d+hin+tA ma
<p>254a.6</p>pa/ /bying ba rnams ni legs bsgral dang / /bcings pa rnams kyang dgrol ba dang / /'jigs pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung dang / /rnam par rmongs rnams thar bya'i slad/ /rgyal po bla med yang dag par/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag don gnyer/ /bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub
<p>254b</p>
<p>254b.1</p>bAp+s+yA n+ya nut+ta raM/ /mo ha ts+tshe daM ka ri Sh+ya si ta dA dz+nyA nA si nA ta ba/ /pra ya yau mu ni ri t+yuk+t+wA ta mA man+t+r+ya swa mA shra maM/ /ta me ba ma na sA s+yA yan rA dza d+hA nAM nr-i po pya gAta/ /k+ShAn+ti bA dI sa e bA haM kauN+Di n+yaHkA la b+hu ra yaM/ /
<p>254b.2</p>gang tshe bdag gis thob/ /de tshe ye shes ral gri yis/ /khyod kyis rmongs pa gcad par bya/ /thub pas de brjod de la ni/ /khams bde byas nas rang gnas song / /rgyal po'i gnas su mi bdag kyang / /de nyid yid la sems shing song / /bzod pa smra ba de nyid nga / /dus sa kauN+Di n+ya 'di/ /
<p>254b.3</p>A sA d+ya sa myak+saM bo d+hi mud+d+h+r-i to\u0f85yaM ma yA d+hu nA/ /i ti su ga ta mu khA ra bin+da nirmata ma d+hu ra ma d+hu pra ti maM ba tsaHpra san+naM/ /b+h+ra ma ra b+ha ra i bo di ta pra mo daHki ma pi ba b+hU ba ni pI ya b+hik+Shu
<p>254b.4</p>da lta yang dag rdzogs byang chub/ /thob nas bdag gis 'di bsgral to/ /zhes pa bde gshegs zhal gyi pad+ma las 'khrungs pa/ /yid 'ong sbrang rtsi'i gzugs brnyan rab tu dang ba'i gsung / /bung ba'i tshogs bzhin dge slong tshogs kyis rab 'thungs nas/ /rab tu dga' ba rgyas pa ci yang
<p>254b.5</p>saM g+haH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM kA shi pun+da rAb dA naMnA ma triM shaHpal+la waH// //ban+d+yaHko pi sa sa twa pA ra sa ra laHsau dza n+ya pu N+ya
<p>254b.6</p>byung bar gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las kA shi'i mdzes pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu pa'o// //sems can snying po drang zhing legs spyad bsod nams gnas de su yang
<p>255a</p>
<p>255a.1</p>s+thi tir+n+nin+d+yaHko pi sa d+har+m+ma mAr+g+ga ga ma ne big+h+naHkr-i ta g+h+naHpa raM/ /tsitraM yats+tsa ri taM bi tsAR+ya su tsi raM ro mAny+tsa tsar+ts+tsartsi ta stu l+yaM yA ti dza naHsa bASh+pa na ya nastad+bar+N+Na na mU ka tAM/ /de ba dat+ta
<p>255a.2</p>phyag byar 'os/ /chos lam bgrod pa'i gegs dang shin tu ngan par spyod de su yang smad par 'os/ /gang gi spyod pa bkra ba rnam dpyad yun ring spu long rgyas pas byugs gyur pa/ /de dag bsngags na skye bo mig chu ldan zhing mi smra nyid du mtshungs par gyur/ /dge slong rnams
<p>255a.3</p>pra seng+ga nab+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bAn pu rA/ /pr-iSh+TaHka thA ma ka tha yata pUr+b+ba br-it+tAn+taM saM shra yaM/ /ma hen+d+ra se nA nA mA b+hU ta bA rA Na s+yAM na ra shwa raH/ /ya yuHk+Shi ti shwa raHsar+b+be ya s+ya lak+Sh+m+yA bi lak+Sha taM/ /tsan+d+ra pra b+hA
<p>255a.4</p>kyis lhas byin gyi/ /zhar la mngon dris bcom ldan gyis/ /sngon gyi byung ba'i mtha' dag la/ /brten pa'i mtha' ni bka' stsal pa/ /bA rA Na sIr mi yi dbang / /dbang po'i sde chen zhes pa byung / /gang gi dpal gyis sa yi dbang / /thams cad skyengs pa nyid du gyur/ /de yi lha mo
<p>255a.5</p>b+ha bat+ta s+ya di bI kIr+t+ti ri ba pri yA/ /ya s+yAHsa t+ya pra b+hA be na swasnaHsa t+ya twa mA ya yuH/ /ba b+hU ba sa ma ye tasmin mr-i ga yU tha pa tirba ne/ /su bar+N+Na pAr+sh+wa i t+yAp+ta nA ma he ma ma yats+tsha biH/ /nI la rat+na da ra s+phA ra
<p>255a.6</p>grags pa bzhin/ /yid 'ong zla ba'i 'od ces gyur/ /gang gi bden pa mthu yis ni/ /rmi lam bden pa nyid du gyur/ /dus der nags su ri dgas kyi/ /khyu yi bdag po byung gyur pa/ /gser gyi logs zhes bya ba'i ming / /thob cing gser gyi rang bzhin snang / /mu tig do shal gsal ba'i
<p>255b</p>
<p>255b.1</p>muk+ta hA ra ni b+ha pra b+hAH/ /ba b+hUd+d+r-iSh+Ta ts+tsha TA ya s+ya b+hU Sha NaM kA na na shri yaH/ /pra bA la bal+lI shr-id+ga s+ya tsi tra rat+na tsi ta twa tsaH/ /ta s+yAsh+tsaR+ya su d+hAM b+ho d+hI la ha rI ru ru tsi ru tsi/ /bo d+hi satwa ba ta ra s+ya
<p>255b.2</p>khongs/ /rin chen mthing gis spras 'dra'i 'od/ /gang gi mig gi rdzi ma ni/ /nags kyi dpal gyi rgyan du mdzes/ /byu ru'i 'khri shing rwa co dang / /rin chen bkra ba'i pags pas rgyas/ /ngo mtshar bdud rtsi'i chu gter gyi/ /rba rlabs de yi 'od zer mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpar zhugs
<p>255b.3</p>ta s+ya kAn+ta ma b+hUt+ba puH/ /pUr+b+baM su kr-i ta tsi tra s+ya lak+ShaNaM hi su rU pa tA/ /dIr+g+ha dr-iSh+Ti rba b+hU bA s+ya ba ya s+yo br-id+b+ha bA ya s+ya/ /lub+d+ha kA n+we Sha Na trA s+ye dig+bi lo ka na tat+pa raH/ /tau ka thA b+hir+m+mi
<p>255b.4</p>gyur pa/ /de yi gzugs ni mdzes par gyur/ /gang phyir legs byas ri mo yi/ /dang po'i mtshan nyid gzugs bzang nyid/ /de yi grogs po bya rog ni/ /rgan po ring du mthong bar gyur/ /rngon pa 'tshol bas 'jigs pa yis/ /de ni mchog tu phyogs rnams lta/ /de dag phan tshun
<p>255b.5</p>thaHpra t+yA bi bik+te Shu bi dzahra tuH/ /prAk+pu N+yairdzA ya te bA NI ti rash+tsA ma pi mA nu Shi/ /sa ka dA tsidz+dza lA n+we Shi yU thA nA thaHsa hA nu gaiH/ /ta Ti n+yAHbe na mA li n+yaHpu li naM sa mu pA ya yau/ /ta trA pa
<p>255b.6</p>dga' ba yi/ /gtam gyis dben par rnam par rtsen/ /dud 'gro la yang snga ma yi/ /bsod nams rnams kyis mi skad 'byung / /nam zhig chu ni 'tshol byed cing / /khyu yi mgon de rjes 'brang bcas/ /lbu ba'i phreng ldan chu klung gi/ /'jug ngogs dag tu song bar gyur/ /der ni dgra
<p>256a</p>
<p>256a.1</p>sh+yata pra bA ha Na kri ya mA Na ma hI ya sA/ /sa sha tru b+hir+g+ga le bad+d+ha k+Ship+tA ma kran+di naM na raM/ /ta s+ya ta ra ta raM shru twA dIr+g+ha mA kran+da ni swa naM/ /ha ri NI du dru buHsar+b+be grI bA ba la na bi b+h+ra maiH/ /su
<p>256a.2</p>rnams kyis bcings nas/ /chur 'phangs cho nge 'debs pa'i mi/ /shin tu che ba'i chu rgyun gyis/ /khyer nas 'gro ba de yis mthong / /de yi cho nge'i sgra dag ni/ /shin tu che zhing ring ba thos/ /ri dwags thams cad mgrin pa ni/ /'khyog pa'i rnam 'phrul ldan pas bros/ /gser
<p>256a.3</p>bar+N+Na pAr+sh+wastu ta dA kr-i pA pA sha ba shI kr-i taH/ /ta trai ba nish+tsi lasta s+tho mar+m+ma bid+d+ha i be Shu NA/ /ta dud+d+ha ra Na san+nad+d+haM dIr+g+ha dr-iSh+Ti bi lo kya tAM/ /kA kaHpro bA tsa na sa khe yuk+to\u0f85yan+te sa mud+Ya maH/ /puSh+po pa mA bi pat+kA
<p>256a.4</p>gyi logs ni de yi tshe/ /brtse ba'i zhags pas dbang du byas/ /mda' yis gnad du phug pa bzhin/ /de nyid du ni g.yo med gnas/ /de ni gdon par chas pa dag /bya rog ring du mtho ba ni/ /mthong nas de la smras pa grogs/ /khyod kyi brtson pa 'di mi rigs/ /rgud pa'i dus na me tog
<p>256a.5</p>le kr-i tAr+thAHku li sho pa mA/ /kr-i ta me te na ma n+yan+te swa kA ya su hr-i daHkha lAH/ /i t+ya sau bArma mA No pi kA ke na ka ru N+ba ku laH/ /a ba pa tiR+YAshu pa ri taM sa ra lasta ma tA ra yata/ /bi mu ts+ya ban+d+ha nA n+ya s+ya sa shr-id+gA b+h+yA ma shad+ki
<p>256a.6</p>mtshungs/ /don byas pa na rdo rje 'dra/ /mi bsrun rang gi lus kyi grogs/ /'di dag byas pa mi bsam mo/ /de dag bya rog gis brjod kyang / /snying rjes rgyas shing drang ba de/ /chu bo la ni myur ba ru/ /zhugs nas de ni thar bar byas/ /dogs med de yi ru dag gis/ /de yi bcings pa rnam bkrol
<p>256b</p>
<p>256b.1</p>taH/ /taM pA da pa ti taM dI na ma ba dad+gan+tu mud+Ya taM/ /na twa yA ka tha ni yo\u0f85has+thaHka s+ya tsita sa khe/ /prAr+tha yan+te su bar+Na maM tsar+m+ma lub+d+ha hi lub+d+ha kAH/ /i t+yuk+taste na bi na yAta tat+ta the t+ya b+hi d+ha ya saH/ /
<p>256b.2</p>nas/ /zhan cing rkang par gtugs byas te/ /'gro bar brtson pa de la smras/ /grogs po khyod kyis su la yang / /bdag ni 'dir gnas smra mi bya/ /pags pa la chags rngon pa ni/ /gser gyi 'od can bdag don gnyer/ /de yi dul bas de brjod tshe/ /gya gyu can zhes bya ba des/ /
<p>256b.3</p>ya yo ku Ti la kA khyastaM pra Na mya pra stu ta stu tiH/ /a drAn+ta re na ra pa teHpat+nI tsan+d+ra pra b+hA ni shi/ /swap+ne da daR+sha sa nas+thaM taM mr-i gaM d+har+m+ma bA di naM/ /pa t+ya swasnA tha sA de bI pra bud+d+ha nr-i pa ma bra bIta/ /su
<p>256b.4</p>de la phyag 'tshal bstod pas bstod/ /de de bzhin zhes brjod nas song / /skabs der mtshan mo rmi lam du/ /mi bdag btsun mo zla 'od kyis/ /ri dgas dam chos smra byed cing / /stan la 'khod pa de mthong gyur/ /de nas bden rmi lha mo de/ /rab sad mi yi bdag la smras/ /lha
<p>256b.5</p>bar+N+Na ha ri NaHswasne de ba dr-iSh+To ma yAta b+hu taH/ /ta ma haM draSh+Tu mits+tshA mi sA k+Sha du pa ga taM mr-i gaM/ /ad+kA di ba mr-i gAd+kA s+ya nirga taM rA hushaM ka yA/ /i t+yuk+taHpra Na yA prI t+yai de byA tsa pr-i thi bI pa
<p>256b.6</p>gcig bdag gi rmi lam du/ /rmad byung gser gyi ri dgas mthong / /ri dgas de ni mngon sum du/ /gyur pa mthong ba bdag 'tshal lo/ /ri dgas mtshan ma'i mtshan ma las/ /sgra gcan dogs pas 'thon pa bzhin/ /lha mos gcugs pas de brjod tshe/ /mdza' slad sa yi bdag po
<p>257a</p>
<p>257a.1</p>tiH/ /mr-i ga gra hA ya bya sr-i dzata lub+d+ha kAn+d+ra bi Na pra daH/ /ta taHpra ti ni br-it+tAste ba na ma n+wi Sh+ya lub+d+ha kAH/ /niHpha lA ga ma na krud+d+haMs kam+pA dza ga dur+b+r-i paM/ /i yan+tI dza ga tI de ba bi tsi tA ni tsi tA
<p>257a.2</p>yis/ /nor rnams byin nas rngon pa dag /ri dgas gzung ba'i slad du btang / /de nas rngon pa de dag rnams/ /nags su btsal nas phyir log ste/ /'dar dang bcas pas mi bdag ni/ /'bras med 'ongs pas khros la smras/ /lha gcig ri yis rgyas pa yi/ /'gro ba 'di rnyed
<p>257a.3</p>ca lai/ /b+h+rAn+tA ba yam bi shrAn+tA na la b+hAsta d+bi d+ho mr-i gaH/ /ash+tsaR+ya ra tsa nA kr-iSh+Ta lo tsa nash+tsA ru lo tsa naH/ /swab+na saM pan+na rU po sau hi ra N+ya ha ri NaHku taH/ /ma no bi no da ni tasmin ya di
<p>257a.4</p>rnam par btsal/ /ngal gso med par bdag cag 'khyams/ /de lta'i ri dgas rnyed ma gyur/ /mig ni ngo mtshar bkod pa yis/ /'gugs pa rab tu mdzes pa'i mig /gser gyi ri dwags rmi lam du/ /yongs rdzogs gzugs 'di ga la yod/ /lha gcig gal te yid kyis ni/ /dge
<p>257a.5</p>de ba pra sI da ti/ /kurban+tu kAny+tsa na mr-i ga ku sha lAHke bi shilpi naH/ /i ti shru twA sa nr-i pa tirda dan ba hu ta raM d+ha naM/ /mr-i ga n+we Sha Na saM kalpe ba b+hU bA b+hi ni be sha bAn/ /ta taHku Ti la ko\u0f85b+h+ye t+ye nr-i saM shru tA ba hu
<p>257a.6</p>mtshan de la dgyes pa na/ /bzo bo mkhas pa kha cig dag /gser gyi ri dwags bgyid du stsol/ /zhes pa thos nas mi bdag de/ /nor ni rab mang ster byed cing / /ri dgas 'tshol ba'i brtag pa la/ /mngon par zhen pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas nor mang ster thos nas/ /rngon pa bas kyang nor len
<p>257b</p>
<p>257b.1</p>pra daM/ /u bA tsa dra bi NA dA ne lub+d+ha ke b+h+yo pi lub+d+ha d+hIH/ /pra sA daHkr-i ya tAM de ba mr-i gaM san+daR+sha yA mya haM/ /dr-iSh+TaHka na ka sA rang+gaHsA rad+gaHsa ma yA ba ne/ /i t+yA k+Shi ti pa tiHpra haR+Shot+phul+la
<p>257b.2</p>la/ /brkam chags blo ldan gya gyu can/ /mi bdag la mngon phyogs nas smras/ /lha gcig bka' drin mdzod cig dang / /ri dgas dgas bdag gis bstan par bya/ /gser gyi ri dwags ri dgas de/ /nags su bdag gis mthong bar gyur/ /zhes pa thos nas sa yi bdag /rab tu dga'
<p>257b.3</p>lo tsa naH/ /b+ha dra san+daR+sha ya kwA sau kwA sA bi t+ya ba dan+mu huH/ /ta me bA gre pa raM kr-i twA mr-i ga mAr+g+ha pra daR+sha kaM/ /sa sai n+yaHsa ya yau swats+tsha tra tsan+d+ro da yA tsa laH/ /dIr+g+ha dr-iSh+Tirda daR+shA tha kA kasta ru shi raHs+thi
<p>257b.4</p>ba'i mig rgyas pas/ /bzang po ston cig gang na de/ /gang na de zhes yang yang smras/ /ri dgas lam ni ston byed pa/ /de nyid sngon du 'gro bar byas/ /dpung bcas de ni dri med gdugs/ /zla shar ri bo bzhin du song / /de nas glang po rta 'gros kyis/ /bslangs pa'i rdul gyi sa nags
<p>257b.5</p>taH/ /ga dza bA dzi bra dzo dIr+N+Na re Nu prA ba ra NaM ba naM/ /su bar+N+Na pAr+sh+wa sa b+h+ye t+ya dza gA da mr-i go yU tha paM/ /hi ta muk+taM ma yA pUr+b+baM na shru taM na kr-i taM twa yA/ /sa e Sha pu ru ShaHprAp+taHsan+na d+d+hai
<p>257b.6</p>khengs pa/ /shing rtser gnas pa'i bya rog ni/ /ring du mthong bas mthong rang gyur/ /de yis ri dwags khyu yi bdag /gser gyi logs la mngon phyogs smras/ /bdag gis phan ba sngon brjod de/ /khyod kyis mnyan min byas pa min/ /bdag gis bzlog kyang khyod kyis ni/ /gang
<p>258a</p>
<p>258a.1</p>sa ha d+ha n+wi b+hiH/ /ma yA ni bA ri te nA pi ya s+ya prA Nas+t+wa yAr+p+pi tAH/ /a d+hu nA kwa nu gan+ta byaM kiM kAr+t+ta bya b+ha yod+b+ha be/ /hi taM ki ma nu parta byaM tu l+yaM mar+t+ta bya me ba bA/ /kr-i ta g+h+naHkru ra tsa ri taHk+Shu dro yaM
<p>258a.2</p>la srog ni byin pa ste/ /skyes bu 'di de go bgos shing / /gzhu bzung rnams dang lhan cig 'ongs/ /da ni 'jigs pa byung tshe kwa'i/ /gang du 'gro bya ci zhig bya/ /phan pa ci zhig spro bar bya/ /mnyam du 'chi bar bya'am ci/ /byas pa mi gzo ma rungs gcod/ /sdig la chags
<p>258a.3</p>sak+ta pA ta kaH/ /twa yai bAt+ma bi nA shA ya rak+Shi to bi Sha pA da paH/ /swa sha rI ra pA da s+yA pi saM hA re Na na tr-i pya te/ /sa sa twa sA ga ra grA saM kr-i tog+h+na ba Da bA na laH/ /u pa kA raHkr-i tag+h+ne Shu bi shwA
<p>258a.4</p>pa'i ngan pa 'di/ /khyod kyis bdag nyid nyams bya'i slad/ /dug gi rkang 'thung bsrungs par gyur/ /byas pa mi gzo'i rta gdong me/ /rang gi lus kyi gnas dag kyang / /yongs su spyad pas mi ngoms te/ /srog chags bcas pa'i rgya mtsho 'thungs/ /byas mi gzo la phan pa dang / /gya gyu'i
<p>258a.5</p>saHku Ti lAt+ma su/ /u pa de shash+tsa mUr+khe Shu kar+t+turdo ShA ke ba laM/ /i ti kA ke na ka thi te pra t+yA san+ne tsa pAr+thi be/ /a tsin+ta ya ta prAp+ta kA laM hi taM yU tha s+ya yU tha paH/ /su b+ha TA hA mi yaM se nA bi gA
<p>258a.6</p>bdag la yid gcugs dang / /ngan pa rnams la gdams ngag ni/ /byed po'i skyon ni 'ba' zhig yin/ /zhes pa bya rog gis bshad tshe/ /sa yi bdag po nye bar 'ongs/ /khyu la phan pa'i dus la ni/ /bab pa khyu yi bdag pos bsams/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi sde 'di yis/ /nags
<p>258b</p>
<p>258b.1</p>he ga ha naM ma hata/ /ka ro ti mata pra sang+ge na mu hUr+t+ti nai ba nir+m+r-i gaM/ /tasmAta sai n+ya pra d+hA na s+ya gats+tshA mi swa ya man+ta kaM/ /e ka s+yai ba ba d+ho mistu sar+b+ba dzI ba twa mI mr-i gAH/ /i ti n+yish+tsi t+ya sa ya yau sa mI paM b+hU
<p>258b.2</p>tshal chen po bskor nas ni/ /bdag gi zhar la ri dwags rnams/ /yud tsam nyid kyis med par byed/ /de slad dpung gi gtso bo dang / /nye bar rang nyid 'gro bar bya/ /bdag nyid gcig pu gsod gyur la/ /ri dgas 'di kun 'tsho gyur cig /de ltar des byas ri dgas de/ /sa bdag dang
<p>258b.3</p>pa tir+m+m+r-i gaH/ /pa ra prA Na pa ri trA Ne tr-i NaM prA NA ma hat+ma naM/ /ta mA yAn+taM dru taM dr-iSh+TaHku Ti la kaHpu raH/ /so ya mi t+yA shu pA Ni rgyu rA dze dru ro da daR+sha yata/ /tat+k+Sha Ne dro Na shA pe na badzra Ne ba Ni pA ti nA/ /
<p>258b.4</p>ni nye bar song / /gzhan srog yongs su skyob pa la/ /bdag nyid che rnams srog ni rtswa/ /mdun du mgyogs par 'ong ba de/ /mthong nas gya gyu can dga' bas/ /rgyal la mgyogs par de 'di zhes/ /lag pa dag gis ring nas bstan/ /de tshe bya rog dmod pa ni/ /rdo rje lhung ba lta bu yis/ /
<p>258b.5</p>ka rau pa ri ts+yu tau ta s+ya pA pa pA da pa pal+la bau/ /tad+b+r-it+taM bismi taHshu twA mr-i ge na ka thi taM nr-i paH/ /a b+hUta kr-i tag+h+na tsa ri te d+hik+kA ra mu kha rA na naH/ /tataHk+Shi ti pa ti prI t+ya bi b+hU t+ya sa ra yA mr-i gaM/ /taM ni nA yA
<p>258b.6</p>de yi lag pa sdig pa yis/ /rkang 'thung yal 'dab yongs su lhung / /ri dgas kyis bshad de yi spyod/ /mi bdag ya mtshan ldan pas thos/ /zhal nas byas pa mi gzo ba'i/ /spyod tshul smad ces mu cor gyur/ /de nas sa bdag dgyes pa yis/ /rje sa shin tu che ba dang / /'byor pa mchog
<p>259a</p>
<p>259a.1</p>swa na ga rIM gau ra be na ga rI ya sA/ /rA dza d+hA nI ma thA sa d+ya tasmai rat+nA sa naM nr-i paH/ /da twA sAn+taHpu rAmA t+yasta s+yA grai sa mu pA bi shata/ /sa bo d+hi sa twA ha ri Nasta s+yaM paR+Sha di di bya d+hIH/ /d+har+m+maM
<p>259a.2</p>gi ri dgas de/ /rang gi grong khyer dag tu khyer/ /de nas rgyal po'i pho brang phyin/ /de nas rin chen khri stan phul/ /de yi mdun du mi yi bdag /btsun mo blon po'i tshogs bcas 'khod/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri dwags de'i/ /mchog gi blo yis mdun sa der/ /chos bstan
<p>259a.3</p>di de sha ye nA b+hUdz+dza naHshik+ShA pa dA n+wi taH/ /su bar+N+Na par+sh+waHsA rad+gAHso ha me bA b+ha baM su rA/ /yo\u0f85b+ha bta ku Ti laHkru ro de ba dat+taHsa tsA d+hUnA/ /i ti su kr-i ti tsi taM b+ha ga ba tA b+ha ba b+hI ti b+hi dA ka thi ta mu dA ra
<p>259a.4</p>gang ga skye bo rnams/ /bslab pa'i gnas dang ldan par gyur/ /nga nyid sngon gyi dus na ni/ /ri dgas gser gyi logs der gyur/ /ma rungs gya gyu can gyur gang / /de yang da lta lhas byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'byed par byed pas snying stobs ni/ /rgya che mdzes pa'i spyod tshul
<p>259a.5</p>sa twa ru tsi ra s+ya ta tash+tsa ri taM/ /pra sha ma ma yaM ni sha mya ku sha lA ya sa b+hik+Shu ga NaHki ma pi ba b+hU ba pu N+ya pa ri pA ka bi be ka ru tsiH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la
<p>259a.6</p>legs spyad la 'os rab zhi'i rang bzhin dag /de skad bshad pa thos nas bsod nams dag ni yongs su smin gyur pa'i/ /dben pas mdzes pa'i dge slong tshogs de dge ba'i slad du ci yang gyur/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
<p>259b</p>
<p>259b.1</p>tA yAM su bar+N+Na par+sh+wA ba dA na me ka triM shaHpal+la waH// //pra t+yak+Sha lak+Sha Na pa ri k+Shi ta e Sha lo ke saM lak+Sh+ya te su dza na dur+dz+dza na yorbi she ShaH/ /karkaHpra kA sha bi sha daM bi da
<p>259b.2</p>gyi 'khri shing las gser gyi logs kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //'jig rten dag na yongs su mtshon byed mngon sum mtshan nyid kyis/ /skye bo bzang dang ngan pa'i khyad par 'di dag legs par mtshon/ /nyi mas thams cad dri med rab tu gsal ba
<p>259b.3</p>d+hA ti bi shwa man+d+hI ka ro ti ni khi laM dza ga dan+d+ha kA raH/ /sar+b+ba dz+nyaHpUr+b+ba br-it+tAn+ta ma she Sha ma ba lo ka yan/ /asmin+ne bka thA ram+b+he b+ha ga bAn pu na ra bra bIta/ /nr-i paHpA Ta li pu trA khye su re b+hU mi pu ran+da raH/ /
<p>259b.4</p>rnam par sgrub/ /smag rum mun pas 'gro ba ma lus mun nag ldan par byed/ /thams cad mkhyen pas sngon byung mtha'/ /ma lus nges par gzigs byed cing / /gtam 'di nyid las rab brtsams te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa/ /grong khyer pa Ta li yi bu/ /zhes par mi bdag sa yi ni/ /
<p>259b.5</p>a b+hUta ta pu r-i da ro nA ma man+di raM pu N+ya sam+ba daM/ /ka l+yA Na kA ri ta s+yA b+hUta sU nurgu Na ga Non+na taH/ /a kal+yA NA b+hi d+hA nash+tsa dwi tI yo nirgu NaHsu taH/ /ka l+yA Na kA ri sar+b+bAr+thi ka ru NA kalpa pA da paH/ /ts+tsha trA
<p>259b.6</p>'byer 'jig 'byer 'jig ces bya ba/ /bsod nams phun tshogs gnas su gyur/ /de yi sras po yon tan gyi/ /tshogs kyis mtho ba dge byed dang / /gnyis pa yon tan med pa yang / /mi dge byed ces bya bar gyur/ /dge byed slong ba thams cad kyi/ /snying rje yi ni dpag bsam shing / /sbyin
<p>260a</p>
<p>260a.1</p>ba sha ShA ma ka rota dA na shi laHshri yaM pi tuH/ /tasmai ma no ra maM nA ma pu N+ya se no ma hI pa tiH/ /dU taM bi sr-i dz+ya le khe na swa su taM ba tsa sAd dau/ /pra t+yA san+na bi pA ho\u0f85tha nr-i saM rA dza su to b+h+ya d+hata/ /prA pAH
<p>260a.2</p>pa'i tshul gyis yab kyi dpal/ /gdugs kyi lhag ma nyid du byas/ /de la sa bdag bsod nams sdes/ /yid dga' ma zhes bya ba yi/ /rang gi bu mo spring yig dang / /tshig gi pho nya btang nas byin/ /de nas len la nye ba'i tshe/ /rgyal la rgyal sras kyis smras pa/ /yab gcig
<p>260a.3</p>pa ri Na yasta ta sam+p+ra t+ye Sha na me ma taH/ /bAt+sa l+ya pe sha la ta yA ma dAt+tI pra kr-i ta shri yaH/ /ma yA dA na bya ba ni nA ko Shaste shu Shi rI kr-i taH/ /tasmAta pra ba ha Ne nA haM sa mut+tIR+ya ma ho da d+hiM/ /rat+na
<p>260a.4</p>bag ma len pa 'di/ /da lta bdag la thob 'dod med/ /mnyes gshin yangs pa nyid kyis ngan/ /bdag ni sbyin la zhen pa yis/ /dga' bas dpal 'byor drag tu blangs/ /khyod kyi mdzod ni stong par byas/ /de slad chu gter chen po ni/ /gzings kyis yang dag bsgral nas bdag /mchog
<p>260a.5</p>dwi saM bra dzA mye ba di bya rat+nAr+dz+dza nod+Ya taH/ /di bya sam+pad mA sA d+ya ka ri Sh+ya dA ra saM gra haM/ /ka la tra ma kr-i tAr+tha s+ya trA sa naM su kha sam+pa dAM/ /i t+yuk+t+wA sa pi tu prA s+yaHshA sa naMtsa ra NA na taH/ /dza ga he
<p>260a.6</p>gi rin chen sgrub brtson pas/ /rin chen gling du nges par 'gro/ /mchog gi phun tshogs thob nas ni/ /bdag gis chung ma blang bar bgyi/ /nor med dag gi chung ma ni/ /bde ba'i phun tshogs skrag pa skyed/ /ces brjod de yis yab kyi bka'/ /thob nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /rba rlabs gos
<p>260b</p>
<p>260b.1</p>dza la diM lo la kal+lo lA lid+gi tAm+ba raM/ /b+h+rA tA taM ma nu ba brA dza sau dza n+ya bya dza no\u0f85nu dzaH/ /nirgu NaHsa gu N+ya dwe Shan+d+ro ha man+tar+b+bi tsin+ta yan/ /dz+yeSh+ThaHtam bra bId+bat+sa sa mu dre kar+m+mabi sla bta/ /a haM grA h+yas+t+waM
<p>260b.2</p>bas nam mkha' la/ /'khyud pa chu yi gter du zhugs/ /yon tan med pa yon tan la/ /sdang bas nang du 'khu sems shing / /gzhung bzang du ston rjes skyes pa'i/ /spun zla de ni der rjes 'brang / /thu bos de la smras pa bu/ /rgya mtshor las kyis rnam bslad pas/ /gzings ni zhig par
<p>260b.3</p>yAskan+d+hi dzA te pra ba ha Na ye/ /i ti b+h+rA tA kr-i tA shwa sasta the t+yu tse sa taM sha ThaH/ /do Sha d+ya taHpra Na yi tAM kha laHsa ma ma lam+ba te/ /ta taHpra ba ha NA ru D+haHsa pa nai ra nu ku la tAMH/ /yA taiHpu N+yai ri ba
<p>260b.4</p>gyur pa na/ /khyod kyi phrag par bdag blang bya/ /zhes pas spun zla yid brtan byas/ /de bzhin zhes des de la smras/ /skyon rtsom g.yo can mi bsrun pa/ /rab dud nyid la yang dag brten/ /de nas gzings la zhon byas te/ /bsod nams bzhin du rjes mthun par/ /'gro ba'i rlung gis rin
<p>260b.5</p>prA s+ya rat+nad+bi paM nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/ /di bya rat+na ni saM pra pya t+yA br-it+te ta taHsha naiH/ /rA dza pu tre pra ba ha NaM drA ga ba b+hany+dza pra b+hany+dza naH/ /b+hag+ne pra pa ha Ne tasmin b+h+rA ta raM pUr+b+ba sam+bi dA/ /sa dza grA ha shaThaHkaN+The
<p>260b.6</p>chen gling / /mi yi bdag po'i sras kyis thob/ /rin chen mchog rnams rab rnyed nas/ /rgyal po'i sras dag dal bu yis/ /slar log tshe na gzings dag ni/ /rlung gi stobs kyis myur du zhig /gzings ni zhig pa de yi tshe/ /sngon gyi gros kyi spun zla de'i/ /mgrin par lag 'gro lta bu yi/ /
<p>261a</p>
<p>261a.1</p>taM b+hu dzaM ga i bA nu dzaH/ /kar+m+ma bA te ri tastUr+N+NaM kU laM prA pya nr-i pAd+ma dzaH/ /a bA pa sa ha sa ni drA mAn+d+h+ya pra tha ma dU ti kAM/ /tas+ya sup+ta s+ya rat+na ni dr-iSh+T+wA bad+d+ha n+ya thA nu dzaH/ /pra har+tha bya sa nats+tshi dre krU
<p>261a.2</p>rjes skyes g.yo can de yis bzung / /las kyi rlung gis myur bskyod pas/ /rgyal po'i bu yi ngogs phyin nas/ /long ba'i pho nya dang po nyid/ /'phral la gnyid du song bar gyur/ /nyal ba de yi rin chen ni/ /bcings rnams nu bo ma rungs des/ /mthong nas gdung ba'i khung bur ni/ /
<p>261a.3</p>raH sa mu pa tsakra me/ /ut+bA T+ya gA D+ha bad+d+ha s+ya sa ta s+ya na yaM nAM bu dze/ /taM tA ra kaM b+ha yAM b+ho d+hau tsa kA ra ga ta tA ra kaM/ /a tu rat+ne ga te tasmi na rA dzA sU nur+g+ga tad+Yu tiH/ /ma tad+gon+mU li tAM b+ho dza i bA
<p>261a.4</p>rab tu 'phrog pa'i bya ba brtsams/ /de yis brtan par bcings pa de'i/ /mig gi chu skyes rab phyung nas/ /'jigs pa'i mtsho las sgrol byed de'i/ /mig gi 'bras bu med par byas/ /rin chen khyer nas de song tshe/ /rgyal po'i bu ni gzi byin nyams/ /glang pos chu skyes dkrugs pa yi/ /
<p>261a.5</p>b+hUt+ka ma lA ka raH/ /sa ba b+hU ba ni rA lo kaHsho ka tI bra ta mo br-i taH/ /kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha k+Sha pA ram+b+ha i ba sUR+Yen+du bar+dz+dzi taH/ /a trAn+ta re sa ma yA tastaM de shaM go ku lA d+hi paH/ /rA dza pu traM bi lokyAn+d+ha ma b+hUt+saM krAn+ta tad+b+ya
<p>261a.6</p>pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzhin du gyur/ /nyi ma zla ba spangs pa yi/ /nag phyogs mtshan mo rtsom pa bzhin/ /mya ngan mun pa drag pos bsgribs/ /de ni snang ba med par gyur/ /de nas ba glang rdzi bo'i bdag /gnas der yang dag 'ongs pa yis/ /rgyal sras long ba mthong nas ni/ /de yi gdung ba 'phos
<p>261b</p>
<p>261b.1</p>thaH/ /sa taM nItwA swa ni la yaM pa ri tsaR+yA pa raHpa raH/ /ta s+yA sId+gu Na so dza n+ya sne hA bi sha ba shI kr-i taH/ /ta tra sho ka ru dzAM shAn+t+yai sa dA tse te bi no di nIM/ /bI NaM swa re pra bI No sau pUr+b+bA b+h+yasta ma ba da
<p>261b.2</p>par gyur/ /de ni de yi rang gnas blangs/ /rim gro mchog gis rab tu bskyangs/ /de yi yon tan legs spyod dang / /mdza' ba 'bebs pas dbang byas gyur/ /der ni mya ngan nad zhi'i slad/ /rtag tu sems ni dga' byed pa'i/ /pi wang sngon du goms gyur pa/ /dbyangs la mkhas pa de
<p>261b.3</p>yata/ /sad+sad+ga maHpr-i thu bi be ka ka thA b+hi yo gaHkA byA pa baHpri ya su hr-ita pra Na yo bi hA rAH/ /bi NA swa naHku su ma kAn+ta ba nAn+ta bA saHsho kAg+ni tap+ta ma na sA ma mr-i ta ba ga haH/ /ta s+ya go pa
<p>261b.4</p>yis blangs/ /dam pa'i grogs dang rgya che dben pa'i gtam gyi mngon sbyor dang / /snyan ngag btung ba snying sdug grogs rnams mdza' bas rtse ba dang / /pi wang sgra snyan me tog mdzes pa'i nags kyi sa gnas pa/ /yid ni mya ngan me yis gdungs rnams bdud rtsir zhugs pa yin/ /ba glang rdzi yi
<p>261b.5</p>pa teHpat+nI gI ta bI NA bi tsak+Sha NA/ /pa shAn+tI rA dza ta na yaM pra ya yau sA b+hi lA Sha tAM/ /kr-i to pa de shA sa ta taM ku Ti lA bI Na ye ba sA/ /mur+ts+tshan+tI na ba rA ge Na sot+kan+thA sa ma tsin+ta yata/ /su b+ha go yaM ma
<p>261b.6</p>bdag po de'i/ /chung ma pi wang glu mkhan mas/ /rgyal po'i bu mthong de nas ni/ /mngon par 'dod ldan nyid du gyur/ /rtag tu gya gyu ldan ma de'i/ /pi wang gis ni gdams byas bzhin/ /chags pa gsar pas brgyal byed cing / /'dod dang ldan pas yang dag bsams/ /skal bzang 'di la
<p>262a</p>
<p>262a.1</p>mA tI ba dr-i shi tsit+te ba bar+t+tate/ /ni bar+t+ta te na me tA paHprem+Ni tsen+na pra bar+t+ta te/ /d+ha n+ye yaM na kha saM pA taiHkwa Nan+t+wi rA gi NI mu huH/ /yA tA s+ya bal+la kI pu N+yai rad+kA ro ha Na yo gya tAM/ /
<p>262a.2</p>bdag gi ni/ /mig dang sems kyang shin tu chags/ /gal te mdza' bar ma gyur na/ /bdag gi gdung ba zlog mi 'gyur/ /yang yang sen mos btab pa yis/ /sgra byed chags ldan pi wang 'di/ /bsod nams kyis ni 'di yi phang / /'dzeg 'os nyid gyur skal ba bzang / /
<p>262a.3</p>i ti saM tsin+p+yi sA swai raM ta mu bA tse sa bi b+h+ra ma/ /spr-i sh+yan+ti tat+ka raM b+ho dzaM sa kam+pa ka ra pal+la bA/ /la la nA su la b+hA ladz+dzAM ma me daM twad+ga ta ma naH/ /a kr-i ta dz+nya i ba prI tiM na saM sma ra ti mA na da/ /na shI
<p>262a.4</p>zhes bsams de yi dal bu yis/ /'dar bcas lag pa'i yal 'dab kyis/ /de lag pad la reg byed cing / /rnam 'gyur ldan pas de la smras/ /khyod la song ba'i bdag nyid 'di/ /mdza' bo byas pa mi shes bzhin/ /bud med rnams la rnyed sla ba'i/ /legs ster ngo tsha mi dran no/ /'dod pas
<p>262a.5</p>laM na ku lA tsA raM nA b+hi mA naM na saM sha yaM/ /a pe k+ShAn+te sma rak+Ship+tA bai lak+Sh+ya ha ri tAHs+t+ri yaH/ /bra Na lAn+ma ma saM kalpaM sa pha laM kartu mar+ha si/ /b+ha ban+ti mA ni tAHprI t+yai de ba tA i ba yo Shi taH/ /i
<p>262a.6</p>'phangs pa'i bud med ni/ /ngo tsha bral ba'i ltos pa dag /rigs spyod la med khrims la med/ /the tshom la med khengs la med/ /bdag gi brtag pa mdza' ba yis/ /'bras bu ldan par bgyi bar 'os/ /bud med rnams ni bsten pa na/ /lha bzhin gcugs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes pa
<p>262b</p>
<p>262b.1</p>ti ta s+ya ba tsaHshru twa b+hin+na swa rA bi shr-id+ga laM/ /tsa pa lAM rA dza pu trastAM trastAn+taHka ra No\u0f85ba data/ /ne yaM mA taHsa mu tsi tA sa taHshI la pa ri ts+yu tiH/ /d+hik+kilbi Sha bi Sha spr-iSh+TaM naSh+Ta shI la s+ya dzI bi taM/ /
<p>262b.2</p>dbyangs dang bral gyur zhing / /ma bsdams de yi tshig thos nas/ /g.yon ma de la rgyal po'i bu/ /nang gi byed pa skrag pas smras/ /yum gcig tshul khrims yongs gtong ba/ /'di ni dam pa'i rigs pa min/ /sdig ba'i dug gis reg gyur pa/ /tshul khrims nyams pa'i skye ba smad/ /
<p>262b.3</p>pa rAd+ganA pa ri Sh+wad+ga mad+gai rad+gI ka ro ti yaH/ /A lid+ga ti pa taM go yaM na ra kAg+ni shi khAM pu naH/ /pa ro pa kA ra Ni ra taHpa ra dA ra ni rA dA rAH/ /ye pya hiM sA bya sa ni nap+ta dzI ban+te mr-i tAHpa raH/ /
<p>262b.4</p>gang zhig gzhan gyi bud med la/ /lus kyis yongs 'khyud bdag gir byed/ /'di ni dmyal ba'i me lce la/ /phye ma leb bzhin slar yang 'khyud/ /gzhan la phan pa la chags shing / /gzhan gyi bud med la gus bral/ /gang yang 'tshe med la chags pa/ /de dag 'tsho la gzhan ni shi/ /
<p>262b.5</p>i ti te nok+ta mA kar+N+N+ya sA b+hUd+b+hag+na ma no ra thA/ /ni d+ha nA b+h+ya d+hi kaM prI ti pra ti She d+ho hi yo Shi tAM/ /ta taHswaM pa ti ma b+h+ye t+ya b+hu dzaM gI b+had+ga mA ga te/ /ma no ra the ma n+yu bi ShaM ba man+tI ba dza gA da sA/ /pa ra bat+sa la
<p>262b.6</p>de skad de yis brjod thos nas/ /yid kyi shing rta chag par gyur/ /gang phyir bud med mdza' ba ni/ /bzhag sa shi ba nyid las lhag /de nas yid la re ba dag /nyams par gyur tshe lag 'gro ma/ /de yi rang bdag la phyogs te/ /khro ba'i dug skyug bzhin smras pa/ /dge ba drang po khyod
<p>263a</p>
<p>263a.1</p>tA sAd+ho do ShA ya pa ra la s+ya te/ /ko h+ya bi dz+nya ta shI lA nAM swA d+hI ni ku ru te gr-i haM/ /pa re Shu b+h+r-i sha mA shwA saM spr-i sha taste na sho b+ha naM/ /gub+tany+tsit+tany+tsa bi tany+tsa dzano dzA na tika s+ya kaH/ /pa ra dA ra sa ha prA k+Shas+t+wa
<p>263a.2</p>kyis ni/ /mchog tu mnyes gshin skyon du gyur/ /gang phyir dang tshul mi shes pa/ /khyim ni rang dbang can su zhig /gzhan la mchog tu yid brtan gyis/ /reg pa khyod kyi mdzes pa min/ /sbas pa yi ni sems dang nor/ /skye bo su yi su yis shes/ /khyod kyi khyim bzung long ba de/ /
<p>263a.3</p>yAn+d+haHsa gr-i he d+h+r-i taH/ /dI nAn+d+ha ban+d+ha ba ta s+ya pa sh+ya ta s+yo tsi taM pha laM/ /a d+yA haM te na bi dza ne sad+ga me b+h+r-i sha mar+thi tA/ /ya d+ya s+ya na ya ne s+yA tAM s+yA ta ka thaM me pa lA ya naM/ /i t+yuk+taHsa ta yA ko pAt+tap+to go pa pa tir+b+h+r-i
<p>263a.4</p>gzhan gyi chung ma'i mig stong pa/ /bkren pa long ba'i grogs po dag /de yi 'bras bu rigs pa blta/ /de yi dben par 'grogs pa la/ /de ring mchog tu bdag don gnyer/ /gal te 'di la mig yod na/ /bdag gis thar bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /de yis de smras pa lang rdzi'i/ /bdag de khro bas mchog tu
<p>263a.5</p>shaM/ /dU re niHkA sh+ya taM tsakre ge haM tsit+ta shI ta laM/ /pi tA t+ya dza ti yat+pu traM su hr-in+mi traM ni han+ti yata/ /ban+d+hur+ts+tshe dA si d+hA rA NA tad+dA rA NAM bidz-im b+hi taM/ /b+h+ru bo dr-i shoR+Yat+ko Ti l+yaM yat+taik+Sh+N+ya ya tsA pa tsa laM/ /ku
<p>263a.6</p>gdungs/ /de ni ring du bskrad byas nas/ /khyim dang sems kyang brang bar byas/ /gang zhig pa yis bu gtong zhing / /snying du sdug pas grogs gsod gang / /gnyen rnams gcod pa ral gri'i rgyun/ /de dag chung ma'i spyod tshul yin/ /gang zhig smin 'khyog mig dag ni/ /gang zhig rno zhing gang yang g.yo/ /gang
<p>263b</p>
<p>263b.1</p>tsa yoR+Yats+tsa kwa Thi n+ya tat+sar+b+baM hr-i di yo Shi tAM/ /ka l+yA Na ka ri sar+the na pa tha san+tA ri taM sha naiH/ /pi ta ri tri dI baM yA te shu shrA ba b+h+rA ta raM nr-i paM/ /sa pu raM pu N+ya se na s+ya shwa su ra s+ya ma hI pa teH/ /kA le na prA sa dUrA d+h+wa kle
<p>263b.2</p>yang nu ma sra gyur pa/ /de kun bud med snying la yod/ /yab ni mtho ris gshegs gyur te/ /don mthun rnams kyi dal bu yis/ /lam bsgral spun zla mi bdag tu/ /gyur ces dge ba byed pas thos/ /de yis gyos po sa yi bdag /bsod nams sde yi grong khyer ni/ /lam ring nyon mongs rab zhi ba'i/ /grogs
<p>263b.3</p>sha pra sha ma ban+d+ha baM/ /a trAn+ta re pu tAta tra ma hi b+harturma no ra lA/ /dA tsA dat+tA pu rA ya smi tasmin+nab+d+hi ts+yu te shru te/ /A hU te Shu na ren+d+re Shu ni biSh+Ta Shu ya thA kra maM/ /A ru h+ya rat+na shi pi kAM swa yam+ba ra b+hu baM ya yau/ /bi lo ka yan+tI b+hU pA
<p>263b.4</p>po dus kyis thob par gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni de dag tu/ /sa bdag sras mo yid dga' ma/ /gang la tshig gi sngon byin pa/ /de ni chu gter lhung thos tshe/ /mi yi dbang po rnams bos te/ /rim pa ji bzhin 'khod pa la/ /rin cen bzhon par zhon nas ni/ /rang nyid khyo 'dam sa ru 'ongs/ /dal bus mig ni mdzes ma
<p>263b.5</p>lAn pA sha nai sh+tsA tu lo tsa nA/ /ya dr-its+tsha yA ga tan+ta tra rA dza pu traM da daR+sha taM/ /an+d+ho pi ta s+yaHsa ha sA sa ya yau pri ya tAM dr-i shoH/ /gra ha ma d+h+ye ku mud+ba t+yA me g+hAn+d+ha pi pri yaHsha shI/ /nr-i pe Shu pra ti yA te Shu bi la k+She Sh+wa phalA ga mAta/ /
<p>263b.6</p>des/ /sa skyong rnams la bltas pa na/ /de ni 'dod dgar song gyur pa/ /rgyal po'i sras de mthong bar gyur/ /de ni long yang 'phral la de'i/ /mig gi snying sdug nyid du gyur/ /sprin gyis long yang gza' nang na/ /ku mud ldan la zla ba sdug /long ba gdams pa mi bdag rnams/ /'ong ba 'bras bu med pa las/ /
<p>264a</p>
<p>264a.1</p>ma hI pa tiHsu ta man+ta ba ra Ne na bi nir+g+ga taM/ /sA pi hA raM pA ri k+Shi pya kaN+The ta s+ya ya tek+Sha NA/ /sha na kair+m+ma d+hu rA lA pa twad+ba shAsmI t+yu bA tsa taM/ /s+t+rI br-it+ta tsa ki taHso pi bi dza ne
<p>264a.2</p>skyengs shing log nas song ba'i tshe/ /bu mo sa bdag gis phyir bskrad/ /mig yangs ma des do shal yang / /de yis mgrin par yongs 'phangs nas/ /de la dal bus snyan pa'i sgra/ /bdag ni khyod kyi dbang zhes smras/ /de yang bud med spyod tshul gyis/ /'jigs te dben par
<p>264a.3</p>tA ma b+hA Sha ta/ /prAdz+nyA da ri dra yA ne daM s+t+rI yA muk+taM kr-i taM twa yA/ /sma ra sau hAr+d+ha mi tre Shu pad+ma ne tre Shu rA dza su/ /s+thi te Shu ban+d+h+ya dzan+mAn+d+hA kasmAd smin bl-i tos+t+wa yA/ /a n+ya bak+tA ba lo ki n+yo dzA yAsh+tsak+ShuSh+ma tA ba pi/ /ba
<p>264a.4</p>de la smras/ /bud med shes rab kyis dbul na/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni rigs ma byas/ /rgyal po dran pa'i snying sdug grogs/ /pad+ma'i spyan rnams 'khod pa'i tshe/ /skye ba don med long ba bdag /khyod kyis ci yi slad du gdams/ /mig ldan rnams kyi'ang chung ma ni/ /gzhan gyi bzhin ras rnam par lta/ /long ba'i
<p>264a.5</p>d+hU kiM pu na ran+d+ha s+ya di ne bya n+yA b+hi sA ri kA/ /la la nA b+hir+n+na me kr-i t+yaM pra t+ya yastA pu nAsti me/ /ku la kU la ni pA ti n+yo ni mA gAHku Ti lAHs+t+rI yaH/ /i t+yuk+tA te na pa ru ShaM ladz+dzA lo lA nr-i pat+ma dzA/ /ta mU tse
<p>264a.6</p>chung ma nyin mo yang / /gzhan la mngon bgrod smos ci dgos/ /bdag la bya med bud med kyis/ /de la bdag ni yid ches med/ /bud med thur bgrod gya gyu can/ /rigs dang 'jug ngogs ltung bar byed/ /ces pa'i tshig rtsub des smras pas/ /mi bdag bu mo ngo tsha g.yos/ /des smras mgon
<p>264b</p>
<p>264b.1</p>nA tha sar+b+ba tra na shaM kAM kartumar+ha si/ /dr-iSh+Ta do ShaHkwa tsan+naR+YAM ya di twa ma ti shaM ki taH/ /a duSh+Ta Na mi daM tad+b+yA b+t+yA kri ya te ka thaM/ /twa y+ye ba ya di pri ti ra na n+ya sha ra NaM ma naH/ /te na sa t+ye na te ne tra
<p>264b.2</p>po thams cad du/ /dogs pa bgyi bar mi 'os so/ /gal te bud med 'ga' la skyon/ /mthong bas shin tu dogs pa khyod/ /de yi khyab pas skyon med la/ /sun 'byin 'di ni ji ltar byed/ /gal te khyod nyid la dga' zhing / /yid kyi skyabs ni gzhan med na/ /bden pa de yis khyod kyi mig /
<p>264b.3</p>me kaM b+ha ba tu nirma laM/ /i t+yuk+ta mA tre su dr-i shA dak+Shi Nan+ta s+ya lo tsa naM/ /a nu b+hA ba b+hUt+sa t+ya pra bud+d+ha ka ma lo pa maM/ /rA dza pu traHpra hr-iSh+To tha taM pra sA d+ya su lo tsa naM/ /a bA tsa tam+mu khAMb+ho dza lA ba N+ya gu Na bisma
<p>264b.4</p>gcig ni dri ma med gyur cig /mig bzang mas ni brjod tsam las/ /de yi lta byed g.yas pa ni/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bu dag /bden pa'i mthu yis byung bar gyur/ /de nas mig bzang ma de la/ /rab tu dad nas de yi bzhin/ /chu skyes mdzes sdug yon tan gyis/ /mtshar bskyed rab dga'
<p>264b.5</p>taH/ /ka l+yA Na kA rI su b+ha ge e bA haM nr-i pat+ma dzaH/ /yasmai pu rA twaM gu ru NA ba tsa sA pra ti ya di tA/ /sa e bA haM ya di pa raM nir+b+bai raHpA Ta ne dr-i shoH/ /te na sa t+ye na na ya naM swa s+thaM b+ha ba tu me\u0f85pa raM/ /sa
<p>264b.6</p>rgyal bus smras/ /gang la bla ma'i tshig gis sngon/ /khyod ni rab tu byin gyur pa/ /skal ba bzang mo rgyal po'i bu/ /dge byed de ni nga nyid yin/ /de nyid bdag yin mig phyung la/ /gal te nges par khon med na/ /bden pa de yis bdag gi mig /gzhan pa rnal du gnas gyur cig /ces pa'i
<p>265a</p>
<p>265a.1</p>t+yo pa yA tsa ne ne ti sa ha sai bA s+ya lo tsa naM/ /dwi tI ya ma pi bai ma l+ya ma prAp+ta sa ha tse ta sA/ /ta to bi di ta br-it+te na pu N+ya se ne na b+hU b+hu dzA/ /kr-i ta sA hA ya kaHprA sa swa rA dz+yaM sa pri yA sa
<p>265a.2</p>bden pa brjod pa las/ /'phral la nyid du de yi mig /gnyis pa'ang sems dang lhan cig tu/ /dri ma dag dang bral ba thob/ /de nas spyod tshul rig pa yis/ /sa la spyod pa bsod nams sdes/ /stong grogs byas te rang gis ni/ /rgyal srid mdzes ma ldan des
<p>265a.3</p>khaH/ /ka l+yA Na kA rI yaHso haM de ba dat+tAHsa tsA nu dzaH/ /te na pUr+b+bA nu b+hA be na tad+bi d+ho a d+yA pi bar+t+ta te/ /i t+yu dA ra mu pa kA ra nir+m+ma laM bo d+hi sa twa tsa ri taM ni shamya te/ /b+hik+Sha baHkha la bi tseSh+Ta tany+tsa tat+tu l+ya ma pra ti ma bisma yaM
<p>265a.4</p>thob/ /gang zhig dge byed de ni nga / /nu bo de yang lha sbyin te/ /sngon gyi mthu des da lta yang / /rnam pa dag ni de ltar gyur/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/ /dri med rgya cher phan dang mi bsrun pa'i/ /spyod tshul ngan pa thos nas dge slong rnams/ /de la mtshungs par mtshungs
<p>265a.5</p>ya yuH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ka l+ya Na kA R+ya ba dA naM dwA triM shaHpa l+la waH// //bA mAH sadz+dza na bA mAHprA ye Na b+ha ban+ti nI
<p>265a.6</p>med ya mtshan gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dge byed kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //skye bo dam pa'i g.yon phyogs g.yon ba rnams/ /phal cher dman
<p>265b</p>
<p>265b.1</p>tsa rA gi N+yaH/ /ti mi ron+mu khI sa rA gA k+Shi pa ti ra biM b+hU d+hArAta saM d+h+ya/ /de pa dat+ta s+ya tsa ri ta ba hu dzan+mAn+ta rA shra ye/ /ka thi te bi pu naHprA ha b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na sA ga raH/ /pu rA ka ling ka bi
<p>265b.2</p>la chags dang ldan par gyur/ /mtshams ni dmar ldan mun pa mngon phyogs pa'i/ /sa 'dzin dag las nyi ma 'phen par byed/ /skye ba gzhan mang la brten pa/ /lha sbyin dag gi spyod pa ni/ /bshad kyang bcom ldan ye shes kyi/ /rgya mtshos slar yang bka' stsal pa/ /ka ling ka yi yul du
<p>265b.3</p>Sha ye nr-i pa tiHsha tru b+haM ga kr-ita/ /shri mA na b+hU da sho kA khya pra khya tA saM khya bi kra maH/ /taM s+ya shA khAHpra shA khash+tsa twA raHsa dr-i sha su tAH/ /a nu shA kho bi shA khash+tse t+ya b+ha bAn b+hu pi pi shru hAH/ /tA ru N+ya mat+tAsta pi trA sa pat+nI kAH
<p>265b.4</p>sngon/ /mi bdag dgra ni nyams byed pa/ /grangs med rnam gnon grags pa can/ /dpal ldan mya ngan med ces gyur/ /de yi sras ni mtshungs pa bzhi/ /lo ma rab tu lo ma dang / /rjes su lo ma khyad par gyi/ /lo ma sa la grags par gyur/ /lang tshos rgyags pa de dag rnams/ /chung mar bcas
<p>265b.5</p>pa bA si tAH/ /sa bi kA ra ni ka re Na pu tre Na pu tre sne ho bi na sh+ya ti/ /te sha naiHk+ShI Na bA the yA dur+d+da shA mi pa duHsa hAM/ /bi ka TA ma Ta biM bra pya k+Shuta k+ShA mAHsa ma tsin+ta yan// /e tAHs+t+ri yo pi bi
<p>265b.6</p>pa pha mas bskrad/ /rnam 'gyur gnod pa ldan pa yis/ /bu yis bu la byams pa'ang 'jigs/ /de rnams rim gyis lam brgyags zad/ /bzod dka' gnas skabs ngan pa bzhin/ /nags tshal stug por phyi na gyur nas/ /bkres pas nyen pas yang dag bsams/ /rgud dus bud med 'di
<p>266a</p>
<p>266a.1</p>pat+ka le gul+pha ban+d+ha na shriM kha lAH/ /kr-its+tshalab+d+he tsa b+hA gi n+yaHs+thi tAHpar+N+NA sha ne pi naH/ /i ti tsin+ta ya tA mA sI ta te ShAM stI ba d+ha nish+tsa yaH/ /dur+d+da shA dag+d+ha phA gyA nAM g+ho ra saM dzA ya te ma tiH/
<p>266a.2</p>dag kyang / /long bu 'ching ba'i lcags sgrog ste/ /bu yis 'bad rnyed lo ma yi/ /zas la'ang skal ba 'dzin cing 'khod/ /de ltar bsams nas de rnams kyis/ /bud med bsad par nges pa byas/ /skal ba gnas skabs ngan pa yis/ /bsregs la blo ni 'jigs rung skye/ /
<p>266a.3</p>te ShAM ma d+h+yAd+bi shA khartu pA pa saM kalpa shaM ki taH/ /b+hAR+YA mA dA ya kr-i pa yA pa l+yA pya pra yayau pr-i thaka /sA ka lad+ku da tI nA ma b+h+r-i shaM bai kla bya mA ga tA+e/ /dU rA d+hA d+hA ba nA shrAn+tA mUr+ts+tshi tA n+ya ba tad+b+hu bi/ /ta taHsA ka
<p>266a.4</p>sdig pa'i brtag pas 'jigs pa yi/ /khyad par lo ma de nang nas/ /brtse bas chung ma khyer nas ni/ /tha dang dag tu bros te song / /skyon ldan ma zhes bya ba de/ /mchog tu rnam par 'khrugs gyur cing / /lam ring brgyugs pa'i ngal dub gyis/ /brgyal nas sa la nges par 'gyel/ /de nas de yi
<p>266a.5</p>ru NAr+d+re Na b+har+t+rA prA Na k+Sha ya k+Sha Ne/ /shi rA bya d+ha sa mud+b+hU taM pA yi tA ni dza sho Ni taM/ /taM rak+ta pA na saM prap+ta dzI bi tAM sa twa sA ga raH/ /swAd+gan+niHkr-i t+ya mAM se na prA Na br-it+ti ma kA ra yata/ /nir+dz+dza yaM g+ho ra kAn+tA raM sa
<p>266a.6</p>srog 'jig tshe/ /bdag po snying rjes brlan pa yis/ /spyi bo phug pa las byung ba/ /rang gi khrag ni 'thung du bcug /khrag 'thungs 'tsho ba thob gyur te/ /snying stobs rgya mtshos rang nyid kyi/ /yan lag nges par bcad pa yi/ /sha yis srog ni brten par byas/ /chu med 'jigs rung dgon pa dag /
<p>266b</p>
<p>266b.1</p>mut+tI R+ya kra me na tau/ /prats+tshA ya pA da pa sh+yA maM prap+tau gi ri na dI ta TaM/ /bi shrAn+ta yosta yosta tra kr-it+tapA da ka ro na raH/ /tI brA krAn+tI na dI be ge no dz+ya mA naHsa mA ya yau/ /dr-iSh+Tai ba ka ru NA sh+liSh+TaHkaSh+TaM bi sa
<p>266b.2</p>rim gyis bsgral nas de dag gis/ /shing gi grib mchog sngo bsangs can/ /ri yi klung gi ngogs su sleb/ /de dag der ni ngal gso tshe/ /rkang lag bcad pa'i mi zhig ni/ /chu bo mgyogs pas khyer bzhin du/ /cho nge grags pos 'debs shing byung / /'o brgyal 'phangs pa la brten de/ /mthong ba nyid ni snying
<p>266b.3</p>dmA shri ta/ /bi gA h+ya sa ri tAM dor+b+h+yAM bi shA khasta ma tA ra yata/ /ta taHpra t+yA ga ta prA NaM to ya mU la pha la di b+hiH/ /sa taM tsakre di nai re ba saM rU D+ha ts+tshe da nir+b+ya thaM/ /swas+thA pi ga ti bai ka l+yA na nai ba gan+tuM kwa tsita k+Sha maH/ /sa tos+thau
<p>266b.4</p>rjes 'khyud/ /khyad par lo ma chur zhugs nas/ /dpung pa dag gis thar bar byas/ /de nas chu dang rtsa ba dang / /'bras bu dag gis srog slar byung / /nyi ma 'ga' yis bcad pa gsos/ /de yis de ni gdungs med byas/ /gsos kyang bgrod pa ma tshang bas/ /gang du yang ni 'gro ma nus/ /dar ni der gnas
<p>266b.5</p>ta tra tat+pa t+n+ya kA le ka li ta b+ho dza naH/ /rA dza pu trastu dzA yA yA ma b+hUd+bi ra la sad+ga maH/ /siM hAlpa ra ta yaHshU rAHprA ye Na bi dzaM gi ShA baH/ /di byo Sha d+hi ra sA hA ra pa ri pUr+N+Na ta nuHsha naiH/ /tat+pat+nI bi ka lA yAsmai tsa kA
<p>266b.6</p>dus su ni/ /de yi chung ma bza' ba ster/ /rgyal po'i bu ni chung ma la/ /yang dag 'grogs pa nyung bar gyur/ /phal cher rgyal 'dod dpa' bo ni/ /seng ge bzhin du 'khrig pa nyung / /dal gyis sman mchog ro dang ni/ /zas kyi lus ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /nyams gyur de dang de yi ni/ /chung mas 'khrig
<p>267a</p>
<p>267a.1</p>ra su ra ta spr-i hAM/ /sne he na no pa li pyan+te na ba d+h+yan+te gu Ne na tsa/ /gau re be na tsa sadz+dzan+ti swets+tsha spaR+sha su khaHs+t+ri yaH/ /sa te na ni shi niHshab+daM ra ma mA Na g+ha na sta nI/ /niHshaM ku su ra tA tr-ib+tA pa tiM bi kh+na ma
<p>267a.2</p>la chags par byas/ /mdza' ba'i snum gyis ma byugs shing / /yon tan srad bus ma bcings la/ /rje sa bla mas ma smad pa/ /bud med rang 'dod med pas bde/ /mtshan mo sgra med nu rgyas ma/ /de ni de dang rol ba na/ /dogs med 'khrig pas ma tshims par/ /bdag po gegs su gyur
<p>267a.3</p>ma n+ya ta/ /sa pa t+yuHswai ri NI te na bi da d+he ba d+ha sam+bi daM/ /pA pe Shu shik+ShA ku sha lA ka lu ShAHki la yo Shi taH/ /swa shi raHshU la ma tu laM ba dan+tI swa s+ya sa swa nA/ /tsakre li khi ta pA pA s+ya la lA Te baT+Ta
<p>267a.4</p>par bsams/ /de nas bdag po g.yem ma des/ /gsad pa'i gros ni byas par 'gyur/ /sdig pa dag la bslab mkhas pa/ /bud med sdig pa can rnams lo/ /rang gi mgo bo mtshungs med ni/ /na bar ston cing sgra ldan des/ /dpral bar sdig pa bris pa bzhin/ /ras kyi 'dab mas
<p>267a.5</p>ban+d+ha naM/ /ta s+ya shi ro ru dzA tI braM bya ti taHpAr+thi bAt+ma dzaH/ /kA ru N+ya t+tat+p+ra tI kA re tAM tAM yuk+ti ma tsin+ta yata/ /bi ShA da tsin+tA sti mi taM sta nan+tAM sA dza gA da taM/ /shI tAr+t+ta kU dzad+b+h+ra ma rA hi ma m+lA ne ba pad+mi nI/
<p>267a.6</p>bcings pa byas/ /de yi mgo yi nad kyis ni/ /rtag tu gdungs pas sa bdag sras/ /snying rjes de slar bcos pa yis/ /rig pa de de sems par gyur/ /mya ngan bsams pa byings de la/ /de yis 'khun bzhin rab smras pa/ /'khyags gdung bung ba sgra sgrogs pa'i/ /kha bas nyen pa'i pad ldan bzhin/ /
<p>267b</p>
<p>267b.1</p>e baM bi d+haM me ka n+yA yAHshi raHshU laM pu rA b+ha bta/ /pA ShA Na b+he da le pe na bi Shag+b+hish+tsa ni bA ri taM/ /pA ShA Na b+he da byAb+ho yaM prAg+b+hA ro\u0f85s+ya ma hI b+h+r-i taH/ /rA dz+wA ba tIR+ya b+ha ba tA gr-i h+ya tAM ya di shAkya te/ /d+hA ra yi Sh+ya mi pA Ni b+h+yA
<p>267b.2</p>rnam pa de lta'i mgo nad sngon/ /bdag ni gzhon nu ma la gyur/ /sman pa rnams kyis rdo ba ni/ /zhu ba bskus nas rnam par bzlog /ri bo 'di yi g.yang sa 'di/ /rdo ba yi ni zhun gyis khyab/ /gal te nus na thag pa las/ /bobs la khyod kyis blang bar mdzod/ /bdag gis khyod kyi dpyang thag ni/ /lag
<p>267b.3</p>ma hA mA lam+ba naM ta ba/ /i t+yuk+taHpra Na yata pat+p+ya ta the t+yA ha nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/ /tat+pA Ni d+h+r-i ta ra dz+wa tha bi hi tA lam+ba naHsha naiH/ /so\u0f85ba tIr+N+NaHshi lA s+phA la gardzad+gi ri na dI ta TaM/ /b+he Sha dzA dA na saM sak+taHsa t+yak+tA

<p>268a.1</p>yaM/ /ma ma s+t+ri ni ya me nU na mu pa de shaHkr-i twa na yA/ /durbi dz+nye ya pra ta ta ma ti b+hiHswap+na saM kalpa kalpA rA ga dwe Sha bya sa na bi Sha mA yA sa bi n+yA sa sak+tAH/ /kA mAt+kA mi sa ka la

<p>270a.1</p>pal+lawaH// //sa ko pi pu N+ya pra sha mA nu b+hA baHshud+d+hAt+ma nA mas+t+yA mr-i ta swa b+hA baH/ /ya s+ya pra b+hA be nA b+ha ban+ti sa d+yaHkrU ra i pi kro d+ha bi Sha pra muk+tAH/ /pu rA ta thA ga te dze ta ba nA rA

<p>270b.1</p>ban+ti b+hasma spaR+she na sa ha sai ba shi lA a pi/ /ba yan+tad+bi Sha ni shwA sair+n+ni dag+d+hA d+h+yA na yo gi naH/ /bi bar+N+Na ba da nats+tshA yAHkai ba laM kr-i tAM ga tAH/ /i ti taiHka thi te shastA b+hi k+Shu si g+hAr+thi taHpu raH/ /nA ga yorda

<p>270b.6</p>de yis bsdams pas rab sad de/ /'jigs rung dbyibs de mthong gyur nas/ /'jigs pas rnam par 'khrugs gyur te/ /mi yi gzugs kyis rab tu bros/ /de nas phan tshun 'bros byed pa/ /de la mau gal gyi bus/ /klu yi gzugs ni yongs btang nas/ /rang gi gzugs su byas te smras/ /klu

<p>271a.1</p>gau kwa ga mya te tUr+N+NaM b+ha yaM saM t+ya dza tA mi daM/ /na sa nA gaHs+thi ta sta tra ye na bi dra bi tau yu bAM/ /sar+b+ba thA ya di nAs+t+ye pa tad+b+ha yata yu ba yaur+d+h+r-i tiH/ /kr-i ya te kiM ka ra N+ya s+ya na bud+d+ha s+yAb+hi
<p>271a.2</p>dag mgyogs par gang du 'gro/ /'jigs pa 'di ni yang dag thong / /gang gis khyed cag 'jigs byed pa'i/ /klu de de na mi gnas so/ /de yi 'jigs pas gal te khyod/ /rnam kun brtan pa med nyid na/ /skyabs su 'os pa sangs rgyas la/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal
<p>271a.3</p>ban+da naM/ /i ti te no k+tA mA kar+N+N+ya bi na yat+tau mU tsa tuH/ /pra sA daHkr-i ya tA mAR+Ya b+ha ga bad+daR+sha ne na no/ /i ti bru bA Nau nA gen+d+rau nI twA b+ha ga ban+ton+ti kaM /sa tad+b+r-i t+tAn+ta ma be d+ya pra Na mya ta mu pA

<p>271a.5</p>bi shata/ /b+ha ga bA na tha nA gan+d+rau ba b+hA She sha ra Na ga tau/ /pra NA many+tsa kra tUr+No rat+na tra b+ha b+hU Shi ta b+hU ta lau/ /shi k+ShA pa dA ni saM prA s+ya sar+b+ba b+hU tA b+hA ya pra dau/ /sha ra Na prAp+ti sam+ba pA da d+hu nA nir+b+ha
<p>271a.6</p>'khod/ /de nas klu dbang skyab song zhing / /rin cen 'od kyis sa gzhi dag /brgyan pas phyag 'tshal byas pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bslab pa'i gnas ni yang dag thob/ /'byung po kun la 'jigs med ster/ /skyabs kyi grogs ni thob pa las/ /da ni khyed cag

<p>271b.1</p>yau yu bAM/ /i t+yA lo ka na ma tre Na do Sha dwe Sha bi brdzi tau/ /kro to b+ha ga ba tA sa myak+dzag+ma tustaM pra Na mya tau/ /saM daR+sha ne nai ba ma hA sha yA nAM pra b+hA sa de shes na sha rI ra lag+naiH/ /hiM prA a pi dwe Sha bi
<p>271b.2</p>'jigs pa med/ /ces ni yang dag gzigs tsam gyis/ /de dag skyon dang sdang ba dang / /bral ba bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad/ /de la phyag 'tshal song bar gyur/ /bsam pa che rnams yan lag mthong nyid na/ /sdang ba'i dug tshan gdung bas gtses pa yang / /'od kyi zol gyis lus la chags
<p>271b.3</p>ShoSha ma tAp+tAHsha ma mr-i taiHshI ta la tAM pra dzan+ti/ /tat+pur+b+ba dzan+ma pr-it+tAn+tAM bik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga pAn+dzi nAH/ /pra b+hA ba bi sma yA ta pr-iSh+TA sar+b+bA daR+shi dza gA da tA na/ /kri kirnA ma pu rA shri mAn pA raNA s+yAM na re shwa raH/ /kA sh+yA pA khyAd+b+ha ga
<p>271b.4</p>pa yis/ /zhi ba'i bdud rtsi bsil ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de yi sngon gyi byung ba'i mtha'/ /mthu yi ya mtshan dge slong gis/ /dris shing rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das/ /thams cad gzigs pas de la gsungs/ /bA rA Na sIr mi yi dbang / /dpal ldan kr-i ki zhes pa sngon/ /bcom ldan 'od srungs zhes pa
<p>271b.5</p>btaHprAp+ta bAn d+hAr+m+ma shA sa naM/ /a mA t+ya yoHsa bi n+yA s+ya rA dz+yaM nan+do pa nan+da yoH/ /ba b+hU ba bo d+hi saM sak+taHsa t+ya daR+sha ne nir+b+r-i taH/ /d+harmA d+har+m+ma ma yaM rA dz+yA kr-i twA tau ta s+ya man+ti Nau/ /sar+b+bo pa ka ra NaiR+Yak+taM bi hA raM kA sh+ya pA
<p>271b.6</p>las/ /chos kyi bstan pa thob par gyur/ /de yi blon po dga' bo dang / /nye dga' dag la rgyal srid gtad/ /byang chub la ni yang dag chags/ /bden pa mthong la dga' bar gyur/ /de yi blon des rgyal srid ni/ /chos dang chos min rang bzhin dang / /'od srung la yang gtsug lag khang / /yo byad kun dang

<p>272a.1</p>@#/ ya tsa/ /kA le na dzA to nA gen+d+rA be tau nan+do pa nan+do kau/ /bi hA rAr+p+pa Na N+ye na pa daM me ru b+hU b+h+r-it+ta yo/ /i ti dzin ni gA di ta pha Ni ba ra tsa ri taM pa ra ta nu pa ri Na ti pa ri
<p>272a.2</p>ldan par byas/ /dus kyis 'di dag dga' bo dang / /nye dga' klu yi dbang por skyes/ /gtsug lag khang phul bsod nams kyi/ /lhun po sa 'dzin de yi gnas/ /de ltar gdengs can mchog gi spyod pa lus gzhan dag /yongs gyur legs spyod yongs 'dris rgyal bas
<p>272a.3</p>tsi ta su kr-i taM/ /shru ta ba ti sha ma na ya mu ni pa ri ni ba he bi Sha d+ha ra ni ya ma na gu Na nu ti ru di b+hUta/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM nan+do pa nan+dA ba dA naM tsa tus+t+riM/ /
<p>272a.4</p>gsungs pa dag /zhi ba'i tshul ldan thub mchog tshogs kyis thos gyur te/ /dug 'dzin nges par zhi ba yon tan bstod par gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las dga' bo nye dga'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i
<p>272a.5</p>shaHpal+la waH// //dat+taHpa ra hi ta b+hA ba na yA ya di tanu d+ha na ka Na she ShaH/ /a pa ri k+Sha ya gu Na kalpa na ya b+ha ba ti su pu N+ya bi she ShaH/ /a thA bya tI te kasmin+tsita kA le b+ha ga ba to\u0f85n+ti ke /
<p>272a.6</p>yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //gang zhig nor gyi cha shas chung ngu'i lhag /gzhan la phan par bsgoms pas byin gyur pa/ /yon tan brtag pa yongs su mi zad pas/ /bsod nams de ni khyad par gyur pa yin/ /de nas 'ga' zhig 'das dus na/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du ni/ /
<p>272b</p>
<p>272b.1</p>nan+do pa nan+da yor+d+har+m+ma de sha nA yAM shro tu mAp+ta yauH/ /rA dzA pra se na dzir+d+raSh+TuM b+ha ga ban+ta mu pA ga taH/ /ta b+h+yA ma kr-i ta sat+kA ra pra Na ma ko sa mA ya yau/ /sa pra Na mya dzi naM ga twA pra da d+hau ni gra haM ta yauH/ /shas+t+ra br-iN+TiM
<p>272b.2</p>chos ston pa la dga' bo dang / /nye dga' nyan du 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan la/ /blta ba'i slad du nye bar 'ongs/ /de dag gis ni bsnyen bkur dang / /phyag ma byas pas thos par gyur/ /rgyal la phyag 'tshal de song nas/ /de dag chad pas gcad par bsams/ /de dag gis kyang
<p>272b.3</p>saM sr-i dza taste tsa tasmai byau m+nA ga tau/ /sar+b+ba dz+nya pre Shi tastUr+N+NaM maud+ga l+yA ya naHpra t+ya tAM/ /shas+t+ra br-it+tiM na ra pa te sh+tsakre pad+mot+pa lA pa liM/ /pu nar+g+gatwA b+ha ga ba taHsa mI baM pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /saM prAp+to k+Sha mA ya mA sa
<p>272b.4</p>mkhar song ste/ /de la mtshon gyi char pa phab/ /kun mkhyen gyis bskul mgyogs par ni/ /mau gal gyi bu song nas/ /mi bdag gi ni mtshon char de/ /pad+ma ut+pal phreng bar byas/ /slar yang sa yi bdag po yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin/ /gdengs can dbang po 'ongs pa la/ /
<p>272b.5</p>ta dA de shAta pha NI shwa rau/ /a thAr+thi taHsAr+thi be na b+ha ga bAn rA dzA man+di raM/ /b+hak+ti pU taM ya yau b+hok+tuM b+hak+taM b+hik+Shu ga NeHsa haH/ /b+hak+Sh+ye Shu pa ts+ya mA ne Shu rA trau ta trAk+ni bi sla paH/ /dzA to dzi na pra b+hA
<p>272b.6</p>de yi bka' yis bzod gsol byas/ /de nas sa bdag gis gsol te/ /rgyal po'i khang par bcom ldan 'das/ /dge slong tshogs bcas gus pa yis/ /gtsang ma'i bshos ni gsol du gshegs/ /kha zas 'tshed par byed tshe der/ /mtshan mo me yi nyer 'tshe skyes/ /'phral la rgyal ba'i
<p>273a</p>
<p>273a.1</p>be na sa ha sA shAn+ti mA ya yau/ /b+hUk+t+wA ga ti b+ha ga ba ti k+Shi ti sAHswa su re\u0f85b+h+ya d+hAta/ /dz+wa la na dz+wa le na rA trau bA ra NaM daN+Da saM bi dA/ /a trAn+ta re gr-i ha pa tiHsu dat+ta s+yAt+ma dzo yu bA/ /mi
<p>273a.2</p>mthu yis ni/ /rab tu zhi ba nyid du gyur/ /bcom ldan gsol nas gshegs pa'i tshe/ /rang gi grong du sa bdag gis/ /mtshan mo me ni 'bar ba la/ /chad pa'i gros kyis dgag pa smras/ /skabs der khyim bdag legs sbyin gyi/ /bu ni rdzu 'phrul stobs zhes pa/ /lang
<p>273a.3</p>d+yA do ShAd+d+ri d+d+hi ba lo nA ma rA dz+nyA b+hi ga ti taH/ /pUr+b+baM b+ha ga ba taHshAstuHshA sa nA nu gra he na saH/ /lab+d+ha dz+nyA na d+h+r-i ti pu tra duHkhe s+ya pI da duHkhi taH/ /a pu tra swa d+ha naM b+hU ri dI ne b+h+yaHpra ti pA d+ya saH/ /tsa kA rA ti ra sA
<p>273a.4</p>tsho ldan pa rdzun skyon kyis/ /rgyal po yis ni mngon par bsad/ /sngon du bcom ldan ston pa yis/ /bstan pa rjes su bzung bas de/ /ye shes brtan thob bu yi ni/ /sdug bsngal gyis kyang sdug min gyur/ /bu med rang gi nor mang po/ /bkren pa rnams la des rab byin/ /shin tu chags las dal
<p>273a.5</p>de ka pa Na she ShaM sha naiHshri yaH/ /pa Na lA b+ha kr-i tA she Sha d+harmaHswalpa pra do tha saH/ /a b+hUd+g+ri ha su dat+tA khyo gr-i haM hi swalpa mu ts+ya te/ /ka dA tsid+daR+sha nA yA taM b+ha ga bAn pu ra taHs+thi taM/ /taM swalpa dA na nAm+nai ba ladz+dzi taM da ya
<p>273a.6</p>bus dpal pa na gcig gi lhag mar byas/ /de nas pa na'i rnyed pas chos/ /ma lus chung ngu byin nas byas/ /de ni khyim legs ster zhes gyur/ /khyim na shan tu chung ngur brjod/ /nam zhig blta ba la 'ongs shing / /mdun 'khod chung ngu sbyin pa yi/ /ming gis ngo tshar gyur de la/ /bcom ldan brtse bas
<p>273b</p>
<p>273b.1</p>yA\u0f85ba da ta/ /alpa dA nad+g+r-i ha pa te na ladz+dza kartu mar+ha si/ /yA ti shrad+d+hAr+pi to dA na ka NaHka na ka shai la tAM/ /pu rA ba hu ta raM t+ti be la me na dwi dzan+ma nA/ /shrad+d+hA bi ra ha sA mA n+yAn+na ta thA br-id+d+hi ma ya yau/ /yaHsarba
<p>273b.2</p>bka' stsal pa/ /khyim bdag sbyin pa chung ngu la/ /ngo tsha bgyi bar mi 'os so/ /dad pas sbyin pa byin pa'i thigs/ /gser gyi ri bo mtshungs par gyur/ /sngon tshe gnyis skyes be la mas/ /shin tu mang ba rab tu byin/ /dad pa dang bral thun mong bas/ /de bzhin du ni 'phel ma gyur/ /su zhig 'dzam
<p>273b.3</p>b+ho dza ye b+b+hak+t+yA dzaM bu dwI pa ga taM dza naM/ /yash+tsai kaM bo d+hi saM yuk+taM ta s+ya pu N+yaM ta to\u0f85d+hi kaM/ /i ti bAkyaM b+ha ga ba tasta th+yaM shru twA bi nan+d+ya tsa/ /ni dza ge haM gr-i ha pa tiHpra ya yau pra Ni pa t+ya taM/ /dI paM da
<p>273b.4</p>gling gtogs pa yis/ /'gro kun gus pas gsol byed dang / /su zhig byang chub ldan zhig la/ /de yi bsod nams de bas lhag /ces pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /bden pa thos nas mngon dga' zhing / /de la phyag 'tshal khyim bdag ni/ /rang gi khang par rab tu song / /mtshan mo mar
<p>273b.5</p>twA pa Tha na rA trau ta tra bud+d+hA nu shA sa nAM/ /dAN+DA ya rA dza pu ru SheHsa nI to\u0f85g+ni pra brta nAta/ /daN+Da s+ya sam+b+ha bAta pad+d+haM ban+d+ha nA gA ra bar+t+ti naM/ /ta dr-iSh+Tu mA ya yu de bA rA trau shakra brah+mA da yaH/ /sa tair+d+ha naM gr-i hA
<p>273b.6</p>me btang nas der/ /bcom ldan rjes bstan klog pa na/ /me ni rab bsgrubs chad pa'i slad/ /de ni rgyal po'i skyes bus bzung / /chad pa'i dngos po med pa na/ /btson khang dag tu bzhag ste bcings/ /mtshan mo brgya byin tshangs pa sogs/ /lha rnams de la blta ru 'ongs/ /de dag gis gsol nor long
<p>274a</p>
<p>274a.1</p>Nai ti prar+thi to nA gra hAd+Ya dA/ /ta dA d+har+m+mo pa de shA yaM pra br-it+taM ta s+ya man+di ye/ /rA dzA pi tat+p+rab+hA be na dr-iSh+T+wa bra dzA li taM pu raM/ /muk+tA taM ban+d+ha nA gA rAn+na da daR+sha na laM kwa tsita/ /sa ga taMHsu ga taM dr-iSh+TuM
<p>274a.2</p>zhes/ /gang tshe de yis ma blangs pa/ /de tshe de yi khang par ni/ /chos bstan pa las bsags pa 'phel/ /de yi mthu yis rgyal pos kyang / /grong khyer rab tu 'bar mthong nas/ /btson ra nas ni de btang tshe/ /gang du 'ang me ni mthong ma gyur/ /nam zhig bde gshegs blta ru ni/ /
<p>274a.3</p>ka dA tsit+tat+pu raHs+thi taH/ /nr-i paM dzi na pra NA mA ya prAp+ta pash+ts+wad+b+ya lo ka yata/ /a gre b+ha ga ba tash+tsakre pra Na yaM na sa b+hU teH/ /dza gat+pu dz+ya s+ya pu ra taHpU dza mar+ha ti nA pa raH/ /dzi na ma man+t+ya nr-i ba tiHpra Na taHswa pu rad+ga
<p>274a.4</p>phyin nas de mdun 'khod pa des/ /mi bdag rgyal la phyag 'tshal slad/ /phyi nas 'ongs pa mthong bar gyur/ /de yi sngon du bcom ldan la/ /phyag byas sa yi bdag la min/ /'gro bas mchod 'os sngon du ni/ /gzhan la mchod par 'os pa min/ /mi bdag rgyal la rab btud nas/ /rang gi grong khyer dag
<p>274a.5</p>taH/ /bi bA pa naM gr-i ha pa te rA di de sha ni dzAta pu rAta/ /pra sA di ni su dat+ta s+ya de ba t-I nraM pa tiM ta taH/ /k+Shu dra dzan+tu b+hi rut+s+r-iSh+Taish+tsakre daM sha bi ShA ku laM/ /sa trastastair+n+r-i paHprAp+taHsA mA t+yan+taHpu rA nu gaH/ /
<p>274a.6</p>tu song / /khyim bdag rang gi grong khyer las/ /gzhan du spyugs zhes bka' yis bsgos/ /de nas legs sbyin dag la lha/ /rab tu dang bas mi bdag la/ /srog chags phra mo rab spros te/ /so yi dug gis 'khrugs par byas/ /de dag gis btab mi bdag de/ /blon po btsun mo'i rjes 'brang bcas/ /
<p>274b</p>
