<p>274b.1</p>ga twA pra sA da yA mA sa su dat+taM dzi na shA sa nAta/ /i ti sa sa ta ta pra t+yA sar+t+yA pa rA mr-i ta nir+b+ha raM b+ha ga ba du di taM shAn+tiM b+he dze su dat+ta gr-i hA d+hi paH/ /swa mi ba la b+ha te big+h+na yA sa pra yA sa bi brdzI
<p>274b.2</p>phyin nas rgyal ba'i bstan pa las/ /legs sbyin la ni dad par byas/ /de ltar rtag tu nye bar gnas pas mchog gi bdud rtsi dag gi tshogs/ /khyim gyi bdag po legs sbyin de yis bcom ldan gyis gsungs zhi ba bsten/ /dri med yid ldan rnams kyi mtha' ru gnas pas dben pa'i gter chen ni/ /rang
<p>274b.3</p>taM bi ma la ma na sA man+te bA sI bi be ka ma hA ni d+hi ma/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yaM gr-i ha pa ti su dat+tA ba dA naM pany+tsa triM shaHpal+la waH// //pha laM sa
<p>274b.4</p>gi bzhin du gegs dang nyon mongs ngal dub rnam par spangs pas 'thob/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las khyim bdag legs sbyin gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //sbyin pa'i grogs
<p>274b.5</p>mA naM la b+ha ta sa dA tuR+YA ti k+Sha Na dA na sa hA ya taM yaH/ /pa ro pa kA ra pra Na yod+ya tA naM nA pu N+ya karmA sa tsi ba twa me ti/ /rA mye pu rA b+ha ga ba te shra bas+t+yAM dze ta kA na ne/ /a nA tha piN+Da dA rA ma bi hA rA d+hi
<p>274b.6</p>su skad cig su gyur pa/ /de dag sbyin bdag 'bras bu mtshungs pa 'thob/ /gzhan la phan par brtson par zhugs rnams kyi/ /grogs su bsod nams las med mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod kyi/ /rgyal byed tshal ni dga' bar sngon/ /mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang / /kun dga'
<p>275a</p>
<p>275a.1</p>ra ti dzi ne/ /kau shAm byaM bat+sa nr-i pa tirba b+hU bo da ya nA b+hi d+haH/ /gA ya t+yA d+yA yat+kIr+t+taM bi d+yA d+ha ra ba d+hu dza naH/ /a b+ha bad+biSha ye ta s+ya kar+m+mAn+tA ka ra dzI ba naH/ /gr-i ha sbaHsu d+ha no nA ma
<p>275a.2</p>ra bar mngon dgyes tshe/ /kau shAm bir bdas yi/ /mi bdag 'char byed ces pa byung / /rig 'dzin bu mo'i skye ba yis/ /da lta 'ang gang gis grags pa sgrogs/ /de yi yul du khyim pa ni/ /las mtha'i 'byung gnas kyis 'tsho ba/ /nor bzang zhes bya nor dag ni/ /sgrub
<p>275a.3</p>d+ha naM d+hA na bi tsak+Sha NaH/ /nr-i paHka dA tsi dA s+thA ne taM kAR+yAr+thi na mA ga taM/ /ba tsa sai ba pa ri dz+nyA ya dza gA da bi hi tA da raH/ /dzA nA mya haM gr-i ha pa te twAM hi ra N+yo pa tsi ta swa raM/ /bi pu laHpany+tsa ya dz+nya s+ya su
<p>275a.4</p>la rnam par mkhas par gyur/ /nam zhig bya ba don gnyer zhing / /mdun sar 'ongs pa mi bdag gis/ /tshig nyid kyis ni yongs shes nas/ /gus pa bskyed de de la smras/ /khyim bdag gser ni yongs bsags pa/ /khyod kyi dbyangs ni bdag gis shes/ /gsog pa shes pa khyod la ni/ /gser
<p>275a.5</p>bar+N+Na ni d+hi rasti te/ /i t+yuk+taHsa smi taM rA dz+nyA sa ta mU tse kr-i tAny+dza liH/ /sa t+ya mas+t+ye ba me rA dzan gr-i he kAny+tsa na sany+tsa yaH/ /sad+b+r-it+ta tsin+tA ni ra te de be bAt+sa l+ya pe sha le/ /kim+bA nAsti dza na s+yA s+ya pi ta
<p>275a.6</p>gyi gter chen yangs pa yod/ /rgyal pos 'dzum bcas 'di brjod tshe/ /de la thal sbyar des smras pa/ /rgyal po bdag gi khyim na gser/ /bsags pa bden par yod pa nyid/ /mnyes gshin yangs pa dam pa yi/ /spyod tshul bsam pa la chags lha/ /yab khyod kyis ni bsrungs pa yi/ /skye bo
<p>275b</p>
<p>275b.1</p>ri twa yi gop+ta ri/ /d+ha ni no yAn+t+ya d+ha na tAM ni d+ha naM yAn+ti tsA d+ha nAH/ /byA g+h+ra tAM yA ti tsed+b+hu b+h+r-i dA mi ShA g+h+rA Na nir+g+h+r-i NaH/ /ni shaM kai rar+dz+ya te bit+ta mardzi tany+tsa bi b+ha dz+ya te/ /bi b+hak+taM b+hu dz+ya te spaSh+TaM dza nair+d+har+m+ma d+ha ne
<p>275b.2</p>'di la ci zhig med/ /gal te mi bdag brtse ba med/ /zang zing la snom stag ltar 'gyur/ /nor ldan rnams ni nor med 'gyur/ /nor med rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mi bdag chos kyi nor ldan na/ /dogs pa med pas skye bo rnams/ /nor bsgrub bsgrubs pa'ang 'god byed cing / /bgos pa gsal bar
<p>275b.3</p>nr-i pai/ /u pa pan+naM ba tsaHshru twA d+hI ma tasta s+ya b+hu pa tiH/ /ta mU tse da sha no d+yo tiHpra sa daM daR+sha yan+ti ba/ /ma ti mAn kAR+ya sa tsi ba s+t+waM me b+ha bi tu mar+ha si/ /d+hI d+hUR+Y+Yais+t+wad+bi d+hai re ba d+hAR+Y+Ya te d+ha ra NI b+ha raH/
<p>275b.4</p>longs spyod byed/ /blo ldan de yi tshig dag ni/ /phun tshogs sa bdag gis thos nas/ /so yi 'od kyis bka' drin ni/ /gsal bar byed bzhin de la smras/ /bdag gi bya ba'i blon por ni/ /blo gros ldan pa khyod 'gyur 'os/ /blo stobs ldan pa khyod lta bus/ /'dzin byed khur ni 'dzin par byed/ /
<p>275b.5</p>i ti rA dza ba tsaHshru twA su d+ha nasta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /na ba yaM rA dza se bA su sa b+hA maN+Da na paN+Di tAH/ /swAts+tshan+d+yod+YA na bi ts+tshe daHsu ni dra su kha bi kra yaH/ /se ba hi puM sAM saM sA ra duHkha dai n+ya b+ha ya
<p>275b.6</p>de skad rgyal po'i tshig thos nas/ /nor bzang gis ni de la smras/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i g.yog 'khor la/ /mdun sar mdzes pa'i mkhas pa min/ /g.yog ni skyes bu rnams dag gi /rang dbang skyed tshal rnam par gcod/ /bde ba'i gnyid dang bde ba 'tshong / /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bkren
<p>276a</p>
<p>276a.1</p>kra yaH/ /I shwa rairmasta ka n+yasta tsa ra NaHkr-i ta kr-i t+ya tAM/ /pA da pi Tha i bA yA ti se ba ko\u0f85ha s+thi taHsa dA/ /se bA yA sa pra yA se na prAp+tA na ma pi saM pa dAM/ /saM b+ho gaHpi shu na saM gi pra b+hu b+h+rU
<p>276a.2</p>'jigs nyo/ /g.yog po dag ni rkang stegs bzhin/ /rtag tu 'og na gnas pa yi/ /mgo la dbang phyug zhabs bkod na/ /bya ba byas pa nyid du 'gyur/ /g.yog gi nyon mongs ngal dub kyis/ /phun tshogs thob pa'ang longs spyod kyang / /phra ma can dang 'grogs pa yi/ /rje bo'i smin ma
<p>276a.3</p>b+had+ga b+had+gu raH/ /e tA swa nA ba tiSh+Than+te pra yat+ne na d+h+r-i tA a pi/ /dar+po gra dur+g+ra ha grA ha dur+g+ra hA nr-i pa sam+pa daH/ /k+Sha NaM na ba na ba sh+le Sha bi sh+le Sha pra Na yod+Ya tAH/ /a bA ra bA ra ra ma NI ra ma NI yA bi b+hU
<p>276a.4</p>'khyog pos g.yo/ /gzung dka'i gdon bzhin mi bdag gi /phun tshogs drag rtag gzung dka' ba/ /'di dag rab tu 'bad pa yis/ /bzung yang nges par mi gnas so/ /'byor pa gsar pa gsar ba ni/ /'du 'bral mdza' gcugs rtsom pa dag /mi bzlog smad 'tshong mdzes pa bzhin/ /skad cig dga'
<p>276a.5</p>ta yaH/ /it+yuk+ta pra ti She d+ho pi sa rA dz+nyA sa tsi baHkr-i taH/ /a ti krA ma ti ko nA ma pra b+ha biSh+NoHsa mI hi taM/ /prAp+ta prau D+ha pa daM rA dz+nyA nI taM sar+b+bA d+hi kA ri tAM/ /bi dwe Sha du Shi tAHsarbe man+t+ri Na na staM si hi re/ /
<p>276a.6</p>bar bya ba yin/ /zhes smras rab tu bkag gyur kyang / /rgyal pos de ni blon por byas/ /jo bo mchog tu bzhed pa la/ /nges par su zhig 'da' bar byed/ /rgyal pos kun gyi gnyer gtad cing / /shin tu che ba'i gnas thob ste/ /rnam par sdang bas sun 'byin pa'i/ /blon po rnams kyis bzod ma gyur/ /
<p>276b</p>
<p>276b.1</p>d+har+m+ma dzi dz+nyA sa yA rA dz+nyA pi shu na pre ri te na saH/ /nai pA ka ro da sad+kAR+Ya ni yuk+to pi pu naHpu naH/ /A g+hA taM pre k+Shi taHso\u0f85tha mi th+yA ko pa na b+hU b+hu dzA/ /ta thA pya d+har+m+ma saM yuk+taM na shA sa na ma n+ya tA/ /e ka
<p>276b.2</p>phra ma can gyis bskul ba yi/ /rgyal pos chos ni brtag 'dod nas/ /dam pa'i bya ba min pa'i las/ /yang yang bskos kyang des ma byas/ /de nas mi bdag khro rdzun gyis/ /de ni gsod du bskul bar gyur/ /de lta na yang chos min dang / /yang dag ldan pa'i bka' ma mnos/ /skye ba gcig
<p>276b.3</p>dzan+ma su khA yai ba ba hu dzan+ma sha tArdi tuM/ /na sA d+hu nin+da taM kar+m+ma ka ro mI ti dzA ga da saH/ /b+ha ya d+harmo pa d+hA shud+d+haHpra ti muk+taHsa b+hU b+hu dzA/ /dA na sha tri ma bits+tshin+na ma ka ro da khi lar+thi nAM/ /sarba tra bi shru te ta s+ya
<p>276b.4</p>nyid bde ba'i slad/ /skya ba brgya mang nyams 'gyur ba/ /smad pa'i las ni dge ba bdag /mi bgyid do zhes de yis smras/ /chos kyis 'jigs shing cho 'brang gtsang / /de ni sa bdag gis rab btang / /slong ba rnams ni ma lus la/ /rgyun chad med pa'i sbyin khang byas/ /grags snyan ldan pa de yi
<p>276b.5</p>dA na sha tri ya sha swi naH/ /kalpa br-ik+ShA da raHpuM sAM pa raM pra ta nu tAM ya yau/ /a trAn+ta re mu ni ga NastIr+thAr+thA dak+Shi NA pa thAta/ /A ga ta kr-its+tsh+wa kAn+tA ra ma pi shan ni rdza naM ba naM/ /ta tra tr-iSh+NArtu
<p>276b.6</p>ni/ /sbyin khang kun tu grags pa'i tshe/ /dpag bsam shing la skyes bu rnams/ /gus pa mchog tu chung bar gyur/ /gnas skabs der ni thub pa'i tshogs/ /'jug ngogs don gnyer lho phyogs nas/ /'ongs pa 'brog dgon nyam nga ba/ /skye bo med pa'i gnas su zhugs/ /der ni thams cad
<p>277a</p>
<p>277a.1</p>rAHsarbe mUr+ts+tsha tAHsha ya na shri tAH/ /a yA tsin+ta dza laM mo hA dUts+tsairnish+tse ta nA ma pi/ /de ba gan+d+har+b+ba nA ge b+h+yaHkash+tsid+Yo\u0f85tra da yAM bu d+hiH/ /s+thi ta pra yats+tsha tu dza laM so\u0f85smA ka mi ti te bru ban/ /ta taH
<p>277a.2</p>skom pas gzir/ /brgyal zhing mal stan la brten pas/ /sems med la yang rmongs pa las/ /skad chen chu ni rab tu blangs/ /lha dang dri za klu rnams las/ /brtse ba'i chu gter su zhig 'dir/ /gang gnas de yis bdag cag la/ /chu rab rtsol zhes de yis smras/ /de nas rin
<p>277a.3</p>sa rat+na ka yU raHkwa Na ka kad+ka Na d+h+wa niH/ /b+hu dzA sak+ta he ma b+h+r-id+gA rasta ru ma d+h+yad+pi niR+Ya yau/ /te tasmA da mr-i tA swa daM pA Ni pad+mA ba na mi tAta/ /A kaN+ThaM sa li laM pI twA dza hr-i Shur+l+lab+d+ha dzI bi tAH/ /pra thi taH
<p>277a.4</p>cen dpung rgyan can/ /gser gyi dril chung sgra sgrogs shing / /lag pas gser gyi chu snod gzung / /shing gi dbus nas byung bar gyur/ /lag pa'i pad+mas btud de las/ /bdud rtsi myang bzhin de dag gis/ /mgrin pa'i bar du chu 'thungs nas/ /'tsho ba thob cing dga' bar gyur/ /ya mtshan ldan
<p>277a.5</p>pu na ra b+h+ye t+ya pa prats+tshu ste sa bisma yAH/ /a dr-i sh+ya br-ik+Sha ni la yA dud+b+hU taM ko b+ha ba ni ti/ /so\u0f85bra bIta bi shru ta ya shAHshra bas+y+tA mA shra yaHshri yaH/ /a nA tha piN+Da do nA ma sarba do sti gr-i hA d+hi paH/ /so tsi ke na
<p>277a.6</p>ba de dag rnams/ /chas te slar yang mngon phyogs te/ /mi mthong shing gi gnas dag las/ /des 'thon khyod ni su zhes dris/ /de yis smras pa mnyan yod na/ /snyan par grags pa dpal gyi gnas/ /mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba/ /kun gter khyim gyi bdag po yod/ /tshem bu pa dag de
<p>277b</p>
<p>277b.1</p>ma yA pUr+b+baM tang+g+r-i hAn+ti ka bA si nA/ /b+hu dza mun+da mya tad+besh+ma daR+shi taM ni t+ya mar+thi nAm/ /te na pu N+ye na de ba twaM prAp+to\u0f85tra bi hA rA mya haM/ /bA hur+m+ma ma bi b+hA t+ye Sha dak+Shi NaHsor+thi dak+Shi NaH/ /te ta mA man+t+ya mu na yaHpu naHsaM
<p>277b.2</p>yis ni/ /khyim dang nye bar gnas pas sngon/ /dpung ba bslangs nas slong rnams la/ /de yi khyim ni rtag tu bsten/ /bsod nams de yis lha nyid ni/ /thob cing da lta bdag 'dir gnas/ /slong ba'i rjes mthun dpung ba des/ /bdag gi g.yas pa 'di mdzes so/ /thub pa de dag de la ni/ /khams
<p>277b.3</p>pras+thi tA ba ne/ /k+Shu d+hi taHsnig+d+ha sats+tshA yAM da dr-i shuHpA da saM pa raM/ /ta ma pyuts+tsai ra yA can+ta b+ho dza naM tad+ba de ba te/ /uts+tsha tsA ra tsagam+b+hI rA bA NI bisma ya kA ri NI/ /a tra puSh+ka ri NI tI re dro N+yaM di byAn+na b+ho dza naM/ /
<p>277b.4</p>bde byas nas slar song ba/ /nags su bkres pas rkar 'thung mchog /mdzes shing grib bsil ldan pa mthong / /de bzhin nyid du de dag gis/ /de la yang ni bza' ba blangs/ /ya mtshan byed pa zab mo yi/ /skad kyang rab tu byung gyur te/ /rdzing bu 'di yi 'jug ngogs kyi/ /'gram na bza' ba lha yi zas/ /
<p>277b.5</p>saM pUr+N+Na masti taM gtwA b+hu dz+ya tAM ya dA b+hIp+si taM/ /i ti te na sa mA diSh+TaM b+hUk+t+wA te di bya b+ho dza naM/ /ko b+ha bA ni ti ba prats+tshustaM di bya ta ru saM shra yaM/ /so s+ya tsa tsak+She shrA bas+t+ya gr-i has+tho\u0f85nA tha paN+Di daH/ /asti ta s+yA
<p>277b.6</p>yongs rdzogs yod kyi der song la/ /gang zhig 'dod pa gsol bar mdzod/ /de skad des bstan de dag gis/ /mchog gi bza' ba zos nas ni/ /mchog gi shing la gnas de la/ /khyod su zhes pa rab tu dris/ /nges kyang smras pa mnyan yod na/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yod/ /de yis dge 'dun
<p>278a</p>
<p>278a.1</p>ha ma b+ha baM brA h+ma NaHsaM g+ha b+ho dza ne/ /tsa tu ra sogs kyi bod skad tshig rkang gcig pu 'di chad pa 'dar los bsgyur// //tsa tu raHpa ri tsaR+yA yaM da d+hi kum+b+ha pra tsA ra kaH/ /tad+b+ho dza nan+te saM prAp+ta swalpa she ShAn+na b+ho dza neH/ /b+hik+ShU Ni gau ra bo dA raM dr-iSh+T+wA haM rA dza b+ho dza naM/ /At+ma nash+tsAn+na
<p>278a.2</p>mchod la bdag /bram ze rim gro la mkhas pas/ /yongs su spyad pa bzhi yis ni/ /zho yi bum pa 'grim byed cing / /de dag gsol ba mthar phyin tshe/ /zas lhag chung ngu za bar gyur/ /dge slong rnams la rgyal po'i zas/ /zhe sa rgya che ldan pa dang / /bdag nyid la ni zas
<p>278a.3</p>pak+ShA ra ma b+ha ba khin+na mA na saH/ /a nA tha paN+Di da gi rA b+ho dza na gau ra bA sha yAH/ /ta to ma yASh+TAM ga yuk+taM gr-i hI taM po Sha d+haM bra taM/ /a sa mAp+ta pra te nA tha b+huk+taM lo l+yan+ma yA ni shi/ /te nA
<p>278a.4</p>ngan dag /mthong nas bdag yid skyo bar gyur/ /mgon med zas sbyin tshig gis ni/ /zas la gus pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yan lag brgyad ldan gso sbyong gi /brtul zhugs de nas bdag gis blangs/ /de nas brtul zhugs ma rdzogs pas/ /sred pas bdag gis mtshan mo zos/ /de yis
<p>278a.5</p>ha ma b+ha paM lo ke bi dz+nyA ta khaN+Da po Sha d+haH/ /khaN+De nA pi bra te na haM de ba pu tra twa mA ga taH/ /i ti te tad+ba tsa shru twA mu na yoHbismi tA ya yuH/ /a tsin+ta yan pra dzan+ta ste tI bre Na ta pa sA ba yaM/ /su tsi raM
<p>278a.6</p>bdag ni 'jig rten du/ /gso sbyong nyams par rnam par grags/ /brtul zhugs nyams pa de yis kyang / /bdag ni lha yi bu nyid gyur/ /de yi tshig de thos gyur nas/ /thub pa de dag ya mtshan gyur/ /de dag 'gro zhing rab bsams pa/ /dka' thub drag pos bdag cag rnams/ /yun ring nyon
<p>278b</p>
<p>278b.1</p>ke ba laM kliSh+TA nA d+yA pi ku sha la spri shaH/ /ma d+hU nA po Sha d+haM prAp+tuM bra ta me ba ya tA ma he/ /ni ra pA ya su kho pA ye swa hi ti ka s+ya nA da raH/ /i ti sany+tsin+ta yan+ta ste ko shAM bI ma b+hi to ga taH/ /su d+ha na s+ya gr-i haM prA
<p>278b.2</p>mongs 'ba' zhig gyur/ /da dung dge la reg pa med/ /da ni gso sbyong brtul zhugs nyid/ /rab tu bsgrub la 'bad par bya/ /gnod pa med cing bde ba'i thabs/ /rang la phan la su mi gus/ /de ltar bsams shing de dag ni/ /ko'u shA ma bIr gtad nas song / /khyim na gnas pa nor bzang gi /
<p>278b.3</p>purbi shru taM gr-i ha me d+hi naH/ /ta tra te na kr-i tA ti th+ya ni bi d+yAsmai ta dad+b+hu taM/ /a nA tha paN+Di daM dr-iSh+TuM te nai pa sa hi ta ya yuH/ /shra bas+t+yAn+te sa mA sA d+ya pU dzi tA ste na sa da raM/ /asmai n+ya be da yan sar+b+baM ya thA dr-iSh+TaM
<p>278b.4</p>khyim ni grags dang ldan par phyin/ /des der mgron gyi bya ba byas/ /de la rmad byung de dag bshad/ /mgon med zas sbyin blta ba'i slad/ /de dang lhan cig nyid du song / /mnyan yod du ni yang dag phyin/ /de rnams de yis gus bcas mchod/ /de la ji ltar mthong ba dang / /ji ltar thos pa
<p>278b.5</p>ya thA shru taM/ /sa tAn pra tar+thi naHsarbAn su hr-i daM su d+ha nany+tsa taM/ /ni nA ya d+har+m+ma sa bi tsaHbrI ti b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/ /b+ha ga bA na pi tad+bA kyAts+tsa kre ta ShA ma nu gra haM/ /sa t+ya daR+sha na saM bud+d+ha ye na te su
<p>278b.6</p>thams cad bshad/ /brtul zhugs don gnyer de kun dang / /grogs po nor bzang de yang ni/ /chos kyi grogs dang mdza' ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du khrid/ /de yi tshig gis de dag rnams/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang rjes su bzung / /gang gis de dag bden pa mthong / /yang dag rtogs
<p>279a</p>
<p>279a.1</p>ga tiM ya yuH/ /te Shu yA teShu su d+ha naM pak+Sha pA tAr+d+ra ya dr-i sha// bi lo kya b+ha ga bAn samyaka bi da d+he dz+nyA na b+hA dza naM/ /sa t+ya saM daR+sha nA bAp+ta bi she Sha ku sha lo da yaH/ /ga twA dzi nA
<p>279a.2</p>shing bder bgrod gyur/ /de dag song tshe bcom ldan gyis/ /phyogs lhung brlan pa'i spyan gyis ni/ /nor bzang nyid la rnam gzigs nas/ /yang dag ye shes ldan par mdzad/ /bden pa yang dag mthong ba thob/ /khyad par dge ba rgyas pa de/ /song nas rgyal ba'i
<p>279a.3</p>ya kau shAM byAM sa bi hA ra ma kA ra yata/ /yasmAd+b+ha ga ba tA diSh+Ta tasmin yA taHsa hA ya tAM/ /b+hik+Shu sh+tsun+dA b+hi d+hasta smA ta so b+hUts+tsun+da bi hA ra b+huH/ /rA d+hA b+hi d+hA da dad+dA sI bi hA ra pa ri tsA ra kA/ /da ya
<p>279a.4</p>gtsug lag khang / /ko'u shA ma bIr byed du bcug /gang phyir bcom ldan gyis bskos pas/ /der ni grogs la 'ongs gyur pa/ /dge slong sku la byed de phyin des/ /skul byed gtsug lag khang zhes gyur/ /gtsug lag khang skyong 'bangs mo ni/ /mgu byed ces pas phul ba yi/ /gos hrul
<p>279a.5</p>yA b+ha ga bAn s+yaHshIr+N+Na bas+t+raM sa ma gra hIta/ /tA dA sI s+yA mI ti shrad+d+hA pra Ni d+hA nAr+pi ta sta yA/ /sa tsI ba re b+ha ga ba taHpra ya yA be ka bar+Na tAM/ /su d+ha na s+yodz+dz+wa laM dr-iSh+T+wA puN+ya sam+b+hA ra mad+b+hu taM/ /b+hik+Shu
<p>279a.6</p>de la brtse ba yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag blangs/ /de yis 'bangs mor bdag gyur ces/ /dad pa'i smon lam gyis phul de/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi chos gos la/ /kha dog gcig pa nyid du gyur/ /nor bzang gi ni bsod nams tshogs/ /rmad byung rab 'bar mthong gyur nas/ /de
<p>279b</p>
<p>279b.1</p>b+hir+b+ha ga bAn pr-iSh+Ta sta t+bUr+b+bo da ya ma b+h+ya d+hA ta/ /sun+d+hA nA khyo gr-i ha pa ti bA rA Na s+yA ma b+hU ta pu rA/ /no dA ra kuny+dza ra s+yA b+hU ta ya s+yA dA na pa ri k+Sha yaH/ /a nA br-iSh+Ti ha te ka le ta s+ya dwA da shA bAR+Shi ke /a bA
<p>279b.2</p>yi sngon byung dge slong gis/ /zhus shing bcom ldan gyis kyang gsungs/ /bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag sngon/ /gzugs byed ces ni bya bar gyur/ /rgya chen glang po gang zhig ni/ /sbyin pa yongs su zad ma gyur/ /lo ni bcu gnyis char med kyis/ /nyams pa'i dus su de yis ni/ /sbyin khang
<p>279b.3</p>ri ta ma b+hUts+tsha tra ma bits+tshin+nAn+na mar+thi nAM/ /ta s+yA pad+mA ka ro nA ma koSh+ThA ga ra pa tir+g+r-i he/ /dA na sA hA ya kany+tsa kre sa hA yas+thA hi sid+d+ha yaH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha saM g+ha s+ya b+hak+ta kA la ni bai da kaH/ /d+har+m+ma
<p>279b.4</p>mi zlog slong rnams la/ /zas ni rgyun chad med par gyur/ /de yi khyim du mdzod khang bdag /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya bas/ /sbyin pa yi ni grogs dag byas/ /gang phyir grogs dang ldan pas 'grub/ /de yi rang rgyal tshogs dag gi /zas kyi dus ni rig byed pa/ /lhag
<p>279b.5</p>dU tA b+hi d+hasta s+ya san+d+ra d+hI mA nu pa s+thi taH/ /kar+m+ma byAk+She pa tasta s+ya dza te kA la bya ti kra ma/ /ka dA tsit+ku ku raste ShAM kA la saM dz+nyA bya d+hA ta pu raH/ /san+d+hA nod+YaHsa e bA haM koSh+Thi ko nA tha piN+Da daH/ /saM g+haM s+ya d+harma dU to
<p>279b.6</p>pa'i blo ldan nye bar gnas/ /chos kyi pho nya zhes par gyur/ /nam zhig de ni las kyis brel/ /dus ni yol bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /de dag rnams kyi mdun du ni/ /khyi yis dus kyi brda dag byas/ /gzugs byed gang de nga nyid de/ /mdzod pa mgon med zas sbyin no/ /tshogs kyi chos kyi pho nya
<p>280a</p>
<p>280a.1</p>yaHsa e bo da ya no nr-i paH/ /saM dz+nyA ni de ba ko yash+tsa ku ku raHsu d+ha no pi saH/ /rA dz+nyA g+ho She Na bi dz+nyA to g+ho Shi la pa ra nA mA b+hU ta/ /tsa ri ta mi t+yu tsi taM b+ha ba b+he di nA b+ha ga
<p>280a.2</p>gang / /de nyid mi bdag 'char byed yin/ /gang zhig brda ni rig byed pa'i/ /khyi de yang ni nor bzang ngo / /rgyal pos gdangs las shes pas na/ /gdangs can zhes pa ming gzhan gyur/ /de ltar yid ni legs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dag /rigs
<p>280a.3</p>ba tA ka thi taM ki la b+hik+Sha baH/ /su kr-i ta sau ra b+ha sA ra su d+hA ra saM su ma na sA shra ba NAny+dza li b+hiHpa puH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa
<p>280a.4</p>par srid pa 'bigs byed bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /legs byas dri bzang snying por ldan pa bdud rtsi'i ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis gsan pa'i snyim pas 'thungs par grags/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam
<p>280a.5</p>la tA yAM g+ho Shi lA ba dA nAM ShaT+t+riM shaHpal+la waH// //bi bud+d+ha sa ra si pad+ma sho b+ha te sang+ka dzan+mAHshu tsi pa ri sa ra dzA tAM spr-i sh+ya te na s+tha lab+dzaM/ /sa ha dza pa ri tsi tA nAM ni t+ya man+targa
<p>280a.6</p>gyi 'khri shing las gdangs can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //lha yi rdzing bu dag tu 'dam las skyes pa'i chu skyes mdzes/ /yongs bskams gtsang sar skyes pa'i pad+ma dag la reg mi byed/ /lhan skyes yongs su 'dris shing rtag tu nang na gnas
<p>280b</p>
<p>280b.1</p>tA nAM b+ha ba ti si tA gu NA nAM ka ra NaM nai ba dzA tiH/ /shra ba s+t+yAM sar+b+ba satwA nAM swa sti d+h+yA na pa ra ya Ne/ /dzi na kalpa dru ma dze ta pa nA rA ma s+thi ti pu rA/ /shurbA ra kA khye na ga re rat+na pany+dza ya sA ga
<p>280b.2</p>gyur pa/ /dkar ba'i yon tan rnams kyi byed po rigs ni min pa nyid/ /mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal na sngon/ /sems can kun la shis pa yi/ /bsam gtan rjes su skyong byed cing / /rgyal ba dpag bsam shing bzhugs tshe/ /grong khyer slob ma lta bur ni/ /ded dpon blo ldan rnams kyi
<p>280b.3</p>raH/ /b+ha bo nA mA b+ha bat+sAr+tha pa tirma taM ma tAM ba raH/ /b+ha bi lo b+ha ba b+ha drash+tsa b+ha ba nan+dI tsa bi shru tAH/ /ke ta kyAM ta s+ya dzA yA yAM ba b+hU busta na yas+t+ra yaH/ /ro ga yo gA du pa ga taHsa ka dA tsin+mu mUR+Sha tAM/ /pA ru Sh+yad+b+h+r-i sha
<p>280b.4</p>mchog /rin chen bsags pa'i rgya mtsho ni/ /'byor pa zhes pa byung bar gyur/ /de yi chung ma ke ta ki/ /zhes pa la ni bu gsum byung / /'byor len dang ni 'byor bzang dang / /'byor pa dga' zhes grags pa'o/ /nam zhig de ni nad kyis btab/ /'chi ba 'dod cing nye bar gyur/ /mchog tu rtsub cing
<p>280b.5</p>mud+big+naiHpat+nI pu trai ru be k+Shi taH/ /b+hak+t+yA dA si tu ta s+yai kA pa ri tsaR+YA pa ra pa raM/ /mal+li kA khya b+ha bar+t+tA bta sa ya bta swAs+th+ya ma ya yau/ /sne ho pa kA ra pra Na taHkr-i ta dz+nyaHpa ta yA n+wi taH/ /r-i tau saM ga ma b+h+ye t+ya ta ta s+yAH
<p>280b.6</p>chags bral bas/ /chung ma bu rnams dag gis spangs/ /de yi 'bangs mo phreng ldan ma/ /zhes pa gcig gis gus pa yis/ /ji srid rnal du gnas gyur pa/ /de srid rim gro mchog tu byas/ /mdza' zhing phan pas rab btud pa/ /byas shes de ni de dang ldan/ /zla mtshan dus su 'grogs gyur pas/ /
<p>281a</p>
<p>281a.1</p>pu tra ma dzI dza na ta/ /ya dA tadz+dzan+ma ni pi tuHsar+b+bAr+thAHpur+Na taM ya yuH/ /sa ta dA pur+N+Na nA mA b+hU dbA laHpUr+Nen+du pun+da raH/ /dz+yeSh+ThA s+t+ra yaHkr-i tod+bA ha ya yu rab+d+hin+d+ha nAr+thi naH/ /pUr+N+Na stu b+haN+Da shA lA yAM pi tush+tsa kre d+ha nA rdza
<p>281a.2</p>de la bu ni btsas par gyur/ /gang tshe de skyes pha yi ni/ /nor kun gang ba nyid du gyur/ /byis pa zla nya ltar mdzes de/ /de tshe gang po zhes par gyur/ /phu bo gsum gyis chung ma blangs/ /rgya mtshor nor don gnyer du song / /gang pos pha yi tshong khang du/ /'dug nas nor gyi bsgrub pa
<p>281a.3</p>naM/ /ta taHpra ti ni pr-it+tAste prAp+tAr+thAHsA ga rAt+su naH/ /ga Na bAM he ma lak+ShA NAM kr-i twA swa mu di re pu raM/ /sa mu dra ga ma ne te ShaM yA bA nA sId+d+ha nA ga maH/ /pUr+N+Na s+ya swa gr-i he pa N+yairba b+hU bA b+h+ye d+hi ka sta taH/ /tad+d+r-iSh+T+wA dza na ka ste ShAM
<p>281a.4</p>byas/ /de nas de dag nor thob ste/ /rgya mtsho las kyang grong khyer du/ /slar log gser ni 'bum phrag rnams/ /bgrang bar byas te dga' bar gyur/ /de dag rgya mtshor bgrod pa la/ /nor ni ji snyed byung gyur pa/ /rang gi khyim du gang po la/ /de las lhag pa zong gis byung / /de mthong de dag rnams kyi pha/ /
<p>281a.5</p>brid+d+haHpaR+Ya nA bA sa re/ /ta nU tse hi ta mA pa t+yAM tr-iSh+NA nai ka k+Sha yo da yaH/ /dr-iSh+TaM b+ha bad+b+hiHsA mu dra lA b+he kr-i ta pa ri shra maiH/ /pUr+N+Ne no pardzi taM bit+ta ma kle she na ma hI ya yA/ /shu b+ha kar+m+ma bi pA kai na b+ha ban+d+yar+thA d+ha nAr+thi
<p>281a.6</p>rgan pos mjug gi nyi ma la/ /de la phan smras sred pas ni/ /rgud tshe du ma nyams pa bskyed/ /ngal dub chen po med pa yis/ /gang pos nor ni nyer bsgrubs pa/ /rgya mtsho'i rnyed pa dag la ni/ /yongs ngal byas pa khyod kyis mthong / /dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /nor don gnyer ba don yod
<p>281b</p>
<p>281b.1</p>nAM/ /hastA ta pa lA ya te\u0f85n+ya s+ya prAb+no ti pa ti taM pa raH/ /san+mAr+g+ga s+yA pa ri t+yA gA ta yuk+ta yuk+ta bi be tsa nA ta/ /de sha kA la ba ri dz+nyA nA ta sa tAM sar+b+ba tra sam+pa daH/ /b+ha ban+ti swa gr-i he d+ha N+yaHsu d+hi yo
<p>281b.2</p>'gyur/ /gzhan gyi la gnas 'bros par byed/ /gzhan gyi ltung bar gyur pa thob/ /dam pa'i lam ni yongs ma btang / /rigs dang mi rigs rnam bcad cing / /yul dang dus ni yongs shes la/ /dam pa kun tu phun sum tshogs/ /blo bzang skal ldan rang khyim du/ /chos kyi
<p>281b.3</p>d+har+m+ma b+hA gi naH/ /ga twA rat+nA ka raM tsA n+ye la b+han+te prA Na saM shA yaM/ /yat+ne na bod+d+ha bya sad+b+hiHd+ha na s+yo pa ni Shata ba rA/ /a dro ha shud+d+ha bud+d+hi nAM swA d+hI nA d+ha na da shri yaH/ /rak+Sha NI yo b+ha bad+d+hish+tsa
<p>281b.4</p>bgo skal ldan par 'gyur/ /gzhan ni rin chen 'byung gnas su/ /song nas srog la the tshom 'thob/ /nor gyi nye bar gnas pa mchog /dam pas 'bad de rtogs par bya/ /'khu med dag pa'i blo ldan la/ /nor sbyin dpal ni rang dbang 'gyur/ /rtag tu khyod ni 'grogs pa yis/ /
<p>281b.5</p>b+he daHsa ta ta saM ha teH/ /b+hin+nAt+sA la ti ka l+yA NaM ku lA ta kum+b+ha di bo da kaM/ /ya thA b+hin+nan+d+ha na s+yAg+he rna sh+yan+ti sa dr-i shA twi ShaH/ /ta thA bi pu la baM sha s+ya b+hin+na dz+nyA terbi b+hu ta yaH/ /b+h+rA trI NaM san+ta to b+he daHka thaM nA
<p>281b.6</p>dbye ba dag ni bsrung bar bya/ /rigs ni dbye bas dge ba dag /zag par 'gyur te bum chu bzhin/ /ji ltar bud shing bye ba yis/ /me yi 'od ni mtshungs pa nyams/ /de bzhin rigs brgyud chen po yis/ /gnyen 'dun bye ba'i 'byor pa'o/ /chung mas rtag tu mtshan mo ni/ /sdang ba'i
<p>282a</p>
<p>282a.1</p>ma ni bar+t+ta te/ /a d+h+yA pi tra naM pa t+nI d+hi r+d+we Sha bi d+yAM sa dA ni shi/ /un+na DA nAM swa baM shA nAM dwai d+hAM tA ban+na dza ya te/ /yA bta ku Tha ra d+hA re ba yo Shi d+bi sha ti nAn+ta raM/ /b+h+rA ta rar+thA na bA de na gu ruM pa ru Sh+ya kut+sa
<p>282a.2</p>rig byed bslabs pa yi/ /spun zla bye ba'i brgyud dag ni/ /nges pa nyid du ji ltar zlog /ji ste sta re rno lta bu'i/ /bud med nang du ma zhugs pa/ /de srid rang rigs smig ma ni/ /mthon po rnam gnyis mi 'gyur ro/ /nor la rtsod pa spun zla dang / /smod cing rtsub pas bla ma
<p>282a.3</p>yAH/ /mi tra me kA b+hi lA She Na na yan+ti dwe Sha tAM s+t+ri yaH/ /tad+pa dan+ti ha san+t+ya bi b+h+ru bi lA se na yo Shi taH/ /yata pra yA ti su hr-ita sne ha mU lon+mU la na he tu tAM/ /hi ta muk+t+we ti pu trA NaM b+hU ta ye\u0f85b+hi ma taM b+ha
<p>282a.4</p>dang / /gcig la 'dod pas grogs po la/ /bud med kyis ni sdang du 'jug /grogs kyi mdza' gcugs rtsa ba nas/ /'byin pa'i rgyur ni rab 'gyur gang / /de ni bud med smin ma dag /g.yo zhing dgod kyang smra bar byed/ /bu rnams 'byor pas mngon 'dod pas/ /phan pa 'di brjod 'byor
<p>282a.5</p>baH/ /a ni t+ya tA pa ri muk+taHkA le ni d+ha na mA ya yau/ /a bi b+hak+te d+ha ne shak+t+wA de shAn+ta ra d+ha nArdza ne/ /dz+yeSh+ThA ba b+hU buHpur+N+Na stu gr-i he bit+ta ma tsin+ta yata/ /ka le na gr-i ha mAp+tA naM bas+t+rA sha na bi bA di
<p>282a.6</p>pa ni/ /mi rtag pa las yongs ma grol/ /dus kyis pha rol song bar gyur/ /nor ni dgos pa min pa'i tshe/ /phu bo rnams ni yul gzhan du/ /nor nyid bsgrub la chags gyur cing / /gang pos khyim du nor la bsams/ /dus kyi khang par 'ongs par gyur/ /gos dang zas la rtsod pa
<p>282b</p>
<p>282b.1</p>nAM/ /s+t+rI man+t+ra dat+ta kar+NA nAM b+he da ste ShA ma dzA ya ta/ /bit+te bi b+ha dz+ya mA ne tha tairbi dwi Sha ba shI kr-i taiH/ /dA sI su to ya mi t+yuk+t+wA nI taHpUr+N+No ni raM sha tAM/ /so pi pUr+N+Na d+ha naHkA le shI ta saM ku tsi taM pa The/ /da daR+sha gr-iSh+mA
<p>282b.2</p>dang / /rna bar bud med sngags byin pas/ /de dag rnams ni rtse bar gyur/ /de nas nor ni bkod pa na/ /sdang bas dbang byas de dag gis/ /'di ni 'bangs mo'i bu zhes brjod/ /gang po skal pa med par byas/ /de yang nor gyis gdung dus su/ /lam du so ka'i tsha ba la'ang / /grang bas 'khongs
<p>282b.3</p>tA pe pi bi ba shaM dA ru b+hA re kaM/ /a dA ya dA ru mU l+ye na sa tasmA ta dA ru b+hA ra kaM/ /di bya tsan+da na ma drAk+ShI ta da ha na s+yA pi shI ta daM/ /su kr-i te nai ba ma hA ta te na lab+d+ha ma hAd+ha naH/ /sa sa byaHsAr+tha
<p>282b.4</p>shing nyen pa yis/ /shing ni khur ba dag gcig mthong / /de yis de las shing gi ni/ /rin gyis shing gi khur po blangs/ /sreg byed la yang bsil ster ba/ /lha yi tsan+dan dag tu mthong / /legs byas chen po nyid kyis bzhin/ /de yis nor chen thob pas de/ /ded dpon rnams
<p>282b.5</p>bA hA nAM pU dz+yo b+hut+p+r-i thi bI pa teH/ /rat+na ka ra pa ShaT kr-i twaHpra yA taHsar+b+ba do\u0f85r+thi nAM/ /tsa kA ra sar+b+ba bA ni dzAM ta ra shulkA d+ya nu gra haM/ /shrA bstI bA si b+hiHsAr+tha ba Nig+b+hiHpu na rar+thi
<p>282b.6</p>kyis bsten bya ste/ /sa yi bdag pos mchod byar gyur/ /slong ba rnams la kun ster des/ /rin chen 'byung gnas lan drug bgrod/ /tshong pa kun gyi gru btsas dang / /sho gam la sogs rjes bzung byas/ /slar yang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i/ /don mthun tshong pas gsol
<p>283a</p>
<p>283a.1</p>taH/ /ya yo pra ba ha NA rU D+haHsa mu dra dwI pa mA shu saH/ /pra t+yA pr-it+te pra ba ha Ne so\u0f85tha shu shrA ba gA ya tAM/ /ba Ni dzAM s+thA ba rI shai la gA thAHsu ga ta saM shra yAH/ /ka s+yai tA i ti te te
<p>283a.2</p>btab nas/ /rgya mtsho'i gling du mgyogs par de/ /gzings la rab tu zhon nas song / /de nas gzings ni slar log tshe/ /tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /bde gshegs la brten tshong pa rnams/ /glu ru len pa de yis thos/ /'di ni su yis zhes des
<p>283a.3</p>na pr-iSh+TA sar+b+ba ba b+hA Shi re/ /e tA b+ha ga ba tA gI tA gA thA bud+d+he na d+hI ma tA/ /i ti bud+d+hA b+hi d+hA me ba shru twA haR+Sha ma bA pa saH/ /puM sAM swa bA sa nA rU D+ha byak+ti mA yA t+yu dI ri
<p>283a.4</p>dris/ /de dag kun gyis legs smras pa/ /'di dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /blo ldan gyis gsungs tshigs su bcad/ /ces pa sangs rgyas mtshan thos nas/ /de yis dga' ba thob par gyur/ /skyes bu rang la bag chags gnas/ /brjod pas gsal ba nyid
<p>283a.5</p>taM/ /tairbi sta re Na ka thi tA mA kar+N+ya b+ha ga wa ta ka thAM/ /so\u0f85b+ha bat+tang+ga ta ma nA ta daR+sha na sa muts+tshu kaH/ /sa sha nair+g+r-i ha mA ga t+ya t+yak+t+wA sar+b+ba pa ri ts+tsha daM/ /a nA tha paN+Di daM draSh+TuM shrA ba stAM
<p>283a.6</p>du gyur/ /de dag gis ni rgyas bshad pa'i/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam dag des/ /thos nas de la yid song ste/ /de ni lta bar 'dod par gyur/ /rim gyis khyim du 'ongs nas des/ /yo byad thams cad yongs btang ste/ /grogs po mgon med zas sbyin ni/ /lta ru mnyan
<p>283b</p>
<p>283b.1</p>su hr-i daM ya yau/ /a b+hi lA ShaM ni be d+yasmai pra bra dz+yA yAM dzi ten+d+ra yaH/ /dza gA ma sa hi taste na b+hak+t+yA b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/ /dr-iSh+T+wai be ta tra sarba dz+nyaM mo ha d+h+wan+ta di bA ka raM/ /tat+pA da bar+N+Na ne nai ba me ne sa kr-i ta kr-i t+ya tAM/ /
<p>283b.2</p>du yod par song / /rab tu byung bar mngon 'dod pa/ /de la dbang po thul bas bshad/ /de dag lhan cig gus pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song / /gti mug mun pa nyin mor byed/ /kun mkhyen der ni des mthong nas/ /de yi zhabs mthong nyid na des/ /bya ba byas pa nyid du bsams/ /
<p>283b.3</p>bi dz+nya ya ta s+ya b+ha ga bAn saM kalpan+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /de sha na dz+yot+p+na ya kur+b+ban bi be ka bi ma lA di shaH/ /e hi b+hi k+Sho ni rA kAM k+She nirbi bak+She k+Sha yau dz+dz+nyi te/ /A khyA te d+har+m+ma bi na ye brah+ma tsaR+yAM tsa
<p>283b.4</p>de yi brtag pa bcom ldan gyis/ /rnam par mkhyen nas de la ni/ /phyogs rnams tshems kyi zla 'od kyis/ /dri med dben par mdzad cing gsungs/ /dge slong tshur shog dogs med cing / /mi mthun phyogs bral nyams pa spangs/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul la/ /tshangs pa'i spyod
<p>283b.5</p>rep+si taM/ /i ti pra sA da shI le na dzi ne no dI ri te pu raH/ /pra bra dz+ya sa ha sai bA s+ya pa pA tA lak+Shi tA ta nau/ /ta taHsa sha tro mi tre tsa pra sha mA ta sa ma hUMtAM shri taH/ /shastuHshA sa namA dwA ya pra Ni pa t+ya dza gA ma
<p>283b.6</p>pa spyad 'dod pa'o/ /zhes pa rab dang ngang tshul gyis/ /rgyal bas sngon du brjod pa'i tshe/ /de yi lus la 'phral nyid du/ /mtshon pa med par rab byung lhung / /rab tu zhi las dgra dang ni/ /grogs la mtshungs par bsten pa des/ /ston pa'i bka' ni rab bzung nas/ /de la phyag ni btsal te
<p>284a</p>
<p>284a.1</p>taM/ /shro NA pa rAn+ta ka nA ma de shaM krU ra dza nA shra yaM/ /swa yaM pa rIk+Shi tuM k+ShAn+tiM dzaM ne na sa ha sa mA ya yau/ /ta tA dr-iSh+TA ta ma yAn+taM mr-i ga yA yA mang+ga laM/ /lub+d+ha kash+tsA sa mA kr-i Sh+ya han+tuM kro d+hA ta sa mu dra bta/ /
<p>284a.2</p>song / /sro na'i pha rol 'gram zhes yul/ /ma rungs skye bo'i gnas su ni/ /rang nyid bzod pa yongs rtog cing / /skye bo dag dang lhan cig song / /ri dwags shor ba la mi shis/ /de ni de nas 'ongs mthong nas/ /rngon pa rnams kyis gzhu bkang ste/ /khro bas gsod par yang dag gzas/ /
<p>284a.3</p>nirbi kA raM ni rud+pe gaM sa taM bi ga ta sA d+h+wa saM/ /pra ha re ti bru bA Nany+tsa dr-iSh+T+wai ba sha mA mAp+ta bAn/ /shA mya tasta s+ya sa ha s+ya pra sA dI lub+d+ha ka s+ya saH/ /d+har+m+man+di de sha ye nA sau bo d+hiM prA ba sa hA nu gaiH/ /sa ta tra su ga tAr+hA NAM sarbo pa
<p>284a.4</p>rnam 'gyur med cing mya ngan med/ /'jigs pa dang ni bral ba ste/ /snun cig ces kyang brjod mthong nas/ /de dag zhi ba thob par gyur/ /rngon pa 'phral la zhi gyur pa/ /de la rab tu dang ldan des/ /gang gis de ni rjes 'brang bcas/ /byang chub rtogs byed chos bstan to/ /der ni bde gshegs la 'os pa'i/ /yo
<p>284a.5</p>ska ra sam+pa dA ma/ /sha tA ni pany+tsa ra myA NAM bi hA rA NA ma ka ra yata/ /pUr+N+No pi dz+nyA na saM pUr+N+Na prasta s+t+ri da sha pU dz+ya tA ma/ /bai rA gya lak+Sh+m+ya yuk+to b+hU na mu nI nAM spr-i ha NI ya yA/ /a tha ta s+yA gra dzA b+h+rA tA b+ha pi laHk+ShI
<p>284a.6</p>byang thams cad phun tshogs kyi/ /gtsug lag khang ni nyams dga' ba/ /lnga brgya dag ni de yis byas/ /gang po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs/ /skabs gsum pa yis mchod bya thob/ /thub pa rnams kyis dgyes bya ba/ /chags bral dpal dang ldan par gyur/ /de nas de yi sngon skyes spun/ /'byor ldan dus
<p>284b</p>
<p>284b.1</p>Na bit+ta tAM/ /kA le no pa ga taHpra ya ta sa mu draM dra bi NA sha yA/ /ta taHpra ba ha NA rU D+haHso\u0f85nu kU laiHsa mI ra NaiH/ /go shIR+Sha tsan+da na ba naM pra pi ta swalpa bA sa raiH/ /ku ThA ri ka sha testasmin pany+tsa b+hi sh+tshet+ta mu d+ya te/ /tats+tsan+da na ba
<p>284b.2</p>kyi nor rnams ni/ /zad pa nyid du rab gyur te/ /nor gyi bsam pas rgya mtshor song / /de nas de ni gzings la zhon/ /rjes mthun yang dag g.yo ba yis/ /go shIR+Sha yi tsan+dan nags/ /nyi ma nyung dus sleb par gyur/ /sta re thogs pa lnga brgya yis/ /der ni mchog gi tsan+dan nags/ /lag 'gro'i tshogs
<p>284b.3</p>naM di byaM b+hu dza ga ga Na saM ku laM/ /ta taHswA mi yak+Sha se nA nAM ma he shwa ra i ti shru taH/ /ko pA du da sri dza taM g+ho raM kA li kA khyaM ma hA ni laM/ /ma ru tA te na ma hA tA prA pi tAHprA Na saM sha yaM/ /tsa kran+dur+b+ba Ni dzaHsar+b+be shar+b+ba sha kra mu khA na
<p>284b.4</p>kyis rgyas gyur pa/ /de la gcod par zhugs pa'i tshe/ /de nas gnod sbyin sde yi rje/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa/ /khros te 'jigs pa'i rlung chen ni/ /ka li ka zhes bya ba spros/ /rlung ni chen por gyur pa des/ /srog la the tshom thob gyur pa/ /tshong pa kun gyis dbang phyug dang / /brgya byin la sogs
<p>284b.5</p>su rA na/ /tA nA rtu ra ba mu kha rA na b+ha bi laHsAr+tha nA ya kaH/ /u bA tsa sany+tsin+t+ya tsi raM pash+tsat+tA pa sa mA ku laH/ /pUr+N+NaHka nI yA na b+h+rA tA so hi tai ShI mAM pu rA ba data/ /ba hukle sho\u0f85lpa su khaHkwa nu gan+ta byas+t+wa yAM
<p>284b.6</p>lha rnams bos/ /mu cor gdung sgrogs de dag la/ /don mthun 'dren pa 'byor len ni/ /rjes su gdung bas 'khrugs pa yis/ /yun ring bsams nas rab smras pa/ /spun zla gzhon pa gang po des/ /phan 'dod bdag la sngon smras pa/ /nyon mongs mang zhing bde ba nyung / /chu gter du khyod gang la
<p>285a</p>
<p>285a.1</p>bu d+hiH/ /a kr-i twA d+hI ma tasta s+ya ba tsa naM sa t+ya daR+shi naH/ /ts+yu to\u0f85haM d+ha na lo b+he na g+ho re smin bya sa nAr+N+Na be/ /shru twe tad+ba Ni dzaHsarbe pra b+hA baM lo ka bi shru taM/ /pUr+N+Na s+ya mA na sA d+h+ya twA ta me ba sha ra NaM ya
<p>285a.2</p>'gro/ /blo ldan bden pa mthong gyur pa/ /de yi tshig ni ma byas pas/ /'jigs rung sdug bsngal rgya mtsho 'dir/ /nor la chags pas bdag lhung ngo / /de dag thos nas tshong pa kun/ /gang po'i mthu ni 'jig rten du/ /rnam par grags pa yid la bsgoms/ /de nyid la ni skyabs
<p>285a.3</p>yuH/ /na ma stu b+h+yaM dza gat+k+le sha bi Sha do ShA sa ha ri Ni/ /pur+N+NA yo dIr+N+Na ka ru NA su d+hA saM pUr+N+Na tse ta s+ya/ /i t+ye ka swa rA ra be Na te ShAM saM pU ri te\u0f85m+ba re/ /k+Sha Ne na ga twA ta dbr-i t+taM pUr+N+Na prA ha swa de ba tA/ /
<p>285a.4</p>su song / /'gro ba'i nyon mongs dug gi skyon/ /'phrog cing snying rje rgyas pa yi/ /bdud rtsis yang dag rdzogs pa'i thugs/ /gang po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa de dag rnams kyi sgra/ /dbyangs gcig gis ni mkha' khengs tshe/ /skad cig la phyin de yi spyod/ /gang po la smras rang gi lhas/ /
<p>285a.5</p>shro NA pa rAn+ta ka ga taHshru twA te ShaM sa bi sla baM/ /byom+na sa mA d+hi san+nad+d+haHprA pa pra ba ha NaM k+Sha NA ta/ /tasmin paR+YaM ka ban+d+he na s+thi to me ru ri bA tsa laH/ /pra la yot+tA la be ga s+ya ga tiM bA yor+dz+dza hA ra saH/ /pUr+N+Ne
<p>285a.6</p>sro na'i pha rol 'gram gnas pa/ /de yis de dag bslad thos nas/ /ting 'dzin bsgrubs pas nam mkha' la/ /skad cig gis ni gzings can phyin/ /der ni de yis skyil krung bcas/ /lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo bas/ /'jig dus rlung tshub lta bu yi/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'gro ba phrogs/ /gang
<p>285b</p>
<p>285b.1</p>na pa ba Ni rud+d+haM dz+nyA twA yak+Sha ga Na gra NIH/ /taM pra sA da ya yau t+yak+t+wA te b+h+yash+tsan+da na kA na naM/ /pUr+N+Na pra sA dA dA dA ya b+ha bi la sh+tsan+da na dru mAn/ /hr-iSh+Ta ste nai ba sa hi taHshU pA raM swa pu raM ya yau/ /pUr+N+Ne \u0f85tha
<p>285b.2</p>pos rlung ni bkag pa dang / /gnod sbyin tshogs kyi gtso bos shes/ /de la dang bas tsan+dan nags/ /de dag rnams la btang nas song / /gang bo'i drin gyis tsan+dan shing / /'byor len dag gis blangs nas ni/ /rang gi grong khyer slob ma 'drar/ /dga' bas de dang lhan cig song / /de nas gang
<p>285b.3</p>sam+mat+te b+hA tu sta tra go shIR+Sha tsan+da naiH/ /tsakre tsan+da na mA lA khyaM pra sA daM su ga to tsi taM/ /ta tra pUr+N+Ne na b+ha ga bAn d+h+yA ta stUr+N+Na bi hA ya sA/ /sa mA ya yau dze ta ba nA dul+laM g+h+ya sha ta yo dza nIM/ /A
<p>285b.4</p>pos spun la bgros/ /go shIR+Sha yi tsan+dan gyis/ /bde gshegs la 'os khang bzang der/ /tsan+dan phreng ba zhes pa byas/ /der ni gang pos bsams pa na/ /bcom ldan mgyogs par nam mkha' las/ /rgyal byed tshal nas dpag tshad brgya/ /'das nas yang dag byon par gyur/ /bcom
<p>285b.5</p>gats+tsha to b+ha ga ba taHpu raHpra pr-i ta yA dza gta/ /de ha kAn+t+ya ka pi shi taM sar+b+baM he ma mi bA b+ha ba ta/ /pu ro sAn ta ni bA si n+ya staM bi lo kya gr-i hAd+ga nAH/ /tI pra tsin+ta pra sA de na pra sha mon+mu kha tAM ya yuH/ /ku sha lo
<p>285b.6</p>ldan byon pa'i sngon du ni/ /sku yi 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /gser bzhin du ni 'jig rten rnams/ /thams cad ser po nyid du gyur/ /de mthong grong gi nye 'khor na/ /gnas pa khyim gyi bud med rnams/ /dang ba'i sems ni drag po yis/ /rab zhi nyid la mngon phyogs gyur/ /gang gis de
<p>286a</p>
<p>286a.1</p>pa tsi tAM tA sAM b+ha ga bA na pa t+ya de sha nAM/ /tsakre b+ha bA da ti krAn+tAHtAHprA suHku sha la ya yuH/ /r-id+d+h+ya b+ha ga ba tasta tra tsai t+yaM po rAd+ga nA b+hi d+haM/ /tA b+hir+b+bi hi ta ma d+yA pi ban+dan+te tsai t+ya ban+da
<p>286a.2</p>dag srid pa las/ /'das nas dge thob bcom ldan gyis/ /dge bar 'os pa bden pa ni/ /de dag rnams la bstan pa mdzad/ /bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul dag gis der/ /mchod rten grong pa'i bud med brjod/ /de dag gis bskrun da lta yang / /mchod rten phyag byed phyag
<p>286a.3</p>kAH/ /mu nI nAM b+ha ga bAn kr-i twA ta thA balka li no mu neH/ /pra bra dz+yA nu gra haM shud+d+haM bi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /ta tash+tsan+da na mA lA khyaM pra sA daM b+ha ga bAn dzi naH/ /pra bi sh+ya spa Ti kany+tsa kre dza na saM g+ha b+ha ra k+Sha
<p>286a.4</p>'tshal byed/ /bcom ldan gyis ni thub rnams dang / /de bzhin thub pa shing shun can/ /rab tu byung bas rjes bzung nas/ /dag pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan rgyal bas ni/ /khang bzang tsan+dan phreng zhes par/ /rab zhugs 'gro ba'i tshogs kyis khur/ /bzod pa shel gyi
<p>286a.5</p>maM/ /a tha rat+nA sa nA si naHsa ta tra ka ru NA ni d+hiH/ /bi da d+he sar+b+ba sa twA nAM shAn+t+yai ni rba Na de sha nAM/ /a trAn+ta re sa nu tsa rau mu nIn+d+rau kr-iSh+Na gau ta mau/ /a b+h+ye t+ya d+har+m+ma shra ba Ne shAstuHshA sa
<p>286a.6</p>rang bzhin mdzad/ /de nas der ni snying rje'i gter/ /rin chen khri la rab bzhugs des/ /sems can thams cad zhi ba'i slad/ /rnam par grol ba bstan pa mdzad/ /skabs der thub dbang nag po dang / /gau ta ma rjes 'brang bcas/ /chos nyan pa la mngon phyogs te/ /ston pa'i bstan la
<p>286b</p>
<p>286b.1</p>nA prA pa tuH/ /ta tra kr-i twA tha b+ha ga bA na prA sA da s+ya prA ti gra haM/ /pu na rdze ta ba naM gats+tsha mud+Ya yau sa ha b+hi k+Shu b+hiH/ /bra dzan+mA rI tsI lo ka s+thaM maud+ga l+yA ya NA mA ta raM/ /sad+gi ra R+ya pa t+yA ha ta d+har+m+ma mA r+g+ge
<p>286b.2</p>'ongs par gyur/ /de nas der ni bcom ldan gyis/ /khang bzang rab tu blangs pa mdzad/ /dge slong dang 'grogs rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal du slar yang gshegs par brtson/ /gshegs shing mau gal bu yi ma/ /'jig rten 'od zer can gnas pa/ /tshig gis 'phags pa'i bden pa yi/ /
<p>286b.3</p>n+ya be sha ya ta/ /a tha dze ta ba nAM prAp+taM b+ha ga bAn+taM sa bisma yAH/ /pUr+N+Na s+ya puN+yaM pa prats+tshur+b+hi k+Sha baHso bya b+hA Sha ta/ /kA sh+ya pa s+ya pu rA sa mya ga saM bud+d+ha s+yA n+ya dzan+ma ni/ /bi hA rA bi
<p>286b.4</p>gzhom med chos kyi lam la bkod/ /de nas bcom ldan rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal gshegs gang po'i bsod nams la/ /ya mtshan ldan pa'i dge slong gis/ /dris shing des kyang bka' stsal pa/ /sngon gyi yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od srungs kyi ni dge 'dun gyi/ /gtsug lag khang
<p>286b.5</p>kr-i taHpUr+N+NaHsaM g+ho pa s+thA ya ko\u0f85b+ha bta/ /sa ka dA tsi da saM mr-iSh+TAM dr-iSh+TA bai hA ri kiM b+hU baM/ /prA ha pra bra dzi taM tI braM kro d+hA du pa d+hi bA ri kaM/ /dr-ip+ta s+yo pa d+hi ba ro\u0f85d+ya bi hA ro\u0f85smin+na mAr+dz+dzi te/ /ka s+ya dA
<p>286b.6</p>skyong nye gnas su/ /skye ba gzhan la gang po gyur/ /nam zhig de yis gtsug lag khang / /sa gzhi byi dor ma byas mthong / /re mos 'bab pa'i rab byung la/ /khro ba drag pos rab tu smras/ /deng 'dir gtsug lag khang ma phyags/ /dregs pa ldan pa 'bangs mo'i bu/ /su yis res
<p>287a</p>
<p>287a.1</p>sI su ta s+ye ti bru bA Nasta ma b+har+t+sa yata/ /te na pA ru Sh+ya pA pe na b+huk+t+wA na ra ka du rga tiM/ /dA sI su to\u0f85b+ha bat+pUr+N+NaHpany+tsa dzan+ma sha tA ni saH/ /saM g+ho pA se na me bA s+ya pu N+yA ya b+hUn+ma hi ya sA/ /
<p>287a.2</p>la bab pa zhes/ /brjod cing de la rab tu smad/ /tshig rtsub sdig pa de yis ni/ /dmyal ba'i ngan 'gror sdug bsngal spyad/ /skye ba lnga brgyar gang po de/ /'bangs mo yi ni bu ru gyur/ /dge 'dun bsnyen pa nyid 'di yi/ /bsod nams chen po'i slad gyur te/ /
<p>287a.3</p>ar+ha twaM ye na niHshe Sha b+ha ba kle shodz+dz+yi taM shri taH/ /i ti pra g+hA baM ka thi taM dzi ne na pUr+N+Na s+ya pu N+yo pa tsa ya pra NI taM/ /shru twAd b+hu taM saM sa di b+hik+Shu saM g+haHpu N+ya pra saM shA b+hi ra to ba
<p>287a.4</p>gang gis srid pa'i nyon mongs rnams/ /ma lus spangs pa'i dgra bcom bsten/ /de ltar bsod nams bsags pas rab bskrun pa/ /gang po'i mthu ni rmad byung rgyal ba yis/ /mdun sar bshad pa thos nas dge 'dun tshogs/ /bsod nams bsngags la mngon par
<p>287a.5</p>b+hu baH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM pUr+N+NA ba dA naM sap+ta triM shaHpal+la waH// //A kiny+tsi n+ya su khA ya ni spr-i ha ta
<p>287a.6</p>dga' bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gang po'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //ci yang med pa'i bde slad chags pa med pa chags
<p>287b</p>
<p>287b.1</p>yA ba rA gya lak+Sh+mI dzu ShaHsar+b+baM yAn+ti bi hA ya kA ya sa tsi bAHsan+taHpra shAn+t+yai ba na/ /ta trA si bra ta Dam+ba re pa ri ka rA ram+b+hA ya tsita pany+tsa yastata kaHko sha pa rits+tsa do pa ka ra Nair+g+ge he\u0f85pa rA d+haHkr-i
<p>287b.2</p>bral dpal 'byor sten byed pa/ /thams cad btang nas lus kyi grogs ldan dam pa rnams kyi zhi slad nags su 'gro/ /der yang tshul 'chos brtul zhugs dag la yo byad rtsom pa gal te gsog byed na/ /mdzod kyi yo byad nyer mkho de dag rnams kyis khyim du gnod pa ci zhig
<p>287b.3</p>taH/ /dzi ne dze ta bA nA rA mA bi hA rA b+hi ra taHpu raH/ /shAkya rA dza ku mA rA NAM pra bra dz+yA dzu ShAM pu raH/ /tsi tra tsI ba ra sat+pA tra yo ga paT+TA di sany+tsa yaM/ /pra b+hU ta ta ra mA lo kya b+ha ga bAn
<p>287b.4</p>byas/ /rgyal ba rgyal byed gtsug lag khang / /kun dga' ra bar sngon bzhugs pas/ /mdun du shAkya'i rgyal po rnams/ /rab tu byung ba bsten pa yi/ /bkra ba'i gos dang dam pa'i snod/ /pus 'khyud la sogs bsags pa dag /rab tu mang po gzigs gyur nas/ /bcom ldan 'das
<p>287b.5</p>sa ma tsin+ta yata/ /a ho ba te ShAM nA d+ya pi ban+d+ha he tur+n+ni bar+t+te/ /a b+hi mA na ma yaHkA ye pri yaHpa ri ka ra gra haH/ /kA ye kA ya pa ri skA rasta s+yo pa ka ra NA ba lI/ /ta s+yAHpa ri kA rA dA na ma ho nu
<p>287b.6</p>kyis yang dag bsams/ /kye ma 'di dag da dung yang / /lus la sdug pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /mngon par khengs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /'ching ba'i rgyu ni yongs ma zlog /lus la lus kyi chas rnams te/ /de la nye bar mkho ba'i bsred/ /de yi yo byad 'dzin pa ni/ /kye ma 'ching ba'i
<p>288a</p>
<p>288a.1</p>ban+d+ha shriM kha lA/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya b+ha ga bAn nai kAn+ta bi hi tas+thi taH/ /kA ru N+ya du ba san+nA nI ku sha lA ya sa mud+Ya taH/ /mA pa tra ya mu pa s+thA naM kar+t+ta byaM ye na ke na tsita/ /a
<p>288a.2</p>lcags sgrog yin/ /de ltar bsams nas bcom ldan 'das/ /dben par gnas pa bsgrubs pa yis/ /nyer 'dzin rnams la snying rje las/ /dge ba'i slad du yang dag brtson/ /dge slong rnams kyis mi mthong slad/ /zla ba gsum du bdag la ni/ /sus kyang
<p>288a.3</p>daR+sha nA ya b+hi k+Shu NA ma ka ro di ti saM bi daM/ /pra br-it+te ni la me tasmin b+hik+Shu rA ra N+ya ka bra taH/ /A ya yA bu pa se nA khyAHkAR+YAr+thaM ta nu tsI ba raH/ /pra bA ri taHsa saM brA pya d+ha n+yaHsu ga ta daR+sha naM/ /
<p>288a.4</p>nye bar gnas mi bya/ /zhes pa'i bgro ba mdzad par gyur/ /nges pa de la rab zhugs tshe/ /dge slong dgon pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /chos gos dman ldan nye ba'i sde/ /zhes pa dgos pa'i slad du 'ongs/ /rab zlog skal ba ldan pa des/ /bde gshegs mthong ba yang dag thob/ /
<p>288a.5</p>kr-i ta kr-i t+yaHk+Sha NaM s+thi twa sra ta s+the pa Ni pa t+ya taM/ /bra dzan+ta me t+ya ba prats+tshu b+hik+Sha baHpa ri bAR+ya taM/ /ta bAR+ya daR+sha na ma ho dat+taM b+ha ga ba tA ka thaM/ /mA sa tra yaM daR+sha ne s+ya ni ya maHshA sa ne
<p>288a.6</p>bya ba byas te skad cig 'dug /de la phyag 'tshal rab tu song / /dge slong rnams kyis bgrod de la/ /yongs bskor sngon du phyin te dris/ /'phags pa khyod la bcom ldan gyis/ /kye ma mthong ba ji ltar gnang / /'di yi bka' la zla gsum du/ /dge 'dun dag gis mthong
<p>288b</p>
<p>288b.1</p>na yaH/ /sa ka thaM b+ha ba tA b+hag+naHsaM g+ha s+yon+mAr+g+ga gA mi nA/ /shru twe ti ba tsa naM te ShA mu pa se naHsmi \u0f9f raM/ /tA nu tse na ma yA kash+tsita kr-i taHsa ma ya bi sla baH/ /a ha muk+to b+ha ga ba tA daR+sha nA ba sa
<p>288b.2</p>med pa'i/ /nges pa gang de lam min nas/ /bgrod pa khyod kyis ji ltar bshig /de dag tshig de thos gyur nas/ /lhag par 'dzum zhing nye sde yis/ /de dag la smras bdag gis ni/ /nges pa gang yang nyams ma byas/ /bdag ni blta ba'i gnas skabs na/ /bcom ldan rang
<p>288b.3</p>re swa yaM/ /A ra N+ya ka s+ya me b+hik+Shor+n+ni She d+ho nAsti daR+sha ne/ /pa ri ts+tsha do pa ka ra Na t+yA ga nirmuk+ta ban+d+ha nAH/ /a bAR+Ya daR+sha na br-ik+Sha mU li kaHpaM shu kU li kA/ /i da ma d+ya pa raM prA ta ri ti ye
<p>288b.4</p>gis bka' stsal pa/ /dge slong dgon pa pa rnams ni/ /lta ba bdag gis bkag pa med/ /yo byad nyer mkho yongs btang zhing / /'ching ba dag las nges grol ba/ /shing drung phyag dar khrod pa dag /lta ba dag ni bzlog pa med/ /lhung bzed chos gos tshogs rnams la/ /'di
<p>288b.5</p>pany+tsa ye re tAH/ /pA tra tsI ba ra bar+g+ge Shu te ShAM nastI ha daR+sha naM/ /sA tho b+hiHpra sa rat+tu ShA ra shi shi rai s+t+r-iSh+NA tu raste pa raM te nirbi g+hA ni d+hA na d+hAm+ni bi br-i tau dai n+yA da laM du rga tA/ /te
<p>288b.6</p>deng nang par gzhan no zhes/ /gang zhig bsags pa la dga' ba/ /de dag 'dir ni mthong ba med/ /gang zhig rab zhi'i brtul zhugs yo byad dag la 'bad pas mngon par khengs 'dis 'ching / /de dag tsan+dan rkang 'thung dag las yang dag gdung byed me ni nye bar bskrun/ /kha
<p>289a</p>
<p>289a.1</p>ShAM tsan+dan pA du pA na taHsan+ta pa kaHpA ba ko ye re Sha prA sha ma bra to pa ka ra Ne bad+d+ho b+hi mA na gra haH/ /i t+yuk+ta mu pa se ne na shru twA ta shAkyab+hik+Sha baH/ /bai la
<p>289a.2</p>bas rab rgyas bsil ba'i chu rnams dag gis de dag mchog tu skom pas gdung / /myang 'das gegs med gter gyi gnas la de dag bkren zhing phongs pa nyid du gyur/ /nye sdes de skad brjod thos nas/ /shAkya'i dge slong de dag rnams/ /skyengs
<p>289a.3</p>k+Sh+ya k+Sha yi tot+sA hAHsa ha sai ba bya tsin+ta yata/ /e ta da b+ha ga ba tA diSh+Ta masmAn+nud+di sh+ya nA pa rAn/ /bi tsi tra tsI pa ra tsa ya prA bA rA ba ya me ba ya ta/ /bi ra tets+tshA pri yA shasturma hets+tshA
<p>289a.4</p>pas spro ba zad gyur pas/ /'phral la nyid du rnam par bsams/ /'di dag bcom ldan gyis gsungs pa/ /bdag cag ched yin gzhan la min/ /gang phyir chos gos bkra ba'i tshogs/ /bdag cag kho nas rab tu gyon/ /'dod bral rnams la ston pa dgyes/ /'dod
<p>289a.5</p>ba ya ma pri yAH/ /tasmA dits+tshAM pa ri t+ya dz+ya b+ha ba masta s+ya sam+ma tAH/ /i ti sa ma tsin+t+ya te sar+b+be tsA ru tsI ba ra sany+tsa yaM/ /prA bri t+yA b+h+ya d+hi kaM t+yak+t+wA ya yur+b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/ /its+tshA bi
<p>289a.6</p>chen bdag cag la dgyes min/ /de slad 'dod pa yongs btang nas/ /bdag cag de yis bzhed par 'gyur/ /zhes bsams de dag thams cad kyis/ /rab tu gyon pa las lhag pa'i/ /mdzes pa'i gos kyi tshogs btang nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song / /'dod pa bral
<p>289b</p>
<p>289b.1</p>rA me b+ha ga bAn bya d+hAt+te ShA ma nu gra haM/ /dz+nyA na badzre Na sat+kA ya dr-iSh+Ti shai laM bi b+he da yaH/ /shAkya rA dza ku mA rA NAM shro taHprAp+ti pha la spr-i shaM/ /b+hik+Shu b+hiH pUr+b+ba br-it+tAn+taM pr-iSh+TaH pra ha ta thA ga
<p>289b.2</p>tshe bcom ldan gyis/ /'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo ni/ /ye shes rdo rjes rnam bcom gang / /de dag rjes su bzung ba mdzad/ /rgyun zhugs 'bras bu la reg pa/ /shAkya'i rgyal sras rnams dag gi /sngon byung dge slong rnams kyis dris/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka'
<p>289b.3</p>taH/ /bA rA Na s+yA ma b+huta pur+b+baM brah+ma dat+ta ma hI pa tiH/ /dA nArdA hasto yad bA huHk+Sh+mA ma d+hAd+di sha dwi po pa maH/ /ta s+ya brah+mA ba tI muk+tA la te pa gu Na shA li nI/ /kIr+t+ti sat+pu ru Sha s+ye ba bi shru tA
<p>289b.4</p>stsal pa/ /bA rA Na sIr sngon byung ba/ /sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin/ /gang dpung sa 'dzin sbyin pa yis/ /lag brlan phyogs kyi gnyis 'thung bzhin/ /da yi btsun mo mu tig gi /'khri shing bzhin du yon tan can/ /skyes bu dam pa'i snyan pa bzhin/ /grags pa tshangs
<p>289b.5</p>da yi tA b+ha bta/ /pra ti bim+bo pa maM pa t+yuHpA su taM bi ma lA sha yA/ /dza la krI DA ga tA kA le su Shu be di bya lak+Sha NaM/ /u da kA khyAHsa ba lo\u0f85b+hUta saM dzA taHsa li lAn+ta re/ /bar+d+ha mA NaHpi tustu l+yaM yau ba rA dz+ya ma no ra
<p>289b.6</p>ldan ma zhes gyur/ /dri med bsam pa dang ldan de/ /chu la rtse ru song ba'i tshe/ /bdag po'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bu/ /mtshan mchog ldan pa btsas par gyur/ /chu nang du skyes byis pa de/ /chu skyes zhes ni bya bar gyur/ /yab kyi rgyal tshab bzhed pa dang / /mtshungs pa nyid du che bar
<p>290a</p>
<p>290a.1</p>thaiH/ /sha tA ni pany+tsA mA t+yA nAM ta s+ya dzan+ma di naM sa maM/ /a bA pustu l+ya rU pa NAM pu trA NAM sha ta pany+tsa kaM/ /ni dzaM dzA ti sma raHsmr-i twA prAg+b+r-it+taM shi shuHsha naiH/ /a tsin+ta yata prAp+ta kA laM
<p>290a.2</p>skyes/ /de ni skyes pa'i nyin par la/ /blon po lnga brgyas mtshungs par ni/ /gzugs ni mtshungs pa'i bu rnams dag /lnga brgya rab tu thob par gyur/ /rang gi skye dran byis pa des/ /rim gyis sngon byung dran gyur nas/ /bdag nyid la phan legs byas kyi/ /dus
<p>290a.3</p>hi taM su kr-i ta mAt+ma naH/ /ShaSh+Tha baR+ShA Ni kr-i twA tu yau ba rA dz+ya ma hA pu rA/ /a b+ha baM kr-its+tsh+wa saM tap+ta sh+tsi raM na ra ka saM ka Te/ /dzan+ma n+yasmin+na pi bu ba rA dz+ya mu pa s+thi taM/ /sar+b+ba thA brAr+th+ya ma No pi
<p>290a.4</p>la bab par yang dag bsams/ /lo ni drug cu tham par sngon/ /bdag gis rgyal tshab byas pa na/ /mi bzad dmyal bar yun ring du/ /nyam nga'i sdug bsngal gdung ba thob/ /slad nas skye ba 'di la yang / /rgyal tshab dag ni nye bar gnas/ /rnam pa kun tu gsol btab
<p>290a.5</p>na ka ri Sh+ya mi bA ta kaM/ /i ti sany+tsin+t+ya sa tsi raM rA dz+ya b+ho ga pa rAd+mu khaH/ /pi tu rud+be ga dza na nI ma gra hI ta paM gu mU ka tAM/ /sar+b+ba la k+Sha Na yuk+to pi rA dza br-it+te ra b+hA dza naM/ /sa mU
<p>290a.6</p>kyang / /bdag ni sdig pa mi byed do/ /zhes pa de yis yun ring bsams/ /rgyal srid longs spyod las phyir phyogs/ /pha ni yid 'byung skyed byed pa'i/ /lkugs pa 'phye bo bzung bar gyur/ /mtshan nyid thams cad ldan mod kyang / /rgyal po'i lugs kyi snod ma gyur/ /gnyen
<p>290b</p>
<p>290b.1</p>ka paM gu nA ma b+hUd ban+d+hU nAM duHkha bar+d+ha naH/ /prAp+te Shu man+t+ri su te Shu shas+t+ra shAs+t+ra ba lo da yaM/ /rA dza pu traHpra br-id+d+ho si no da tiSh+Than+na tsA ba data/ /pr-iSh+TAsta taHk+Shi tI she na bai d+yAsta dang+go d+dau Sha
<p>290b.2</p>rnams sdug bsngal skyed byed de/ /lkugs pa'i 'phye bo zhes par gyur/ /mtshon dang bstan bcos stobs rgyas pa/ /blon po'i bu rnams kyis thob tshe/ /rgyal sras rab tu cher gyur kyang / /ldang ba ma yin smra ba min/ /de nas de yi lus skyon gyi/ /sman ni sa yi dbang
<p>290b.3</p>b+he Sha dzaM/ /a ba da na bai ka l+yaM rA dza sU norna dr-i sh+ya te/ /a b+h+yA sA d+ya di dzA to\u0f85s+ya do Sho\u0f85yi su kha se bi naH/ /ta de Sha b+ha ya saM be gA dut+tiSh+Tha ti tsa bak+ti tsa/ /i ti bai d+yai ra b+hi hi ta ta the t+yuk+t+wA k+Shi
<p>290b.4</p>pos dris/ /sman pas smras pa rgyal po yi/ /sras la ma tshang mthong ba med/ /gal te bde ba bstan pa 'di'i/ /skyon ni goms las skyes gyur pa/ /de lta na 'di 'jigs pa yi/ /shugs las ldang 'gyur smra bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa sman pas smras pa'i tshe/ /de bzhin zhes smras
<p>290b.5</p>tI shwa raH/ /mi th+yai rba d+h+ya ba su d+hAM b+ha yA ya bya sr-i dza ta su taM/ /sa s+ya mA naHpu ru Shaista nu bA tsa ra tha s+thi taM/ /a pi kash+tsid+ba sa t+ya s+yAM bA rA Na s+yaM na na bA dza naH/ /i ti tad+ba tsa naM shru twA tairnI taHsa nr-i ban+ti kaM/ /ta
<p>290b.6</p>sa dbang gi/ /brdzun gyis gsod pa'i sa ru ni/ /'jigs pa bgyi slad bu btang gyur/ /smod byed skyes bu de dag la/ /shing rta la gnas des smras pa/ /bA rA Na sI 'di na ni/ /skye bo 'ga' zhig yod dam med/ /ces pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /des de mi bdag drung du khyer/ /der
<p>291a</p>
<p>291a.1</p>tra pi tAr+th+ya mA no pi mU ka e bA b+ha bta pu naH/ /pu narba d+h+ya b+hu baM nI taHsha baM dr-iSh+TA dza gA da saH/ /a s+ye Sha dzI ba ti sha baHkim+bA sar+b+bAt+ma nAM mr-i taH/ /shru twe tat+taiHpi tuHpAr+sh+wen+yasto mau naM bya d+hAt+pu naH/ /
<p>291a.2</p>ni yab kyis gsol btab kyang / /slar yang lkugs pa nyid du gyur/ /slar yang gsod sar khrid pa na/ /ro zhig mthong nas nges smras pa/ /ro 'di 'tsho ba yin nam ni/ /bdag nyid kun gyi shi ba yin/ /de thos yab kyi ngogs su des/ /bkod tshe slar yang smra bcad byas/ /
<p>291a.3</p>pu nar+b+bad+ha b+ha yA yai ba nI taHpro bA tsa tAn pa thi/ /rA shiR+Ya e Sha d+ha n+ya s+ya sa hi b+huMk+to\u0f85nu b+hU dz+ya te/ /i t+yuk+ta bA kyo pi pu narno tse kiny+tsi ta pi tuHpu raH/ /ta taHkhyutaHkhyA ta pra ti k+She pe ta s+yA diSh+Te ma hI b+hU dzA/ /so ba dad+ba bA rA dA ne na
<p>291a.4</p>slar yang gsod 'jigs nyid slad khyer/ /de dag la ni lam du smras/ /gang zhig 'bru yi phung po 'di/ /gang phyir de zos rjes su za/ /zhes pa'i tshig 'di brjod kyang slar/ /pha yi mdun du cang mi smra/ /de nas de la sa bdag gis/ /bshad pas rab smad bstan pa'i tshe/ /de yis smras pa mchog ster na/ /
<p>291a.5</p>bats+mi pad+b+h+yAM bra dzA mi tsa/ /a thA s+ya rA dz+nyA hr-iSh+Te na ba ra dA ne pra ti shru te/ /sa pad+b+h+yAM swa ya ma b+h+ye t+ya spaSh+TaM pi ta ra ma bra bIta/ /nA haM sang+gurna mU ko\u0f85haM nai ba tsA haM dza DA sha yaH/ /kin+tu dzan+mAn+ta ra kle shaM smr-i twA bai hwa
<p>291a.6</p>bdag ni smra zhing rkang pas 'gro/ /de nas rgyal po dgyes pa yis/ /de la mchog ster rjes thos tshe/ /rang gi rkang bas mngon phyogs te/ /gsal bar phal de yis smras/ /bdag ni 'phye min bdag lkugs min/ /bsam pa blun po'ang bdag min te/ /'on kyang skye ba gzhan nyon mongs/ /dran zhing rnam
<p>291b</p>
<p>291b.1</p>l+ya mA shre taH/ /yau ba ra dz+ya su khaM b+huk+t+wA ShaSh+Thi baR+ShA N+ya haM pu rA/ /ShaSh+Thi baR+Sha sa ha sra Ni n+ya pa san na ra ko da re/ /rA dza b+hI t+ya ma yA tasmA ta kr-i te yaM mU ka sang+gu tA/ /pra bra dz+ya yA brah+ma tsa R+YaM tsa rA mye Sha ba ro
<p>291b.2</p>par 'khrugs la brten/ /lo ni drug cu bdag gis sngon/ /rgyal tshab bde ba longs spyad nas/ /lo ni stong phrag drug cu dag /dmyal ba'i nang du gnas par gyur/ /de slad bdag ni rgyal po yis/ /'jigs nas lkugs 'phye 'di nyid byas/ /rab byung tshangs par spyad pa dag /spyod pa 'di ni bdag
<p>291b.3</p>ma ma/ /i ti te nok+ta mA kar+N+ya ta mu ba tsA tsa ma hI pa tiH/ /a mU ka i t+yA sta dr-i tir+b+bi rak+ta i ti duH khi taH/ /d+har+m+ma mU la mi daM rA dz+yaM pu tra na t+yak+tu mar+ha si/ /ya dz+nyA dA na pra dzA tra NaiHpu N+ya pUr+N+NA nr-i pa shri
<p>291b.4</p>gi mchog /ces pa de yis brjod thos nas/ /ma lkugs zhes pas dga' thob cing / /chags bral zhes pas sdug bsngal ba'i/ /sa yi bdag pos de la smras/ /chos kyi rtsa ba rgyal srid 'di/ /bu kye btang bar mi 'os so/ /mchod sbyin sbyin pas skye rgu skyob/ /mi bdag dpal ni bsod nams
<p>291b.5</p>yaH/ /e ka pu trasta yA pu tra pa ri t+yA ga ra sA da haM/ /ni drA da ri dra tAM nI taHsho ka sha sa mA shra yaH/ /saM pur+N+Na tsan+d+ra ru tsi raM byak+ta muk+ti ka hA si nIM/ /ka thaM saM pa da mu ta sr-i dz+ya pra bra
<p>291b.6</p>rdzogs/ /bu gcig bdag bu khyod kyis/ /chags pa yongs su btang ba las/ /gnyid kyis dbul ba thob gyur cing / /mya ngan mal stan dag la brten/ /yongs rdzogs zla ba ltar mdzes shing / /mu tig gsal bar dgod pa can/ /phun sum tshogs pa spangs nas khyod/ /rab
<p>292a</p>
<p>292a.1</p>dz+yA b+hi ma tA ta ba/ /ka thaM sha y+YaH pa ri t+ya dz+ya prA dz+ya prA dz+ya rA dz+ya su kha tsi tAH/ /ba nAn+ta bA sa bya sa nI se ba se pAM shu lA s+tha lI/ /kAn+tA lI lA mu ku ra ma Ni man+man+di rI rA dza d+hA nI me tAM t+yak+t+wA na nu ba na
<p>292a.2</p>'byung ji ltar mngon par 'dod/ /rgyal po la 'os bde ba yi/ /mal stan mchog ni yongs btang nas/ /nags mtha'i gnas la zhen pa yi/ /rdul khrod sa gzhi ji ltar stan/ /rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ma rol pa'i me long nor bu dang ldan khang pa ni/ /'di dag btang nas
<p>292a.3</p>b+hu baHsaM pa tad+b+ya g+h+ra g+ho rAH/ /se ba pri t+yai dza ra da dza ga rA shwA sa bi p+luSh+Ta sh+liSh+Ta kliSh+Tats+tshA ya pra bi ra la la tAstAHka than+te b+ha ban+ti/ /pi tuHshru twe ti ba tsa naM rA dza pu trasta
<p>292a.4</p>nags kyi sa gzhi 'jigs rung stag ni yang dag rgyu byed cing / /brtan pa'i sprul ni rgan po'i dbugs kyi bsregs pa dang ldan grib ma dman gyur pa/ /'khri shing nyung ba de dag rnams kyis mnyes gshin khyod kyi dgyes pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /zhes pa yab kyi tshig thos nas/ /rgyal po'i bu
<p>292a.5</p>ma bra bIta/ /dan+ta kAn+tA d+ha ra ru tsiM bai rA gyaM grA hA yan+ni bA/ /shI ta la nirma la dza lAHsan+to Sha sha shi shI ta lAH/ /ba ne bai rA gya su b+ha gA b+hu baHka s+ya na bal+la b+hAH/ /pa ra dA ra i ba k+Shi pra su khA bar+dz+dzi ta
<p>292a.6</p>yis der smras pa/ /mchu mdzes so yi 'od kyis ni/ /chags bral len du 'jug pa bzhin/ /chu ni bsil zhing dri ma med/ /chog shes ri bong ldan pa bsil/ /chags bral skal ba bzang po'i sa/ /nags tshal la ni su mi dga'/ /gzhan gyi chung ma dag la bzhin/ /bde myur ngan pas
<p>292b</p>
<p>292b.1</p>durdza nAH/ /na ra ka pra t+ya yA yA me sA pA yA na pri yAHpri yAH/ /d+h+yA naM man+t+raHpa ri dz+nyA na min+d+ra yA NAny+tsa nirdza yaH/ /rA dz+nyA hiM sA\u0f85pra yat+ne na yo go yaM na ra ka pra daM/ /ha san+t+yaHsaM sA raM
<p>292b.2</p>ma btang ba/ /gang zhig dmyal rkyen gnod bcas kyi/ /dga' ma rnams la bdag mi dga'/ /bsam gtan sngags dang yongs shes dang / /dbang po rnams ni thul ba dang / /'tshe bas rgyal po'i sbyor ba 'di/ /'bad pa med pas dmyal ba ster/ /nags kyi sa gzhi me tog rab rgyas
<p>292b.3</p>ku su ma ka li lAHkA na na b+hU baHswa b+hA be na prI tiM bi da d+ha ti bu d+hA nAM sha ma ma yAM/ /dr-i D+haM tsin+tA shrAn+tA bya dza na pa ba nots+tshA sa ba hu lA bi b+hu tir+b+hu pA nAM b+ha ba ti kha lu ne yaM su kha sa khI/ /a nu dzA nI hi mAM tA ta bra
<p>292b.4</p>'khor ba dag la dgod pa 'dra/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mkhas pa rnams la zhi ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba skyed/ /bsam pa yi ni mchog tu ngal zhing rlung yab rlung gi shugs rings mang / /sa bdag rnams kyi 'byor pa 'di ni nges par bde ba'i grogs ma yin/ /yab gcig bdag la rjes gnang gsol/ /
<p>292b.5</p>dzA mye Sha ta po ba naM/ /dza nI hi sar+b+ba b+hA bA nAM shi raHshak+ta ma ni t+ya tAM/ /i ti pu tra ba tsa naM shru twA tat+ta the ti tsin+ta yan/ /u pA tso pa tsi tAsh+tsaR+YastaM ma nI ShI ma hI pa tiH/ /bi be ka bi ma laM pu tra twa mits+tsha
<p>292b.6</p>bdag ni dka' thub nags su 'gro/ /mi rtag pa nyid dngos kun gyi/ /rtse mor chags pa mkhyen lags sam/ /zhes pa bu yi tshig thos nas/ /de de bzhin zhes rnam par bsams/ /sa bdag mkhas pa ngo mtshar ni/ /rgyas par gyur pas de la smras/ /dri med dben pa'i nags tshal du/ /bu khyod
<p>293a</p>
<p>293a.1</p>si sa tsed+ba naM/ /hi twA me saM sha yaM tA ba ta pash+tsa d+yuk+ti ka ri Sh+ya si/ /bra dza tA ba d+h+ya ba su d+hAM tiR+Ya guk+taM s+t+wa yA ba tsaH/ /pra tsu raM ta da b+hi prA yaM bak+tu mar+ha si ta twa taH/ /i ti k+Shi ti b+hu dza
<p>293a.2</p>gal te 'gro 'dod na/ /re zhig bdag gi the tshom gsol/ /phyi nas rigs par khyod 'gyur ro/ /khyod ni gsod sar 'gro ba yis/ /'khyog po dag tu tshig mang po/ /smras pa de dag dgongs pa ni/ /de bzhin nyid du brjod par 'os/ /sa yi bdag pos dris pa
<p>293a.3</p>pr-iSh+TaHso\u0f85bra bIrtan+ma yo di taM/ /ba sa t+ya tra na kash+tsita twA mad+ba d+hAd+b+h+yo ni brta te/ /su kr-i tI dzI ba ti sha baH sa pA pastu mr-i to\u0f85mr-i taH/ /prAk+pu N+ya b+hak+Sh+ya te mU lAta sa d+ha nair+d+hA n+ya rA shi bta/ /i
<p>293a.4</p>dang / /des smras bdag gis brjod pa des/ /'di na su zhig bdag gsod las/ /khyod kyi zlog pa mi gnas sam/ /legs byas dag gi ro yang gson/ /sdig ldan shi ba min yang shi/ /bsod nams snga ma'i rtsa ba spyod/ /nor ldan rnams kyi 'bru phung bzhin/ /zhes
<p>293a.5</p>t+yA sha yAn+ma yA ta duk+taM ba tsa naM pra yaM/ /i ti shru twA k+Shi ti pa tiHtaM pa ri Sh+wa dz+ya sA da raH/ /u tsi taM kri ya tAM pu tra ku sha lA ye t+ya b+hA Sha ta/ /ta taHsa pi trA nu dz+nyA taHsA shru ne tre Na kA
<p>293a.6</p>pa'i bsam pas bdag gis ni/ /tshig ni gsum po de dag brjod/ /ces pa thos nas sa yi bdag /de la yongs 'khyud gus bcas pas/ /bu gcig dge ba'i slad du ni/ /rigs pa mdzod ces rab tu smras/ /de nas yab ni mig chu dang / /bcas pas rjes gnang nags
<p>293b</p>
<p>293b.1</p>na naM/ /pra ya yau man+t+ri pu trA NAM sa hi taHpany+tsa b+hiHsha taiH/ /ma haR+Sho ran+ti ke ta tra pra bra dz+nyAM prA pya sA nu gaH/ /te ShAM kA le na so pa sh+ya kuN+Da balka la sany+tsa yaM/ /ta taHsa saM tsa ya dwe ShI ta da daR+Sha na saM
<p>293b.2</p>tshal du/ /blon po'i bu ni lnga brgya dang / /lhan cig rab tu song bar gyur/ /der ni drang srong che drung du/ /rjes 'brang bcas pas rab byung thob/ /dus kyis de dag ril ba dang / /shing shun bsags pa de yis mthong / /de nas bsags pa la sdang des/ /de dag mi bltar nges
<p>293b.3</p>bi dA/ /e kA kI bi dza ne ta s+thau kany+tsita kA laM ma hA ma tiH/ /daR+sha nA b+hA Sha Ne bad+d+ha ni ya mo pi ya dr-its+tsha yA/ /prAp+taM su ga ta mi t+yuk+t+wA pa prats+tshaHku sha laM mr-i gaM/ /pu nash+tsa pU dzi taM dr-iSh+T+wA mu nin+te
<p>293b.4</p>byas nas/ /blo gros chen pos ji tsam dus/ /skye bos dben par gcig pur bsdad/ /mthong dang smra ba nges pa yis/ /bsdams kyang 'dod dgar 'ongs pa yis/ /ri dwags la ni dge ba dag /legs par 'ongs zhes smras nas dris/ /slar yang thub pa ri dwags kyi/ /brtul
<p>293b.5</p>na mr-i ga bra taM/ /a mA t+ya ta na yAHsar+b+be bi lak+ShAHsa ma tsin+ta yan/ /mr-i go mr-i ga bra tash+tsA yaM pU dzi tau niHpa ri gra hau/ /e tai bA nA dzi nA daN+Da sam+b+hA rA Dam+ba rodz+dz+nyi tau/ /
<p>293b.6</p>zhugs de yis mchod mthong nas/ /blon po'i bu rnams thams cad ni/ /skyengs par gyur pas yang dag bsams/ /nags su yongs 'dzin med pa yi/ /ri dwags ri dwags brtul zhugs 'di/ /gos dang dbyug pa'i tshogs dag gi/ /phung po spangs pa 'di dag mchod/ /
<p>294a</p>
<p>294a.1</p>e ta dar+tha ma ne nAsma daR+shI na ni ya maHkr-i taH/ /pra to ba ka ra Na bya grA ta nu na ma s+yA pi bA ra yeta/ /i ti sany+tsin+t+ya sar+b+baM te bra to bskA ra sany+tsa yaM/ /na d+yAM pra k+Shi pya bA rA yAM
<p>294a.2</p>de yi don du 'di yis ni/ /bdag cag blta la nges pa byas/ /brtul zhugs yo byad bsags pa na/ /'di dag gis kyang bzlog gam snyam/ /zhes pa bsams nas de dag gis/ /brtul zhugs yo byad bsags pa kun/ /chu yi klung du rab spangs
<p>294a.3</p>ya yuHshud+d+hA sta dan+ti kaM/ /t+yak+ta gra ha b+hu pAM te ShA mA sha yA nu sha yo tsi tAM/ /sa d+hA tuM pra kr-i ti dz+nyA twA bi di d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /rA dza pu traHsa e bA haM shAkya ste man+t+ri sU na baH/ /pu nas+t+yA go pa de
<p>294a.4</p>nas/ /dag pas de dang nye bar phyin/ /'dzin pa spangs pa de dag gis/ /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de'i/ /bsam pa bag la nyal dag la/ /'os pa'i chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /rgyal po'i bu de nga nyid de/ /blon po'i bu dag shAkya rnams/ /da lta bdag gis de dag la/ /
<p>294a.5</p>sho ya ma d+yA s+ye ShAM ma yA kr-i tAH/ /i ti shAkya ku mA rabr-it+ta me tat+ka thi taM b+hik+Shu ga NaHswa ya dzi ne na/ /a bi d+hAR+Ya pa rA ma pU dza yata tAM kA ru Na mA shri ta bat+sa l+ya s+ya ta s+ya/ /i ti k+She
<p>294a.6</p>gtong ba nyer bstan 'di slar byas/ /zhes pa shAkya gzhon nu rnams kyi sngon byung ni/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs pa de dag nges bzung ste/ /rten byed rnams la mnyes gshin ldan par gyur pa de'i/ /thugs rje de ni dge slong tshogs kyis rab tu mchod/ /ces pa dge ba'i
<p>294b</p>
<p>294b.1</p>men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM mU kA pad+g+wa ba dA na maSh+Ta trid+shaHpal+la waH// //te dza yan+ti d+h+r-i ti shA li naHpa raM nir+b+bi kA ra ru tsi sU bi tad+b+hU
<p>294b.2</p>dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las lkugs pa 'phye bo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //brtan pa'i khur gyis mi gdung lhag ma bzhin/ /legs byas bzod pa gang gi bzod
<p>294b.3</p>tAH/ /she Sha bta pr-i thu la b+hA ra Nir+b+ya thA ye ba han+ti su kr-i tak+ShamaHk+Sha mAM/ /pu ra pur+b+ba pu N+ya bi sad+ya se na ri suHpra dzA nAM dza ni ta pra kam+pa/ /u dum+bA nA mA ni bi Do pa tA yA yai ba kr-i ta k+Sha No d+hu ta/ /
<p>294b.4</p>pa 'dzin/ /rnam 'gyur med pa'i mdzes pa rmad byung bskyed/ /brtan ldan de dag mchog tu rgyal gyur cig /sngon gyi bsod nams phyin ci log pas sngon/ /gnod sbyin 'dir skyes skye rgu rnams kyi dgra/ /u dum pa zhes bya ba drag por ni/ /gdung bas 'jigs la dus byas bzhin du gyur/ /
<p>294b.5</p>a kA la kA laM ta ma nA tha ban+d+hu lo kA nu kam+pI b+ha ga bA na sa dz+ya/ /shik+Sho pa de shaM sha ra NaM pra pan+naM sha mA b+hi d+hA yI bi na ye n+ya yuk+ta/ /tasmin pra shAn+te b+hu ba no pa tA se dr-iSh+TaM pra hr-iSh+TaH su ga taM sa me t+ya/ /sany+tsa
<p>294b.6</p>'jig rten la brtse mgon med rnams kyi gnyen/ /bcom ldan zhi ba brjod pos 'phral la ni/ /dus min dus der bslab pa nyer bstan cing / /skyabs 'gro rab ldan 'dul ba dag la bkod/ /srid pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi ba de/ /bde gshegs de dus 'dzum skyes rgyu ba la/ /rab tu
<p>295a</p>
<p>295a.1</p>ri NaM nA ka pa tiHpra Na mya tat+kA la dzA tasmi ta mi t+yu bA tsa/ /kasmA da ta smi ta tsan+d+ra le khA mu khAm+bu dze b+hA ti ta bAd+b+hu tA ya/ /a kA ra NaM sa twa su d+hA sa mu dra na lo ka sa mA n+ya ta yA ha san+ti/ /
<p>295a.2</p>dga' bas lta ru 'ongs gyur pa/ /mtho ris bdag pos phyag 'tshal 'di skad smras/ /ci slad glo bur 'dzum pa'i zla ris kyis/ /khyod zhal chu skyes rmad byung slad du mdzes/ /snying stobs bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rgyu med du/ /'jig rten thun mong bzhin du bzhad ma lags/ /
<p>295a.3</p>shru twe ti bA kyaM tri da she shwa ra s+ya taM sar+b+ba daR+shI b+ha ga bAn ba b+hA She/ /asmin+p+ra de she ni dza pUr+b+ba br-it+taM smr-i twA smi taM dzA taM mi daM ma men+d+ra/ /pu ra mu niH k+ShAn+tirbA di ba nesmin nu bA pa nirbA si ta ro Sha do
<p>295a.4</p>skabs gsum dbang phyug tshig de thos gyur nas/ /bcom ldan thams cad gzigs pas der gsungs pa/ /phyogs 'dir rang gi sngon byung dran gyur nas/ /dbang po bdag la 'dzum pa 'di skyes so/ /sngon tshe nags tshal 'dir ni gnas gyur pa/ /khro ba'i skyon spangs thub pa bzod la
<p>295a.5</p>ShaH/ /yo\u0f85b+hUd+b+hu be rA ga ra dzaHswa b+hA be bi dwe Sha bA nin+du raM bA ra bin+de/ /a thot+ta rA shA d+hi pa tir+b+ba san+te ba nAn+ta rA lo ka na kau tu ke na/ /san+taHpu raHke li su khA ya kA mi ta dA shra yo pAn+ta ma hI ma
<p>295a.6</p>dga'/ /chags rdul rang bzhin srid la sdang ba gang / /pad+ma dag la zla ba bzhin du gyur/ /de nas dpyid ka byang phyogs bdag po ni/ /chags ldan btsun mo'i tshogs bcas rtse dga'i slad/ /nags kyi nang rnams blta zhing dge mtshan gyis/ /de yi bsti gnas nye ba'i sa gzhir
<p>295b</p>
<p>295b.1</p>bA pa/ /rA gI kA lirnA ma sa b+hU mi pA laH pA da pra hA rerba da na sa baish+tsa/ /le b+hi bi lA se Shu ni tam+bi nI nA ma sho ka sho b+hAM ba ku la shri yaH/ /di shasta po lo pa pr-i thu pra ko pa b+h+ru b+had+ga pr-in+dai ri ba ta pA sa nAM/ /
<p>295b.2</p>'ongs/ /chags ldan sa skyong rtsod ldan zhes pa des/ /rtse dga' la ni bud med rnams dag gis/ /rkang pas bsnun dang kha yi chang gis kyang / /mya ngan med mdzes ba ku la dpal thob/ /der ni phyogs rnams dka' thub pa rnams kyis/ /dka' thub nyams byed khro chen smin 'khyog gi/
<p>295b.3</p>ta tra b+h+ra mad+b+hir+b+ha rairba b+hu puHkA mag+ni d+hU mai ri ba sAn+d+ha kA rAH/ /li la pi lo lAHsa ba nA ku lA nAM stan ba na mrAHsta ba ka na tA nAM/ /rak+tA d+ha rAHsA Ta la pal+la bA nAM pra purbi lA saM la la nA la tA nAM/ /rA dzAng+ga
<p>295b.4</p>tshogs kyis bzhin dang 'dod me'i du bas bzhin/ /bur ba 'khor bas mun pa dang bcas gyur/ /rlung gis bskyod pa rtse dgas g.yo ba dang / /me tog phun bus dud pa nu mas sgu/ /yal 'dab dmar po dang ldan mchu sgros dmar/ /'khri shing rol rtsed bud med rnams kyis thob/ /rgyal
<p>295b.5</p>nAHko tu ka bi b+h+ra me Na pa ne tsa ran+t+yasta mr-i Shi bi lokya/ /a tsany+tsa la d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi sak+taM bi muk+ta rA gaM pa ri bAR+Ya tas+thuH/ /tad+de sha ma b+h+ye t+ya na re shwa ro\u0f85tha dr-iSh+T+wA ba d+hU b+hiHpa ri bA ri
<p>295b.6</p>po'i btsun mo dge mtshan rnam 'phrul la/ /nags su rgyu bas chags las rnam grol zhing / /g.yo med bsam gtan ting 'dzin la chags pa/ /drang srong de la yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /de nas mi dbang phyogs der mngon phyogs pas/ /bud med rnams kyis yongs bskor de
<p>296a</p>
<p>296a.1</p>taM taM/ /iR+Sh+yA pra ko pA na la durni rIk+Sh+yaH tsits+tshe da ta s+yA shu sa pA Ni pA daM/ /tshin+nAd+ga brgo bi sa nirbi kA rash+tsu ko pa b+hU pA ya nA ma d+hI raH/ /n+ya bA ra yata krud+d+ha ta rany+tsa tasmai gan+d+har+b+ha yak+Sho ra ga
<p>296a.2</p>mthong nas/ /phrag dog khro ba'i me ni blta dka' des/ /de yi lag pa rkang pa myur du bcad/ /brtan par rnam 'gyur med des yan lag tshogs/ /bcad kyang sa yi bdag la nges ma khros/ /dri za gnod sbyin lto 'phye lha tshogs kyis/ /de la khro ba drag po dag
<p>296a.3</p>de pa saM g+haH/ /ta taHpra yA te nr-i pa tau pu riM swaM sa me t+ya sar+b+be mu na yo ba ne b+h+yaH/ /taM ta tra krit+tA ba ya baM bi lokya k+ShAn+tA a bi kro d+ha d+hu tA ba b+hU buH/ /shA sa pra dA nA b+hi mu khAn ni bAR+Ya k+ShAn+ta bya mi t+ye ba sa tA nu bA
<p>296a.4</p>las bzlog /de nas mi bdag rang gi grong song tshe/ /nags nas 'ongs pa'i thub pa thams cad kyis/ /der ni yan lag bcad pa de mthong nas/ /bzod ldan dag kyang khro bas 'dar bar 'gyur/ /dmod pa 'debs la mngon phyogs de dag la/ /bzlog nas bzod par bya zhes de yis
<p>296a.5</p>tsa/ /k+Sha mA sa mA lid+gi ta mA na sA nAM ko pa kri yA b+hiH ya te na saM gaH/ /bi kA ra be go pi na pA Ni pA da ts+tshe de ma mA di bI ta ma n+yoH/ /sa t+ye na te nA k+Sha ta de ha e ba s+yA mi t+ya ba dI sa su naHpra
<p>296a.6</p>smras/ /bzod pas yang dag 'khyud pa'i yid ldan rnams/ /khro ba'i las kyis chags par mi byed do/ /khro bral bdag gi rkang lag bcad gyur kyang / /gal te rnam 'gyur shugs ldan ma gyur na/ /bden pa de yis nyams med lus ldan par/ /bdag gyur cig ces rab dang des
<p>296b</p>
<p>296b.1</p>sA dI/ /ta taHk+Sha NAta sad+ga ta pA Ni pA daM rU D+haM bra NaM ba t+ya sa do da ye na/ /a bU dza yata k+ShAn ti gu NaM sta be na taM de ba tA sa twa si taiSh+paiH/ /rA dzA pi tata kilbi Sha kA la ku Ta bi spo Ta saM g+haT+Ta bi na Sh+Ta
<p>296b.2</p>slar smras/ /de nas bden tshig brjod pas skad cig la/ /lag pa rkang pa 'byar zhing rma dag gsos/ /lha yis bzod pa'i yon tan de bstod cing / /snying stobs dkar ba'i me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /rgyal po'ang de sdig nag po brtsegs lta bus/ /chu bur gyis gtams spyod
<p>296b.3</p>tseSh+TaH/ /pU yot+ka tA bar+t+ta bi brta mA naHsaM bar+t+ta pA kaM na ra kaM dza gA ma/ /yo\u0f85b+hUt+pu rA k+ShAn+ti ra tir+m+ma haR+ShiHso\u0f85haM ka liR+Yash+tsa sa de ba dat+taH/ /a tI ta br-it+tasma ra Ne shakra nA kA ra NaM dzA ta mi
<p>296b.4</p>tshul rnam par nyams/ /rab drag rnag gi 'khor mor rnam 'khor zhing / /'jigs byed smin pa'i dmyal bar song bar gyur/ /bzod dka' drang srong chen por gang sngon byung / /nga nyid rtsod ldan gang de lha sbyin no/ /brgya byin 'das pa'i spyod tshul dran pa la/ /bdag gi 'dzum pa 'di
<p>296b.5</p>daM smi taM me/ /i tI b+ha ga ba taHshru twA bA kyaM bismi ya mA na saHpra ma da bi ka tsa byak+tot+sA hA ba han+na ya nA ma lIH/ /ta ra Ni ki ra Na spaR+she ne ba s+phu TaHka ma lA ka ra s+t+ri da sha ba sa tiM pri taHprA yA pa ti s+t+ri di
<p>296b.6</p>skyes rgyu med min/ /zhes pa bcom ldan gsung thos ya mtshan dag dang ldan pa'i yid/ /rab dga' rnam rgyas spros pas gsal ba'i spyan gyi phreng 'dzin cing / /nyi ma'i 'od zer reg pas pad+mo'i 'byung gnas rgyas pa bzhin/ /lha rnams bdag po dga' bas skabs gsum gnas su song
<p>297a</p>
<p>297a.1</p>bau ka sAM/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM k+ShAn+t+ya ba dA na mU nA tsa twA riM sha pal+la waH/ //a t+yan+ta mun+na ti ma tAM
<p>297a.2</p>bar gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las bzod pa la dga' ba'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //chen po khyad 'phags mtho ba rnams
<p>297a.3</p>ma ha tAM bi na sha do Sh+ya s+ya durdza nA sa mA ga ma e ba he tuH/ /kU la dru mAHki la pha la pra sa bai sa hai ba sa d+yaHba tan+ti dza la sang+ga ti b+hin+na mU lAH/ /ru tsi rA gA ra shA li n+yAM b+ha ga bAn pu
<p>297a.4</p>ni nyams par 'gyur ba yi/ /skyon gyi rgyu ni skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa kho na yin/ /'jug ngogs shing ni nges par 'bras bu skye bas lhan cig nyid/ /chu dang 'grogs pas rtsa ba phyung nas 'phral la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa sngon/ /chu bo yid 'ong ldan pa'i
<p>297a.5</p>rA/ /balgu ma t+yA ta Te na d+yA bi tsa tsA ra ta thA ga taH/ /ta s+yAHkai bar+t+ta sar+the na gam+b+hI rem+b+hA se dusta ra/ /ka dA tsid g+ho ra ma ka raHk+Shi p+t+wA dzA laM sa mud+d+h+r-i taH/ /aSh+TA da sha shi rAHsiM ha dwi pa dwI pa kha
<p>297a.6</p>ngogs/ /khang bzang mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ /yangs pa can na rnam par rgyu/ /nya pa'i tshogs kyis de yi chu/ /bsgral bar dka' zhing zab pa las/ /nam zhig rgya ni 'phangs pa na/ /'jigs rung chu srin yang dag 'thon/ /mgo bo bco brgyad seng ge dang / /gnyis 'thung stag dang
<p>297b</p>
<p>297b.1</p>rA na naH/ /nr-i NAM sa hA srai rA kr-iSh+TaHsar+b+ba tA kA ra bi gra haH/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA ta tra bi trastAHsrap+tA kaR+Sha Na radz+dza baH/ /Ash+tsaR+Ya nish+tsa la dA shA na ta s+thur+n+na ya yu k+Sha Ni/ /ga Na ni ga ha nAsh+tsaR+Ya bi she Sha sha ta shA li
<p>297b.2</p>bung bu'i bzhin/ /lus ni ri yi rnam pa can/ /mi ni stong phrag dag gis drangs/ /der ni de mthong rnam par skrag /'dren pa'i thag pa chad gyur cing / /ngo mtshar g.yo med nya pa rnams/ /skad cig sdod min 'gro ba min/ /'khor ba las kyis rnam bkra bar/ /rnam 'gyur ngo mtshar zab mo
<p>297b.3</p>nAM/ /saM sA re kar+m+ma bai tsi t+r+ye bi kA rA NAM ka ro ti kaH/ /a tran+ta re ta mud+de shaM b+ha ga bAn b+hU ta b+hA ba naH/ /dzi naHsa mA ya yau sar+b+ba dza na trA Na kr-i ta k+Sha NaH/ /sa brad+d+ha bA la la la naM dza naM kau tu ka saM ga taM/ /dr-iSh+T+wA
<p>297b.4</p>ni/ /brgya dang ldan pa'i khyad par rnams/ /su zhig gis ni rtsi bar byed/ /skabs der de yi ched du ni/ /'byung po dgongs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /skye bo thams cad skyob pa la/ /dus mdzad rgyal ba yang dag byon/ /rgan po byis pa bud med bcas/ /ltad mo la 'tshogs skye bo dag /bcom
<p>297b.5</p>ta tra ka rot+tI re b+ha ga bA nA sa na gra haM/ /b+hik+Shu saM g+haiH pa ri br-i taM dr-iSh+T+wA ta tra ta thA ga taM/ /dza no b+hUt+ton+mu khaHsar+b+baHpra t+yA br-it+ta i bo da d+hiH/ /taM bi lo kyai ba bi na tAHke
<p>297b.6</p>ldan gyis gzigs 'jug ngogs der/ /stan ni yongs su bzung ba mdzad/ /dge slong tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa der mthong nas/ /chu gter phyir la log pa bzhin/ /skye bo thams cad der phyogs gyur/ /de mthong nyid kyi 'phral la ni/ /nya pa rnam
<p>298a</p>
<p>298a.1</p>bar+t+tA pra Ni ban+d+ha naM/ /bi shA laM dzA laM sa ha sA saM sA ra mi ba ta t+ya dzuH/ /mat+s+ya kum+b+hI ra na krA di saM b+hA raM tad+gi rAM b+ha si/ /t+yak+t+wA te bi ra ta ko sa ba b+hU buHkilpi Sha dwi ShaH/ /tair+n+ya staM b+ha ga bAn dr-iSh+TA ma hA ma
<p>298a.2</p>par dud pa yis/ /srog chags 'ching ba yangs pa'i rgyal/ /'khor ba lta bu btang bar gyur/ /de yi gsung gis chu la nya/ /chu srin na kra la sogs tshogs/ /btang nas de dag khro bral bas/ /sdig pa yi ni dgra bor gyur/ /de dag gis bkod chu srin che/ /mdun du bcom
<p>298a.3</p>ka ra ma gra taH/ /taM dza gA da sr-i dza d+da n+ta kAn+t+ye ba ka ru Na na diM/ /a pi twaM ka bi laH pu tra kin+na sma ra si duHkr-i taM/ /pa tso dush+tsa ri ta s+yA ya ma pi bA ko\u0f85nu b+hU ya te/ /sA s+ya ka l+yA Na mi tran+te dza na ne kwA d+ya bar+t+ta te/ /sar+b+ba
<p>298a.4</p>ldan gyis gzigs nas/ /tshems kyi mdzes pa snying rje yi/ /chu bo spro bzhin de la smras/ /bu kye ser skya khyod kyis ni/ /nyes pa byas pa mi dran nam/ /'di yang dag gis nyes spyad dag /smin pa nyams su myong ba yin/ /khyod kyi mi dge'i grogs gyur pa/ /ma de da lta gang na gnas/ /thams
<p>298a.5</p>dz+nye ne t+ya bi hi taHsmr-i twA dzA ti mu bA tsa saH/ /bi b+ho b+ha bA mi ka pi laHsma rA mi ni dza duH kr-i taM/ /ba tso dush+tsa ri ta s+yA yaM pa ri pA ko nu b+hU ya te/ /dzA tA me na ra kAM de tA na ra kA de shi nI pu raH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA
<p>298a.6</p>cad mkhyen pas 'di brjod tshe/ /de yis skye ba dran nas smras/ /khyab bdag bdag ni ser skya yin/ /rang gis nyes pa byas pa dran/ /ngag gis nyes byas yongs smin pa/ /'di ni nyams su myong bar gyur/ /dmyal ba ston byed bdag gi ma/ /sngon du dmyal ba dag tu skyes/ /zhes pa smras
<p>298b</p>
<p>298b.1</p>ma ma kasta tra ru ro da pa ru Sha swa raM/ /taM sho ka sA ga re mag+naM ba b+hA She b+ha ga bAn pu naH/ /a kA le kiM ka ro mya d+ya ni ga ta s+ya te/ /a pu N+ya prA ram+b+he ra b+ha sa ha si tol+lA sa bi hi ti pra matA
<p>298b.2</p>nas chu srin der/ /nga ro drag pos rab tu dus/ /mya ngan rgya mtshor bying de la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas song khyod la/ /dus min de ring ci zhig bgyi/ /bag med rnams kyi bsod nams min pa'i rab tu rtsom pa gzu lums dag/ /dgod cing rangs
<p>298b.3</p>nAM yA te na ra ka pa ri sA ka pra Na yi tAM/ /a shAn+taH san+tA paM ru di ta sha ra NA nAM pra ti ni shaM b+h+r-i shaM kla shA bi shairdi sha ti bi Sha tu l+yai ra nu sha yaH/ /k+Sha Na duH kha k+Sha yA yai ba ma yi tsit+taM pra sA da
<p>298b.4</p>pas bsgrubs pa dmyal bar yongs su smin la chags gyur tshe/ /nyon mongs 'bebs pa dug dang mtshungs pa'i rjes su 'gyod pa ma zhi bas/ /du la skyabs gnas rnams la mtshan mo so sor mchog tu gdung bar byed/ /sdug bsngal skad cig gis 'jig slad/ /bdag la sems ni dang
<p>298b.5</p>ya/ /pra san+na mA na saHkA le yA s+ya pi tri da shA la yaM/ /shr-i Nu bat+sa hi tany+tse daM bi tsAR+Ya ku ru tse ta si/ /a ni t+yAHsar+b+ba saM skA rAHshAn+ti nir+b+bA Na ma k+Sha yaM/ /i t+yA dz+nya yA b+ha ga ba tasta smin yA te pra
