<p>298b.6</p>bar byos/ /dang ba'i yid kyis dus byas nas/ /lha yi gnas su khyod bgrod 'gyur/ /mnyes gshin phan pa 'di yang nyon/ /rnam par dpyod la yid la gyis/ /'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing / /zhi ba myang 'das 'jig pa med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' 'di yis/ /de ni rab dang gyur
<p>299a</p>
<p>299a.1</p>san+na taM/ /dza na saM g+haHsa su tsi raM ba b+hU bAsh+tsaR+Ya nish+tsalaH/ /AR+YA nan+daHpra Na yi nA dza ne nA b+h+yar+thi tasta taH/ /tabUr+b+ba br-it+taM pa prats+tsha b+ha ga ban+taM kr-i tAny+dza liH/ /sa te na pr-iSh+Ta pro
<p>299a.2</p>pa'i tshe/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyang yun ring du/ /ngo mtshar g.yo ba med par gyur/ /de nas skye bos gus par ni/ /gsol btab 'phags pa kun dga' bos/ /bcom ldan 'das la thal sbyar byas/ /de yi sngon byung rab tu dris/ /de yis dris la ye shes
<p>299a.3</p>bA tsa bi ma la dz+nyA na lo tsa naH/ /a s+yA ku sha la shI la s+ya pr-it+tAn+taHshru ya tA ma yaM/ /b+ha dra kA khye su ra kalpe baR+ShA yu ta yu gA yu Shi/ /dza ne ba b+hU ba b+ha ga bAn kA sh+ya pA khyasta thA ga taH/ /kr-i kIrnA ma ma hI pA
<p>299a.4</p>spyan/ /dri med de yis rab tu gsungs/ /sdig pa'i ngang tshul 'di yi ni/ /byung ba'i mtha' 'di mnyan par gyis/ /bskal ba bzang po dag la sngon/ /skye bo tshe lo khri phrag zung / /thub tshe bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /'od srungs zhes pa byung bar gyur/ /bA rA Na sIr de dus su/ /
<p>299a.5</p>laHkalpa shA la i bAr+thi nI/ /a b+ha bat+sa ma ye tasmin bA rA Na s+yAm+ba hu pra daH/ /ka dA tsing+bi bu d+hA s+thA ne sa ha srAk+Sha mi pa pA raM/ /A sI naM bA di siM hA khya taM bid+bA nA ya yau dwi dzaH/ /a bi lam+bi ta saM prAp+ta
<p>299a.6</p>sa skyong kr-i kI zhes bya ba/ /slong ba'i dpag bsam shing lta bu/ /mang po rab tu ster ba byung / /nam zhig mkhas pa'i gnas su ni/ /mig stong gzhan pa bzhin du gnas/ /der ni gnyis skyes rig byed ldan/ /smra ba'i seng ge zhes pa 'ongs/ /thogs pa min par phrad pa dang / /
<p>299b</p>
<p>299b.1</p>daR+sha nA sa na sat+k+r-i tiH/ /sa ta dA shIr+n+na ra pa tiM shi Sh+ya sre Ni br-i to bya d+hAta/ /swasti swasti ma te bu d+hA d+hI pa sa b+ha ya tu b+h+yaM bi b+ho lub+d+hAHsa ts+tsa ri tA mr-i te ta ba pa raM sa n+daR+sha ne rA gi
<p>299b.2</p>stan dang bsnyen bkur yang dag thob/ /slob ma'i 'phreng bas bskor ba des/ /de tshe rgyal la shis brjod pa/ /khyab bdag mkhas pa'i bdag po mdun sar 'dug 'os shis ldan khyod ni shis gyur cig /khyod kyi legs spyod bdud rtsi dag la mchog tu sred ldan yang dag blta la
<p>299b.3</p>NaH/ /sa dwe ShAHpa ra b+hU pa nAm+ni mu kha rAsta gu No dI ra Ne\u0f85kasmata sar+b+ba gu Na shra me Na b+ha ba tA do Shairba yaM yo dzi tAM/ /yad+yA tsa kA a pi ni ran+ta ra rat+na baR+She nA nAr+thi sAr+tha pa ri pU ra ka
<p>299b.4</p>chags/ /sa bdag gzhan gyi ming la sdang ldan yon tan brjod la mu cor che bar sgrogs/ /yon tan kun gyi rten gnas khyod kyis glo bur nyid du bdag la skyon rnams sbyar/ /gang zhig slong ba rnams kyang bar med rin chen char phab pas/ /sna tshogs slong ba'i don mthun yongs su
<p>299b.5</p>tAM prA yAn+ti/ /sarbaM b+ha bA nu sa ma puN+ya ni d+he ba dA n+ya nirdai n+ya dA na bi b+ha ba s+ya bi dz+w-im+b+hi taM twata/ /rA dza na kiny+tsi ta pa ri tsi ta gu NaiHse ba yA sad+gu ru b+h+yaH prAp+tasmA b+hirbi bu d+ha
<p>299b.6</p>tshim par byed gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad gtong phod dang ldan mtshungs med bsod nams gter/ /khyod kyi sbyin pa bkren med 'byor pa'i rnam par 'phel ba yin/ /rgyal po yon tan cung zad yongs su 'dris pa bdag gi bla ma dam pa dag /bsten las mkhas pa rgyal byed
<p>300a</p>
<p>300a.1</p>bi dza yi ko pi bi d+yAM sha le shaH/ /a s+yAM bi dwad ka ma la b+ha ra so mya pra b+hA sa b+hA yAM ta s+yot+kaR+ShaM ka ti pa ya pa daM pra t+ya yaM daR+sha ya maH/ /ni dza gu Na ga Na ne d+hIr+l+ladz+dza te sadz+dza nA nAM mu kha ra ya ti ta
<p>300a.2</p>rig pa'i cha yi cha shas ci yang thob/ /yid 'ong mkhas pa'i pad+ma'i tshogs kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i mdun sa 'dir/ /de yi tshig ni phul du byung ba'i yid ches 'ga' zhig bdag gis bstan/ /skye bo dam pa'i blo ni rang gi yon tan brtsir ngo tsha/ /de lta na yang smra 'dod drag
<p>300a.3</p>thA bi pro D+ha bA dA b+hi lA ShaH/ /i ya ti dza ga ti rA dzan k+Shi pra ma n+wi Sh+ya tAM me pra ti ba tsa na ru tsish+tse dasti kash+tsid+bi pash+tsita/ /san+dar+b+hargar+b+ha gam+b+hi ra mi ti ta s+yot+ka Tam+ba tsaH/ /shru twA k+Shi ti pa tiH k+Shi praM bi lak+ShaH sa ma tsin+ta
<p>300a.4</p>pos mu cor sgrog tu bcug /rgyal po 'gro 'di dag na bdag gi tshig lan la sred pa'i/ /gal te mkhas pa yod na myur ba nyid du brtag par gyis/ /zhes pa de yi gzhung gi tshig /drag por snyems shing zab pa dag /thos nas sa yi bdag po ni/ /skyengs pas myur bar yang dag
<p>300a.5</p>yad/ /a prAp+ta pra ti mal+lo yaM ya di yA yata ma dod+d+ha taH/ /ta de Sha ma ma de sha s+ya ya shaHkhaN+Da na DiN+Di maH/ /gu NA ba mA na kr-iR+Ya tra mUr+kho b+ha ba ti b+hU pa tiH/ /na ka ro ti dza nasta tra bi d+yAdz+dza na pa ri shra maM/ /bi
<p>300a.6</p>bsams/ /gal te lan ni ma thob par/ /rgyags shing 'phyar 'di song gyur na/ /de lta na ni bdag yul gyi/ /grags pa min pa sgrog pa'i rnga/ /gang nas bdag blun por gyur/ /yon tan can rnams dman par byed/ /de na skye bo rig byed la/ /yongs su ngal ba byed ma yin/ /sa
<p>300b</p>
<p>300b.1</p>be ka bi ma la lo ke d+har+m+mA rA me ma hi pa tau/ /lo ke bi d+yAHpra bar+t+tan+te sa dA tsA ra kri ya i ba/ /tasmA da s+ya pra yat+ne na kar+t+ta byo ma da ni gra haH/ /bi d+yA da ri dra tA de she do Sha e ba baM shAM pa tiH/ /i ti
<p>300b.2</p>bdag chos kyi kun dga' ra/ /dri med dben pa'i snang ba can/ /'jig rten rig byed la 'jug ste/ /dam pa'i bya ba'i spyod la bzhin/ /de slad 'di yi rgyags pa ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas tshar gcad bya/ /yul ni rig byed kyis dbul ba/ /rigs kyi bdag po nyid kyi skyon/ /de ltar
<p>300b.3</p>sany+tsin+t+ya nr-i pa tirbi pra kar+b+ba Ta bA si naM/ /A ni nA ya ma hA mA t+yai ra n+wi Sh+ya bi du ShAM gu ruM/ /b+hU b+h+r-ita sa b+ha mu sA d+h+yA yaH pra t+ya ta tar+k+ka tar+k+ka shaH/ /tsa kA ra bA di siM ha s+ya dar+b+ba ke sha ra kar+t+ta naM/ /ta s+ya
<p>300b.4</p>bsams nas mi bdag gis/ /bram ze kar pa Tar gnas pa/ /mkhas pa'i bla ma rnam dpyad nas/ /blon po chen pos 'gugs su bcug /mkhan po rtog ge rno ldan pa/ /sa bdag mdun sa der 'ongs nas/ /smra ba'i seng ge dregs pa yi/ /ral pa dag ni chad par byas/ /myur
<p>300b.5</p>te na dzi ta s+yA shu bi dzi tA she Sha pA di naH/ /mau na mu traM sa ma pe re ladz+dzi te ba sa ra swa tI/ /A rU D+hAHpra b+h+ra ma ha saM nak+Sha trA NA mi bo da yAH/ /u p+Yu ri draM Sh+yan+te gu Narkor+Sha ma nI Shi NAM/ /bA di
<p>300b.6</p>bar smra ba ma lus las/ /rnam rgyal de yis pham pa de'i/ /dbyangs can ngo tshar gyur pa bzhin/ /smra bcad rgya ni yang dag thob/ /skar ma rnams ni 'char ba bzhin/ /mkhas pa gzi byin che rnams kyis/ /yon tan khyad 'phags la gnas pa/ /gong nas gong du mthong ba yin/ /de nas
<p>301a</p>
<p>301a.1</p>siM haM bi sr-i dz+yA tha da twA b+hU ri d+ha naM nr-i paH/ /da dau dwi dzA ya dza yi ne kar+b+ba TaM na ga ro pa maM/ /lab+d+ha rA dza ga dzA shwo\u0f85tha tsA ru ke yU rA kaM ka NaMH/ /u pA d+h+yA yaHswa b+ha ba naM pra bi be sha sa ha shri yA/ /b+hU dzAr+dz+dzi
<p>301a.2</p>nor mang mi bdag gis/ /byin nas smra ba'i seng ge btang / /grong khyer lta bu kar pa Ta/ /gnyis skyes rgyal ba dag la byin/ /de nas rgyal las glang po rta/ /dpung rgyan gdu bu mdzes pa thob/ /mkhan po dpal dang lhan cig tu/ /rang gi khyim du rab tu zhugs/ /rgyal po'i
<p>301a.3</p>tA mi b+hU dzAM ba ni dzAM sA ga rAr+dz+dzi tA/ /bi d+yA ba tI bi rA dzan+te gu Not+ka R+ShAr+dz+dzi tAHshri yaH/ /kA len shraM ma dasta s+ya pu tra dzan+motsha bo b+ha bta/ /su khe pi su kha saM pat+tir+l+la k+Sha NaM pu N+ya kar+m+ma
<p>301a.4</p>dpung pas bsgrubs pa dang / /tshong pas rgya mtsho nas bsgrubs dang / /mkhas pa'i yon tan khyad 'phags kyis/ /bsgrubs pa'i dpal ni rnam par mdzes/ /dus kyis dpal dang ldan pa de/ /bu skyes kun tu dga' bar gyur/ /bde la'ang bde ba phun tshogs pa/ /bsod nams las kyi mtshan
<p>301a.5</p>NaM/ /ka pi lo nA ma sa shi shuste dzaH ping+gaM shi ro ru haH/ /bar+d+ha ma nA ma tir+b+bi dwa na pi tu ra b+h+ya d+hi ko\u0f85b+ha bta/ /ku le ma hA ti bai du Sh+yaM bai duSh+ye bi b+ha bod+b+ha baH/ /bi b+ha be sat+su ta t+koR+ShaHpha laM su kr-i ta sha khi
<p>301a.6</p>nyid yin/ /skra ni ser skya gzi byin can/ /ser skya zhes bya byis pa de/ /cher skyes shin tu mkhas pa ni/ /pha las mngon par lhag par gyur/ /rigs brgyud chen po dag la mkhas/ /mkhas pa la ni 'byor pa rgyas/ /'byor la khyad 'phags dam pa'i bu/ /legs byas yal ga ldan
<p>301b</p>
<p>301b.1</p>naH/ /ka dA tsita byA d+hi saM yo gAta pra t+yA san+n+ta nu k+Sha yaH/ /bi dza ne pu tra mA ha ya so\u0f85ba bta pu tra bat+sa laH/ /bA l+ye gu NArdza naM pu tra tA ru N+ye dra bi NAr+dz+dza naM/ /ma ya kr-i taM na tu pu naHpa ra lo ka su
<p>301b.2</p>pa'i 'bras/ /nam zhig nad kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lus ni 'jig la nye ba na/ /skye bo med sar bu bos nas/ /bu la mnyes gshen des smras pa/ /bdag gis gzhon la yon tan bsgrubs/ /dar la babs tshe nor zas bsgrubs/ /bu gcig 'jig rten pha rol gyi/ /bde bsgrub slar
<p>301b.3</p>khArdza naM/ /ut+ta mar+N+Na i ba prap+te kA le su ga Ni tA ba d+hau/ /a d+hu nA bi ba shaHkwA haM kwa sA bi d+yA kwa tad+d+ha naM/ /gu Na puSh+pe su kha pa le bar+d+ha mu la d+ha nairdza ne/ /ba ne badzra i bA kA la kA laHpa ta
<p>301b.4</p>yang byas pa med/ /mtshams ni legs par bgrangs pa'i dus/ /bu lon pa bzhin 'ongs pa'i tshe/ /da ni 'khrugs te bdag gang na/ /rigs de gang na nor gang na/ /yon tan me tog bde 'bras ldan/ /nor gyi rtsa bcings skye bo yis/ /nags su dus min rdo rje bzhin/ /bzod dka'i
<p>301b.5</p>ti duH sa haH/ /k+Sha pa ya ti sa ka lA bir+dz+dzan+ma bi d+yA ka lA b+hiHk+Sha Ni ka su kha ni mit+taM san+ni d+hat+te tsa bit+taM/ /pa shu shi shu Shu ma nuSh+yaHpri ya te mo ha shi Sh+yaHta nu bi ra ha mu hUr+t+te sar+b+ba me n+ya ta sa tsA n+yaH/ /i
<p>301b.6</p>dus ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /mtha' dag rig dang sgyu rtsal rnams kyis skye ba 'phen byed cing / /skad cig bde ba'i rgyur ni nor rnams rab tu 'dzin par byed/ /rmongs pa'i slob ma mi rnams phyugs dang bu la dga' bar byed/ /lus 'bral yud tsam dag la thams cad gzhan te de yang gzhan/ /mdza'
<p>302a</p>
<p>302a.1</p>tan+tu te hi taM bats+mi sne ha mo ha ba shI kr-i taH/ /saM sA ra sA ra sa ra NaM bat+sa bitshi ba hu shru taH/ /san+taH pra Na myAHpa ru ShaM na ba ts+yaM kAR+Ya pra yat+ne na pa ro pa ka raH/ /pA pA ba pA te sa ta tAM hi puM sA
<p>302a.2</p>ba rmongs pas dbang byas bdag /khyod la phan pas 'di brjod do/ /mnyes gshin mang du thos pa las/ /'khor ba'i snying po'i lam rig bya/ /dam par phyag bya rtsub por smra mi bya/ /rab tu 'bad pas gzhan la phan pa bya/ /skyes bu sdig pa'i g.yang sar lhung rnams
<p>302a.3</p>me tA ni puN+yA n+ya ba lam+ba nA ni/ /a lo b+ha sho b+hA b+ha ra NA bi b+hU tir dwe Sha sak+tiHswa su khe Sh+wa mo haH/ /mU la tra yesmin ku sha la dru ma s+ya ba sa t+ya she ShA khi la sat+pha la shriH/ /yA bat+ta pa ti tIk+Sh+NAM shu rasmi b+hu
<p>302a.4</p>kyis/ /bsod nams 'di dag rnams ni brten sa yin/ /'byor pa dag la ma chags mdzes pas brgyan/ /sdang med stobs dang rang bde la ma rmongs/ /rtsa ba gsum po 'di la dge ba'i shing / /'bras bu dam pa'i dpal ldan ma lus gnas/ /ji srid sa yi dkyil 'khor dag /tsha zer
<p>302a.5</p>ba na maN+Da le/ /tA bat+t+wata sa dr-i shaHpu tra bi dwAn bA dI bi d+ya te/ /b+hik+Shu b+histu na kar+t+ta bya s+t+wa yA bA daHka dA tsa na/ /gam+b+hI ra dz+nyA na durbo d+ha pra bud+d+ha baud+d+ha bud+d+ha yaH/ /pu rA b+hik+Shur+m+ma yA pr-iSh+TaHpa da s+yAr+thaM dza
<p>302a.6</p>gyis gdungs de srid ba/ /'di na bu khyod mtshungs pa yi/ /mkhas pa smra ba po yod min/ /khyod kyis nam gyi dus na yang / /dge slong rnams la rtsod mi bya/ /sangs rgyas pa yi blo rab rgyas/ /ye shes zab cing rtogs par dka'/ /dge slong la sngon tshig gi don/ /bdag gis dris tshe
<p>302b</p>
<p>302b.1</p>hA sa mAM/ /prash+naM kartuM na dzA nI She bi dwA ni ti dza gA da tsa/ /tasmAd b+hik+Shu bi pA daste pa raM paN+Di t+ya pI Da naM/ /ba la pra b+hA ba kA mo hi gi riM mUr+d+h+nA na tA Da yeta/ /i t+yuk+t+wA ta na yaM bi praHpa ra lo ka b+hu baM ya
<p>302b.2</p>bdag la bshad/ /mkhas pa khyod kyi dri ba dag /bya ba mi shes shes pa'ang smras/ /de slad dge slong la rtsod na/ /khyod mkhas mchog tu zhum par 'gyur/ /gang phyir stobs mthu 'dod pa yis/ /ri la spyi bos brdung mi bya/ /bu la des smras bram ze ni/ /'jig rten pha rol sa la
<p>302b.3</p>yau/ /kA yA ba sa tha sAn+thA nAM de hi nAM na tsi raM s+thi tiH/ /bAg+mI kA le na ka pi laHkhaN+Di tA khi la paN+Di taH/ /nr-i pAd+ba hu gu NaM pra pa d+ha na mA na ma ho da yaMH/ /ta taHka dA tsi de kAn+te ka pi laM kA tsa rA
<p>302b.4</p>song / /lus kyi khang par lus can gyi/ /'gron rnams ring por mi gnas so/ /dus kyis smra mkhas ser skya ni/ /mkhas pa ma lus nyams byed pa/ /yon tan mang pos rgyal po las/ /nor dang mchod chen rgyas pa thob/ /de nas nam zhig ser skya ni/ /rgol ba'i rgyal srid
<p>302b.5</p>b+hid+hA/ /saM prAp+ta bA di sA mrA dz+yaM dza gA da dza na nI sha naiH/ /bA dirdar+p+pa ts+tshi dA pu tra dig dwI pa dza yi nA twa yA/ /durdza nAHshra ma NAHkasmAd+dar+pAr+d+hAHpa ri bar+dz+dzi taH/ /pa rot+kaR+ShA d+hi rU D+ha s+ya pra ti pak+ShA+e k+Sha
<p>302b.6</p>thob pa la/ /dben par dal bus rang gi ma/ /ka tsa ra zhes bya bas smras/ /rgol ba'i dregs pa gcod pa'i bu/ /phyogs dang gling las rgyal ba khyed/ /dge slong ngan pa dregs pa yis/ /long rnams ci slad yongs su gtong / /gzhan las khyad 'phags la zhen cing / /mi mthun dag la
<p>303a</p>
<p>303a.1</p>mA ra te/ /a k+Sha mo ya mi ti byak+t+yaM k+Sha Ne nak+ShI ya te ya shaH/ /i ti mA tur+b+ba tsa shru twA so\u0f85ba dad+bi du ShA ba tsaH/ /na bA daM shra ma NeHkAR+YaHpi tra ha mi ti bA ri taH/ /i yaM durdzI bi kAsmA
<p>303a.2</p>bzod dka' ba/ /'dis mi bzod ces skad cig gis/ /gsal bar grags pa nyams par gyur/ /zhes pa ma yi tshig thos nas/ /mkhas pa'i mchog des rab smras pa/ /dge slong rnams la rtsod mi bya/ /zhes de bdag gi pha yis bzlog /gang gis yon tan ldan
<p>303a.3</p>kaM pa tra lam+ba na bA di nAM/ /kr-i ya te gu Na mA n+yA nAM mA na m+lA nirmu khe ya yA/ /d+hi ge tats+tsaN+Da pAN+Di t+yaM gu ru bi dwe Sha duHsa haM/ /ma ha tAM su kha b+hang+gA ya sa dA yasmin sa mud+ya maH/ /ya s+yAM na mA yA sA
<p>303a.4</p>rnams kyis/ /kha la mchod pa dman par byed/ /yi ge 'debs byed smra ba po/ /bdag cag 'tsho thabs 'di yang ngan/ /chen po rnams kyi bde gzhom slad/ /rtag tu gang zhig rab brtson pa/ /bla ma la sdang bzod dka' ba'i/ /mkhas pa gtum po 'di dag smad/ /gang zhig g.yo sgyu med de
<p>303a.5</p>bud+d+hiHsA shrIrlo b+haM ni han+ti yA/ /dar+p+po na ya s+ya bi R+YA sA k+Sha ma ba tI/ /e ba me ba na kar+t+ta byaHsa rer+b+bi dre Sha bi gra haH/ /ki pu nardza ga tAM pU dz+yar+b+hi k+Shu b+hiHkhyA ta lak+Sh+ma b+hiH/ /bi dzit+tuM na tsa te shAkyaH
<p>303a.6</p>blo/ /gang zhig chags pa bcom de dpal/ /gang zhig dregs pa med de rig /gang zhig bzod pa ldan de stobs/ /de lta nyid du gzhan rnams dang / /sdang bas rtsod par mi bya na/ /'gro bas mchod 'os dge slong ni/ /grags pas mtshon dang smos ci dgos/ /tshad mas yongs nges de dag
<p>303b</p>
<p>303b.1</p>pra mA Na pa ri niSh+Thi tAH/ /pra ti pak+Shai ra bik+Shi p+taM ye ShAM nai rAt+m+ya shA sa naM/ /i ti pu tra ba tsa shru twA ku pi tA ta mU ba tsa sA/ /a b+hUt+ta ba pi tA nU naM pA pa shra ma Na tseT kaH/ /ma ha ti brAh+ma Na ku le dzA ta prA
<p>303b.2</p>las/ /rgyal bar yang ni mi nus te/ /gang zhig bdag med bstan pa rnams/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis yongs mi skyod/ /ces pa bu yi tshig thos nas/ /khros te de yis de la smras/ /khyod kyi pha ni sdig pa can/ /dge sbyong 'bangs gyur ma yin nam/ /bram ze'i rigs ni che bar skyes/ /mang du
<p>303b.3</p>dz+nyo ba hu shru taH/ /b+hik+Shu pak+She ni pa ti taHka thaM twa ma bi tA dr-i shaH/ /pr-i thu pra mA Na khad+ge na ku ru shra ma Na ni gra haM/ /a bi dAR+YA b+h+ra saM g+ha taM tik+Sh+NA shur+n+na bi rA dza te/ /i ti sa pre ri to mA turgi
<p>303b.4</p>thos pas shes rab ldan/ /dge slong phyogs su lhung gyur pa/ /khyod kyang de dang mtshungs sam ci/ /tshad ma'i ral gri chen po yis/ /dge slong rnams ni tshar gcad mdzod/ /sprin gyi tshogs rnams ma bcom na/ /tsha zer byed pa mi mdzes so/ /zhes pa ma yi tshig gis bskul/ /
<p>303b.5</p>rA tad+b+hak+ti yan+t+ri taH/ /b+hik+Shu NA mA shra ma pa daM sha nairgan+tuM sa yau/ /bra dza na sa saM mu khA yA taM b+hik+Shurdzi dz+nyA sa yA ba thi/ /gran+tha pA raM pra mA Nany+tsas prats+tsha sa ma yo tsi taM/ /sa te na pr-iSh+TaHpro bA tsa
<p>303b.6</p>de la gus pas bsdams pa des/ /dge slong rnams kyis bsti gnas su/ /dal bus 'gro bar yang dag brtsams/ /de nas bgrod pas shes 'dod nas/ /lam du dge slong 'ong ba la/ /gzhung gi snying po tshad ma yang / /dus su 'os pa yang dag dris/ /des dris de yis rab smras pa/ /sgra
<p>304a</p>
<p>304a.1</p>gU D+ha shap+dAr+tha nir+N+Na yaM/ /lak+Sha tra yaH pra mA NaM naHshAs+t+raM tIr+m+ri ka dur+l+la b+haM/ /ku taHsa rA ni bar+t+tan+te kwa tsa bar+t+ma ni brtan+te/ /su kha duHkhe tsa lo ka s+ya kwa tsi ta ma bi ba d+ha taH/ /i ti gam+b+hI
<p>304a.2</p>don nges par sbas gyur pa/ /nged kyi tshad ma 'bum phrag gsum/ /bstan bcos mu stegs dag la dkon/ /mtsho ni gangs las ldog 'gyur zhing / /lam ni gangs las ldog par 'gyur/ /gang du 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang / /bde ba yang ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /zhes pa bcom
<p>304a.3</p>ra shap+dAr+thaM shAstur+b+ha ga ba to ba tsaH/ /a nu pA si ta sar+b+ba dz+nyair+dz+nyA ya te na ya thA ta thA/ /e ta dA kar+N+ya ka pi laHsh+lau ka gam+b+hIR+Ya bi smi taH/ /ya yau b+ha ga ba taHpu N+yaM kA sh+ya pa s+ya ta po ba naM/ /ta tra b+hik+Shu ga NaM dr-iSh+T+wA
<p>304a.4</p>ldan ston pa yi/ /gsung gi sgra don zab mo dag /thams cad mkhyen pa la brten pas/ /ji lta de ltar shes ma yin/ /de dag thos nas ser skya ni/ /tshigs bcad zab mos ya mtshan te/ /bcom ldan 'od srungs bdag gis ni/ /dka' thub nags tshal gtsang mar song / /der ni dge slong tshogs
<p>304a.5</p>pra san+na hr-i da yA na naH/ /a tsin+ta yat+ta da shrad+d+hAM bi hA ya ga ta mat+sa raH/ /e te ShAM dwe ShA kA lu Sh+yata krauR+YaM kaHkartu mar+ha ti/ /ye ShAM san+daR+sha nai ba bai ma l+yaM la b+ha te ma na/ /i ti sany+tsin+t+ya sa tsi ra tad+pi bA
<p>304a.6</p>mthong nas/ /de la ma dad rab spangs te/ /snying dang bzhin ras rab dang zhing / /phrag dog bral bas rab tu bsams/ /gang zhig yang dag mthong nyid na/ /yid ni dri ma med thob pa/ /sdang ba'i rnyog pas de dag la/ /gdug pa bya bar su yis 'os/ /de ltar de yis yun ring bsams/ /de dang
<p>304b</p>
<p>304b.1</p>da pa rAt+mu khaH/ /dU rA d+hA khin+naHswa gr-i haM ga twA pro bA tsa mA ta raM/ /mi th+ye bA haM twa yA mA tAH pre ri tAHka li karma Ni/ /a dza ma NA lo ke gA D+hAr+thA gran+tha bA de naH/ /sh+lo ka mA traM ma yA shru twA b+hik+Sho re ka s+ya
<p>304b.2</p>rtsod las phyir phyogs te/ /lam ring gis dub rang khyim du/ /phyin nas ma la rab smras pa/ /ma ma rtsod pa'i las la nga / /khyod kyis bskul ba rdzun nyid do/ /don sbas gzhung smra dge sbyong las/ /'jig rten du ni rgyal mi nus/ /lam du dge slong gcig gi ni/ /tshigs bcad tsam zhig
<p>304b.3</p>bar+t+ma niH/ /a dz+nyA tAr+the na bai lak+Sh+ya ta su tsi raM bIk+Shi tA+o k+Shi tiH/ /tang+g+ran+the Sh+wa kr-i tA b+h+yA sastA na bak+tuM kaHpra gam+b+ha te/ /ka tha yan+ti swa shAs+t+raM te na hi pra bra dzi tA dr-i te/ /i ti te no di taM shru twA dza na nI ta ma b+hA Sha
<p>304b.4</p>bdag gis thos/ /don ma shes pas skyengs gyur te/ /shin tu yun ring sa la bltas/ /de yi gzhung la goms ma byas/ /su yis de la smra bar spobs/ /de dag rab byung min pa la/ /rang gi bstan bcos 'chad mi byed/ /ces pa de yis brjod thos nas/ /ma yis de la rab smras
<p>304b.5</p>ta/ /A yA pi tA haM b+ha ba tA gar+b+hA re Na ke ba laM/ /saM g+haR+ShA maR+ShA shU n+ye na dai n+yA ta sar+b+ba pra NA mi nA/ /d+haR+Sha NA nir+b+bi maR+She Na kri ya te pu ru She Na kiM/ /lo ka sa ka la rat+nA nAM te dza sai ba ma hAr+g+ha tAM/ /ko\u0f85r+thaH
<p>304b.6</p>pa/ /khyod kyi mngal gyi khur gyis bdag /ngal dub bskyed pa nyid du zad/ /'gran zla la ni khro bas stong / /dman pas kun la rab tu 'dud/ /gnod pa byas la mi sems pa'i/ /skyes pa de yis ci zhig byed/ /rin chen mtha' dag 'jig rten na/ /rin chen gzi brjid nyid kyi tshe/ /gzi
<p>305a</p>
<p>305a.1</p>pu ru Sha drA Nai ste dzo dzI ba na brdzi taiH/ /mi th+yA tang+g+ran+tha lA b+hA ya pra bra dz+ya gr-i h+ya te na kiM/ /mUr+d+h+ni kr-it+te Shu dzA yan+te kiM ke she Shu ku shaHpu naH/ /i ti mA turgi rA ta s+ya ma naHka lu Sha TAM ya yau/ /sa hA
<p>305a.2</p>brjid 'tsho ba spangs pa yi/ /skyes bu'i srog gi ci zhig don/ /de gzhung thob slad rdzun gyis ni/ /rab tu byung ba cis mi bzung / /skra bcad mgo la ku sha dag /slar yang skye bar 'gyur ram ci/ /zhes pa ma yi tshig gis de'i/ /yid ni rnyog pa nyid du gyur/ /'phral la
<p>305a.3</p>sa kA la bA tA lI ra dzo rud+d+ha mi bAm+ba raM/ /ta taHsa ku Ta pra sha ma pra Na yI b+hik+Shu kA na nAM/ /ga twA gr-i hI twA pra bra dz+yaM shAs+t+raM sau ga ta mAp+ta bAn/ /kA le na d+har+m+ma ka tha ki sa bi dwAn gu Na gau ra
<p>305a.4</p>dus min rlung tshub kyi/ /rdul gyis nam mkha' 'gegs pa bzhin/ /de nas rab zhi la chags shing / /zog ldan de yis dge slong gi/ /nags su phyin nas rab byung blangs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan bcos thob/ /dus kyis yon tan la gus pas/ /seng ge'i khri la yang dag
<p>305a.5</p>bAta/ /siM hA sa naM sa mA ru h+ya bi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /dza na n+yA pre ri tasta s+yAM de sha nAM yAM kra me Na saH/ /b+hik+Shu d+har+m+ma bi rud+d+hAr+thaM bak+tuM sa mu pa tsa kra me/ /d+har+m+ma pra hA ra bya thi ti b+hik+Shu b+hiHsa pa de pa
<p>305a.6</p>'dzegs/ /mkhas pa chos ni smra ba po/ /de yis chos ni bstan pa byas/ /ma yis bskul bar gyur pa de'i/ /bstan pa de la rim pa yis/ /dge slong chos dang 'gal ba'i don/ /smra ba ru ni yang dag brtsams/ /chos la bsnun pas gdungs gyur pa'i/ /dge slong rnams kyi tshig dang
<p>305b</p>
<p>305b.1</p>de/ /ni bAR+Ya mA Na stA nu tse kr-i twA bi kr-i ta mA na naM/ /a dz+nyA twAd+dar+p+pa mu kha rai ra s+thA ne ba hu bA di b+hiH/ /b+ha bad+b+hiH s+thu la dan+toSh+Thair+b+yA khyA ma ma bi sU de tA/ /yU yaM gar+d+ha b+ha mar+k+ka ToSh+T+wa ba da nA dwI
<p>305b.2</p>tshig /bzlog kyang de yis de dag la/ /bzhin gyi rnam 'gyur byas nas smras/ /gnas skabs min pa mang du smra/ /dregs ldan mu cor so mchu dag /khyed kyis shes pa min pa las/ /bdag gis bshad pa rnam par 'gog /khyed rnams bong bu spre'u rnga mo'i bzhin ldan stag gi
<p>305b.3</p>pA s+ya pa shwA na nA mAr+dz+dza rai Na ba rA ha kuk+ku ra mu khA durdaR+sha bak+t+rAHpa raM/ /sa h+yA mau na dzu Sho pi nai ba bi ka TA D+ho paM ra Tan+taHki mu b+h+rU b+haM gai ri ti b+hik+Shu saM g+ha ma sa kr-in+nar+b+har+t+sa yan so b+h+ya d+hAta/ /ta s+ya bAkya sha
<p>305b.4</p>kha dang ba glang gdong / /byi la e na phag dang khyi yi bzhin ldan mchog tu lta bar dka' ba'i gdong / /smra bcad bstan yang bzod pa min na drag po'i sgra chen sgrog pa smos ci dgos/ /zhes pa smin ma 'khyog cing lan gcig ma yin dge slong tshogs la de yis smras/ /de yi tshig mnga' rnon po
<p>305b.5</p>raistI k+Sh+nai rbi kr-it+tA i ba b+hi k+Sha baH/ /a nuk+t+ye ba pra ti ba tsa s+t+yak+t+wA taM ya yu ra n+ya taH/ /te na bAka pA ta ke nA tha paSh+tsat+tA sa mu ga taH/ /ta t+yA dza dza na nI ma ba pra bra dz+yAM na tu tAM dwi dzaH/ /shra ma Nairme hraM taHpu tra i ti sa bi
<p>305b.6</p>yis/ /rnam par bcad bzhin dge slong rnams/ /lan gyi tshig ni mi brjod par/ /de btang nas ni gzhan du song / /de nas ngag gi sdig pa des/ /phyi nas 'gyod pas gdungs gyur te/ /gnyis skyes de yis ma nyid btang / /rab tu byung ba btang ma gyur/ /bdag gi bu ni dge sbyong gis/ /phrogs zhes
<p>306a</p>
<p>306a.1</p>pra lA pi nI/ /un+mA di ni ta nuM t+yak+t+wA pra pe de na ra kas+thi tiM/ /ta taHkA le na ka pi laHsra yaM ka li ra kilbi ShaH/ /de hAn+te bAkya pA R+Ya Sh+yA di mAM ma ka ra tAM ga taH/ /tA n+ye tA ni mu kha n+ya s+ya yAn+yA tse b+hik+Shu b+har+t+sa
<p>306a.2</p>cho de smra de yang / /smyon mar gyur cing lus btang nas/ /dmyal ba dag tu gnas pa thob/ /de nas dus kyis sdig pa dag /rang gis byas pa'i ser skya ni/ /lus kyi mjug tu tshig rtsub kyis/ /chu srin 'di nyid dag tu gyur/ /dge slong smad la gang smras pa/ /de dag 'di yi gdong 'di
<p>306a.3</p>ne/ /pha laM sa dr-i sha dU paM hi kar+m+ma bI dzA ta pra dzA ya te/ /i t+yuk+t+wA ta tra b+ha ga bAn d+har+m+ma mA di sh+ya shA shwa taM/ /dza na s+yA nu gra hany+tsa kre nA nA bo d+hi bi d+hA ya kaM/ /ta taHpra yA te swa pa daM dzi ne tan+ma ya mA na
<p>306a.4</p>dag /gang phyir las kyi sa bon las/ /'bras bu mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin skye/ /zhes gsungs der ni bcom ldan gyis/ /rtag pa'i chos ni bstan mdzad nas/ /tha dad byang chub sgrub byed pa'i/ /skye bo dag la rjes bzung mdzad/ /de nas rgyal ba rang gnas su/ /gshegs tshe de yi rang bzhin
<p>306a.5</p>saH/ /ma ka raH prodz+dz+hi tA hA ras+t+yak+t+wA de haM di baM ya yau/ /tsA tur+m+ma hA rA dzi ke Shu de ba Shu bi sha da tiH/ /shrI mAn sa dzA taHsu ga te k+Sha NaM tsit+ta pra sA da nAta/ /ta taHpUr+N+Nen+du ba da naHsrag+bI ru tsi ra kuN+Da laH/ /sa
<p>306a.6</p>yid/ /chu srin kha zas rab spangs nas/ /lus btang lha yi gnas su song / /de ni skad cig bde gshegs la/ /sems ni rab tu dang ba las/ /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su/ /dpal ldan dri med mdzes par skyes/ /de nas zla ba nya ba'i bzhin/ /'phreng ba dang ldan rna rgyan mdzes/ /kun
<p>306b</p>
<p>306b.1</p>sA kA ra i bA nan+daHsu ga taM draSh+Tu mA ya yau/ /pra kir+N+Na di bya ku su maH ki rI Ta spr-iSh+Ta b+hU ta laH/ /pra b+hA pU ri ta dik+tsakrastaM b+hak+t+ya pra Na nA ma saH/ /tsakre ta s+yo ba biSh+Ta s+ya b+ha ga bAn d+har+m+ma de sha nI/ /ya yA
<p>306b.2</p>dga' rnam pa dang bcas bzhin/ /de ni bde gshegs blta ru 'ongs/ /lha yi me tog rab tu gtor/ /cod pan gyis ni sa la reg /'od kyis phyogs kyi 'khor lo bkang / /de yis de la gus phyag 'tshal/ /nyer 'khod de la bcom ldan gyis/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /gang gis
<p>306b.3</p>shro taHpha laM prA s+yas t+ya daR+shi dza gA ma saH/ /tr-i Na mi ba gu ru pyud+d+h+r-i taHpA pa pang+kA di ti sa dza na kA yaHso bi duHkhArdza ne na/ /bya sa na ni pa ti tA nAM kI la yA pu N+ya shI lA ni
<p>306b.4</p>bden mthong rgyun zhugs kyi/ /'bras bu thob nas de song gyur/ /de ltar bya ba dka' yang de ni rtswa bzhin sdig pa'i 'dam dag las/ /bton cing skye bo'i tshogs pa de dag kyang ste sdug bsngal bsgrubs pa yis/ /gdung bar nges par lhung ba rnams kyi nyon mongs rtsa ba mtshungs med dag /ma lus
<p>306b.5</p>khi la ma tu la mU laM kle sha mun+mu la yan+ti/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ka pi lA ba dA naM nA ma tsa twA tiM shaH pal+la waH// //tu l+ya me ba pu ru She Na
<p>306b.6</p>bsod nams ngang tshul rnams kyis bde blag nyid du 'joms par byed/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ser skya'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //lus kyi snod son dge dang mi
<p>307a</p>
<p>307a.1</p>b+hu dz+ya te kA ya b+hA dza na ga taM shu b+hA shu b+haH/ /de hi nAM bi bi d+ha kar+m+ma dzaM pha laM h+ya b+huk+ta mu pa yA ti saM k+Sha yaM/ /b+ha ga bAn su ga taH pUr+b+baM pu re rA dze gr-i hA b+hi d+he/ /ka lAnd ka ni pA pA khya pi
<p>307a.2</p>dge ba/ /mnyam pa nyid du skyes bu longs spyod de/ /lus can rnams kyi rnam mang las skyes 'bras/ /gang phyir ma spyad kun tu zad mi 'gyur/ /bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa sngon/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab kyi ni/ /ka lan da ka'i gnas zhes pa'i/ /
<p>307a.3</p>dza hA ra ba nAn+ta re/ /bim+bi sA raHk+Shi ti pa ti ta trA b+hUd+pi shru taHshri yA/ /rat+nA ka raHsatwa rat+nA nAM rat+nA ka ra i bA pa raH/ /ba b+hU ba sa ma ye tasmin rau ru kA khye pu re nr-i paH/ /shri mA nu drA ya No
<p>307a.4</p>nags kyi nang na rnam par gnas/ /gzugs can snying po sa yi bdag /der ni dpal gyi rnam par grags/ /rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur/ /rin chen 'byung gnas gzhan pa bzhin/ /dus der grong khyer sgra sgrogs zhes/ /bya bar mi bdag dpal dang ldan/ /grags pa zla ba'i chu
<p>307a.5</p>nA ma ya shash+tsan+d+ra ma ho da d+hiH/ /ta s+ya tsan+d+ra pra b+hA nA ma pat+nI tsan+d+rA na nA b+ha bta/ /shi khaN+Di yu ba rA dzash+tsa sU nur+b+bi kra ma karka shaH/ /hi ru ko b+hi ru kash+tse ti ta s+yA mA t+yau ba b+hu ba tuH/ /ga Na nI yo na bi na ye ya yau shu kra bi has+sa
<p>307a.6</p>gter che/ /u drA ya na zhes pa byung / /de yi btsun mo zla ba'i 'od/ /ces pa zla ba'i bzhin ras can/ /sras ni drag po'i rtsal dang ldan/ /rgyal tshab gtsug phud can zhes gyur/ /he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka /zhes pa de yi blon po gnyis/ /'dul ba dkar po phur bu dag /bgrang bar bya ba min par
<p>307b</p>
<p>307b.1</p>tI/ /dzA tA b+hU mi b+hu dzoH pri tirle khair+l+le kha twi Shasta yauH/ /a pi du ra s+tha yo rarka ka ma lA ka ra yo ri ba/ /a pUr+b+ba rat+na ni tsa yaM pre Sha nairba hu gasta yoH/ /pa ri pUr+N+Na pa raM pra pa sa khyaM pre ma ni d+hA na
<p>307b.2</p>gyur/ /sa bdag lha yi 'od zer can/ /de gnyis spring yig gis mdza' gyur/ /ring du gnas kyang nyi ma dang / /pad+ma yi ni 'byung gnas bzhin/ /de gnyis mang du pho nya yis/ /sngon med rin chen tshogs dag dang / /grogs nyid mchog tu yongs rdzogs pas/ /mdza' ba'i gter ni thob
<p>307b.3</p>taM/ /dUr s+thA pi pa raM prI tiHsa tAM kIr+t+ti ri bA k+Sha yA/ /saM sak+tA pi kha la prI ti tr-i Na dz+wA le ba na s+thi rA/ /ka dA tsid+di bya rat+nAng+ka ka ba tsa kAny+tsa nodz+dz+wa laM/ /prA hi No bim+bi sA rA ya sA
<p>307b.4</p>par gyur/ /dam pa'i mdza' ba ring gnas kyang / /mchog tu mi zad grags 'bar bzhin/ /mi bsrun mdza' ba nyer gnas kyang / /brtan pa ma yin rtswa 'bar bzhin/ /nam zhig gzugs can snying po la/ /mchog gi cha gser 'od 'bar/ /lha yi rin chen gyis mtshan pa/ /mi
<p>307b.5</p>ra mu drA yA Na nr-i paH/ /bi Sha shas+t+rAg+ni rak+ShA r+ha bi tsi tra rat+na kaM ka TaM/ /su hr-ita pre Sh-i ta mA bA ya pro bA tsa sa tsi bAn nr-i paH/ /i daM me pra hi taM te na sau dza n+ya mi ba b+hU b+hu dzA/ /sar+b+ba rak+Sha k+Sha
<p>307b.6</p>bdag u drA ya nas springs/ /dug mtshon me rnams bsrung 'os pa/ /rnam bkra rin chen go cha ni/ /grogs kyis springs pa legs blangs nas/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras/ /sa bdag de yis lugs bzang bzhin/ /lhag par mdza' ba go byed cing / /thams cad bsrung
<p>308a</p>
<p>308a.1</p>maM bar+m+ma gA D+ha pre ma ni bi de kaM/ /na pa sh+ya mya s+ya sa dr-i shaM pra ti de yaM ta to d+hi kaM/ /alpa pra ti kri yA sha l+ya mu pa kA ro pa kA ra yauH/ /u tsi taM tsin+t+ya tAM kiny+tsi ta pre Sha NI ya ma tod+hi kaM/ /sar+b+ber+b+ha
<p>308a.2</p>bar bzod pa yi/ /go cha 'di ni bdag la springs/ /'di la lan du sbyin 'os pa/ /de las lhag pa ngas ma mthong / /phan dang gnod pa dag la yang / /lan ni chung ba zug rngu yin/ /'di las lhag pa cung zad cig /bskur 'os khyed rnams thams cad kyis/ /bsam
<p>308a.3</p>bad+b+hi ri t+yuk+t+wA nr-i pash+tsin+tA ku lo b+ha bta/ /a tha d+hI mAn ma hA mA t+yash+tsi raM d+h+ya twA ta ma pra bIta/ /baR+Sha kA ra b+hi d+ho bi praHsar+b+ba bi d+yA su pA ra gaH/ /a to ba hu gu NaM rA dza na nai ka me bas+t+yu pA ya
<p>308a.4</p>par mdzod ces brjod nas ni/ /mi bdag bsam pa 'khrugs par gyur/ /de nas blo ldan blon po che/ /dbyar gyi rnam pa zhes bram ze/ /rig kun legs par pha rol phyin/ /yun ring bsams nas de la smras/ /'di las yon tan mang ba'i skyes/ /rgyal po gcig kyang yod ma
<p>308a.5</p>naM/ /ta s+ya saM pre Sha Ne yatanaHkri ya tAM yaM di sha kya te/ /ya e Sha b+ha ga bAn bud+d+ha s+thi tas+t+wad+bi Sha yAn+ti ka/ /de bA nA mA da ra s+thA naM pa Tastat+p+ra ti mang+ki taH/ /a she Sha lo ka ka l+yA Na ka li kA kalpa pA
<p>308a.6</p>yin/ /gal te nus na 'bad pa yis/ /de ni rab tu spring bar mdzod/ /gang zhig bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'di/ /khyod kyi yul na nye bar gnas/ /lha rnams dag gi lus gnas kyi/ /thang ka de yi gzugs kyis mtshan/ /ma lus 'jig rten dge ba yi/ /me tog gsar pa'i dpag
<p>308b</p>
<p>308b.1</p>da baH/ /tsi tre swap+ne tha saM kalpe pr-i thu pu N+yaiHsa dr-i sh+ya te/ /i ti man+d+raM ba tsaHshru twA ta the t+yuk+t+wA ma hI pa tiH/ /ga twA b+ha ga ba te na mraHta me bAr+thaM bya be da ya ta/ /a nu dz+nyA ta sta ta ste na nr-i pash+tsi tra ka rAn
<p>308b.2</p>bsam shing / /ri mo rmi lam kun rtog la'ang / /de ni bsod nams che bas mthong / /zhes pa blon po'i tshig thos nas/ /de bzhin zhes brjod sa yi bdag /song nas bcom ldan la btud de/ /don de nyid ni rab tu gsol/ /de nas de yis rjes gnang ste/ /ri mo mkhan po mchog
<p>308b.3</p>ba rAn/ /A di de shA shu b+ha ga ba teHpra ti mol+le kha kar+m+ma Ni/ /dzi na s+yA lo ka yan+taste mUr+t+tiM rU pa ba shI kr-i tAH/ /ya yuHpra mA Na gra ha Ne pra gal+b+hA a s+ya shak+ta tAM/ /saM kran+taM nir+m+ma la pa Te ts+tshA yAM b+ha ga ba
<p>308b.4</p>rnams la/ /bcom ldan sku gzugs bri ba'i las/ /mi yi bdag pos myur bar bskos/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni lta byed pa/ /de dag gzugs kyi dbang byas nas/ /spobs dang ldan yang tshad dag ni/ /rab tu gzung bar nus ma gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan sku gzugs ni/ /dri med ras la
<p>308b.5</p>tasta taH/ /su bar+N+Na b+hA ba nA b+hi dz+nyAste sha naiHsa ma pU ra yan/ /prA hi No da tha b+hU pA la staM bud+d+ha pra ti mA pa TaM/ /dza gan+na ya na pu N+yA nAM mUr+t+tA nA mi ba sany+tsa yaM/ /bim+bi sA ra s+ya
<p>308b.6</p>'phos ba dag /gzugs bzang bsgom pa mngon shes des/ /dal bus yang dag rdzogs par byas/ /'gro ba'i mig gi bsod nams rnams/ /gzugs can yang dag bsags pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs thang ka de/ /de nas sa gzhi skyong bas springs/ /gzugs can snying
<p>309a</p>
<p>309a.1</p>hastAng+ka le khA mu drA ya No nr-i paH/ /ba Ta s+ya pu ra taHprAp+taM hr-iSh+TaHswa ya ma bA tsa yata/ /su ga ta tsa ra Na pad+ma n+yA sa pu N+yo pa kaN+ThAta tri da sha pu ra bi She ShAn+mA ga d+ho dA ra de shata/ /ku sha la ka
<p>309a.2</p>bo'i lag rtags can/ /spring yig thang ka'i sngon byung ba/ /mi bdag u drA ya na ni/ /rab tu dga' bas rang gis bklags/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i zhabs pad bkod pa'i bsod nams nye gyur pa/ /skabs gsum grong gi khyad par rgya che ma ga d+ha yul nas/ /dge ba byas pa'i
<p>309a.3</p>li ta mUr+t+tir+b+hu pa tirbim+pi sA raHk+Shi ti ta la ti la kaM twAMd+har+m+ma ban+d+hur+b+ra bI ti/ /e tat+te pra hi taM hi taM b+ha ba ma hA mo hA ma ye b+he Sha dzaM ra ga dwe Sha bi ShA pa haM b+ha ga ba to bim+bi sha shAng+ka twi ShaH/ /tr-iSh+NA paM
<p>309a.4</p>gzugs can sa yi bdag po gzugs can snying / /chos kyi gnyen gyis sa gzhi'i thig le khyod la rab smras pa/ /ri bong mtshan ma'i 'od ldan bcom ldan sku gzugs chags sdang dug ni nyams par byed/ /sred pa yang dag zhi byed srid pa'i rmongs chen nad kyi sman dang phan pa dang / /rab dang mngar
<p>309a.5</p>sha ma naM pra san+na ma d+h+ya raM twan+ne tra pA trAr+b+bi taM d+ha n+yaHpu N+ya rA sa ya naM pi ba ha ThA dA kaN+Tha mut+kaN+Thi ta/ /san+mAr+g+ge bi ni yo dza na gu Na ga NA dgA ne sa dA d+h+yA pa naM dur+b+yA sA ra ni bA ra NaM s+thi ra su kha prAp+tau pa
<p>309a.6</p>ba'i bsod nams bcud len khyod kyi mig gi snod du rab blugs pa/ /'di ni khyod la rab springs skal ldan mgrin pa'i bar du rab tu 'dod pas 'thung / /dam pa'i lam la rnam par sbyor zhing yon tan tshogs rnams 'dzin pa rtag tu slob/ /bya ba ngan las rnam par zlog cing brtan pa'i bde ba
<p>309b</p>
<p>309b.1</p>ri pre ra NaM/ /nir+b+yA dzo pa kr-i tau ni ran+ta ra ta yA sarbAt+ma nA bar+t+ta naM kar+t+ta byaM ki ma taHpa raM pri ya hi taM ka l+yA Na mi traiHsa tAM/ /i ti le khAr+tha mA swA d+ya su hr-ita pre mA mr-i to tsi taM/ /rA dza ga dzA d+hi rU D+ha s+ya pa
<p>309b.2</p>'thob la mchog tu bskul/ /rgyun chad med pa nyid du bdag nyid kun gyi zol med phan pa skyed byed pa/ /dam pa'i dge ba'i grogs kyi yid 'ong phan pa 'di las mchog ni ci zhig bya/ /zhes pa'i spring yig grogs mdza' ba'i/ /bdud rtsi la 'os don myangs nas/ /glang po la gnas thang sku yi/ /sngon
<p>309b.3</p>Ta pra ya yau pu raH/ /a b+hi nan+d+ya ta mA nan+da ta sA mA t+yaH sa pu ro hi taH/ /he ma siM hA sa not+paM ge sa pra sAR+Ya n+ya be sha yata/ /lA ba N+ya pu N+ya ni la yaM dr-iSh+T+wA tat+sau ga taM ba puH/ /na mo na maH pra bud+d+hA ya
<p>309b.4</p>du rgyal po rab tu song / /blon bcas mdun na 'don bcas te/ /mngon par dga' nas kun dga' las/ /gser gyi seng ge'i khri steng du/ /de ni rab tu bkram nas bkod/ /mdzes sdug bsod nams dag gi gnas/ /bde gshegs sku de mthong gyur nas/ /skye bos sangs rgyas rab rgyas la/ /
<p>309b.5</p>bud+d+hA ye t+ya ba dadz+dza naH/ /bud+d+hA b+hi d+hA naM shru twe ba pu la kA laM kr-i tA kr-i tiH/ /puSh+pa baR+She su rairmuk+te bismi to b+huta ma hI pa tiH/ /pu N+yaM b+ha ga ban taHshru twA sa ta tra tsa ri tA mr-i taM/ /pa yo da nA sat+koN+Tha
<p>309b.6</p>phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal zhes pa smras/ /sangs rgyas mngon brjod thos nyid na/ /spu long gis brgyan dbyibs gyur cing / /lha yi me tog char phab tshe/ /sa yi bdag po ya mtshan gyur/ /der ni bcom ldan spyod pa yi/ /bdud rtsi'i bsod nams thob nas ni/ /chu 'dzin sgra yis mgrin sngon
<p>310a</p>
<p>310a.1</p>nI la kaN+Tha tu laM ya yau/ /twA da shA ga pa Ta s+yA d+haHsA nu lo ma bi paR+Ya yaM/ /pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da tsa dr-iSh+T+wA mo haM mu mo tsa paH/ /shro taHprAp+ti pha le nai baM dr-iSh+Ta sa t+yo\u0f85tha b+hU pa tiH/ /
<p>310a.2</p>dang / /rab 'dod ldan pa mtshungs par gyur/ /rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis ni/ /rjes mthun ldog pa dang bcas pa/ /thang ka'i 'og tu mthong gyur nas/ /de yis rmongs pa rnam par grol/ /de nas sa bdag rgyun zhugs kyi/ /'bras thob bden pa mthong ba yi/ /
<p>310a.3</p>de de sha pra ti saM de shaM sa khyur+b+hik+Shu bi sardza ne/ /bim+bi sA raHta tastasmai kr-i to b+ha ga ba to\u0f85/ /kA t+yA ya nany+tsa bya sri dzata shai la khyAny+tsA pi b+hik+ShU NIM/ /u drA ya na s+ya nr-i pa te rA R+YaHkA t+yA ya no\u0f85tha saH/ /pU
<p>310a.4</p>grogs la dge slong rdzongs zhes pa'i/ /'phrin gyi lan ni rab tu springs/ /de nas gzugs can snying po yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol byas nas/ /kA t+yA ya na dge slong ma/ /rim zhes pa'ang de la springs/ /de nas mchod pa sgrub byed pa/ /mi bdag u drA ya na la/ /'phags
<p>310a.5</p>dzA bi d+hA yi nasta tra bi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /d+har+m+ma de sha na yA ta s+ya saM ga taHsu ma hAn dza na/ /shro taHsa kr-i da nA ga mi pha lAr+ha ta pa da mAp+ta bAn/ /tasmin gr-i ha pa tI khya tau ti Sh+ya pu Sh+ya b+hi d+hA pu re/ /
<p>310a.6</p>pa kA t+yA ya na des/ /der ni chos rnams bstan pa mdzad/ /de yis chos ni bstan pa yis/ /skye bo rab mang 'dus pa rnams/ /rgyun dang lan gcig phyir mi 'ong / /dgra bcom 'bras bu'i gnas thob gyur/ /grong khyer der ni rgyal dang ni/ /skar rgyal zhes grags khyim bdag gnyis/ /
<p>310b</p>
<p>310b.1</p>shAn+d+yai pra bra dz+ya ta s+yA gre pa ri nir+b+r-i ti mA sat+ta/ /kA le na bi hi tau stU pau de hAn+te dz+nyA ti b+hista yoH/ /tan+nA ma tsih+nA ba d+yA pi ban+dan+te tsai t+ya band kAH/ /de byAsh+tsan+d+ra pra b+hA yAsh+tsa shai lA khyA sA pi b+hik+Shu NI/ /kra
<p>310b.2</p>zhi slad de mdun rab byung nas/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /dus kyis de yi gnyen rnams kyis/ /lus kyi mjug tu mchod rten bsgrubs/ /de ming gis mtshan da lta yang / /mchod rten phyag byed phyag 'tshal byed/ /btsun mo'i 'khor du dge slong ma/ /rim zhes ni bya bas kyang / /rim
<p>310b.3</p>me NAn+taHtsa kre sa ta taM d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /ka dA tsi da tha b+hU pA laHkr-I DA gA ra ga taHpri yaM/ /ta ma dz+nyA sIn+ni mit+ta dz+nyAHsap+tA hA ba d+hi dzi bi tAM/ /dz+nyA ta saM sA ra tsa ri ta sta taHtA ba su d+hA d+ha baH/ /a nu dza
<p>310b.4</p>gyis lha mo zla 'od la/ /rtag tu chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas nam zhig sa skyong gi / rtse dga'i khang par song gyur pa/ /mtshan ma shes pas de yis ni/ /'tsho ba zhag bdun mtshams su rig /de nas 'khor ba'i spyod tshul shes/ /nor 'dzin bdag pos de la ni/ /sngon la rab
<p>310b.5</p>dz+nye shu b+ha pa daM prA snuM pra bra dz+ya yA pu raH/ /swA khyA te d+har+m+ma bi na ye b+hik+Shu kyA nr-i pa teM gi rA/ /de bI pra bra dzi tA de haM di ne ta t+yA dza sap+ta me/ /tsa turma hA rA dzi ke Shu de be Shu sa ha sai ba sA/ /pra yA
<p>310b.6</p>tu byung ba yis/ /dge ba'i gnas thob rjes su gnang / /legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul la/ /mi bdag tshig gis dge slong mas/ /lha mo rab tu phyung ba'i lus/ /nyi ma bdun pa nyid la btang / /rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su/ /lha yi bu mo nyid du ni/ /'phral nyid
<p>311a</p>
<p>311a.1</p>ta dai ba ka n+yA twAM dza gA ma dzi na kA na naM/ /ta tra pUr+Nen+du ba da nA di byA ra Na b+hU Shi tA/ /dr-iSh+T+wA shAkya mu niM hr-iSh+TA sha ya pA tA s+ya pA da yoH/ /pra kI NaM di bya puSh+pa yA sta s+yAsh+tsakre ta thA ga taH/ /
<p>311a.2</p>rab tu gyur pa de/ /rgyal ba yi ni nags su song / /der ni zla nya'i bzhin ras can/ /lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa des/ /shAkya thub pa mthong gyur nas/ /dga' bas de yi zhabs la gtugs/ /lha yi me tog rab 'thor la/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /
<p>311a.3</p>d+har+m+mo pa bA da naM ye na dr-iSh+Ta sa t+yA dza gA ma sA/ /sA ga twA na ga raM pa t+yur+b+yom+nA mUr+t+ti ri bairde bI/ /bi bo d+h+ya ni shi sup+ta s+ya tsakre bo d+hi pra kA sha naM/ /yA tA ya swa pa daM ta s+yAM pra b+hA te ba su d+hA d+hi
<p>311a.4</p>gang gis bden pa mthong byed pa'i/ /chos ni bstan mdzad de song gyur/ /de yis mkha' la zla ba yi/ /gzugs bzhin bdag po'i grong khyer phyin/ /mtshan mo nyal ba bslangs nas ni/ /byang chub rab tu gsal bar byas/ /de ni tho rangs rang gnas su/ /song ba'i tshe na nor 'dzin
<p>311a.5</p>paH/ /pra bra dz+yA b+hi mu khaHpu tra ma b+hi Shi ts+ya shi khaN+Di naM/ /pra dzA trA NA ya ni k+Shi s+ya taM ma hA mA t+ya yosta taH/ /nr-i pa terbem+bi sA ra s+ya su hr-i daHsa ya yau pu raM/ /bim+bi sA rasta mA yA taM bi ga tats+tshat+t+ra tsA
<p>311a.6</p>bdag /rab byung mngon par phyogs pas su/ /gtsug phud can ni dbang bskur te/ /de nas blon po dag las de/ /skye rgu bskyab pa'i phyir gtad nas/ /de ni mi bdag gzugs can snying / /grogs po'i grong khyer dag tu song / /gdugs dang rnga yab dang bral ba/ /de 'ongs gzugs
<p>311b</p>
<p>311b.1</p>ma raM/ /nri po pa tsA raiHpra Na taHprI ti pU tai ra pU dza ya ta/ /bi shrAn+ta mA sa nA si naM sa ta mU tse ba bi sma yaH/ /hr-iSh+TaH saM daR+sha ne nA s+ya shrI bi yo ge na duH kh-i taH/ /rA dzan+na nan+ta sA man+ta mau li
<p>311b.2</p>can snying po yis/ /rab btud mi bdag nyer spyad ni/ /mdzes shing gtsang ma rnams kyis mchod/ /ngal bsos khri la 'khod de la/ /de dang phrad pas rab dga' zhing / /dpal dang bral bas sdug bsngal ba'i/ /ya mtshan ldan pa de yis smras/ /mtha' yas kun gyi mgo bo la/ /
<p>311b.3</p>bi shrAn+ta shA sa naH/ /pA ka shA sa na tu l+ya s+t+waM ka tha me ba mu pA ga taH/ /a b+hin+na bak+t+ra pra kr-i tergup+ta man+t+ra s+ya d+hI ma taH/ /pa re Na rA dz+ya ha ra NaM bI ra saM b+hA bya te na te/ /i ti pr-iSh+TaH sa su hr-i dA sasmi
<p>311b.4</p>rgyal po'i bka' ni ngal gso ba/ /brgya byin dag dang mtshungs pa khyod/ /'di bzhin nye bar ji ltar gyur/ /rang bzhin bzhin ras ma bral zhing / /blo ldan don ni sbas pa can/ /dpa' ba khyad kyi rgyal srid ni/ /gzhan gyis grogs po srid ma yin/ /zhes pa grogs kyis dris la des/ /
<p>311b.5</p>tasta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /rA dza na br-id+d+hA bi b+hU tirma na pri yA sar+b+ba gI mi nI/ /pi Sha yA swA dpai mu khyAd bi tr-iSh+Ne na ma yA swa yaM/ /ut+s+r-iSh+Ta mi ba saM t+yak+ta mai shwaR+YaM b+ho ga b+hA dza naM/ /twa yA ka l+yA Na mi
<p>311b.6</p>'dzum bcas de la rab smras pa/ /rgyal po 'byor pa thams cad du/ /'gro zhing rgan la bdag mi dga'/ /yul nyams myong las phyir phyogs su/ /sred dang bral ba bdag rang gis/ /dbang phyug longs spyod snod dag ni/ /lhag ma bzhin du yang dag btang / /dge ba'i grogs po khyod
<p>312a</p>
<p>312a.1</p>tre Na su ga ta bra ti mA pa TaH/ /yo sau hi tA ya pra hi taHsa bai rA gya gu rum+ma ma/ /a d+hu nA twat+p+ra sA de na ga twA b+ha ga ba ton+ti kaM/ /i ts+tsha' mya bA p+taM pra bra dz+yA ma gA rA da nA gA
<p>312a.2</p>kyis ni/ /bde gshegs sku gzugs thang ka gang / /phan slad rab tu springs pa de/ /bdag gi chags bral bla mar gyur/ /da ni khyod kyi bka' drin gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi drung phyin nas/ /khyim nas khyim ni med nyid du/ /rab byung 'thob par bdag
<p>312a.3</p>ri kaM/ /i ti sa khyu r+b+ba tsaHshru twA tat+ta the ti bi tsin+t+ya tsa/ /sA da rasta d+bi be ke na bim+bi sA ra sta ma bra bI ta/ /d+ha n+yo ba hu ma tush+tsA pi sA tAM pr-i thi bI pa teH/ /saM sA ra bi mu khI ka thaM dzA tA te ma ti rI dr-i
<p>312a.4</p>'tshal lo/ /zhes pa grogs kyi tshig thos nas/ /de de bzhin zhes rnam bsams te/ /de yi dben pa la gus ldan/ /gzugs can snying pos de la smras/ /sa yi bdag po khyod kyi blo/ /dam pa mang pos bkur ba yang / /'khor ba las ni phyir phyogs pa/ /skal ldan 'di 'dra ci ltar
<p>312a.5</p>shI/ /san+to Sha bi b+ha bA b+ho ga su b+ha gaHsho b+ha se pa raM/ /lak+Sha NaM shud+d+ha sa twA naM bai rA gyA b+ha ra Na ma naH/ /ki ma sA mrA dz+ya ma hau dza sA sa ra dza sA duHsAd+ha naiH sA d+ha naiHkiM b+ho gai k+Sha Na b+ho dza naiHka lu Sha daiHkiM sak+ta
<p>312a.6</p>skyes/ /chog shes 'byor pa thob gyur pas/ /skal ba bzang po mchog tu mdzes/ /yid ni chags bral gyis brgyan pa/ /sems can dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /dam pa rnams ni 'khor ba nye bar zhi slad rmongs chen myu gu nyams byed pa/ /skye ba gzhan la nyer bsgrubs chags bral
<p>312b</p>
<p>312b.1</p>duHkhaiHsukhaiH/ /saM sA ro sa ra mA ya tse ta si sa tAM dzan+mAn+ta ro pArdzi taM bai rA gyaM ku ru te ba daM ya di ma hA mo ha pra ro hA pa haM/ /ye na prA Na ya NaM pri yA ba su ma tI saM t+ya dz+ya te lI
<p>312b.2</p>gnas ni gal te yid la byed pa na/ /rgyal srid chen po gzi chan rdul bcas kyis ni bsgrub dka' sgrub byed rnams kyis ci/ /longs spyod skad cig spyod rnams kyis ci sdig ster sdug ldan bde ba rnams kyis ci/ /gang gis nor mchog srog las phangs pa'i nor ldan ma ni bde blag
<p>312b.3</p>la yA trai lo kyA b+hi ma te pi yaHsma ra su khe bai mu khya dIk+ShA gu ruH/ /saM mo ha bya sa nA tu raM dza ga di daM ye nA nu kam+pAspa daM pu N+yaiHko pi sa dzA ya te ma ti ma tAM saM sA ra bA maHsha maH/ /
<p>312b.4</p>nyid du gtong / /gang zhig 'jig rten gsum po 'dod kyang 'dod pa'i bde la phyir phyogs 'doms pa'i bla/ /gang gis kun rmongs sdug bsngal gyis gzir 'gro ba 'di ni rjes su brtse ba'i gnas/ /bsod nams dag gis blo ldan rnams kyi zhib ci yang 'khor ba'i g.yon der 'gyur/ /
<p>312b.5</p>it+yuk+t+wA bim+bi sA ra staM ni twA be Nu ba nA shra maM/ /sa pra NA maM b+ha ga ba te tad+b+r-it+tA n+taM n+ya be da ya ta/ /u drA ya No pi su ga tA kA raM su tsi ra tsin+ta taM/ /bi lo kya haR+Sha dAt+ma naM kr-i ta kr-i t+ya ma
<p>312b.6</p>zhes brjod gzugs can snying po des/ /'od ma'i tshal gyi gnas khrid nas/ /rab tu btud byas bcom ldan la/ /de yis byung ba'i mtha' rnams gsol/ /bde gshegs rnam pa mthong gyur nas/ /dga' bas yun ring bsams byas te/ /bdag nyid bya ba byas par gyur/ /u drA yan
<p>313a</p>
<p>313a.1</p>ma n+ya ta/ /pra Na ma bya gra shi ra sA saM sA ra ts+tshe di nI ta nau/ /pa bA ta b+ha ga ba p+d+r-iSh+TI sta s+ya pra bra dz+ya yA sa ha/ /b+hik+Shu b+hA ba ma thA sA d+ya pA tra pA NiH sa tsI ba rI/ /na ga re piN+Da pA tA r+thI
<p>313a.2</p>yis kyang bsams/ /mgo bos phyag 'tshal gyis brel ba/ /de yi lus la bcom ldan gyis/ /gzigs pa 'khor ba gcod byed ni/ /rab byung nyid dang lhan cig babs/ /de nas dge slong dngos po thob/ /lag na chos gos lhung bzed ldan/ /grong khyer du ni bsod
<p>313a.3</p>tsa kA ra dza na bisma yaM/ /pra dzAH shi khaN+Di d+har+m+me Na pA la yi twA pra san+na d+hIH/ /yA ta kA le na kA lu Sh+ya ma d+har+m+mA b+hi ra to\u0f85b+ha ba ta/ /ka lu Sha kAny+tsa na ru tsa byak+ti d+bi lA si nI/ /na ka s+ya ku ru
<p>313a.4</p>snyoms bslangs/ /skye bo ya mtshan ldan par byas/ /gtsug phud can gyi rab dang blos/ /chos kyis skye rgu bskyangs byas nas/ /dus kyis chos min mngon 'dod cing / /rnyog pa dag dang ldan par gyur/ /gser 'od gsal ba'i glog dag ni/ /rnam par rol pa'i sprin 'phreng bzhin/ /phun sum tshogs
<p>313a.5</p>de la k+Sh+mIrme g+ha mA le ba mA na saM/ /a nA yat+taM ma hA ma d+yai r+he ru ko b+hi ru kash+tsa taM/ /a d+har+m+ma kar+m+ma nir taM krud+d+haM ta t+ya dza tuHpra b+huM/ /ta ta pa de bi hi tau rA dz+nyA sa tsi bau baN+Da mung+ga rau/ /tsit+tA nu br-it+ta ku sha lau swai raM sak+taM ta mu tsa
<p>313a.6</p>pas su yi yid/ /dri ma can du byed ma yin/ /he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka /blon chen dag gis chos min gyi/ /las la dag bzhi dbang ma gyur/ /khro ldan jo bo de btang gyur/ /de nas gnas su rgyal po yis/ /dbyug pa thob blon por bcug /sems kyi rjes 'jug mkhas pa yis/ /dman par chags pa de
<p>313b</p>
<p>313b.1</p>tuH/ /pra dzA rany+dza na saM sak+tA rA dza dordza n+ya bA di naH/ /swa ya shaH khyA sa nA yai ba dzA yan+te d+hU rtA man+t+ri NaH/ /na d+har+m+ma na su khaM nA r+thaM na kir+t+ta ye na dzI bi taM/ /ga Na yan+ti pra b+ho rar+the te b+h+r-i t+yA b+ha bya
<p>313b.2</p>la smras/ /skye rgu rnams la mdza' bas yang dag chags/ /rgyal po gzhung ngan dag tu smra bar byed/ /g.yon can blon po rnams kyis rang nyid kyi/ /grags pa rab tu sgrogs par byed pa yin/ /gang zhig rje bo'i don du ni/ /chos la mi rtsi bde la min/ /don min grags min 'tsho ba min/ /de dag mchog tu
<p>313b.3</p>b+hak+ta yaH/ /nA khaN+Di tA k+Sha yi tA na tap+tA nA s+ya pI Di tA/ /kur+b+ba n+t+ya r+thi kr-i yA rA dz+nyA sti la tu l+yAHki la prA dzAH/ /i ti bru bA Nau tau rA dz+nyA ni yuk+tau rA dz+ya tsin+ta ne/ /lo b+hA ta pra br-i t+tau dur+n+r-i tau han+tuM niHsha
<p>313b.4</p>gus pa'i g.yog /nges par til mtshungs skye rgu rnams/ /rgyal po'i don byed ma bcag pas/ /ma yin ma nyams pas kyang min/ /ma gdungs pas min ma gzir min/ /zhes smas de dag rgyal srid kyi/ /bsam pa la ni rgyal pos bskos/ /chags las spyod tshul ngan pa yis/ /skyabs med
<p>313b.5</p>ra NaHpra dzAH/ /ni rbi tsa re du rA tsA re ku ma tau pri thi bI pa tau/ /lup+ta sa t+ye ma hA mA t+ye pra dzA nAM dzI bi te ku taH/ /u drA ya No tha tsi re Na ka dA tsid+bi Ni dzaM pa thi/ /ni dza de shA ga taM bAr+t+taM sa prats+tsha nr-i pa raSh+TA yoH/ /so ba dad+de
<p>313b.6</p>skye rgu gzhom par zhugs/ /sa yi bdag po blo gros ngan/ /rnam par mi spyod spyod tshul ngan/ /sna chen bden pa nyams pa'i tshe/ /skye rgu rnams ni ga la 'tsho/ /de nas nam zhig yun ring na/ /lam du u drA ya na yis/ /rang yul nas 'ongs tshong pa la/ /mi bdag yul 'khor gtam dag dris/ /de yis smras
<p>314a</p>
<p>314a.1</p>ba ku sha li su tasta ba ma hI pa tiH/ /kin+tu san+man+ti ra hi taHku man+t+ri ba sha mA ga taH/ /ta tra pra dzA nAM bi ta to pa tA paHko pi bra br-it+taHpra b+hu shA sa ne na/ /ye nA d+ya tat+kut+pi ta dai sha dzan+ma di bA ni shaM sho tsa ti pau ra lo kaH/ /
<p>314a.2</p>pa lha khyod kyi/ /sras pos sa yi bdag po dge /'on kyang dam pa'i blon dang bral/ /blon po ngan pa'i dbang du song / /der ni jo bo'i bka' yis skye rgu rnams/ /nye bar gdung ba rab rgyas ci yang gyur/ /gang gis da lta de ni yul ngan skyes/ /grang ba'i 'jig rten nyin dang mtshan mor gdung / /
<p>314a.3</p>ya tra d+h+wan+taM sri dza ti ta ra tra tsan+d+rA g+ni baR+ShI ya tro de ti pra ka Ta ma mr-i tA dut+ka TaHkA la kU TaH/ /ya tra trA tA ha ra ti nr-i pa ti rdzI ba br-it+tiM pra dzA nAM ta trA kAn+daM pra pr-i ta bi pu lo pa p+la be kaHshr-i No ti/ /i t+yA sak+ta nr-i pa yA sa khin+na s+yAr+t+ti
<p>314a.4</p>gang na nyi mas mun pa spro byed gang na zla ba me char 'bebs/ /gang na bdud rtsi las ni rab drag nag po brtsegs pa rab gsal skye/ /gang na skyob byed mi yi bdag pos skye rgu rnams kyi srog 'tsho 'phrog /nyer 'tshe che ba rab rgyas de na cho nge dag ni su zhig nyan/ /mi bdag gis gdungs skyo la gcags/ /tshong
<p>314a.5</p>ma yaM ba tsaH/ /duHsa ha ba Ni dzaHshru twA sa ta mU tse kr-I pA ni d+hiH/ /mang+gi rA twA mi tog twA tUr+N+Na mA shwa sa ya pra dzAH/ /s+thA pa yi Sh+yA mya haM d+har+m+me swa ya me t+ya shi khaN+Di naM/ /i t+yuk+ta ste na sA nan+daHswa de shaM sha na kair+b+ba
<p>314a.6</p>pa'i tshig ni bzod dka' ba/ /gdung ba'i rang bzhin de thos nas/ /brtse ba'i gter des de la smras/ /bdag gi tshig gis 'di nas khyod/ /song la skye rgu dbugs dbyung mdzod/ /nga nyid 'ongs nas gtsug phud can/ /chos la rab tu dgod par bya/ /zhes pa de brjod kun dga' ldan/ /tshong pa rim gyis rang yul
<p>314b</p>
<p>314b.1</p>Ni ka/ /ga twA pra dzA nAM bi da d+he swai ra mA shwA sa naM pu raH/ /pra bA de pra sr-i ta tasmin+na mA t+yau daN+Da mung+ga rau/ /a tI ta b+hU pA la ga ma Na tra stau nr-i pa ti mU tsa tuH/ /sar+b+ba tra shru ya te de ba pra bA daHsA d+hu nan+di taH/ /br-id+d+haH pra
<p>314b.2</p>du/ /song nas sngon du skye rgu rnams/ /dal bus dbugs ni dbyung ba bsgrubs/ /gtam de rab tu grags pa'i tshe/ /blon po dbyug pa thob dag /'das pa'i sa skyong 'ong ba yis/ /skrag ste mi yi bdag la smras/ /legs pa rnams kyis smad pa'i gtam/ /rgyal po rgan po rab byung ba/ /rgyal srid
<p>314b.3</p>bra dzi to rA dzA rA dz+ya r+thI yan+na bA ni ti/ /tI bra bra ta pa ri kliSh+TaHsaM b+ho gA b+hi mu khA da raH/ /ladz+dzAM pra bra dza yA sAr+d+haM t+yak+t+wA sa pu na re Sh+ya ti/ /rA dzan+na sa kwa bai rA gyA s+t+ya dzan+ti sa ha sai ba ya ta/ /
<p>314b.4</p>'bad pas don gnyer ldan/ /zhes pa lha gcig kun tu thos/ /brtul zhugs drag pos yongs su dub/ /gus pas longs spyod la mngon phyogs/ /rab byung ngo tsha thabs cig tu/ /btang nas de slar 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chags bral ma smin bas/ /'phral la nyid du gang btang ba/ /
<p>314b.5</p>tat+pUr+b+bA b+h+ya d+hi kaM te ShA bra yA ti pri ya tAM pu naH/ /lo ka s+thi ti bi rud+d+he Shu bi Sha ye Shu bi she Sha taH/ /spr-i hA saM dzA ya te dzan+to ra ba th+ye Sh+wi ba ro gi NaH/ /su khotshe kA ta pa ri t+yAk+taM pa ra hasta mu pa ga
<p>314b.6</p>de rnams slar yang de dag la/ /sngon las lhag par dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten lugs dang 'gal ba yis/ /yul rnams la ni khyad par du/ /srog chags yang dag 'dod gyur te/ /gnod pa'i zas la nad can bzhin/ /bde ba rab rgyas las yongs btang / /gzhan gyi lag tu nye bar
<p>315a</p>
<p>315a.1</p>taM/ /prA ya sar+b+baM b+ha ba t+ye ba dza Da s+yA mra mi ba pri yaM/ /tasmAd+b+ha ban+ta mut+pAR+Ya pra tA pa ni d+hi mA sa nA ta/ /k+ShI NaH sha shI s+tha bi raHsa rA dz+ya b+hok+tu mi ts+tsha ti/ /tsI ba ro d+big+na gA tra s+ya bar bas+t+rA b+hi lA
<p>315a.2</p>song / /blun po dag gi a mra bzhin/ /phal cher thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /de slad gzi byin chen po'i gter/ /khyod ni khri las rab bskyod nas/ /gnas brtan ri bong can nyams bzhin/ /de ni rgyal srid spyod par 'dod/ /lus ni chos gos kyis skyo zhing / /gos mchog mngon
<p>315a.3</p>Shi NaH/ /dzA tA s+ya muN+Di te mUr+d+h+ni rat+nAM ka mu ku Ta spr-i hA/ /rat+na harmye Shu na ba tA sam+b+ho ga bi b+ha bod+b+ha ba/ /t+yak+t+wA bi lA saM sA yA saM pa na bA paM sa he ta kaH/ /mr-i du sha ya na su khAr+hA ye ka thaM she ra te te ha
<p>315a.4</p>par 'dod ldan 'di/ /mgo zlum la ni rin chen gyis/ /mtshan pa'i cod pan 'dod par gyur/ /rin chen khang par gsar pa yi/ /longs spyod 'byor bas rnam bskrun pa'i/ /rtse dga' btang nas nags kyi gnas/ /dal dub ldan pa su yis bzod/ /ri dwags rmig pas rtsub cing tsher ma bltams pa'i thab ba
<p>315a.5</p>ri Na khu ra kha rong+yat+kaN+Da kA su s+tha lI Shu/ /ma d+hu bi d+hu ka ra shI taM yan+ni pI taM ka than+te ba na dza ga dza ma doSh+NaM tik+ta mam+b+haHpi ban+ti/ /a d+hu nai ba ta ba san+na pra ba sa bi Sha ma s+thi taH/ /A d+yam+ma taM na ya bi dA ma rA dza pu tra ni pA
<p>315a.6</p>la/ /gang zhig 'jam pa'i mal stan bder 'os de dag ji ltar nyal/ /gang gis zla zer ltar bsil chang 'thungs de dag nags skyes kyi/ /glang po'i chang gis dro zhing kha ba'i chu ni ji ltar 'thung / /khyod la mi bzang bgrod pa ni/ /da lta nyid du nye bar gnas/ /lugs shes rnams kyi dang po'i gros/ /rgyal sras nges
<p>315b</p>
<p>315b.1</p>ta naM/ /tasmA da nA ga to rA dzA pUr+b+ba ba d+h+ya sta ba pra b+ho/ /dI paM han+ti pa taM go hi na dag+d+he sh+tse ta sa mA ba ta na/ /ta yo ri ti gi rA k+Shi pra ma b+hud+d+hu pa ti rA ku laH/ /kha la me g+haiH ka lu Sha tAM nI taM ka s+ya na mA na saM/ /sa tau ba b+hA
<p>315b.2</p>par lhung byed pa'o/ /de slad rgyal po ma 'ongs pa'i/ /sngon du jo po khyod kyis gsod/ /phye ma leb ni 'bab pa dag /gal te ma bsregs mar me 'joms/ /zhes pa de dag tshig gis ni/ /sa bdag myur du 'khrugs par gyur/ /mi bsrun sprin gyis su yi yid/ /dri ma ldan par byed mi 'gyur/ /dogs bcas
<p>315b.3</p>She sA shi kaHkra ka tsa krU ra tAM ga taH/ /bA d+haH sA d+hA ra e bA yaM yu ba yorma ma tsA gra taH/ /b+ha bad+b+h+yA me ba bi na yo pA ya bi shrAn+ta yA d+hi yA/ /bi tsAR+Ya kAR+Ya tAt+pa R+YaM tad+pi d+hi yA tAM/ /i
<p>315b.4</p>sog le bzhin du ni/ /rtsub mor gyur des der smras pa/ /bdag dang khyed gnyis mdun du ni/ /gnod pa 'di ni thun mong nyid/ /khyod gnyis nyid kyis khyad par gyis/ /tshul dang thabs la gnas pa'i blos/ /bya ba'i de nyid rnam dpyod la/ /gang rigs de ni sgrub par mdzod/ /ces
<p>315b.5</p>ti rA dz+nyA kr-i ta sot+pa hA tau bi sr-i dz+yA shu g+hA ta kA na/ /u drA ya Na s+yA gra pa thaM ba d+hA yai ba ba ban+d+ha tuH/ /so bi bra dzA pa ri trA Ne ni yok+tuM pu tra mud+ya taH/ /b+ha ga ba taM sa ma b+h+ye t+ya bra dzA mI ti bya dzi dz+nyA pata/ /
<p>315b.6</p>te rgyal pos spro bar byas/ /de dag gis mgyogs gsod byed btang / /gsad phyir u drA ya na yi/ /mdun gyi lam ni rab tu bsdams/ /des kyang skye rgu yongs bskyab slad/ /bu la bsgo bar brtson pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs te/ /bdag 'gro'o zhes zhu bar byas/ /
<p>316a</p>
<p>316a.1</p>sarba snyai nA d+h+ya nu dz+nyA taHrba graM taM b+hu dz+nye tA mi ti/ /kar+m+ma pA sha sa mA kr-iSh+TaHsa ya yau ro ru kaM pu raM/ /ta mad+ba dzan+taM ni r+b+yA dza mA tsA ra mi ba durdza nAH/ /duSh+Ta mA t+ya pra yuk+tasta dza g+h+nur+b+bar+t+ma ni g+hA ta
<p>316a.2</p>rang gis byas pa spyod mdzod ces/ /thams cad mkhyen pas rjes gnang nas/ /las kyi zhags pas yang dag drangs/ /de ni sgra sgrog grong khyer song / /lam du zol med 'ong ba de/ /blon po gdug pas bskos pa yis/ /gshed ma de dag rnams kyis bsad/ /skye bo ngan pas kun spyod
<p>316a.3</p>kAH/ /ta s+ya tsI ba ra pA trA dI br-i hI twA ni ha te s+ya te/ /n+ya be da ya na kr-i taM prI t+yai rA dza kAR+ya ma mA t+ya yoH/ /ta taHbA ba bra hr-iSh+TA b+h+yAM nr-i pastA b+h+yAM pra daR+shi taM/ /dr-iSh+TA mu mo ha sa ha sA rak+tAk+taM tsI ba raM bi tuH/ /sa
<p>316a.4</p>bzhin/ /bsad pa de yi chos gos dang / /lhung bzed sogs bzung de dag gis/ /blon po dag la mgu ba'i slad/ /rgyal po'i bya ba byas pas smras/ /sdig pas rab dga' de dag gis/ /mi yi bdag la rab tu bstan/ /pha yi chos gos khrag gis ni/ /sbags mthong 'phral la rmongs par gyur/ /dal
<p>316a.5</p>lab+d+ha saM dz+nyA sha na kaiHshu sho tsa na ta thA gu ruM/ /ya thA pa ti ta mAt+mA naM g+ho re na ra ka ga hwa re/ /so\u0f85ba dad+ba ta saM prA p+taM pha laM kha la dza nAn+ma yA/ /ai shwAR+ya ma d+hu lub+d+he na pA ba pA ta ma ba sh+ya tA/ /a ho pa ta ni rA lam+be
<p>316a.6</p>gyis 'du shes thob pa des/ /ji ltar bdag nyid dmyal ba ni/ /'jigs rung gting du lhung ba yis/ /mya ngan de bzhin bla ma'i min/ /des smras dbang phyug sbrang rtsi chags/ /sdig par lhung pa ma mthong ba/ /bdag gis skye bo mi bsrun las/ /kye ma 'bras bu yang dag thob/ /kye ma kye hud rten sa med/ /'jigs
<p>316b</p>
<p>316b.1</p>g+ho re na ra ka saM ka Te/ /un+na tA ro hi NAM sa d+yaHpa ta kaM kha la sad+ga taM/ /kr-i ta me ta ta ma hata pA paM duSh+TA mA t+ya d+hi yA ma yA/ /pa ti ta s+ya ma me dA nI pA ba ko pi na pA ba kaH/ /tu l+ya pi tu sh+tsAr+ha tash+tsa
<p>316b.2</p>rung dmyal ba'i gting du ni/ /mthon por 'dzegs rnams mi bsrun dang / /'grogs pas 'phral la lhung byed 'gyur/ /gdug pa blon po'i blo gros kyis/ /bdag gis sdig chen 'di dag byas/ /da ni lhung bar gyur pa bdag /gtsang byed kyis kyang gtsang mi byed/ /mnyam du pha dang dgra bcom dag/
<p>316b.3</p>ba d+he kA ma ma niHkr-i tiH/ /pI taM ya tra ma yai kasmin pA tre sa da ha naM bi ShaM/ /br-id+d+he pi ta ri niHshaM ka sha ma pra bra dz+ya lA shri te/ /swa tsit+taM ni shi taM shas+t+raM lo b+hA d+b+yA pa ri taM ma yA/ /yat+saM tsin+ta ta me ba kam+ba dza na kaM shro tuM na
<p>316b.4</p>bsad pa bdag ni su yis sgrol/ /gang du bdag gi snod gcig tu/ /dug ni sreg byed ldan pa 'thungs/ /dogs med yab ni rgan po dag /rab byung zhib bsten pa la/ /chags las bdag gis rang gi sems/ /mtshon ni rnon po'i bya ba byas/ /gang zhig bsams pa nyid na 'dar bskyed byed de ni thos par
<p>316b.5</p>tat+sha kya te dr-iSh+TaM yats+tsa ka ro ti sho ka ka la nAM nish+tse ta nA nA ma pi/ /ya tra kauR+ya ma pi pra yA ti mr-i du tAM tI brA nu tA pAg+ni nA ta trA pi pra sa ran+ti nir+g+h+r-i Na d+hi yAM ni s+t+riM sha tIk+Sh+NAHkri yAH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA duHkha san+tap+taHpra lA
<p>316b.6</p>yongs mi bzod/ /gang zhig mthong nas sems med rnams kyang mya ngan dag la rab tu bcags par byed/ /gang la 'gyod pa drag po'i me yis ma rungs rnams kyang 'jam po nyid 'gyur ba/ /de la'ang brtse med blo ldan rnams ni ral gri rnon po'i bya ba rab tu spros/ /zhes brjod sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa/ /
<p>317a</p>
<p>317a.1</p>sa mu kha rA na naH/ /n+ya pA ra yat+ta yoHko pA ta pra be+e shaM duSh+Ta man tri NoH/ /gu NAn+ta raM ba ri dz+nyA ya b+hi ru kaM he ru kaM tsa saH/ /A ni nA ya pra sA d+ya shu pu rA Ne sa tsi bau pi tuH/ /ta taHtsin+tA kr-i she rA dz+nyI sho kA ta paN+Du ra tAM ga taH/ /swai raM
<p>317a.2</p>bzhin ni cho nge'i mu cor ldan/ /ma rungs blon po de dag ni/ /nang du 'jug pa khro bas bzlog /yon tan khyad par yongs shes des/ /he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka /yab kyi sngon gyi blon po gnyis/ /rab tu dang bsam mgyogs par bos/ /de nas rgyal po bsam pas rid/ /mya ngan gyis ni skya bor gyur/ /dal gyis
<p>317a.3</p>tadz+dza na nI me t+ya duSh+TA mA t+yA ba bo tsa tAM/ /de bi twat+ta na yaHshrI mAn swa b+hA ba sha ra lA sha yaH/ /rAdz+ya rak+ShaM na dzA nA ti swa dza nots+tsha da karka shaM/ /pi tA pra bra dzi to s+ya s+ya rA dz+yaM hartu mu pA ga taH/ /A bA b+h+yAM pra sha maM nI ta sta tra
<p>317a.4</p>blon po gdug pa yis/ /de yi ma la mngon phyogs smras/ /lha mo khyod sras dpal dang ldan/ /rang bzhin gyis ni bsam pa drang / /nang mi rab gcod rtsub mo yis/ /rgyal srid bsrung ba yongs mi shes/ /pha ni rab tu byung ba yang / /'di yi rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs/ /bdag cag rnams kyis rab zhi byas/ /
<p>317a.5</p>kA nA ma bA ts+ya ta/ /nI ta tan+t+ro ba pan+nA sh+tse ta kra mo ya mo shu b+ha kra maH/ /rA dz+yA b+hi lA Shi tA b+hi k+Shosta s+yA pi sa ka tha kra maH/ /A bAM pi kr-i ba d+ha kro d+hAta bA re tau b+hU b+hU dzA pa dAta/ /swa ya ma d+yA bi sho ke na kiM mi th+ya pa ri shu Sh+ya
<p>317a.6</p>de la ci zhig brjod par bya/ /gal te lugs kyi rgyud ldan pa'i/ /rim bar dge ba'i rim min na/ /dge slong de yang rgyal srid ni/ /mngon par 'dod de ji ltar rim/ /sa bdag pha bsad khros pa yis/ /bdag cag gnas nas rnam par bskrad/ /rang nyid da lta'ang mya ngan gyis/ /log par ci la yongs su
<p>317b</p>
<p>317b.1</p>te/ /su kr-i taM kr-i ta mA bA b+h+yAM pra b+horduHkr-i tAd+ga tAM/ /b+ha ban+ti sar+b+ba b+hA be Shu b+h+r-i t+ya e ba pra rA d+hi naH/ /ga taM sho tsa ti kiM rA dzA yat+k+r-i taM ta me ba tata/ /u pe k+Sha te twa yA de bi kasmAts+tsin+tA kr-i sha su taH/ /
<p>317b.2</p>skems/ /bdag cag gis ni legs byas byas/ /jo bo'i nyes byas nyid du gyur/ /dngos po kun la g.yog po rnams/ /gnod pa nyid dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rgyal po 'das la ci zhig 'gyod/ /gang byas de dag byas pa nyid/ /lha mo bsam pas ring ba'i bu/ /khyod kyis ci slad btang snyoms byed/ /
<p>317b.3</p>tA b+h+ya mi t+yu di taM shru twA sa rA dza dza na nI sha naiH/ /U tse ta ra li kA nA ma tad+bA kya bi hi tA da rA/ /A nan+taR+ya mi daM kar+m+ma dwa yaM na ra ka pA ta kaM/ /yuSh+man+ma tA du pa na taM rA dz+nyA pU r+b+ba kr-i te na bA/ /a haM tu bA ra
<p>317b.4</p>de dag gis ni brjod thos nas/ /de dag tshig la gus pas bsgrubs/ /ta ra li ka zhes pa yi/ /rgyal po'i ma des dal bus smras/ /khyod kyi gros la nyer bsgrun pa'i/ /rgyal pos sngon ni byas pa yis/ /dmyal bar ltung bar byed pa'i las/ /'di ni mtshams med gnyis su 'gyur/ /'di yi pha bsad las
<p>317b.5</p>yA mya s+ya sho kaM pi tr-i ba d+hod+b+ha paM/ /ar+had+ba d+hod+b+hU baM duHkhaM b+ha bad+b+h+yA ma pi bAR+ya tAM/ /i ti tau swai ra mA di sh+ya sA ga twA par+thi bAn+ti kaM/ /ta mu bA tsa shu tsAkrAn+taM pa ri k+ShI Na mi bo Du paM/ /d+harmA d+harma ma yaM du tra rA dz+yAM rA dz+nyAM ba
<p>317b.6</p>skyes pa'i/ /mya ngan bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /dgra bcom bsad skyes sdug bsngal ni/ /khyed gnyis kyis kyang zlog par mdzod/ /ces pa dal gyis de la bstan/ /sa bdag drung du de song nas/ /mya ngan gyis non zla ba ni/ /yongs zad lta bu de la smras/ /chos dang chos min rang bzhin gyis/ /rgyal po'i rgyal
<p>318a</p>
<p>318a.1</p>huts+tsha laM/ /pA pA shaM ka yA tasmin ki shu tsA pa ri shu Sh+ya si/ /pi turba d+hA ta pra tap+to si ya di nA ma gu ru pri yaH/ /ta trA d+ya te sa mut+p+r-i dz+ya ladz+dza twad+d+huHkha saM ka Te/ /swai raM dzA tas+t+wa ma n+ye na na sa ta d+harma taHpi tA/ /swaits+tsha
<p>318a.2</p>srid nyes pa mang / /de la sdig dogs mya ngan gyis/ /bu khyod ci la yongs su gdung / /gal te nges par pha bsad las/ /bla ma la byams khyod gdung na/ /khyod kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad der/ /de ring khyod la ngo tsha gtong / /khyod kyi chos nyid pha de min/ /khyod ni gsang ba gzhan las skyes/ /rang 'dod
<p>318a.3</p>hA ra su kha pu tras+t+rI yo hi ni ra pa tra pAH/ /i t+yapri ya ma bi shru twA rA dzA tad+ba tsa naM ra haH/ /pi tr-i bai sha sha pA po gra duHkha san+tA ba ma t+ya dzata/ /pra kur+b+ban+t+ya stA dre ru da ya gi ri NA shA+e Sha ka la nAM k+Sha NA ta k+Sho NI k+Sh+mA b+h+r-id+bi g+ha
<p>318a.4</p>zas dang bde bas bu/ /bud med rnams la khrel yod min/ /zhes pa de tshig snyan min yang / /dben par rgyal pos thos gyur nas/ /pha bsad sdig pa drag po yis/ /sdug bsngal dag gis gdung ba btang / /shar gyi ri bos nub kyi ril sbyor ba'i bya ba rab tu byed/ /skad cig gis ni sa dang sa 'dzin bral ba'i
<p>318a.5</p>Ta na bi no daM bi da d+he ti/ /sr-i dzan+te tA bah+niM sa ya di sa li lAt+tats+tsa da ha nA da sA d+h+yaM nA rI NAM rI NAM na hi b+ha ba ti kiny+tsit+t+ri b+hu ba ne/ /a thA sau\u0f85d+had+ba d+he nai ba sha l+ya tu l+ye na bI Di taH/ /nr-i paHsa prats+tsha d+har+m+ma dz+nyAn+niHkr-i tiM ta s+ya kar+m+ma NaH/ /ta ta
<p>318a.6</p>rol rtsed rnam par bsgrubs/ /'di dag 'phral la me ni chu las rnam spro de yang sreg byed las/ /srid gsum dag na bud med rnams kyi bsgrub bya min pa ci yang med/ /de nas dgra bcom bsad pa nyid/ /zug rngu lta bus gzir ba yi/ /mi bdag de yis las de ni/ /phyir bcos chos shes rnams la dris/ /de nas blon
<p>318b</p>
<p>318b.1</p>stau duSh+Ta sa tsi bau ti Sh+ya pu Sh+yA khya tsi t+ya yoH/ /mAr+dz+dza ra po tau d+h+r-i twAn+taHsa k+tA bA mI Sha shi k+Sha la/ /ni Shid+d+hA ba pi d+har+Sh+D+ye na pra bi sh+ya nr-i pa teHsa b+hAM/ /ta mU tsa tuHtI pra tA pa san+tA ba pra sha mAr+thi naM/ /de ba mi th+yai ba b+ha ba
<p>318b.2</p>ngan de dag gis/ /rgyal dang skar rgyal mchod rten gyi/ /nang du byi la chung ngu gnyis/ /sha yi bslabs pas chags byas nas/ /bkag par gyur gyang spyi brtol gyis/ /mi bdag mdun sar rab bzhugs te/ /gdung ba drag pos yongs gdungs pa/ /rab zhi don gnyer de la smras/ /lha gcig khyod ni rdzun nyid
<p>318b.3</p>tA tsit+ta mA yA s+ya te b+h+r-i shaM/ /sarba ka l+yA NA lo ke smin nAr+han+taHsan+ti te taH/ /ya di sa t+yaM b+ha be yuste na b+ha sA rA dza haM sa pa ta/ /r-id+d+h+yA yAn+ti ka thaM te ShA ma n+ye nA ba d+ha saM b+ha baH/ /na san+ti tasmA dar+han+taH ku tastad+pa d+ha pA
<p>318b.4</p>kyis/ /sems ni mchog tu gdung bar byed/ /'jig rten 'di na de nyid du/ /thams cad dge ba'i dgra bcom med/ /gal te de dag bden pa na/ /mkha' la ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis bgrod pas/ /gzhan gyis gsod pa ji ltar srid/ /de smad dgra bcom yod min na/ /de bsad sdig pa
<p>318b.5</p>ta kaM/ /sI ma bi bA daHkasta tra ya tra grA mo na bi d+ya te/ /ti Sh+ya pu Sh+yau gr-i ha pa tI yA bar+ha tA ba da mA pa tuH/ /mArdzA ban+ta re dzA tau tA be bA d+ya swa tsai t+ya yoH/ /pra ka Tau to tsa dr-i sh+ya te bra t+yak+Sha ka s+ya saM sha yaH/ /pra t+ya yo ya di
<p>318b.6</p>ga la yod/ /gang na grong khyer yod min pa/ /de na mtshams kyi rtsod pas ci/ /gang dag khyim bdag rgyal dang ni/ /skar rgyal dgra bcom gnas thob pa/ /de dag da lta rang rang gi/ /mchod rten nang du byi lar skyes/ /de dag gsal bar mngon su bgyis/ /mthong la the tshom su zhig byed/ /gal te yid ches
<p>319a</p>
<p>319a.1</p>nAs+t+ye ba swa yaM kiM na nI rI k+Sh+ya te/ /i t+yuk+t+wA b+hU pA te kr-i twA kha lau do lA ku lam+ma naH/ /dzag+ma tuHsa hi tau te na tsai t+ya saM daR+sha nA ya tau/ /a pUr+b+ba kau tu kA be shAta ta tra saM g+haT+Ti te dza ne/ /bi lo ka nod+Ya te rA dz+nyI sa
<p>319a.2</p>yod min na/ /rang nyid nges par cis mi blta/ /zhes pa brjod nas sa bdag yid/ /khyogs la 'phyang ba bzhin byas nas/ /mi bsrun de dag de dang ni/ /lhan cig mchod rten lta bu song / /sngon med ltad mo 'bebs pa yis/ /der ni skye bo yang dag 'khrigs/ /rgyal po blon bcas blta brtson
<p>319a.3</p>mA t+ye duSh+Ta man+t+ri No/ /A mi ShA b+h+yA sA da sam+bad+d+ha ti Sh+ya pu Sh+yA b+hi d+ha na yoH/ /d+hur+t+to tsakra tu rAd+kA nAM sha nairbA la bi DA la yoH/ /to pa ti Sh+ya puSh+yA bar+ha tAM mA yai ba yu ba yoR+Ya di/ /pra dak+Shi NA ba kri ya tAM te na sa t+ye na tsai
<p>319a.4</p>tshe/ /gdug pa'i blon po g.yon can gyis/ /sha la goms pas 'brel byas pa/ /rgyal dang skar rgyal zhes brjod pas/ /byi la chung ngu gnyis po dang / /dal bu yis ni mthong bar byas/ /rgyal dang skar rgyal de dag gis/ /gal te dgra bcom sgyu nyid na/ /bden pa de yis khyod gnyis kyis/ /mchod rten la ni
<p>319a.5</p>t+ya yoH/ /mA sa dA na k+Sha Ne tA b+h+yA mi ti tA tsa mu dI ri tau/ /tur+N+NaM nar+g+ga t+ya mArdzA rau tsakra tustau pra da k+Shi NaM/ /tad dr-iSh+Ta sa ha sA bAp+ta pra t+ya ye sA nu ge nr-i pe/ /yA te durdza na mA yai ba dza gadz+dza ya ma hIM ya yau/ /muSh+Tau
<p>319a.6</p>bskor ba'ang mdzod/ /sha ster tshe na de dag gis/ /de skad skad cher brjod pa yis/ /byi la de dag mgyogs par ni/ /nges par 'thon nas bskor ba byas/ /mi bdag rjes 'brang bcas pa yis/ /mthong nas 'phral la yid ches thob/ /skye bo ngan pa'i sgyu ma nyid/ /sa steng 'gro las rgyal bar gyur/ /khu tshur
<p>319b</p>
<p>319b.1</p>pA yuM dr-i Sha di ka ma laM tsi tra mA kA sha de she dzi hwA gre tsa pra tsu ra ra tsa nA sr-iSh+Ti saM hA rA lI lA// kiM bA nA n+ya ta ba shu shi shu d+hi yAM mo hA mA yan+d+re dzA laM mur+t+taM d+hUr+t+tAHk+Sha Na pa ri tsi ta pra t+ya yaM daR+sha yan+ti/ /niHpra t+ya ya
<p>319b.2</p>du rlung rdo la pad+ma nam mkha'i phyogs la ri mo dang / /lce rtse la yang spro dang sdud pa'i rol pa rab mang bkod ba dang / /gzhan yang ci min phyugs dang byis pa'i blo la rmongs sgyu mig 'phrul dag /skad cig yongs 'dris yid ches gzugs can g.yon can rnams kyis ston par byed/ /de nas bde
<p>319b.3</p>ba raM rA dzA ta taHso ga ta daR+sha ne/ /AR+ya kA t+yA ya NA s+yA gre shrad+d+hA bU dzA ma bA rA yata/ /rA dza d+hA n+yAM ni Shod+d+ho tha ba hi re pa sa sA nu gaH/ /bi ne ya kr-i pa yA ta tra tas+thau shai lA tsa b+hi k+Shu NI/ /ta taHkA dA yAn+taM dr-iSh+T+wA kA t+yA ya naHbu raH/ /
<p>319b.4</p>gshegs bstan pa la/ /rgyal po mchog tu yid ches bral/ /'phags pa kA t+yA ya na ni/ /mdun du dad pas mchod pa bzlog /de nas rgyal pos grong khyer bkag /phyi rol nyid der gdul bya la/ /brtse bas rjes 'brang bcas te gnas/ /dge slong ma ni ri ma yang / /de nas kA t+yA ya na ni/ /gang tshe sngon du mi yi bdag
<p>319b.5</p>nr-i pa tiM dza na saM pA d+hA da ba mA na b+ha yAt+Ya yau/ /pre Shi taM pUr+b+ba man+t+ri b+h+yaM bra dzan+ta ma bo lo kya taM/ /duSh+TA mA t+yA na ra pa tIM dIr+g+ha bai rA ba bo tsa tuH/ /rA dzan+na maM ga la ni d+hiM muN+Do yaM bi shi khaHsa thi/ /dr-iSh+To nya d+ya
<p>319b.6</p>'ong ba mthong nas skye bo yi/ /tshogs pas smod pas 'jigs nas gshegs/ /blon po snga ma dag gis bskul/ /de ni gshegs pa mthong gyur nas/ /gdug pa'i blon po khon ring dang / /ldan pa dag gis rgyal la smras/ /rgyal po bkra shi min pa'i gter/ /dge sbyong mgo reg skra med de/ /lam du de ring
<p>320a</p>
<p>320a.1</p>b+hik+Shu rasmA b+hir+n+na bid+baHkiM b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /na pa sh+yA mi mu khaM rA dz+nyAHbA pa s+ye ti b+ha ban+t+ya sau/ /ta tha hi k+Sha Na me kaM te ga twA du ra mi ta s+thi taH/ /shru twa tad+durdza nA maR+ShA du bA tsA nu ra tsa rAn nr-i paH/ /e Sha
<p>320a.2</p>bdag cag gis/ /mthong bas ci 'byung yongs mi shes/ /'di ni rgyal po sdig can gyi/ /bzhin la bdag med blta zhes brjod/ /khyod la 'di nas skad cig gcig /ring du song ste de ltar gnas/ /gzhung ngan khros pas de thos nas/ /mi bdag gis ni 'khor rnams la/ /phyag dar
<p>320a.3</p>dU ras+thi taHpAM shu muSh+Ti b+hiHbuR+Ya tA mi ti/ /pUR+Ya mA Na sa taiHpAM shu muSh+Ti b+hirduSh+Ta tse Ta kaiH/ /di byAM ku Ti pra be she na pa ri hA rA ya nirma me/ /a maR+Sha ko pi tA sar+p+pA byA g+h+rA bA pI ta lo hi tAH/ /shAn+te
<p>320a.4</p>rdul gyi par mo yis/ /ring du gnas 'di g.yogs zhes smras/ /gdug pa'i 'bang ni de dag gis/ /rdul gyi par mos g.yogs pa na/ /nang du zhugs pa bzlog pa'i slad/ /de yis mchog gi khang pa sbrul/ /khro bas 'khrugs pa'i sprul rnams dang / /khrag ni 'thungs pa'i stag dag kyang / /zhi las
<p>320a.5</p>rA yAn+ti mr-i du tA na tu b+hU pa ti tse Ta kAH/ /ta ta pra yA te nr-i pa tau pAM shu rA shi sha tA br-i taM/ /duHkhA dU tsa tu ra b+h+ye t+ya he ru ko b+hi ru kany+tsa taM/ /AR+ya kr-its+tsh+wa ma bAp+to si rA dz+nyAHkru ra duHkr-i taiH/ /lo tsa nA nid+hi tsA smA kaM yai ri daM dr-i sh+ya te
<p>320a.6</p>'jam pa nyid gyur te/ /sa yi bdag po'i 'bang ma yin/ /de nas mi bdag song ba'i tshe/ /rdul phung brgya yis g.yogs de la/ /he ru ka dang b+hi ru kas/ /rdul la mngon du phyogs te smras/ /rgyal po ma rungs ngan byed kyis/ /'phags pa khyod kyis 'o brgyal thob/ /gang gi mdun du 'di mthong bas/ /bdag cag gi ni mig
<p>320b</p>
<p>320b.1</p>pu raH/ /mo hAn+d+haHpA ta ka shwa b+h+re du rdza naiHpA ti tau nr-i baH/ /kar+m+ma No pa ya ma s+ya s+ya daR+sha nAd+pA pa b+hA gi naH/ /b+hU ri yaM b+hU ri pA pAr+t+tA t+yA dz+yA prA dz+ya ma tep+ta ba/ /duHsa haHkha la saM bA saHt+yAk+taHka s+ya na sam+ma taH/ /pra
<p>320b.2</p>rnams smad/ /rmongs pa'i mun pa sdig spyod du/ /skye bo ngan pas mi bdag bsgyur/ /las 'di mthong bas bdag cag kyang / /sdig pa'i skal ba dag dang ldan/ /sa gzhi sdig mang gis gdungs 'di/ /blo mnga' khyod kyis btang bar byos/ /bzod dka' mi bsrun gnas pa 'di/ /gtang bar 'os pa su mi 'dod/ /zhi ba
<p>320b.3</p>yA ti na sha maHsha maM k+Sha ya mu pai ti nai ba k+Sha mA b+ha ban+ti na tsa bud+d+ha yaHpa ru Sha ro Sha do Shaspr-i shaH/ /ba san+ti na bi mA na nA ma na si sha l+ya tu l+yAHsa tAM na durdza ba nA da pa ra ma ste lo ke su khaM/ /ai shwaR+yaM gu Ni nA ma d+ho ni pata nA yA
<p>320b.4</p>zhi bar mi 'gyur bzod pa nyid ni nye bar zad mi 'gyur/ /khro ba rtsub mo'i skyon rnams dag gis blo gros la yang reg mi 'gyur/ /ngan sems zug rngu dang mtshungs yid la mi gnas dam pa rnams dag la/ /'jig rten na ni skye bo ngan pa rnam par spangs las bde gzhan med/ /dbang phyug nyid ni yon tan ldan rnams
<p>320b.5</p>sa pra yA sa pra daM gAm+b+hIR+yaM ti mi rA ka raM pra bi sha tAM prA NA pa haM prA Ni nAM/ /naSh+TA sA pi ni kr-iSh+Ta duSh+Ta ku Ti la byA lai ru pA de ya tA kU pa s+ye ba kha la s+ya nAsti ta da ho do ShA ni yuk+taM ya taH/ /ta yo ri ti ba tsaH
<p>320b.6</p>'og lhung ngal dub nyon mongs ldan ba ster/ /zab mo nyid ni rab rib 'byung gnas su 'jug srog chags rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /mchog gyur de yang ma rungs gdug pa gya gyu'i sprul rnams dag gis nyams byas pa/ /kye ma gang gis skyon dang bral ba de ni mi bsrun la med khron pa bzhin/ /de dag tshig de thos gyur
<p>321a</p>
<p>321a.1</p>shru twA ma hA kA t+yA ya no \u0f85ba data/ /na ni kA re bi me ko paHkar+m+ma No ga ti rI dr-i shI/ /e tA ba de ba me duHkhaM ya n+mU D+ha s+ya ma hI pa teH/ /kha la sad+ga ma do She Na b+ha yaM ma hA du pas+thi taM/ /pra tha me\u0f85tI ma hA bA yuH
<p>321a.2</p>nas/ /kA t+yA ya na chen pos smras/ /gnod pa byas kyang bdag ma khros/ /'di 'dra las kyi bgrod pa yin/ /gang zhigs bdag blun po la/ /mi bsrun dang 'grogs skyon dag gis/ /'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas/ /'di dag kho na bdag sdug bsngal/ /'di yi grong du dang po yi/ /nyin
<p>321a.3</p>pu re s+ya ni pa ti Sh+ya ti/ /dwi tI ye puSh+pa br-iSh+Tash+tsa bas+t+ra br-iSh+Ta taHpa re/ /rU bya br-iSh+Tash+tsa tur+the tsa he ma ma br-iSh+Tash+tsa pany+tsa me/ /ran+ta pr-iSh+Tasta taHpAM shu br-iSh+Tash+tsa sap+ta me/ /ta yA sa ban+d+hu rASh+TA+o sau na b+ha bi She ti b+hU pa tiH/ /tasmAd+b+ha
<p>321a.4</p>la rlung chen 'bab bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni me tog char/ /de nas gzhan la gos kyi char/ /dngul gyi char ni bzhi pa la/ /lnga pa la yang gser gyi char/ /de nas rin chen char pa ste/ /rdul gyi char ba bdun pa la/ /de yis sa bdag gnyen dang ni/ /yul 'khor bcas 'di med par 'gyur/ /de slad
<p>321a.5</p>pad+b+h+yAM gan+ta bya rat+nA n+yA dA ya b+hU ya se/ /i ti tad+ba tsaM naM shru twA bi ni shri t+ya ta thi ti tau/ /he ru kaHsh+ya ma kaM pu traM ta s+yo pas+thA ya kaM bya d+h+wAta/ /b+hi ru kash+tsa su tAM sh+yA mA pa tI mA dA ya pA Ni nA/ /i b+h+ye ta b+hik+Shu kIM shai lAM pra Na yA di dam pra bIta/ /
<p>321a.6</p>khyed gnyis rin chen ni/ /mang po blangs nas 'gro bar bya/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /de bzhin zhes te de dag song / /sngo bsangs he ru ka yi bu/ /de yi nye bar gnas pa byas/ /b+hi ru kas kyang bu mo ni/ /sngo bsangs can ma lag pas khrid/ /dge slong ma ni ri ma la/ /mngon phyogs gus pas 'di dag smras/ /
<p>321b</p>

<p>324b</p>
<p>324b.1</p>br-id+d+ha d+harma d+ha ba la shrad+d+hA sa mr-id+d+h+yAn+bi taM niHsaM sA ra bi dzr-iM b+hi taM ta du tsi taM tsit+ta s+ya bit+tas+ya tsa/ /dzi na dze ta ba nA rA ma bi hA ri ni ma hA d+ha naH/ /d+hI rA b+hi d+hA naHshra bas+t+yA ma b+hud+g+r-i ha pa ti pu rA/ /ta s+ya paN+Di ta nA mA b+hU ta pu traHsu
<p>324b.2</p>la dad pa phun tshogs dang ldan 'khor ba med pa ni/ /rnam par 'phel byed de ni sems dang nor dag dag pa nyid la rigs pa yin/ /rgyal ba rgyal byed tshal gyi ni/ /kun dga' ra bar bzhugs tshe sngon/ /mnyan yod du ni khyim bdag dag /brtan pa zhes bya nor chen byung / /mkhas pa zhes bya de yi bu/ /legs byas

<p>325a.1</p>@#/ Not+sa ha sa hiSh+Nu baH/ /ar+tha sar+thAr+tha na kalpa br-ik+Shas+t+waM dik+Shu be shru taH/ /sha tA ni pany+tsa saM prap+tAs+t+wa mud+bi sh+yA sha ya ba yaM/ /a laM kA rAM shu ka yu gaM pra t+ye ka naHsa mI hi taM/ /a d+hu nai bA bi
<p>325a.2</p>sngon du phyogs nas smras/ /slong ba'i don mthun slong ba yi/ /dpag bsam shing khyed phyogs su grags/ /bdag cag lnga brgya khyod la ni/ /bsam pa gtad la yang dag 'ongs/ /rgyan dang gos ni zung re dag /bdag cag so so yang dag 'dod/ /gal te phod na da lta
<p>325a.3</p>lam+be na dI ya tAM ya di shAkya te/ /it+yuk+tasteHsa dA tsA raHso ba tIR+Ya tu raM ga man/ /sA d+hu pU dza bi d+hAye ShAM d+hI mAn+k+Sha Na ma tsi ta yata/ /b+ha ga ban+ta ma dr-iSh+Tai ba gats+tshA mi swa gr-i haM ya di/ /A san+nA mr-i ta pA na s+ya taM
<p>325a.4</p>nyid/ /thogs pa med par gnang bar mdzod/ /de yis 'di brjod dam pa yi/ /spyod ldan de ni rta las babs/ /de rnams legs par mchod byas nas/ /blo dang ldan pas skad cig bsams/ /gal te bcom ldan ma mthong bar/ /rang gi khyim du phyin pa na/ /bdud rtsi 'thung la nye ba yis/ /gegs
<p>325a.5</p>big+h+naM ka tha mud+sa he/ /a ra twa pri ya mar+thi s+yA bra dzA mi ya di nis+t+ra paH/ /ka thaM ka ro mi dA na s+ya twAM swa yaM pra ta khaN+Da nAM/ /i ti tsin+ta ya tasta s+ya b+hi twA b+hU miM sa mud+ga taH/ /nA ga rA dzaHswa yaM she ShaHprA dA dAr+tha sa mI hi taM/ /
<p>325a.6</p>de bdag gis ji ltar bzod/ /slong rnams 'dod pa ma byin par/ /gal te khrel med phyin pa na/ /sbyin pa'i brtul zhugs rang nyid kyis/ /nyams pa 'di yang ji ltar bya/ /de ni de ltar sems pa na/ klu yi rgyal po lhag ma rang / /sa gzhi brtol nas yang dag 'thon/ /slong rnams 'dod pa rab tu
<p>325b</p>
<p>325b.1</p>dat+tA ni nA ga rA dze na bas+t+rA N+yA b+ha ra NA ni tsa/ /sa te b+h+yaHpra ti yAR+yA shu ya yau niHsha l+ya tA mi ba/ /te bi dr-iSh+N+wA ta dAsh+tsaR+Ya pu N+ya su ga ta b+hA ba nAM/ /sar+b+bAr+tha sam+pa ta sid+d+hI nAM dza na nI me ba me
<p>325b.2</p>byin/ /klu yi rgyal pos byin pa yi/ /gos rnams dang ni rgyan rnams kyang / /de dag rnams la byin nas de/ /zug rngu med bzhin mgyogs par song / /des kyang ngo mtshar de mthong nas/ /bde gshegs bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ni/ /don kun phun sum tshogs pa dag /'grub pa'i ma nyid yin par
<p>325b.3</p>ni sh+tsa/ /dzA ta tsit+ta pra sA dA naM ste te ni ba sa hi tAsta taH/ /b+ha ga ban+taM ya prar+d+raSh+TuM bi na sha dwe Sha kal+ma ShAH/ /b+ha ga ban+ta ma lokyasta tAHku mA raHpra Na tA na naH/ /ut+pA da pad+ma ra dza sA d+ha n+yash+tsa sru la la Ti kAM/ /
<p>325b.4</p>sems/ /de nas sems ni rab dang skyes/ /zhe sdang sdig pa rnam par nyams/ /de dag de dang lhan cig nyid/ /bcom ldan 'das la blta ru song / /de nas bcom ldan mthong gyur nas/ /gzhon nus bzhin ni rab btud de/ /de nas zhabs kyi pad rdul gyis/ /skal ldan dpral bar thig le byas/ /
<p>325b.5</p>tA raM pu rash+tsa ra Na yoHshAstuHsha shi ka ro dz+wa laM/ /bi n+yastaM pra Na tA na gre sa tA nA smain+Ya be da yata/ /d+har+m+ma de sha na yA te ShAM b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na badzra b+h+r-ita/ /b+hi twA sat+kA ya dr-iSh+T+yA dr-i shro taHprAp+ti pha laM bya d+hAta/ /
<p>325b.6</p>ston pa'i zhabs gnyis mdun du ni/ /do shal zla 'od rab 'bar ba/ /bkod nas mdun du rab btud pa/ /de dag de yis de la gsol/ /bcom ldan ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /de dag rnams la chos bstan pas/ /'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri phug nas/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgrubs/ /
<p>326a</p>
<p>326a.1</p>dr-iSh+Ta pa t+ye Shu yA te Shu ta taste Shu pra Na mya tAM/ /ku mA raM paN+Di taM prI t+yA b+ha ga bAn swa ya ma b+hA Shata/ /bat+sa pu N+yai ra wasto bi ba ra yAp+ti su kr-i tAM shri yaM/ /dur+b+hi k+ShA ba bi b+hik+Shu NA ku ru b+ho
