<p>326a.2</p>de nas bden mthong de dag rnams/ /de la phyag 'tshal song ba'i tshe/ /gzhon nu mkhas pa dag la ni/ /bcom ldan dgyes pas mngon gsungs pa/ /bsod nams dag gis bu khyod ni/ /legs byas dpal 'byor yongs rdzogs thob/ /mu ge'i bar du dge slong rnams/ /
<p>326a.3</p>dz+yA b+hi bA sa nI/ /pa ri gra ho me b+hik+Shu NAM sha tA n+yar+d+d+ha tra yo da shaH/ /a n+ye tsan+bi Sh+ya kr-i ts+tshAr+t+tAHsaM bi b+hak+t+yA s+t+wa yA pu re/ /i ti shrutwA b+ha ga ba taHpaN+Di taHpra mo dA ku laH/ /b+hak+t+yA saM
<p>326a.4</p>zas la lhag par gnas pa mdzod/ /bdag gis dge slong brgya phrag ni/ /phyed dang bcu gsum yongs bzung la/ /gzhan yang khyod kyis grong khyer btsal/ /'o brgyal gzer la bgo bshar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di thos nas/ /mkhas pa rab tu dga' bar dkrigs/ /ji srid 'tsho
<p>326a.5</p>g+ha s+ya bi da d+he yA badz+dzI baM ni man+t+ra NaM/ /ta taHsra gr-i ha ma b+h+ye t+ya rA dzAr+he b+hik+Shu sam+ma teH/ /saM bud+d+ha pra mu khaM saM g+haM pa dA b+hau dz+yai ra pU dza yata/ /da ri drA na da ri drAMsh+tsa yAts+yA na bi tsa yA tsa kAn/ /a tra kaM pyAn+sa
<p>326a.6</p>bar gus pa yis/ /dge 'dun mgron du gnyer bar byas/ /de nas rang gi khyim song ste/ /dge slong rab bzhed rgyal po la/ /'os pa'i zas kyis rtag tu ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs dge 'dun mchod/ /dbul dang dbul ba min rnams dang / /bslang bya dang ni slong byed dang / /brtse bas 'os pa
<p>326b</p>
<p>326b.1</p>bi da d+he dA ne nA n+yAn+nu kaM pi naH/ /she ShAn kr-i pa na saM g+hA tAn son+pi Sh+ya ka ru NAm+ba d+hIH/ /rat+na rA shiM da dau te b+h+yo daurga rgya ti mi rA sa haM/ /sa rat+na ni ka ra ste ShAM dza gA mA gA ra rA shi tAM/ /nr-i NAM b+hA gyA ni
<p>326b.2</p>rnams la des/ /sbyin pa zas kyis brtse ba bsgrubs/ /lhag ma 'jungs pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /snying rje'i chu gter des btsal nas/ /de dag rnams la rin chen tshogs/ /dbul ba'i rab rib 'phrog pa byin/ /rin chen tshogs de dag la/ /sol ba'i phung po nyid du gyur/ /gang phyir nor bu rdo rang
<p>326b.3</p>rat+na ni ma Na yo he gA ta yaH/ /te ta mU tsuHsa ma b+h+ye ta swap+na dr-iSh+Ta d+ha nA i ba/ /rat+na nAm+nA twa yAsmA kaM sa dat+toM gA ra sany+tsa yaH/ /d+ha na lA b+he na ma hA tA sad+yaHprAp+ton+na tis+dza naH/ /tat+saM khya yAta k+Sha Ne nai ba ba ri b+h+raSh+To
<p>326b.4</p>bzhin/ /rin chen mi rnams skal pa'o/ /de dag 'ongs nas de la smras/ /rmi lam nor ni mthong ba bzhin/ /rin chen ming gi sol phung de/ /khyod kyis bdag cag rnams la byin/ /skye bo nor chen rnyed pa yis/ /'phral la mthon po thob gyur pa/ /skad cig kho nas de zad las/ /yongs su nyams pa mi
<p>326b.5</p>na dzi bti/ /i ti te ShAM ba tsaHshru twA paN+Di taHka ru Na ni d+hiH/ /tab+ba tse pu N+ya hI nA nAM rat+na n+yA yAM t+ya rat+na tAM/ /yuSh+mA b+hirna kr-i taHpUr+b+baM mo hAt+su kr-i ta sany+tsa ya/ /te mA yaM rat+na rA shir+b+baHpra yA toM gA ra sa ra tAM/ /
<p>326b.6</p>'tsho'o/ /zhes pa de dag tshig thos nas/ /mkhas pa snying rje'i gter dag gis/ /der smras bsod nams dman rnams la/ /rin chen rin chen min nyid 'gyur/ /khyed kyis sngon ni rmongs pa las/ /legs byas tshogs ni ma byas pa/ /des na rin chen phung po 'di/ /khyed la sol ba'i phung por gyur/ /
<p>327a</p>
<p>327a.1</p>rat+nA ni yat+na ni hi ta n+ya pi yAn+ti dU raM pu N+ya k+Sha yA du pa na yAn+ti tsa b+ha gya yo ga ta/ /bit+tArdza naM pa ti ta sho ka ni mit+ta ma ba bit+taM hi tsit+ta mu tsi tiM su pra kr-i ta br-it+taM/ /tasmAt+b+ha bid+b+hir+b+ho dz+yA
<p>327a.2</p>rin chen rnams ni 'bad nas bzung yang bsod nams zad pa las/ /ring du 'gro zhing skal ba ldan pa las kyang nye bar 'ongs/ /nor rnams sgrub pa dag ni rgya che mya ngan mtshan ma nyid/ /nor ni legs byas dag la rab zhugs rigs pa'i sems nyid do/ /de slad khyed kyis dge slong
<p>327a.3</p>ya b+hik+Shu saM g+ho d+hi bA s+ya tAM/ /b+ho ga saM b+hA ra sa ma d+hI ma haM sam+pa da ya mI baH/ /i t+yuk+ta ste na tad+hat+ta bit+ta b+ho dza na sam+pa dA/ /te bud+d+ha pra mu khaM saM g+haM di na me ka ma pU dza ya na/ /saM g+ha ya
<p>327a.4</p>gi/ /dge 'dun zas la sta gon mdzod/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa'i tshogs/ /bdag gis khyed la phun tshogs bgyi/ /zhes brjod de yi nor dang zas/ /phun sum tshogs pa byin pa des/ /sangs rgyas la sogs dge 'dun rnams/ /de dag gis ni nyin gcig mchod/ /dge 'dun ji lta
<p>327a.5</p>thA ba da b+h+yar+ts+ya pra Ni d+hA na ma kA ri te/ /mA ka dA tsan dA ri drAM s+yA dasmA ka mi ti k+Sha NaM/ /ta taste paN+Di ta gi rA ga twA da dr-i shu ra gra taH/ /ta me bAM gA ra ni ka raM pra yA taM rat+na rA shi tAM/ /b+ha ba ne paN+Di ta s+yA tha ku mA ra s+ya pra
<p>327a.6</p>bzhin mchod nas/ /skad cig smon lam de dag gis/ /bdag cag rnam yang dbul por ni/ /ma gyur cig ces bya ba byas/ /de nas mkhas pa'i tshig dag gis/ /de dag song bas mdun du ni/ /sol phung de nyid rin chen gyi/ /phung po nyid du gyur pa mthong / /de nas mkhas pa gzhon nu ni/ /mthu dang ldan pa'i
<p>327b</p>
<p>327b.1</p>b+ha ba taH/ /bi d+h+r-it+tA nA ni d+hA nA nAM nir+b+bi g+h+nasha ta mu d+ya yau/ /sa pra se na dzi te rA dz+nye d+harma dz+nyaHs+thi ti rak+Sha NA ta/ /da dau ni d+hA na ShaD+b+hA gaM sa tsA s+yaM gA ra tA ma gA ta/ /ku mA ra s+yai ba su kr-i tair+b+hA gyo ya ni d+hi sany+tsa yaH/ /
<p>327b.2</p>khyim nyid du/ /rnam par bzhag pa'i gter dag ni/ /gegs med brgya dag byung bar gyur/ /chos shes de yi lugs bsrung slad/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal nyid la ni/ /gter gyi drug cha phul de yang / /de la sol ba nyid du gyur/ /gzhon nu nyid kyi bsod nams kyis/ /gter gyi tshogs 'di spyad bya yin/ /
<p>327b.3</p>i t+yan+ta rIk+ShAd+ba tsa na ta taHshu shrA ba b+hU pa tiH/ /ku mA ra s+yai ba sAn+ni d+hA ni ni d+hi ni d+hi tAM/ /pu naHprAp+tA ni sAsh+tsaR+YaHpra hi not+ta gr-i haM nr-i paH/ /ta tasta da khi laM bit+taM bi tIR+Ya bi su lA sha yaH/ /ku mA raHsam+pa
<p>327b.4</p>zhes pa'i tshig 'di bar snang las/ /de nas sa yi bdag pos thos/ /gzhon nu nyid kyi tshig gis ni/ /gter rnams dag ni gter nyid du/ /slar gyur ngo mtshar bcas pa yis/ /mi bdag gis ni de khyim springs/ /de nas nor rnams ma lus pa/ /gzhon nu bsam pa yongs pa yis/ /byin nas phun sum
<p>327b.5</p>dAM tsa kre s+thi tiM durga ta tse me su/ /a tha niHsA ra saM yA ra bi tsA ra bi ra ta spri haH/ /a ni t+ya tA sa saM tsi t+ya d+hI raHpi ta ra ma pra bIta/ /a tra dzA nI hi mAM tA ba ta gan+tuM tA ta ta po ba naM/ /i mA dzan+ma sha
<p>327b.6</p>tshogs pa rnams/ /dbul po'i khyim du gnas par byas/ /de nas 'khor ba snying po med/ /rnam par dpyad phyir chags bral ba/ /brtan pa de yis mi rtag nyid/ /yang dag bsams nas pha la smras/ /yab gcig dka' thub nags su bdag /'gro ba re zhig gnang bar mdzod/ /skye ba brgya yi lhag ma
<p>328a</p>
<p>328a.1</p>tots+tshaSh+TA ma ma bi b+hu ta yaH/ /trai lo kya sam+pat+saM prap+tiR+Ya smin+n+ra dza tib+ho gya tAM/ /ta di daM sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAM mA yur+b+hA dza na malpa kaM/ /shI te ya s+ya ka ro mi saM ta ta mr-i du sbaR+shAM gu kairgU ha NaM saM tA pe ra tsa yA mi ya s+ya
<p>328a.2</p>yi/ /'byor pa nyid kyis bdag nyon mongs/ /'jig rten gsum gyi phun tshogs thob/ /gang du spyad bya nyid 'gyur ba/ /'byung po kun gyi tshe yi ni/ /snod 'di shin tu chung ba nyid/ /gang zhig grang la rgyun du bdag gis reg bya 'jam pa'i gos kyis g.yogs bya zhing / /gang zhig gdung la bdag gi
<p>328a.3</p>shi shi ra shri khaN+Da tsar+ts+tsartsa naM/ /ya s+yar+the bi Sha shas+t+ra ba ha ni b+hu dza ga brA tAt+pa raM me b+ha yaM prAp+taHso pa ma pA ya taHpa ri kr-i to s+yA yA ti kA yaHk+Sha mIM/ /b+ho gAd+bi rak+Sha pra bra dz+yA mA dA ya da yi tAM ba ne/ /
<p>328a.4</p>dpal gyi dum bu bsil ba'i byugs pas byug pa bya/ /gang gi don du du ga mtshon me dang lag 'gro'i tshogs las mchog tu 'jigs pa 'thob/ /bdag gi lus 'di gnod pa dag las yongs su bsrungs kyang 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur/ /longs spyod las ni chags bral bdag /dga' ba'i rab byung blangs
<p>328a.5</p>bi ha rA mi ha ram+pit+taM tsi tA tap+ta s+ya tse ta saH/ /i t+yuk+ta pa ri t+ya dz+ya bi Sha yasne ha ban+d+ha naM/ /kr-i tA b+hu pa ga maHpi trA shA ri pu trA shra maM ya yau/ /ta tra pra brA dzi ta ste na pa tra pA NiHsa tsI ba rau/ /
<p>328a.6</p>nas ni/ /nags su gnas shing bsam pa yis/ /gdungs pa sems kyi gzir ba 'phrog /ces brjod yab kyis khas blang ni/ /byas shes yul la chags pa yi/ /'ching ba de yis yongs btang nas/ /shA ri'i bu yi gnas su song / /der ni de yis rab phyung ste/ /lag na lhung bzed chos gos can/ /
<p>328b</p>
<p>328b.1</p>ta s+yai bA nu tsa ra b+hU twA bi tsa tsA ra ma ta bra taH/ /sa dr-iSh+TA haR+Sha kai bA ri k+Shat+tAt+k+She t+t+raM bar+t+ti tAM/ /nirdi rdiSh+Te ya thA yan+taM bi sma yA di t+ya tsiM ta yata/ /a ho pi hi ta marge Na gats+tsa tA ma s+ya tse ta
<p>328b.2</p>de yi rjes 'brang nyid gyur nas/ /brtul zhugs kyis bsdams rnam par rgyu/ /zhing pa rnams kyis bstan pa yis/ /zhing nas zhing la 'jug pa'i chu/ /lam nas bgrod pa de mthong nas/ /ya mtshan las ni 'di ltar bsams/ /kye ma sems med chu rnams kyang / /bsgrubs pa'i lam nas bgrod
<p>328b.3</p>saM/ /dza lA nAMkar+m+ma saM sid+d+hir+t+ri sh+ye te na tu de hi nAM/ /saM bi t+ye hi pra dzan+na gre dr-iSh+TA s+yaSh+TI kr-i raM/ /sa ta p+ta mi Shu ka re Na pra da g+hau d+hi ma tAm+ba raH/ /tA sat+p+ra gu Na tA me te yAn+ti nish+tse
<p>328b.4</p>pa yis/ /las ni yang dag sgrub mthong ste/ /lus can rnams la ma yin no/ /zhes bsams bgrod pas mdun du ni/ /mda' mkhan dag gis mda' bsros shing / /drang por byed pa mthong gyur nas/ /blo ldan mchog des rab tu bsams/ /mda' ni sems med 'di dag rnams/ /gdung bas
<p>328b.5</p>rta nAHsha raH/ /na tu saM sA ra saM tap+ta ma pi bak+t+rAHsha ri riNaH/ /i ti g+hA ya na bi lo kyA pre ta dz+nyA sha ka Ta tsakra nAM/ /nI tA ni dr-i D+ha rU pA Ni pu nish+tsit+tAM sa mA ya yau/ /a ho nu d+ya D+ha nA yo gAta
<p>328b.6</p>drang po nyid 'gyur te/ /lus can 'khyog po rnams dag ni/ /'khor ba'i gdung bas kyang ma yin/ /zhes sems mdun du shing mkhan gyis/ /shing rta'i 'khor lo nyid byas pa'i/ /brtan pa'i gzugs rnams mthong gyur nas/ /slar yang yang dag sems par gyur/ /kye ma sems med shing rnams ni/ /
<p>329a</p>
<p>329a.1</p>yAn+ti kar+m+mA N+ya tAM k+Sha NAta/ /nish+tse ta nA ni dA rU Ni na tsit+tA ni sha rI ri NAM/ /i ti saM tsi t+ya saM yA taHsu d+har+m+ma ni ya mA da raH/ /bat+sa laM pi ta ra pu tra i bA tsAR+Ya mu bA tsa sa/ /AR+Ya e ba pri yA twa d+ya paN+Da
<p>329a.2</p>bzo yi sbyor bas skad cig las/ /las su rung ba nyid 'gyur te/ /lus can rnams kyi sems ma yin/ /'di dag bsams shing yang dag song / /chos bzang nges pa la gus pa/ /de yis slob dpon la smras pa/ /mnyes gshin pa la bu yis bzhin/ /'phags pa nyid ni bsod snyoms la/ /
<p>329a.3</p>pI tAye mat+k+r-i te/ /a haM ru b+ha ba tA diSh+TaM tsan+taM yA mi ni dza bra taM/ /i t+yu pA d+h+yA ya b+h+yar+th+ya b+hak+ta kr-i t+yA ya paN+Di taH/ /tasmin yA ti ta dA diSh+TaM bi hA ra gi rimA bi shata/ /ta tra s+yaSh+TI kr-i taM ta nuHkr-i twA pra ti mu
<p>329a.4</p>de ring bdag gi ched du gshegs/ /khyod kyi bstan pa rang nyid kyi/ /brtul zhugs bdag gis bsam par bgyi/ /zhes te zas kyi bya ba ni/ /mkhan po la gsol mkhas pa ni/ /de song tshe na des bstan pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang gi khang par zhugs/ /de ni g.yo med skyil krung bcas/ /lus ni drang po nyid
<p>329a.5</p>khIM smr-i tiM/ /sa tra da g+hau ni dzad+d+har+m+maM bad+d+ha paR+Yad+ka ni sh+tsa yaH/ /tasmin+sa mA d+he san+nad+d+he ba su d+hA sa d+ha rA d+hA rA/ /bi tsa pA lA khi lAM b+ho d+hi dza la lo la du kU li nI/ /sha kras+thaM niya ta d+h+yA nAM tadz+dz+nya twA nirbig+h+na sid+d+ha ye/ /di de sha
<p>329a.6</p>du byas/ /dran pa sngon du byas nas ni/ /de yis rang gi chos la bsams/ /de ni ting 'dzin la zhugs tshe/ /nor 'dzin 'dzin ma 'dzin byed bcas/ /ma lus chu gter chu rlabs kyis/ /du ku la yi gos can g.yos/ /nges pa'i bsam gtan de shes nas/ /gegs med grub slad brgya byin gyis/ /phyogs su
<p>329b</p>
<p>329b.1</p>dik+Shu rak+ShA yai dik+bA lAn+sen+du b+hA ska ran/ /b+ha ga bAn tha sar+b+ba dz+nyasta s+ya sid+d+hi mU paspi nAM/ /pA kAt+ku sha la lU mA mAM dz+nyA twA k+Sha Na ma tsin+ta yata/ /A san+nAr+hat+pa da s+ya s+ya shA ri bu tra sa me t+ya tsata/ /dwA ra mud+g+hA Ta yan+ma
<p>329b.2</p>bsrung slad phyogs skyong nas/ /zla ba nyi mar bcas pa bskos/ /de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen gyis/ /de yi dge rtsa smin pa las/ /grub pa nye bar gnas pa dag /mkhyen nas skad cig yang dag bsams/ /'di yis dgra bcom nye ba la/ /gal te shA ri'i bu 'ongs nas/ /sgo ni rab tu brdungs pa na/ /bar du
<p>329b.3</p>d+h+ye bi g+h+na re Sha na shaM sa yaH/ /tasmA dA ga ta s+ya ta s+ya ga twA swa ya ma haM pu raH/ /ka ro mi kA la hA ra ya nA nA prash+nA t+ya yAHka thAH/ /i ti saM tsi t+ya b+ha ga bAn swa yaM tat+te sha mA ga taH/ /b+hi k+Sho rA gats+tsha ta ta s+ya bi lam+ba ka tha yA ka ro ta/ /su
<p>329b.4</p>bgegs 'di the tshom med/ /de nas de ni 'ong ba yis/ /sngon du bdag rang nyid song ste/ /sna tshogs 'dri ba la brten pa'i/ /gtam gyi dus ni dbrog par bya/ /de ltar dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das/ /rang nyid phyogs der byon nas ni/ /dge slong de ni 'ong ba dag /gtam gyis thogs pa nyid du byas/ /lha
<p>329b.5</p>ra pra b+hA bAn+niHshap+de ni b+h+r-i ga tA bi ha ga me/ /lo ka nirbA ta dI pa s+ya tu l+ya tAM prA pa paN+Di taH/ /shro taHprAp+ti pha la dUr+d+d+h+wa sa kr-i dA gA mya bA s+ya saH/ /a nA gA mi pha la prA s+ya ta tor+har+pha la mA bAp+ta bAn/ /ta taHka
<p>329b.6</p>yi mthu las mkhar bgrod rnams/ /sgra med lus ni bsdams gyur pa'i/ /'jig rten du ni mkhas pa yis/ /rlung med sgron ma nyid mtshungs thob/ /de yis rgyun zhugs 'bras bu las/ /steng du lan cig phyir 'ong thob/ /phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras thob nas/ /de nas dgra bcom 'bras bu thob/ /de nas gtam
<p>330a</p>
<p>330a.1</p>thAn+ta su ga te pra bA te ni dza mA shra maM/ /shA ri pu tra pra bi sh+yArka mi bshiN+yAM bya lo ka yata/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA sa ha sot+tAr+N+NiM bitIr+N+Na b+ha ba ban+d+ha naM/ /sid+d+hi yu ga sha ta prA s+yAM ta s+ya taM pra sha shaM sa saMH/ /tAM ta
<p>330a.2</p>gyi mjug tu ni/ /bde gshegs gshegs te rang gnas su/ /shA ri'i bu yis zhugs pa na/ /slob ma nyi ma bzhin du mthong / /srid pa'i 'ching ba rnams btang zhing / /'phral la thar pa de mthong nas/ /de yis grub pa dus bzhi brgyas/ /thob bya de ni de yis bsngags/ /de yis dgra
<p>330a.3</p>s+yAr+hat+sa da prAp+ti shru twA dza ga ti bi shru tAM/ /b+hik+Shu b+hir+b+ha ga bA na prISh+TaHstat+ka thA ma bra bI dzi naH/ /b+ha ga pAn+kA sh+ya paHpUr+b+baM bA rA Na s+ya ta thA ga ta/ /sa ha b+hik+Shu sa ha prA NI biM sha t+ya pU ra bA si b+hiH/ /shrad+d+hA pra NI
<p>330a.4</p>bcom gnas thob par/ /'gro la grags pa de thos nas/ /dge slong rnams kyis de yi gtam/ /dris shing bcom ldan rgyal bas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs bA rA Na sIr sngon/ /dge slong stong phrag nyi shu dang / /lhan cig grong khyer ba rnams kyis/ /dang bas phul
<p>330a.5</p>taiHshu tsi b+hiHsar+b+ba b+ho gair+m+ma no nu gaiH/ /u pa bA sa pU dzi taHkany+tsi ta ka laM sa twa hi to d+ya taH/ /b+hik+Shu pU dzA pa re ta tra bar+t+ta mA ne gr-i he gr-i he/ /a tsin+ta yad+bi ni shwa s+ya durga to nA ma durga taH/ /
<p>330a.6</p>zhing gtsang ma yi/ /longs spyod yid 'ong thams cad kyis/ /mchod cing dus ni ji snyed cig /sems can phan par brtson pas bzhugs/ /der ni dge slong mchod la chags/ /khyim bdag khyim du zhugs pa na/ /dbul po zhes pha'i dbul po yis/ /shugs rings phyung nas rab bsams pa/ /
<p>330b</p>
<p>330b.1</p>d+hiSh+mA ba tI bdA ri d+r+yA twa ni tswa tu ku sha la kr-i yaM/ /nai ko pi man+da b+hA gye na ye na b+hik+Shurni man+d+ri taH/ /t+yA dz+yA dza na s+ya sa ka la bya ba hA ra bA h+yA bAkya pra mA Na pa da san+d+hi Shu nai ba yau gyAH/ /naSh+Ta kr-i yA bi ga ta
<p>330b.2</p>gang zhig skal ba dman pa yis/ /dge slong gcig kyang mgron ma gnyer/ /shin tu dbul las dge ba yi/ /bya ba btang ba bdag 'dra dman/ /ngag tshad tshig ni mtshams sbyor rnams la regs pa yod min zhing / /bya ba nyams shing byed pa dang bral de nyid dman gyur pa/ /tha snyad kun las phyi rol
<p>330b.3</p>kA ra ka tar+g+ra hI NAHshap+dA i bAr+thA ra ha tAHpu ru Sha b+ha bAn+ti/ /i titsin+tA na lA kraM taM ni dr-in+tan+d+ha na hI na tA/ /taM sa mA dA ya ko pe b+h+ye t+ya su kr-i ta pre ra ko b+h+ya d+hata/ /k+ShI NAr+tha nA pi b+ha ba tA dzan+mAn+ta ra shu
<p>330b.4</p>gyur cing don dang bral ba yi/ /sgra rnams bzhin du skyes bu rnams kyi skye bos don bya yin/ /'di bsams me yis zil gnon cing / /nor gyis dman zhing smod byed pa/ /de la legs byas skul byed pa'i/ /las pas mngon du phyogs te smras/ /nor gyis dman pa khyod kyis kyang / /skye ba gzhan du dge
<p>330b.5</p>b+hA b+ta ye/ /ya thAM ka thaM tsi de ko bi b+hik+ShuHkiM na ni man+t+ri taH/ /i t+yuk+taste na saM sak+ta sha l+yaHpu na ri bA hA taH/ /b+hik+Shu b+ho dzan bai ka l+yAta sa b+h+r-i shaM bya thi ta b+ha bta/ /ka thaM tsik+Shut+pa ri k+ShA maHsa ga twA shreSh+Thi man+di raM/ /yat+ne na prA
<p>330b.6</p>thob slad/ /ji zhig ltar yang dge slong ni/ /gcig kyang ci slad mgron me gnyer/ /zhes pa de yis brjod pa na/ /zug rngu zug pa slar bsnun bzhin/ /dge slong zhal zas ma 'byor bas/ /de ni mchog tu gdung bar 'gyur/ /tshong dpon khang par ji zhig ltar/ /bkres pas yongs nyen de song nas/ /'bad pas
<p>331a</p>
<p>331a.1</p>pa mU l+yAM sha dA ru pA Ta na kar+m+ma NA/ /kr-i twA ta tre ba tad+b+haR+YA shud+d+hA taN+Du la khaN+Da naM/ /ta daM shra b+h+r-i ti mU l+yAp+taM b+hak+t+yA b+har+t+re n+ya be da yAta/ /sa mu d+ya ta s+ya ta s+yA tha b+hik+Shu b+ho dza na sid+d+hi ye/ /shud+d+ha ya shud+d+ha satwa s+ya sha kro
<p>331a.2</p>shing ni gcod pa yi/ /las kyis rin gyi cha shas thob/ /de yi chung ma'i dag pa'i 'bras/ /de nyid du ni grub byas nas/ /de yis gla rngan cha shas thob/ /gus pas rje bo dag la phul/ /de nas dad pas dge slong gi/ /zas ni bsgrub par brtson gyur pa/ /snying stobs dag pa de yis ni/ /rjes su
<p>331a.3</p>b+hU da nu sA d+hu kaH/ /di s+ya bar+Na ra sA mo de b+ho dz+ye sha kre Na sA d+hi te/ /prI t+yA prats+tshan+na rU pe Na b+hik+ShuM le b+he na durga taH/ /b+hi b+hu ti mA hi to gAD+h+yaiHbur+b+ba pu ra ni bA si b+hiH/ /saM g+he ni man+t+ri te duHkhAta durga to martu
<p>331a.4</p>sgrub byed brgya byin gyur/ /mdza' bo brgya byin gzugs bsgribs pas/ /lha yi bza' ba kha dog dang / /dri dang ro ldan bsgrubs pa'i tshe/ /dbul pos dge slong rnyed ma gyur/ /'byor ldan longs spyod phyug pa yis/ /grong pa rnams kyi sngon du ni/ /dge slong mgron gnyer sdug bsngal las/ /dbul po 'chi
<p>331a.5</p>mu d+ya yau/ /kri pa yA ta s+ya b+ha ga bA na swa ya ma b+h+ye t+ya kA sh+ya paH/ /shud+d+ha sid+d+hiM pa ri dz+nyA ya tsakre b+ho dz+ye pra ti gra ha/ /a ho haM b+ha ga ba to b+ho dz+yo pra yats+tshA mi ti b+hU b+hu dzA/ /pra yat+nAt+p+rAr+thi to s+yar+tha nai bA ma n+ya ta
<p>331a.6</p>brtsom par gyur/ /de la brtse bas bcom ldan 'das/ /'od srungs rang nyid mngon phyogs te/ /dag cing grub pa yongs mkhyen nas/ /zhal zas rab tu blang ba mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas bdag /dbul zhes rgyal pos nor rnams kyis/ /rab tu 'bad pas gsol btab kyang / /dbul pos
<p>331b</p>
<p>331b.1</p>durga taH/ /gu Na dra bi Na saM pUr+N+Na sh+yA maspI ti pra sA da naM/ /b+ha ga ban+ta ma thA b+h+yar+ts+ya pra Ni d+hA na tsa kA ra saH/ /swA shra maM kA sh+ya pe yA De su ren+d+ra tsa ga to di baM/ /durga ta s+ya gr-i haM sar+b+baM di bya rat+na ma pU ra
<p>331b.2</p>nges par khas ma blangs/ /de nas bcom ldan mchod byas te/ /de yis smon lam rab tu btab/ /yon tan nor ni yang dag rdzogs/ /dbul la drin par bdag gyur cig /'od srungs rang gi gnas gshegs shing / /lha dbang mtho ris song ba'i tshe/ /lha yi rin chen thams cad kyis/ /dbul po'i khyim ni
<p>331b.3</p>yata/ /bi shwa kar+m+ma ta tasta s+ya bi da d+he shakra shA sa nAta/ /b+ha ba naM ru tsi ro d+yA naM rat+na staM b+ha bi b+hu Shi taM/ /saM prAp+ta bi ma le shwaR+YaHsa hi taM sar+b+ba b+hik+Shu b+hiH/ /sap+tA haM bi b+ha bair+b+ho geHsa kA sh+ya pa ma pU dza yata/ /k+Shut+k+ShA maM
<p>331b.4</p>khengs par gyur/ /de nas brgya byin bka' las ni/ /de yi khang pa skyed tshal mdzes/ /bi shwa karmas rin chen gyi/ /ka bas rnam par brgyan pa byas/ /dri med dbang phyug yang dag thob/ /de yis zhag bdun 'od srungs ni/ /dge slong kun dang bcas pa dag /'byor pa longs spyod rnams kyis mchod/ /gang gi
<p>331b.5</p>ga Na mar+thi b+hiHpa ri hri ta dwA raM ru da dA ra kaM ge haM ni sh+tsa la kadz+dza lA n+ya pi tha rI ko Nats+tsha Nan+mA k+Shi kA/ /tsul+li sup+ta bi DA la bA la ma pa raM ya s+yA b+ha bA rau rA baM shrIs+tha s+yai ba nraM paspr-i hAspa da ta yA tsa mru na ka s+ya swa yaM/ /
<p>331b.6</p>khyim ni bud med bkres pas rid cing bu tsha du la slong rnams kyis/ /sgo ni yongs dor khri stan sre mog phreng ldan g.yo med zur na sbrang bu sgrogs/ /byi ba'i phrug gu dag ni thab tu nyal zhing du 'bod gzhan pa bzhin gyur pa/ /de yi dpal ni mi bdag chags pa'i gnas nyid dag gis su zhig mtshar mi byed/ /
<p>332a</p>
<p>332a.1</p>te na dA na pra b+hA be na sud+d+hA shud+d+he na durga taH/ /dzan+mAn+ta re paN+Di ta tA mi bAr+g+hAr+ha twa mA ga taH/ /i ti paN+Di ta pUr+b+ba dzan+ma bar+t+ta ka thi taM sar+b+ba bi dA gu NA da re Na/ /a ba bi shud+d+ha dA na pu N+yaM ku sha lAr+haHpra sha saM
<p>332a.2</p>sbyin pa'i mthu ni bdud rtsi ltar/ /dag pa de yis dbul po ni/ /skye ba gzhan du mkhas pa ni/ /thob nas dgra bcom nyid du gyur/ /de ltar kun rig yon tan la gus pas/ /mkhas pa'i skye ba snga mar byung ba gsungs/ /rnam dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams dge la 'os/ /nges par bzung nas
<p>332a.3</p>sa b+hik+Shu saM g+haH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twa ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM paN+Di tA ba dA naM nA ma dwi tsa twA riM shaHpal+la baH// //sa twe na sUR+Ya ru tsa yasta ma si sbu ran+ti
<p>332a.4</p>dge slong tshogs des bsngags/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las mkhas pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //snying stobs kyis ni nyi ma'i 'od zer mun pa la bzhin
<p>332a.5</p>d+har+m+me Na rat+na ni tsa yA na b+ha saHsa tan+ti/ /d+haiR+Ye Na sar+b+ba bi pa dAHpra sha maM bra dzan+ti dA ne na b+ho ga su b+ha gAHka ku b+ho b+ha ban+ti/ /b+ha ga bAn+su ga taHpUr+b+ba shrA bas+t+yAM dze ta kA na na/ /
<p>332a.6</p>gsal/ /chos dag gis ni rin chen chogs rnams mkha' las 'bab par 'gyur/ /brtan pa yis ni rgud pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gro/ /sbyin pa yis ni phyogs rnams longs spyod skal bzang por 'gyur/ /mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal du sngon/ /bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /
<p>332b</p>
<p>332b.1</p>ku sha lA nAM pra ban+nA nAM bi da d+he d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /pUr+b+ba kalpAn+ta ra dza ne tsa pa nASh+Ta yu tA yu Shi/ /shrI mAn+ka na ka bar+N+NA khyo ba b+hU ba pr-i thi bI pa tiH/ /ka na ka khyA pu rI ta s+ya sha kra s+ye bA ma rA ba tI/ /sar+b+ba lo ke shwa ra s+yA pi
<p>332b.2</p>dge ba rab tu rdzogs rnams la/ /chos ni rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /sngon gyi dus ni gzhan dag la/ /skye ba tshe lo brgyad khri'i tshe/ /dpal ldan gser mdog ces bya ba'i/ /sa yi bdag po byung bar gyur/ /de yi grong khyer gser zhes pa/ /brgya byin 'chi med ldan bzhin du/ /'jig rten kun gyi dbang yin
<p>332b.3</p>ba sa tir+b+bal+la b+hA b+ha ba ti/ /nA ya kar+haM ya shaHshu b+h+raM tsA ru br-it+ta gu No tsi taM/ /hr-i da ye yaHpra dzA muk+tA hA ra mi ba ba hata/ /pra dzA kam+mA bi bA ke na pu re pa ra ma dA ru NA/ /a pr-iSh+Ta ra b+ha bat+ta tra
<p>332b.4</p>kyang / /bzhugs gnas yid du 'ong bar gyur/ /'dren par 'os shing grags par dkar/ /mdzes par zhugs shing yon tan rigs/ /gang gis mu tig do shal bzhin/ /skye rgu'i bya ba snying la bzung / /skye rgu'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /char med mchog tu mi bzad cing / /skye rgu rnams la 'jigs ster ba/ /
<p>332b.5</p>sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya pra dA/ /sAd+haiR+Ya hA ri NI sar+b+ba lo ka saM tA pa kA ri NI/ /a br-iSh+TaHpra ya yau b+hU b+h+r-ita mA na sA ya sa he tu nAM/ /kuN+Tha sar+b+ba pra tI kA raHsa tsin+tAs+tha mi taM pu raH/ /u bA tsa su tsi rad+h+yA twA pra d+hA nA mA t+ya
<p>332b.6</p>de yi grong khyer dag tu byung / /snying stobs ldan pa 'phrog byed cing / /thams cad yongs su gdung byed pa/ /char med de ni sa 'dzin gyis/ /yid ni yongs gdung rgyu nyid gyur/ /bcos thabs thams cad nyams pa des/ /blon po'i gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsam pas g.yo ba med mdun du/ /shin tu yun ring
<p>333a</p>
<p>333a.1</p>maN+Da laM/ /a baR+Sho pa ni pA to yaM pra dzA nAM niHpra ti kr-i yaH/ /ka ro ti me yat+na kr-i taM niSh+pha laM pa ri pA la naM/ /ni br-it+ta baR+ShaHka ku b+ho b+ha baMt+ya b+ha ba swats+tsha kAH/ /pra br-it+ta baSh+pa baR+Shash+tsa pra dzA pA
<p>333a.2</p>bsams nas smras/ /bcos thabs med pa'i char med ni/ /nye bar lhung 'di skye rgu rnams/ /bdag gis 'bad pas yongs bskyang ba/ /byas pa 'bras bu med par byed/ /sa spyod sdig pas skye rgu rnams/ /mchi ma'i char ni rab 'bebs shing / /'byor med gsal byed phyogs rnams kyi/ /
<p>333a.3</p>pe na b+hu b+hA dzaM/ /trA NA ma had+b+ha yo rA dza pra dzA nAM na ka rau ti yaH/ /ta s+yasbaSh+TaM na Ta s+ye ba ki rI Da mu ku Ta gra haH/ /ta dA kr-i ta yu gaM lo ke ya dA rA dzA pra dzA hi taH/ /ta dA ki la ka lirlo ke ya dA rA dzA pra dzA hi
<p>333a.4</p>char ni nges par 'chad par 'gyur/ /skye rgu 'jigs pa tsha la gang / /rgyal pos skyob par mi byed par/ /de yi zur phud cod pan 'dzin/ /gsal bar zlos gar lta bu yin/ /gang tshe rgyal pos 'gro la phan/ /de tshe 'jig rten rdzogs ldan dus/ /gang tshe rgyal pos 'gro mi phan/ /nges par 'jig rten rtsod ldan
<p>333a.5</p>taH/ /dur+b+hik+Sha k+Sha pi tA bi sak+Sha ba ta na pra t+yak+Sha la k+Sh+ye k+Sha ya ro god+be ga sa mA hi tAHpr-i thu ta ra kle shA ba lI bits+tsha lAH/ /hA hA kA ra bi shr-iM kha lAHkha le ta rai ra t+ya rdi tA bal+la b+haiHsho tsin+d+yaHpra Na yi pra yAM t+ya
<p>333a.6</p>dus/ /mi bdag rnams kyi sdig pa las ni skyabs med skye rgu mu ges nyen gyur cing / /mi mthun phyogs lhung mngon sum mtshon pas 'jig cing nad dang sdug bsngal nye bar gnas/ /zab rgyas nyon mongs dag gis shin tu nyam thag ma bsdams kyi hud ces ba sgrogs/ /shin tu mi bsrun mdza' bos
<p>333b</p>
<p>333b.1</p>sha ra NAHpA per+N+r-i pA NaM pra dzAH/ /tasmAt+samasta ko She Na rak+Sha NI yA ma yA pra dzAH/ /rA dz+nyA pra dzA pa ri trA NaM pu N+yaM rat+na ma yo ni d+hiH/ /i t+yuk+t+wa sar+b+ba lo ka s+ya saM tsin+ta koSh+Tha ko Sha yoH/ /sa ni nA
<p>333b.2</p>bslangs rnams mya ngan byed cing mdza' gcugs med par 'gyur/ /de slad bdag gis skye rgu rnams/ /mtha' dag mdzod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /rgyal pos skye rgu yongs skyob pa/ /bsod nams rin chen rang bzhin gter/ /zhes brjod de yis rang gi ni/ /mdzod dang bang ba la sogs kun/ /rtag tu 'jig
<p>333b.3</p>ya ni dzaM sar+b+baM sa dA b+ho gyo pa b+ho gya tAM/ /ta taHkA le na ta s+yo gra dur+b+hi k+She NAn+na sany+tsa yaH/ /ya yau ma hA bya ya de ka pu ru ShA sha na she Sha tI/ /tasmin+na ba sa re byom+bA sa ma b+h+ye t+ya ra bi pra b+haH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+hasta s+ya tha bi
<p>333b.4</p>rten thams cad kyis/ /longs spyod nye bar spyad byar byas/ /de nas de yis zas kyi tshogs/ /dus kyi mu ge drag po yis/ /'god pa che bas skyes bu ni/ /gcig gis zas kyi lhag mar gyur/ /de nas gnas skabs de la ni/ /nyi ma'i 'od can rang sangs rgyas/ /nam mkha' las ni mngon phyogs te/ /de
<p>333b.5</p>da b+he b+ho dzA nar+tha nAM/ /naM ya me saM sha ye tasmin+nAt+ma naHpra Na d+hA ra NaM/ /nirbi kal+p+ya sa taR+sar+b+bA da dau tasmai pra san+na d+hIH/ /swa pra Na br-it+t+ya te nA sau kr-i tA ti thA pra sA di nA/ /pra ya yau na b+ha sA ta s+ya pra shaM sa na sa twa shI la tAM/ /
<p>333b.6</p>la zas ni bslang bar mdzad/ /nges pa'i the tshom de la ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni srog gi zungs/ /ma brtags rab dang blo ldan des/ /de dag thams cad de la phul/ /dang ba can des rang srog gi/ 'tsho bas mgron du byas pa de'i/ /de yi snying stobs ngang tshul nyid/ /bsngags shing mkha' la rab tu gshegs/ /
<p>334a</p>
<p>334a.1</p>a tho d+ya yau byo ma ma hA dwi pa s+ya lI lA li mA le ba sa daM bu le khA/ /me g+hA ba lI bash+tsi ma dik+p+ra rab+hAHka po la kA lA gu ru many+tsa rI ba/ /ta taHsa map+taM ga ga nAn+ta ro la ud+phul+la nI lot+pa la kA na nA b+ha/ /Ats+tsha
<p>334a.2</p>de nas mkha' la sprin 'greng chu ris can/ /gnyis 'thung che la bung ba'i 'phreng bzhin dang / /nub phyogs bu mo'i 'gram par a ka ru/ /nag po'i dog pa lta bur rab tu brtsams/ /de nas nam mkha' bar snang mtha' dag ni/ /ut+pal sngon po rab rgyas nags kyi mdangs/ /bung ba'i
<p>334a.3</p>d+ya mA naM sa ra sai ba b+ha sai b+h+r-iM ga pra ba swe ri ba me g+ha saM g+haiH/ /ta taHpa pA tA khi la b+hau dz+ya br-iSh+Ti riSh+TA pra dzA naM b+hU bi sap+ta rA traM/ /d+hA n+yA di br-iSh+Ta sta da nan+ta raM tsa rat+nA di br-iSh+Tash+tsa ta traHkra me Na/ /i ti sa ka na ka bar+N+Na k+Sha pa
<p>334a.4</p>khyu yis bzhin du sprin gyi tshogs/ /ro dang ldan pas g.yogs gyur rnam par mdzes/ /de nas zhag bdun sa la skye rgu rnams/ /'dod pa'i kha zas ma lus char du 'bab/ /de yi 'og tu 'bru la sogs pa'i char/ /de nas rim gyis rin chen tshogs char yang / /de ltar legs byas phun tshogs la dga' sa
<p>334a.5</p>tir+b+hU ba tI nAM mu ku Ta ma Ni ri bo tswair+b+hA dzamA naHpra dzA nAM/ /a kr-i ta su kr-i ta sam+sat+p+ra Ni naHprA Na rar+k+Sha pra b+ha ba ti hi pa rar+the sadz+dza na nAM pra b+ha ba/ /b+hu pa tiHka na ka bar+N+Na e Sha yaHso ha me ba ba pu ShAt+ma nA d+hu nAM/ /i t+yu dIR+Ya
<p>334a.6</p>yi bdag po dag /gser mdog de ni sa bdag kun gyi cod pan nor bu bzhin/ /mchog tu mdzes shing skye mu rnams kyi srog ni bsrung bas mdzes/ /gang phyir skye bo dam pa'i mthu ni gzhan don rab sgrub byed/ /gang zhig sa yi bdag po gser mdog de/ /da lta nga nyid sku yi bdag nyid 'di/ /de skad gsungs
<p>334b</p>
<p>334b.1</p>b+ha ga bAny+dzi naHsa tAM d+hI ma tAM bya d+hi ta d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM b+ho d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM ka na kA ba dA nAM tri tsa twA riM shaHpal+la waH// //pa ro pa kA ra
<p>334b.2</p>nas bcom ldan rgyal ba yi/ /blo ldan dam pa rnams la chos bstan mdzad/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //gzhan la phan pa
<p>334b.3</p>pra Na yi pra b+hA baHsar+b+bo pa dzI bya ma ha tI pi b+hU tiH/ /pu N+yAM ku ro ha s+ya b+hA tAM bi shA la pha lAr+ha me tat+p+ra tha maM hi puSh+pam/ /dzi na dze ta ba nA rA ma bi hA rA b+hi me ta pu rA/ /shrA bas+t+yaM de ba se nA khyaHshrI mA nA sI d+g+r-i hA d+hi paH/ /
<p>334b.4</p>'jebs pa'i mthu dang ni/ /kun gyi nyer 'tsho 'byor pa chen po ste/ /'bras bu cher 'os 'di dag dge rnams kyi/ /bsod nams myu gu'i 'bras bu dang po yin/ /rgyal byed tshal gyi kun rar sngon/ /rgyal ba bzhugs shing sngon dgyes tshe/ /dpal ldan khyim bdag lha yi sde/ /zhes pa mnyan yod dag na gnas/ /
<p>334b.5</p>ti ra N+ya pa Nista s+yA b+hu ta pu traHsat+pu tra mA ni naH/ /ya s+ya he ma ma yaM dzA tAM pA Ni dwi ta ya mad+b+hU taM/ /rU pya lak+Sh+ya dwa yaM ta s+ya prA taHprA ta ka ra dwa ye/ /prA du rA sat+sa ye na dar+thi nAM kalpa pA da saH/ /ta s+ya byak+ta bi be ke na pa
<p>334b.6</p>bu khyod kyis ni khengs ldan de'i/ /bu ni gser gyi lag gyur te/ /gang gi lag gnyis rmad byung ba/ /gser gyi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur/ /de yi lag gnyis dag la dngul/ /snga dro snga dro 'bum phrag gnyis/ /rab tu skye ba gang gis ni/ /slong ba'i dpag bsam shing du gyur/ /de yi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams/ /
<p>335a</p>
<p>335a.1</p>ri pA ke na b+hU ya sA/ /ka le ku sha la mU lA nAM dzi ne b+hak+ti ra dzA ya ta/ /a tha dze ta ba nAM ga twA b+ha ga ban+ta ta thA ga tAM/ /sa dr-iSh+TA bid d+he na s+ya sA nan+daHpA da ban+da nA ma/ /b+ha ga bAn pi saM sA
<p>335a.2</p>dus kyis yongs su smin gyur pa/ /rab gsal dben pa chen po yi/ /rgyal ba la ni gus pa skyes/ /de nas rgyal byed tshal du de/ /song nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /mthong ste kun dga' ldan pa yis/ /de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal byas/ /bcom ldan gyis kyang 'khor
<p>335a.3</p>ra tA pa pra sha ma tsan+d+ri kaM/ /su d+ha sa khiM di de shasmi dri shaM ku sha la dU ti kaM/ /sa shasturdaR+sha nai nai ba saM mo ha ti mi rodz+dz+hi taH/ /ba b+hA She sUR+Ya ki ra Na pra bud+d+ha ka ma yo pa maH/ /b+ha ga bAn bi da d+he ta s+ya ta taH
<p>335a.4</p>ba yi/ /gdung ba zhi byed zla ba'i 'od/ /bdud rtsi'i grogs po dge ba yis/ /pho nya gzigs pa de la gtad/ /ston pas gzigs pa nyid kyis de/ /kun rmongs rab rib rab spangs pa/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis pad+mo ni/ /rab tu rgyas pa lta bur mdzes/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / /de la dam
<p>335a.5</p>sad+d+har+m+ma de sha nAM/ /ya yA d+har+m+ma ma yaM tsak+Shu rak+ShuN+Na lo ka mu d+ya yo/ /prAk+pu N+ya ba ri NA me na dze ta bai ra gya bA pa naH/ /pra Na mya bi ma la pra dz+nyAHsa sar+b+ba dz+nya ma b+hA Sha ta/ /sha ra N+ya sha ra Nasta s+ya b+ha ga bAn b+ha
<p>335a.6</p>pa'i chos bstan mdzad/ /gang gi chos kyi rang bzhin can/ /mi dman snang ba rab tu bskrun/ /sngon gyi bsod nams yongs smin pas/ /chags bral bag chags sad gyur pa/ /shes rab dri ma med pa des/ /phyag 'tshal kun mkhyen la gsol ba/ /bcom ldan skyabs thob skyabs su 'os/ /nyon
<p>335b</p>
<p>335b.1</p>ba ha ri Ni/ /a she Sha kle sha nA shA ya pra bra dz+yA me bi d+hi yA tAM/ /tsa pa laM bra Ni nA mA yusta to pi na ba yau ban/ /bi d+yu da tsa la na bi lAsta to pye tA bi b+hU ta yaH/ /i ti ta s+ya bra bA Na s+ya su ga tA
<p>335b.2</p>mongs ma lus nyams pa'i slad/ /srid pa 'phrog pa'i rab byung ni/ /bdag la rab tu sgrub par mdzod/ /sems can rnams kyi tshe srog g.yo/ /lang tsho gzhon pa de bas kyang / /glog ni 'khyug pa bzhin du g.yo/ /de bas kyang ni 'byor pa 'di/ /zhes pa smra zhing chags bral ba/ /de yi lus la bde
<p>335b.3</p>nu gra ho di tAM/ /pa pA ta bI ta ra dza saHpra bra dz+yA ba pu Shi swa yaM/ /rak+ta tsI ba ra su byak+taM bi b+h+rA NaHsa bi rak+ta nAM/ /pa tra gra he Na ta t+yA dza pu naHsaM sA ra pA tra nAM/ /ta s+ya tA ma da b+hu taM sid+d+hiM pra t+yak+ShaM bIk+Sh+ya
<p>335b.4</p>gshegs kyis/ /rjes su bzung ba las skyes pa'i/ /rab byung rang nyid lhung bar gyur/ /chos gos dmar pos rab gsal ba'i/ /chags bral nyid ni de yis bzung / /lhung bzed bzung bas slar yang ni/ /'khor ba'i snod nyid rab tu btang / /dge slong rnams kyis de yis ni/ /rmad byung grub de
<p>335b.5</p>b+hi k+Sha baH/ /tat+pur+b+ba br-it+taM pa prats+tshur+b+ha ga ban+taM sa tsA bra bIta/ /bA rA Na s+ya pu ra rA dzA kr-i kIrnA ma ta thA ga te/ /kA sh+ya pA khye b+ha ga ba ti pra yA ti pa ri ni r+b+raM tiM/ /sha ri ra ma s+ya sat+k+r-i tastu paM rat+na ma yaM bya d+hata/ /
<p>335b.6</p>mngon sum mthong / /de yi sngon byung bcom ldan la/ /dris shing des kyang rab gsungs pa/ /rgyal po kr-i kI zhes pa sngon/ /wA rA Na sIr de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan 'od srungs zhes bya ba/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur tshe/ /de yi gdung ni rab sbyangs nas/ /mchod rten rin chen rang bzhin dag /
<p>336a</p>
<p>336a.1</p>swargA ba gA ta na prau D+haM mUr+t+ti pu N+ya mi bon+na taM/ /tasmin+nA ro bya mA NA yAM yaSh+T+ya pU dza ba ri gra he/ /ki ta tsaHkan+da lo nA ma ni da d+he rU pa ka dwa yaM/ /tsit+ta pra sA deR+shud+d+he na te na pu N+ye na b+hu ya
<p>336a.2</p>mtho ris snyog nus bsod nams ni/ /gzugs can bzhin du mtho ba byas/ /de la mchod pa yongs 'dzin cing / /bya ru 'dzugs pa byed pa'i tshe/ /bzo bo kan ta la zhes pa'i/ gzugs can gnyis ni rnam par bkod/ /dang ba'i sems ni dag pa yis/ /bsod nams shin tu che ba
<p>336a.3</p>sA/ /hi ra N+ya bA NiHprAp+to d+ya ma ha tIspr-i ha NI ya tAM/ /b+ha ba ti bi b+ha bas+t+yA go da yaHsa mo gra gu No b+hi bi taHpra sha ra ti ya shaHku klaM lo ke sud+d+haM shu sa ho da ram/ /pa ri Na ti pa de pu N+yaM d+hat+te ya dalpa ma nalpa tAM bi ma la
<p>336a.4</p>des/ /da lta gser gyi lag pa ni/ /'dod par bya ba chen po thob/ /'jig rten du ni rab tu grags pa dkar po bdud rtsi'i zer gyis spun drung dang / /gtong ba'i yon tan drag po dang ldan 'byor pa rab tu rgyas gyur pa/ /chung ngu gang zhig yongs bsngo'i gnas la bsod nams chung ngu nyid min gyur/ /de
<p>336a.5</p>ma na saHshrad+d+hAM shud+d+hAM ta de ba bi dzr-iM b+hi taM/ /i ti pra b+hA baM ka thi taM dzi ne na pu N+yA nu b+hA ba s+ya hi ra N+ya pA NeH/ /shru twe ba haR+ShA da ra bisma yA nAM sa b+hik+Shu saM g+haHpra Na yI ba b+hu ba/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA
<p>336a.6</p>nyid kho na dri med yid kyi dad pa dag pa'i kun spyod yin/ /bsod nams mthu ldan gser gyi lag pa yi/ /mthu ni de ltar rgyal bas bshad pa dag /thos la nyid na dge slong dge 'dun te/ /dga' dang gus dang ya mtshan dbang du gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems
<p>336b</p>
<p>336b.1</p>ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM hi ra N+ya bA h+ya bA dA naM tsa tuSh+tsa twA riM shaHpal+la baH// //dur+dz+dza na duHsa hA bi Sha d+ha ra b+hI Sha Na ta ra ti mi ra pa ti rA nAM/ /A laMm+ba naM dza na naM b+ha ba b+ha ya ha ra NaM dzi nasma
<p>336b.2</p>dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las gser gyi lag pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog rgyal ba dran pa ni/ /skye bo ngan pa bzod dka' dug 'dzin dang / /shin tu 'jigs rung khron par lhung gyur pa'i/ /skye bo rnams kyi
<p>336b.3</p>ra NaM/ /pu re rA dzA gr-i hAb+hi khye b+ha ga bAn+b+hU b+h+r-i taHpu rA/ /ka Ta ke gr-i d+h+ra kU Ta s+ya bi dza hA ra tathA ga taH/ /tasmin+na ba sa re rA dzA bim+bi sA raHpu ta pri yaH/ /a dzA ta sha tru Na ta tra pu hre Na kru ra
<p>336b.4</p>rten sar gyur pa yin/ /grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces par/ /sa 'dzin bya rgod phung po yi/ /ngos la sngon tshe bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par gyur/ /skabs der bu la byams pa yi/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po nyid/ /de yi bu ni ma skyes dgra/ /gdug pa byed par gyur
<p>336b.5</p>kA ri NA/ /su hri daHpA pa ka s+ye ba de ba dat+ta s+ya sam+ma taM/ /g+ho rAn+d+ha ban+d+ha nA gA raM niHsaM tsA raM pra be shi taH/ /sat+n+yAHpra be shi taM ta s+ya ban+d+ha ne gU D+ha b+ho dza snaM/ /dz+nyA twA sa tat+k+Sha yA kAM k+ShI k+Shu ma s+ya n+ya bA ra yata/ /
<p>336b.6</p>pa yis/ /grogs po sdig pa dang ldan pa/ /lha sbyin gyi ni rol bzhin du/ /'jigs rung mun can btson khang ni/ /rgyu ba med par rab tu bcu pa/ /bkres pas nyen pa de la ni/ /btsun mos zas dag brtson khang du/ /gsang nas rab tu 'jug par byas/ /des gsad 'dod des shes nas bzlog/ /
<p>337a</p>
<p>337a.1</p>rU k+ShaHkr-i sho ni ma li naHso b+ha bad+p+r-i thi bI pa tiH/ /a ka la kA la me g+hAr+t+taHkr-iSh+Na sa k+Sha i ben+du yaH/ /sad+koN+Tha ba sa saM tA baHpra yaHpe sha la tse ta sAM/ /ka ro t+yA li gA naM prau D+hA gA D+ha pra Na yi nI ba
<p>337a.2</p>sa yi bdag de shin tu rid/ /sngo zhing dri ma ldan par gyur/ /dus min sprin nag gis gzir ba'i/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba bzhin/ /phal cher mnyes gshin sems ldan la/ /mchog tu rgud pa'i mdza' mo ni/ /gdung bcas sred dang ldan bzhin du/ /shin tu dam par 'khyud par
<p>337a.3</p>mata/ /sa sa mud+bi sh+ya sho kAr+t+taHsu ga tA d+h+yu Shi tAM di shaM/ /kr-i tAny+dza lirna ta shi rAHk+ShA ma swa ra ma b+hA Sha ta/ /na mastu b+h+yaM b+ha ga ba te ma hAr+hA ya ma hAr+ha te/ /dI nod+d+ha ra Na sa nAd+d+ha samyak+saM bo d+hi tsit+te
<p>337a.4</p>byed/ /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i phyogs su ni/ /mya ngan gyis gzir der phyogs te/ /thal mo sbyar te spyis btud nas/ /skad gdangs zhan par rab smras pa/ /dman pa 'don pa la brtson pa/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/ /rin chen dgra bcom chen po nyid/ /bcom ldan khyod la phyag
<p>337a.5</p>se/ /na ma ste g+ho ra saM sA ra ma ka rA ka ra se ta be/ /dzi nA ya dza na tA dzan+ma kle sha pra sha ma he ta be/ /na mo ni t+ya pra bud+d+hA ya sar+b+ba sa twe ka ban+d+ha be/ /bi shud+d+ha d+hAm+ne bud+d+ha ya ka ru NA mr-i ta sin+d+ha be/ /i
<p>337a.6</p>'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba skye tshogs skye ba yi/ /nyon mongs rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu/ /'jigs rung 'khor ba rgya mtsho yi/ /zam stegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid rnam par dag /snying rje bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho ste/ /sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig pu/ /rtag tu sad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes
<p>337b</p>
<p>337b.1</p>ti b+hak+ti su d+hA sik+tA su ga ta shra ba No tsi tAM/ /pu N+ya puSh+pa pra sA ba nI sa tsakra stu ti maM dza rIm/ /sarba dz+nya sta s+ya bi dz+nya ya kA ya kle sha ma yI da shaM/ /ban+d+ha nA gA ra bi ba rA lo kai ro s+yA ya naM bya d+hAta/ /a
<p>337b.2</p>pa bsod nams me tog las/ /'khrungs shing gus pa'i bdud rtsis bran/ /bstod pa'i dog pa bde gshegs kyi/ /snyan du 'os pa de yis byas/ /de yi nyon mongs sdug bsngal gyi/ /rang bzhin skabs mkhyen kun mkhyen gyis/ /'ching ba'i khang pa'i bu ga yi/ /snang ba dag gis tshim par byas/ /de ltar
<p>337b.3</p>dzA ta sha trusta d+b+r-it+taM dz+nyA twA shaM kA ku laHpi tuH/ /a bA ra yad+bad+d+hA gr-i he su sUk+Sh+ma bi ba rA N+ya pi/ /ta tasta s+ya ta dA de shAta kru ra ban+d+ha na rak+Shi NaH/ /k+Shu re Na gA D+ha ban+d+ha s+ya pA da yostad+bi kar+t+ta naM/ /sa ti bra be sha sa
<p>337b.4</p>gyur pa ma skyes dgras/ /shes nas dogs pas 'khrugs gyur te/ /pha yi btson khang dag gi ni/ /bug pa shin tu chung ba'ang bkag /de nas gdug pa'i btson srung gis/ /de yi bka' las spu gri yis/ /dam du bcings pa de yi ni/ /rkang pa rnam par bcad par byas/ /drag po sdug bsngal nyon
<p>337b.5</p>kle sha bya thi taHsAr+thi baHpa ra/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya bud+d+hA ye t+yar+t+ti sa kran+da bya d+ha ta/ /b+ha ga bA na tha sarba dz+nyaHpu raHpra t+ya k+She taM ga taH/ /sha kra dat+tA sa nA sI naHkA ru N+ya t+ta ma b+hA Shi
<p>337b.6</p>mongs kyis/ /mchog tu gzir ba'i sa bdag des/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes/ /gdung pa'i cho de ldan pas brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen/ /mdun du mngon sum nyid gshegs te/ /brgya byin gyis bshams gdan la bzhugs/ /thugs rje nyid kyis der
<p>338a</p>
<p>338a.1</p>ta/ /rA dzan kiM kri ya te krU ra kar+m+ma NaM ga ti ri dr-i shi/ /shu b+hA shu b+hA sa mud+b+hu taM nA b+huk+taM k+Sha ya te pha laM/ /rA ga dwe Sha bi Sha sak+tA nA nA bya sA na duHpa ha/ /e baM ba d+he bA niHsA re saM sA
<p>338a.2</p>bka' stsal/ /rgyal po ci bya mi bzad pa'i/ /las kyi lugs ni 'di 'dra yin/ /dge dang mi dge rab bskrun 'bras/ /spyad pa min pa yongs mi mdzad/ /chags sdang dug gis dkrigs gyur cing / /sna tshogs gdung ba bzod dka' ba/ /snying po med pa'i 'khor ba na/ /sdug bsngal
<p>338a.3</p>re duHkha sA ra tA/ /saM kle she ka li le kA le bi pa ta saM pa ta saM ka Te/ /d+haiR+Y+Ya me ba pa ri trA NaM bai rA gyaM ba ni rA ku laM/ /saM sA ra g+ho ra ga ha nAn+ta ra dzr-iM b+hA mA naHduHkhA na la bya ti ka raiHpra sr-i te ra
<p>338a.4</p>'di lta snying po nyid/ /rgud pa rgyas pas nyam thag cing / /kun nas nyon mongs rdzogs dus su/ /'khrugs pa med pa'i chags bral lam/ /brtan pa kho na yongs skyabs yin/ /'khor ba 'jigs rung nags kyi nang na rab tu rgyas gyur pa/ /sdug bsngal me yis gdung ba 'phro bas rab rgyas du ba
<p>338a.5</p>sik+tAH/ /d+hA mong+ga me ri ba pu naHsu kr-i to tsi tA nAM bASh+pAM bu bin+du ka li lA na dr-i sho b+ha ban+ta/ /b+ha dza swa duHkha smin b+ho gA nAM t+ya dza b+hU pa tai/ /pa ri NA ma bi ro d+ha n+yaHsar+b+ba saM sA ra br-it+ta yaH/ /a
<p>338a.6</p>bzhin/ /slar yang reg par gyur pa min pa legs byas ldan rnams kyi/ /mig ni mchi ma'i chu yi thigs kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po longs spyod re ba thong / /sdug bsngal 'di la brtan pa brten/ /'khor ba'i spyod tshul thams cad ni/ /yongs su gyur pa 'gal ba can/ /lus kyi
<p>338b</p>
<p>338b.1</p>d+hu nai ba ta thA san+na de hAn+ta ku sha la s+thi tiH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA taM sa mA shwa s+ya b+ha ga bAn+s+wa pa daM ya yau/ /bim+bi sa ro pi de hon+te tasmin+ne ba k+Sha Ne di bi/ /a b+hUdz+dzi naR+Sha b+ho nA ma shrAM mAn+bai shra ba Nat+ma dzaH/ /a dzA ta sha trurdza
<p>338b.2</p>mjug tu da lta nyid/ /khyod la dge ba nye bar gnas/ /zhes brjod de ni dbugs phyung ste/ /bcom ldan rang gi gnas su gshegs/ /gzugs can snying po'ang lus kyi mthar/ /de dus nyid na mtho ris su/ /dpal ldan rnam thos sras kyi bu/ /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ces par gyur/ /pha ni srog dang bral ba
<p>338b.3</p>na kaM dz+nya twA bi ga ta dzI bi taM/ /sha rI ra ma s+ya sat+k+r-i t+ya ni nin+da ni dza duHkr-i taM/ /ta s+yA ti tI bra pA pArtaM tsit+ta dur+b+r-it+ta du Shi tAM/ /pash+tsAt+ta pag+ni pa ta naM prA yash+tsit+ta mi dA ka rota/ /so bad+ba ta sam+mo hA dai shwaR+Ya ma da lub+d+ha
<p>338b.4</p>dag /ma skyes dgra yis shes gyur nas/ /de yi lus ni rab sbyangs te/ /rang gis nyes par byas pa smad/ /de sems drag po'i sdig pas gdungs/ /spyod tshul ngan pas sun phyung ste/ /phyi nas gdung ba'i me la der/ /dag pa'i bya ba byed pa bzhin/ /des bsams kye ma kun rmongs las/ /dbang phyug gis
<p>338b.5</p>d+hIH/ /dur+b+r-it+ta pA ta ka shwa b+h+re pa ti to ha ma b+ho mu khaH/ /shru ta pradz+nyA da ri drA NAM ni dza ni drA su kha mo hA/ /tsin+tA da ha ti gA trA Ni kha la man+t+rA nu bar+t+ti nAM/ /pa ti ta s+yA tsa san+na s+ya pA pa saM ke bra
<p>338b.6</p>rgyags sred ldan blo/ /tshul ngan bdag ni kha sbub du/ /sdig pa'i g.yang la lhung bar gyur/ /thos pa shes rab kyis dbul zhing / /rang nyid bde bas rmongs gyur pa/ /mi bsrun sngags rjes zhugs pa rnams/ /bsam pas lus ni gdung bar byed/ /rten sa med pa'i sdig pa yis/ /'dam du lhung zhing
<p>339a</p>
<p>339a.1</p>mA da niH/ /a nA lam+ba naMtrA NAM dzi na saM sma ra Na ma ma/ /i ti saM tsiM t+ya su tsi raM sa ga twA su ga tAn+ti kaM/ /dzu gup+sa mA naHku kr-i tAta pa ra saM ko tsa mA ya yau/ /ta tra pa bi tra mAt+mA naM ma n+ya mA
<p>339a.2</p>nyams gyur pa/ /bag med bdag la rgyal ba ni/ /yang dag dran pa skyabs su 'gyur/ /de ltar yun ring bsams nas der/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung song ste/ /ngan pa byas la smod byad cing / /mchog tu yang dag zhum par gyur/ /der ni bdag nyid mi gtsang ba/ /khas len khrel
<p>339a.3</p>naHsa sa tra paH/ /pra Na nA ma dzi naM du rAta bA pa spaR+sha d+ha yA di ba/ /sA shru ne tra pa ri trA NaM sa sar+b+ba dz+nya bya dza dz+nyA yata/ /sa kam+paHkA ya saM sak+ti bi d+huts+tsan+ni ba duHkr-i taM/ /b+ha ga bAn kr-i ta pA bo ha mA san+na
<p>339a.4</p>dang bcas pa des/ /sdig la reg pas 'jigs pa bzhin/ /ring nas rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal/ /ngan byas lus la yang dag chags/ /gsal bar byed bzhin 'dar ldan pas/ /mig ni mchi ma dang bcas des/ /kun mkhyen la ni yongs skyobs zhus/ /yongs gdungs sdig pa byas pa bdag /
<p>339a.5</p>na ra kA na laH/ /san+tap+taHka ru NA sin+d+huM twA me ba sha ra NaM ga taH/ /mA mi yaM sho Na paR+Yan+tA dr-iSh+Taste puSh+ka ra pra b+hA/ /pu N+ya spr-i sha tu gad+ge ba ma la pra k+ShA la na k+Sha mA/ /kha la man+t+ra pra br-it+te na dur+b+r-it+te na pra
<p>339a.6</p>dmyal ba'i me ni nye bar gnas/ /thugs rje'i rgya mtsho bcom ldan 'das/ /khyod nyid la ni skyabs su song / /grwa gnyis dmar ba khyod kyi spyan/ /pad+mo'i 'od ldan gang gA bzhin/ /dri ma 'khru bzod dag byed pa/ /'di yis bdag la reg pa mdzod/ /mi bsrun gros kyis rab zhugs shing / /bag med
<p>339b</p>
<p>339b.1</p>mA di nA/ /mA yA bi b+hA ba lub+d+he na pA pe na ni ha taHpi tA/ /i ti pra lA pi nasta s+ya ba tsaHshru twA ta thA ga taH/ /sa sardzastat+pA pa ra dzaHshud+d+hau pu N+ya sa ra swa tIM/ /rA dzan+na tsi ti tA pA paHkha le ne ba swa kar+m+ma
<p>339b.2</p>spyod tshul ngan pa can/ /sdig can 'byor pa la chags pa/ /bdag gis pha ni rnam par bsad/ /ces pa cho nge ldan de yi/ /tshig thos de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /de yi sdig rdul dag bya'i slad/ /bsod nams dbyangs can rab tu spros/ /rang las kyis bzhin mi bsrun pa/ /rgyal po gnod pa ma
<p>339b.3</p>NA/ /pre ri ta s+t+waM pi dr-i ba d+he pa ti taHpA pa saM ka Te/ /duHkhan+tat+te na b+hok+ta byaM prAp+tA kilbi ShaM twa yA/ /ta ba ta s+ya sa b+hU pA la tu lai ShA b+ha bi ta bya tA/ /ni dza kar+m+ma sa mud+kIr+N+NA lA la Ta ta Ta bar+t+ti nAM/ /shi lA sha ka la
<p>339b.4</p>bsams pa/ /khyod ni pha bsad la bskul te/ /nyam nga'i sdig par lhung bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal de des spyad bya zhing / /khyod kyis kyang ni sdig pa thob/ /sa skyong de dang khyod kyi 'di/ /myong bar bya ba mtshungs pa nyid/ /rang gi las ni rab bkod pa/ /dpral ba'i ngos la gnas pa dag /rdo yi dum bu'i ri mo
<p>339b.5</p>le khe ba nish+tsa la ni yA tir+b+r-i Na ma/ /kur+b+ba tA ka lu ShaM kar+m+ma kha la sre ra Na ya twa yA/ /pra t+yA san+nA mr-i ta shre yaHswa haste na ti raskr-i taM/ /a d+yA pi ya di te pA paM han+tuM brAp+tany+tsa sam+pa daM/ /bAMny+tsAsti tad+ku ru ma tiM pu N+ya bA
<p>339b.6</p>bzhin/ /mi rnams kyis ni g.yo ma yin/ /khyod ni mi bsrun pas bskul nas/ /sdig pa'i las ni byas pa yis/ /dge legs bdud rtsi nye ba ni/ /rang gi lag pas 'phangs par gyur/ /gal te khyod la da lta yang / /sdig gzhom phun tshogs thob 'dod pa/ /yod na bsod nams blo gros mdzod/ /
<p>340a</p>
<p>340a.1</p>pa sha mA dAt+ma ne/ /dI ba br-it+taM su khaM sU te dzI ba ya t+yudz+dz+wa laM ya shaH/ /a mr-i ta s+ya pra ka ro yaM su br-it+taHsa sa mA ga maH/ /bash+tsat+tA pAg+ni pA te na sA d+hu ni sad+ga men tsa/ /sAM kIr+t+ta ne na dA ne na pA
<p>340a.2</p>de yang zhi las bdag nyid la'o/ /mar me'i spyod tshul bde ba skyed/ /'tsho byed grags pa rab tu 'bar/ /bdud rtsi'i rab tu byed pa 'di/ /legs pa dang 'grogs dam pa'i spyod/ /rjes su 'gyod pa'i mes gdungs dang / /dam pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dang / /yang dag bsgrags dang
<p>340a.3</p>pi na sh+ya ti de hi nAM/ /bA traM ba bi tra ya ti nai ba gu NAn+k+Shi No tisne haM na saM ha ra ti nA pi ma laM pra sU te/ /do Sha ba sA na ru tsi rash+tsa la tAM na d+hat+te sat+saM ga maHsu kr-i ta sad+ma ni ko pi dI paH/ /
<p>340a.4</p>sbyin pa yis/ /lus can rnams kyi sdig nyams byed/ /snod ni gtsang byed yon tan sdong bu nges par zad mi byed/ /mdza' ba'i snum ni mi 'phrogs dri ma yang ni skyed mi byed/ /skyon mtshan mjug tu rab mdzes g.yo ba nyid ni 'dzin mi byed/ /dam pa dang 'grogs legs byas khang par mar me ci yang
<p>340a.5</p>gu Ni ga Na pi pad+dI k+Sh+ya k+Sha ya k+Sha Na san+ni b+haHsa ka la na ya na byA pA rA NAM dza nA ni ni ro d+ha kaMH/ /a sa ma bi Sha mA yA sA bA saHpra kA shaM pa ri k+Sha yAta su dza ti hi ma hA mo had+go maM ta
<p>340a.6</p>yin/ /yon tan ldan pa'i tshogs la rgud pa 'doms mkhas mtshan mo'i skad cig mtshungs/ /skye bo'i 'dren byed rnams kyi bya ba mtha' dag rab tu 'gog par byed/ /shin tu mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la gnas shing snang ba yongs zad las/ /rmongs pa chen po'i 'byung ba bskyed de mun pa dang ni
<p>340b</p>
<p>340b.1</p>maHkha la saM ga maH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+has+t+waM rA dza na kA le na k+ShI Na kilbi ShaH/ /b+ha bi Sh+ya pi bi be ke na kr-i tA lo kaHsha naiHsha naiH/ /i ti ta s+ya da yA swA saMny+tsa kA ra b+ha ga bAny+dzi naH/ /pa ti te Sh+wa d+hi ka san+taHka ru NA snig+d+ha lo tsa nAH/ /
<p>340b.2</p>mi bsrun grogs/ /rgyal po dal bu dal bu yis/ /dus kyis sdig pa zad gyur nas/ /dben pas snang bar byas pa yi/ /rang sangs rgyas su khyod 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yi/ /brtse bas de ni dbugs dbyung mdzad/ /lhung las lhag par dam pa rnams/ /snying rje byams pa'i spyan dang ldan/ /
<p>340b.3</p>ta taHpra Na mya su ga taM pra yA taHswA pa daM nr-i paH/ /ma ha taHpA pa b+hA ra s+ya bi be de la g+hu tA mi ba/ /tasmin+p+ra yA te sar+b+ba dz+nyaHpr-iSh+Tasta s+ya kar+m+ma kau tu kAta/ /b+hik+Shu b+hiHk+Shi taM pA la s+ya pUr+b+ba br-it+ta ma b+hA Sha ta/ /bA rA Na
<p>340b.4</p>de nas bde gshegs la btud de/ /mi bdag rang gi gnas su song / /sdig pa'i khur po chen po ni/ /yang ba nyid bzhin rnam par rig /dge slong rnams kyis de song tshe/ /de yi las kyi dge mtshan las/ /sa skyong gi ni sngon byung mtha'/ /dris shing bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal/ /bA rA Na
<p>340b.5</p>s+yAM ni rA yA sa bi lA sa bya ba sA yi naH/ /tsa twA raHshreSh+Thi ta na yAHba b+hu buHshri bi br-iMkha laH/ /te ka dA tsit+su kha k+ShI bA ma thiHka li ka thAs+thi tAH/ /pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha mA yAn+taM da dr-i shuR+Yau ba nod+d+ha tAH/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wA dzA
<p>340b.6</p>sIr tshong dpon gyi/ /bu bzhi dag ni byung gyur te/ /dpal ldan bsdams pa dag bral zhing / /gdung med rtse dga' la brtson pa'o/ /nam zhig bde bas myos gyur cing / /phan tshun kyal ka'i gtam gyis gnas/ /lang tshos 'phyar ba de dag gis/ /rang sangs rgyas ni byon pa mthong / /de mthong rnam
<p>341a</p>
<p>341a.1</p>ta bi dwe ShaHsha ma sa ya ma nin+da kAH/ /dz+yaiSh+Tha su pun+da ra ko nA ma b+h+rA tr-in+b+ra bA tsa sa smi taH/ /a yaM tsi ba ra pA traM kaHpA ne na ga ta dzI bi taH/ /k+Shi re bi d+hI ya te b+hik+Shu ri t+ya yam+me ma no ra thAH/ /i t+yuk+te tsA
<p>341a.2</p>par sdang ba skyes/ /zhi dul smod byed phu bo ni/ /sun da ra ka zhes pa yis/ /'dzum bcas spun zla rnams la smras/ /btung bas nyes pas dge slong ni/ /chos gos lhung bzed rtags can 'di/ /srog dang bral ba bsgrub po zhes/ /'di ni bdag gi yid la snyam/ /g.yo ba las des
<p>341a.3</p>pa lAt+te na dwi tI yaHkun+da rA b+hi d+haH/ /u pA tsa b+hik+Shuk+Shib+he maM han+tu maMts+tshA mya haM dza laM/ /ta tas+t+ri tI yo s+ya ba data pA paHpun+da ra kA b+haM d+haH/ /e Sha b+hik+Shu raM bo n+yA s+yAM bI th+yA ni k+Shi s+ya te dza bAta/ /tsa tur+tho s+ya ba dat+k+ru ra ma tiH
<p>341a.4</p>'di brjod tshe/ /gnyis pa kun da ra zhes pas/ /smras pa bdag ni dge slong 'di/ /chu la 'phangs te gsad par 'dod/ /de nas gsum pa sdig pa can/ /sun ta ra ka zhes pas smras/ /dge slong 'di nyid mgyogs par ni/ /kha khyer dag la 'phangs par bya/ /bzhi pa gdug pa'i blo gros can/ /
<p>341a.5</p>gan+da rA b+hi d+haH/ /phi k+ShoHk+Shu re Na kraM ya te nish+tsar+m+ma tsar Na swa yaM/ /i ti te ShAM bru bA NA nAM ka lu Sho b+hUt+ma no ra thaH/ /ye na dzan+mAn+ta ra brA s+yaste Sh+we ts+tshA sa dr-i shaM pha laM/ /d+ha na pa sh+ya ti lo b+hAn+d+ha kro d+hAM d+haHsha tru me
<p>341a.6</p>kan da ra zhes bya bas smras/ /dge slong rkang pa rang gis ni/ /spu gris lag pa med par bya/ /zhes pa smras shing de dag rnams/ /sdig pa yid la 'dod par gyur/ /gang gis rang 'dod mtshungs pa'i 'bras/ /de dag skye ba gzhan la thob/ /chags pas long bas nor mthong ste/ /khro bas long bas dgra
<p>341b</p>
<p>341b.1</p>ba/ /kA mAM d+haHkA mi nI me ba dar+s+yan+d+hastu na kiM tsa na/ /d+ha nod+b+hU ta bi kA rA NAM pra yA t+ya ni ya tAt+ma nAM/ /ma da man+da bi tsA rA NA mA nan+daHkle sha ban+ba tA ma/ /kru d+h+yan+t+ya kA ra Na ma ra kA Na mut+pa tan+ti sne
<p>341b.2</p>nyid do/ /'dod pas long bas 'dod ldan nam/ /dregs pas long bas ci yang min/ /nor gyis rab bskyed rnam 'gyur can/ /bdag nyid mi sdom rtog dpyod dman/ /rgyags pa rnams kyi kun dga' ni/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba nyid du 'gyur/ /rgyu med khro bar byed cing rgyu med rab tu 'bar bar byed/ /rgyu med
<p>341b.3</p>h+yan+t+ya kA ra Na ma kA ra Na ma ma nan+taM/ /mo hA ha tAHkha lu hi tA hi ta nirbi tsA rA s+t+r-ib+tAHpa raM nr-i pa sha baHsa ma dA b+ha ban+taM/ /dz+yeSh+Tha shreSh+ThaHsu taHpA bA tas e bar+t+ta dzan+ma ni/ /sha riR+YA nA b+hi d+haHshAkyaH
<p>341b.4</p>mdzad par byed cing rgyu med kun tu khas len byed/ /nges par rmongs pas bcom pa phan dang mi phan dpyod med cing / /mchog tu tshim pas mi yi phyugs rnams rgyags dang bcas par gyur/ /sdig las tshong dpon bu thu bo/ /de nyid skye ba gzhan la ni/ /shAkya shA ri rgya zhes pa/ /chang 'thungs nas
<p>341b.5</p>bI twA ma d+ya bi pa d+ya ta/ /dwi tI yo pi ma han+na ma shAkya sto ye k+Sha yaM ga taH/ /traM tAM yash+tsa bu tre Na byasto rA dzA pra se na dzi ta/ /bim+ba sA rash+tsa tur+tho sau dr-i ta pu tre Na ban+d+ha ne/ /pra yuk+tan+d+ha na bat+kar+m+ma b+hu dz+ya te hi sa br-id+d+hi
<p>341b.6</p>ni nyams par gyur/ /gnyis pa yang ni shAkya dag /ming chen chu la shi bar gyur/ /gsum pa rgyal po gsal rgyal yang / /bu yis bskrad nas bsad bar gyur/ /bzhi pa gzugs can snying po 'di/ /bu yis btson du bcings nas bsad/ /skyed dang ldan pa'i nor bzhin du/ /las ni rab ldan spyod par
<p>342a</p>
<p>342a.1</p>kaM/ /mo hA ha tai raM ha ha sad+b+hi ra sa sI re bAM niHshar+m+ma kar+m+ma sa ha sai ba pi b+hAM ya te yata/ /bASh+bAm+bu pUr+N+Na na ya nai ra na yau ba nI ta masto ka sho ka bi ba she ra nu b+hU ya te tra/ /su ga ta ka thaM
<p>342a.2</p>byed/ /de ltar rmongs pas bcom pa'i dam pa dam min rnams kyis 'dir/ /bde ba med pa'i las ni 'phral nyid rnam par bsgrubs pa gang / /tshul min nye bar gnas pa de ni mchi ma'i chu dag gis/ /mi rdzogs mya ngan mi chung dbang dang bral phas spyod par byed/ /gzugs can snying
<p>342a.3</p>ta me tat+pur+b+ba dzan+ma pra br-it+taM bi Sha bi Sha ma bi bA kaM biM bi sA ra s+ya br-it+taM/ /bi bi d+ha sa da si b+hik+ShuHspaSh+Ta mA kar+N+N+ya me ne bya sa na sha ta ni mit+taM dU Shi ta tsit+ta me ba/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi
<p>342a.4</p>po'i skye ba snga mar rab zhugs byung pa'i tshul/ /mi bzad dug gi rnam smin 'di dag bde gshegs kyis gsungs pa/ /mdun sar dge slong rnam mang dag gis gsal bar thos gyur nas/ /gdung ba brgya yi mtshan mas sun phyung sems nyid yin par sems/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas
<p>342a.5</p>tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yA ma dzA ta sha tru pi tr-i dro hA ba dA na pany+tsa tsa twA riM shaHpal+la baH// //an+d+hi kr-i to pi sa dr-i shA ta ma sA kha le na lak+Sh+mI bi hA ra bi ra he bi ni pA ti to pi/ /
<p>342a.6</p>pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las ma skyes dgras pha bsad pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //mi bsrun mun pas 'phral la long bar byas gyur cing / /dpal 'byor rnam par gnas dang bral bar rab bskrun kyang / /
<p>342b</p>
<p>342b.1</p>kr-ir+b+bA da shA mi ba ni shA ma ni bA h+ya pad+maHswA me ba saM pa da mu pai ti pu nargu NA D+h+yaH/ /shra bas+d+yAM su ga te dze ta ba no d+yA na bi hA ri Ni/ /de ba dat+taHpa ri dwe Sha bA di byAp+to byA tsin+ta yata/ /tu l+yaHsa mA no me b+h+ra
<p>342b.2</p>nyam nga'i gnas skabs mtshan mo 'das nas pad+ma bzhin/ /slar yang yon tan ldan pas rang gi phun tshogs thob/ /bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi/ /skyed mos tshal na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /lha sbyin yongs su sdang ba yi/ /rtsod pas khyab pas rnam bsams pa/ /shAkya'i rigs las skyes
<p>342b.3</p>tA ma nu Sh+ya shAkya baM sha dzaH/ /prAp+taHpu N+ya pra b+hA be na tri dza gat+pu dz+yA tAM dzi naH/ /dzI bi to br-it+ti ye tasmAta ta s+ya yat+naM ka ro mya haM/ /na d+yu na staM ga te b+hA nau pa ra te dzaHpra kA sha te/ /bi dz+nyA ne nA nub+hA
<p>342b.4</p>pa'i mi/ /bdag ni spun dang mtshungs shing mnyam/ /bsod nams mthu yis 'gro gsum gyis/ /mchod bya nyid ni rgyal bas thob/ /de slad de yi 'tsho ba ni/ /rab tu gzhom la bdag 'bad bya/ /gang phyir nyi ma ma nub tshe/ /gzhan gyi gzi byin gsal ba med/ /yid ni nga rgyal gyis mtho bas/ /
<p>342b.5</p>be na bi d+ya yA ta pa sAM shri yA/ /pa ra pra kaR+Sha sa ha te na hi mA non+ta tan+ma naH/ /b-i ShaM ni dza na khA gre Shu d+h+r-i twA ta s+ya pra NA ma kr-ita/ /sa tsA ra yA mi d+ha ni Sh+l-iSh+k+r-i bya ne tsi DaHpA da pI Da naiH/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya ka lu ShaM bi dwe
<p>342b.6</p>rnam shes dag dang mthu dang ni/ /rigs dang dka' thub dpal dag gis/ /pha rol khyad 'phags bzod ma yin/ /dug ni rang gi sen rtse la/ /bzung nas de la phyag 'tshal te/ /brtan par rkang pa la mnan pas/ /nges par phug la gtang bar bya/ /de ltar sdig pa bsams byas nas/ /sdang ba'i
<p>343a</p>
<p>343a.1</p>ShaHbi ba shaHkha laH/ /sa ti Sh+ya pra mu khA ne t+ya bAn+d+ha bA ni da ma b+h+ya d+hAta/ /krU raHkr-i tA pa ka ro haM su ga ta s+yA d+ya pA da yauH/ /sa ra la s+ya pra sA dA ya ba tA mi gu ru pA ta kaH/ /i ti bra bA NastaiHsar+b+baiHsu
<p>343a.2</p>dbang gyur mi bsrun pa/ /de yis skar rgyal la sogs pa'i/ /gnyen rnams la ni 'di skad smras/ /de ring bde gshegs gzu bo yis/ /zhabs la rab tu dang ba'i slad/ /gdug pa gnod pa byed pa yi/ /sdig pa lci ldan bdag gtug go/ /zhes smra gdug pa'i blo can de/ /rjes mthun
<p>343a.3</p>dat+tA nu ma taiHsata/ /dzi naM dze ta ba nA sI naM dr-iSh+TaM duSh+Ta tiR+Ya yau/ /b+ha ga bAn+taM bi lo kyA b+hut+ta tra yA bat+sa sar+b+ba saH/ /tA bad+dag+d+ho ha mi t+yuts+tshai ra Nat+k+Ship+ta tsa ra NA ba data/ /hiM sA saM kalpa pA pe na badzre Ne ba sa mA ha taH/ /
<p>343a.4</p>ster byed de dag rnams/ /kun dang lhan cig rgyal ba ni/ /rgyal byed tshal bzhugs blta ru song / /der ni bcom ldan mthong gyur nas/ /ji srid nye bar des phyin pa/ /de srid bdag ni bsregs so zhes/ /rkang pa sprug cing sgra cher smras/ /'tshe ba'i rnam rtog sdig pa ni/ /rdo rje lta bus yang dag bcom/ /
<p>343a.5</p>sa shi rI raM k+Sha Ne ta smin na ra kag+nau pa sA ta saH/ /sar+b+ba dz+nyA sa ha sA dr-iSh+T+wAM taM g+ho ra na ra ke ts+yu taM/ /u bA tsa shru ta tad+b+r-it+ta bismi tAM b+hi k+ShuM sam+pa da/ /e Sha kilbi Sha do She Na pa ti taHkle sha saM
<p>343a.6</p>skad cig de la dmyal ba'i mer/ /lus dang bcas pa lhung bar gyur/ /'jigs rung dmyal bar lhung ba de/ /'phral la kun mkhyen gyis gzigs nas/ /de brjod thos pa'i ya mtshan pa'i/ /phun tshogs dge slong la gsungs pa/ /sdig pa dag gi skyon gyis ni/ /nyon mongs nyam ngar lhung bar
<p>343b</p>
<p>343b.1</p>ka Te/ /tI braM s+thi taM mi raM sr-i te sar+b+ba thA ma li nam+ma naH/ /na gaR+YA ba ti g+ho Sha yaM ra ti so ma s+ya b+hu pa teH/ /kr-i ta dz+nyaSh+tsA kr-i ta dz+nyAsh+tsa pu rA pu trau ba b+hu ba tuH/ /kr-i ta dz+nyAHkr-i pa yAr+thi b+h+yaHkalpa br-ik+Sha i bA ni shIM/ /
<p>343b.2</p>gyur/ /gang phyir dri ma ldan pa'i yid/ /kun tu rab rib drag po skyed/ /grong khyer dge ba'i dbyangs su ni/ /sa yi bdag po yid bzang la/ /byas shes dang ni byas mi shes/ /bu gnyis sngon tshe byung bar gyur/ /byas shes brtse bas slong rnams la/ /rtag tu dpag bsam shing bzhin du/ /
<p>343b.3</p>ni dza bi mu tsa pra da dau rat+nA b+ha ra Na sany+tsa yaM/ /a bi b+hak+ta pi tur+d+ra byaM sar+b+baM sA d+hA ra ma d+hi yoH/ /ba dan+ni t+ya kr-i ta dz+nyo pi te na dat+ta dza hA ra tata/ /tataHsh+lA g+h+yA ya ba tsa sA ma ti g+ho ShA b+hi d+ho nr-i paH/ /
<p>343b.4</p>rang gi rin chen rgyan gyi tshogs/ /rnam par bkrol nas rab tu ster/ /bgos pa min pa pha yi rdzas/ /thams cad 'u cag thun mong yin/ /zhes smras byas mi shes kyis kyang / /de yis byin pa de dag phrogs/ /de nas mi bdag blo gros dbyangs/ /zhes pas byas shes bsngags 'os la/ /
<p>343b.5</p>dza na ka l+yA Ni kAM nA ma kr-i tA dz+nya ya su tAM da dau/ /swa ya me bArdzi taM bit+taM dzA tuM dzA ta ma no ra thaH/ /A ru ro ha pra ba ha NaM kr-i ta dz+nyo tha ma ho da d+hau/ /rat+nArdza nau ya taM dwe Sha s+sar+d+d+hi tA da raH/ /ta me bA nu ya yau
<p>343b.6</p>skye bo dge ma zhes pa yi/ /bu mo tshig gis byin par gyur/ /rang nyid kyis bsgrubs byin pa yi/ /yid la re ba de la skyes/ /de nas chu gtor chen por ni/ /byas shes gzings la zhon par gyur/ /sdang zhing 'gran pas gus 'phel ba/ /ngan pa byas mi shes pa yang / /rin chen sgrub brtson
<p>344a</p>
<p>344a.1</p>lo b+hA da kr-i ta dz+nyo bi durdza naH/ /saM pUr+N+Nam+pa ni dziM sAr+thaista taHpra ba ha NaM sha naH/ /A nu kU l+ye na ma ru tA ma bA pa dwi pa mis+si tA/ /tasmin+na pra ti ni pr-it+te tha swa de shaM gan+tu mu d+ya te/ /rat+na
<p>344a.2</p>de nyid kyi/ /rjes su chags las song bar gyur/ /de nas tshong pa'i don mthun gyis/ /yongs gang gzings ni dal bu yi/ /rjes su mthun pa'i rlung dag gis/ /'dod pa'i gling du phyin par gyur/ /tshong pa rnams kyi kun rtog bzhin/ /rin chen tshogs kyis kun tu khengs/ /de nas
<p>344a.3</p>rA shi b+hi rA pUr+N+Na saM kalpe ba Ni dzA mi ba/ /kr-i ta dz+nyaHpr-i thi bI mU l+yaM rat+nA naM sha ta pany+tsa kaM/ /A dA ya gran+thi paT+Te na ba ban+d+hAM shu ka pal+la be/ /rat+na b+hA ra pa ri shrAn+taM ta taHbra ba ha NaM ma hata/ /a b+ha dz+nyA ta ma
<p>344a.4</p>de ni slar log nas/ /rang gi phyogs su 'gro brtson tshe/ /sa gzhi ri ba'i rin po che/ /brgya phrag lnga ni byas shes kyis/ /blangs nas gos kyi yal 'dab la/ /ras ma yis ni mdud par bcings/ /de nas gzings chen rin chen gyi/ /khur gyis yongs su ngal ba de/ /rlung chen dag gis zhig
<p>344a.5</p>hA bA tai rai shwaR+Ya mi ba dur+N+Na yeH/ /ta taHpha la ha kA bAstAM kr-i ta dz+nyAHprAp+ta dzi bi taH/ /a kr-i ta dz+nyI ni madz+dzan+taM pr-iSh+The na sa ma ta ra yeta/ /tA ri taHkr-i pa yA b+hA tA sa g+ho ra ma ka rA ka rAta/ /a sa sh+Ya da tsa le ta
<p>344a.6</p>gyur te/ /tshul ngan rnams kyi dbang phyug bzhin/ /de nas shing dum bzung ba yis/ /byas shes kyis ni 'tsho ba thob/ /rgyab kyis byas mi shes dag ni/ /byings par gyur pa yang dag bsgral/ /'jigs rung chu srin 'byung gnas las/ /brtse bas bsgral ba'i spun zla des/ /de yi thu po dag la ni/ /rin
<p>344b</p>
<p>344b.1</p>s+ya ru tsi raM rat+na sany+tsa yaM/ /sa ta s+ya rat+na lo b+he na dwe She tsa ba shI kr-i taH/ /sa mu dra tI re shran+ta s+ya b+har+t+ri dro ha ma tsin+ta yata/ /ta s+ya ni drA ni lI na s+ya shas+t+re not+pA D+ya lo tsa ne/ /gr-i hI twA rat+na ni tsa yaM kr-i ta g+hanaHsa ye yau
<p>344b.2</p>chen yid 'ong bsags pa mthong / /de yi rin chen la chags dang / /sdang ba'i dbang du gyur pa des/ /rgya mtsho'i 'gram du ngal ba yi/ /spun ya 'khu ba bsams par gyur/ /de ni gnyid du song ba la/ /mig dag mtshon gyis rab phyung nas/ /rin po che yi tshogs bzung ste/ /byas mi gzo de mgyogs
<p>344b.3</p>dza bAta/ /kru re NAn+d+hI kr-i taste na rA hu Ne ba di ba ka raH/ /lo ko pa kA ra bi ra hata duHkhi taHso s+ya tsin+ta yata/ /a d+hu nAr+thi pra dA ner+the byar+thI b+hU te ma no ra the/ /kim+ma mAn+d+ha s+ya ban+d+he dzI bi te na pra yo dza naM/ /a
<p>344b.4</p>par song / /sgra gcan gyis ni nyin byed bzhin/ /gdug pas long bar byas pa des/ /'jig rten phan pa bral ba las/ /sdug bsngal ldan pa des kyang bsams/ /da ni slong la sbyin don du/ /yid la re ba don med gyur/ /long ba bdag gi 'tsho ba ni/ /'bras med dag gis dgos pa ci/ /gal te
<p>344b.5</p>prAp+ta bi d+ha yaHprA NA na pra yAn+ti ya dik+Sha yaM/ /ta da saM ga ta po yo gaHkle sha shAn+ti k+Sha ya k+Sha maH/ /k+ShI Ne d+ha ne dza ne dwe She mA ne bai ka l+ya be+e hwa le/ /pU dz+ye puM sAM sa me nai ba she Sha s+ya tsa ya so bya yaH/ /i ti sany+tsi d+ya
<p>344b.6</p>dus la ma bab pas/ /srog ni 'jig par mi 'gyur na/ /de la grogs med dka' thub kyi/ /sbyor ba nyon mongs zhi 'jig bzod/ /nor zad skye bo sdang gyur cing / /khengs pa dang bral 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ /skyes bu rnams ni na tshod 'jug /zhi bas zad pa mchod par 'os/ /de ltar bsams shing
<p>345a</p>
<p>345a.1</p>sa sha nair+b+ra dza na sAr+the na tA ri taH/ /a bA pa na ga ro pAn+taM ma ti g+ho Sha s+ya b+hU pa teH/ /go pA la b+ha ba ne ta tra sa kiny+tsit+kA la mA s+thi taH/ /u d+yA na ya trA ga ta yA rA dza pu t+ya bi lo ki taH/ /taM dr-iSh+T+wAn+d+ha ma
<p>345a.2</p>dal bus de/ /'gro ba don mthun dag gis bsgral/ /sa bdag blo gros dbyangs kyi ni/ /grong khyer dag dang nye bar phyin/ /ba lang skyong ba'i khang pa der/ /cung zad dus ni de yis bsdad/ /rgyal po'i bu mo skyed mos tshal/ /rnam par lta zhing 'gro ba yis/ /long yang rgyal po'i
<p>345a.3</p>pi byak+ta rA dza lak+Sha Na lak+Shi ta/ /prAg+dzan+ma pre ma ban+d+he na sa b+hi lA ShA ba b+hU ba sA/ /ta taHswa ya swa ra bi d+hi sA kr-i twA sa sha nat+pi tuH/ /rA dz+nyA mA d+h+ya mA nA N+ya ban+d+hu bi ga ta lo tsa naM/ /b+hU mi pA
<p>345a.4</p>mtshan rnams kyis/ /gsal bar mtshan pa de mthong nas/ /skye ba snga ma'i mdza' bas bcings/ /de la mngon par dga' bar gyur/ /de nas yab kyi bka' las ni/ /rang nyid mchog 'dam de yis byas/ /rgyal po rnams kyi nang nas ni/ /mig dang bral ba bos ta gdams/ /sa skyong
<p>345a.5</p>lA nu ri t+ya dz+ye br-i to \u0f85n+d+ha pA pa yA twa yA/ /uk+t+we ti pi trA ko pe na ni ra s+thA ba hi shu b+hA sA/ /u d+yA ne sA ni d+hA yAn+d+hAM yat+ne nA kr-i t+ya b+ho dza naM/ /sa dA tasmai da dau pre ma pra Na yo pa tsi tA da rA/ /ka dA
<p>345a.6</p>rnams ni yongs btang nas/ /sdig ma khyod kyis long ba gdams/ /zhes brjod pa ni khros pa yis/ /dge ma de ni phyi rol bskrad/ /mdza' gcugs nyer bsags gus pa can/ /de yis long ba skyed tshal du/ /bzhag nas 'bad pas kha zas dag /bslangs nas ster zhing rtag tu gnas/ /nam
<p>345b</p>
<p>345b.1</p>tsit+taM tsi rA yA tA mA hA rA ba sa re ga te/ /u bA tsa rA dza ta na yaHpa ris+thA nA na naHk+Shu d+hA/ /a sa mI k+Shi ta kA ri N+yA twa yA ke ba la tsa pA lAta/ /br-i te ha man+d+haHsaM t+ya dz+ya nr-i pAn+bi pu la lo tsa nA
<p>345b.2</p>zhig zas kyi skabs 'das tshe/ /yun ring lon nas 'ongs de la/ /bkres pas bzhin ni yongs nyams pa'i/ /rgyal po'i bu yis rab smras pa/ /khyod ni kun tu ma brtags par/ /byed mas g.yo ba 'ba' zhig las/ /mi bdag yangs pa'i spyan ldan rnams/ /yongs btang bdag ni long
<p>345b.3</p>na/ /pash+tsat+tA pe na nU naM twaM ma yi paR+Yu Shi tA da rA/ /a d+hu nA tAn+d+hA baM prem+naHpra daR+sha tu mu d+ya tA/ /an+d+ha san+daR+sha nod+big+nA su rU pA lo ke no mu khI/ /A hA ra kA le ti krAn+ti tsi re NA hA twa mA ga ta/ /i t+yuk+tA
<p>345b.4</p>ba 'dams/ /khyod ni phyi nas 'gyod pa yis/ /bdag la gus pa dman gyur te/ /da ni mdza' ba zhen pa nyid/ /ston par brtson pa ma yin nam/ /long ba lta bas yid byung ste/ /gzugs bzang blta la mngon par phyogs/ /de ring zas kyi dus 'das te/ /ring mo zhig na khyod 'ongs so/ /de yis
<p>345b.5</p>pa ru ShaM te na kam+pa mA nA la te ba pA/ /u bA tsa guM dzan+ma d+hu pa shre NI ma d+hu ka ra bA di nI/ /nA tha mi th+ye ba me shaM kA na ko pAt+kar+t+tu mar+ha si/ /bAg+bA Na pA taM sa ha te na tse taHprI ti pe sha laM/ /two me ba de ba
<p>345b.6</p>rtsub mo 'di smras te/ /'dar ba dang ldan 'khri shing ni/ /sgra sgrog bung ba'i 'phreng ldan bzhin/ /snyan par smras byed des smras pa/ /mgon po khro bas bdag la ni/ /log pa'i dogs pa bgyid mi 'os/ /mdza' bas mnyes gshin sems kyis ni/ /tshig gi mda' lhung mi bzod do/ /khyod ni lha nyid
<p>346a</p>
<p>346a.1</p>tAM dzA na ya d+ya haM shud+d+ha mA na sa/ /te na ba t+ye na sA lo ka me kaM na ya na mastuta/ /i t+yuk+ta sa twa shA li n+yA ta yA ta s+yA shu lo tsa naM/ /ut+pal+la ka ma lA kA ra me kaM bi ma la tAM ya yau/ /ta s+yAHba t+ya bra b+hA be na
<p>346a.2</p>du shes la/ /gal te bdag gi yid dag na/ /bden pa de yis khyod kyi mig /gcig ni snang ba ldan gyur cig /ces pa snying stobs ldan ma des/ /brjod tshe myur bar de yi spyan/ /rab rgyas pad+ma'i rnam pa can/ /gcig ni dri med nyid du gyur/ /de yi bden pa'i mthu yis
<p>346a.3</p>saM dzA ta pr-i thu bisma yaH/ /pa t+ya pra t+ya ya sot+sA haHkr-i ta dz+nyastsa ma b+hA Sha ta/ /b+h+rA trA te nA kr-i ta dz+nye na pA Ti te lo tsa na dwa ye/ /tasmin+bi kA ro bai raM bA na ni kA ro s+ya b+hU ta ma ma/ /swats+tshaM te nAstu ba t+ye na dwi tI ya ma pi
<p>346a.4</p>ni/ /ya mtshan chen po yang dag skyes/ /bden pa'i yid ches spro ldan pas/ /byas shes kyis ni de la smras/ /spun zla byas mi shes de yis/ /mig gnyis dag ni phyung gyur pa'i/ /gnod pa de la bdag la ni/ /khon rnam rnam 'gyur ma skyes na/ /bden pa de yis gnyis pa yi/ /mig
<p>346a.5</p>lo tsa na ma/ /i t+yuk+te tat+k+Sha Ne nA s+ya spaSh+Tany+tsak+Shu ra lak+Sh+ya ta/ /ta taHka li ta br-i tAn+taM kr-i ta dz+nya mu tsi taM pa tiM/ /pra hr-iSh+Ta dza na ka l+yA NiM ga twA pi tre n+ya be da yata/ /pU dzi taHswa shu re NA tha sa rat+na ga
<p>346a.6</p>kyang rnal du gnas gyur cig /ces brjod de yis skad cig la/ /de ni gsal ba'i mig gis mtshan/ /de nas byung ba'i mtha' bshad pa'i/ /byas shes bdag por 'os pa ni/ /skye bo dge ma rab mgu bas/ /song nas pha la nges par bshad/ /de nas de ni gyos po yis/ /rin chen glang
<p>346b</p>
<p>346b.1</p>dza bA dzi b+hiH/ /shri ye ba kAn+ta yA sAr+d+d+haM dza ga ma na ga riM pi tuH/ /sa ta tra pi trA hr-iSh+Te na tsa ra NA lI na she kha raH/ /dza nA nu rA ga shu b+ha ge yau ba rA dz+ye pa de d+h+r-i taH/ /a kr-i ta dz+nyo pi nirladz+dzastaM pra sA da yi tr-iM
<p>346b.2</p>po rta yis mchod/ /dpal dang bzhin du mdzes ma dang / /lhan cig yab kyi grong khyer song / /zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/ /rab tu mgu ba'i pha yis der/ /skal bzang skye bo rjes chags pa/ /rgyal tshab dag gi gnas la bkod/ /ngo tsha med pa byas mi shes/ /de la rab tu dang ba'i
<p>346b.3</p>sha ThaH/ /bi tsi t+ya pA da sa ta ne ta s+ya dro hi sa mA ya yo/ /un+ma nArta tu mA tI ti sa taM ku Ti la tseSh+Ta taH/ /hA hA dag+d+hosmi dag+d+ho k+mI t+yuk+tai ba na ra ke pa tata/ /sa e ba de ba dat+to sau kr-i ta dz+nya bya ha me ba
<p>346b.4</p>g.yos/ /zhabs la gtugs te de la ni/ /'khu ba'i bsam pas yang dag 'ongs/ /sgyu yis de ni gsad 'dod pa'i/ /gya gyu'i bsam pa ldan pa de/ /kyi hud bdag bsregs bdag bsregs zhes/ /brjod pa kho nas dmyal bar lhung / /de nyid lha sbyin 'di yin te/ /byas shes de yang nga
<p>346b.5</p>tsa/ /dzan+mAn+ta rA nu ban+d+he na dwe Sho s+ya na ni bar+t+ta te/ /sar+b+ba dz+nya b+hA Shi ta mi ti pra tsu ro pa kA raM tat+de ba dat+ta tsa ri taM pa ri tA pa kA ri/ /dzan+mAn+ta ro pa tsi ta pA ta ka sin+na bad+d+haM shru twA ba b+hU ba bi ma lA i pa b+hik+Shu
<p>346b.6</p>nyid do/ /skye ba gzhan du rjes 'brel bas/ /'di yi sdang ba yongs mi zlog/ /de ltar kun mkhyen gyis gsungs lha sbyin gyi ni spyod pa de/ /yongs su gdung ba byed pa gnod pa rab mang dang ldan zhing / /skye ba gzhan du nye bar bsags pa'i sdig pa rjes 'brel ba/ /dge slong tshogs kyis thos nas
<p>347a</p>
<p>347a.1</p>saM g+haH/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM kr-i ta dz+nyA ba dA naMShaT tsa twA riM shaHpalpa baH// //dA nai ka tA na ma na saM pr-i thu
<p>347a.2</p>yid ni byung ba bzhin du gyur/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las byas shes kyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //snying stobs che bsten yid ni sbyin
<p>347a.3</p>sa twA b+hA dzA mut+sA ha mA na gu Na b+ho ga bi b+hU ti pU taH/ /prAk+pu N+ya sany+tsa ya ma yaHku sha lA b+hI d+hA na kA le pha la t+ya bi ka laHki la kalpa br-ik+ShaH/ /kau sha len+d+ra s+ya b+hu b+har+t+tu shrA bas+t+yA b+ha ga
<p>347a.4</p>la gcig tu nges rnams kyi/ /spro dang mchod dang yon tan longs spyod 'byor pa skyed byed pa/ /sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa las byung dge ba mngon brjod pa'i/ /dpag bsam shing ni nges par dus su ma tshang med 'bras skyed/ /bcom ldan rgyal ba mnyan yod na/ /sa bdag
<p>347a.5</p>bAn pu rA/ /bi dza hA ra ba ro d+yA nre sa ha b+hik+Shu ga Ne re dzi naH/ /A di ma d+h+yAn+ta ka l+yA NaM b+ha bA b+hi b+ha ba te pu dzaM/ /sa daM de sha sa ran+d+har+m+maM trai lokya ku sha lo d+ya taH/ /a trAn+ta re nA ga rA dzaHpu trAH
<p>347a.6</p>ko sa la dbang gi/ /skyed tshal mchog na dge slong gi/ /tshogs dang thabs cig mngon bzhugs tshe/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /srid pa zil gnon mchog gi chos/ /'jig rten gsum po dge ba la/ /sbyor ba de yis rab tu bstan/ /skabs der glu yi rgyal po'i bu/ /rgya mtsho
<p>347b</p>
<p>347b.1</p>sA ga ra bA si naH/ /tsa twA raHsu ga to dir+N+NaM sad+d+ha r+m+ma sa ra mA mr-i taM/ /a b+hi ra t+ya khyA yA swa prA pre ri tAHshro tu mA sa byaH/ /te ba lA ti ba lA shwA sa ma hA shwA sA b+hi d+hAHsa maM/ /kra kut+su n+da s+ya su d+hi yaHkA
<p>347b.2</p>dag tu gnas pa bzhi/ /stobs dang shin tu stobs dang ni/ /dbugs dang dbugs chen zhes bya ba/ /sring mo mngon dga' zhes pa yis/ /bskul nas de dag mnyam du ni/ /bde gshegs kyis gsungs dam pa'i chos/ /mchog gi bdud rtsi nyan du 'ongs/ /sngon gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das/ /
<p>347b.3</p>le b+ha ga ba taHbu rA/ /ka na kA khya s+ya tsa mu neHkA sh+ya pa s+ya tsa yerta taH/ /nA dzag+muHshrI su khA sak+t+taHshro tuM ya swAr+thi tA a pi/ /te pu N+ya pa ri NA me na prAp+taHshAkya mu naHpu rAH/ /te Shu pra Na mya shAstA
<p>347b.4</p>blo bzang 'khor ba 'jig dang ni/ /gser thub ces ni bya ba dang / /de bzhin dgra bcom 'od srungs la/ /nyan du sring mos bskul gyur kyang / /dpal gyi bder chags 'ongs ma gyur/ /de dag bsod nams yongs smin nas/ /shAkya thub pa'i sngon du 'ongs/ /de dag mi yi lus bsgrubs
<p>347b.5</p>raM tsa ra NA lI na mau li Shu/ /bi d+hA ya mA nu ShaM rU paM mu sa biSh+Te paR+Sha di/ /sad+d+har+m+ma ma ya yau shro tuM kau sha len+d+raHpra se na dzita/ /lak+Sh+mI ma dasmi tats+tsha yaM ni bAR+Y+Ya ts+tsha tra tsA ma raM/ /shAstuHpA da pra NA
<p>347b.6</p>te/ /ston pa la ni phyag btsal nas/ /zhabs la mgo yis gtugs byas te/ /'khor der nye bar 'dug pa'i tshe/ /gsal rgyal ko sa la yi dbang / /dpal 'byor rgyags 'dzum mdzes pa yi/ /gdugs dang rnga yab bzlog nas ni/ /dam chos nyan du yang dag 'ongs/ /ston pa'i zhabs la
<p>348a</p>
<p>348a.1</p>mA ya bi sha tasta s+ya saM sa di/ /a ba kA shaM na tAsh+tsa kruHsar+b+bo nr-i pa ti gau ra bAta/ /ta s+yA b+hi naM d+ya mA na s+ya bar+N+Na shra ma gu ror+n+r-i b+hiH/ /nA ga rA dza su tA sh+tsa krurnA ba kA shaM na sat+k+r-i taM/ /ta ya
<p>348a.2</p>phyag 'tshal slad/ /tshogs su zhugs pa de la ni/ /mi yi bdag la gus pa las/ /kun gyis btud cing go skabs phye/ /rigs gnas bla ma mi rnams kyis/ /mngon par dga' bar byas de la/ /klu yi rgyal po'i bu rnams kyis/ /go skabs bkur sti byas ma gyur/ /de dag dregs
<p>348a.3</p>darba na mA n+yai ba dzi na s+ya bi na ye na tsa/ /mA ni no nr-i pa ti ran+tar+m+ma n+yuHbrats+tshan+na tAM ya yau/ /sa saM dz+nya yA mA di sh+ya ni dza pa ri dza naM pu raH/ /ga ma ne ni gra haM te ShAM nir+b+bi kA ra i ba b+ha ba ta/ /b+ha ga bA na bi sar+b+ba dz+nyasta
<p>348a.4</p>pas khengs pa dang / /rgyal ba la ni gus pas kyang / /khengs ldan mi bdag khro ba ni/ /nang du rab tu bsgribs par gyur/ /de yis rang gi 'khor la ni/ /'gro tshe sngon du de dag rnams/ /tshar bcad brda yis bskos byas nas/ /rnam 'gyur med pa bzhin du gyur/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas
<p>348a.5</p>s+ya nish+tsa yaM dz+nya to/ /d+yar+m+mo pa de sha paR+Yan+to pro bA tsa ra tsi tasmi taH/ /na bi dwe Sha ra dzaHpUr+N+Na ma no ma li na dar+p+pa Ne/ /b+ha ti d+har+m+mo pa de sha s+ya pra ti bim+ba pra ti gra haH/ /a pi ta sa ma tA nAM ko sa mo ha
<p>348a.6</p>kyang / /de yi nges pa mkhyen gyur nas/ /chos ni nye par bstan pa yi/ /mjug tu 'dzum mdzad rab gsungs pa/ /yid kyi me long dri ma can/ /sdang ba'i rdul gyis gang ba la/ /chos ni nye bar bstan pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa mdzes ma yin/ /mnyam pa nyid dang bral zhing khro dang rmongs pas
<p>348a.7</p>de dag dregs pas khengs pa rang zhes pa'i skad dod chad pa 'dar los bcug pa rgya dpe rnyed na zhus dag byed/
<p>348b</p>
<p>348b.1</p>ha tA nAM kr-i sha ma pi ku sha lAM shaM no pa de shaHka ro ti/ /na hi ba hu ta ra do She shud+d+hi hI ne sha rI re bra dza pra ma tI nAM b+he Sha dzaM b+he Sha dza twam/ /i ti yuk+tu b+ha ga ba nA hi ta muk+tam+ma hrI ba tiH/ /shru twApi
<p>348b.2</p>bcom rnams la/ /nyer bstan gyis ni dge ba'i cha shas chung ngu yongs mi byed/ /gang phyir blo gros blun po rnams kyi rab mang skyon ldan lus/ /dag pas dman pa dag la sman ni sman nyid mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa bcom ldan rigs pa yis/ /phan pa gsung ba thos gyur kyang / /klu rnams la ni
<p>348b.3</p>na tsa ta t+yA dza nA ge Shu bi ma naska tam/ /b+ha ga ban+taM pra Na mA tha pra yA te swa pa daM nr-i paM/ /nA gAstat+sai ni kA bad+d+ha mAr+g+ga byo ma sa thA yA staH/ /te bi tsin+t+yaM swa b+ha ba nek+Sh+ma sak+Sha ya kr-i ta k+Sha NaH/ /g+ho ra nir+g+ho
<p>348b.4</p>sdang ba'i yid/ /sa yi bdag pos btang ma gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan la btud nas/ /mi bdag rang gi gnas song tshe/ /de yi dpung gis lam bkag pas/ /klu rnams mkha' yi lam nas song / /khyim du de dag gis bsams te/ /sa bdag gzhom pa'i dus byas nas/ /'jigs
<p>348b.5</p>ta me g+hau g+ha grasta lo kAHsa ma ya yuH/ /te ShAM bya ba si taM dz+nyA twA sar+b+ba dz+nyaHsak+Sha pa ti na/ /rak+Sha k+Sha maM k+Shi ti pa termaud+ga l+yA ya na mA di shatra/ /a tha nA ga ga Nat+s+r-iSh+Ta badzra br-iSh+Tir+m+ma hI pa ti/ /b+hu b+har+t+tustat+p+ra
<p>348b.6</p>rung sgra sgrogs sprin gyi tshogs/ /snang ba 'joms pas yang dag 'ongs/ /de dag stsol ba kun mkhyen gyis/ /mkhyen nas sa yi bdag po yi/ /phyogs su lhung zhing bsrungs bzod pa/ /mau gal gyi bu la bskos/ /de nas klu yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /rdo rje'i char chen rab spros pa/ /de yi mthu yis
<p>349a</p>
<p>349a.1</p>b+hA be na pra ya yau puSh+pa br-iSh+TitAM/ /shas+t+rAsh+ma br-iSh+Tirni pi Da k+Ship+tA+e tai ra tha duHsa hA/ /maud+ga l+yA ya na si kalpa ta ya yau rA dzAr+ha b+ho dz+ya tAM/ /tat+p+ra b+hA bAta pra yA te Shu bag+not+sA he Shu b+ho gi Shu/ /ga twA ba ban+de su ga taM
<p>349a.2</p>sa bdag la/ /me tog char pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas de dag gis mtshon dang / /rdo yi char drag bzod dka' ba/ /mau gal bu yi brtag pa las/ /rgyal po la 'os zas nyid gyur/ /de yi mthu las gdengs can rnams/ /spro ba nyams nas song ba'i tshe/ /'tshe ba dang bral mi yi bdag /song
<p>349a.3</p>nr-i pa tirbI ta bi sla baH/ /sa maud+ga l+yA ya na s+yAr+g+hAmu tsi taM b+ho ga sam+pa dA/ /b+hak+ti saM skA ra su b+ha gA bi ded+he dzi na shA sanAta/ /ta taHswar+g+go tsit+taM b+hik+Shurbi b+hU tiM bIk+Sh+yu b+hU pa teH/ /sa prats+tsha kau tu ka be shAta
<p>349a.4</p>nas bde gshegs la phyag 'tshal/ /rgyal ba'i bka' las mau gal bu/ /de yi longs spyod phun tshogs gyis/ /gus pas legs sbyar skal ba bzang / /rigs pa nyid du mchod par byas/ /de nas mtho ris la 'os pa'i/ /sa bdag 'byor mthong dge slong gis/ /thal mo sbyar nas kun mkhyen la/ /
<p>349a.5</p>sar+b+ba dz+nya ra tsi tAny+tsa liH/ /b+ha ga ban+ka s+ya pu N+ya s+ya pra b+hA be na pra se na dzita/ /sar+b+ba bi rA dzi tAMb+ho geHprA dz+ya saM rAdz+ya masnu te/ /ik+ShustaM pA shi de bA s+ya shA listam+bAts+tsha dzA ya te/ /di bya sA nAn+na sam+bat+tiH
<p>349a.6</p>dge mtshan 'bebs las rab tu zhus/ /bcom ldan bsod nams ci zhig gi/ /mthu yis rgyal po gsal rgyal ni/ /longs spyod kun gyis rnam mdzes pa'i/ /rab rgyas rgyal sred chen po thob/ /'di la rtag tu sa li yi/ /sdong po bur shing sdong por 'gyur/ /lha yi bza' btung phun sum tshogs/ /
<p>349b</p>
<p>349b.1</p>pha la tat+ka s+ya kar+m+ma NaH/ /i ti pr-iSh+TaHpra Na yi nA b+hik+Shu NA b+ha ga bAny+dzi naH/ /u bA tsa shru ya tAM rA dz+nyaHkA ra NaM b+ho ga sam+ba dAM/ /kau sha me sminy+dza na sa da khaN+DA khyA gu Da kaR+Sha kaH/ /da dau pra t+ye ka bud+d+hA ya pUr+b+ba mik+Shu ra
<p>349b.2</p>de dag las ni gang gi 'bras/ /dge slong gus pas dris pa 'di/ /bcom ldan rgyal bas bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal po'i longs spyod phun tshogs kyi/ /rgyu ni rab tu mnyen par mdzod/ /ko sa la yi ljongs 'di ru/ /bur shing zhing pa dum bu zhes/ /bya bas rang sangs rgyas la sngon/ /bur chu dang ni
