<p>349b.3</p>so danaM/ /b+huk+te nai k+Shu ra sA+en+ne na te na bA ta ga dAt+di taH/ /bra t+ye ka bud+d+hastat+pu N+yaiHpra san+na swas+tha tAM ya yau/ /rA dzA pra se na dzit+so yaM pu N+ya bAn gu Da kaR+Sha kaH/ /te na pu N+ya pra b+hA be na b+ho ga b+hA gI bi rA dza
<p>349b.4</p>zas dag byin/ /de yi bsad nams rnams dang na/ /bur chu gzan dag gsol ba des/ /rlung nad kyis nyen rang sangs rgyas/ /rab dang dri med nyid du gyur/ /bur shing zhing ba bsod nams can/ /de ni rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di/ /bsod nams de yi mthu yis ni/ /longs spyod skal ldan rnam
<p>349b.5</p>te/ /u pa kA ra kr-i ta dz+nya nAM ni kA raHkrU ra tse ta sAM/ /su kr-i tAM shash+tsa sA d+hu nA malpo pyA yA t+ya nalpa tAM/ /sar+b+ba dz+nye ne ti ka thi te pUr+b+ba pu N+ya ma hI pa te// /ba b+hU ba su kr-i tod+kaR+Sha b+hik+Shu rA sh+tsaR+ya
<p>349b.6</p>par mdzes/ /byas shes rnams la phan pa dang / /gdug sems can la gnod pa dang / /dam pa rnams la legs byas ni/ /chung yang chung du nyid min 'gyur/ /sa bdag sngon gyi bsod nams ni/ /kun mkhyen gyis ni gsungs pa'i tshe/ /legs byas mchog tu gyur pa las/ /dge slong ngo
<p>350a</p>
<p>350a.1</p>@#/ nish+tsa laH/ /a tha b+hak+t+yaHb+ha ga ba taHkr-i twA rA dzA d+hi bA sa nAM/ /u pA ni n+ye swa yan+tAn+tA surAr+g+haM b+ho ga sam+pa daM/ /pa ro pa tsA ri ru tsi re rar+ts+tsi te kAny+tsa nA sa ne/ /su khA ya biSh+TaM sro bA tsa
<p>350a.2</p>mtshar g.yo med gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan la gus pas/ /rgyal pos lhag par gnas byas nas/ /longs spyod phun tshogs lha la 'os/ /de de rang gis nye bar bkod/ /mchog tu mdzes pa'i rim gro yis/ /mchod de gser gyi khri la ni/ /bder bzhugs de bzhin
<p>350a.3</p>na ra nA thasta thA ga taM/ /b+ha ga ban+me b+ha bat+b+hak+ti bi b+hak+ta su kr-i ta shri maH/ /tsa yaHku sha la mU lA nA ma si muk+t+yai b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /bi na yAt+pAr+thi bai ne ti pur+N+Na pu N+yA b+hi mA ni nA/ /pr-iSh+TaH
<p>350a.4</p>gshegs pa la/ /mi yi mgon pos rab smras pa/ /bcom ldan khyed la gus pa yis/ /legs byas dpal ni rnam rgyas pa/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yis/ /bdag ni grol 'gyur srid lags sam/ /bsod nams rdzogs pa'i nga rgyal can/ /sa yi bdag po gus pas 'di/ /dris la
<p>350a.5</p>smi ta si tA lo kaM dza gA da su ga taHpr-i dzan/ /rA dzA na saM sA rA mAr+g+ga ya ma nA di ni d+ha na baH/ /he lA laM g+h+yaHka thaM puM sA ma prAp+ta kle sha saM k+Sha ya/ /tsi ra ba ri tse taish+tsa krA bar+t+te ra sak+ta ga tA ga tiHpra kr-i
<p>350a.6</p>bde bar gshegs pa yis/ /'dzum dkar snang ba spro zhing gsungs/ /rgyal po 'khor ba dag gi lam/ /thog mtha' med par 'jug pa 'di/ /nyon mongs kun zad ma thob par/ /skyes bus bde bar ji ltar 'gongs/ /yun ring yongs 'dris 'khor lo bskor bzhin rgyun du 'ong dang 'gro ba yis/ /
<p>350b</p>
<p>350b.1</p>ti ga ha naHsaM sA ro yaM su khe na na laM g+ha te/ /a pa ti hi bi nA yo gyA b+h+yA saM k+Sha ya ki la karma NAM s+phu Ta pha la taM ti r+d+d+har+m+mo s+ya smin+ni ban+d+ha na tAM gtaH/ /sarba to bi ni br-it+ta s+ya dA nA b+h+yA se na b+hu ya sA/ /ma mA pi
<p>350b.2</p>rang bzhin gyis zab 'khor ba 'di la bde blag 'gongs par mi nus te/ /sbyor ba goms pa med cing las rnams nges par zad pa min pa ni/ /rgya che 'bras bu gsal ba'i chos kyang 'dir ni 'ching ba nyid du gyur/ /sbyin la goms pa chen po yis/ /kun las rnam par log gyur pa/ /bdag kyang sa
<p>350b.3</p>d+har+m+ma saM sA ro ba b+hU ba b+hu bi dzan+ma kr-ita/ /d+ha ni ko nA ma d+ha na bAn bA rA Nas+yA ma b+hUt+pu ra/ /ta po sa ha pha la s+phI tash+tshA yA br-ik+Sha i bAr+thi nAM/ /dur+b+hik+Sha k+Shi pi te lo ke bi Sha ma kle sha bi hwa le/ /b+ho dz+ya pra t+ye ka bud+d+hA
<p>350b.4</p>la skye ba bzung / /chos kyis 'khor ba nyid du gyur/ /nor can zhes pa nor dang ldan/ /bA rA Na sIr sngon byung gyur/ /gdung ba 'phrog cing 'bras bu rgyas/ /slong ba rnams kyi grib shing bzhin/ /mu ges 'jig rten brlag gyur cing / /mi bzad nyon mongs kyis 'khrugs tshe/ /rang sangs rgyas ni lnga brgya
<p>350b.5</p>nAM sor+thi teHpany+tsa b+hiHsha taiH/ /sa tai ShAM pa ra b+ho gAr+hi dur+b+hik+ShA pa d+hi dza nAM/ /a kalpa ya da na s+ya shrIHkoSh+Tha gA rI ka sam+ma te/ /sha ta pany+tsa ka saM g+ha tai b+ho k+tuM ta s+ya gr-i haM ta taH/ /pra mAt+p+ra t+ye ka bud+d+hA nAM sa ha sra
<p>350b.6</p>yis/ /de la 'tsho ba bslangs par gyur/ /mi chung dpal des bang ba yi/ /khang bdag la bgros de dag la/ /mchog tu longs spyod 'os pa'i zas/ /mu ge dag gi mthar thug sbyar/ /de yi khyim du gsol ba la/ /brgya phrag lnga ni 'tshogs gyur te/ /de nas rim gyis rang sangs rgyas/ /stong phrag
<p>351a</p>
<p>351a.1</p>dwa ya mA ya yau/ /ta s+ya ta ta pu N+ya bA se na dzA tA lAp+d+ha pha la shri yA/ /dur+b+hak+Sha dA na yi taHko sha ra na kle sha A k+Sha yatra/ ! /su khaM sa nA ta naM pu N+ya b+ho gya twaM tai ba d+hA na batra/ /shan+tA s+t+ya yaM sa re NA haM samyaskaM
<p>351a.2</p>gnyis ni byung bar gyur/ /skyes tshe 'bras bu'i dpal thob pa/ /bsod nams btab pa de yis ni/ /mu ge'i sbyin pas de yi mdzod/ /zas kyi nyon mongs zad ma gyur/ /bde ba brgyud pa bsod nams kyis/ /spyad nas nor can de nyid ni/ /nga yin zhi ba mchog gis 'dir/ /yang dag rdzogs
<p>351a.3</p>bo d+hi mA shri taH/ /pu n+ye na pA pe na tsa be Sh+Ti te yaM saM sA ri NaM kar+m+ma pha la pra br-it+taH/ /si tA si tA ban+d+ha na radz+dzu ShA ta ta saM k+Sha ye mo k+Sha pa tham+ba dan+ti/ /i ti k+Shi tI shaHka thi taM dzi ne na mo ha bya pe ye na ni sha mya mo k+ShaM/ /
<p>351a.4</p>pa'i byang chub bsten/ /'khor ba pa yi las 'bras 'jug pa 'di/ /'ching byed thag pa dkar dang dkar min ni/ /bsod nams sdig pa dag gis rnam par bcings/ /de zad pa la thar pa'i gnas zhes brjod/ /de ltar rmongs pa zad pas thar par ni/ /rgyal bas gsungs pas dbang gis thos nas/ /
<p>351a.5</p>kle sha k+Sha yAr+ha sha ma me ba ma twA pu N+yA b+hi mA naM shi thi lI tsa kA ra/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yaM bo d+hi sa twA ba da na kalpa la tA yAM shA listaM bA ba dA na sap+ta tsa twA riM shaHpal+la baH// //swAr+tha pra
<p>351a.6</p>nyon mongs 'dzad 'os zhi ba kho nar nges/ /bsod nams mngon pa'i nga rgyal lhod par byas/ /zhes pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las sA la'i sdong bu'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ /rang don
<p>351a.7</p>!skyes tshe 'bras bu'i sogs sh+lo ka gcig gi rkang pa bzhi pa'i skad dod na klo sha sogs tsheg bar drug dang / bde ba brgyud pa sogs sh+lo ka gcig rkang pa dang po/ gnyis pa'i skad dod su khaM sogs tsheg bar bcu drug /rkang pa gsum pa'i zhi ba 'dir yin gsum gyi skad dod shan+tA sogs tsheg bar bzhi rnams kyi rgya skad chad ba 'dar los gsar du bcug pa slar dpyad/
<p>351b</p>
<p>351b.1</p>br-it+to bi ga taspr-i ha NAM pA ro pA kA re sa ta to d+ya tA nAM/ /kle she Shu b+hI tA bya sa ne ra nI tA big+h+ne ra pI Da ka ma re ti sid+d+hiH/ /shrA bas+t+yaM b+ha ga bAn+s+tu r+b+baM dzi no dze ta ba nes+thi tAH/ /d+har+m+ma khyA na pra saM ge nab+hik+Shu
<p>351b.2</p>la 'jug chags pa dang bral zhing / /gzhan la phan par rtag tu brtson rnams kyis/ /grub pa nyon mongs rnams la mi 'jigs shing / /gdung dang gegs bral gzir byed min par gyur/ /mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal du sngon/ /bzhugs pa bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /chos 'chad pa yi zhar la ni/ /dge
<p>351b.3</p>kaM hA ma b+hA Sha ta/ /A sI da khi la b+hU pa lA mau li lA li ta shA sa naH/ /sid+d+hAr+tho nA ma su kr-i tI sAr+b+ba b+hau mo ma hI pa tiH/ /sA ga rA khya s+ya na ga s+ya su nurdza la d+hi bA si naH/ /sar+b+bAr+tha sid+d+haHpu tra twAM pra ya yau ta s+ya b+hU pa teH/
<p>351b.4</p>slong tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ /sa bdag sa rnams kun gyi bdag /don grub ces pa legs byas ldan/ /sa skyong kun gyi mgo bo la/ /bka' ni rnam par rtse bar gyur/ /chu yi gter la gnas gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho zhes bya klu yi bu/ /don kun grub pa sa bdag ni/ /de yi bu nyid dag tu gyur/ /
<p>351b.5</p>sa b+hA dra kalpi ko bo d+hi sa twoHsa two dz+wa la pra b+haH/ /dzA ta mA traHk+Shi ti ta lash+tsakre pUr+N+Na swa r-id+d+hi b+hi/ /tas+ya pra bar+d+ha mA na s+ya d+har+m+ma s+ye ba sa mu d+ya yau/ /sa map+ta b+hu ba na byA si bi bu d+hA b+h+yar+ts+tsi taM ya shaH/ /sa ka dA
<p>351b.6</p>snying stobs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skal bzang byang chub sems dpa' de/ /skyes pa tsam gyis sa gzhi ni/ /rang gi 'od kyis rgyas par byas/ /de ni che bar skyes gyur pa'i/ /grags pa lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /srid pa mtha' dag khyab pa ni/ /chos kyi bzhin du yang dag rgyas/ /skyed tshal
<p>352a</p>
<p>352a.1</p>tsid+ba ro d+ya naM s+yan+da ne na yu bA bra dzanra/ /da daR+sha br-id+d+hi pu ru ShaM de ba tA nir+m+mi ta bu raH/ /taM bi lo kya dza rA dzIr+N+NaM dzA ta bai rA gya pA sa naH/ /saM sA ra ma ba ni sA raM sa sha rI ra ma ma n+ya ta/ /ud+ya nAM
<p>352a.2</p>mchog tu dar ma de/ /nam zhig shing rtas 'gro ba na/ /mdun du lha rnams kyis sprul pa'i/ /skyes bu rgan po mthong bar gyur/ /rga bas 'khogs pa de mthong nas/ /chags bral gyi ni bag chags sad/ /'khor ba bzhin du lus dag ni/ /snying po med par de yis bsams/ /skyed
<p>352a.3</p>yA tra bi ra saHsha naiHpra ti ni br-i t+ya kaH/ /dA ri dra bi dru tats+tshA ya na drAk+ShAt+k+r-i pa NAn+pa thi/ /dr-iSh+T+wAM tA ma su kha kliSh+Ta nu ka ru NA kr-iSh+Ta mA na saH/ /a tsin+ta ya da ho duHkhaM sa han+te b+hu bi durga tAH/ /a dA
<p>352a.4</p>tshal blta ba'i chags bral te/ /dal gyis log nas 'ong ba des/ /lam du dbul ba nyid kyis ni/ /mdzes bral phongs par gyur pa mthong / /snying rjes drangs pa'i yid can des/ /bde med nyon mongs de mthong nas/ /bsams pa sa la dbul po rnams/ /kye ma sdug bsngal bzod par byed/ /rin
<p>352a.5</p>na pra b+ha ba duHkham+ba dan+te ti bi sad+ga tAH/ /pr-i thi byAM rat+na pUr+NA yAM pa ra piN+Do pa dzI bi naH/ /i da me bA bi saM bA di tsih+naM ka lu Sha karma NAM/ /dI nA ya de te ya tsan+te pu ru ShaM pu ru ShAHpa raM/ /a ho duSh+k+r-i ta
<p>352a.6</p>chen gyis gang sa gzhi na/ /gzhan la bslangs pas nyer 'tsho zhing / /phongs gyur 'di dag sdug bsngal ni/ /sbyin pa min las skyes par smra/ /skyes bu bkren pa 'di dag rnams/ /skyes bu gzhan la slong ba gang / /'di nyid kho na mi bslu bar/ /sdig pa'i las rnams dag gi rtags/ /gnas dang gnas
<p>352b</p>
<p>352b.1</p>me te ShA ma ba d+h+r-i tAHpa de pa de/ /ya de te mArga No dwig+nA b+hik+Shi twA pi bu b+hu k+Shi tAH/ /i ti saM tsin+t+ya pu tsi ra bi sha kle sha k+Sha yo d+ya tAH/ /a da ri dra dza gat+ke rtuM rat+nA r+thi dza la d+hi ya yau/ /ka thany+tsidi ba saM sak+taH
<p>352b.2</p>su smad gyur cing / /'di dag slong bas yid byung la/ /bslangs par gyur kyang bkres pa na/ /kye ma 'di dag nyes byas nyid/ /de ltar yun ring bsams byas nas/ /kun gyi nyon mongs gzhom brtson pas/ /'gro ba dbul min bya ba'i slad/ /rin chen don gnyer rgya mtshor song / /pha yis ji zhig ltar stes
<p>352b.3</p>sa pi trA dr-i D+ha nish+tsa yaH/ /sa ma ru h+ya pra ba ha NaM rat+na dwI pa ma bAp+ta bAn/ /ta tra bra ba ha NA rU D+hanra ba Ni dziHsa ha yA yi naH/ /so bra bI ta kr-i ya tAM kA maM yuSh+mA b+hir+m+ma Ni saM gra haH/ /e teHsA mA n+ya rat+naistu ma ma
<p>352b.4</p>nyid/ /rjes gnang nges pa brtan pa de/ /gzangs la yang dag zhon byas nas/ /rin chen gling du phyin par gyur/ /der ni tshong pa gzings dag la/ /zhon nas lhan cig 'ongs rnams la/ /de yis smras pa khyed cag rnams/ /rin chen 'dod pa bsdu bar mdzod/ /thun mong rin chen 'di dag gis/ /bdag la
<p>352b.5</p>nAsti bra yo dza naM/ /ka sha ma hAn+ti b+hA swan+ti san+ti rat+not+ta mA ni naH/ /kin+tu tsin+tA ma Ni prAs+d+yai bi pu lo yam+mamo d+ya maH/ /te na bi dru ta rA ri d+h+yaM kar+t+tu mets+tshA mi me di nI/ /shru tam+ma yA nA ga rA dzaHsA ga rA khyA ma hod d+hau/ /ba sa
<p>352b.6</p>dgos pa yod ma yin/ /bdag cag mdzad na rin chen mchog /'od dang ldan pa mang po yod/ /'on kyang yid bzhin nor thob slad/ /bdag gi rtsom pa chen po 'di/ /de yis sa ni dbul ba nyid/ /nyams pa dag tu bya bar 'dod/ /rgya mtsho zhes bya klu yi rgyal/ /chu gter che la rab tu gnas/ /bsam
<p>353a</p>
<p>353a.1</p>t+yasti gr-i he ta s+ya tsin+ta tAr+tha bra do ma NiH/ /bi laM g+h+ya bi Sha mam+mAr+g+ga ta mA dA tuM bra dzA mya haM/ /nAsti d+haiR+Ya sa hA yA nAM dur+g+ga mi bya ba sA yi nAM/ /na tsamad+bi ra he kiM tsita bya sa naM bo b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/ /
<p>353a.2</p>ba'i don ster nor bu ni/ /de khyim na yod bdag gis thos/ /mi bzad lam ni bgrod byas te/ /bdag ni de nyid len du 'gro/ /brtan pa'i grogs ldan 'bad rtsol dang / /ldan pa rnams la bgrod dka' med/ /bdag gi legs byas rtsom pa 'di/ /gal te 'thob na bden nyid
<p>353a.3</p>sa t+ya me ba pArAr+tha yaM ya di me su kr-i to d+ya maH/ /i t+yuk+t+wA tran+ba ma ma t+ya pra tas+the s+thi ra nish+tsa yaH/ /ma hA tAM b+h+ri ti mA lam bya sa twa bAn+sAr+thi bAt+ma dzaH/ /gul+pha mA tre Na sap+ta haM sa twA dza ma bar+t+ma nA/ /dzA nu
<p>353a.4</p>du/ /bdag dang bral bas khyed cag rnams/ /ci yang gdung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod de dag la bzlas nas/ /snying stobs ldan pa rgyal po'i bu/ /chen po brtan pa la brten nas/ /nges pa brtan pas rab tu zhugs/ /de yi chu yi lam dag tu/ /long bu tsam la nyin bdun phyin/ /pus nub
<p>353a.5</p>dag+h+ne na sap+tA haM sab+tA haM pau ru She Na tsa/ /tsa twA ri sap+ta drA trA Ni ta taHpuSh+ka ri NI dza laiH/ /ga twA tr-iSh+Ti bi ShAn+g+ho rAnra da daR+shA shI bi ShAn+pu raH/ /mai trI yuk+te na ma na sA kr-i twa tA na tha nir+b+bi Shan/ /krU ra kau ser+b+r-i taM
<p>353a.6</p>tsam la nyin bdun dang / /skyes bu tsam la nyin bdun te/ /de nas zhag ni bdun pa bzhi/ /glang mo'i tshad kyi chu dag la/ /phyin pas mdun du so dug can/ /'jigs rung mthong ba dug can mthong / /de nas byams ldan yid kyis ni/ /de dag dug med byas nas de/ /khro bas 'khrugs pa'i
<p>353b</p>
<p>353b.1</p>yak+Sh+yaiR+Ya dwI pa ma bo sa saH/ /ta tra mai tre Na ma nA sA bI ta kro d+hAn+bi d+hA ya tAn/ /shu shra ba tai ru tsi k+Shi taM bi su lot+sA ha bismi taiH/ /ku mA ra s+ya s+phI ta sa twe na bIR+Yot+sA na tsA mu nA/ /na ga rA dza s+ya b+ha ba
<p>353b.2</p>gnod sbyin gyis/ /gang ba'i gnod sbyin gling du phyin/ /der ni byams ldan yid dag gis/ /de dag khro dang bral bar bsgrubs/ /spro ba yangs pas ya mtshan pa/ /de dag gis bshad thos gyur te/ /gzhon nu snying stobs rgyas pa dang / /brtson 'grus spro ba 'di yis ni/ /klu yi rgyal po'i khang pa
<p>353b.3</p>na sa mA hi ta ma bAs+s+ya ti/ /kA le na samyak+saM bud+d+haHsar+b+ba dz+nyas+t+waM b+ha bi Sh+ya si/ /shrA ba kAsh+tsa b+ha bi Sh+ya mo ba yaM twa da nu yA yi naH/ /pra sa bai ri ti tai ruk+ta ma b+hi nan+d+ya nr-i pAt+ma dzaH/ /rak+Shor+b+ya rA
<p>353b.4</p>ru/ /khyod nyid bzhed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dus kyis khyod ni thams cad mkhyen/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bdag cag rnams kyang khyod nyid kyi/ /rjes 'brang nyan thos dag tu 'gyur/ /'di dag dang bas 'di brjod de/ /mngon par dga' ba'i mi bdag bu/ /srin po rnams
<p>353b.5</p>br-i taM prA sa rAk+Sha sa dwi pa mut+ka TaM/ /ta thai ba bi ga ta kru ra bi kA rai staiHsa pU dzi taH/ /b+huk+to k+Sha pe Na ni k+Ship+taHk+Sha NAn+nA gen+d+ra sa mu ni/ /sa ta tra dIp+ta bi b+ha be di byot+sa ba su kho tsi taH/ /a shr-i Nod+dIr+g+ha duH
<p>353b.6</p>kyis khengs gyur pa/ /nyam nga srin bo'i gling du phyin/ /rnam 'gyur gdug bral de dag gis/ /de bzhin nyid du mchod nas de/ /dpung pas blangs te skad cig gis/ /klu yi dbang po'i khang par 'phangs/ /lha yi dga' bde la 'os pa'i/ /snang ba 'byor ldan der ni des/ /sdug bsngal chen pos
<p>354a</p>
<p>354a.1</p>khArtI ta ta mA ro da na g+ha ni/ /sa ta mA kar+N+ya sod+be gaHpra kr-i t+ye ba da yAr+d+ra d+hiH/ /ki me ta di ti sa prats+tsha dr-iSh+T+wA gre nA ga ka n+ya kAM/ /sA taM ba b+hA She saM sak+ta sho koSh+ma pi shu nairmu hur+m+mu huH/ /m+lA ni
<p>354a.2</p>gzir byas pa'i/ /cho nge'i sgra ni thos par gyur/ /de yis de thos chags bral can/ /rang bzhin brtse bas brlan pa'i blos/ /mdun du klu yi bu mo dag /mthong nas 'di dag ci zhes dris/ /yang yang mya ngan la chags pa'i/ /dro ba gsal byed shugs rings kyis/ /bim pa'i
<p>354a.3</p>na yan+tAM ni shwA sair+b+bim+bA d+ha ra da lak+Sha tiM/ /gu Na bAn+nA ga rA dza s+ya pu traHka ma la lo tsa naH/ /dz+yeSh+ThaHsar+b+bar+tha sid+d+hA khyaHpri yaM pany+tsa twa ma ga taH/ /ta twaHs+yA ta bi ga tA na n+we pi br-it+ta su khot+sa be/ /g+ha no nA ro da ne nAsmin+na
<p>354a.4</p>mchu 'dab mdzes pa dag /dri mar byed des de la smras/ /yon tan ldan pa pad+mo'i spyan/ /klu yi rgyal po dag gi bu/ /thu bo don kun grub ces pa/ /gces pa lnga pa nyid du gyur/ /de yi sdug bsngal dag gis ni/ /kun dga' dang bral ba de dga' spangs/ /khang pa 'dir ni cho de dag
<p>354a.5</p>bad+b+ha b+ha ba nes+thi tiH/ /i ti tas+yaHba tsaHshru twA son+taHpa ri tsi tAM ba han/ /swa de sha daR+sha na prAsto nA ga rA dzAn+ti kaM ya yau/ /nA ga rA dzasta mA yAn+taM pa ri dz+nyA ya pri yA sa haH/ /e h+ye hi pu tre ti ba dan ma
<p>354a.6</p>stug po nyid kyis gnas par byas/ /zhes pa de yi tshig thos nas/ /rang yul mthong bas dga' ba des/ /nang du yongs 'dris 'dzin byed cing / /klu yi rgyal po'i drung du phyin/ /klu yi rgyal po dga' ma dang / /bcas pas de 'ongs yongs shes nas/ /bu gcig tshur shog tshur shog ces/ /
<p>354b</p>
<p>354b.1</p>b+hU la nan+da bi hwa laH/ /mar+t+t+ya dzan+ma ka thaM te na swany+tsA ga ma na kA ra NaM/ /shru twA ni be di taM nA ga pa ri Sh+wa dz+ya dza gA da taM/ /tsin+ta ma Ni ra yaM pu tra ma ma mau li bi b+hU Sha NAM/ /gr-i h+ya tAM ta ba saM ka lpaM na ban+d+d+haM
<p>354b.2</p>brjod cing kun dga' 'khrugs par gyur/ /mi yi skye ba'i gtam dang ni/ /rang nyid 'ongs pa'i rgyu dag kyang / /de yis bshad pa thos gyur nas/ /klu yis yongs 'khyud de la smras/ /bu gcig yid bzhin nor bu 'di/ /bdag gi mgo bo nyid kyi rgyan/ /long zhig khyod kyi brtag pa ni/ /'bras
<p>354b.3</p>kar+t+tu mut+sa he/ /de yaHkr-i ta dza gat+k+r-i t+yo ma me bA yaM su nasta yA/ /i t+yuk+t+wasme da dau di bya tsU Da rat+naM bi mu ts+ya saH/ /tsin+tA ma Ni sa ma dA ya ku mA rasta ra Ni pra b+hi/ /hr-iSh+TaHpra Na mya nA gen+d+ra ya yau pra ba ha

<p>358a.1</p>rU pa mA lokya tA ma ya paR+Yu Shi ta d+yA tiM/ /bisma yasma ra yostu l+yAM sa ya yau sa ha sA ba shaM/ /so tsin+ta yata a ho kAn+ta mi daM na t+yad+b+hU taM ba pUH/ /ya smin+b+hA ti mu kha byA dzA da do Sha bi sha daHsha shI/ /

<p>358b.1</p>d+hat+te ra teH/ /ud+d+h+r-i te ka Thi Ne sa yo d+ha ra yu ge na sh+yad+bi be ke tsa raM ya s+yA do Sha ma ye s+ya ho gu Na bA tA hA re Na bad+d+hA s+thi tiH/ /a s+yasmin+na ba la ba te\u0f85m+bu dza d+hi yA ro lam+ba re khA mu khe lo

<p>359a.1</p>mI li te ba ni lI ne ba pa pra Shi te ba b+hU ba sA/ /ku mA ro pi swa b+ha ba ne sa mud+d+hU ta ma no b+ha ba/ /tA me ben+du mu khI ma gre saM kalbai ra li khan+mu huH/ /sa tA mA na sa b+har+m+ma swi sma ra bi d+yA mi ba sma ran/ /pra
<p>359a.2</p>zum pa bzhin dang zhum pa bzhin/ /bcom pa bzhin du de gyur to/ /gzhon nu yang ni rang khyim du/ /yid las byung ba yang dag rgyas/ /mdun du zla bzhin ma de nyid/ /kun tu rtog pas yang yang dris/ /de yis yid kyi nor mchog de/ /'dod pa'i rig pa bzhin dran cing / /'khor
<p>359a.3</p>da d+h+yau durla b+hom+ma twA ta na yAM tsakra bar+t+ti naH/ /dzan+mAn+ta re ta nuR+Ya s+ya ta paHpa ri tsi tA tsi raM/ /d+ha n+yaHsa tA ma bA sno ti la tAM su kr-i ta shA khI naH/ /ra mya pra dA na pu N+ye na tad+daR+sha na ma bA s+ya te/ /na dzA

<p>359a.5</p>ne tA ni pu N+yA ni ye ShAM tat+saM ga maHpha laM/ /tad+bak+t+ra shI ta ki ra Na sma ra Not+sa be na ta s+yAsh+tsa durla b+ha ta yA bi ra hoSh+ma NA me/ /no bed+mi kiM d+h+r-i ti ri yaM ki ma yaM bi mo hoHkiM dzI bi taM ki ma

<p>359b</p>
<p>359b.1</p>su b+hiHsa ha bi pra yo gaH/ /tad+bak+t+rap+dza dzi taHpra sa h+ya b+ha dza te k+Shai N+yaM k+Sha pA bal+la b+hA s+ya b+hU bi b+h+ra ma ladz+dzi ti tsa bi na tiM pat+te d+ha nu m+mAn+ma thi/ /ta s+yaHpal+la ba se sha li d+yu ti mu ShA sho NA d+ha re NA rdi
<p>359b.2</p>par bral lam ci yin yongs mi shes/ /de gdong chu skyes dag gis 'phral la bcom pas mtshan mo'i yid 'ong nyams pa bsten/ /de yi smin ma'i rnam 'phrul dag la ngo tsha yid srubs gzhu ni gug par gyur/ /yid 'ong yal 'dab mdangs 'phrog de yi mchu sgros dmar ba dag gis
<p>359b.3</p>te nu naM prA pya bi rak+ta tAM ba na ma hIM bim+baM sa mA lam+ba te/ /i ti pUr+N+Nen+du ba da nA ba da na d+h+yA na nish+tsa laH/ /ni shIn+na nA ya saM t+yak+taHseR+Sh+ya ye ba na ni dra yA/ /ka n+yA daR+sha na br-it+tAn+taM ta
<p>359b.4</p>gzir gyur te/ /chags bral nyid thob bim+ba dag ni nags kyi sa la yang dag brten nam snyam/ /de ltar zla nya'i bzhin ras can/ /bzhin la bsam gtan g.yo med kyis/ /gnyid kyis phrag dog can gyis bzhin/ /gtang ba de yis mtshan mo 'das/ /mdzes ma mthong bar gyur pa'i
<p>359b.5</p>taste na ni be di taM/ /shru twA pi t+r+yA s+ya saM krAn+ta tsin+tA pa ri tsi to\u0f85 b+ha bta/ /sa ta mu tsa ba yaM pu tra rA dz+ho pya pu ra bA si naH/ /sa ka thaM he du hi ta raM tsakra brti pra dA s+ya ti/ /A shAkyaM nai ba kur+b+ban+ti
<p>359b.6</p>mtha'/ /de ni de yis bshad pa dag /pha yis thos nas de yis ni/ /bsam pa 'phos shing yongs 'dris gyur/ /de la de smas bdag cag bu/ /rgyal po'i grong khyer gnas pa'ang min/ /'khor los sgyur de bu mo ni/ /khyod la ji ltar ster bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa bkur ba 'dod pa rnams/ /
<p>360a</p>
<p>360a.1</p>sa mI han+te na dur+l+la b+haM/ /a saM b+ha byaM na b+hA Shasta mA na kA mA ma nI Shi NaH/ /tsU ta tsam+pa kal+lI Shu swA d+hI na pu ni rA da raH/ /tsin+ta yan+pA ri dza ta s+ya la tAM shu Sh+ya ti ShaT+padaH/ /ta ba ta s+yAsh+tsa
<p>360a.2</p>mi nus pa nyid byed ma yin/ /rnyed par dka' ba 'dod ma yin/ /mi bden pa ni smra ma yin/ /'khri shing tsU ta tsam pa ka /rang dbang rnams la mi gus par/ /yongs 'du'i 'khri shing sems pa na/ /rkang drug pa nyid bskam par 'gyur/ /gal te khyod dang de gnyis kyang / /
<p>360a.3</p>sam+ban+d+haHprAg+dzan+ma bi hi to ya di/ /ta da ba sh+yaM b+ha ba t+ye ba niHpra yat+na pha lo da yaH/ /A shA sA shai ra nA kr-iSh+TaM bi tsA rai ra ka har+thi taM/ /pra yAt+na b+ha rai ra shrAn+taM bi d+hat+te b+ha bi ta bya tA/ /i t+yA kar+N+N+ya pi turbA kyaM tat+ta the
<p>360a.4</p>skye ba snga mar 'brel bsgrubs na/ /de yi 'bras bu 'bad med du/ /nges pa kho nar rgyas par 'gyur/ /re ba'i zhags pas ma bkug cing / /rtog dpyod dag gis ma gzir la/ /'bad pa'i khur gyis ma ngal bar/ /nges par myong bya grub pa nyid/ /ces pa pa yi tshig thos nas/ /de de
<p>360a.5</p>ti bi tsin+ta yan/ /na tse taHkAn+ta kA nI taM pra t+yA ne tuM sha shA ka saH/ /sa ga twA dan+ta yu ga laM ya yA tse he ma kuny+dza raM/ /na ba saM daR+sha ne rAdz+nyAHprI ti yo gya mu pA ya naM/ /puN+ya ban+d+he na ka ri NA dat+taM dan+ta
<p>360a.6</p>bzhin zhes rnam bsams te/ /sems ni mdzes mas bzung ba dag /slar yang zlog pa des ma nus/ /de song gser gyi glang po la/ /rgyal la gser du phrad pa yis/ /dga' bar 'os phrad skyes su ni/ /gser gyi mche ba zung dag blangs/ /de nas lag ldan bsod nams kyis/ /
<p>360b</p>
<p>360b.1</p>yu gaM ta taH/ /sa he ma ma ya mA dA ya draSh+TuM b+hU mi pa tiM ya yau/ /sa rat+na ru tsi raM prA s+ya b+ha ba naM pr-i thi bI pa te/ /pra bi sh+ya pra Na taHprI t+yai he man+dan+ta dwa yaM da dau/ /b+hU b+hu dza bi shru ta gu NaHpra
<p>360b.2</p>mdza' bas byin pa'i mche ba zung / /gser gyi rang bzhin khyer nas de/ /sa yi bdag po lta ru song / /de yis rin chen gyis mdzes pa'i/ /sa yi bdag po'i khang par phyin/ /nang zhugs rab btud mdza' ba'i slad/ /gser gyi mche ba gnyis po byin/ /rgyal po rab tu dang ba yis/ /yon
<p>360b.3</p>sA de nA b+hi nan+di taH/ /ba raM gr-i hA Ne t+yuk+ta sh+tsa sa na dza grA ha kiny+tsa na/ /ta s+ya dai n+ya d+yu sh+tsa kre mA na ma b+h+ya d+hi kaM nr-i paH/ /au tsi t+ya tsA ru tsa ri taHpri yaHka s+ya na ni spr-i haH/ /sa sa dA daR+sha ne rAdz+nyaH
<p>360b.4</p>tan gyis grags dga' bar byas/ /mchog ni long zhes brjod gyur kyang / /de yis ci yang blangs ma gyur/ /mdzes pa dman min de la ni/ /rgyal pos lhag par bkur ba byas/ /rigs shing mdzes pa'i spyod pa can/ /chags pa med la su mi dga'/ /rtag tu rgyal la phrad tshe des/ /
<p>360b.5</p>kany+tsa nAM gA ni dan+ti naM/ /pu nardza ta na bI ge na dat+tA ni pri ta ye da dau/ /ta mu ba tsa ma hI pA laHse ba pra Na ya yan+t+ri taH/ /dU tIm+ma naHpra sA da s+ya ba da na d+yu ti mut+pa ha na/ /pra b+hU ta he ma saM b+hA rA gur+b+bi
<p>360b.6</p>gsar du so ldan la skyes pa/ /gser gyi rang bzhin mche ba rnams/ /dga' ba'i slad du rab tu byin/ /yid rab dang ba'i po nya ni/ /bzhin ras mdzes pa 'dzin byed cing / /bsten pa'i mdza' gcugs kyis bsdams pa'i/ /sa skyong gis ni de la smras/ /rab mang gser tshogs brling ba yis/ /
<p>361a</p>
<p>361a.1</p>se bA mI mA ma haM/ /na sa he pau ra brge hi b+ha ra NI yo ma hI b+h+r-i tAM/ /saM bi b+ha dz+ya dza nA nI taiHkA prI tir+m+ma ma kAny+tsa naiH/ /te ba nar+g+ha gu NA mUr+t+ti ri ya mi ba ma ma bri yA/ /lo b+haHpu
<p>361a.2</p>bsten 'di bdag gis yongs mi bzod/ /gang phyir grong khyer ba yi tshogs/ /sa bdag rnams kyi rgyas bya nyed/ /skye bos bgos skal phul ba yis/ /gser gyi dga' ba bdag la ci/ /rin chen yon tan khyod kyi ni/ /gzugs 'di nyid la bdag dga'/ /gser dang rin
<p>361a.3</p>ru Sha rat+ne Shu b+hU Sha NAr+he pra sho b+ha te/ /rA dz+nyAM ko she Shu sI dan+ti he ma rat+nAsh+ma pany+tsa yAH/ /sa mI hi ta ta maM tu b+h+yaM kiM pra yats+tshA mi ka th+ya tAM/ /niHshe Sha ko Sha rA ne pi na nA mA nu sha yo stu me/ /rA dz+nyA tr-i ka
<p>361a.4</p>chen rdo ba'i tshogs/ /mdzod rnams na gnas rgyal po ni/ /rgyan du 'os pa'i skyes bu dag /rin chen rnams la chags na mdzes/ /khyod la 'dod pa'i mchog dag ni/ /bdag gis ci sbyin smra bar mdzod/ /ma lus mdzod ni byin gyur kyang / /nges par bdag ni 'gyod mi 'gyur/ /rgyal bo'i
<p>361a.5</p>pA ta mA tre Na prA s+yan+te ya di na shre yaH/ /ta da nar+thaM ga tA nr-i n+yA kor+thaHpAr+thi ba s+ye ba yA/ /i t+yuk+taHk+Shi ti pA le na ku mA raHka li tAM dza liH/ /ta ma d+hA Sha ta b+hU pa la dA tu mar+ha ti ko pa raH/ /a nar+thi te na
<p>361a.6</p>spyan zur lhung tsam gyis/ /gal te dpal 'byor ma thob na/ /don gnyer don med nyid gyur pas/ /sa bdag bsten pa'i don ni ci/ /de skad sa skyong gis smras tshe/ /gzhon nus thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /de la smras pa sa skyong dag /ster bar 'os pa gzhan pa su/ /mkhas pa rnams la rin
<p>361b</p>
<p>361b.1</p>rat+nA ni bi bu d+he b+h+yaHpra yats+tsha tA/ /ta dun+ni draM saM mu dra s+ya mu dri taM b+ha ba tA ya shaH/ /ma hA tA pi pra dA ne na sUR+Ya te na ma hA sha ya/ /alpa kA nAM la dai shwaR+YaM dA ri tan+ma hI ya sAM/ /kiM tu twa ta b+hu dza gup+tA nAM d+har+m+ma mArga
<p>361b.2</p>chen ni/ /don du ma gnyer stsol mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi rgya mtsho'i grags pa ni/ /rab rgyas de dag rgya yis btab/ /rab tu sbyin pa chen pos kyang / /re ba chen po khengs ma yin/ /chung ngu rnams kyi dbang phyug gang / /de ni chen po'i dbul po nyid/ /'on kyang gang gis nor slong ba/ /khyod kyi dpung pas
<p>361b.3</p>NAM dzI ba tAM/ /dza nA nAM nasti dA ri draM dra bi NAM ye na mr-i gya te/ /d+ha nAr+thi ne na tu ba yaM na tsa se bA pi kA ri NaH/ /d+ha nan+d+ha nan+d+ha na d+hi yaM mA na e ba mA nam+bi nAM/ /mi lad+gu Ne na pa ra me shwa ra se ba ne na nir+m+ma l+ya tAM
<p>361b.4</p>bsrungs gyur cing / /chos kyi lam gyis 'tsho ba yi/ /skye bo rnams la dbul po med/ /bdag kyang nor don gnyer ba min/ /sten par byed pa po yang min/ /nor ldan rnams la nor nyid nor/ /khengs ldan rnams la bkur ba nyid/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug bsten pas yon tan dag ni zum gyur pas/ /
<p>361b.5</p>su ma na sAM sa ha sA ga tA nAM/ /rai n+yat+pu naHkr-i pa Na pa N+ya ba the ts+yu tA nAM na spaR+sha mA tra ma pi sA d+hu dza naHka ro ti/ /ar+thi twAt+ma ra NA ba raM ta nu b+h+r-i tAM dai n+yA ba san+nAt+ma nA mar+thisar+b+ba dza nA ba mA na ba
<p>361b.6</p>dam pa'i me tog rnams ni 'phral la rnying pa nyid gyur cing / /slar yang bkren pa'i tshong gi lam du dman pas lhung gyur la/ /dam pa'i skye bo rnams ni reg pa tsam yang mi mdzad do/ /dman zhing smad pa'i bdag nyid lus 'dzin rnams kyis slong ba nyid pas shi ba mchog /slong ba mchog
<p>362a</p>
<p>362a.1</p>sa tiHsat+kA ra yau gyaHsha baH/ /kuM b+hAstA ba da d+haHpra yA ti gu Na bAn+kU sA ba tA re pa raM yA ba ta mo ha ta maHpra be sha bi ba shaHprAp+tor+thi tA lam+ba te/ /sA mA n+yA d+ha na sam+pa daHkra ya kr-i Shi
<p>362a.2</p>tu bkur sti 'os pa skye bo kun gyis smad pa dag gi gnas/ /ji srid don gnyer nyid thob rmongs pa'i mun par dbang med 'jug cing 'bab byed pa/ /de srid yon tan ldan pa'i bum pa khron par 'jug las mchog tu thur du 'gro/ /phun tshogs thun mong nor ni zhing las tshong la rtag tu
<p>362a.3</p>pra pyaHsa dA d+hI ma tAM san+to Sho ya di nAsti tat+ki ma pa rA b+hU mir+n+ni d+hA nA dr-i tA/ /saM t+ye bA ti sha ya pra sA da ti ra sAstA stA ra he ma kr-i yAHka s+yeSh+Ta pri ya saM ga mA ya ba pu ShAM se bA ma yo bi kra yaH/ /i t+ya pa ra d+hi yasta
<p>362a.4</p>blo ldan rnams kyis 'thob/ /gal te chog shes med na gzhan pa ci zhig sa la gter rnams rgyas pa dang / /phul byung rab dang gser dang dngul gyi bya ba de dag yod pa nyid/ /dga' dang 'grogs pa'i slad du lus ni g.yog gi rang bzhin du 'tsho su zhig 'dod/ /ces pa blo gros gzhan de yis/ /
<p>362a.5</p>s+ya ba tsaHshru twA ma hI pa tiH/ /gr-i h+ya tA ma pa raM kiny+tsi di t+ya b+hA Sha ta sA da raH/ /au tsi t+ya tsa tu rA lA saHkarka sho pi nr-i NAM pri yaH/ /kr-i pa Na shaT+Ta ka ro pi kar+N+Na shu lA ya ko ma laH/ /au dAR+Ya pa ri tuSh+Te na sa rA
<p>362a.6</p>tshig thos nas ni sa yi bdag /gus dang bcas pas gzhan pa ni/ /cung zad blang bar mdzod ces smras/ /rigs shing brjod pa mkhas pa yi/ /rtsub mo la yang mi rnams dga'/ /bkren pa rnams kyis ngo bstod ni/ /'jam yang rna ba na ba'i rgyu/ /rgya cher yongs su tshims pa yi/ /rgyal
<p>362b</p>
<p>362b.1</p>dz+nya s+t+yar+thi taHpa raM/ /ta mU tse ya di tuSh+To si pu tA ma h+yaM pra dI ya tAm/ /i t+yuk+te te na nr-i ba teHsan+de hAn+do li tA ya shaH/ /pra tar+b+bak+tA ha mi t+yuk+t+wA k+Sha NaM k+Sh+mA ta la mai k+Sh+ya te/ /sa ku mA ra bi pr-i dz+yA tha prA d+hA nA mA t+ya ma pra
<p>362b.2</p>pos mchog tu gsol ba btab/ /de la smras pa gal te khyod/ /sim na bu mo bdag la stsol/ /des de brjod tshe mi bdag ni/ /bsam pa the tshom 'phyang mor gyur/ /nang par bdag smras zhes smras nas/ /skad cig sa gzhi dag la bltas/ /de nas gzhon nu btang nas des/ /blon po'i gtso bo la
<p>362b.3</p>bI ta/ /pra sA da ra b+ha se nai ba kr-i tAM kA ka tsA pa laM ma yA/ /tsakra bar+t+ti ku lot+pan+nA ka n+yA pu N+ya pa No tsi tA/ /ka thaM sa mA n+ya sau rA ya gu Na mA tre Na dI ya te/ /da dA mI ti pra ti shru t+ya pash+tsa da nu sha yA ku
<p>362b.4</p>smras pa/ /rab dang gzu lums dag gis ni/ /bya rog bzhin du g.yo ba byas/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs 'khrungs pa'i/ /bu mo bsod nams zod la 'os/ /grong pa thun mong pa la ni/ /yon tan tsam gyis ji ltar sbyin/ /sbyin no zhes ni rab bsgrags nas/ /rjes su 'gyod pas gzir gyur
<p>362b.5</p>laH/ /ka thaM sa d+ya d+ha no b+hU twA b+ha bi Sh+yA myar+thi ni Sh+pha laH/ /kaM thaM prAp+ta s+ya ta s+yA haM prA ta r+d+r-iSh+T+wA mu Sha pu raH/ /pr-i yo s+ya pr-i ya tA yA taHsA ma durla b+ha yAs+tha yA/ /nU na gu No pa san+no pi pra kr-i t+yai ba sha rI ri NAM/ /
<p>362b.6</p>pa'o/ /bden nor ldan par gyur pa bdag /slong ba 'bras med ji ltar 'gyur/ /nong par mdun du de 'ongs pa'i/ /bzhin ni bdag gis ji ltar lta/ /bdag la rnyed dka' des bslangs nas/ /mdza' yang mdza' min nyid du gyur/ /rang bzhin nyid kyis lus can rnams/ /nges par yon tan yongs
<p>363a</p>
<p>363a.1</p>bak+ti yA ban+na de hi ti tA bad+b+ha ba ti bal+la b+haH/ /i ti b+hU pa tiHshru twA ba tso do la ba lam+bi naH/ /ta mu bA tsa ma hA mA t+yaHsaM tsin+d+ya ba sa ro tsi taM/ /a nA lo tsi ta paR+Yan+tAHpra t+ya gra sa ra
<p>363a.2</p>rdzogs kyang / /ji srid bslang zhes ma brjod par/ /de srid snying du sdug pa yin/ /zhes pas bdag khyogs la ni/ /nges par bstan pa'i tshig thos nas/ /blon po chen pos gnas skabs su/ /'os pa bsams nas de la smras/ /rje bo dag gi blo gros rnams/ /bgros pa min pa'i
<p>363a.3</p>sA da rAH/ /swa b+hA ba ra b+ha swa e ba b+ha ban+ti pra b+hu bud+d+ha yA/ /a shakyAr+tha na yA taM na lub+d+he ne ba gu No da yaH/ /rA dza se ba pra br-it+te na he ma hastI bi nA shi taH/ /bA ts+yo sau b+ha ba tA swai raM ka n+yAr+thI pu
<p>363a.4</p>mthar thug cing / /gsar du chags ldan gus pa dang / /rang bzhin gzu lums ldan pa yis/ /sred ldan mi nus don gnyer bas/ /yon tan 'byung gnas bzhin du ni/ /rgyal po'i g.yog la rab zhugs des/ /gser gyi glang chen rnam par bcom/ /bu mo slong ba slar 'ongs tshe/ /khyod kyis
<p>363a.5</p>na rA ga taH/ /he ma hasti na mA ru h+ya prAp+taHprAs+s+ya si me su taM/ /te no ta kr-it+taHsra ha ste na ku tasta s+ya sa kuny+dza riH/ /na tsA sau tad+bi ra hi taHpu na rA yA ti ladz+dza yA/ /i t+ya mA t+ya s+ya ba tsa sA nr-i pa tiR+Yuki mA shri taH/ /
<p>363a.6</p>dal bus 'di brjod bya/ /gser glang zhon te 'ongs pa na/ /bdag gi bu mo thob par 'gyur/ /de yi rang lag gis bsad nas/ /de la glang po ga la yod/ /de dang bral ba'i ngo tsha yis/ /slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa blon po'i tshig gis ni/ /nyin gzhan gzhon nu 'ongs pa la/ /
<p>363b</p>
<p>363b.1</p>prAp+taM ku mA ra ma n+ye d+yusta dai bA b+hi mu kho ba data/ /ku mA ro pi gr-i ha ga twA bi bA ho tsi ta maM ga leH/ /hai ma dwi ra da mA ru h+ya swa dza na na sa hA ya yau/ /swar+N+Na bA ra Na dU D+hAn+ta mA yan+taM ma hI pa tiH/ /bi lokyAsh+tsaR+Ya
<p>363b.2</p>lugs la brten pa'i mi bdag gis/ /mngon du phyogs te de nyid smras/ /gzhon nu yang ni khyim song nas/ /bag ma len 'os bkra shis kyis/ /gser gyi so gnyis la zhon te/ /rang gi mi dang lhan cig 'ongs/ /gser gyi glang chen la zhon nas/ /'ong ba de ni sa bdag gis/ /mthong nas ngo mtshar
<p>363b.3</p>bi b+ha ba me ne pu N+ya ba tAM ba raM/ /kau tu kA da tha b+hU sa lastaM ga dzaM he ma bi gra haM/ /A du ro ha ma hot+sA h+yaHsu me ru mi ba badzra b+h+rita/ /A dU D+he pr-i thi bI pA le na tsa tsA la sa kuny+dza raH/ /pra sa sar+b+baku mA re Na
<p>363b.4</p>'byor pa can/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i mchog tu shes/ /de nas rgyal pos dge mtshan las/ /glang po gser lus can de la/ /spro ba chen pos lhun po la/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du zhon/ /sa skyong gis ni zhon pa'i tshe/ /glang po de ni mi g.yo zhing / /stan ni gzhon nus brgyan pa'i tshe/ /slar
<p>363b.5</p>pu na sh+tsA laM kr-i tA sa naH/ /tam+ma twA nr-i pa ti re baM tat+p+ra b+hA be na bismi taH/ /d+ha n+yosmI ti ba dan+ka n+yAM da dau tasmai sma ra shri yaM/ /a b+h+yar+ts+ya ka n+yA rat+ne na nr-i pa tiHpu ru Shot+ta maM/ /haR+Shot+sa ba sa mud+b+hU taHsu d+hA sin d+hU ri bA pa
<p>363b.6</p>yang rab tu g.yo bar gyur/ /mi bdag gis de lhar shes shing / /de yi mthu yis ya mtshan pas/ /bdag ni skal bzang zhes brjod cing / /bu mo 'dod dpal de la byin/ /rin chen bu mos skyes bu mchog /ma nor mchod nas mi yi bdag /spro dga' yang dag rgyas gyur pa/ /bdud rtsi'i/
<p>364a</p>
<p>364a.1</p>b+hau/ /ta taHku mA ra da yi tA mA dA ya swa gr-i haM ga te/ /sa pha lo b+hU da naM ga s+ya kArmu ka kaR+Sha Na shra maH/ /na be ba ya saM b+ho gAr+he na ba kAn+tA sa mA ga mo/ /ta sA b+hUd+bi b+ha bo dA raHsa dA
<p>364a.2</p>rgya mtsho bzhin du mdzes/ /de nas gzhon nus mdzes ma ni/ /blangs nas rang gi khyim song ste/ /lus med gzhu ni drangs pa yis/ /ngal ba 'bras bu yod par gyur/ /lang tsho gsar pa longs spyod 'os/ /mdzes ma gsar pa dang 'grogs te/ /'byor pa rgya ches rtag tu des/ /
<p>364a.3</p>na ba na bat+so baH/ /ta taHka dA tsid+b+hu bA lAHkr-i ta kr-i t+yaHpra se na dzita/ /pu N+ya pra b+hA baM dzA mA tuHka la yan+sa ma tsin+ta yata/ /a ho di byaHpra b+hA bo sau ku mA rA s+ya pra dr-i sh+ya taM/ /na hi sA mA n+ya puN+yA nAM sA ko b+ha
<p>364a.4</p>gsar pa gsar pa dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas nam zhig sa skyong ni/ /bya ba byas pa gsal rgyal gyis/ /bsod nams mthu ldan mag pa dag /yid la gcags shing rab bsams pa/ /kye ma lha yi mthu 'di ni/ /gzhon nu dag la rab tu mthong / /gang phyir thun mong bsod nams rnams/ /de ltar
<p>364a.5</p>ba ti tad+bi d+haH/ /ku laM lak+Sh+mI harmyaM hri ta sha shi ma dA rU pa ra ha li ba yaHsaM b+ho gAr+haM gu Na pa ri tsa yo b+hU Sha Na tsa yaH/ /ya shaHpu N+yo d+ya na pra pr-i ta ku su mol+lA sa sa tsi baM na bid+maHka s+yA yaM ku sha la
<p>364a.6</p>min par 'gyur ma yin/ /rigs ni dpal 'byor khang bzang gzugs kyi rba rlabs zla ba'i dregs pa 'phrog /lang tsho longs spyod 'os dang yongs su 'dris pa'i yon tan rgyan gyi tshogs/ /grags pa bsod nams skyed tshal rab 'khrungs me tog rab tu bkram pa'i grogs/ /'byor pa 'di ni
<p>364b</p>
<p>364b.1</p>pa ri NA ma s+yA bi b+ha baH/ /i ti saM tsin+ta su tsi raM sa saM dzA ta ku tU ha laH/ /sar+b+ba dz+nyA daR+sha nA bar+d+ha mA ru ro ha ma no ra tha/ /sa dzA mA ta ra mA hu ya su taM tsa sa tsi baiHsa ha/ /b+ha ga ban+taM ya
<p>364b.2</p>dge ba yongs smin ci yi 'bras bu yin par yongs mi shes/ /dge mtshan yang dag skyes pa des/ /de ltar yang dag bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas blta ba la btags pa'i/ /yid kyi shing rta dag la 'dzegs/ /mag pa bu mo bos nas ni/ /blon po dag dang lhan cig tu/ /yid ni sngon du 'gro ba
<p>364b.3</p>yau dr-iSh+TaM ma na sA pra thA maM ga taH/ /yA te dr-iSh+Ti pa thaM dze ta ba ne saM t+ya dz+ya ba ha naM/ /u pa sr-i t+ya nr-i pa pad+d+h+yaM b+ha ga ban taM bya lo ka yata/ /sa taM pra Na mya ta ha pA da pad+ma b+hU ti shi khA ma NiH/ /su tAM dzA mA ta rany+tsAsmai
<p>364b.4</p>yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la lta ru song / /rgyal byed tshal ni mig lam du/ /gyur tshe bzhon pa yang dag btang / /rkang pas nyer btud mi bdag gis/ /bcom ldan 'das la rnam par bltas/ /der btud de yi zhabs pad kyis/ /gtsug gi nor bu g.yo ba des/ /bu mo mag pa btud pa dag /de la
<p>364b.5</p>na mro nAm+nA n+ya be da yata/ /u pa biSh+Ta Shu sarbe Shu pra NA mA na ta mau li Shu/ /sa prats+tsha rA dza sar+b+ba dz+nya b+ha ga ban+ta kr-i tAM dza liH/ /a yaM gu Na ga No pe taHku mA raHshri mA tAM ba raH/ /he me na dan+ti nA yA tAM b+ha ga
<p>364b.6</p>ming gis rnam par bshad/ /thams cad 'khor zhing phyag 'tshal te/ /kun nas mgo bo dud pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pa la/ /thal mo sbyar nas rgyal pos dris/ /bcom ldan las ni ci zhig gis/ /gzhon nu dpal ldan rnams kyi mchog /yon tan tshogs ni rgyas pa 'di/ /
<p>365a</p>
<p>365a.1</p>ban+to na kar+m+ma NA/ /i yaM tsI bar ka n+YA tsa mat+su ta s+ya na bA bad+ng+ha/ /ke na bu N+yA bi pA ke na 'dzI bi tA da d+hi pal+la b+hA/ /i ti br-iSh+TaHk+Sha tI she na sar+b+bA bid+b+ha ga bAn 'dzi naH/ ta mu tse b+hU pa te
<p>365a.2</p>gser gyi glang pos 'gro ba lags/ /'di yi bag gsar bdag gi ni/ /bu mo gos kyis mdzes ma 'di/ /bsod nams gang gi rnam smin gyis/ /srog las lhag par snying du sdug /sa yi bdag pos 'di dris tshe/ /kun rig bcom ldan rgyal ba yis/ /der gsungs skyes bu'i
<p>365a.3</p>puM sAM pu N+yod+b+hU tA bi b+hU ta yaH/ /ya du dA raM ya du tsi te yad+d+h+rA dziSh+Nu mad+b+hu tAM/ /spr-i ha NI yaM tsa yat+lo ket+tat+pu N+ya sa mud+b+ha baM/ /bi pa sh+yi b+ha ga bAn pUr+b+baM su ga taHsa ha b+hik+Shu b+hiH/ /tsa tsA ra lo
<p>365a.4</p>'byor pa rnams/ /sa bdag bsod nams dag las byung / /'jig rten na ni 'dod bya gang / /rgya che gang dang 'os pa gang / /mdzes pa gang dang rmad byung gang / /de de bsod nams nyid las 'byung / /bcom ldan bde gshegs rnam par gzigs/ /dge slong dag dang lhan cig sngon/ /rgyal po
<p>365a.5</p>ka kr-i pa yA rA dz+nyo ban+d+hu ma taHpu re/ /tasmin+na ba sa re ta traku mA R+yA sa ha dA ra kaH/ /bi krI DA bar+t+t+ma ni pu raHkr-i dwA dA ru ma yaM ga dzaM/ /tau bi lo kya sa mA yAn+taM d+h+mA ta dzaM bU na da d+yu tiM/ /pul+la pad+ma da lA kA
<p>365a.6</p>gnyen ldan grong khyer du/ /'jig rten la ni brtse bas rgyu/ /gnas skabs der ni khye'u zhig /gzhon nu ma dang 'grogs nas ni/ /shing gi rang bzhin glang po byas/ /lam gyi mdun der rnam par rtse/ /bcom dzam+bu na da'i 'od/ /pad 'dab rgyas pa'i rnam pa can/ /yid 'ong snying rje'i spyan ldan
<p>365b</p>
<p>365b.1</p>ra ka ru NA sni g+d+d+ha lo tsa naM/ /b+ha ga ban+taM sa mud+b+hu ta tad+b+hak+ti pa ra son+mu khau/ /krI DA ga dzaM ni be d+yAsmai pra Na tau tas+tha tuHphu raH/ /b+ha ga bA na pi sar+b+ba dz+nya sta yor+dz+nyA twA ma no ra thaM/ /da ya yA tsa ra Na spaR+shaM bi da
<p>365b.2</p>pa/ /bcom ldan byon pa de dag gis/ /mthong nas de la gus pa rgyas/ /rjes su chags pas mngon phyogs te/ /de la rtse cha glang po ni/ /phul nas mdun du btud de gnas/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas kyang / /de dag bsam pha mkhyen gyur nas/ /brtse bas shing gi glang po la/ /zhabs
<p>365b.3</p>d+he dA ru dan+ti naH/ /samyak+tsit+ta pra sA de na dr-iSh+To b+ha ga ba to\u0f85tha tau/ /pra Ni d+hA ni bi bA hA ya tsakra tu rdA ra kau mi thaH/ /ku la pra b+hA ba bi b+ha bair+b+hU yAdz+dzan+ma ma yo tsi ta/ /bA ha naM he ma dan+ti tsa ku mA ra s+ye t+ya b+hUt+ma
<p>365b.4</p>pad dag gis rag par mdzad/ /de nas de dag bcom ldan gyis/ /yang dag dang ba'i thugs gyis gzigs/ /phan tshun khye'u bu mo dag /khyo shug tu ni smon lam byas/ /gser gyi glang po'i bzhon pa dang / /rigs dang mthu dang 'byor pa yis/ /bdag gi skye ba 'os gyur cig /ces par gzhon nu'i blo
<p>365b.5</p>tiH/ /dr-iSh+ThA b+ha ga ba taHka n+ya saM sIk+ta tsA ru tsI ba re/ /dzan+ma tsI ba ra yuk+tA ya ma ma sI da t+ya tsin+ta yatra/ /sa e Sha pra Ni d+hA ne na dzA ta ste ne ba hasta kaH/ /i yaM tsI ba ra ka n+yA tsa ta nu tsI ba ra lak+Sha NA/ /i ti
<p>365b.6</p>gros gyur/ /bu mos bcom ldan chos gos ni/ /mdzes pa dang ldan mthang gyur nas/ /bdag gi skye ba chos gos dang / /ldan par gyur cig ces pa bsams/ /de ni smon lam da dag gis/ /glang po can 'di nyid du skyes/ /chos gos bu mo 'di yang ni/ /lus ni chos gos kyis mtshan no/ /bde gshegs
<p>366a</p>
<p>366a.1</p>shru twA k+Shi ti pa tistad+b+r-it+taM su ga to di taM/ /mu ku Ta spr-iSh+Ta tat+pA da pad+maHswa b+ha ba naM ya yau/ /dza te sa bisma ya rA dz+nyi ku mA raHsa ha dza ya yA/ /ka th+ya mA naM b+ha ga ba tA d+har+m+maM shru shrA ba shud+d+had+d+hiH/ /ta ta stau dzA tA
<p>366a.2</p>gyis gsungs byung tshul de/ /de ltar sa bdag gis thos nas/ /cod pan de yi zhabs bde la/ /reg nas rang gi khang par song / /rgyal po ya mtshan bcas song tshe/ /gzhon nu chung mar bcas pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /chos ni dag pa'i blo yis thos/ /de nas de dag chags
<p>366a.3</p>be rA gyau k+ShI Na saM sA ra bA sa nau/ /pra bra dz+ya yA dzi ta kla shau shud+d+hI bo d+hi ma pA sa tuH/ /bi ta ta su kr-i ta su kraM ta pu N+yA b+h+yA sa yo ge na puM sAM b+h+wa ba ti ku sha la b+hA dzaM d+hAr+m+ma kA mAr+tha sam+pa ta/ /a b+hi ma ta ma tha b+huk+t+wA tat+pha laM
<p>366a.4</p>bral skyes/ /'khor ba'i bag chags nyams gyur cing / /rab tu byung bas nyon mongs btul/ /dag pa'i byang chub thob par gyur/ /rgya che legs byas goms pa'i sbyor bas bsod nams bsten pa yi/ /skyes bu rnams ni chos 'dod don yang dge bas phun tshogs 'gyur/ /de nas de 'bras mngon 'dod spyad nas gus
<p>366a.5</p>sA da rA te bi g+ha na ga ga na kAn+tiM shAn+ti man+te b+ha dzan+de/ /i ti k+She men+d+ra bi ra tsi tA yAM bo d+hi sa twA ba dA na kalpa la tA yAM hasta kA ba dA na mU na pany+tsa shaHpal+la baH// //
<p>366a.6</p>bcas de dag rnams/ /sprin bral mkha' ltar mdzes pa'i zhi ba mjug tu ston par byed/ /ces pa dge ba'i dbang pos byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi 'khri shing las glang po can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa'i yal 'dab ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //
